1b1(rgyud):
1b2(rgyud): du/ 'adz+ra shi ba ma du
1b3(rgyud): chen po'i rgyud rdo rje
2a1(rgyud): // phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag
2a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de bzhi/ nu gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal
2a3(rgyud): lo// de nas rgyal po rje rje 'chang // kun mchog sred pa'i dbang phyug gis// 
2a4(rgyud): 'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas// rnal 'byor can ni mi gsung bzhugs/ 
2b1(rgyud): mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun// ma lus thub pa'i skyes mchog gis// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// thub
2b2(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug la gsol 'debs// rnal 'byor tshul chen sgrub byed cing // cho ga sna tshogs yang dag 'byung // rigs
2b3(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba 'i// 'khor lo mchog no shad du gsol// mgon po khyod na
2b4(rgyud): skal chen te// khyod ni bya ba don sems byed// gsang ba mkhyen cing dgongs bshod mkhyen// rnal 'byor rig pas
2b5(rgyud): mchog gyur gsungs// de nyid rjes kyi de nyid ldan// rnal 'byor bdag nyid rnal 'byor che// rdo rje chen po byang chub sems// 
3a1(rgyud): // gsungs shig gsungs shig tshul chen po// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ste// rdo rje rnal 'byor sna tshogs bdag/ 
3a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po dkyil 'khor che// chos kyi tshul ni sgrub byed pa// rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// chos kyi don 'di ci yin
3a3(rgyud): brjod/ 'dir ni rtog pa ji lta bu/ sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma// rgyud don ci yin brjod
3a4(rgyud): par bgyi// ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma lags// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung // rdo rje chang drag 'di ci zhig/ drag po'i
3a5(rgyud): don ni ji ltar byung // rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig/ ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod// phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir// rdo rje gtum po'ang ci zhig lags// 
3a6(rgyud): ci yi phyir ni gtum por brjod// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa// ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par bgyi// rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci// de
3b1(rgyud): mi rdo rje ji lta bu// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni dri// rdo rje rigs kun gang gi lags// chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas// rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod
3b2(rgyud): ci yi phyir na rigs su brjod// rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig/ ci yi phyir na sems dpa' brjod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// ci yi
3b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' lags// rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod// rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci// rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod// rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir/ 
3b4(rgyud): rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod// rdo rje rgyal// mtshan bzhad pa che// gsungs shig ci yin pa// rjod pa gsungs// ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos
3b5(rgyud): rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod// rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che// rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod// rdo rje las dang ga nod sbyin che// rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che// 
3b6(rgyud): rdo rje srung ba khu tshur che// gsungs shig ci yin brjod par gsungs// sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung // de bzhin pa dang ma ni gang // dang po
3b7(rgyud): gang zhig gleng gzhi dang // dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gang zhig lags// gsang ba 'di ni gang las byung // khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung // thog ma tha ma
4a1(rgyud): med 'di ni// gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs// rab tu dga' nyid rab bzang nyid// rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bur// ci yi phyir na
4a2(rgyud): kun tu bzang // de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung // chos kun skye ba med pa dang // 'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// byang chub sems
4a3(rgyud): dpa' ci yin brjod// ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod// bcom ldan 'das bcom ci yin brjod// de
4a4(rgyud): bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci// ci yi phyir/ de ni ye shes brjod// shes rab ye shes ci yin/ brjod// ci phyir shes rab brjod par
4a5(rgyud): bya// de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin tshul ni ci zhig ting 'dzin gang // bsam gtan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ci/ srid gsu
4a6(rgyud): 'jig rten gsumangon ci// ci yi phor yang khams gsum pa// 'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin// mya ngan 'das pa'ang ci yin brjod// rtag dang
4a7(rgyud): 'jig dang de bzhin dag/ theg pa chen po ci yin brjod// na mkha' yang ni ci yi phyir// sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod// 'byung ba chen po gang las 'byung
4a8(rgyud): 'gog pa ci zhig gang gis byed// ci yi phyir na phyag rgyar brjod// ci phyir sngagaso su brjod par bya// ci yi phyir na reg sngags brjod// de bzhin kho na
4b1(rgyud): gzung sngags rnams// phyag rgya yi na mtshan nyid gsungs// sngags kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya// rig sngags kyi ni mtshan 'ad gsungs// de bzhin khonar gzungs sngags rnams
4b2(rgyud): rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang // ji ltar bcing 'thub chen po// phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ban// ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes// rig sngags ji ltar bzlas par bgyi// thub pa chen po
4b3(rgyud): gsungaso shig/ rig sngags dag ni zlos pa ni// ji ltar yid kyi rdo rje bltas// dri ba'i tsho gas mdor stan pa'o// oMn ci zhig yin par bshad// yi ge hUM ni ci yin brjod// ci yi phyir/ 
4b4(rgyud): na yige phaT// swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod// mchod pa phyir brjod par bya// de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid dang // ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor/ 
4b5(rgyud): dang por zhugs pa yi// skyes pa yang na bud med kyis/ bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni// gsungs shig bsang ba'i dab / nga phyug che// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la// sdom pa
4b6(rgyud): ji ltar sbyin par bgyi// de yis srog gi phyir yang ni// dor bar mi bya gang zhig lags// khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya// de bzhin kho nar phyogs bcing ba// bgegs rnams bcing ba dang
4b7(rgyud): bcas pa'i// log 'dren ji ltar bskrad par bgyi// dga' ba chen po ji ltar bur// rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bgyi// spos dang me tog de bzhin du// mar me mchod sogs ji ltar lags
4b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor brtag pa ji lta bur// gzhug pa yang ni ji ltar lags// dam tshig ci zhig yin par po shad// rdo rje slob ma'i cho ga gang // sngon du bsnyen pa ji ltar bgyi// sgrub pa'i don ni
5a1(rgyud): ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu// snyoms 'jug ji lta bu zhig lags// bdun du dgugs pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// 'dir ni rje su chags pa'ang ji lta
5a2(rgyud): bu/ bcing bar bya ba'i las ni ji lta bu// 'dren pa rnams ni mnyes par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dir ni gshig su gsol ba lags// dkyil 'khor mchog ni ji ltar gdeg par
5a3(rgyud): bgyid 'gro ba'i bya ba yang ji ltar bgyi// las kyi cho ga'i bya ba ji ltar bgyi// dge ba stug po gsang chen ji lta bu// las rnams tha dad bya ba ji lta bu// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan ni ji lta
5a4(rgyud): bgyi// mchod dang mchod pa'i lan ni ji ltar blang // dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo ji ltar 'byung // 'khor lo'i rna dam pa'i bye brag du zhig 'chis// dngos dang dngos med ji
5a5(rgyud): ltar spang ba lags// bla ma gsang byung 'od zer gsang / ba ni// sbyin sreg rnam pa du ru brjod// thab khung ji lta bu zhig legs// sbyin sreg mdor bsdus ji lta bu// las/ 
5a6(rgyud): rnams rnam pa du ru brjod// gsang ba rnams ni rnam pa du// mchog tu gsang ba ji ltar brjod// de nyid ji lta bu zhig lags// phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ci// mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags// 
5a7(rgyud): rigs kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// ji ltar sgrub bya shin tu bsgrub// rdo rje phra mo ji ltar brjod// bgeg ni ji ltar bsal bar bgyi// mdor na rig pa 'dzin pa dang // slob dpon ji lta bu zhig
5a8(rgyud): lags// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang ldan pa'o// 'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod// dngos grub mtshan nyid sgrub byed pa'i// sna tshogs rtog pa ji lta bu// thig rnams brtag pa nyid dang ni
5b1(rgyud): dngos grub ji ltar nye bar brjod// dngos grub tshogs ni ji lta bu// gsang ba kun nas btus pa gsungs// bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bar// bya ba'i cho ga ji lta bu// yang na gzhan dag nyid
5b2(rgyud): la ni// dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar lags// ji ltar sems ni bskyed par bgyi// ting 'dzin ji lta bu zhig lags// de nyid rig pa 'di rtag tu// rdo rje ye shes ji lta bu// gzhan yang dgo
5b3(rgyud): pa ji lta bu// spyod pa ji lta bu zhig lags// gang yang rung ba'i rtags las byung // ming dang ming min shes pa'i mtshan// las 'bras med par byed pa dang // 'dzin par byed par gang
5b4(rgyud): las bshad// lus ni na mkha' bzhin 'byung ba/ gang las byung bar brjod par bya// ci yi phyir na thar bar bya rjod// rnal 'byor ba don ci yin brjod// rdo rje dbyings ni
5b5(rgyud): bskyed byed pa'i// rdo rje phra mo'i rnal 'byor gang // gzhan ya nga rang gi rigs dag las// rnal 'byor rtul zhugs rdza ltar brtsam// mdor na dbang du bya ba dang // de nyid bsang ba
5b6(rgyud): gang zhig lags// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// gsang ba rtog chen las gsungs pa// dgongs pa rnam pa du ma yis// gsang ba gsungs shig blo gros che// rnal 'byor
5b7(rgyud): rnam pa du ru brjod// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung du// ji ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud du brjod// gsang ba'i rigs byung ji lta bu// nga ni rang byung nyid yin te// khams gsum 'jig rten sa 'og dang // sa
5b8(rgyud): stengs sa bla mya ngan 'das// ji skad bshad pa'i gsang ba gzhan// rdo rje can nyid khyab 'jug rang nyid yin// nyi ma zla ba gshin rje drag po nyid// rang nyid skye dgu'i bdag ste pha ma yin// 
6a1(rgyud): 'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// dri ba'i tshogs gnyis pa mdor stan pa'o// tshangs pa 'jig rten gsum las dbang phyug che// gdong drug tshogs bcas
6a2(rgyud): lha'i rigs dkyil 'khor rnams// gzhan yang bza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa// nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// nga ni 'dod pa thar pang // nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba pa/ 
6a3(rgyud): nga ni yi dgas dud 'gro ba dag/ tshig de ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang 'dod la chags sems ldan// lta bcas tshig ldan 'dzin pa'i lta la chagaso// mu stegs theg dam
6a4(rgyud): mngon dga' skye dgu'i rigs// ji ltar 'dod bzhin don rnams rtog byed cing // ji skad bshad pa'i sna tshogs rigs dkyil 'khor// dag pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas
6a5(rgyud): dgongs mi shes// rang gi 'dod pas mu ngan rtog byed pa/ de la skye dgu bdag chen brtse bas gsungs// mtsho da 'os chen po mchog dang po yi gnas// gsang ba'i bas
6a6(rgyud): mchog mngon sdus dbye bar bsol// skye dgu'i bdag po'i dkyil 'khor gsang mdun du// dam tshig mchod pas ji ltar mchod par bya// 'dod yon lngar bcas rol bar byed pa
6a7(rgyud): yis// dngos grub tshegs mchog chen po thob par 'gyur// dman pa'i 'dod las rigs kyi dngos grub 'byung // 'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de bzhin b+ha go ji lta
6a8(rgyud): rtags ci 'dra// de yi 'jug pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// rdzas de dag ni ji ltar rab tu sgrub// 'jig rten gsum na dman pa ji ltar 'gyur// de nas 'dod chags zhen pas dngos
6b1(rgyud): grub thog/ 'dod chags dag phyir de ni ji ltar rung // chags bral sdig pas chags dang bral ba la// gsang bstan pas sdig pas ji ltar 'gyur// btor bas bsod nams mchog thob
6b2(rgyud): ji lta bu'i skyes dgu bsad pas bsod nams ji lta bu// ma byin blang bas bsod nams 'gyur zhes pa'i// 'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// dga' ba chen po'i bud med sten pa yis// 
6b3(rgyud): tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas mchog 'grub pa// mi gtsang 'dod pa sten pas sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bar ji ltar 'gyur// 'dir ni rdzun dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams med// ji
6b4(rgyud): ltar brdzun ni bsod nams ldan par brjod// 'dir ni sem das can gzhan bsad bza' bar bya// 'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// 'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur
6b5(rgyud): bdang / mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba chos ma yin// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyi ni rjes 'jug pa// chos min 'gyur zhe/ sa ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// dregs dang ser sna sdang ba'i sems
6b6(rgyud): ldan pa// chos min spyod cing brdzun pa'i tshig la chags// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags bcas pa'i lhag par rgyal// rigs kyi rnal 'byor las byung ji ltar 'grub// bla med go 'phang dngos grub
6b7(rgyud): 'dod pa yi// dag cing rnal 'byor rnal 'byor lhur blang bya// sbyor gcin mthung dang bshang ba za ba yis// dag cing mchog gyur rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod// mi gtsang bshang gci zos shing
6b8(rgyud): 'thung ba yis// yid 'dod dngos grub ji ltar dngos grub 'dod// bud med bcas par lhan cig chos spyod cing // gnyis ka lhan cig gyur pas dag gtsang mchod// ji ltar bud med lhan
7a1(rgyud): cig dkyil 'khor mchod// dngos grub dam pa mchog tu ji ltar 'gyur// gzhan yang rdo rje rigs 'byung kun ldan zhing // mchog tu mi bzangad drag po'i las can te// dag cing shin
7a2(rgyud): tu sdug la mtho bar 'gro/ 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rdeg dang bsad pa lhur len zhing // bskad dang drag pa'i las can de dag ni// dag cing shin tu sdug la mtho bar
7a3(rgyud): 'gro/ 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin// gzhan yang bza' dang btung ba lhur len cing // snying 'byin pa yis dag par 'dod pa nyid// de ni dag cing sdug la mtho bar 'gro/ 'gal ba de ni ji ltar
7a4(rgyud): rung ba yin// gzhan yang nor bu rin chen 'phrog pa yis// / sdug cing bstan la dag cing mthor 'gro dang // gzhan yang nga rgyal ser sna lhur len pas// dag par 'gyur ba nyid ni 'gal/ 
7a5(rgyud): ba yin// gzhan yang las kyi rig pa byung ba yis// mi dge ba yid las rnams thams cad bya// 'khrig sogs las kyi ze tshogs rnam mang po'i// las byed pa ni ji ltar
7a6(rgyud): skyon mi 'gyur// gzhan yang brdzun tshig de bzhin 'khrig pa yis// dag 'dod 'phags pa min pas gsang ba yi// rgyal ba'i dbang chen 'dod pas bdud rtsi ltar// sdug cing mthor 'gro/ 
7a7(rgyud): ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// kye mgo na khyod ni dag pa'i chos kyi tshogs te khyod ni rtag tu rnal 'byor 'gyur// kye mgon khyod ni dgyes chen bdud rtsi 'chang ba dam chos gsang ba'i 'byung gnas
7a8(rgyud): te// kye rgyal khyod ni dri med nyi ma bzhin du mi shes kun tu sbyor mdzad pa// khyab byed rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dren chen byang sems dga' ston kye// mdor bsdus pa'o// / 
7b1(rgyud): kun mchog thams cad rig pa ste// kun mkhyen dri ma gsum spangs pa// byang sems sangs rgyas rgyal po che// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ni// ting nge 'dzin las bzhed nas kyang // phyogs
7b2(rgyud): rnams kun tu gzigs mdzad te// thub pas mgon rnams rab tud nas// sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs// kye ma'o rnam dag ye shes bdag/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas nyer thob pa// kye
7b3(rgyud): mdo gar mkhan 'khor lo 'di// rang gi ye shes 'dri bar byed// rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i// mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya// shin tu rnyed dka' dam pa yi// rin chen sgom
7b4(rgyud): gyi khang bye bya// bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi// rgyal mchi na dam pa bsgreng bar bya// rin chen sgrom gyi kha phye nas/ shes rab kyi ni snang bar bya// de nas gsang ba mchog gyur pa/ 
7b5(rgyud): dam pa yang dag bshad par bya// bya ba sgrub pa'i thabs/ chen po// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // gsang ba'i bye brag 'byed byed cing // rnal 'byor dgongs pa rnam par 'grol
7b6(rgyud): de nyid dam pa shes byed pa'i// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga dang // 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor cho ga ste// mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya de'o// rtog pa thams cad bsdus
7b7(rgyud): pa dang // dus gsum khyab pa'i bya bar ldan// gsang ba rnal 'byor kun 'byung zhing // bya ba kun gyi thabs chen gyi// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // sangs rgyas rnal 'byor go gar ldan// 
7b8(rgyud): rdo rje chos ni rab 'jug pa// sku gsum zhes bya gsang chen gyi// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // rdo rje rnal 'byor chog ldan// ma rungs thams cad 'dul byed pa// khams gsum
8a1(rgyud): rnam rgyal zhes bya yi// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // chos kyi rnal 'byor cho gar ldan// pad+ma gar mkhan bskyed byed pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i// rtog pa ba
8a2(rgyud): cad bsdus pa dang // smyon pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rin chen 'khor lo bskyed byed cing // byang chub sems dpa' yid ches byed// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // sangs rgyas kun
8a3(rgyud): gyi thabs chen po// sna tshogs gar mkhan skyed byed pa// las kyi rnal 'byor cho ga yi// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // de nyid shes shing dgongs pa shes// tshul chen mchog na
8a4(rgyud): byed cing // mchog gi dang po sangs rgyas mchog/ rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa ste// go rims bzhin du 'jug byed/ dnga'i// gcig par sems can bya ba byed// bya ba chen po
8a5(rgyud): mchog zhi ba// chos dang longs spyod mchog gyur pas// / sangs rgyas gor mkhan 'khor lo ni// mchog tu ngo/ mtshar gyur pa 'di// skal ba ji bzhin gsang ji bzhin// 
8a6(rgyud): ji ltar sems can 'dul 'gyur bshad// sngon 'gyur 'das pa'i dus su ni// byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing // thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ 
8a7(rgyud): spro ba chen pos ngo mtshar che'i// dka' ba dpag tu med pa spyad // go rim bzhin du de yis ni// dbang bskur bar du legs thob 'gyur// shes rab chen pos sa mthar phyin// gos kyi dbang
8a8(rgyud): ni thob gyur nas// 'og min stug po nyams dga' bar// blo gros chen po zhugs par gyur// bdag ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yis bsams nas ni// bya ba mthar
8b1(rgyud): phyin bdag gis ni// sems can don 'byung thob bya zhes// bya ba de la dgongs nas ni// sngon dang phyi mar bde chen med// chos kyi dga' ba rmang chen po'i// dka' ba spyad par bya sam ste/ byang
8b2(rgyud): chub shing drung bzhugs gyur nas// bya ka'i bya ba kun ldan de// dbugs 'byung rngub pa 'gog pa dang // sems pa med cing g.yo ba med// lus mi gang yang mi 'gul zhing // yan lag spyod par
8b3(rgyud): mi byed de// de bas g.yo ba med chos la// yun ring du ni gnas par 'gyur// phyogs bcu yi ni thub dbang po// sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub dus/ 
8b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal bya bar rigs pa min// de bas bdag cags/ dan lhan cig/ sprul bar bya phyir 'gro snyam du/ dgongs na das thams cad rang chas te// stug po ru ni byon par gyur/ khyon
8b5(rgyud): nas thub pa thams cad kyis// bskul ba mchog ni mdzad par 'gyur// oM badz+ra u ta tiSh+Thad ces pa'i// rigs pa/ sa se gol brdabs nas ni// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
8b6(rgyud): bslang phyogs rnams kun tu bltas pa na// sangs rgyas kyi ni rgya mtsho mthong // thub pas mgon rnams la btud de// bka' stsol zhes ni gsol ba btab// mgon chen sangs rgyas
8b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis// gsung gcig gis ni bka' stsal pa// sems kyi spyod yul ci 'dra zhes// rang gi sems ni so sor rtogs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas// rang gi sems
8b8(rgyud): la rtog bzhin du// yun ring du ni gnas pa ni// sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste// yan lag kun gyis rab btud nas// zhus pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// sems kyi rnam pa ma ma
9a1(rgyud): ste// sems kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// sems kyi spyod yul shes par dka'// khyod la snying po rab sbyin gyis// phra mo'i bzlas pa rab
9a2(rgyud): tu spyod// oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+hi kA ro mi// snying po dag pa blangs na ni// rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du// thang cig de la gnas pa na// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du mthong // de nas sems
9a3(rgyud): 'di ci zhig yin// nyon mongs sa bon can nam ci// dge ba'am mi dge ba yi sems// kun gzhi'i sa bon can sems sam// chos kyi rgyu 'thun rtogs gyur nas// pha rol phyin pa
9a4(rgyud): drug bsten pa// 'di ni sems can dag pa ste// kun nas nyon mongs gnas ma yin// yun ring du ni bsod na mas dang // ye shes tshogs chen bsags pa ste// ji
9a5(rgyud): ltar zla ba gang ba 'di// dag cing dang la rnyog ma med// de/ bzhin tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir// sems ni/ zla ba gang dang mtshungs// dngos po yod dang med min
9a6(rgyud): pa// ji ltar zla ba mtshungs nyid yin// 'on kyang bsod nams ye shes che// rdzogs pa zla ba dang mtshungs bstan// legs byas tshogs ldan rang sems kyi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas
9a7(rgyud): ni// dga' zhing mgu ba skyes nas kyang // slar yang tshig tu rab smras pa// bcom ldan mgon po bdag gis ni// nyon mongs dri ma kun dag cing // gzungs dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i// rang sems
9a8(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong // sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa// thog mar byung ba'i sems 'di bzang // dang por blo bur nyon mongs rnams// byang chub sems kyis dag par bye
9b1(rgyud): dngos po thams cad rnams spangs pa'i// dag pa yi ni snying po 'dis// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// byang chub kyi ni sems la rtogs// oM bi d+hi tsit+ta ud pA da yA mi// snying po dag pa bla
9b2(rgyud): nas ni// sems kyi dbusu rtog pa na// zla ba'i dbusu yang zla ba'i// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong ba ni// thub pa rnams la tshig smras pa// dkyil 'khor gnyis padag mthong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas
9b3(rgyud): kun gsungs pa// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin brtan// brtan par bya ba'i ched du ni// de ni legs par sgrub par gyis// khyod la snying po sbyin bya ste// zlos shing de ni bstan par dgongs/ oM
9b4(rgyud): tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus gnas pa'i// rdo rje chen po sems byed cing // zang ge cig so sor rtags pa ma// shin tu brtan pa mthong gyur nas// smras parjo
9b5(rgyud): ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor dbusu rdo rje mthong // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yi// dbus na rdo rje dang lnga na mthong // de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// lha rnams
9b6(rgyud): kun gyi rdo rje che// rdo rje dbyings ni bskyed pa yi// shin tu brtan pa 'ang smos shig/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko haM// snying po dag pa blangs nas ni// rdo rje'i lus rnam bsgoms pas// de ni sra brtan khong
9b7(rgyud): stong med// rdo rje'i sku ni thob gyur nas// smras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rang bdag rdo rje'i skur mthong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// sangs rgyas gzugasu rnam par sgom// 
9b8(rgyud): oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga te swA thA a he// snying po dag pa blangs nas ni// sangs rgyas gzugs rnam bsgoms pas// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// kun mkhyen ye shes thob par gyur// sangs rgya
10a1(rgyud): / kun la rab btung nas// smras pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// mgon po bdag la byin rlob cing // bdag gi byang chub bstan par mdzod// grags chen sangs rgyas
10a2(rgyud): thams cad kyis// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshig thos nas// mgon rnams thugs kar zhugs par gyur// rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gsungs// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi sa ma bo d+hi dr-i T+Ta badz+ra ban+d+ha grag
10a3(rgyud): chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rig sngags chen po brjod pa na// rdo rje dbyings ni shin tu brtan// de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje thugs
10a4(rgyud): ka nas byung ste// chos kyi dbang bskur bzhi po yi// de tshe thub pa dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' byas pa yi// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba// 'bras bu byang chub
10a5(rgyud): sems ldan gang // rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin/ bskal pa grangs med gsum dag gi/ sbyin dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bzang dang // mkha' mtshungs rin chen thob byed pa// 
10a6(rgyud): nor bu rin chen dbang bskur yin// bskal pa grangs med gsum du ni// gzhan gyis dka' ba spyad pa dang // brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras sgrub pa// rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur yin// de bzhin ga/ 
10a7(rgyud): pa'i snying po dag/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chen te// nyon mongs 'dam gyis ma gos pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur yin// byang chub sems rdzogs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi// dbang bskur bzhi po de
10a8(rgyud): rnams chos kyi dbyings// de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas rang bzhin yon tan dam pa'i tshogs// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru'adong // rdo
10b1(rgyud): rje chos kyi dbang bskur bas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'dong // rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur bas// de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byang ngo // sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che// mkha' mtshungs chos nyid
10b2(rgyud): snying po can// rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur bas// sprul pa yi ni skur 'dod// gsang ba bzhi yi dbang bskur bas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob// de nas ming gi dbang bskur bas// thub de/ 
10b3(rgyud): rnam snang mdzad chen gyur// chos nyid kyang ni yang dag rtogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par brtag/ chos kun dngos po med pa ste// mtshan ma med cing gsal byed med// mtshan nyid
10b4(rgyud): med cing mkha' dang mtshungs// dmigs pa rnam par spang sa pa ste// rang bzhin med cing brjod du med// chos kun gyi ngag gi spyod yul min// gzhan yang gsang bar brtags pa ste/ 
10b5(rgyud): de phyir 'dir ni rtogs par brjod// rtog pa med pa'i chos rna/ mas kyi// chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod// bdag med da // sa po yod pa min// chos rnams med cing rtog pa med// 'o na// 
10b6(rgyud): kyang chos nyid yang dag rtogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par rtogs// rtogs pa nyamasu myong bar brjod// 'dir ni ngo mtshar nyid du rtogs// chos kun gzugs can min pa dang // gzug
10b7(rgyud): can du yang 'di ru bstan// chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min// sgra ru yang ni 'dir bstan te// de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru// rtog pa rtog pa yin par brjod// ci phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos// 
10b8(rgyud): de nyid gsang bsgrub pa'i phyir// las rnams drug po nyid dang ni// gzugs can tshig gi mthu dag dang // 'bras phyir sdom pa'i ngo mtshar te// de phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos// de phyir 'di ni rtogs
11a1(rgyud): par brjod// de bas mtshar chos ri ru// rtog pa 'ab shig rtog pa yin// yang 'dir rtog paji lta ba// sems can kun gyi don pa'i phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bsrung na/ 
11a2(rgyud): pha rol phyin drug spyod pa dang // sten pa rtog pa nyid yin no// sgrub pa'i don ni ji lta bu// gang zag chos las bdag med dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yi// rab tu dga' ba'i sa sgrub pa/ 
11a3(rgyud): sgrub pa'i don yin no// ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma// rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste// 'khor ba rgyud du 'dod pa yin// phyi ma zhes bya pha rol te// rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste// phyi ma snga ma
11a4(rgyud): las byung ba'i// de nyid gsang ba sbas shes pa// rgyud ni dmar brjod pa yin// ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma yin// sa mtha phyin pa'i rgyal ba mchog/ srid pa'i brtson ra las rgal
11a5(rgyud): yin// yang na gang zhig rgal gyur pa// rgyud ni phyi ma rmi/ na par bshad// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung // sems ca/ ni kun la phan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos
11a6(rgyud): longs spyod// sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba ni// rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs byung ba'i// chos dang longs spyod byung ba ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi
11a7(rgyud): gsang chen ni// rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin// rdo rje'i chang drag 'di ci zhig/ sangs rgyas gzugs kyis mi 'dul ba'i// sems can gdug tshogs de yi phyir// rang gi ye shes byang
11a8(rgyud): chub sems// rdo rje drag por yang dag 'byung / drag po'i don ni ji ltar 'byung // drag po drag po'i mig gis ni// drag po'i khro bo zhes su bstan// drag po'i las ni spyong byed rnams// 'chos
11b1(rgyud): shing bzlog par bya ba yin// rdo rje ning 'di ci zhig/ gdug pa kun btul nas ni// slar yang zhi bar yang dag byung // de nyid rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // sems can don gyi thabs ston mdzad/ pa/ 
11b2(rgyud): ldan rnam par sdong mdzad ni// khro ba'adabang phyug dag tu bstan// de nyi zhi dang drag po dang // phyagan rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// ci yi phyir ma ni bar brjod// sna tshogs gzugs can rnal 'byor che/ se
11b3(rgyud): can smin bra 'ba' shig phyir// nyon mongs gdul la brtser dgongs shing // zhi ba'i don ni yang dge byung // phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir// nyon mongs gdug pa nyes gzhom phyir// byang chub
11b4(rgyud): sems kyi rang bzhin bzang // rdo rje phyag na bsnams mdzadad // de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod// dus gsum bdud rnams dede bzhin du// mi mthun phyogs kyis mi shig pa/ byung sa
11b5(rgyud): rang bzhin rdo rje ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa'i chog/ sa// de nas sangs rgyas kun dang ldan// gsang chen rdo rje de lta bu// phyag na rtag tu bsnams pas na// de ni phyag/ 
11b6(rgyud): na rdo rjer brjod// rdo rje gtum po'i don ci zhig/ rdo rje gtum po gnod sbyin che// rdo rje gnod sbyin shin tu brtan// nga rgyal nyon mongs zhags pa za// byang chub sems dpa' rang byung ba/ 
11b7(rgyud): yi phyir na gtum por brjod// gtum gdug drag po chen po ni// rang byung nga nyid kho na ste// srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing // drag po'i don ni gtum po yin// rdo rje khro bo ci yin brjod// 
11b8(rgyud): gsod dang skrod pa drag po ste// de ni khro bo'i don du brjod// nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar// nyon mongs phyogs rnams sreg byed yin// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa// ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par bya// sra
12a1(rgyud): / ni snying po khong stong med// bcang dang gzhig par bya ba min// bsreg par bya min 'jig med pas// stong nying rdo rjer brjod par bya// 'gro drug 'khor lo spong dred cing // sdig pa
12a2(rgyud): bar byed pa yi// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// nyon mongs thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang // byang sems brtan pag
12a3(rgyud): yin pa// de ni rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ de yi rdo rje rje lta bu// rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing // chos su 'dzin pa rnam sbyangs pa// chos rnams ldan/ 
12a4(rgyud): gyi de bzhin nyid// stong pa nyid ni rdo rje brjod// gzugs de sogs chos kyi rang bzhin gang // 'gyur ba med pa'i de ni na nyid// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa gang / de lta bu ni 'ong
12a5(rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi don 'di ci// bden ning don yod de/ zhin nyid// 'gyur ba med cing skye ba med// 'gag med de/ kho na nyid gang // de lta bu ni rdo rje yin// don yod 'gyurab
12a6(rgyud): med pa yi// de lta bu yi rigs gyur pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rigasu brjod// de ni rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya// thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos// byang chub sems dpa' zhesu brjod// bden zhing sku
12a7(rgyud): ba med pa yi// byang chub sems dang de rigs yin// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du// phyogs rnams thams cad kun khyab pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni// chos dbyings dang / 
12a8(rgyud): mnyam thug pa med// rdo rje 'chang rnams de snyed do// rdo rje'i rigs kun gang gi yin// chos kyi bdag po bla med pa// rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas// mgon des yongs su
12b1(rgyud): gzung ba de'i// de yi dkyil 'khor yin gsungs pa// ston pa gang zhig 'di rnam su'i// rjesu ston par byed pa gang // de yi spyod lam bya ba ci// gsang ba kun tu bsdus pas gsungs// 'di yi
12b2(rgyud): ston pa byang chub sems// rjesu ston byed shes rab thabs// phyag rgya rnams ni spyod lam ste// sngags rnams de yi bya ba yin// rdo rje 'chang gi rigs gang yin// rdo rje 'chang bde kun gyi/ 
12b3(rgyud): rigs ni byang chub sems yin te// byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs bzang // sangs rgyas kyi yang de nyid yul// chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas// chos rnams kun la gnas
12b4(rgyud): med de// rtsub med sems spyod yul lo// chos rnams thams cad gzugs can min// chos kyi dbyings te skye dang yul med// rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod// rigs ni
12b5(rgyud): rnam pa brgyar gsungs te// mdo ru bsdu na rnam pa lnga// sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang // chos dang las dang rnam pa lnga// ci yi phyir na rigasu brjod// mchog dang dman pa'i
12b6(rgyud): bye brag gis// rigs zhes bya ba de rnam gnyis// sems can lam ngan zhugs pa yi// rigs ni dman pa yin par brjod// lam ngan 'gro ba spangs nas ni// byang chub sems la 'jug
12b7(rgyud): pa chos// de bas rdo rje rigs brjod pa// rigs de yang ni lnga pa yin// rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig/ byang chub sems ni rgyal po che// rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs pa med// mgon po
12b8(rgyud): chen po rigs kyi bdag/ de ni rigs kyang lnga pa yin// ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// sems dpa' zhes bya rnam gsum ste// byis pa de bzhin mkhas pa dang // de bzhin byang chub se// 
13a1(rgyud): dpa' dang / rnam gsum sems dpa' brjod par gyu/ yang gsungs pa/ ci yo phyir nasems dpar brjod// sems dpa' chi yin byis pa brjod// sems dpa' mkhas pa tsam
13a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod// gnas gang zhig tu brjod bya ba// do ni de yi sems dpar brjod// chos sam yang na chos min dang // legs byas nyes par byas pa la// mi shes mun pa
13a3(rgyud): bsgribs gyur cing // chos la nyon mongs bdag nyid 'dzin// dmam ning gti mug rigs can gyur// de lta bu ni byis par brjod// nyon mongs kun lo chags pa dang // de bzhin srid par na sa
13a4(rgyud): gsum// mi shes mun pa la chags pa// de 'dir bris pa dar brjod par bya// sems dpa' mkhas pa gang zhig yin// dri ma las 'das nyon mongs spyod // rnal 'byor ldan ning ba
13a5(rgyud): zhugs che/ mi shes long tog 'joms byed pa// de ni sem/ sa dpa' mkhas par brjod// 'dir ni byang chub sems pa pa gang // chos kyi de nyid rtogs gyur cing // 'khor ba'i
13a6(rgyud): gnas nas sang 'gyur te// sems can rnams ni sang byed pa// de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// de la byang chub rnam gsum ste// dman dang mchog
13a7(rgyud): dang bar ma'o// dman pa nyan thos sems yin te// bar ma rang rgyal byang chub bo// mchog ni byang chub sems yin te// de ni mi 'gyur rdo rje yin// sku gsung thugs rnams bzhag pa gang
13a8(rgyud): byang chub mchog tu brjod par bya// ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin// byang chub mchog gi ye shes gang // de ni rdo rje nges par brjod// ye shes rdo rje las byung ba// de ni rdo rje sems dpar
13b1(rgyud): brjod// rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rgyal// ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po che// dga' chen de ni chags sam ci// sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir/ sems
13b2(rgyud): can rnams la chags pa ste// de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rje sems dpa' zhesu bsgrags// byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu ni// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med gang // de ni rdo rje sems rang
13b3(rgyud): bzhin// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'o// rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod// rdo rje rigs kun rgyal po ste// rdo rje lcags kyu zhesu brjod// dgug dang dbab pa'i rdo rje ni// de ni rdo rje rgyal por brjod
13b4(rgyud): bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi// bcom ldan 'das kyis ga nga spyad pa/ sems can dgug pa'i thabs zhes pa// rdo rgyal po yang dag byung / rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci/ sangs
13b5(rgyud): rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pa// rje su chags pa zhe/ so brjod// rdo rje chags pa bdud chen po// de ni rdo rje/ chags par brjod// sems can sman phyir bcom ldan
13b6(rgyud): gyi// gang tshe byang chub spyod po spyad// byang chub spyod pa rjes chags pa// rdo rje chags par yang dgra 'byung // rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing // legs
13b7(rgyud): zhes bya rab ster byed// byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu byed// de ni rdo rje legs par brjod// sems can dag pa mgu byed cing // rdo rje 'chang rnams sgrub par byed// sems can mkhas
13b8(rgyud): rnamaso dga' byed cing // gas ngang 'dzin pa 'angs par byed// chos dang lings spyod rdzogs su'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das 'di chos rnam drug/ gang gi tshen sngon bsgrubs pa/ rdo rje legs
14a1(rgyud): / par yang dag byung // rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang // mkha' mnyam rin chen lta bu ste// rdo rje rin chen skal ba che// de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/ 
14a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur te// sems can kun gyi dbang bskur ba// byang chub snying po'i dbang bskur gyis// rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'dzin par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin pag
14a3(rgyud): mkha' mtshungs rdo rje yang dag byung // de ni rin chen don yod de// de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod// ma rig ling tog 'khor ba yi// mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing // thar pa'i snang ba gzi brdzi
14a4(rgyud): che// de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod// ci phyir rdo rje rgyal mchu nA yin// rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// bar pa'i lam 'gro rgyal mtshan te// chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgya/ 
14a5(rgyud): mtshan che// de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan brjod// rdo rje bzhad pa'i yin brjod// rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje bzhad// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhad byed cing // byang chub sems dpa' kun
14a6(rgyud): dbugs 'byin// de ni rdo rje bzhad par brjod// ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos// rnal 'byor chen po sangs rgyas chos// sangs rgyas sems can rtogs byed pa// dag pa de bzhin gshegs
14a7(rgyud): snying po// de ni rdo rje cho su brjod// rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod// shes rab rnon po ye shes che// shin tu sdug pa'i nyon mongs gcod// shes bya'i sgrib pa'ang gcod pas na// de ni rdo rje
14a8(rgyud): rnon por brjod// rdo rje rgyu yi don ci zhig/ 'khor lo sangs rgyas gar byed pas// chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu brtan// dam chos ro yi bcud las byung // de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes bya/ rdo rje smra bci
14b1(rgyud): yin brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi chos chen po// mkha' mtshungs tshig dang bral ba ste// tshig med tshig las yang dag byung // de ni rdo rje smra bar brjod// ci yi phyir na rdo rje las/ sems can
14b2(rgyud): smin dang grol ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi las gang dang // sangs rgyas las ni bdag med pa// de ni rdo rje las zhes bya// rdo rje bsrung ba ci yin brjod// byang chub sems dpa'i srung ba ste/ theg pa
14b3(rgyud): dman pa spong byed cing // rtse mo nas lhung srung byed pa// de ni rdo rje srung bar brjod/ rdo rje gnod sbyin 'di don ci// sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing / nyon mongs thams cad nges par gcod// srid pa za
14b4(rgyud): byed gnod sbyin che// de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod// rdo rje khu tshur ci yin brjod// bden zhing gzhan min de bzhin nyid// 'gyur mi de kho na nyid gang // sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid ye shes// de ni rmo
14b5(rgyud): brjod/ sngon du byang chub sems 'gyur gang / rdo rje sems dpa yang dag byung / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni/ rdo rgyal por yang gabyung // sen smin byed chags pa'o// byang chub spyod pa legs pa
14b6(rgyud): ste/ de nyid ces bya dam tshig che// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // sngon gyi sbyin pa'i spyod gyur gang // de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod// sen kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod// 'byung po kun la byam
14b7(rgyud): pa ni/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag byung // chos kyi sbyin pa bzhad pa ste/ dbang bskur bzhi por bstan pa yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gang // rdo rje chos ni de las byung // nyon mongs gcod byed rdo cha/ 
14b8(rgyud): rnon por yang dag byung / mngon shes dang ni mthu la sogs// de ni rdo rje rgyu ru brjod/ gzungs la sogs pa grub pa ni/ rdo rje smra bar yang dag byung / ye shes chen po chos chen po// dam tshig ces bya'i dga'
15a1(rgyud): // chen po ye shes mngon par rtogs te dag rdo rje chos las yang dag byung / brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rgyal po// rdo rje la su yang dag byung // theg pa dman pa spong byed pa/ de phyir rdo srung bar brjod/ nyon mongs srid pa'i
15a2(rgyud): gdon chen po// rdo gnod sbyin yang dag byung // de nyid ye shes mngon byang chub// de nyid rdo rje khu tshur brjod// las kyi dam tshig bzhi po ste/ las kyi sems dpa' bdag nyid che// las kyi 'khor lo las byung ba'i// rdo las ni de/ 
15a3(rgyud): las byung // gzhan yang byang chub sems ni bskyed pa las/ rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung // rdo rje rang bzhin sems de yang / rnam pa bzhi ru byung ba ste// sgrol ba dang ni grol ba dang / dbugs 'byin mya ngan 'das 'god byed so/ 
15a4(rgyud): dpa' rgyal po chags pa che// rdo rje legs par yang dag byung // bsodarnams ye shes tshogs nyid las/ rdo rje rin chen rab tu bsgrags/ bsod nams rang bzhin rin chen de// rnam bzhi ji skad bshad pa
15a5(rgyud): bzhin// ye shes kyi ni tshogs brjod pa/ de ni rdo rje chos zhes bya/ ye shes rang bzhin chos de yang // rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung / brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa nyid// de ni rdol su brjod// brtson 'grus
15a6(rgyud): rang bzhin las de yang // rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung // brtson dang sbyong ba zhes bya dang // so sor rtog dang sgrub pa ste/ brtson 'grus de bzhin las bzhi po// de las mthar gyis byung ba yin// sems dpa' 'di rnams
15a7(rgyud): gang las byung // rdo rje sems sogs de bzhin du// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // pha rol phyin drug spyod pa las// rdo rje can rnams byung bar 'dod// de bzhin pa dang ma ni gang // ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// 
15a8(rgyud): pa ni thabs la mkhas pa ste/ pad+ma las ni sangs rgyas sras// rdo rje can rnams gang las byung // rdo rje rgyal po de bzhin chags// rdo rje rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje chos dang de bzhi no// de rnams shes rab ga ca/ 
15b1(rgyud): bor bstan// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje legs// gzi brjid de bzhin bzhad pa nyid// rgyu dang smra ba sems dpa' che/ de rnams thabs las byung ba yin/ rdo rje las dang rdo rje srung // gnod sbyin de bzhin khu tshur nyid// shes rab
15b2(rgyud): thab su grags pa ste/ bstan pa chen po cho gsubashad / rdo rje rigs rnams kun gyig sa rdo rje lcags kyu ma ru bshad/ rdo rje rin chen mchog gyur pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin pa/  ni rdo rje rgyal po rgyu// ma
15b3(rgyud): rnon po ste/ pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po yi/ pang 'dzin gang las byung ba'o// rdo rje gzi brjid rin chen pa/ rgyal mtshan ma ni yin par bsdun/ nor bu rigs chen bzang po yi/ rin chen gang las byung ba'o//  ni rgyal// 
15b4(rgyud): po rdo rje las/ ma ni gnod sbyin srung ba ste/ las kyi rigs can bza dpo yi/ las rnams gang las byung ba'o// dang po gang zhig ci zhe na/ dngos kun dang pos bon te/ rdo rje can kun dang po sems/ 'dun
15b5(rgyud): dang dran dang ting nge 'dzin// rigs rnams kun gyi dang por bshad/ ya nga gleng gzhi ci yin zhe na/ rigs gzhi la ni yang dag byung / tsha sa pa'i gnas chen dang ldan pa// snying rje bdag nyid can rnams kyi/ 
15b6(rgyud): snying rje chen po gleng gzhi yin// dmigs pa gang zhig yin zhe na// rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med/ dang por byang chub sems byung ba'i// pha rol phyin pa mchog drug ni// de yi dmigs pa yin par bshad
15b7(rgyud): rkyen gang zhe na// rtag tu srid gsum mngon dga' ba// sems can sdug bsngal gyur bltas nas// snying rje dang ni ldan pa yi// byang chub sems kyis bskul ba'o// gsang ba 'di ni gang du byung // 'og min/ 
15b8(rgyud): stug po nyams dga' zhing // stug po'i zhing khams 'jig med pa// de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos// rdzogs par longs spyod tshul 'di byung // khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung // 
16a1(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen mchog chen gyi// gzhal yas khang pa yid 'ong zhing // sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ldan pa// de nas khyab bdag 'di rnams byung // thog ma tha ma med 'di ci// gsang
16a2(rgyud): ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs// sems can kun gyi shes pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gang // chos dbyings rdo rje chen po ste// thog ma tha ma med par bshad// rab tu dga' ba
16a3(rgyud): nyid 'di ci/ bde chen rab tu grub bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ rab tu dga' ba nyid ces bshad/ rab bzang nyid ni ji lta bu// dngos po kun mchog
16a4(rgyud): rdo rje ni// byang chub kyi ni sems zhes brjod// sangs rgyas skyed byed bzang po yi// rdo rje rab bzang nyid ces bshad// rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu// gdul bya 'phags pa'i skyes mchog
16a5(rgyud): nyid// de ni rdo rje snying por brjod// de rnams bdag po rgyal pa ni// rdo rje snying po'i bdag por bshad// ci yi phyir na kun tu bzang // byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ldan pa'i// 
16a6(rgyud): 'gro ba srid pa'i skye gnas gang // de kun rtag tu bzang bas na// kun tu bzang por brjod par bya// rdo rje rdo rje 'chang ba gang // byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// rdo rje gang de rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal
16a7(rgyud): po che// rdo rje rdo rje 'chang bar brjod// dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyis// glags chen rdzogs par byang chub pa// de ni dang po'i rigs byung ste/ de kho na nyid rigs lnga
16a8(rgyud): so// yang na rab tu mkhas pa rnams// bskal pa grangs med 'das nas ni// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob gang // de ni dang po'i rigs byung yon// chos kun skye ba med pa dang // 'byung ba ji ltar rung bar
16b1(rgyud): 'gyur// de nyid rtogs shing shes pa yis// chos rnams thams cad rtog pa med// chos dang gang zag bdag med las/ rigs de byung ba nyid du 'dod// chos rnams 'ga' yang skye ba med// chos rnams/ 
16b2(rgyud): 'gag par 'gyur ba med// rnam par rtog pa nyer zhi gang // de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod// chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa dang // 'khor ba'i gnas
16b3(rgyud): las sad gyur cing // sems can rnams kyis rtogs byed pa// de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod// ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya// de bzhin nyid bden shin tu brtan// de kho na nyid gang rtogs nas/ 
16b4(rgyud): chos kun rtogs pa zhes bya gang // de ni rtogs pas sangs rgyas brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod// chos da kyi de bzhin yang dag gnas// slar yang gzhan du mi 'gyur
16b5(rgyud): zhing // de nyid lam ni ston byed pa// de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ci yin brjod// las dang nyan mo ngas de bzhin skye// de bzhin nyon mongs shes pa'i sge ga/ ma mthu/ 
16b6(rgyud): ngogs kyi chos rnams gang // de bcom pas na bcom ldan brjod// de yi bcom pa ci yin brjod// bcom ldan de bzhin bcom par brjod// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags gcod byed cing // nyon mongs
16b7(rgyud): 'joms shing pham byed pa// de ni de yi bcom par brjod// de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci// nyon mongs bdud sogs gcod byed cing / skye dgu ma lus thabs chen gyis// ngan 'gro srid las skyob byed pa// 
16b8(rgyud): ston pa'i ston par brjod pa yi// ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod// de nyid shes pas ye shes te// slar yang chosu rtog pa mini// rtag dang tshad pa spong byed cing // 'chi med de bzhin ye shes yin// 
17a1(rgyud): / shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod// rnam pa mang po shes byed cing // rtogs pas sdug bsngal las grol byed// kun nas nyon mongs chos spong ba/ shes rab ye shes zhesu brjod// 
17a2(rgyud): pir shes rab brjod par bya// rab sbyor sbyor ba shes 'gyur zhing // khyad par du ni rtogs par byed// bden pa de bzhin nyid shes pa'i// shes rab shes rab zhesu bshad// shes rab pha rol pin don
17a3(rgyud): tsi/ nyan thos rang rgyal pha rol gyi// shes rab las ni bla mar brjod// de bzhin nyid gzhol pha rol phyin/ shes rab pha rol phyin zhes bshad// tshul zhes pa don ci yin brjod// na ni dgag po'i don
17a4(rgyud): chen te// dngos med dngos po med min pas// gang du dri ma med gyur pa// de ni de yi tshul du brjod// ting 'dzin don 'di ci nga yin brjod/ chos kun dngos po med ces pa'i// mnyam pa
17a5(rgyud): nyid du rab gnas pa'i// shes rab can gyis lhag par bsten// / sems la dmigs par brjod par bya// ci yi phyir// na bsam gtan brjod/ sdug bsngal thams cad spong byed
17a6(rgyud): cing / nyon mongs dra ba rab 'joms pa'i// shes rab bcas par sems pa ni/ srid pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog rnal 'byor don ni ci yin brjod// chos rgyal chen po dam pa dang // zab mo'i
17a7(rgyud): mchog tu gyur pa des// kun shes kun rig ldan 'byor pa'i// rnal 'byor du ni brjod par bya// rnal 'byor pa ni ci yin brjod// shes rab kyi ni nges sems pa// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor don sems
17a8(rgyud): shing // sems can kun gyi don sems gang / de ni rnal 'byor pa don brjod/ nga ni kun gyi rgyal po che// thams cad rig cing thams cad ster// rdo rje 'chang chen dang po ste/ bde ba yi ni rgyu 'di
17b1(rgyud): yis// de bzhin nga ni 'jig rten gsum// khams gsum rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog/ de bzhin 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro dang // 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod yin// srid gsum
17b2(rgyud): 'di yi don ci zhig/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// srid pa gsum du brjod par bya// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med las/ 'di ltar thams cad rig pa mchog/ bdag med byed pa po
17b3(rgyud): yang med// chos kyang yod pa ma yin te// dge dang mi dger byed pa yi// bag chags kyis ni kun tu bsgribs/ chos ni thog med dus can te/ byed pa po ni yod ma yin// rtog pas nyams pa'i sems
17b4(rgyud): ldan pas// rgyu dang 'bras bur mthong bar 'gyur// kun grozhi/ sa byon thams cad pa// de ni chos kun bskyed par byed// / bsgos shing bag chags dang ldan pa// de ni srid pa gsum zhwa
17b5(rgyud): bye// 'dod pa'i las skyes khams gsum gyi// rgyur ni ku na gzhi de nyid snang // gzugs dang gzugs mdo'/ gro ba yi// chos rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin// chos kun
17b6(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i phyir// nyes pa kun dang bral ba ste// thog ma med 'byung chos snying po// glo bur dri mas nyon mongs 'gyur// nga ni kho na chos chen po// nga ni chos kyi snying por bshad// de bas nga ni rgyal po
17b7(rgyud): che nga ni srid pa gsum du bsgrags// 'jig rten gsum ni ci yin brjod// 'dod pa 'jig rten de bzhin gzugs// gzugs med pa yi skye dgu rnams// 'jig rten gsum po zhes pa de/ rang byung nga nyid kho
17b8(rgyud): na yin/ 'dod pa zhes bya chos chen te/ dag pa btsal bar bya ba'i phyir// gzung 'dzin chos rnams zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin nyid las so sor rtog/ chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med phyir/ nga ni chos de dag par
18a1(rgyud): byed/ de bas nga ni rgyal po che// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por bstan// ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin gzugs// de bzhin gzugs med rab tu bsgrags// stong pa nyid dang dbyer med pas// nga ni
18a2(rgyud): snying po'i bdag por bshad// khams gsum pa yi don ci zhig// 'dod khams de bzhin gzugs khams dang // gzugs med pa ni nyid dag dang // khams gsum bzang po 'di dag ni// rang byung nga nyid kho na
18a3(rgyud): yin// 'di ni khams dang rgyu dang don// khams gsum gyi ni rgyu sems pa// stong dang mtshan ma med bshad cing // smon pa med pa nga nyid bstan// 'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin// byis pa rnams ni kun tu
18a4(rgyud): 'byung // de bzhin yang dang yang du 'khor// 'khor ba dag pa'i bdag nyid de// rang 'byung nga nyid kho na yin// gang la 'khor pa yod pa yi// chos ni rdul tsam yod ma yin// yang dag ma
18a5(rgyud): yin kun brtags phyir// de ni thog mtha' med pa yin// med/ gang de ni stong pa ste// stong pa nyid gang nga nyid do// de bas 'khor ba de nyid ni// rdo rje 'chang rgyal nga nyid bsgrags// ma
18a6(rgyud): ngan 'das pa ci yin brjod// gang zhig de bzhin nyid rtag stong // bden bzhi rang bzhin bzang po nyid// mtshan nyid dang ni dngos po gzugs// mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs// tshig dang sgra yis/ 
18a7(rgyud): gzung bya min// rnam par rtog pa yod ma yin// de bas mya ngan 'das sgra ru// nga nyi kho na rab shes bya// de yi rtag pa'i don ci zhig/ rtag nyid rtag la 'byung gnas te// rnam par rtog pa dang bral gang
18a8(rgyud): rtag pa de nyid kho na ni/ mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra ru bsgrag so// 'jig pa yang ni ci yin brjod// gang zhig 'khor bar mi 'jug cing / thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang / sdug bsngal 'byung 'gog byed pa
18b1(rgyud): yi// 'jig pa mya ngan 'das sgra yin// dag pa yang ni ci yin brjod// yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang min// brjod bya brjod byed ma yin min// drag pa mya ngan 'das nyid yin// theg pa chen po ci/ 
18b2(rgyud): yin brjod// sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gyur cing / theg pa kun las nges rgyal ba// yang dag gyur pa'i sems can ni// theg pa chen po zhesu bstan// mthu dang las rnams
18b3(rgyud): 'jug pa dang // tshogs rnams rnal 'byor ngo mtshar rnams// rgya che zhes pa theg chen te// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo mtshar mchog/ na mkha'i don ni ci zhig yin/ sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod
18b4(rgyud): 'byung ba med cing rdzus kyang med// skye ba med cing 'chi ba med/ dus gsum dngos po dang bral mchog/ na mkha' zhes dpa'i sgra ru bstan// yang dang yang du skye ba dang // de bzhin nyon
18b5(rgyud): myongs kun bdag nyid// grangs med dpag med dang bral ba/ de ni sa nyid brjod par bya// 'byung ba chen po gang las byu nga // 'gog pa ci yin gang gis byi // ma rig nyon mongs la/ 
18b6(rgyud): sogs las// 'byung ba chen po yang dag 'byung // sa bon kun ldan kun gzhi ni// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod// gnas ni yongasu gyur pa dang // kun gzhi sa bon mi 'byung zhing // rtog pa thams
18b7(rgyud): cad dang bral ba// 'byung ba chen po 'gog pa yin// rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang zhing sbas pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las shin tu gsang ba stug po'i tshogs kyi las
18b8(rgyud): thams cad bsdus pa ste// drug pa las sems dpa' bcu drug gi bshad pa zhes bya ba bshad pa'i dang po rdzog so// ci yi phyir na phyag rgyar brjod// gang gis phyag rgya bcings
19a1(rgyud): / gyur pa/ de ni srog chags gdug kun dang / 'gro ba sdig can thams cad dang / rtag tu rgyas ni btab par 'gyur// ci pir sngag su brjod par bya// gsang sngags rnams ni 'bod byed/ 
19a2(rgyud): cing / gdugs pa thams cad skrod par byed// nyon mongs sngags rnams 'joms byed cing // sangs rgyas chos ni spyan 'dren yin// ci phyir zhe ni rig sngags brjod// 'dod chags mun pa rnam
19a3(rgyud): 'dul zhing // nyon mongs rnams kyang rnam par 'dul// ma rig pa ni bzlog byed pa// de ni rig sngags legs par brjod// gzungs sngags rnams ni ci yin brjod// chos rnams kyi ni rten byed cing / 
19a4(rgyud): srid pa'i phyogs ni rab 'joms byed// sangs rgyas chos na// maso thob byed cing // dge ba la rten sbyin pa'ang yin// padag rgyu yi ni mtshan nyid brjod// sangs rgyas kun dang brtul
19a5(rgyud): zhugs ljon/ byang chub sems donga' rnams dang ni// rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad dag/ spyod lam phyag rgyas mtshon pa ra byed// sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid kyang // sangs rgyas
19a6(rgyud): kun gyi thugs yin te// chos kyi snying po sgrub byed cing // chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan// sngags kyi mtshan nyid yin par brjod// rig sngogs kyi mtshan nyid gsungs// 'khor bar myong ba'i
19a7(rgyud): sdug bsngal dang // 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa'i tshogs// rigs dang bcas pa zhi byed pa'i// rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod// de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags kyi// sangs rgyas chos
19a8(rgyud): rnams 'dzin byed cing // chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa dang // dge ba zhes bya 'dzin byed pa// gzungs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang // ji ltar bcing ba bub chen po// 
19b1(rgyud): phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba na// ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes/ dang po kho nar khrus bya zhing // de bzhin phyogs dag bcing ba dang / log 'dren rnams kyang bcing ba ste/ gos dang gtsang ma bgo bya zhing // grong dang
19b2(rgyud): yul 'khor dag dang ni// grong khyer dang ni grong rdal rnams// de yi dbus su phyag rgya dang // nam yang bcing bar mi bya ste/ lha khang yang na dgon pa'am/ ri bo yi ni phug dag gam// rnam pa sna tshogs
19b3(rgyud): kyis dben zhing // 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas gtsang ma// der ni skyil krung bca' bar bya// bkra shis skyil krung nyid bya ste// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yis// byang chub snying por bcings pa bzhi
19b4(rgyud): der ni mig dag btsum bya zhing // so la so ni bzhag par bya/ ma chu gnyis dag kyang mnyam bya zhing // dran pa rtse gcig byas nas kyang / sbyor med sbyor ba'i sngags bzla zhing / phyag rgya chen
19b5(rgyud): po bcing bar bya/ phyag rgya'i rnam pa de lta bu'i// bcings pas rdo rje can kun mnyes/ rig sngags ji ltar bzla bar bya/ dbang phyug chen po gsang ba gsungs// rig sngags dag ni
19b6(rgyud): bzlos pa na// ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas// skyil krung ji lta ba bzhin bya// dran dang yid ni ma yengs pas/ rig sngags dag ni bzla bya zhing / sku nyid kyang ni bsam par bya// mchu yis me yin lces
19b7(rgyud): kyang min// dkan nyid kyis kyang ma yin te// lce dang rkog mas kyang ma yin// rtag tu snying ka nas kyang min// shin tu phra ba'i yid kyis ni// sems ni chos nyid nang chu do bya// de ltar bzlas pa bas na/ 
19b8(rgyud): niH/ yid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa yin// oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad/ mchog dang nor ster dpal dang g.yang / skal bzang rnam pa dang ldan zhing // dam bca' ba dang bkra shis don/ nor bu 'dzin
20a1(rgyud): pa'i snying po yin/ yi ge dz+nyA na ci yin brjod// sdug bsngal 'chos shing 'joms par byed/ srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing / gdug bsngangs shing gsod byed pa'i/ rgyu ni mchog
20a2(rgyud): tu dran par bya/ yi ge phaT ni ci yin brjid// gdug dang sdug bsngal 'joms byed cing // bde ba dag ni 'gugs par byed// phaT ni 'joms byed sgra yin te/ grogs dang bcas pa'i joms
20a3(rgyud): bar byed/  snongahA zhes pa ci yin brjod// sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing // dge ba'i tshogs ni 'phel bar byed// nyes par byas pa 'phrog byed cing / sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog mcho
20a4(rgyud): paci phyir brjod par bya// mchod par byed pas mchod pa ste// / nang du bsang bya mi 'jigs pa'i// de yi mchod pa rnam ma 'gyur// phyi rol gyi ni mchod nga min// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun
20a5(rgyud): gyis mchod// de bzhin du ni thar pa'i mchog gsang ba'i mdzu dab rnams ni/ 'jigs med rgyal sras rnams kyi ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dang // nyid kyi sras kyi mtshungs
20a6(rgyud): med pa'i// cho ga sgrub pa'i gsang ba ni// rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang // zhugs pa gang dang gang yin pa// de ni dam tshig shes pa yin// dam tshig goms par byed pa / 
20a7(rgyud): dam tshig shes pa yin par brjod// bskal pa grangs med 'das pa yi// byang chub sems dang mtshungs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i dam tshig la zhugs pa// de yi dam tshig shes par brjod// ci yi phyir na
20a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yin// dam pa'i chos kyi bcud snying po// 'byung bas de ni dkyil 'khor brjod/ dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba che// chos chen shin tu bstan pa'o// dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu// cho ga
20b1(rgyud): chos dang rnal 'byor te/ gsang ba'i thar pa yang dag 'byung // skye ba 'di nyid kho na la/ rab dga' sgrub par byed pa'i mchog dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs pa yi// skyes pa'am yang na bud med kyis// 
20b2(rgyud): bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni// gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang drug che// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro dang / byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang / de bzhin du ni sgrub pa'i mchog shin tu
20b3(rgyud): bstan par bya ba yin// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la// sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bya/ khyod kyis srog chags bsed mi bya// ma byin par yang blang mi bya// 'dod pas log par g.yem rmi
20b4(rgyud): bya// brdzun du yang ni sgra mi bya// nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi// chang dag 'thung ba spang bar bya// bya ba ma yin thams cad dor/ mochog tu sems can gdul bar bya// dam pa rnams la rim
20b5(rgyud): gro dang // rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya// rnal 'dro/ ra rig par sgrub pa'i phyir// mkhas pa rnams la ba sten par bya// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi
20b6(rgyud): yang ni rnam pa bizho// yid kyi rnam pa gsum dog kyang // tsi nus par ni bsrung bar bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste/ bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs/ sngags dang phyag rgya rnams la yang / 
20b7(rgyud): nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma sogs// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyo gang yin pa// 'gom pa nyid du mi bya zhing // bza' bar yang ni mi bya'o// de bzhin sman ma lha yi grib// rkang pa
20b8(rgyud): dag gis brdzi mi bya// de yi steng du 'dug mi bya/ slar yang bzhag por mi bya'o// lha yi phyag mtshan bzang po dang // lha yi bzhon pa'i mtshon ma rnams// 'gom zhing brnyas par mi
21a1(rgyud): // seM ma da pa de yis srog gi phyir yang ni// 'dor bar mi bya gang zhig yin// 'tshe ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni// byang chub sems ni dor mi bya/ rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni/ nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// 
21a2(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la dad pa yang // rnam pa kun tu btang mi bya// sdom pa btang bar mi bya zhing // bdag nyid gdung bar mi bya'o// khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya// mau dge bcu ni spangs na su// dge bo bcu
21a3(rgyud): ni sten byed cing // 'byung po rnams la phan 'dod pa// nang gi bdag nyid khru su 'dod// bdag nyid rab tu dag bya'i phyir// bodag nyid phyag rgya rgyas gdab phyir// phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing // 
21a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yi khru su brjod// gsang ba'i mkhas ldan khas len pa'i// chu yi khrus ni bya ba ste// las 'od rnam par rtog pa'i khrus// rdo rje slob dpon dag gis bya yang na cho gas
21a5(rgyud): khrus bya'o// mchog tu ngo mtshar bshad bya ste// dang por bad// gnyid go bgo zhing // khro bo yang ni dran par bya// don ku na rab tu sgrub byed pa'i// yig gnyis go cha bzang po yin// 
21a6(rgyud): rdo rje gnod sbyin drag chen dang // khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// oM badz+ra kI li kI li badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM tru go cha'o// oM hU~M A rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi'o// oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i 'o// 
21a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'dri dang ni/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje 'bar rab bzod dka' bas// bdag nyid dag ni 'bar bar bya// oM d+hu pi d+hu pi kA ya d+hU pi pr-i dz+wa la ni swA hA// chu yi nang du 'jug
21a8(rgyud): pa dang / snyim pa gsum ni blugs pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs dag la// rig sngags 'di ni 'dod pa yin// rig sngags mngon par bzlas pa yi// sa yi phung po gsum dag ni// bdag gi stong
21b1(rgyud): dang smad dang dbus// rab tu dag byed mchog yin no// oM b+hu dza la hUM/ sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran pas// rig sngags thams cad mngon bzlas pa'i// chu ni phyag rgya kun gyis blang / rig sta/ 
21b2(rgyud): 'di ni gsang bar 'dod// phyogs ni ji ltar cing ba yin/ me lha rgyal chen shar phyogasu// lho yi phyogasugashin rje dang // nub tu rlung lnga nyid dang ni// byang du chu lha gzhim par 'dod// rnal 'byor pa yis
21b3(rgyud): gzugs bzhin// phyogs bzhi dag tu nges par bcing // de nas steng 'gra mtshoms rnams so// rdo rje nag mos nges par bcad// dgag cing pa ni ji ltar logs// rdo rje khu tshur rab 'bar dang // 
21b4(rgyud): nyi ma ltar 'bar dang // rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yis// bgegs pa cing ba ni brtan par 'gyur// dga' ba chen po ji lta bu// rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bya// phyag rgya bzhi yis phyogs
21b5(rgyud): bzhi ru lnga pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis// steng dang 'og dang mtshams rnams su// stod dang bcas pa'i phyag/ bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyi/ chog tu gsong ba'i
21b6(rgyud): dam pa yis// rtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du// de bzhin du ni bcing bar bya// mchod pa ji ltar yin zhe na// rig sngags mngon par zlas mchod dang // phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len dang // 
21b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor sgom pa mchod po dang // sgrub pa dag gi mchod pa'o// sbyin sreg las ni ji lta bu// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa ga sum dag dang / 
21b8(rgyud): sreg bye sbyin sreg mchog yin no// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba'i// de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi/ snying po gsang ba kun bsdus pa'i// shin tu sbas padam pa'i mchog de kho na nyid bshad
22a1(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje slob dpon spyod chen ldan// dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhugs// slob dpon las ni dbang skur thob// gsang dang dgongs pa kun shes shing // dpa' zhing brtan la brtson 'grus
22a2(rgyud): chetshe// yid zhungs 'dzin cing gsal bar ldan// dul drang shes nyen can dag gis// rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o// dang por ji srid tshogs bar du/ zla ba'am yang na zla ba phyed// yang na lo yi bar du ni// rig pa'i
22a3(rgyud): brtul zhugs spyad par bya// gal te de ni sangs rgyas kyi// rig 'dzin grub pa rnam gsum mo// ji ste rdo rje can gyi yin// rnam pa gsum du nges pa yin// nor bu rigs can bzang po la// rnal 'byor bzhi po nyid
22a4(rgyud): bya'o// ji ste pad+ma 'byung ba la// rnal 'byor bzhi ni rab tu sgrub/ ji ste las kyi rang bzhin bzang // las rnams kun gyi rig sa las ni// sbyor ba bzhi ni yang dag byung // rnam pa bco brgyad
22a5(rgyud): dag tu 'gyur// snga dro phyi dro nyi phyed dang // nam gyi gung smad gung / la ni// bya ba chen po kun bya ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rigs// dang por re zhig rnal 'byor che// chen pos
22a6(rgyud): phyogs kun phyag bya ste// rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga yis// rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o// shes rab chen po sangs rgyas kun// yang dang yang du dran bya ste/ bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas kun/ rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bar bya// oM sar+b+ba
22a7(rgyud): ta thA ga ta pU dzo pa pra brta nA ya At+ma naM nir+ya tA yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha sra mAM/ shar gyi phyogasu song nas ni// yan lag kun gyis phyag byas te// rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di yis ni// bdag nyid
22a8(rgyud): dbul bar bya ba yin// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dze a b+hi She ka ya at+ma na nir+ya tA yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ lho phyogasu ni phyag byas te/ sangs rgyas dag ni tham/ 
22b1(rgyud): cad la// bdag ni dbul bar bya ba yi// de nas nub kyi phyog su ni// sngags 'di yis ni phyag byas te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dz+nyA pra brta nA ya at+ma na nirA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thAg ta badz+ra d+harma pra brta ya mAM// dag pa'i chos can
22b2(rgyud): slob dpon ches// nub phyogasu ni phyag byas te/ rdo rje'i sngags 'dis skul bya zhing // bdag nyid rab tu dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ni At+ma na nir+ya tA yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru mA// mchod
22b3(rgyud): dang dbang skur las ldan zhing // byang du chos la nges sbyor bas// byang phyogasu ni phyag byas te// bdag nyid rdo rje la su 'gyur// shar du mchod pa'i las yin te// lho phyogs su ni dbang bskur ba// nub phyogs
22b4(rgyud): su ni chos chen po// byang du chos la nges par sbyor// thub pa ku/ dan gyi nyi ma'o// mgon po chen po rab btud gnas// phyogs rnams kun tu sngags 'di yis// phyag ni rab tu btsal bor bya// 
22b5(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta pra Na me na badz+ra ban d+ha naM kAka ro ma~M/ de nas ji skad bshad pa'i phyag bya ba// sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni// rab tu gus bcas phyag rgya rnams/ 
22b6(rgyud): myur du bsnyen pa'i sgrub pa yin// phyag byas 'og tu langs nas ni// bdag nyid kyis ni las rnams bya// bdag nyid dbul ba bzang po yi// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya ste// ma lus phyogs bzhugs mchog
22b7(rgyud): gyur pa// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongasu gsol// 'di ltar nye bar zhi ba bdag/ ci nas rdo rje nyid gyur mdzod// rdo rje rigs kyi mchog gyur pa/ sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad la// rtag tu rnam pa thams cad
22b8(rgyud): kyis// bdag nyid dag ni dbul bar bya// rdo rje'i gsang sngags de yis ni// bdag nyid dngul bar 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad ni// yang dang yang du rjes
23a1(rgyud): dran te// sdig pa la sogs nyon mongs kun// mya ngan 'das par bshags par bya// skye ba 'di 'am gzhan dag gi/ sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ sangs rgyas sras bcas thams
23a2(rgyud): cad kyi// bsod nams ye shes tshogs skyed dang // de bzhin sems can kun gyi la// rje su yi rang bya ba yin// byang chub mya ngan mi 'da' bar// sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab// byang chub sems
23a3(rgyud): ni thabs chen gyis// sems can sangs rgyas rjes dran bya/ shin tu ngo mtshar mchod pa ni// ci nus par yang bsgrub por bya// yang na mya ngan 'das sogs dang // rnal 'byor dge ba sogs pa la// 
23a4(rgyud): ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mchod pa yis// mchod pa'i sprin dag dang la bar bya// gnas 'di'am ni gzhan dag na// lha sogadasau bdag gir ma byas pa'i// me togau chu skyes thang skyes rnams/ 
23a5(rgyud): thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de yi 'od kyi dkyi/ la 'khor nas// thub pa'i dbang po rnams la dbul// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// me tog mchod pas rab
23a6(rgyud): / mchod cing // phyag rgya rnal 'byor bcas pa yis// phyogs rnams kun tu nges par spro// oM sarba ta thA ga tA puSh+pa pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// gang dag spos kyi shing bzang po// thub pa'i
23a7(rgyud): dbang phyug rnams la dbul// lha yi spos sogs rmod 'byung ba// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dri yi shing rnas bzang po ni// thub
23a8(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug rnams la ni// phyag rgyar bcas rab bskul nas ni// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+haM pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma yai hU~M/ rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho/ 
23b1(rgyud): dparin chen ri bo la sogs mchog mchod pa'i sprin ni smra ba yis/ phyogs rnams kun tu dbul bar bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+h+yang gA rat+na a laM kA ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa mA ye hUM// 
23b2(rgyud): rtsed 'jo bde bdaga' chen dang / rgod dang sgeg la sogs pa'i chog so// phyogs rnams kun tu thams cad nas/ dga' ba'i mchog ni spro bar bya/ oM sirba ta thA ga ta hA s+ye lA s+yer ti sau khyam
23b3(rgyud): nut+tA ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gos dang rgyan sogs 'byung ba yi/ de bzhin dpag bsam shing bzang po// de yi sngags ni brjod bya zhing / sangs rgyas kun lo dngul bar bya// 
23b4(rgyud): oM sarba te thA ga ta a nut+ta ra bo d+hi a lang kA ra wasta pU dza~M/ ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// rin chen bzang po/ cher 'bar dang // snang ba'i shing las byung ba dang // zla ba nyim/ 
23b5(rgyud): la sogs 'od// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a l-i ka pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal che// yang dang yang du rjes
23b6(rgyud): dran nas// snying rje bskyed pa'i sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas// sems can kun gyi don byi'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing // 
23b7(rgyud): phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba to thA ga ta badz+ra bo d+hi tsit+ta pU dza me g+ho sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// sems can kun la bde legs dang // 'byung po kun la byams pa dang // dud 'gro kun la/ 
23b8(rgyud): mau 'jigs sbyin// ngan 'gro thams cad zhi 'dod dang // byams dang snying rje bting snyoms dang // dga' ba tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor byung / rdo rje'i sngags ni brjod bya zhing // sangs rgyas kun la dbul
24a1(rgyud): bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta u nut+tA ra ma hA prAh+ma bi hA ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can thams cad dpal dang ni// nor dang ldan pa grub par shog/ bde ba
24a2(rgyud): ma tshang med par shog/ zhes pas dbul zhing spro bar bya// oM sarbaM tA thA ga ta ma hA badz+rod+b+ha ba dA na pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// sems can thams cad byang chub
24a3(rgyud): dang / sdom la rab tu gnas par sheg/ rgyags sogs nyes pa chen po rnams// zhi 'gyur kun tu spro bar bya// oM sa rba ta thA ga ta a nut+te ra ma hA bo d+hi hA ra shI la pa ra mi tAM/ 
24a4(rgyud): pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// 'jigs dang 'khon sogs sdug bsngal la// sogs pa'i 'ji/ glus kun zhi gyur cig byams dang ldan pa'i rnal
24a5(rgyud): 'byor gyis// cho sA la bdag med bsgrub par bya// oM sarba/ ta thA ga ta a nut+te ra ma hA d+harmA a ba bo d+hik+Shin+na pA ra mi tA pU dze me g+ha sa mu dra s+pho ra NA sa ma ye hUM// 'khor ba
24a6(rgyud): mthor thug bar du ni// bdag 'tshang rgya bar mo gyur cig/ de bzhin sems can thams cad ni/ de nyid sgrub pa byed par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta san sA ra pa ri t+yet+yai ka a nut+te ra bir+ya pA ra
24a7(rgyud): mi tA pU dze me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ srog chags kun gyi 'dod chags sogs// nyon mongs chen po zhi bar shog/ sems can thams cad g.yeng med cing // bsam gtan bzhi
24a8(rgyud): dang ldan par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+tA ra ma hA sau khya bi hA ra d+hA na pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// sangs rgyas ye shes shes rab che// sdug bsngal gco
24b1(rgyud): byed bla na med// shes rab sbyor bas dag byed pa'i// sangs rgyas sems can dag gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA A nut+tA rakle shats+tshe da sarba d+har+m+ma sa man+ta dz+nyA na ma hA pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa
24b2(rgyud): mr-i dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi// bdag nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing // mchod pa'i phyir nI rnams bsams nas// sangs rgyas ku na la dbul bar bri// 
24b3(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ye nair+yA ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi// bdog nyid kyis ni rnams bsam zhing / lce ni de snyed ldan dang bcas// sangs
24b4(rgyud): rgyas bsngags pa brjod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ta ga ta bA ka nir+yA ta na pU dza mr-i g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// de nas rnal 'byor de nyid kyis// lus dang ngag sems byung ba yi// 
24b5(rgyud): mchod pa dag ni bsdus nas su// sangs rgyas kun la dA bul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta nir+yA ta ne pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ grags chen ldan
24b6(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// ma lus kun la mchod nas ni// dge ba dag ni bsdus byas nas/ sems can don du bai sde bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran nas// sems
24b7(rgyud): dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya// byams sogs rnal 'byor chen po rnams// phyo gso rnams kun tu spro bar bya// gau cha mchog gi yig gnyis kyis// blo ldan bdag nyid go bgo zhing // 
24b8(rgyud): rig sngags gang zhig mngon 'dod pa'i// rig sngags de ni bzla bar bya// rgyud tshon gsang ba 'di ru ni// rnal 'byor chen po'i sngags bzlas pa// brgya rtsa bcu ru bshad pa yin// yang na
25a1(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig go cho ga'i sbyor ba 'dring la ni// thun mong du ni rnam lngar bshad// gang gis sdig can 'grub 'gyur ba'i// gsang ba'i bzlas pa rnal 'byor che// de bzhin/ 
25a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs mchog la// bzlas pa 'di ni mchog yin no// bkra shis skyil krung bcas nas ni// sems kyis sangs rgyas la dmigs nas// blo dang ljon pa bdag nyid
25a3(rgyud): ni/ rtag tu kun mkhyen sangs rgyas bsam// gtsug tor la sogs mtshan bzang dang // ldan par bdag gis lus bsams te// sangs rgyas snying po nang 'dug cing // nga nyid
25a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhesu bsam/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las byung ba'i// gang gis 'khor lo rnam sprul pa// mngon par byang chub chen po yis// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
25a5(rgyud): bar bya// gdul bya'i tshogs ni longs spyod pa'o// chos/ dang longs spyod sprul pa'ang 'grub// gnas ni yo/ ngasuM gyur pa yis// sems ni kun bzhi las byung min
25a6(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes rab rdzogs phyir// zla ba gang bar rnam par rtag/ zla bo gang ba dri med pa// snying ka ru ni bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rig pa'i yi ge/ 
25a7(rgyud): rnam par sgom// de lta bu yi tshul mchog gis// zla ba phyed na 'grub par 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // lo gcig na ni 'grub par 'gyur// ji srid skyo bar mi
25a8(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i// de srid rnal 'byor chen pos bzlas// lus ni ngal bar gyur pa ni// phyag rgya bcing ba brtsam par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i// de tshe byang chub mchog
25b1(rgyud): bcing bya// yang na chos 'byung zhes pa'am/ shin tu rmad 'byung dpal be'u'o// de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa/ bag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid// byang chub snying po la gnas bdag/ bdag ni phyag na rdo
25b2(rgyud): rje bstan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par sgom// gsang chen rdo rje'i dbus su ni// rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom// de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa/ pad+ma sems
25b3(rgyud): drapa' rang bdag nyid// zla ba'i dbus su pad+ma che// pad+ma'i dbus su yi ge rnams// de bzhin rin chen rigs bzlas pa'i// rin chen rgyal po rigs bdag nyid// zla ba'i dbus rin chen che// 
25b4(rgyud): rin chen dbus su'ang yi ge rnams// de nas las kyi rigs// bzang po// rnal 'byor don kun sgrub byed la// sangs rgya// sa snying po rang bdag nyid// rdo rje la su rnam par sgom// zla ba'i
25b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rin chen rdo rje rnam par sgom// rin chen rtse mo rdo rje che// de yi dbus su'ang yi ge rnams// rig sa lnga yi ni bzlas pa 'di// gsang ba'i bzlas pa brjod par
25b6(rgyud): bya// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// bzlas rgyud gsang ba mchog 'dzin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i// sangs rgyas bdag nyid bkra shis 'dzin// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten
25b7(rgyud): 'dir// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas de yis thugs dbusu// rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom// rang gi lus ni bdag med cing // chos dang gang zag stong pa nyid// sangs
25b8(rgyud): rgyas de dag gi gzugs ni// bdag med par ni rnam par bas mo// lus ni sangs rgyas zhes brjod pas/ sangs rgyas de yang yod ma yin/ phung po dang ni skye mched khams// chos zhes bya ba'i/ 
26a1(rgyud): / sangs rgyas med/ gang zag nyid kyis sangs rgyas med// sangs rgyas med pa yang ma yin no// nga rol byin drugs bon te/ shes rab sa bon spyong mdzad pa'i// gnas dang gnas
26a2(rgyud): min skal ldan pa// de nyid byang chub bdag med 'dzin// de lta bus ni gsang chen gyis// de bzhin gshegs po'i rigs bzlas na// myur bar slob dpon chen po yis// rab tu dga'
26a3(rgyud): ba 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje rigs bzlas pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir// rdo rje'i gzugasu rnam par sgom// rdo rje de yi lde dbus su// rig
26a4(rgyud): pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom/ dngos med zhes bya rdo rje de/ byang chub 'bras bu gang yin pa'o// gang zhig rdo rje zhesu pa de// gang zhig de nyid 'gyur med pa'o// lus kyi de nyid zhes
26a5(rgyud): brjod la/ gang zhig chos dang chos nyid stong // gzugs la/ sogs pa'i chos chen po// 'byung ba che sgra 'dzin pa/ med// lus ni gzugs zhes bya bar brjod// gzugs zhe
26a6(rgyud): bya ba yod ma yin// gzugs de yang ni rnam phye la// phra mo'i du shes rnam par sgom// cha sha su ni rnam phye na// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// gzugs ni stong pa zhes bshad// 'di de
26a7(rgyud): rdo rje zhes byar bstan// gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad ni// stong pa nyid ni rnam par sgom// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis// rab tu dga' ba sgrub par bya// rdo rje rin chen rigs bdag nyid
26a8(rgyud): stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir// stong nyid namakhar rnam par sgom// de ni na mkhar rnal 'byor chos// rtog pa dang bcas yi ger bsam// chos kun dngos med zhes bya ba/ stong
26b1(rgyud): nyid de bzhin nyid ces brjod// dngos med ces bya'i gzugs med de// mkha' mtshungs sangs rgyas spyod yu'o// gang la gzugs ni yod min pa'i// mig ces bya ba ci yin brjod// mig
26b2(rgyud): de yang ni gang zhig gi/ mig ces bya ba yin par brjod// bdag po rgyal po 'di gang zhig/ 'di yo skye ba'ang ji lta bu'i// 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'dus lus// mig gi dbang po yang dag
26b3(rgyud): byung / mig de la'ang gzugs med la/ ci zhig byed de yod pa'ang min// mig ni ji lta ba bzhin du// thams cad gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs// zlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// chos chen po yi/ 
26b4(rgyud): dbang bskur 'gyur// de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa/ ba d+ma'i sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ pad+mi'i gzugasu rnam par sgom// pad+ma
26b5(rgyud): shin tu de gA de la// rig pa'i ye shes rnam par sgom// shes rab chen po pad+ma de// chos kyi snying por bas/ ma par bya// pad+ma chu yis ma gos shing // 'dam gyi nyes
26b6(rgyud): pas gos mi 'gyur// sems can thams cad de bzhin dag/ chos ni bzod nas ma skyes pa'i// de bzhin gshegs nyid 'di gang zhig/ chos dang chos nyid stong gang yin// gzugs
26b7(rgyud): sogs chos rnams thams cad kyi// chos nyid de bzhin nyid du 'dod// de nas las kyi rigs bzlas pa'i// las kyi rnal 'byor rnam par bsam/ sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'kho
26b8(rgyud): lo 'di// chos dang longs spyod thob byed yin// gang la chos zhes bya ba med// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul snang // e ma'i sangs rgyas de dag // rang gi las kyang sgrub par mdzad// 
27a1(rgyud): / de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/ rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// tshe 'di nyid la dam pa yi/ sangs rgyas nyid ni mchog thob 'gyur// rdo rje'i snying sogs phyag rgyu ni/ rdo rje rigs
27a2(rgyud): la bdag por bshad// rin chen la sogs dbang bskur zhing // dag pa'i mchog ni pang mchog 'dzin// sangs rgyas sku ni chos chen la// rdo rje rnal 'byor nges bston byo// byang chub
27a3(rgyud): mchog ni kun 'dul ba// 'di ni zlas pa dam par 'dod// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin// phreng ba nges par ston par bya// gang du zla ba bye ba byed// rnam gnyis rnam gsum nyung ba'ang rung // phreng
27a4(rgyud): bya sangs rgyas la 'dzub bcas// gung mos rdo rje'i rnal 'byor skyes/ srin lagre steng du rin chen skyes// mthe'u tshung gos ni pad kha phye/ las kyi phreng bas las byed pa// 
27a5(rgyud): sor mo kun gyi bya bar bshad// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yau// 'di ni gsang ba'i bzlas pa che// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor po de tse// rdo rje can la ru rag sha phyi r-Il rdor
27a6(rgyud): rigs dbang po ste// mu tig nor bu'i rnal 'byor can// pad+mo'i snying po'i phreng ba ni// pad+ma'i rigs rnams kun la sngags// yang na kun las mchog gyur pa// bo de tse de srog 'dzin pa// 
27a7(rgyud): lcags kyi zlas pa nyis 'gyur te// zangs kyi yang ni bzhir 'gyur ro// ru reg sha yi bye ba gnyis// mu tig gi ni brgyar 'gyur ro// dbang po'i stong 'gyur rnal 'byor te// dngul gyi 'bum
27a8(rgyud): du 'gyur ba yin// pad+ma'i bya ba brgya 'gyur brjod// bo de tse yi grangs med do// lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya bcing // g.yas pa phreng ba dang ldan bya/ ji ltar sngar bshad bsang ba sogs
27b1(rgyud): rmad 'byung chen po'i zlas pa bya// ci yi phyir na bzlas pa brjod// dge ba la brtson rgyal 'gyur zhing // rmang 'byung rnams kyang mthong 'gyur zhing / byang chub spyod pa rgyal 'gyur zhing // sa
27b2(rgyud): rgyas rol pa mngon par 'gyuraro// bzlas pos skyon langs nas ni// phyag rgya dag ni btsong bar bya// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ phyogs kun tu ni 'dud pa bshad// byang chub sems
27b3(rgyud): tshul thob byed pa'i// mdo sogs gsang ba bklag par bya// bsod nams tshogs ni bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas mchod po yang dag bya// de nas zas kyi dus ni// rnam pa kun tu chad
27b4(rgyud): bu sbyin// sangs rgyas rigs pas mngon bsrungs pa/ da bza' ba dag pa dbul bor bya// sangs rgyas bdag nyid bza' ba dbul// legs par bgyis nas bza' ba dbul/ 
27b5(rgyud): snga dro sdom pa blang bya ste// de nyid nyi phyed dang mtsham su// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsumo du// sangs rgyas rdo rje no ra bu dang // pad+ma byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang // rnam pa bzhi
27b6(rgyud): po de las sbyor// sangs rgyas chos dang tshegs byang chub/ nyin dang mtshan la rnam pa drug rdo rje dril bu tshogs slob dpon// rdo rje can rnams de bzhin drug zang zing mi 'jigs chos
27b7(rgyud): dang ni// byams pa nyin zhag kun la brgyad// cho so gsum tshangs pa bzhi zhes pa// rnam pa brgyad du bzlas par bya// 'di yi chos chen gsum po la// rtag tu snyoms par 'jug par bya// 
27b8(rgyud): gsang mchog dkyil 'khor mchog dang ni// de bzhin las kun byed pa'o// gang du sdig par mi 'gyur ba'o// thams cad bza' zhing thams cad len// lus nas lhag mar gyur
28a1(rgyud): pa spab/ de bzhin dri ma thams cad spang / nyin re zhing ni lan gsum du// khrus gsum bya zhing gsang blang ba/ gos kyang lan gsum brje bar bya// gtsang gos lan gtsu
28a2(rgyud): yang ni sbyin// sha dang chang gtsang la sogs pa/ dri ngan kha yi sgregs pa dang // 'khrig pa 'dod dang bston pa dang // sems can 'tshe la dga' mi bya// brtson zhing las mkhas spyod par
28a3(rgyud): ldan// sgron zhing dul la dga' dang gtsang // bya ba byed cing bla ma khur// dge legs rgyan ni 'chang bar byed// kun rdzob don dam rnam pa gnyis// slob pa'i sdom pa blang bar bya// kha ni nang
28a4(rgyud): du lta yi ches// sngags dang phyag rgya rig sngags dang // gzungs dang lha dang bla ma dang // rdo rje la sogs mchi dan cha bzang // lha yi gnas dang yang dag lda ni// 'jigs/
