28a5(rgyud): min g.yo dang sgyu can min// mi brten pa yo blo can min// / mya ngan 'das la dga' ba min// blo ldan 'jig rte/ nA 'dir mi dga'// de bzhin pha rol dga' ba min// lus
28a6(rgyud): srog btang snyoms mi bya zhing // slab pa las ni 'da' mi bya// skrag ldan nga rgyal ldan pa min// 'jig rten bya ba 'dod mi bya// de lta'i ngo mtshar tshul la ni// rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub
28a7(rgyud): par bya// smra ba spang zhing pod+mod chen ldan// rnyed pa sbyang zhing legs rnyed ldan// dpa' zhing rtan la bla ma gus/ sdig pas 'jigs shing kun tu bsdams// ji nus ji ltar spro bar
28a8(rgyud): bya// zla ba'am yang na lor 'am// nyin zhag gcig la lan gnyi su// de bzhin bla ma blta bar bya// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // de lta bu yi tshul gnas shing // phyag rgya
28b1(rgyud): rnam pa brgyad bcings nas// rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// brtul zhugs tshungs par rdzogs 'gyur nas// rnal 'byor mkhar 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje 'chang ba skyod dpon/ 
28b2(rgyud): la/ sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur// rig pa kun bdag rgyal po ste/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi de nyid rig/ rnal 'byor tshig de nyid shis// de bzhin lha yi rigs rnams mthong // sdom
28b3(rgyud): pa blangs shing rnam par mkhas// rig pa'i slob dpon dbang bskur 'gyur// lam rnams chen po byed rgyal po// rig pa ldan zhing de nyid shes// phan pa dang ni gnod pa shes// lha la sogs pa
28b4(rgyud): kun dbang byed// gnod sbyin 'byung po lnga dbang sogs// rig pa'i rgyal po mngag gzhug pa/ 'di ni chos kyi grul ge/ nas// sangs rgyas mchod pa legs mchod byed// byang chub
28b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshogs rgyal po// mchod 'dzin rtag tu gas/ nga ba'odzin// 'khor lo grong khyer chen por gnas// byang / chub sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pa'i// dam chos bcud kyi
28b6(rgyud): snying po skyes// snying po 'dzin cing dkyil 'khor mchod// dgongs pa de nyid tshul shes 'di// theg pa chen po'i tshul don shes/ mchod sbyin lhag pa'i mchod dam pa'i// gsang ba yi ni dkyil
28b7(rgyud): 'khor bya// rdo rje khro bo ting 'dzin gyis// gang zhig gi ni thog mar ru// bgegs kun nges par 'joms pa yis// gsang sngags drag po brjod par bya// bkra shis sdig pa 'joms byed pa// bzlas
28b8(rgyud): brjod sbyin sreg cho ga yang // nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar// drag po'i bzod dka' ye shes 'dzin// dkyil 'khor mchod pa bya ba ni// yo byad yongasu rtag par bya// yang na phyi nas byed pa yis// 
29a1(rgyud): / rigs par ni rtag par bya// dpag tshad las lhag mi bya zhing / khru drug las ni chung ba min// sgrub pa bcu gnyis zhes bya ste// gzhan yang byed pa bcu gnyis// gal te de ni rgyal por 'gyur
29a2(rgyud): dpag tshad kyi ni khon tsam bya/ yang ni kun nas bzang po ste// ngos bzhi dag deng yang dag ldan/ yang na sgrub pa blon po yin// khru stong yod pa mchog yin no// yang na kun nas bzang ba yi// 
29a3(rgyud): drug pa las chung mi bya// yong na ded dpon yin yang rung // ngos bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// lnga pa las ni chung mi bya// yang na gang zhig gzhan dag gam// sgrub pa po dag yin yang rung // bcu pa
29a4(rgyud): las ni chung mi bye// zur bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// rgya cher yang ni mi bya'o// yang na sgrub byed slob dpon yino// drug pa dbas ni chung mi bya// ya ngan dpag tshad dang ldan pa'o// yang
29a5(rgyud): na lo byad ldan por bya// gal te sgrub byed de rgyal po// ra ni/ chen phyi ma rab tu bya/ rin che ni btags las lag/ sa ba shing // shin tu khyad 'phags yid du 'ong // in+d+ra ni la
29a6(rgyud): sngon po che// tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu byo// pad+ma rA ga rA ga che// tshwa na rtsi dmar po yang dag ldan// tshon rtsi ser po mdog bzang po// dri ma mdo pa'i 'od zer ldan// tshon rtsi dkar po ldan pa yi// dkar
29a7(rgyud): paM dag ni shal las bye// bai DUR+Ya dang btsod midog ste// tshon rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad// gal te de ni ma 'byor na// rin po che dang bsres pas bya// tsheng dpon yang na ded dpon rung // tshen rtsi dag la
29a8(rgyud): rab tu bya// yang na gzhan ni 'ga' zhig yin// tshon rtsi gzhan ni dam por sbyar// thal ba yis kyang dus tso bzhin// 'dir ni slob dpon dag gi bya// rin chen phye mar yang dag ldan// yang na yo
29b1(rgyud): byad dang ldan pa// gal te sgrub byed de rgyal po// sna tshogs bye ba'i tshad du bya// yang na 'bum dang yang dag ldan// stong las nyung bar mi bya'o// spos dang mar me mchod bstod dang // dri yi bu/ 
29b2(rgyud): po nyid dang ni// de bzhin bu ma gong gtor ma dang / bum pa rnams dang mar mo dag/ tshong dpon yang na ded da pon rung / bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o// gzhan dga' zhig ni 'ongs kyang rung / ba6
29b3(rgyud): ba dag ni stong phrag bcu// bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o// bza' ba dag ni brgya'am stong // bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o// g.yos kyi rnam pa kuno dang ni// de bzhin dri rnams thams cad kun// 
29b4(rgyud): rol mo sgeg dang rtsed mi dang // de bzhin phun sum tshogs rapa kun// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// de tshe mchod pa byas nasu// ci nas sang ni khyed rnams cag / grub par bya phyi
29b5(rgyud): brtul zhugs brtsam// rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byu// gas// dag cing gtsang ma'i gos gyon cing // rnam pa/ ra dben pa'i gnas 'dug ste// sangs rgyas thamoso cad
29b6(rgyud): spyan drang bya// me tog spos snod lag thog shing / phyogs rnams kun tu phyag bya'o// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog ldan pa 'i/ sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs shing // gsang
29b7(rgyud): ba'i spyan ni 'gugs pa yi// rdo rje phyag rgya bcing bar bya// rdo rje sngags dang phyag rgya yis// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya// de nas gnas ni yang dag sgrub// dben zhing kun tu
29b8(rgyud): g.yeng ba med// ri bo'am ni dgon pa'am// de bzhin phug gi nang dag gam// shing drung gi ni gnas dag gam// chu bo'i 'gram 'am yang na ngogs// dngos grub gnas su 'dug nas ni// lha rnam
30a1(rgyud): myur du gshegs par 'gyur// rdo dang gseg ma rus par ldan// thal ba ldan ljin mi gtsang bcas// rtsub cing rtsa ba'i khyab la sogs// de 'dra'i sa gzhi rnam par spang // shin
30a2(rgyud): tu bzang zhing 'od bzung snu ma// tshad dang ldan zhing gasreg ma med// 'dom gang yang na khru ga dra tsam// dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyang bar bya// grong dang yul 'khor nyid dag dang // grong khyer dag dang
30a3(rgyud): ljongs dang ni// rgyal po'i pho brang tshong dus dang // dkyil 'khor chen po bya ba min// de 'dra'i sa bzhi sgrubs nas ni// steng gi cha ro ni sgrub par bya// 'dom gang yang na khru gang tsam/ skas
30a4(rgyud): gdung bzhi dang ldan pa ru// sbyangs te de nas gnas kyi ni// dbus su phur pa gzugs par bya// rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgyu yi sa// mchod pa'i sa gzhi mdzes par bya/ rig pa 'dzin
30a5(rgyud): pa byed pas bcag/ bgegaso bcing ba yi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams kun tu bcing bar bya// me dang gshi/ ni rje chu dang ni// rlung dang dbang po rdo rje phyogs// rdo rje bzod
30a6(rgyud): dko'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje sngags kyi sbyang bar bya// mchod gnas dpag tshad tshad tsam du// bco lnga nas ni yang dag rtsam// gnyis pa'am ni gsum be yi// nya la nyes par mi 'gyuraro// ci ste
30a7(rgyud): 'byor po mngon ni/ zla ba cig tsam rab tu sbyar// bco lnga las ni yang dag rtsam// bco lnga la ni rdzogs par bya/ ci ste zla ba phyed tsam du// bco lnga la ni rnam par sbyang / ci ste rings ni tshes
30a8(rgyud): brgyad nas/ bco lnga la ni rdzogs par bya/ tshes dgu dang ni bcu dang ni// bcu gsum pa dang bcu bzhi pa/ bdun pa lnga pa nyid nas ni// nya la nyes par mi 'gyur// ci ste nyin zhag de rtsam
30b1(rgyud): nas// de nyid la ni yongs rdzogs bya// rnal 'byor chen po dag bya'i phyir// rnal 'byor sa bzhi rab tu sgrub/ rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byug rnam pa sna tshogs gos bgo zhing // rgyan rnams
30b2(rgyud): kun gyis rab tu spras// rdo rje slob dpon rnam par rgyan// gtsong zhing gtsang mi'i gos dang ldan// ga tsang ma'i grogs dong lhan cig tu/ sems can kun don yang dag ldan// byang chub sems
30b3(rgyud): ni yang dag gzung / skal pa brgya phrag stong du yang // ci nas mngon par brtson byas kyang // gang zag bzhi po 'jig rten tu// bsgrub kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur// sems ni bskyed par ma
30b4(rgyud): gyur dang // dad med 'grub par mi 'gyur nyid// the tshom 'ji ngan pa nyid dag dang // bka' bsgo ba ni mi bya'o// dri yi chu nga yi legs skus pa'i// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de ni/ 
30b5(rgyud): dri dang ldan pa'i chu dag gi/ phyogs rnams kun tu chag cha/ gra btab// ba yi lci bas legs sbyang to// dri dang btse/ sa pas legs byugs te// de nas gur gum la sogs
30b6(rgyud): pa'i/ dri dag gtsang mar sbyar bar bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyi brlab// rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yis// pad+ma'i mig can dag gi blta// dkyil 'kho
30b7(rgyud): bar dang tha ma ru// sbyin sreg las ni yang dag rtsam// sbyin sreg las ni rnam par sbyar// rig pa'i dngos grub cho ga la/ sbyin srog las ni yang dge brtsam// de bzhin sngags dang phyag
30b8(rgyud): rgya tshogs// de 'dra'i sngags dang phyag rgya'ang min// sngon la bgegs rnams gzhom par bya// de nas sbyin sreg yang dag rtsa mo// de 'og gsang ba'i mchod chen gyi// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri/ 
31a1(rgyud): / bar bya/ sbyin sreg rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ yang na bcu drug dag du 'gyur// rang rang gi ni cho ga bzhin/ sbyin sreg las ni yang dag rtsam/ dgongs pa'i gang zhig sgrub pa'i phyi
31a2(rgyud): gang zhig mchod pa yang dag rtsam// gal te mi nus skal chen gyis// bza' ba dag ni rab tu bya// dri dang bcas pa dang sbyar ba'i// yang na dkar gsum bza bar bya// 'di ltar rgyal po rnga
31a3(rgyud): rje 'dzin/ byin gyi rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur// bgeg rnams nges 'joms nga yi ni// slob dpon gyi ni las bzang po// bgog rnams zlog par byed pa'i mchog/ btsong ba dam pa bshad par
31a4(rgyud): bya// rtag tu rdo rje khro bo dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag bya zhing // rdo rje lcags kyi'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rdo rje zhugs pa'i phyag rgya yis// bsreg
31a5(rgyud): rnams thams cad drang bar bya// rdo rje las kyi phyog rgyo yi// sa// bgag rnams thams cad kun tu dgu/ sdig pa/ med kyis ma 'jig shing // sems can rnam par 'tshe ba
31a6(rgyud): med// rang gi rnam rtog las byung bgeg/ ma rIg las byung mi dge bzhin// rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya yis/ 
31a7(rgyud): thams cad rdo rje rang bzhin bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad gzir bar bya// rdo rje lu gu rgyud phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad bkri bar bya// 
31a8(rgyud): rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad kun tu dbab// rdo rje brdab pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad brdab par bya// rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis
31b1(rgyud): bgegs rnams thams cad sbar bar bya// rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad bcad par bya// rdo rje cod pan phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad brdung bar bya// rdo rje
31b2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis// bgegaso rnams thams cod gzhig par bya// rdo rje 'phrul 'khor phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad btsir bar bya// rdo rje khA Ta phyag rgya yis// bgeg
31b3(rgyud): rnams thams cad btub par bya/ rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya// rdo rje sregs byed phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad ba sreg par bya// rdo rje
31b4(rgyud): 'khor byed phyag rgya yis// dge gos rnams thams cad ba skor bar bya// rdo rje srang bu'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad bskyod par bya// rdo rje bzlog byed phyag rgya yis// bge/ 
31b5(rgyud): rnams thams cad rnam par brlag/ rdo rje 'joms byed phyagargya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad gzhom par bya// rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad 'jig
31b6(rgyud): par byed// rdo rje za byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// rdo rje 'cha' byed phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad 'cha' bar bya// rdo rje dral ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams
31b7(rgyud): thams cad dral bar bya// rdo rje sgyel byed phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad skyel bar bya// rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bslang bar bya// rdo rje gsod pa'i phyag rgya
31b8(rgyud): yis/ bge ga rnams thams cad bsad par bya// rdo rje 'tsho byed phyag rgya yis// bgag rnams thams cad 'tsho bar bya// rdo rje sgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad yang dag sgrub// rdo rje
32a1(rgyud): / rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yis// gdug pa thams cad rgyas gdab bya// rdo rje rlung gi phyag rgya yis// bgag rnams thams cad rlung la bskur// rdo rje chu yis phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnam
32a2(rgyud): thams cad tshul g.yeng // rdo rje me ni rab rno bas// bgegs rnams thams cad sreg par bya// rdo rje rgyal byed phyag rgya yis// bgeg rnams thams cad brgyal bar bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya
32a3(rgyud): yis// bgegs rnams thams cad sbyin sreg bya// rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bzung bar bya// rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad
32a4(rgyud): sos gdab bya// rdo rje 'big pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgeg/ sa rnams thams cad dbug par bya// rdo rje 'jigs bye/ dang phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par
32a5(rgyud): bya/ rdo rje bka' bzhin byed pa yis// bkug nas bka' la dgod par bya// rdo rje bsdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bsdigs par bya// rdo rje 'ges
32a6(rgyud): byeng phyag rgya yis// bgrogs rnams thams cad dgas par bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yis// bgegs kyi rigs kun gzhom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin bzod dga' dang // rdo rje mi ltar 'ab
32a7(rgyud): ba dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis// rdo rje rkang pas snun par bya// bgegs 'joms pa yi phyag rgya yis// de na steng ge bgegs gzhom bya// mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i mchog/ rdo rje
32a8(rgyud): chen po'i gsang rgyud las// rdo rje khro ba'i snyoms 'jug byi/ brgya dadong rtsa bcu lhag pa dang // rdo rje slob dpon bsang ba ni// rgyas pa ru ni yongasu bstan// bgegs la sogs pa gdug pa
32b1(rgyud): kun/ chad pa bcad phyir btus pa yin// dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir/ sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam// rnam pa brgyad dang rtsa bcu lhag rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni/ 'di ni/ 
32b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud chen po// rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad// gsang ba'i sbyin srog cho gor bcas// gzhan yang dang por rab bshad bya// rnal 'byor chen po gsang ba'i las// sbyin sreg las
32b3(rgyud): ni rgyun mi las rnams thams cad btus pa yi// gsang brgyud chen 'di ru ni// sbyin sreg rnam pa nyi shu yis// thams cad bsdus par 'gyur ba yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // mngon spyod
32b4(rgyud): kyi ni las dang ni// tshe spel ba dang dgug pa dang // nor da dang 'bruni 'phel ba dang // srung dang srung ba min dang bge/ dgas// sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom dang // bcing dang
32b5(rgyud): bsad dang drag po dang // chags dang rje su bcom pa dang // dbang du bya dang gzugs bzang nyid// 'dod dga'i gzu gsu snang ba dang // mkha' la 'gro dang dngos grub kyi// rdzas
32b6(rgyud): ni grub par bya ba la// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor byed pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya// de lta bu yi rnam pa yi// sbyin sreg bzang po nyi shur bshad// ji ltar sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin// 
32b7(rgyud): sngon du thab khung bya ba yin// gru bzhi la ni rgyas pa ste// zlum po la ni zhi ba'o// gang zhig 'gug par byed pa yi// rdo rje rnam par yang dag bya// de bzhin pad+ma'i rnam pa bzhin// mngon
32b8(rgyud): spyod la ni gru gsum ste// sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom phyir// zlum po rta babs ldan pa yin// rin chen rnam pa rigs rgyas la// tshe 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang // shin tu dag
33a1(rgyud): / phyir phyag rgya'i dbyibs// srung la go cha lta bu yin// bcing ba la ni 'obs kyis bskor// bsang la mche ba dang ldan pa'i// ci 'dod gzugs la gang yang rung // mi snang ba la
33a2(rgyud): gzhu dang ldan// phyogs dang mkha' 'phuraro la lcags kyu// bka' byed phyag rgya sgrub pa dang // dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pa la// 'khor lo'am ni gru bzhi'o// rdzas dang sman ni 'grub pa la// 
33a3(rgyud): brab khung bud med yan lag mtshungs// yang na thun mongs dngos grub kyi// dkyi la 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ji lta ba// sbyin sreg thab khung de mtshungs 'gyur/ 
33a4(rgyud): rig 'dzin dngos grub bzang ldan zhing // thams cad phun tshogs de ltar 'gyur// 'khor lo sogs la cung zad mthar/ sbyin srog thab khung bsko bar bya// 
33a5(rgyud): thab khung nyi shu dkyil 'khor tshi ga thams cad la// thab/ khung gang zhig mthong tsam gyis// sdig pa kun las/ grol bar 'gyur// thab khung bstan pa bshad par bya// 
33a6(rgyud): sngon du thig ni gdab bya zhing // tshon gyis sa phyogs legs par bri// gru bzhir thig brgyad zhes bya ba/ dbus kyi 'khor lo 'byung bar bya// gru bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa ste// legs par
33a7(rgyud): bgos shing legs bris pa// rta 'bab bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ sgo khyed rnams kyi legs paro spras// sgo bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// sgo ni cha brgyad ldan par bya// dra ba zla ba phyed
33a8(rgyud): pas spras// rdo rje sgo khyud rdo rjer ldan// pad+ma'i nag kyi lcug se ma dang // phreng ba rab tu 'khor ba dang // spyi blugs phyag rgya chen po dang / shar gyi phyogs kyi cha ru bri/ rtse gsu mo zla
33b1(rgyud): ba phyed pa dang // ral gri khyu mchog mdzes rgyal mtshan/ 'od bcas bde ba phyag rgya che// lho yi phyogs su bri bar bya// 'khor lo dung dang dbyug to dang // rta babs glang po dang ni phag/ phyag rgya nub/ 
33b2(rgyud): du bri bar bya/ mdung thung dril bu ba dan dang // rma bya de bzhinar skyes dang // khyim bya 'thab mo lo phyogs pa// bang gi phyogasu bri bir ba// de yi dam tshig 'khor lo la// sangs rgyas phyag rgya yi
33b3(rgyud): dag bri/ dbus kyi gan su cod pan te// phyi rol rdo rjes nye bar spras// rdo rje 'bar bya 'bar ba yi// rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru// lho ru nor bu sna tshogs pa// nub tu pad+ma rdo rje'o// byung du rdo rje
33b4(rgyud): hUM mjed de/ bdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'o// sangs rgyas rdo rje thabs chen rnams/ phyi rol phyag rgya ba cu drug tu/ thab khung bskos pa gang yin pa// de yi bla re rnam
33b5(rgyud): par sgom// me tog shing dang spos sogs kyis// ji bzhin/ du ni dkyil 'khor mchod// rang nyid khrus chu so yan/ log byugs// sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan pa// rgyan
33b6(rgyud): rnams kun gyis rab tu spras// dri dang bzang pos dbang po skur 'gyur// nga ni pad 'dzin rgyal po ste// thor tshugs dbus na de bzhin gshegs// yang na rdo rje sems dpa'
33b7(rgyud): 'am/ rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ldan// bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu// dpung pa dam du bsdams byas te// mtshan ma bgreng bar rab gyur nas// sbyin sreg las ni yang dag
33b8(rgyud): brtsam/ e ma'o bde ba bde chen po/ 'dod chags bde ba bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod chags che// 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag grub mdzod// 'dod chags bde ba rjes dran nas/ 
34a1(rgyud): / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi b+ha/ bud med khams ni bkug na su// 'khrig pa bdun ni spang bar bya// mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas/ dbang po nye bar ni byas te/ 'dod/ 
34a2(rgyud): chags rjes dran gyur nas ni// sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam// mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes brjod do// langs pa lhag par bya ba yin// rdo rje can gyi phyag mtshan mkhas pas lhag
34a3(rgyud): par bcang bar bya/ rdo rje can dang byang sems kyi// byang chub sems ni brtan pa dang // pha rol phyin pa drug gi mtshan// brtse bas rjes chags dngos grub stor/ shes rab thabs la dga'
34a4(rgyud): pa bstan// rtag tu bsten par bya ba yin// mtshan mo langs par rab gyur nas/ lhag par yang ni bsten par bya// mngon 'dod rig ma sdug gang yin// de la rnal 'byor pas
34a5(rgyud): 'o bya// lhag pas phyag rgya cher gyur nas// dpung pa dam du bsdam par bya// rab tu dga' ba mang po gang // don/ rab dga'i sa ru 'dzi de// gang la chags par rab brtags
34a6(rgyud): pa// yang dang yang du dran par bya// rtse dang byams pas yang dag byugs// khrel yod pa yi gos kyi dgag/ tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag byugs// byang chub kyi ni sems kyis
34a7(rgyud): rgyan// de 'dra'i brtul zhugs ldan pa yi// tshon gyi chen po sten par bya// gzhan yang phyi yi yan lag dag/ gang phyir rdo rje can gyis 'dzin// sbyin sreg las kyi tshig bzhin/ shar du
34a8(rgyud): khe ltas sbyin sreg bya// ji skad gzhung las gsungs pa bzhin// rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya// zhi la sangs rgyas byang chub mchog rgyas la rdo rje rin chen gyis/ rdo rje khro bo mngon
34b1(rgyud): spyod la/ lcags kyu yis ni 'gugs par bshad// bcud kyi len la rdo rje'i sman// tshe 'phel de bzhin mi g.yo ba'i// rdo rje spyan gyi rgya chen dang // rdo rje rtse mo nor 'phel la// snang la 'khor ro// 
34b2(rgyud): cho ga ste// bzlog pa la ni rdo rje gsung // g.yon pa lcags sgrogs phyag rgya ches// sdig pa gzhom par bya bar bshad// bcing la rdo rje bcing ba ste// gsod la rdo rje gsod byed do// tshogs la rdo rje
34b3(rgyud): chags pa yis// rje su bstan pa la yang bshad// dbang po/ rdo rje dbang gis so// ci 'dod gzugs la sna tshogs te/ mkha la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la// rdo rje'i dngos grub rnam 'phrul
34b4(rgyud): gyis dang d+ma'i dran pa kyis /  rgyal pa de tshag na// dkyil 'khor// rdzogs pa'i grub pa la// rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya / yis// rig pa kun bdag rgyal po yi// phyag rgya'i mchog
34b5(rgyud): de yongasu gzung / dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la// pad+ma chen po'i sman mchog gis/ leg pa g.yon pos gargya bcing // g.yas pa yis ni sbyin srog bya// rdo rje sna
34b6(rgyud): tshogs phyag rgya yis// sbyin sreg las la rgyas gdab byas// g.yon pa hUM ldan bsdigs mdzub ste// g.yas pa mche ba gtsigs pa ste// mngon spyod kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rus pa'i phye mas
34b7(rgyud): phyogs rnams bcing / oM suM b+ha ni suM bA hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ye hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bi d+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ g.yon pa chos 'chad dang ldan zhing // g.yas pa yis ni
34b8(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya/ sangs rgyas chos ni snyoms 'jug pas/ til bsregs pas ni sdig pa sreg/ oM sarba pa bi da ha ne badz+rA ya swA hA/ lag pa g.yon pa rin chen 'gyur// g.yas pa yis ni
35a1(rgyud): / sbyin sreg ga/ 'brubadun yang na rin chen nas/ yo byad kun gyis mnyes par bya/ oM ma Ni rat+nakrA m+ba ka ye swAhA/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas ni// rlung rabs me ni rab skur te/ rnal/ 
35a2(rgyud): 'byor pas ni 'bras bsregs na// khyim ni nges par rgyas par 'gyur/ oM badz+ra puSh+pa ye swA hA/ shin tu mngar ba'i bud shing gis// me ni rab tu sbar byas te// ku sha'i myug gu til bcas pas/ 
35a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas na srung don mchog/ oM badz+ra a pra ti ha ta badz+ra swA hA// yam shing mngar po nyid dang ni/ de bzhin du ba'i myu gu dag/ mar byugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis// bsregs na tshe 'phel byed
35a4(rgyud): bo'i mchog/ oM badz+ri A yu She swA hA/ bud shing che ba rnams kyi ni// rdo rje khro bdag ting 'dzin gyis// thab khung du ni mi swaM ra ra te// tsher ma rnams kyi dgug par bye// oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha yau/ 
35a5(rgyud): swAhA/ de bzhin sna tshogs thams cad kyis/ mkhas pa yi// sa ni me sbar te// rtag tu chu skyes sbyin sreg byas// rdo rje 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin// oM badz+ra ban d+ha ya baM// de bzhin
35a6(rgyud): sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// mkhas pas yam shing bsreg bya zhing // 'bras bu kha ba'i sbyin sreg byas// skrod cig gis ni gsod par 'gyur// oM badz+ra mA ra Na ye hUM// de bzhin pa la sha dmar po// 
35a7(rgyud): sregs na dbang du byed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra rA ga nau ye hrIH// sha bus pas ni sbyin sreg byas// de bzhin chags par byed pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra shi ka ra ya swA hA/ khros pas 'dod pa'i
35a8(rgyud): 'bras bsregs na// ci 'dod gzugs ni thob par 'gyur/ oM badz+ra kA ma ru pa Ni swA hA/ oM badz+ra kha ra tsi ri ni swAhA/ bod shing ro ni kha ba yis/ shin tu khros pas ma sbar te// khros pas rdo rje
35b1(rgyud): me tog bsregs// rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// hUM badz+ra shA ka ra ye swA hA/ oM b+hU ta sha ka rA ya swA hA/ dngos grub kun gyi cho ga bzhin// mkhas pas nyung kar sbyin bsreg bya// yungs kar/ 
35b2(rgyud): shin tu bkra shis pas// dngos grub sbyin sreg mchog yin no// oM sarba si d+he ye swA hA/ rig pa 'dzin pa grub pa'i phyir// mkhas pas swasti ka bsreg bya// grub po'i dkyil 'khor sbyor
35b3(rgyud): yis// sbyin sreg rdo rje dkyil 'khor du// oM sid d+ha sid d+ha ye swA hA/ oM da la i d+hi be ta ye swAhA/ maN+Da le oM d+hi pa~M ta ye swA hA/ oM b+hu swA hA/ oM b+hu ba swA hA/ oM swa swA hA/ oM b+hur b+hA ba sa
35b4(rgyud): swAhA/ oM sAsti swA hA/ oM swa sI nA ma swA hA/ oM sid d+hi pra b+hA te yai swA hA/ oM sarba duHkha u pa sha ma ne swA hA/ oM re badz+ra si dA d+he yai sU hU~M/ oM kAr+ya ka ra ne pustaM shan ti ka~M swA hA/ 
35b5(rgyud): yi ge phaT ni mngon spyod la// yi ge dza yis 'gugs pa ra 'gyur// yi ge ba ni bcing la sbyar// dbang du bye la yi ge shri// yi ge hU~M ni bsdigs la sbyar// bsad pa la yeng
35b6(rgyud): yi ge hUM/ ha ni srung po bzang po la/ yi ge hUM ni bzlog pa la// shris ni sna tshogs gzugs bsgrub pa// oM ni mi spong bstan pa la// ho ni chags dang dgug pa la// u ni gsang ba'i dag pa
35b7(rgyud): 'dzin/ mngon sprid ldan la yi ge hAM// hA ni rdzu 'brel sgrub byed pa// lha mo chen po sgrub la aH// aM ni kun la nges par sbyar// yam shing ser po rgyas pa la// zhi ba la ni dkar po'o// dbang
35b8(rgyud): du bya ba dmar po ste// nag po mngan sgyid las le'o// zho la mar gyis byug pa ste// rgyas pa la ni 'o ma bcas// dbang du bya la lan tshwar ldan// tsha ba dang bcas mngon spyod la// dbye ba rgya
36a1(rgyud): chen dag gis ni/ sbyin sreg las rnams shes byar ba// de nyid sbyin sreg nyi shu di// rdo rje 'chang gis gsang ba yin// de kho na nyi shu nga zhes bya ba sbyin sreg gi gsang ba'o// 
36a2(rgyud): de nas dngos grub thabs chen po// thams cad 'grub 'dod dkyil 'khor du// sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// dngos grub tshogs kyi sbyor ldan zhing // rdo rje yi ni slob dpon che// brtan bcas
36a3(rgyud): rigasu yang dag skyes// theg pa chen por yang dag gnas// bskal pa grangs med mthar thug par// chos kyi shing rta che la zhon// shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan// sems can kun gyi don
36a4(rgyud): la brtson// sangs rgyas kun gyi yongasu bzung // slob dpon chen po'i tshul la gnas// mchog tu sa yi mthar/ phyin pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rigasu skyes// rdo rje slob dpon
36a5(rgyud): bka' thub che// bgogs rnams thams cad bsal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gan su yang dag ldan// sbyin sreg cho go byas nas kyang // chos sbyin chen po yod dag brtsam// dam
36a6(rgyud): chos snying po bcud las byung // sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul// shes rab thabs kyi tshul thob byed// rgyal chen shes rab chen po dang // thabs
36a7(rgyud): kyi rmad 'byung chos nyid do// bram ze bzhin du rigs mchog skyes// byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen 'dzin// gal te nus na skal chen gyis// gang tsho mchod pa rtsom pa nas// ji srid zin par
36a8(rgyud): gyur gyi bar/ bza' bdag ni mi bya'o// dri dang bcas pa'i legs sbyar ba'i// yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya// gang phyir rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// byin gyi slob pa mdzad par 'gyur// ci ste
36b1(rgyud): bzod ldan nyin mtshan du/ bzla' ba dag ni ma bya ste/ gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas/ tshim par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ dkyil 'khor dag ni dag byas shing // dri rnams kun gyi mngon 'dra/ 
36b2(rgyud): byas// stegs kyi bsangs pa'i chu yis ni// thams cad kun nas chag chag gdab// glang tshe mchod par byed pa na// phyogs rnams kun nas phyag bya ning // bshags dang gso ba gang pa nyid dang / 
36b3(rgyud): mchod pa'i sprin dang rje yi rang / bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i/ las rnams rim bzhin byas na so ni// ngal 'khor chen po mA/  mo ngas// sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya/ 
36b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi// sgrol klung rnam dpa bcu ru bI shud// gsang chen de nyid mchog 'di ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'o// dpal dang
36b5(rgyud): shes bsdigs mdzub byed// de bzhin g.yos kyi phyed/ nga nyid// phyi rol brkyang dang bzhugs pa'o// de bzhi na rin chen rang bzhin te// de dag bcu ru rang bzhin bshad
36b6(rgyud): skyil krung bergya dang bcu lhag pa// gsang ba'i rgyud kyi gsang ba yi// rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas te// sangs rgyas la dmyigs sems kyis ni// rgyu
36b7(rgyud): dong mi rmyi 'jig rten gsum// byams pa chen po rjes dran nas// dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/ rnal 'byor pas ni snyoms 'jug bya// de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog / de nas
36b8(rgyud): yang ni las rgyal po// ting 'dzin lhag pa'i bzang po nas// bcu phrag gcig lhag rgya ru bshad// las thams cad pa gsum du brjod// gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad// ting
37a1(rgyud): / 'dzin rlor med pa ni// dkyil 'khor gan par myi gyur ro// dkyil 'khor sbyo med pa hUM// ngos grang sbyi ni 'gyu mi 'gyu// de bas ga tu 'dang bsas
37a2(rgyud): ting 'dzin dngos grub kyil 'khor ba// gal te mchog dugasang du ni// du med theg pa rigs pa 'dod na// ting 'dzin gsum ni yang dag bya// dang po'i rgyud las bshad pa bzhin/ ngam
37a3(rgyud): yang dag pashad par bya// de nas byung sems rnam 'phrul du// so so'i skyebs mi nus so// de rnams kyi ni ting 'dzin mchog/ sems nyid kyis ni yang dag bya// dang po'i rgyud las
37a4(rgyud): bA shad pa bzhin// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul pa shid// blo ldan byung sems ting 'dzin gyi// bdag nyid rje/ 'phrul chen por bsam// dkar thub sna tshogs drag po
37a5(rgyud): ni/ bdag gis byas pa bsam par bya// 'og min zhes byug nas yin pa// lha yi gnas ni bsam pa bya// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// dag
37a6(rgyud): pa'i 'dus pa rnam par bsam// dong por sangs rgyas phyag byas nos// de nas thub rnams la de bzhin// bka' mnos ji skad bstan pa yi// slar yang skyil krung bca' ba bya// mngon
37a7(rgyud): par byang chub rnam pa lnga// kun tu dga' byed pasamo par bya// mtshan nyid thams cad kyis rgyan pa'i// bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku dang ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang skur pa// lnga ni ba/ 
37a8(rgyud): nyid la bsam bya// rdo rje'i gan su 'dug bya zhing // rtse mo mngon por bsam par bya// dang por sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// rdo rje shar du 'dug bya zhing // sangs
37b1(rgyud): rgyus 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang spro// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul// rgyal po dang bcas rigs dkyil 'khor// sgo srung sgeg mo la
37b2(rgyud): sogs dang // lha mo dang bcas phyag rgya yi// sbyor bas rdo rje can dbang bskur// rdo rje la su yang dag bya'o// bang gnyid kyis ni mkha' dbyings// sangs rgyas thams cad mos byas te// 
37b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// dbang bskur bar ni yang dag bya// rdo rje chos 'dzin rgyal po ru// dkyil 'khor bkod la brtag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug bya zhing // rje
37b4(rgyud): rje can rnams mchog gzhug bya// bsgrub pa dang ni dbang du bya// bya ba 'di ni mchog yin no// rang gi rigs dgang dkyil 'khor du// gnas de lhag par mos par bya// 
37b5(rgyud): 'khor lo ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin// phyag rgya ji bzhin dngong byas pa'o// las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting / nge 'dzin to// rang nyid khrus byas yin lag byugs/ 
37b6(rgyud): rgyan dang gos ni sna tshogs ldan// dpu rgyun gdu bu nyid dang ni// de bzhin sor gdub dbu rgyun bcas// go ser skud mu tig dang ldan pa'i// lag pa rkang po de nas ske// lus kun
37b7(rgyud): rnam par rgyan 'gyur ba// de bzhin ke shau'i ras lhog pa'i// gos dag bzang po bgos shing gsang // yang na chos gros 'dzin pa ste// sangs rgyas phyag rgya rgyal mtshan bzhin// gal
37b8(rgyud): te skra bregs dge slong de// ring zhing 'khyil la mdog sngo ba'i// skra ni sngon po bcang bar bya// yang na rang gi mgo la skyes// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'om// yang na rdo rje las
38a1(rgyud): su byang rnal byo rang bzhinags mang ba // ngos snab ba bang po po mi 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dngamam ma drum// tshigs par ni 'dug nas// shang du la bawAn/ 
38a2(rgyud): rangs nas ni// 'ongs pa med cing ma 'phrul bar// rdo rje snyems par yangasu bskor// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya// stod pa byas nas rang bdag nyid/ 
38a3(rgyud): dngos grub sbyar ba 'ang dag grwa// snying rje chen po sbyor ba yis// bdag gis drang srong bskul bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe// don yong dang drug dpong ste// dag pa chen mo/ 
38a4(rgyud): skyes pa'i mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub ma dzod// sems dbye' chen po thabs chen po//  rje 'khor lo mchod pa che// dngos grub chen po rdzu 'phrul
38a5(rgyud): tsho/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// rdo rje ming ni yang dag gzung // phyogs rnams kun tu yang dag bskor// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par lci bya ning // rdo rje
38a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor rjes dran bya// slar yi skyil mo krung bcas te// nga ni rang nyid 'khor los bsgyur// phyag rgyu'i tshogs ni bcing ba la// stong las nyung bar mi bya'o// tha ni rdo rje sem sna dpa
38a7(rgyud): ni dostong drug d+hA su phreng // rings sa tshig ni brjod pa ga//  dgra ni rdo rje sa rnams dpo' // dkyil 'khor chen por bsgrib pa// rdo rje mgos kun ga shegs shig/ 
38a8(rgyud): dag rgyal ji rje jom//  sems dpang dag khri mdzod// tshan can hru dri ldan pa// slang du chug khrims par rjog/ rdza grang ba rgyas rgya tshig// kyil
38b1(rgyud): bo ga gang bag/ 'khor lo dri bzhin grong dri bzhin/ rje bzhin gzung gi rjes 'dra sa nas// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rje bzhin bri// rdo rje'i big ni yong su ga dag// de nas de 'i rang rigagasang// 'a
38b2(rgyud): lo chen po rab tu grub/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ni// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa'i// thig bzhi dang ni yang dang / 
38b3(rgyud): ldan// dar dang dring bas rnam par rgyun// mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo yi sgo khyud mtshom sa ni// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// byi stod kyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de yin
38b4(rgyud): gi rim pa ni// 'khor lo lta bur dri bar bya/ rdo rje phreng bas so dadu su bskor// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje/ da ba'i 'dun gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par
38b5(rgyud): rgyan/ ji ltar phyi dang nang gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor re/ rer rnam par dbye// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// dkyil 'khor lnga bris gang yin te// ke ba mchog ni
38b6(rgyud): brgyad kyis spraso// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa yin par bshad// dbus kyi shin tu dbus song nas// chos 'dzin rgyal po chen po ste// rnam par snang mdzad khyab bdag che// sangs rgyas gzugs
38b7(rgyud): ni dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus ni// dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po yang // go rims bzhin du yang dag bri// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po
38b8(rgyud): che mdun rgyob du ni gnas pa yin// rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas phyog su// nub kyi phyig su dud 'joms pa// rdo rje legs pa rgyal po che// chos 'dzin chen pi dbang deng ldan/ chos 'dzin pa/ 
39a1(rgyud): ni byang du ste// mdun du rdo rje bsnyems tshul lo// de la de yi snying po gas // shin tu rtogs par byed pa'i mchog/ sdug bsngal kun las rab grol byed// byang chub sems ni ras
39a2(rgyud): skul pa/ hUM wa hos// shar phyogs tsha yi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus de ru// mi bskyod pa ni dgod par bya// rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni/ 
39a3(rgyud): tshem gcod pa sngon 'gro can// tshogs sngon 'gro ba bzang po ste// sdig pathams cad rab 'joms byed// oM begA kra ma ho// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsong ba che// thub pa skyes mchog ma
39a4(rgyud): bskyod pa/ glang po phyag rgya la gnas shig zhi ba'i phyag rgya yong su 'dzin// de la snying po 'dri yon te// hUM de yi po/ dgas rnams thams cad du// rdo rje mchog rnams dgrod pa
39a5(rgyud): ni// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing // 'khros bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dgra/ 'a rgyal po che// rdo rje lcags kyu bstan pa che// rdo rje 'dod
39a6(rgyud): chags bdud chen po// rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje ron chen dgod par bya// rdo rje chags pa gang bshad pa// rdo rje chos ni dgod par bya// rdo rje legs par gang bshad pa// rdo rje las
39a7(rgyud): ni yongasu bzung // dam tshig rnam pa bzhi po ni// 'khor los bsgyur ba dgod por bya// thams cad sangs rgyas cod pan ldan// 'khor lo sa sgyur bar dbang bskur ba// rdo rje rin chen de bzhin
39a8(rgyud): las/ pad+ma sna tshogs dga' chen po// bcom ldan rnam par snang ma dzad kyis// byang chub mchog de yang dge bzung // yan lag 'gyur ba lha gam rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' la sog
39b1(rgyud): sosang smra sa phyu smra ste/ rdo rdo dag la//  rgyu na ma sas smras /  nas nags pashang du'/ mnanam
39b2(rgyud): yang dag dgod// ha~M ng+ga chos dbyings yi ge a// yi ges ni yongasu sgyur// rdo rje shugs kyis lhor song nas// rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor lo// bcom ldan mchog ni yongasu 'dzin// 
39b3(rgyud): de snyi gas rnams thams cad do// rdo rje rinani chen la sogs bri/ byin chen go zi bad+d+hi rgyal mtshan dang // rin chen mo yi rgyan bcas pa// de la de rnams kyi slong po ni// oM At+patra/ 
39b4(rgyud): nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su// de yi dbus su rdo rje ches/ 'od dngag/ med ni dgod par bya'o// de yi snying pon de yi phyogs
39b5(rgyud): rnams thams cad du// rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri// pad+man po de bzhin rgyu// smra ba pad+ma phyag rgyu bcas// de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni// hrI d+ha mar// rdo rje shugs kyi song
39b6(rgyud): nas ni// byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// bcom ldan 'das ni don yod gru ba/ sangs rgyas nyid ni dgod par bya// de yi snying po ni kaM/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje las
39b7(rgyud): laso gso pa bri// thams cad srung ba gnod sbyin che// les dang khu tshur shin tu brtan// de la 'di rnams kyi snying po nau// ka haM hUM ga/ dbus kyi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// 
39b8(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las// pad+mal mo bzhi ru bshad// de la de rnams kyi snying po ni// oM a hrI aM// thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po las cha dang po'i dkyil 'khor dbus
40a1(rgyud): mardzogs so// dkyil 'khor dbus martogs na sa ni// phyag rgyathams cad songs bri// phyag rgya ni byin rlangag// rdo rje'i dag rgya yong su gathu // byang chub mchog tu
40a2(rgyud): dbus nas mchog/ shis pa shar gyi dag rgyu ste// lho yi phyog su mchog sbyin no// nub tu chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin/ khyong du ma 'jigs sbyin zhes bya// don yong grub pas yong su gzung // phyag rtsa
40a3(rgyud): lhag ma ngag mtshan bcas// de nas rdo rje sems tshogs bro// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i dbus kyi che zhes bya ba rdzogs/ 
40a4(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyi song na su// shar ngogs kyi ni dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rigs chen nyams dga' ba'i// dkyil 'khor ldan de yang dag bri// ka ba brgyad ni rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor lnga yis
40a5(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// dkyil 'khor bo zhi dang ldan pa yi// rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongasu dgod// de yi shar gyi dbus su ni/ sangs rgyas gzugs can yang dag bri// ud pa la sngon po
40a6(rgyud): 'od chen ldan// 'khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i// drag po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab// rdo rje tI rin ti ri 'dzin// khro bo rdo rje'i lta ba 'dzin// gtum pa thams cad rab 'dul byed// sangs rgyas
40a7(rgyud): mdun du rdo rje 'dzin// 'bar ba'i dbusu dgod par bya// de bzhin 'bar dbus pad+ma dang // de bzhin rin chen sna tshogs mtshan// de nyid shar gyi 'khor lo che// shar gyi cha ru song nas ni// de yi
40a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad yang dag bri// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// phyag rgya brgyad ni yongasu 'dzin// mche bdag ni cung zad gtsigs// khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i// 
40b1(rgyud): lcags kyi rdo rje lcug zlog dang // zhugs pa drug tu bani rub shadu// mang dang gnan ga'i su yin// gnyis ni yi ge du gis bsdus// des ni nang pa g.yon pa yis// dpung byug chen po mam/ 
40b2(rgyud): bdag g-i mas pas mo umAn+ti// nu ma'i bar du mnan pa ste/ g.yon kyang ba yis legs par gnas// ra pa'i phreng bas khri 'od ldan// sku mdug sngon po drug po ste// sangs d+ha
40b3(rgyud): thams cad 'jigs byed pa// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo dgod par bya// thams cad khro bo'i 'bar bas khyab// mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs// khro bo sems dpa' khyer
40b4(rgyud): rje/ de bzhin khro bo chags pa ste// khro bo legs pa dag pa ste// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni// khro bo'i rgyal po g.yas phyogs su// 
40b5(rgyud): bo'i bdag nyid chen pos bskor// dbus khro bo khro gnyen can// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad do// rdo rje khro bo'i dang nga bskur ldan// thams cad dri zhing yang dag dgod// khro gnyi
40b6(rgyud): can gyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin tshon khro bo dgod par bya// khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang // khro bo bzhad pa shin tu byung // dkyil 'khor dam pa
40b7(rgyud): gsum pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyi song nos ni// khro bo'i bdag nyid chen por bskor// rdo rje'i sde ni yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma'i khro ba dgod par bya// chos dang
40b8(rgyud): rnon po de bzhin rgyu// bzhad pa khro bo rdzu 'phrul tshe// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// las kyi rigs mchog chen po 'o// las kyi rgyal po bdag nyid che// rdo rje dbab pa yang dag bri// de mi
41a1(rgyud): phyogs rnams thams da bu/ las kyi khro la logs bri// las kyi gnod sbyin srin po dang// bsdu ba'i rdzu 'phrul khu chur che// dkyil 'khor lnga blo kun tu bri/ don rdo rje / 
41a2(rgyud): su ba shad// dkyil 'khor chen po che zhes bya// gsang ba de nyid tshegs kyi bdag/ de nas kun gyi snying po ni// rdo rje rigs ku ni nyams dga' ba'i// yi ge hUM ni 'dir brjod// drag po ha ha nas
41a3(rgyud): sgrogs hUM/ hUM hUM zhes sgrog 'jig par byed// de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni// rdo rje gsang pa legs 'dus bya// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// lha mo bani ni yang dag bri// khro bar/ 
41a4(rgyud): sems me rin chen dang // pad+ma dang ni los zhes bya// kun de nas ma ma sna rnams dag tu ni// dag rgya dam pas de dag bzung // dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal
41a5(rgyud): las cha gnyis pa rdzog so// / shar // sa kyi cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogaso so// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi// ka bi'i phyi rol
41a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ gar mo lha mo phyag rgya bcas// shar gyi rdo rje rigs nyid la/ phyi rol gnas su de bzhin nyid// nyi ma la skyed bzhi po ni// rdo rje'i dkyil
41a7(rgyud): 'khor sbyor 'byung ba// yi ge hU~M ni kun tu dgod// de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs rgyal po// yi ge hUM ni 'dir brjod do// phyag rgya rang gi yan lag 'gyur// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu gzung / 
41a8(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad rab sbyor ba sa// de dag gsang zhing mchog gsang bshad// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po mchog tu gsang ba zhis bya ba las rdo rje rigs
41b1(rgyud): chen po zhes bya ba rdzog so// lho yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang // de ru phun tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi// 'khor lo lnga po dgod par bya// de yi
41b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// rin chen chen po rta la bcibs// sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku// 'od
41b3(rgyud): zer phreng bas kun tu khyab// rin chen phreng ba mchog 'dzin pa'i// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa// so yi drang ba rab bzhad cing // so yi phreng ba'i phyag rgyar ldan// mthe bo'i rjem
41b4(rgyud): rgyal mtshan 'dzin// nyi ma'i dbus na sangs rgyas che/ zlo ba lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i sku// rdo rje nyi mo'i rigs mtsha dag go// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen sem
41b5(rgyud): dpa' yang dag ldan// rin chen sems dpa'i pad+ma dang // de bzhini rdo rje las nyid do// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// 'khor los bsgyur bas rnam par
41b6(rgyud): rgyanan/ rin chen chen po rigs las 'byung // nor bu'i rdo rje nyi ma 'dzin// de nas snying po ni tAM// lho yi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni// de yi dbus sems
41b7(rgyud): dpa' che// nor bu'i 'od can yang dag bri// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur ldan// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen de bzhin
41b8(rgyud): yang dag dri/ rin chen sems pa de bzhin chags// rgyal po legs pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje rin chen sogs phyag rgya// rang gi phyag rgya phyag mtshan phrag/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / 
42a1(rgyud): lho yi gnas kyi steng 'dug nas// rin chen rigs chen bzang po la// rdo rje rin chen bzang po bri// rin chen bzhi yi dbang bskur ldan// sangs rgyas spyi bo 'dzin pa'i mchog/ 
42a2(rgyud): rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// rin chen phreng ba'i dbang bskur ldan// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// sems dpa' bzhi ni yang dge bri// rin chen rgyal po rgyal mtshan dang / 
42a3(rgyud): bzhad dang rin chen rgyal po che// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // nub kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor la// pad+ma rin tshon bdag nyid che// rin chen phreng bas dbang bskur 'di// rin chen pad+ma'i mchog
42a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas dbu rgyan sems dpa' che// rin chen zhi ba yongs su 'dzin// zur mig 'dod tshigs chags pa'i spun// skyes bu 'dul ba le gzigs pa// pad+ma 'dzin du'i
42a5(rgyud): rgyal po che// 'jig rten dbang phyug tshe dpag med// de yi phyo// gas rnams thams cad du// rin chen pad+ma yang dag/ bri// rin chen pad+ma de bzhin no// de bzhin rgyu dang smra ba 'dzin
42a6(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // byang gi phyogs kyi nga dkyil 'khor la// rin chen las chen rgyal po ni/ bdag nyid chen pos yang dag bri// bcom ldan thub pa'i
42a7(rgyud): dbang po don yod grub// las kun 'dzin pas sangs rgyas rnams 'phrul pa'i// rdo rje las te rgyal po mdzod 'dzin pa// 'khor los sgyur ba'i gtso bo mchog dam pa// sangs rgyas dbu
42a8(rgyud): rgyan las rnams bzhi dang ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis yan lag legs par brgyan// las kyi rin chen dam pas rgyas gdab cing // rin chen dkyil 'khor tshogs chen mchog
42b1(rgyud): myur ba'i// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las kyi na chen yang dag gi// las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang // de yi bsdu ba'i khu chung 'dzin// de nas kun gyi snying ngan/  na chen
42b2(rgyud): rigs chen rnal 'byor pa// yi ge tA ni brjod par bya// ci rigs par ni rang nyid kyi// phyag rgya phyag mtshan yang dag gi// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las
42b3(rgyud): rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs so// / lho phyogs cha'i dkyil 'khor yong rdzogs so// / de nyid kyi ni grwa ba ni ru// lha mo bzhin yang dag bri// phyi yi dkyil 'khor
42b4(rgyud): mdun gnas sku// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// sems mi/ rin chen de bzhin chos// lAm 'khor lo'i 'khor du// smyig mo dreng ba de ba nin sku// go ma rnam par skyes
42b5(rgyud): mi yi/ nor bu rigs chen bzang po ni// rin chen phyag rgya sa kun khyab la// phyag mchog rang gi phyag rgyas mchu na// 'od zer phreng bas khyab 'od ldan// rin chen rdo rje dang
42b6(rgyud): skur ba// rang rang phag rgya yongs su 'dzin// rin chen mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// rin chen las byung rin chen ldan// rin chen rang bzhin khang par gnas// spos dang rin chen me
42b7(rgyud): tog bcas// rin chen mchog chen la gnas shing // lus la rin chen gos gyon pa// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba mchog tu gsang / 
42b8(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba las nor bu'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzog so// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang // nub kyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la// pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang
43a1(rgyud): / kho na/ dga'ang chen pos yang dag bri// de mi na gyi dkyil 'khor la// dkyil 'khor lda ni yang dag bri// dbus kyi skye ba'i 'khor lol// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ dz+ra/ 
43a2(rgyud): bzang po mdab ma brgyad// mad da ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba// chos dbyings gartan pa'i rnal 'byor can// pad+ma'i phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus rgyal po che// sna tshogs gzugs can ra
43a3(rgyud): bzhin mchog/ sangs rgyas shes rangab thabs ldan pa// chos kyi 'khor lo yong su 'dzin// pad+ma cig po de gnas shing // de yi dkyil 'khor la rten pa// pad+ma'i sems dpa' ba ni dro bri/ 'khon
43a4(rgyud): los sgyur ba 'jig pa med// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis smras pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma dbang skur ldan// rdo rje dad+ma la sogs bri// pad+ma'i sems dpa' 'jig pa med// kun
43a5(rgyud): kyang sangs rgyas cod pan ldan// chos kyi phreng bas dbu skur bas// pad+ma'i phyog mtshan mtshon che bsnams/ sangs rgyas 'phrul pas rnam par rol// pad+ma'i sems dang / 
43a6(rgyud): de bzhin rgyal// rin chen ches ni tshul chen po// dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po ni// rim pa bzhin du yang dag bri// nub kyi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang // 
43a7(rgyud): yi dbusu rgyal po che// sna tshogs 'khor lo dgod par bya// chos kyi snying po rab tu gnas// pad+ma mdab ma brgyad la ste// pad+ma'i ge sar dbus ni// sna tshogs gshug can dgod par bya// 
43a8(rgyud): rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spros pa// gshugs bzang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ba// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbang skur ldan// spyan gsum phyag ni brgyad pa ste// ther tshugs tshangs pa dpal bar dpong/ 
43b1(rgyud): me tog mnor cha sbyin mtshams su// mig la nyis zla ba dgod// bkar gzhon nu nub la// khya 'jug sna yi bye mo ste// mche ba nag po gsus po che// lce la dbyangs can ma yin te// gsung dbyung
43b2(rgyud): la ni dbyung chen mi// ku mu da dang bad phreng can// kha dang 'gram padag la gnas// spyan lo shes rab pha rol phyin// gdong gi phyed ni sprul par byed// phrag pa g.yas par seng ge ste// g.yon pa
43b3(rgyud): drag ni yang dag gnas// sna yi bu gu gnyis pa ni// rgya mtsho nye bar gdung ba dag dgu' bo nye dga' dpung ba la// lto ba la ni rgyo mchoganas// brla gnyis pa la dpung chen gnas// tshogs kyi
43b4(rgyud): dbang phyug dpung pa la// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni// mtshwa na me'i steng gi sgon gnas// dpal be'u snying ka lag nas te/ lhag pa lha mo chen mo dpal// 'og gi kha yi sgoru
43b5(rgyud): ni/ gshin rje'i rgyal po rnam par rten// rdzong dang 'jig te/ de lha mo che// dbus mo la ni yang dag gnas// rkang nga'i sor mo bcu la ni// ma mo bcu ni kun tu gnas
43b6(rgyud): drag po rje rang gnas pa nyid// chu yi lha mo rgyab na gnas// dpyid dang sos ka dbyar dang ni// skyon dang dgun dang dgun snad la// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa yi// rkang pa dag la yang dag gnas// 
43b7(rgyud): 'og gi 'khor lo rtsibs stong la// drag po'i phung po 'chang ba dong // sgra gcan thag bzangs ris snang byed// lha ma yin rnams kun tu gnas// lag pa bcu yi thal mo la// pha rol phyin pa
43b8(rgyud): bcu dag gnas// mngon par 'dod pa nyid dag gi/ lha chen la sogs 'di dag bri// zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste// zhal re zhing ni spyan gsum pa'i// gos dang gzugs ni bzang por ldan// de
44a1(rgyud): 'dra'i rang bzhin thub pa dgod// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri// pad+ma'i sems dpa' lcags kyu dang // mda' dang pad+ma legs par sbyin// nub kyi/ 
44a2(rgyud): lha mo'i phyogs mchog tu// pad+ma'i shugs kyi song nas kyang // de yi dbusu sems dpa'i che// rin chen pad+ma yang dag bri// zhal ni bcu gnyis ldan pa nyid// phyag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i mchog
44a3(rgyud): rin che ni pad+mar yang dag bzhugs// rani chen las ni 'byung bar 'dod// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma'i rin chen drag sogs bri// khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang // de bzhin
44a4(rgyud): zhal ni bcu gcig pa// nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dbusu sem das dpa'i tshe// 'od dpag med ni dgod par bya// pad+ma chen po
44a5(rgyud): rab ster ba// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtso// spyan dang phyag ni stong par ldan// phyag rgya mtshon cha thams cad bcwa nga/ zhal bcu gnyis pa bzang po ste// pad+mo'i lha mo yang
44a6(rgyud): dag ldan// pha rol phyin pa bcu dang ldan// tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par rol// de yi phyogaso rnams thams cad du// pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri// sgrol ma gzhon nu'i mthu can dang // mgrin
44a7(rgyud): sngon tshangs pa'i mdog las byung // nub kyi byang gi cha ru ni// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dbusu sems dpa' che// pad+ma la sogs dgod par bya// zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa'i
44a8(rgyud): phyag rgya mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/ chen po sna tshogs rab ster ba// pad+ma las ni yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rgyal// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun
44b1(rgyud): gnas pa/ pad+ma'i sbyin po gnod sbyin dang // pad+ma'i khu tshur yang dag bri// g.yas dang g.yon dang rgyab dang ni// mdun nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor ro// de nas snying po ni ha/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po hUM ste/ 
44b2(rgyud): thams cad snying po yin no// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa bzhi pa rdzog so// pad+ma'i rigs kyi tshogs
44b3(rgyud): dag gi/ dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs nas ni// de yi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// pad+ma'i sems dngapa'i rin chen dang // las dang chos ma yang dag bri// sgeg mo phreng ba de
44b4(rgyud): bzhin glu/ gar ma 'di ni yang dag bri/ dkyil 'khor tham sa cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las pad+ma'i ri dgas chen po zhes bya ba rdzog so// byang gi las kyi
44b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang // de yi/ dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni// 'khor lo lnga lnga dgod pa ra bya// de yi dbu suM las chen po// sangs rgyas gzugs ni/ 
44b6(rgyud): dgod par bya// chos 'dzin pa yi rgyal po che// na mkha' lding gi gdan la bzhugs// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las kyi phyag rgya yang dag bri// las kyi sems dpa' rin chen
44b7(rgyud): dang // de bzhin las dang chos nyid do// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni// byang gi shar gyi dkyil 'khor la// mi bskyod pa ni sangs rgyas tshe// rdo rje las ni dgod par bya// de yi mchod pa
44b8(rgyud): mtshon cha bcas// de yi phyag rgya bcas pa bzung // las chen 'dzin pa bzang po ste// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// los kyi sems dpa' ya/ 
45a1(rgyud): / dag bri/ sems dpa' chags pa'i rgyal po che// legs pa de bzhin las nyid do// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang // byang gi lho yi cha ru ni// rin chen ting 'dzin rgyal po che// rin
45a2(rgyud): chen las ni yang dag bri// rin chen char ni rab 'bebs shing // sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 'joms// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen las ni yang dag bri// sems dpa'i
45a3(rgyud): gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang // las dang bzhad pa rnam sbyong ba// las kyi rin chen bzang po la// rin chen dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang // byang gi nub kyi cha ru ni// 
45a4(rgyud): pad+ma'i las kyi sems dpa' che// dkyil 'khor dbus su yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ depad+ma'i las ni yang dag bri// pad+ma rnon po de bzhin sgra// de
45a5(rgyud): bzhin smra ba las yin no// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang / byang gi byeng phyogs dkyil 'khor la// las chen 'dzin pa dbang ldan pa// las kyi rgyal po yang dag bri// de
45a6(rgyud): yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las kyi sems dpa' dgod par bya// los kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang // de bzhin bdu ba'i khu tshur nyid// de nas snying po ni a// sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni
45a7(rgyud): A ste// thams cad kyi snying po yin no// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa lnga pa rdzog so// / byang gi
45a8(rgyud): cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzog so// / byang du ji ltar rigs byas te// las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni// de yi 'khor lo'i gre bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni dgod par
45b1(rgyud): bya/ sngar gyi dam tshig bzhi po ni// thams cad sum cu rtsa gsum yin// dbus ma zhes bya gsum cu gsum// shar gyi phyogs na sum cu gsum// de bzhin nub kyi phyogs cha'o// byung dang
45b2(rgyud): lnga yang de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gas zhing mchog tu gsang ba las los kyi rigs zhes bya brdzog so// / dkyil 'khor gyi
45b3(rgyud): 'khor lo thams cad kyang rdzog so// brgya drug cu rtsa lnga'o// de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog/ thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che// 'khor lo chen po'i gra bzhi ru// dkyil
45b4(rgyud): 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya// 'khor lo sbyor chen shar lho ru// zla dra'i gzugasu dgod par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i dgod par bya// 'dzum zhing
45b5(rgyud): zla ba'i mdog can to// 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar / sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog/ phyag g.yas pa na rdo
45b6(rgyud): rje bsnams// de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams// mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dpa' che// sems can kun gyi don sems pa// de yi pad+ma yang dag gnas// de 'od dkyil 'khor
45b7(rgyud): la brten pa// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// gsang ba lnga ni yang dag bstan// dang po drang ni gnyis pa ni// g.yas kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas// gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa ni// g.yon
45b8(rgyud): logs na ni rab tu gnas// lha mo rdo rje ca co sgrogs// dbus mkhyud rang gi lha mo de// de yi glon mgo bsgyur zhing // 'dzum bcas kun tu lta ba ste// bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la
46a1(rgyud): 'jus/ chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan sgreng // de yi glon bzhad bcas shing // rdeg byed skye dgu'i bdag mo yi// rdo rje ca co sgra sgrogs dang // de bzhin rdo rje don yod dga'// lha mo rdo rje 'dod
46a2(rgyud): dbang phyug/ gzi brjid dga' ba'i rdo rje ma// lho dang nub kyi mtsham su ni// rdo rje shug kyi song nas kyang // de yi dkyil 'khor dbus ni// pad+ma chen po dgod par bya// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni/ 
46a3(rgyud): pad+ma'i sems dpa' dgod par bya// zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa// de yi pad+mar yang dag gnas// de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa// pad+ma'i rigs can
46a4(rgyud): las byung ba// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// kun nas gsang dpa'i lha mo yi// de nas ming ni rab bshad bya// rdo rje dang dal dang rdo rje dkar// rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje can// rdo rje shugs kyis
46a5(rgyud): song nas kyang // nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du/ na mkha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje nyi ma yang da ga ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rin chen sems
46a6(rgyud): dpa' dgod par bya// sngon mar gyi ni 'od kyis khyab// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// de yi pad+ma yang dag gnas// de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa// rin chen rigs chen las byung ba'i
46a7(rgyud): lha mo bzhi ni yang dog bri// na mkha' las byung mkha' rdo rje// na mkha' mdog can skye dgu'i bdag/ rin chen dpal ldan lha mo che// rin chen dang bcas rigs mdzes ma// rdo rje shugs kyis song
46a8(rgyud): nas kyang // byang shar mtshams kyi 'khor lo la// de bzhin ud pal sngon po'i mdog/ dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// ud pal sngon po de dbusu// las rnams 'dzin pa chen po'i mchog/ 
46b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la sogs bshad pa// rdo rje'i las ni dgod par bya// de yi pad+mar yang dag gnas// de 'od dkyil 'khor la rten cing // las kyi rigs can las byung ba'i// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag gi/ 
46b2(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje rin chen ma// las mchos ma dpal ldan che// ji ltar sngon du rdo rje'i rigs// de bzhin dkyil 'khor thams cad la// de nyid po nya mo ru gnas// de nyid lha mor yang dag gnas// de nyid
46b3(rgyud): sgeg mo rnam sgeg sogs// phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho gzhan yang byed// ser mo dmar po'i me mtshungs// ud pal sngon po'i mngang 'drar 'gyur// bsnyems bcas ni pa'i dbang bskur ldan// rang gi phyag rgya yongs
46b4(rgyud): su 'dzin// de nas snying po ni hU~M dz+dza.oM A// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gas zhi mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las dang ba drug pa rdzog so// 
46b5(rgyud): mtshams rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang rdzog so// brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa lngar ldan// 'khor lo yongasu rdzog/ sa nas kyang // de yi mtshams kyi logs rnams// lha bzhi dag
46b6(rgyud): ni yang dag bri// shar du rdo rje chen po ste// rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o// rdo rje rigs chen mtshan ma ste// 'bar ba'i phreng bar ba 'jigs pa'i// lho ru rin chen phun tshogs pa// chu lha rin chen chu
46b7(rgyud): srin rnams// rin chen rigs chen mtshan ma ste// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod// nub tu sa lha bri bar bya// rtsal ldan skyes bu zhes bya yi// dkyil 'khor chen po 'dzin byed cing / 
46b8(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'ang yin// byang du rlung gi skyes bu ni// rlung gi shugs kyis gis 'ching zhing // de bzhin las kyi riges 'dzin ma// g.yo zhing rtsal ldan bri bar bya/ brgya dang brgyad
47a1(rgyud): // cu cung muru / dngus kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag sgrub// chos kyi tshul gyi gru chen po// thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po lnga/ 
47a2(rgyud): 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba zhes bya ba rdzog so// / thun mong mchog tu gsang ba yi// rdo rje rigs pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rang rigs 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni// phyogs
47a3(rgyud): gcig tu ni bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus ni// thub pa'i dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad// seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// de ni byang chub mchog 'dzin pa// mi bskyod pa ni glang chen
47a4(rgyud): bcibs// rin chen dbang ni rta la bcibs// bcom lda// na tshe dpag med pa ni// rma bya'i khri la yang dag bzhug/ sa// don yod grub pa bla na med// mkha' lding dbang po yang
47a5(rgyud): dag bzhugs// 'di rnams kyi ni bzhon par bshad// rigs mchog kun gyi dbye ba'o// mi bskyod pa yi sa gnon te// de bzhin rin chen dbang mchog sbyin// tshe dpag med kyi ting
47a6(rgyud): 'dzin sbyin// don yod grub pa'i mi 'jigs sbyin// sngon po ser po de bzhin dmar// kho dog ljang ku los 'dzin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yid 'ong // sku mdog dkar po rab tu bsgrag/ 
47a7(rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje rin chen la// rdo rje phreng bas rdo rje mtshan// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba// rdo rje'i ri mo yang dag bri/ pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po la// pad+ma'i phreng bas pad+ma mtshan// pad+ma'i dkyil 'kho
47a8(rgyud): sbyor byung ba// pad+ma'i srang bus thig gdab bya// rin chen rigs can bzang po la// rin chen phreng bas rin chen mtshan// rin chen dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba// rin chen ri mo rnam par mdzes// las kyi/ 
47b1(rgyud): rigs la sna tshogs bshad// de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs mchog la// 'on kyang rdo rje khyad par gyis// rdo rje dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba'i// rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru// lho ru rin chen dkyil 'khor
47b2(rgyud): te// nub du pad+ma yang dag bshad// byang du las ni yang dag sbyor// rdo rje can kun khro gnyer can// rin chen tshogs ni rab bshad pa// pad+ma chen po du'o zhing zhi// drag po zhi ba las 'dzin pa/ kyi
47b3(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ru// 'khor lo chen po yang dag bri// de nas phyi rol 'khor lo sogs// cho ga 'di kun de dang 'dra/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba chen po mchog tugs
47b4(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsang ba zhes bya ba rkang pa dang na pa rdzog so// las kyi rnal 'byor las byung brdzog so// nang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni// 
47b5(rgyud): tshon rtsi lngas ni dgang bar bya'o// thig dang ri mo thams cad ni// tshen rtsi kun gyis rab tu dgang // dang po nis ni tha man// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu bri// mnyam zhing kun tu cha
47b6(rgyud): mnyam pas// gru bzhi ru ni rab tu brtag/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa// ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan// yid du 'ong zhing legs par phye// thig bzhi dang ni yang
47b7(rgyud): dag ldan// dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rdo rje rin chen srad bu yis// phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gad pa bya// kha khyer gyis ni yongasu bskor// rdo rje kha khyer mdzes byas la// zla ba phyed pa'i
47b8(rgyud): lcug mes khyag/ rdo rje phreng ba'i tshogs dang ldan// dra bas dra ba phyed pas spraso// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// g.yer ka'i dra ba yang dag ldan// kha dog sna tshogs rnam par rgyan/ de dang dbus kyis
48a1(rgyud): / bar thig la/ byang chub sems rnams yang dag bri// bskal pa bzang po stong dag ni// 'das pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams// shar du thams cad rdo rje mtshan// lho ru rin chen phyag
48a2(rgyud): mtshan bsnams// nub tu pad+ma rdo rje sogs// byang du las kyi rdo rje bsnams// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha gang dag/ phyi rol thig la yang dag bri// drag po la sogs lha chen rnams// snam bu las
48a3(rgyud): ni lus phyed phung // dbang phyug chen po tshangs pa che// khyab 'jug g.yung drung gzhon nu ni// rigs bcas dpung dang bcas rgyal po// shar gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// 'khyil pa'i 'od can gtum
48a4(rgyud): po dang // ser skya rdo rje ser skya rnams// rigs bcas 'khor lo ya dang ngag ldan// lho yi phyogasu yang dag bri// myos pa phreng ldan rgyal nyid pa// rnam par rgyal dang skyel byed rnams/ 
48a5(rgyud): rigs bcas dpung dang yang dag ldan// nub kyi cha ru yang dag bri/ ko shaM gos can mo dang rlung // rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs rnams// nub kyi cha las 'og tu ni// byang gi cha ru
48a6(rgyud): yang dag bri// de bzhin dpung dang bdag por bcas// ma mo 'jig rten rab grags dang // gtso bo 'khor lo rnam rol pa// lha min la sogs rdzu 'phrul che// phyi rol 'khor lo'i rigasu bshad// rgyud
48a7(rgyud): chen gsang ba zhes bya las// stong phrag bcu ru bshad pa rnams// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas zur du// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya// me tog spos la sogs
48a8(rgyud): ldan pa// mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri// ji ltar nus shing bri ba dang // ji ltar mdzes shing rje su 'thun// ji ltar rang gi rigs bshad pa// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri// dkyil 'khor thams
48b1(rgyud): cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba rkang pa brgyad pa rdzogaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
48b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ma lus pa rdzog so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma lus pa dgug pa 'di
48b3(rgyud): 'byung ngo // 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dgug pa nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sal thabs mkhas pa chen po 'jug par byed pa nyid dang / don thams cad la
48b4(rgyud): mngon tu phyogs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub chen po'i tsho gos bsags pa// sems can gyi don la mi slu ba dang // theg pa chen po 'di las rdeg pa/ 
48b5(rgyud): gzhan la 'dod pa mi skyed cing 'gyur ba med par 'ching ba nyid da / thab dang shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa sdud par
48b6(rgyud): byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po nyid la yang dag par byed pa nyid do// de la shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin dgod par bya'o// lho ru ni rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba dang / nub tu rdo
48b7(rgyud): lcags sgrog ces bya ba dang / byang du rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las byang chub sems
48b8(rgyud): dpa' chen po'i tshul ched du brjod pa las rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzog so// / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul thob
49a1(rgyud): bya/ dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs nas ni// dam tshig mchog chen sems dpa' yis// skor bdag ni lan gsum bya// ma lus gsang ba blta bya zhing // kun tu tshogs nas dga'
49a2(rgyud): bar bya// gsang ba chad na dag bya zhing // lhag pa rnam par sbyang bar bya// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// myur du phyag rgya che sten bya// mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// lan cig tu ni brjod par bya// 'khor/ 
49a3(rgyud): lo zur ni yang dag gnas// rdo rje lha mo spyan drang bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod rten spyan drang bya// sgo yi dbus na gang gnas pa// sgo srung rnams ni spyan drang bya/ 
49a4(rgyud): phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sems dpa' chen dbo spyan drang bya// de nas sgo rnams thams cad du// lcug des kyu la sogs las byas te// phyag rgya bzhi ni yang dag bcing // 
49a5(rgyud): brgya dang rtsa brgyad dag bya ba// rdo rje lcags kyu kun tu dgugardo rje zhags pas gzhug par bya// rdo rje lcags sgrog ku na tu bcing // rdo rje dril bus dbab par bya// sgo'i bya ba'o// 
49a6(rgyud): / de nas dbusu 'dug byas nas// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches// rdo rje dbye ba'i phyag rgya yis// sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya// sgo srung bar du dmigs nas ni// sgo rnams dbye bar bya ba yin// rdo rje
49a7(rgyud): bsdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis// gdug pa thams cad bsdigs par bya// gang tshe mchod pa yang dag tsom// ji srid dus kyi rdzogs 'gyur ba// gra ni thams cad dag tu ni// bdug spos rnams ni
49a8(rgyud): btul bar bya// sngon du sgo yi las byas te// de nas mchod pa yang dag bya// dang por me tog shing la sogs// spos dang mar me phyag rgyar bcas// mtshams kyi dus las sngon du ni// bum pa rdo rje
49b1(rgyud): spyan drang bya/ rdo rje bum pa'i phyag rgyu yis// ci nus par ni spyan drang bya// bum pa shin tu bzang po gcig/ rin chen sna bdun las byas mdzes// yang na rin chen dang bsres pa'i// rdo rje dri yi chu ldan/ 
49b2(rgyud): bya// rdo rje chu yi sngags dang ni// rdo rje phyag rgya chu gtsang ma// stong dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas na// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur// bumo pa'i sngags ni oM badz+ra u da ka hUM// me tog gi sngags ni oM baH
49b3(rgyud): puSh+pe hUM// mar me'i sngags ni oM badz+ra A lo ke hUM// dri'i sngags ni oM badz+ra gan d+hi hU~M/ bdug spos kyi sngags ni oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa// thams cad phyag rgya ldan par bya// 
49b4(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgya gzung byas nas// rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor// dgongs ka'i dus nas brtsams nas ni// khru sa kyi cho ga yang dag bya// lus la dri yis byugs pa dang / 
49b5(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyi legs par brgyan// rdo rje'i shugs kyi sngogs dang ni// rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya yis// 'byung / ba dang ni 'jug pa yis// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur// 
49b6(rgyud): smin ma rdo rje ri mo mtshan// sangs rgyas phyag rgya la sogs tshogs// sems dpa' thams cad 'gom byas kyang // rdo rje rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur// der ni 'gyod pa med par 'gyur// rdo rje dril
49b7(rgyud): bri dkrol ba yis// cho ga chad dam ldog kyong rung // 'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur ro// gal te 'di ni cho gar ldan// kun tu 'jig par mi bya'o// grub pa'i rnal 'byor go cha yis// sangs rgyas skyon
49b8(rgyud): du 'dzin mi mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches// dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas dkyil 'khor dbus ni// rdo rje dag ni dgug par bya// rdo rje lcags kyu kun bcings nas// 
50a1(rgyud): / sor mo yis ni dgug par bya// de nyid rdo rje ljags kyu yis// rgyud las dgug pa nyid du gsungs// de bzhin rdo rje rigs chen la// rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bcing // rin chen ljags
50a2(rgyud): kyu'i sbyor ba yis// rin po che ni dgug par bya// pad+ma lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni// pad+ma'i rigs chen dag la bshad// las kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// las kyi rigs chen dgug par bya// rdo rje chen po'i
50a3(rgyud): lcags kyu bcing // sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya// dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bya// phyi rol rdo rje lcags kyu bcing // phyi rol rdo rje rigs spyan
50a4(rgyud): drang // bkra shis rdo rje'i lcags kyu yis// byang chub sems da dpa' spyan dang ba// byang mchog lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// // dkyil 'khor pa rnams spyan drang bya// rin chen lcags kyu'i
50a5(rgyud): phyag rgya yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drang bya// snying po'i lcags kyu 'i phyag rgya yis// phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bya// rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// ku li nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// bsnyems
50a6(rgyud): tshul sngags kyi phyag rgya yis// rnam snang yang dag spyan drang bya// sangs rgyas lcags kyi'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin kho nar sangs rgyas rnams// dam tshig lcags kyu'i phag rgya yis// dam tshig sems
50a7(rgyud): dpa' sbyin drang po// dgug pa'i sbyor ba byas nas ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs nas ni// mchod pa'i sprin rnams yang dag sgrub// bdag nyid dbul ba la
50a8(rgyud): sogs pa'i// ji skad bshad pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// bshags dang bsol gdab mchod pa dang // bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs rnams// bdag gi bya ba rdzogs nas ni// phyag rgya bcing ba yang
50b1(rgyud): dag brtsam// brgya 'am yang na stong dag gam// brgya phrag brgya ni bsdus pa yis// phyag rgya'i tshogs ni bcing byas nas// dkyil 'khor dag ni 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te// 
50b2(rgyud): ji srid skya rengs shar gyur pa'i// de srid phyag rgya yang dag cing // nges par dngos grub ster bar byed// de nas langs te phyag rgya bcas// dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni// gdug pa la sogs
50b3(rgyud): kun bsdigs te// dkyil 'khor mchid phyir 'jug par bya// rang gi khrus byas lus dris byugs// ji ltar 'tsham pa'i rgyan gos ldan// shin tu mdzes pa'i gos gyon zhing / phreng ldan kha ni dri zhim
50b4(rgyud): pas// rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// me tog spyi bor bzhag byas datAM// rol pa'i rdo rje dga' ba yis// zhugs nas mgo/ de na la rab btud cing // de nyid 'dod chags rjes chags dang / 
50b5(rgyud): de nyid bskul ba'i phyag rgya yis// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba// sangs rgyas kun ni bskul bar bya// skyon dang bral zhing brtag pa ste// 'dod chags kun la rjes chags
50b6(rgyud): pa// mchid 'os chen po rgyal po che// bcom ldan de nyid bdag grub mdzod// de nas dam tshig mchog gi ni// phyag rgya cho ga bzhin bcings nas// rdo rje slob dpon zhugs nas ni// lcags sgrog
50b7(rgyud): phyag rgya yang dag bcing // de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu bcing // steng du se gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// sangs rgyas bsdu ba'i sngags
50b8(rgyud): ni dza dza dza// shar gyi sgo ru yi ge dzaM// de bzhin lho ru yi ge hUM// nub tu lcag sgrog chen po be// byang du kun tu dbab pa a/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad lo// las 'di dag ni yang dag bshad
51a1(rgyud): // lus ni kun tu rdzogs byas nas// de bzhin ngo mtshar mthong 'gyur ba// cho 'phrul chen po rmad 'byung che// sna tshogs brgya dang rtsa bcu ste// cho 'phrul rlud 'byung chen po rnams// 
51a2(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur// dngos grub bdag nyid chen po kun// dkyil 'khor kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur// rdo rje can dang byang chub sems// de bzhin rigs ni rnam lnga dang // rdo rje dbying
51a3(rgyud): ni bdag nyid che// bcom ldan mchog kyang gshegs par 'gyur// rdo rje sems sogs sangs rgyas sras// ngo mtshar slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur// mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid// ji bzhin cho
51a4(rgyud): ga bcas par 'gyur// de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dngos grub dag/ mthong nas dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// ji ltar bkod pa 'khor lo dang // ji ltar yo byad zad pa dang // ji ltar brtul
51a5(rgyud): zhugs spyod pa bzhin// de bzhin dngos grub thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen dang // sangs rgya/ sa yang dag mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'khor lo chen po
51a6(rgyud): byon// 'di ni ngo mtshar mchog yin no// ji ltar de rnams bzhugs pa bzhin// de bzhin 'khor lo yongasu gzung // ye shes bzang po khyab pa yi// rmad 'byung dam pa thob par 'gyur// 
51a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rmad 'byung thams cad ni// sa dag brtol nas mthong bar 'gyur// yang na dkyil 'khor bar snang gi/ nam mkha' la gnas mthong bar 'gyur// yang na sangs rgyas kun gang ba'i// 
51a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur// yang na phyogs rnams thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku ni rab mthong 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs bzhin du// rdo rje can gyis bdag nyid mthong // 
51b1(rgyud): yang na gsang ba lnga zhes pa'i// yang na sangs rgyas mkhas pa'i mchog yang na dkyil 'khor gnas de ni/ stong phrag gsum ni yongasu bzung // yang na rdo rje sems gcig po// dkyil 'khor bdag po zhes/ 
51b2(rgyud): bshad do// de yi mtshan mo nyin mo mthong / nyi mo'i 'od kyis kun khyab pa'i// yang na nyi ma 'char ba ste/ yang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dag pa'i zhing ni mthong na su// sangs rgyas rol pa mthong bar 'gyur/ 
51b3(rgyud): 'dus pa shin tu dag pa yi// dbang bskur ba ni mthong bar 'gyur// rmad 'byung sna tshogs zhes bya ba// rnam 'phrul ngo mtshar 'di mthong 'gyur// rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyis// dkyil 'khor mchod pa
51b4(rgyud): sna tshogs 'gyur// yo byad tshogs par gyur kyang ni// gang zhig dbasgribs par gyur pa yis// de bzhin ngo mtshar nyid mi mtho dang // rnal 'byor gzhan ni yang dag rtsom// phyag rgya thams cad bcings
51b5(rgyud): nas ni// sdig pa dral ba yang dag bya// rmad byung sna tshogs 'di lta/ ste// la lar zhugs pa tsam gyis ni// 'grub pa nyi du gdon mi za// dang po thun la 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin la lar mtshan
51b6(rgyud): phyed na/ gsum pa'ang skya reng 'chotsher na 'grub/ de bzhin la lar nyi shar na// de ma thag tu mngon 'dod pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog 'grub 'gyur/ skal ldan thar par 'dod 'gyur na/ sa ni dang por
51b7(rgyud): 'dod pa ste// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas// gang gi gnas med 'gro ba'o// yang ni rig pa 'dzin nyid dam// de bzhin rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/ ji ltar mngon par 'dod par 'grub/ sangs rgyas byang chub yongasu 'dzin// 
51b8(rgyud): mtsham med lnga po byed pa dang // de bzhin sdig pa kun byed pas// gang tshe lan bdun byas nas ni// sgrub pas rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur// 'byung ba bzhi las gzugs can min// na mkha'i gzugs su
52a1(rgyud): rtag tu 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur ba nyid// rdo rje bka' ni gzhan du min// gang gi lan bdun sgrubs nas ni// sdig pa dge ba nyid 'gyur zhing // nyes par byas pa bsod nams tshogs// 
52a2(rgyud): gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ dang pa med par gnas pa dang // gang tshe the tshom za 'gyur ba/ de ni rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur/ byang chub sems ni yongs ma bzung / sngon du bsnyen pa nyams 'gyur te/ rtag
52a3(rgyud): tu rtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur// de 'dra la sogs bgeg mang dang // nga rgyal 'di dag rnam par spangs// sdom pa yongs su ma bzung zhing // rnal 'byor de nyid tshul shes mini/ rdo rje slob dpon mi brtan 'gyur
52a4(rgyud): 'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyi/ gdal te rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur// mkhas shing sdom pa blangs da pa dang / byang chub sems ni yongasu gzung // gang tshe 'tshe ba don
52a5(rgyud): yod cing // gal te skye ba 'bras bcas 'dod// 'bad pas tham sa cad nyid kyis ni// rnal 'byor chen po yang dag brtsam// byang chub sems dang ldan gyur nas// rig pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa
52a6(rgyud): yi// de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub 'gyur/ yang zhus pa/ rig pa'i rgyud ni rab 'grub phyir/ sdom pa ji ltar blang bar gyi// ji ltar dam tshig srung bar bgyi// dam tshig nyams
52a7(rgyud): pa ji lta bu// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni// theg pa gzhan la 'dod mi bya// de nas rnal 'byor yang dag rtsam// dkyil 'khor gang na gnas kyang rung // slob dpon gyi ni
52a8(rgyud): mdun song ste// zhabs dag la ni btung nas brjod/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ slob dpon khyod ni dgongasasu gsol/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul stan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// 
52b1(rgyud): dam chog de nyid sbrul tu gsol// rlom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol// gtso bo bdagu la sdom pa gsol/ slob dpon gyis ni bar brtag / rnam pa kun tu bar gdam tshig brjod byug bzhig ni// snod du dang / 
52b2(rgyud): bde gzhug bya/ bu dang slob ma ma yin min// snod dang ldan la sbyin par bya// gal te snod dang ldan par shes/ srog dang bdog pa kun sbyin pa// sngon tu dkyil 'khor rab 'jug cing / cho ga bzhin du bcun sa ni/ 
52b3(rgyud): de nas me tog bcas thal mo// lus btung dga' ba che rnams kyi/ bshags pa dang ni gsol ba ga ga/ rje su yi rang kun tu bya/ rgyud dbang gsang ba las gsung bzhin/ mchod pa dang bcas yongasu bsngo/ 
52b4(rgyud): phyogs rnams kun tu phyag bya zhing // sdom pa chen po blang dang / bya/ slob dpon la ni rab tu brjod// gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol// thub pa'i nyim ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas bdag la
52b5(rgyud): dgongasu gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di// slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas rol mo las byung gi/ rmi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer
52b6(rgyud): mchog/ gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi// gsang ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du// slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzad// mi ldog pa yi dbang skur ba/ skal ba chen po bdag la stsol// mtshan rnams
52b7(rgyud): kun gyis rgyas btab cing // dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong pa/ slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// dbang skur pa ni rmad byung che// sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir// bdag
52b8(rgyud): ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// gsang ba'i rigs las byung ba yi/ rdo rje'i rigs bcas 'khor lo ste/ rta babs bcas par yang dag ldan// slob dpon gyur par shes
53a1(rgyud): par bya// bdag nyid nye bar zhi ba nyid// byang chub sems ni yongasu bzung // gsang ba yi ni 'khor lo ru// sdom pa dang bcas 'jug par bgyi// de nas slob dpon gyi 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste// 
53a2(rgyud): gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa// gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni// bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ yang slob dpon gyi 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste// sangs rgyas
53a3(rgyud): / chos dang dge 'dun ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // 'di na sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // blo chen gyis ni zung bar bgyi// byang chub
53a4(rgyud): sems gang de rdo rje/ shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do// slob/ dpon dag kyang bzung bar bya// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang ma da nyam/ 'di ni rdo rje rig dag pa'i// sdom pa dam tshig yin par
53a5(rgyud): gsungs// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ zang zing mi 'jig chos dang byams// spyi na pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// 
53a6(rgyud): dam chos khyod kyi gzung bar bya// 'di ni pad+ma'i rig dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs// las kyi rig mchog chen po la/ sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ 
53a7(rgyud): mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi ni// phas pham par ni rab tu bshad/ sbreng zhing dor bar mi bya ste// rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// 
53a8(rgyud): nyin re zhing ni bzla bar byed// gong che nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa/ kha na mtho sbom por 'gyur// khyod kyi srog chags bsad mi bya// ma byin par yang mi blang ngo // 'dod la log par mi spyad cing // brdzun
