76b5(rgyud): shes rab can gyi bskul ba bsam// sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas shing // ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya// nges par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rang sems so so brtag par bya// byang
76b6(rgyud): sems yang dag skyed nas ni// dbusu zla ba brtag par bya// de nas rang gi ye shes brtag/ zla ba'i dbusu rdo rje bzhin// rang lus rdo rje gzugasu ste// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid// de nas sangs
76b7(rgyud): rgyas mngon rtogs nas// rang bdag nyid ni dbang skur bya// rang bdag sangs rgyas thams cad du// rdo rje rnal 'byor blta bar bya// ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru// stug po'i gnas las babs na su// rdo rje'i gdan/ 
76b8(rgyud): la 'dug na su// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bya// sems dpa' bzhi ni phyung na su// phyogs rnams kun tu yongasu spro// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan byas nas// phyogs bzhi ru ni dgod par bya// mtshamasu
77a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis bangs// phyogs pa ni du ni sangs rgyas kyi// 'khom la dkyil 'khor chen po byung // 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas nyid// dkyil
77a2(rgyud): 'khor thams cad blta bar bya// sems dpa' gsang ba'i lha mor bcas// sgo srung rnams ni bsam par bya// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag pa ni// snying po chen po rtag par bya// rang gi 'khor lo yang dag
77a3(rgyud): bzhugs// 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan// thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mtshan ni rje su dran po sgom// ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang // rdo rje'i lta bas blta bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting
77a4(rgyud): 'dzin gyis// slar yang snyoms par 'jug par bya// rnam pa dar snang mdzad thugs dbus// byang chub sems ni bsgom pa ra bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par ni// mgon po'i snying kha
77a5(rgyud): nas gzung bya// sems dpa' kun gyi spyan snga ru// bka' ni rims bzhin nod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur gyis// rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya// gsol ba btab pa gsan
77a6(rgyud): par bya// bdag ni rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ting 'dzin shin tu bla na med// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun// kun gyis rlab pa mdzad par 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin las
77a7(rgyud): langs nas kyang // bka' ni nye bar gnod bya ste// rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// skyil krung bshig ste langs nas ni// rang gis 'dren pa'i zhabs phyag bya// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
77a8(rgyud): gang ba ru// phyogs rnams bzhi ni lta bar bya// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs// rdo rje'i chog ni brjod par bya// bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid// bdag ni sangs rgyas
77b1(rgyud): rgyal po che// bdag ni stobs chen rdo rje can// bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal// bdag ni phyag na rdo rje mchog/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di// lan cig nyid ni brjod par bya// bdag ni gtso
77b2(rgyud): bo rdo rje che// byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro// sangs rgyas rgya mtshos kun tu gang // 'khor los lnga par yang dag gnas// bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni// rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan par bya// slar
77b3(rgyud): yang bdag nyid go bgo zhing // bdag nyid dbang ni bskur bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bcad par bya// lag nyed pa yi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad rab tu
77b4(rgyud): mnye rdo rje gtun shing nyid kyis ni// bgegs rnams tha/ thams cad brdung bar bya// rdo rje ral gri rab rno bas// bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya// rdo rje mche ba drag po yis/ 
77b5(rgyud): bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya// rdo rje bzang po'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom par bya// rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig
77b6(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje mche ba rab grags pas// bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// rdo rje lcags sgrogs phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs
77b7(rgyud): rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya// rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya// rdo rje 'bebs pa'i
77b8(rgyud): phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad skyel bar bya// rgyas pa yis ni ci nus par// lus rnams thams cad dgug par bya// bgegs ni 'ga' yang yod min zhes// sems ni dag par gyur pa yin// 
78a1(rgyud): rang sems bdud ces bya bar bshad// bgegs nyid kyang ni rang gi sems// rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsal// rnam rtog las ni bgegs rnams 'byung // gdul bar dka' ba'i sems
78a2(rgyud): gzung zhing // 'dod pa lnga ni spang bar bya// sngon du rjes dran nas brtsams te// yang na rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// bcom zhing nges par bcad nas ni// yi ge hUM gi skrag par bya// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yis// 
78a3(rgyud): rdo rje ra ba bcing bar bya// hUM mdzad rdo rje snga mas bya zhing // de ni rdo rje ra bas skor// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches// dkyil 'khor yang dag byin rlabs nas// ci nus par ni rgyas pa ru// rab mchog
78a4(rgyud): ni bcing bar bya// rtog pa kun la nges sbyar nas// sems ni dag par 'gyur ba yin// dkyil 'khor dag ni mtshan nyid ni// mkhas pa yis ni bzung bar bya// grogs dag dang ni/ 
78a5(rgyud): thams cad la// g.yel ba med par srung bar bya// gsar zhing / legs par bkal ba dang // tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang // dri zhim reg bya 'jam pa dang // logs par byas shing
78a6(rgyud): sra ba dang // dri gsung dang ni yang dag ldan// sna tshogs tshon gyis kun tu khyab// dri bcas tshon du spang bya zhing // chos kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de nas de ni yang dag bshad// dkyil 'khor
78a7(rgyud): mchog ni chen po ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// sangs rgyas brtan pa'i rdo rje can// sems can 'di rnams gdul bya min// bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho che// tshogs ni kun tu ma bsags
78a8(rgyud): pas// bsod nams tshogs dang mi ldan zhing // sangs rgyas 'byung la chags dang bral// sems can de rnams mos bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor chen po bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ 
78b1(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor 'dzin du 'jug/ yang na song nams dag gi tshogs// de ni rang nyid kyi mthong 'gyur// gang phyir tshogs bcas longs spyod dang // chos kyi sku ni blan med// rdo rje'i dam chos las
78b2(rgyud): byung ba'i// sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'dzin du gzhug// gal te de ni tshogs bsags gyur// sngon du sangs rgyas rje su mthong // dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la gnas te// sangs rgyas thams cad des mthong 'gyu
78b3(rgyud): tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang // sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru// des ni thos pa rnyed mi 'gyur// dang por 'dir 'dug smos ci dgos// gang phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'di ni gsang ba mtshung
78b4(rgyud): med pa// 'di ni theg chen snying po ste// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na me da// bskal pa grangs med pa ru byung // sa yi pha rol phyin pa mchog/ gang phyir gsang ba mtho ba thob// rab tu dga' ba
78b5(rgyud): sgrub par 'gyur// gal te rnal 'byor pa de brtson// tshe 'dri na de la mya ngan 'das// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob cing // rdo rje nyid ni the tshom med// yang na mthong ba tsam gyi ni// skye ba bcu drug
78b6(rgyud): mya ngan 'das// rab tu dga' ba thob pa dang // yang na rdo rje nyid kyang ngo // sa la nyi zla ltung byed cing // de ni na mkha'i rang bzhin 'gyur// so so'i skye bos sangs rgyas nyid// 'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min// 
78b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor mchog ni bla med pa// de phyir rnal 'byor chen po sbyor// gal te sangs rgyas nyid 'dod na// brtson 'grus chen pos brdad mi bya// tshad ni ji skad bshad pa ru// de bzhin gzhung gi rjes 'brangs
78b8(rgyud): nas/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ 
79a1(rgyud): cha mnyam pas ni mdzes pas gyur// dar gyis chun pos rgyan gyur cing // rin chen dra bas rnam par rgyun// g.yer ka'i dra bas yang dag ldan// kha dog lnga pos rab tu mdzes// 
79a2(rgyud): dril bu'i dra bas shin tu sbas// rnga yab sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa// phreng ba rnga yab bla re dang // nyi zla dag gis nye bar mdzes// kun nas phyi rol gnas dag tu// rdo rje kha khyer yang dag rten// kun
79a3(rgyud): tu kha khyer dang ldan pa'i// sgo ni kha khyer med pa'o// rtse mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin// gzhan ni gser gyi mdog can dang // dmar po pad+ma lto bu dang // gzhan yang shel ltar dkar ba dang // rin
79a4(rgyud): chen rang bzhin mchog kun gyis// dkyil 'khor mdze nges par bri bar bya// sna tshogs gzugs ni mdzes pa mchog/ rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyi mchod// rim gnyis sgo
79a5(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan// rta babs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dkar zhing gsal dang rdo rje dang // nyi zla dag gis rnam par spras// mdab ma bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sgo
79a6(rgyud): bzhi dag ni mchog tu mdzes// mtho zhing yangs la mdzes pa ste// rdo rje rdo rjer yang dag ldan// rdo rje sgo srung skal chen po// bdag nyid rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin// gtum pi srung byed rnal
79a7(rgyud): 'byor pa/ shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas// lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ste// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog go// rdo rje dril bu skal chen po// byang gi sgo ru yang dag gnas// 'jug pa dang ni 'byung
79a8(rgyud): ba'ang rung / rdo rje shugs ni brjod par bya// ri mo dman ma brdzis byas na// dam tshig de nyid mthong mi 'gyur/ oM badz+ra be gA kra ma hUM// gang gi dus su thig 'debs pa// rdo rje'i thig ni brjod par
79b1(rgyud): byanas yi cha ni ma lus pa// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur// oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU tra ma ti kra ma hUM// sngon du tshon dri'i phye ma la// 'bar ba'i ldabs yang dag blta// badz+ra rA ga
79b2(rgyud): zhes brjod na// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur// oM badz+ra rA ga hUM/ mtshams kyi tshoni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ 
79b3(rgyud): phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// logs dang cha ni mnyam pa dang // kun nas cha ni rnam par phyed// dkyil 'khor cha ni rnam par gsal// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ 
79b4(rgyud): do yi nang gi rim pa ru// zhugs nas 'khor lo de mtshung das pa// kun tu cha ni mnyam par br-i// ka ba brgyad kyis de nye bar mdzes// rdo rje'i ka ba'i mdun gnas su// dkyil/ 
79b5(rgyud): 'khor dag ni lnga yis rgyan// gnas lnga dag ni thams cad du// 'khor lo lnga ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// kun tu dri zhing dgod par
79b6(rgyud): bya// rdo rje bsnyems tshul gyis bltas nas// rdo rje sems dpa' gzung bar bya// oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas rgyal po dgod par bya// gang gi thugs
79b7(rgyud): las nges byung ba// gsang ba'i cho gas ni stug cing brten// rnam par snang mdzod rnal 'byor che// phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gsal// gang gi thub pa don yod grub pa dgod// de yi
79b8(rgyud): phyogs rnams thams cad du// las chen po bdag yang dag bri// kun nas phyogs ni bzhi dag tu/ phyag na rang gi phyag mtshan mtshon// mdun du rdo rje las yin te// g.yas su rdo rje srung ba/ 
80a1(rgyud): g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te// rdo rje khu tshur rgyab tu'o// de nas phyag mtshan bcu drug dang // dbus ma nyi shur rab bshad bya// bcu drug dbus ma nyi shu ni// go rims bzhin du rab bshad
80a2(rgyud): bya/ ji ltar rigs shing tshim pa la// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// rdo rje rin chen rin po che// rdo rje pad+ma chen po dang // rdo rje rnon po dbus ma yin// phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje che// de bzhin rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin// rdo rje chag/ 
80a3(rgyud): po gzhu nyid do// rdo rje legs pa'i rdo rje gnyis// rdo rje rin chen rin po che// rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma ste// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan sgreng // rdo rje gzhad pa chos chen po// rdo rje chos kyi pad+ma ches// rdo rje chos kyi
80a4(rgyud): ral gri bzang // rdo rje rgyu yi 'khor lo che// rdo rje'i smra ba'i yi dge ste// rdo rje rnon po las chen po// rdo rje srung ba'i cho ga ste/ rdo rje gnod sbyin mche ba che// rdo rje khu tshur snrums pa ste// lcags
80a5(rgyud): kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu dag ni slob bzhi/ rdo rje sems ma'i rdo rje che// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen nor/ pad+ma rdo rje chos ma ste// rdo rje rnon po las ma yin// grwa bzhi dag tu
80a6(rgyud): gsang ba yi// phyag mtshan de rnams dgod par bya// 'khor lo chen po'i phyi rol gyi// grwa bzhi dag ni thams cad du// gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri/ rdo rje sgeg ma rdor phreng ma// 
80a7(rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje glu mo nyid// bsnyems bcas phreng ba'i pi bang dang // glu gar gsang ba'i lha mo rnams// phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnamasu// mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri// me tog spos dang de bzhin dri/ 
80a8(rgyud): mar me nub byang mtsham su 'ong // mar me la sogs par nyid kyi// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad du// bskal pa bzang po'i sems dpa' che// stong ni nges par dgod par bya// mtshan ma ji bzhin ci rigs
80b1(rgyud): pas// byams pa la sogs ma lus pa// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa yi// sems dpa' chen po dgod par bya// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// kun tu dri zhing dgod par bya// rang gi snying pos kun dbab phyir// 
80b2(rgyud): rang rang gi ni snying po yin// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra pA Ni hUM// badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHbadz+ra rA ga ho/ badz+ra sA drA sa/ dam tshig mchog gi snying po'o// oM badz+ra ma Ni/ oM badz+ra ti dza a/ badz+rA ka/ 
80b3(rgyud): tu hUM/ badz+ra hA sa ha/ badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na d+h+waM/ badz+ra he tu ma/ badz+ra b+hA Sha raM/ dbang gi sems dpa' dang / ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen po'i snying pa'o// badz+ra karma kaM/ badz+ra rak+Sha haM/ badz+ra yak+Sha hUM/ badz+ra muSh+Ti baM/ las kyi
80b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i snying po'o// de rnams ni rab tu gnas dpa'i snying po yin no// de nas sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni/ badz+ra hUM/ rat+na traM/ d+harma hrI/ karma a/ lha mo rnams kyi sngar bshad zin
80b5(rgyud): to// sgo srung rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad dgod par bya/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi las bshad par bya ste/ kun nas rdo rje
80b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis// chos kyi blo can gyis bri byar// dpal mchog dang po las gsungs pa'i// sems dpa'i phyag rgya btsong bar bya// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs// lan bdun du ni brjod par bya// phyi
80b7(rgyud): rol dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la// lan bdun du ni bskor bar bya// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni// mkhas pas thams cad blta bar bya// gal te chad dam lhag kyang rung // rdo rje shugs
80b8(rgyud): kyis dag par bya// 'khor lo chen po dag par byas// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor yang dag gzung // rgyal ba rnams la bdag nyid ni// dbul ba'i las ni kun tu bya// de nas yo byad thams cad kyis// 
81a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya// ci 'byor pas ni bya ba ste// dman par gyur kyang nyes pa med// 'byor pa ci snyed yod pa kun// go rims bzhin du rab tu dbul// bum pa gang
81a2(rgyud): ba'abum phrag gam// stong ngam yang na brgya yang rung // mar me 'bum phrag stong ngam ni// yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung // dri dang spos kyi snod 'bum mam// yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung / ga pur a ga ru nyid dang / 
81a3(rgyud): du ru ka dang tsan dan sogs// mang sbyar dri zhim dang ldan pa// spos rnams 'di dag bsreg par bya// gser ram dngul gyi snod dag dang // sa las byas kyang nyes pa med// yo byad ji snyed yod pa kun// dkyil 'khor
81a4(rgyud): du ni bzhag par bya// de la skong bu stong phrag gam// mar me stong bu shin tu 'bar// than mar me snod gcig ste// ma tshang gyur kyi dang nyes pa med// dar ni phyar bar bye ba bre// rnga yab phreng bas rnam
81a5(rgyud): rgyan// dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// / sna tshogs bzhon pa brgya 'am ni// stong phrag gcig kyang nye sa pa med// thams cad ma tshang gcig nyid kyang // bde bas rol
81a6(rgyud): mo mchog rnams bya// phan pa'i zas ni stong phrag dang / bye ba phrag ni rgya mtsho tshogs// bca' ba sna tshogs pa yang ste// gal te ma tshang nyes pa med// dri dang gos bzang thams cad dang // dri zhim pa yi byug pa dang // 
81a7(rgyud): bya ba mchog ni snyoms par mdzes// bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs dri yi chus bkang ba// bum pa shin tu yid 'ong dang // me tog shing ni brgya nyid dang // bzhi yang nyes par mi 'gyuraro// dri dang ma
81a8(rgyud): tog thams cad dang // bdug pa yid du 'ong ba kun// gal te sbyor ba ldan gyur na// mchod pa rnam pa thams cad bya// mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid// ji bzhin sgrub pa pos de phul// de bzhin dngos
81b1(rgyud): grub rdzu 'drul ni// mthong ba'i chos la thob par 'gyur// sngar ni ji skad bsgrags pa bzhin// thams cad cho ga bzhin du dgod// sangs rgyas kun la dbul ba zhing // mchod pa nyid kyang rab tu ga/ de nas dkyis
81b2(rgyud): 'khor 'khor lo yi// dbus kyi 'khor lo phyag byas nas// dbus mo btsugs te 'dug nas ni// yang dag par ni dgug par bya// sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu bcing // rdo rje lcags kyu brjod par bya// nyi shu kya ga ci
81b3(rgyud): zlas pa yi// de bzhin gshegs rnams kun du gshegs// de nas sgo srung bcings nas ni// yi ge dza ni yongasu brjod// rdo rje can ni thams cad dgug/ the tshom med par gshegs par gyur// rdo rje
81b4(rgyud): zhags pa bcings nas ni// cho ga ji bzhin nges par gzhugardo rje lcags sgrog bcings nas ni// dbang du yang ni rtag tu bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis// de dag nyid kyang dbab par bya// 
81b5(rgyud): rdo rje gnas pa'i phyag rgya yi// gnas rnams kun ni dgod par bya// ci nus par ni rab tu sgrags// de nas mchod pa rab tu bya// / spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
81b6(rgyud): kun la sbyar// bdag nyid dbul dang mchod pa dang // bshegs dang gsol ba btab la sogs// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang // sdom pa yang dag spyad par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches/ 
81b7(rgyud): bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya// se gol dag ni brdab bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// bkug cing rab tu bcug nas ni// rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag
81b8(rgyud): dpab rdo rje sems dpe'i phyag rgya ches// dral nas de ni yang dag dbab// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// ye shes dag pa skye bar 'gyur// sems dpa'i ye shes 'bab par 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa yang dag
82a1(rgyud): brjod// ji ste babs par ma gyur na// yi ge a yis dril bu dkrol// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // rdo rje slob dpon 'di lta bu// ye shes dam pa skye 'gyur zhing // rmad du byung
82a2(rgyud): ba'ang 'dis mthong 'gyur// brgya las rtsa bdun lhag pa nyid// mtshan ma'ang de las lhag 'byung 'gyur// gzhan dag gang yang rung ba nyid// gal te bsod nams skal pa che// des ni sangs rgyas
82a3(rgyud): thams cad mthong // yang na byang chub sems dpa' 'am// yang na rdo rje 'dzin gang nyid// yang na 'od zer 'phros pa mthong // hUM sgrogs 'brug gi sgra dang ni// spos dang me tog dag gi bar// baspu lang/ 
82a4(rgyud): pa la sogs byung // de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni// dkyil 'khoraphyi rol byung nas ni// sems ma'i phyag rgya ldan gyur dbas// sor mo gnyis kyi phreng bas zung // gar gyi tshul
82a5(rgyud): gyis zhugs nas ni// rdo rje gar gyi rab bskor bas/ dbus kyi 'khor lo rab zhugs nas// phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya/ phreng ba de ni gar babs pa// de dang don skad cig 'grug
82a6(rgyud): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// phyag rgya thams cad btsod byas na// dngos grub thams cad nges pa ru// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gzhan yang de la rdo rje 'chang / byin gyi rlob
82a7(rgyud): pa mdzad par 'gyur// langs nas der ni bcom ldan 'das// yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang rung // 'dar ba dang ni g.yo ba'ang rung // de bzhin yan lag 'khum pa dang // yang na tshig ni byung ba dang / 
82a8(rgyud): ci ste hUM ni brjod pa'ang rung // nges par legaso zhes bya ba// cho 'phrul bde ba chen po ni// rmad 'byung bsam gyi mi khyab ste// rdo rje slob dpon skal pa ches// mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// mtshan
82b1(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// de nas langs te brjod par bya// mgon po thub pa la btud nas// ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// sems
82b2(rgyud): can kun la phan bya'i phyir// slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi// rgyu dang mi rgyu khams gsum gyi// sems can kun gyi bde gang yin// des ni rdo rje slob dpon de'i// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// 
82b3(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzog so// / de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po dar
82b4(rgyud): ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad 'jug tu rung ngo // snod dang snod ma yin pa yongs su brtag par mi bya ste/ gzhug pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su
82b5(rgyud): gzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mod la phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyu/ ra ro// dad pa med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa dang // 
82b6(rgyud): rgyud yongasu ma smin pa dang / mos pa med pa mang du zin kyang 'on kyang mthong ba tsam gyis so// gang gi phyir gsang ba chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gsang bas
82b7(rgyud): 'dul ba'i thabs dang / 'khor lo'i tshul dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ngan song thams cad rgyun
82b8(rgyud): chad par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sras ni 'jig pa med// ngan song sgo ni bcad pa dang // thams cad thar pa la gzhol dang // phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ste// 
83a1(rgyud): byang chub sems ni skyed du gzhug/ sems can kun gyi don bsams nas// sdom pa yang ni sbyin par bya// srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yen
83a2(rgyud): pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / gtses pa'i chang dang / myos par gyur pa dag/ de nas brtsams te spang bar bya'o// sngon la sdom pa 'di dag ni// ji ltar 'dod cing mos pa ru// mkhas pa
83a3(rgyud): yis ni sbyin bya ste// rang dbang med par sbyin mi bya// gal te de ni dad gyur na// de la sdom pa sbyin par bya// sdom pa gsum lo bkod nas ni// de nas dkyil 'khor brtan par bya// gal te dngos grub
83a4(rgyud): mchog 'dod na// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ste// sla ba pa lnga la rnam par gnas// byang chub sems la mtsho dag brtson bya// sems can shin tu gdul dka' gang // 
83a5(rgyud): sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed cing // dad dang ljon pa med pa'ang // 'jug pa nyid ni dgag mi bya// ji ltar sangs rgyas thu gas rje can// de dag gi ni sku ru 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyi mod/ 
83a6(rgyud): la ni// sdom pa dag par 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid ngan pa'i sems can gang // khro zhing shin tu gshe ba dang // gzhang gang byed cing 'phyar yang rung // de nyid rgyu ru 'gyur ba yin// gzhug pa'i cho ga
83a7(rgyud): rgyas pa ru// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// sbyor ba bzhi yis phyag bya zhing // rdo rje sngags kyang sgom par bya// sngar bshad cho ga ji bzhin/ 
83a8(rgyud): du// phyag bzhi dag kyang bya ba yin// stod g.yog gos ni dmar po dang // dmar pos mig kyang dgab par bya// gos ni dmar po skon byas te// gang phyir sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya
83b1(rgyud): che// shin tu gsal ba 'ching du gzhug/ snying po lan cig brjod bya zhing // sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes bya brjod// dga' zhing mgul rangs pa yi// sor mo gnyis kyi phreng ba blangs// snying po 'di dag nyid kyi ni// 
83b2(rgyud): slob dpon chen po gzhug par bya// sa ma ya hUM/ shar gyi sgo yi nang du ni// yi ge dza ni yang dag brjod// lho ru zhag pa'i yi ge hUM// nub tu lcags sgrog pa lhan cig/ byang du dril bu byang chub par// yi ge
83b3(rgyud): a ni brjod par bya// dus phyi so rol pa dang bcas pa// bkug ste phyag kyang btsal bar bya// bshags dang gsogadab ma chod pa dang // yongasu sngo dang rjes yi rang // bdag nyid dbul ba nyid kyang ni/ 
83b4(rgyud): go rims bzhin du byed du gzhug/ deng bdag ye shes rdo rje ni/ dathe tshom med par skyed par bya// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya ste// khyod ni phung bar gyur ta re// brjod nas phreng ba dor du
83b5(rgyud): gzhug/ rdo rje'i phreng po sbyin par bya// phreng ba de ni gang du babs/ 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med// oM badz+ra mA le/ rdo/ rje tshig ni rab brjod cing // deng nas gdong g.yog dgrol bar
83b6(rgyud): bya/ nges par yid ches sbyin bya zhing // dkyil 'khor ltos zhes brjod par bya// oM nga ni rdo rje sems rang nyid// sangs rgyas snying po las byung ba// rdo rje mig ni dbye bar bya// kye rdo rje'i dkyil 'kho
83b7(rgyud): ltos/ dam tshig nyid ni sbyin bya zhing // sems ma'i phyag rgya steng du bcing // 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig 'joms// rdo rje cho ga ni brjod par bya// oM ud ka Tha/ rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ 
83b8(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes srung bar byed// dam tshig nyid ni nyams 'gyur na// 'bras bu 'di ni thob mi 'gyur// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrung
84a1(rgyud): / pas 'grub par 'gyur// 'thungs shig rdo rje bdud rtsi 'thung // rdo rje sems dpa'i mna' yi ni// snying po 'dis ni gnas bsgra'o/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid ni// de ring khyod kyi snying la
84a2(rgyud): zhugs// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// skad cig de la dral nas gshegs// gang zhig sdom pa mi len cing // shin tu gdul dka' dang med la// gzhug pa tsam ni sbyin par bya// de la las ni mi bya'o// dkon
84a3(rgyud): mchog gsum la dad dang ldan// sdig la 'jigs shing rab tu bsdam// dad dang dang ba phun sum tshogs// de la dam tshig sbyin par bya// de la dam tshig gang zhe na// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // gtso
84a4(rgyud): bo de dag lhur blang bya// 'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni// byang sem sa nges par dor mi bya// lha rnams la ni smad mi bya// sngags dang phyag rgya nam yang min// rdo rje slob dpon brnyas mi bya// bla ma
84a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// bzhon pa mtshon cha phyag mtsha na dang // dman ma lus kyi grib ma rnams// gya nom du ni rdzi mi/ bya// nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o// bdag gi sngon ni ji ltar mthong
84a6(rgyud): sems can gzhan la brjod mi bya// sngags dang phyag rgya srab pa na// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sems can bsad par mi bya zhing // theg pa gzhan la dga' mi bya// sems can don dang 'khor ba las// 
84a7(rgyud): nam yang skyo bar mi bya'o// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// bya ba ma yin rtag tu spang // khyod kyi dam tshig sdom pa yin// gal te snod ldan mchog yin na// 'di 'dra'i dam tshig
84a8(rgyud): brjod par bya// ci ste min na btang snyoms gzhug/ ci ste 'dod pa bde bar bya/ sbyor ba 'di dag thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad sdus pa ru// rgyud rnams kun gyi dam tshig mchog thams cad du ni/ 
84b1(rgyud): sbyar bar bya// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// rdo rje chos ni sgrub pa yis// dngos grub mchog kyang sbyin pa bya// gal te rdo rje can rang grub// mkhas pas gzhan la'ang sgrub par/ 
84b2(rgyud): bya// rang nyid ye shes yang dag skyes// de bzhin gzhan la skyed par bya// dkyil 'khor mthong zhing cho ga shes// dam tshig dngos grub dang ldan pa'i// dad dang ldan pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// 'dir ni slob
84b3(rgyud): dpon 'gyur ba yin// de yis mchod pa byas nas ni// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // lan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje slob ma la brjod bya// 'di
84b4(rgyud): las 'jig rten gzhan du min// sdug bsngal kun lasarnam par grol// khyod 'drir rdo rje can du 'gyur// sangs rgya das rnams kyi spyod sprul zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ 
84b5(rgyud): skye// 'khor ba'i gnas kyi brtson ra ru// slar yang sdug bsnga la 'gyur ba med// deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas// sangs rgya/ sa kun dang mtshungs pa ru// de ring khyod ni gyur pa yin// nga la
84b6(rgyud): spyi bos gus pas gtugs// lus ni theg gsum pha rol phyin// mi khoms par ni skye mi 'gyur// byang chub spyod pas nyes pa med// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob 'gyur// rdo rje can khyod brtson par gyis// 
84b7(rgyud): gzhan tshe bcu drug gi thob pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sras kyis sa thob kyang // dkyil 'khor gsang ba mthong ma gyur// ji ltar khyod ni deng byung ba// de bzhin theg pa yid ches min// 
84b8(rgyud): skye dang skye ba thams cad du// rdo rje can ni mngon brtson 'gyur// skye ba bcu drug mthar thug pas// zhi bar sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gnas kyi sa thob cing // bskal grangs med gnyis
85a1(rgyud): dka' ba spyod// gsang ba'i theg par ma zhugs par// bcu drug gis ni 'gyur ba yin// 'byung po kun gyis mthong mi 'gyur// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// lha tshogs gdug pa thams
85a2(rgyud): cad kyis// rdo rje can ni zil mi non// rims gdon dug dang phyag rgya dang // mkha' 'gro la sogs 'jigs pa'i gdong// nga rgyal dang bcas gzhan dag gis// slar yang khyod ni zil non min// de ni bskal
85a3(rgyud): pa brgya ru yang // rdo rje'i yon tan nyid brjod 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong 'gyur// nam yang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// sems dpa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya bcing // brtson 'grus chen pos
85a4(rgyud): brtan par bya// ji skad du ni brjod par bya// dbab pa bla na med pa ste// 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad// rdo rje ye shes bla med pa// de nyid kyis ni dbab par bya// 
85a5(rgyud): badz+ra A be sha a/ de nas dbab par gyur pa nyid// mngon par/ shes pa drug thob cing // ye shes dam pa thang cig/ gis// sngon byung min pa'i dga' bde dang // dga' ba mgu ba
85a6(rgyud): mchog dag dang // rig pa thams cad mngon du 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul dag ni rdzogs par 'gyur// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// rdo rjes phyag rgya snying kar dkrol// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rtag tu
85a7(rgyud): snying khar zhugs par 'gyur// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra dr-i D+ho me b+ha sha shwa ta me b+ha ba/ hr-i da ya me a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM ha ha ha ha hoH// de nas snying po 'di yis ni// phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya// pra tits+tsha
85a8(rgyud): ho// gnas gang du ni phreng ba babs// de yi lha ni rigs de yin// go rims bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi// gsang ba chen po bstan par bya// dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas sa ni the tshom
85b1(rgyud): med// dri dang ldan zhing yid 'ong ba// bum pa'i chu ni blangs nas ni// snying po 'di yis dbang skur bya// sdug bsngal rab tu 'khrud pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ de nas phyag rgya gang rung bas// phreng ba byin nas
85b2(rgyud): dbang bskur bya// rdo rje'i ming ni dbang bskur la// ming gi sgra ni rab sbyar bya// oM badz+ra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badz+ra nA ma// slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// 
85b3(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes bla na med// de la ye shes bslab par bya// bzhi las gang yang rung ba ni// skal ba ji bzhin dri bar bya// gal te nor gyi dngos grub smra// de ni rnam bzhir bshad par bya// nor gyi ye shes
85b4(rgyud): chen po bzhi// dngos grub rnams ni bslab par bya// gang na ga dater ni yod re pa// dar ni skyil mo krung bcas te// snying ka/ dar rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// gter gyi gnas ni rab mthong 'gyur/ 
85b5(rgyud): badz+ra ni d+hi/ nam mkha' rdo rje bsgom bya zhing // me long la ni yang da ga blta// gang du lhag par mthong 'gyur ba// de na gter ni yod par bstan// rat+na ni d+hi/ rang gi lce la rdo rje sgom// 'di na yod
85b6(rgyud): ces rang nyid smra// d+harma ne d+hiH/ rdo rje las ni yang dag babs// gang du babs pa der bstan te/ karma ni d+hi/ gal te rdo rje'i dngos grub smra// rnam pa bzhi ni bslab par bya// chu ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin mthong // 
85b7(rgyud): shin tu mnyam gzhag dga' bar 'gyur// chu ni stug po'i rang bzhin mthong // chu yi steng du bcag par 'gyur// badz+ra dza la/ bdag nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan pas// yang dang yang du dga' bar bya/ 
85b8(rgyud): bdag nyid dga' ba'i gzugasu ni// bsgoms na de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// badz+ra rU pa/ bdag nyid na mkha'i rang bzhin mtshungs// rang bzhin med pa nyid bsgoms shing // rdo rje dbab pa skyed byas nas// myur
86a1(rgyud): / du mi snang banyid 'gyur// badz+ra A kA sha/ rdo rje'i sgras ni rnamakhar la// bsgom zhing steng du 'dzeg byas na// ji srid du ni 'dzeg pa'i gnas// de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// badz+ra ma
86a2(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa 'dod smra ba// ye shes rnam bzhi sbyin par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing // na mkha' la ni bdag nyid gnas// lag na rdo rje dang ldan par// bdag nyid yongasu bsgom par
86a3(rgyud): byad/ rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// gal te chos kyi phyag rgya 'dod// gnas sam yang na gzhan yang rung // bdag nyid gnas par bsgoms na ni// de ltar gnas shing lag pa ru// rdo rje pad+ma rab sgom
86a4(rgyud): zhing // bdag nyid rdo rje chos te// pad+ma rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// badz+ra d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+hAr/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste// bdag nyid las dang yang dag ldan// na mkha' la gnas pa/ 
86a5(rgyud): nyid ni nalas kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// bdag nyid kyi/ rin chen dang // de bzhin du ni bdag nyid gnas// litu rin chen rnams bsgoms na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par
86a6(rgyud): 'gyur// kaR+sha d+ha ra/ rat+na d+hA ra/ gal te sangs rgyas dngos grub smra// ye shes rnam bzhi brjod par bya// rtag tu namakhar bsgoms nas ni// lus ni yang ba nyid 'gyur zhing // rdzu 'phrul gyi ni
86a7(rgyud): gnas thob 'gyur// rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du 'phar// badz+ra r-id+d+he/ stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin bstan// rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod// de srid skad cig gis
86a8(rgyud): 'phar 'gyur// badz+ra badz+ra/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dag/ yan lag pad+ma dang ldan zhing // bdag nyid dag par rab bsgoms nas// mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur// shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ nyin
86b1(rgyud): mtshan brtson 'grus dang bcas pa// rdo rje sems dpa' na mkha' yi// dbyings su bzhugs par bsams na ni// rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni/ 
86b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugasu mos byas nas// brtan par rje su dran grub na// sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba yin// satwa satwa/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ gang tshe gsang ba'i lha mor 'gyur// de yi rigs kyi lha ru
86b3(rgyud): 'gyur// ye shes dag pa brjod bya zhing // de la mna' yang bsgrag par bya// ji skad gsang mdo dbang gsungs pa// de bzhin b+ha gar gzhug par bya// yid kyis thams cad bcug nas ni// de
86b4(rgyud): lus ni mnyam du spro// mi bskyod thugs ka nas byung ste// rnamo par snang mdzad thugs ka nas// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// sangs rgyas kun ni mnyam du spro// ting 'dzin
86b5(rgyud): sbyor ba la gnas te/ mnyam par gzhag pas pheg rdob bya// rdo rje thal mo'i theg brdabs pas// dngos grub thams/ cad dbang du 'gyur/ badz+ra pA sha/ rin dbang thugs kha nas byung
86b6(rgyud): te// rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas// sangs rgyas kun ni bcug nas kyang // bdag nyid rdo rje'i lha mo ru// rdo rje thal mo byis nas ni// rdo rje bsdams pa'i 'thil brdab bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor
86b7(rgyud): bsgrub bya zhing // rdo rje ye shes yang dag brdab// rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni// de bzhin du ni b+ha gar zhugs// rdo rje thal mo byas nas ni/ sor mo'i rtse mos mnyam du brdab// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti
86b8(rgyud): mu ga dang // rtag tu nyon mongs dang 'brel pa// nyon mongs zhes bya'i sgrib pa dag/ skad cig gis ni rigs brgya 'joms// badz+ra ha na/ de bzhin b+ha gar gnas nas ni// sangs rgyas sku ni mnyam du/ 
87a1(rgyud): spro/ rdo rje lha mor rang bdag nyid// rnam par snang mdzad thugs kar gnas// rdo rje lha mo bcings nas ni// badz+rA badz+wA lan gnyis brjod// rdo rje bsdams pa nges bkrol na// sdug
87a2(rgyud): bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog/ badz+ra ha ra/ de nas rnam par snang mdzad sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni// sngar gyi ting 'dzin ji bzhin du// rdo rje dbyings ni rab tu bya// rnal 'byor lnga la'ang
87a3(rgyud): rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+hi ka ra mi/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA ma~M/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko haM/ oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta ta thA a haM/ rnal 'byor lnga po 'di/ 
87a4(rgyud): yis ni// phyag rgya lnga ni yang dag sgrub// rnam par snang mdzad rang bdag nyid// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de/ bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyag
87a5(rgyud): / rgyurgya rnam so// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug ste// rdo rje gsor la bzung bar bya// sku dang gsung thug phyag rgya dag/ rdo rje se mas dpa'i rang nyid 'gyur// badz+ra satwa haM/ sgrub pa dag gi mchog
87a6(rgyud): chen po// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rang nyid rdo rje gsung gi bshad// rdo rje rnal 'byor sgrub par bya// snyem bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni// rdo rje snyem tshul yang dag gzung // rdo rje dbab par rang gyur
87a7(rgyud): nas// bdag nyid rdo rje zhe byar sgom// badz+ra satwa haM/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan zhing // dkyil 'khor ma lus ston mdzad pa// phreng ba'i rnam pa 'od dang ldan// rgyan dang gos dang kha dog ldan// 
87a8(rgyud): Da ba ta ni brjod bya zhing // sems dpa' chen po rjes dran bya// ye shes sems dpa' gos pa med// dga' dag ji srid mthong bar du// badz+ra satwa dr-i sh+ye/ sems dpa' mdun du ltas nas ni// bdag nyid la
87b1(rgyud): ni yang dag dbab/ oM badz+ra satwa a/ sdug cing che ba'i sku de ni// rdo rje lcags kyus yang dag dgug/ dzaHhUM baM ho// rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yi// bdag nyid chen pos lta bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs
87b2(rgyud): ka ru// slar yang de yi snying kar gzhug/ sa ma ya a/ zhes brjod nas ni rnal 'byor pa// zla ba dang ldan steng du gnas// ci 'dod pa yi bya ba byed// sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems
87b3(rgyud): dpa' 'di ji bzhin// de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rang gi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i// rdo rje can kun sgom par bya// gang dag gang la mos gyur pa// de bzhin snying po bzla bar bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis
87b4(rgyud): ni// rdo rje can dang mtshungs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rjes dran rab grub nas// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bya// rang nga gi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa'i thug grub pas// 
87b5(rgyud): 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid thob 'gyur// rgyal po bya ba sngon 'gro bas/ mnyes pa dang ni dbang bskur bya// thun ni yongasu rdzog/ sa pa dang // chos kyi bzhad dang dga' bar gyur// ting 'dzin
87b6(rgyud): gzungs kyi 'khor lo dang // gsang ba'i mdzod ni bla na med// smin pa dang ni grol ba nyid// sangs rgyas byang chub stan pa'i mchog/ rtog pa gsang chen 'di las ni// phyag rgya grangs med yang dag
87b7(rgyud): byung // rig kyi dbye ba yang dag ldan// rgya cher rab tu bsgrags pa yin// go cha ma bgos snod mi 'gyur// le lo khro dang g.yeng bcas pas// nges par 'dzin par mi nus te// de bas nyung bar rab
87b8(rgyud): tu bsgrags// mdo sde'i dbang po gsang rgyal po// de nas phyag rgya rab tu bshad// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs// rin chen snod du lta bar bya// ye shes kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdzog so// 
88a1(rgyud): // rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi snying po// gang las 'khor lo yang dag byung // rnal 'byor thams cad kun 'byung ba// mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya// dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag pa
88a2(rgyud): rnam 'phrul zhes ni rab tu bsgrags// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul te// 'khor lo thabs ni rab ston pa// 'khor lo lnga ru yang dag bshad// thabs ni rnam pa lnga yang yin// gsang ba yi ni
88a3(rgyud): dbye ba gnas// 'khor lo yi ni rnam 'phrul ston// dbus ma gang yin byang chub sems// shar gyi sdu ba rnam pa bzhi// lho yi cho gsu bshad pa ste// bsod nams tshogs dang yang dag ldan// ting // 
88a4(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams dang // chos su 'dzin pa rnam spangs dpa// nub tu yang dag brjod pa yin// byang ni sems/ can smin byas te// phyi rol grwa bzhi gang yin pa// tshad med pa
88a5(rgyud): ni bzhi dang bcas// byams pa snying rje btang snyoms dang // dga' ba zhes ni bya bar bshad// gang zhig thig skud yang / dag bshad// chos kyi rgyun gyi lam las byung // lta ba thams
88a6(rgyud): cad rnam dag 'di// theg pa gzhan ni rnam par spangs// gang zhig kha khyer zhes bya ba// ting 'dzin chos nyid dag pa ste// rdo rje lha mor yang dag bshad// gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya bar bshad// sgo
88a7(rgyud): ru yang dag bshad pa gang // thar pa'i sgo ni bzhi po yin// rta babs dang ni dra ba nyid// chos mdzod rang bzhin grong khyer yin// dra ba dra phyed bla re ni// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rnam 'phrul pa// tshon rtsi yang dag
88a8(rgyud): bshad pa dang // de 'dra ba yi byang chub tshogs// gang zhig mar me yang dag bshad// de ni chos kyi snang ba mchog/ dri ru yang dag bshad pa gang // grags pa'i dri ni bla na med// rdzu 'phrul byug pa gang
88b1(rgyud): yin pa// tshul khrims dri yis byugs pa yin// bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa// chos kyi zas ni bla na med// rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bar bshad// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// grong khyer du
88b2(rgyud): ni bshad pa gang // de ni thar pa'i grong khyer mchog/ gang zhig dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad// chos kyi snying po rang bzhin grong // nad med ces ni bya bar brjod// de ni dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// dbusu
88b3(rgyud): rnam snang mdzad ces pa// chos kun gcig tu bsdus pa yin// sangs rgyas rgyal po gtso bo che// phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gsal// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bshad// byang chub sems kyi
88b4(rgyud): rang bzhin mchog/ de bas rgyal po byang chub sems// byang chub ra sems las yang dag byung // rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung // / sems ni rnam pa bzhi zhes bya// sgrol dang grol dang dbugs
88b5(rgyud): dbyung dang / mya ngan 'da' bar lcags kyu'o// rdo rje chags par/ yang dag bshad// byang chub spyod pa la sbyor ba/ rdo rje/ legs par yang dag bshad// rab tu sbyor ba ston pa nyid// rdo rje
88b6(rgyud): rin chen yang dag bshad// sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs shong // rdo rje gzi brjid yang dag bshad// chos kyi sbyor ba 'od byed pa// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag bshad// sems can 'khor
88b7(rgyud): ba las grol byed// rdo rje bzhad par yang dag bshad// sems can the tshom gcod par byed// rdo rje cho su yang dag bshad// chos kyi ye shes bla na med// rdo rje rnon por yang dag bshad// nyon mongs
88b8(rgyud): gcod cing 'joms byed pa// rdo rje rgyu ru yang dag bshad// 'khor lo rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// rdo rje smra bar yang dag bshad// rdo rje chos ni ston byed pa'i// rdo rje la su yang dag bshad// sems can 'dra/ 
89a1(rgyud): bar byed pa'i mchog/ rdo rje srung bar yang dag bshad// sems can grol bar byed pa'i mchog/ rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag bshad// 'khor ba'i nags pa za byed pa// rdo rje khu tshur yang
89a2(rgyud): dag bshad// byang chub mchog ni brtan par byed// rdo rje sems ma rdo rje chos// rin chen las kyi rdo rje ma// rdo rje rin chen chos chen po// las kyi gsang ba las byung ba// rdo rje lha mo lhag par brgyad// pha rol
89a3(rgyud): phyin mchog lhag ma brgyad// chos ma shes rab pha rol phyin// las ma thabs kyi mchog yin no// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ni// sa bcu dag tu yang dag bshad// dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer srung // byang
89a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' zhes byar bshad// e ma'o ye shes i ma'o tsha/ sa// e ma'o thar pa'i grong khyer mchog/ e ma'on dam 'phrul 'khor lo ni// thub pa'i dbang phyug dag gis
89a5(rgyud): bstan// chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mgon pos thar par dgod pa ra mdzad// gang du sangs rgyas rgal gyur nas// sems ca na rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzad/ 'di ni chos kyi rang bzhin
89a6(rgyud): grub na 'di chos rang bzhin shing rta ste// chos kyi rang bzhin snying po ste// 'di chos rang bzhin grong khyer yin// de kho na nyid mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po
89a7(rgyud): rdo rje rtse mo las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa dang po rdzog so// dngos grub thams cad bla na med// de nas gsang ba bshad
89a8(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje'i rigs pa 'dzin pa ni// bdag nyid kyis ni sbyar bar bya// cho ga ji lta bu bzhin du// phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya// ci rigs par na bcing bya yi// gzhan du myur du 'grub mi 'gyur
89b1(rgyud): bal mo mnyam pa bcing bya ste/ sngon la thal mo mnyam par bya// de nas rdo rje thal mo bcings// rdo rje bsdams pa bcing bar bya// sor mo rdo rje bsdams bcing nas// snying po brjod cing dral bar bya// de nas
89b2(rgyud): phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// badz+ra ban+d+ha tra tha/ 'di ni sngon du brjod bya zhing // de nas phyag rgya yang dag bcing // gang gi drung du bcings pa ni// bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis
89b3(rgyud): brlabs// sa ma ya sa twa haM/ shes rab can gyi dbab pa bsam// bdag la sems dpa' dbab par bya// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni// snying po yang ni brjod par bya// a phyag rgya bcings pa tsam
89b4(rgyud): gyi ni// yan lag kun la yongasu gnas// snying po brjod par bya ba ste/ 8 / snying po 'di dag nyid yin no// sa ma ya haM/ de nas bdag nyid byin rlabs nas// rang lho yang dgo rje su dran// snying po 'di/ 
89b5(rgyud): dag nyid kyis ni// snying po brjod par bya ba yin/ sa ma ya satwa aHd+hi tiSh+Tha sa maM/ phyag rgya sgrub pa lhur len pa// de nas she sa rab can gyis sgrug/ dam tshig sems dpa' chen po dag
89b6(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi ni bsgrub par bya// de la 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po no// aR+tha sid+d+hi/ badz+ra sid+d+hi/ badz+ra par+ye/ bud+d+ha sid+d+hi/ de nas phyag rgya brtan par byed pa ni// oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa/ 
89b7(rgyud): twe no pa tiSh+Tha / dr-i D+heM me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+haM ba/ sarba sid+d+him+me pa yats+tsha/ sarbi karma su tsi me/ tsit+ta shri yaH/ ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho// b+ha ga wA/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mA
89b8(rgyud): me muny+dzu badz+rI b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya satwa aH/ mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // rdo rje sems dpa'i dang 'drar 'gyur// phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing // thams cad 'grub par the tshom med// de nas
90a1(rgyud): / thams cad dgrol ba ni thun mong yin no// phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// tha mar bdag nyid dbang bskur bya// sor mo'i rtse mos phreng ba che// rnam bzhi yang na rnam pa gsum// oM baH
90a2(rgyud): rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ shes rab can gyis go cha bcing // ci nus par ni dbang bskur bya// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// phyag rgya thams cad brtan par bya// badz+ra ka ba tse na gaM/ gang nas byung ba der grol te// snying
90a3(rgyud): po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// gnas de ru ni dgrol bar bya// gzhan du bya ba mi byed do// oM badz+ra muHmgon po thal mo mnyes bya zhing // rdo rje thal mo bcing bar bya// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// rdo rje can
90a4(rgyud): kun mnyes par bya// badz+ra tuSh+ya ho// cho ga 'di yis dgrol bya ste// phyag rgya dgrol ba mchog yin no// phyag rgya thams tso dang brtan gyur nas// rdo rje can ni mnyes par 'gyur// snga dro'i dusu nyin
90a5(rgyud): re zhing // shin tu bsdams shing gsang bar 'gyur// rdo rje som so dpa' ci 'dod bzlas// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// badz+ra satwa/ gsang ba'i yi ge hUM bzlas pas// rnam pa lnga
90a6(rgyud): ni mthong bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// zla ba gnyis pa yongasu sgom// bdag nyid sangs rgyas dang ldan pa// rdo rje'i dbus
90a7(rgyud): su sgom par bya// mdor na rdo rje'i dbus ni/ yi ge hUM ni sbyar bar bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ yi ge hA ni bsgrub par bya/ hUM de ltar rnam pa bcu drug ni// phyag mtshan thams cad rab tu sgrom// zla ba'i dbus
90a8(rgyud): su rab sbyor bas// bdag nyid thams cad skad cig 'grub/ yang na yi ge sbyor bas ni// dbus sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ zla ba yi ni sbyor ba yis/ yi ga dza sogs 'grub ma 'gyur/ yi ge ho dang sa dang mi/ 
90b1(rgyud): mi ge oM sogs rab stor bas/ zla ba la ni oM a d+ha/ yi ge ha ni rab tu smug/ hrI dang d+hi dang ma par// kaN hUMb bsgrub par bya/ hU~M tshig ni 'di dag gis/ rdo rje bzlas pas 'grub par bya/ bdag nyid
90b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ bcu drug bdag nyid rab sbyor bas// rnal 'byor rgyud du bsgrub bya zhing // zla ba'i dbus bsgom par bya/ de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi chog ni// nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te/ 
90b3(rgyud): bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa// sangs rgyas kun la mchod par bya/ rdo rje can rnams bzod par gsol/ phyag rgya thams cad bcing bya zhing // rdo rje thal mos mnyes par bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
90b4(rgyud): dam pa ni// thams cad byas nas gdon par bya// lan gsum de dang ni lan bdun du// bskor ba dag kyang rab tu bya/ rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// mkhas po yis ni dral bar bya/ 
90b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// 'khor lo'i dbus snying du bcing / gang gis sems ni dag gyur pa// phyag rgya thams cad yid dag bcing / oM badz+ra muHsnying po 'di ni brjod nas// phyag rgya
90b6(rgyud): thams cad stong du bcing // sgo dang phyi rol mchod pa la// rdo rje'i mu ni brjod par bya// gsang ba 'di ni gsang ba che// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ shes rab can gyis kun mi bstan// sdom dang ldan pa mtsha
90b7(rgyud): la sbyin/ shin tu snod ldan pha rol la// de ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs te/ lag pa g.yasu rdo rje ste/ g.yon du dril bu sbyin par bya/ rdo rje'i brtul zhugs gsang chen po/ snying po 'di ni sbyin par bya/ 
90b8(rgyud): de byin snying kar 'dzin du gzhug thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog yin no// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / phyag na rdo rje'i brtul
91a1(rgyud): / zhugs brtan/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+waM d+hA ra yA mi badz+ra satwa/ hi hi hi ho hUM/ de nas thams cad mtshungs pa ru// phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor dgrol bar bya/ 
91a2(rgyud): badz+ra satwa mu/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba rdzogs so// / ji ltar cho gar rab ldan nyid// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// de bzhin kun tu bsgrub par bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa
91a3(rgyud): rgyal po che// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis// rnal 'byor gyi ni rgyud bsdus pa// mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur// e ma'o sangs rgyas mgon po che// spyod pa spyad phyir byung ba ste// chos kyi mgon po rnal
91a4(rgyud): 'byor che// rgyud rnams thams cad yang dag byung // sangs rgya des med cing sems dpa' med// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor sgrub pa med// sa dang gsang ba mchog med de// de bzhin gdul ba'i
91a5(rgyud): don du byung // sangs rgyas mchog dang dam tshig mchog sem sa dpa' mchog gi sgrub pa dang // gsang mchog sems pa'i spyod pa mchog rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag byung // yon tan mcho
91a6(rgyud): dran dam tshig rnams kyi mchog/ yon tan dran dbu rgyan dam pa ste// grag chen dang ldan spyod pa mchog 'dzin pa// yon tan mchog ldan rnams kyi spyod pa mchog/ rdo rje chen po rab bsdams can// rnal
91a7(rgyud): 'byor chen po spyod pa chen po spyod// gsang ba chen po'i yon tan 'dzin mdzad pa// bde ba chen po yang dag 'byung ba gsol// yon tan mchog dran ldan bcod pan mchog dam tshig tshogs mchog 'bru
91a8(rgyud): bas brgyan gyur pa// mi g.yo rab mchog mchog ster dri ma med/ spyod mchog spyod pa'i mchog ste dri ma med// tshogs kyi bskor ba shin tu gzhad mdzad pa// gnod byed 'joms pa tra Ta tra Ta sgrogs
91b1(rgyud): g.yo byed skyed pa'i bzhad cing bzhad par mdzad// yon tan mchog drag tsa la tsa la pa/ ha da ha da pa ya gnod mdzes 'joms// ha ra ha ra ha re ha re las mchog 'joms// gnas chen po ni stobs kyi grub
91b2(rgyud): mdzad pa// rig mchog stobs kyi grol zhing sgrol mdzad pa/ ha ha hA ha ha hA ha ha hA/ hi hi hi hi ho hI hi hi hi hi hi hI/ hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu/ rab mchog bdag nyid mkhas pas 'dren gyur pa/ Ta Ta Ti Ta Ta TaM Ta
91b3(rgyud): Ta Ti Ta Ta Ti Ta Ta Ti Ta Ta Ti Ta Ta Ti/ Tu Tu Tu n+ya/ n+yan+ya D+ha Tu D+ha Tu D+ha Tu Tu n+ya/ rgyan gyi spyod pa 'ang zhing 'dir bar mdzad// spyod pa spyod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur// spyod pa spyod byed rab mchog bdag nyid can// 
91b4(rgyud): dam tshig rkyen te reg drug mchod gyur pa// bdag po chen po/ 'phrog byed 'jom par mdzad// phrog byed sgrub pa rnams da ni grub mdzad pa// mchog gsol mchog gi bdag nyid yang dag
91b5(rgyud): byung // ta to ta te bstan pa'i spyan mnga' ba// yi ge dza las ra ba byung mchog ni ster ba hUM ni dang po las sbyor ba// ho ho 2/ dod chags mchog ldan bud med bstan byed sa ni len pa rab ste/ 
91b6(rgyud): ba/ oM ni dang po bla med Ta Ta Ta Tis a nI gzi brjid rab 'bar ba/ twA tra rjesu chags pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs byed ha ni bzhad pa yang dag sbyor/ hri ni chos can byed cing rab rno dri med hi ni rgyu'i 'khor
91b7(rgyud): lo che// ha dang ra na mkha' dgyes smra ba'i sbyor ba 'ching byed a ni sna tshogs byed// ha ni srung ba tra ta 'gis byed ta T+Ta ta Ti sa ni hUM ni za zhing 'cha'// baM ni dga' bed dga' ste tsha ta tsha ti Ta ni rab dag
91b8(rgyud): byed// ho na rdo rje bstan pa dang bcas bde bstan 'dod chags bcas pa dga' byed// ha ni mgon po skye ba mchog gi rgyur gyur hr-in dga' ba bdag nyid can/ ha ni spyod pa 'god byed dul spong mchog
92a1(rgyud): stengs gsum mgon pos bskor gyur ga/ gas ning gsang pa'i yon tan kun mchog meng cen byang du baspyod pa mchog mchog gi chog ste mchog gsol go 'dang mtshag/ 
92a2(rgyud): thob yi ge hUM ni gsol ba mchog nyon mongs dri ma thams cad 'joms shing rang 'phro hUM gi mche ba'i mtshon chad ldan// sna tshogs dga' ba mchog gis rnam par rgyan mdzes yi ge oM dang yang
92a3(rgyud): dag spel// he ho ha ni yid 'ong hUM gis sna tshogs 'joms// gnod mdzes nges 'joms bdag nyid can// bde mchog glu dang rol mo dang bcas pa// gzugs bzang dang ldan lha mo rnams kyis mchod// 
92a4(rgyud): zla ba ltar dkar 'phro ba'i zhal mang rag/ rdo rje gsang ba'i ye dan tan brtsegs pas mtshan/ rin chen kun gyis rnam smras yid 'ong ba/ rin chen dra ba'i blo res rnam par mdzes/ 
92a5(rgyud): lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod cing mdzes// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ni 'jigs med pa/ sa rnams kun gyis rnam sbyang dri med pa// byang chub spyod pa yongs rtogs bdag nyid
92a6(rgyud): chos mdzad yongasu rtogs pa'i zas dang ldan// bsod nams de yis bskyed pa'i dga' ba che// tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor gru bzhir yang dag gnas// chos mchog go rims bzhin du thig btab pas// / 
92a7(rgyud): 'khor lo mu khyud rab tu mdzes bris pa// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni gtso bo bzhugs// ting 'dzin mchog rnams kha khyer gyis mdzes pa// gzungs kyi lha yi tshogs kyis mchod pa'i tshogs// bar
92a8(rgyud): pa'i theg pas byams pa'i sgo yis brgyan// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs// pha rol phyin sa btsun mo gar byed pa/ sems can smin byed rnam par 'phrul la dga'// bsam gtan
92b1(rgyud): zas ldan mngon shes mchog gis brgyan/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs/ dkyil 'khor de ni gtso ba'i chos nyid can// chos nyid bstan pa'i snying po kun zhugs pa// sangs rgyas su/ 
92b2(rgyud): gyi tsho gas 'dus mdzes pa yis// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang ba zhes byar bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa che// gsang ba kun 'byung ting 'dzin yang dag gnas// de ni rnam snang
92b3(rgyud): thub pa'i chos nyid gzigs/ gzungs dang dam tshig yang dag 'byung ba mchog/ dga' ba'i chos bzhin rdo rje yang dag gnas// de ni rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug gtso// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
92b4(rgyud): chen po nges par phyung // hUM shin tu dag pa'i chos nyid lta// bur byung // sangs rgyas dbang phyug dam pa'i kun gyi mchog/ rtse gcig dang bcas e ma'o dga' ba che// sangs rgyas
92b5(rgyud): sku yang bud med gzugs can te// sems can khams ni gdul phyir yang dag gnas// bud med gzugs kyang chos nyid dag pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi gdung rgyur gnas gyur
92b6(rgyud): pa// rang gi rigs chen byung ba des byung mdzod/ oM badz+ra d+hA tri hUM/ oM badz+ra badz+ra Ni hUM/ oM rat+na badz+ri Ni hUM/ oM d+harma badz+ri NI hUM/ oM karma badz+ri NI hUM/ mchog gi dang po rmad byung gsang ba lnga// sangs
92b7(rgyud): rgyas lngas byas bud med gzugs can te// rmad byung dang bcas dbang phyug dam par gnas// rdo rje gsang chos nyid kyi gsang ba mchog/ 'khor lo'i sbyor bas kyang ni bzhugs gyur pas// 
92b8(rgyud): rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis ni shar du bzhugs// de ni rigs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor brjod/ re re zhing yang rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan// rnal 'byor 'khor lor yongasu bshad pa mchog/ 
93a1(rgyud): yi mi skyod mchog tu byung ba yi/ mchog tu gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor gsung // oM badz+ra satwa gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM gu h+ya badz+ra sa aM ku sha hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya rA ge rA ga ya
93a2(rgyud): hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya sa d+hi shwa ri hUM/ rdo rje rin chen dkyil 'khor bstan gyur pa// de yi slar yang snying po bzhi gsung ba// oM badz+ra guh+Na rat+ne sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya bri bi hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hA dza gra gu h+ya hUM/ 
93a3(rgyud): oM badz+ra gu h+ya hA sa hUM// rdo rje chos ni dbang phyug dam pa che// de yi slar yang snying po bzhi gsung so// oM badz+ra d+harma gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra g+ho Sha gu h+ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ye maN+Da le hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya dza ba sa
93a4(rgyud): ma ya hUM/ oM rdo rje las ni yongasu dag pas mchod// 'khor lo thams cad la ni yongs gnas mdzes// chos mtshodag dbang phyug dam pa mchog gyur pa// de yis snying po bzhi ni
93a5(rgyud): gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra gu h+ya karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM baR+Sha gu h+ya ka ba ru hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya daSh+Ta d+hA ra Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gu/ h+ya muSh+Ti hUM/ sngar bzhin 'khor lo'i grong khyer yongs gnas
93a6(rgyud): pa// rdo rje'i gzugasu yongs gnas mdzes gyur pa// de nyid sangs rgyas sras te rdo rjer bcas// 'on kyang de ltar bud med gzugasu sprul// de dag srid pa dag byed rab tu 'bar// thar pa'i grong du 'dod
93a7(rgyud): chags dag byed pa/ rtog dang rnam par rtog pa zlog pas dag/ chos la dga' zhing sku mchog 'byung 'gyur ba// bden dang mi bden rnam dag nyi shu dang // chos dang chos min dga' zhing dga' ba'i
93a8(rgyud): snod/ byed dang byed min rdo rje tha dad gcig/ rdo rje tha dad bstan pa ho yis rab sbyangs yod// gsang 'byor rin chen las byas chos grong ste// rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'di ni ma pa ma don// rdo rje bla
93b1(rgyud): ri'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// gsang dbang rdo rje chen po yis// bar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer mdzad// sems can kun la phan don du// 'khor lo lnga ni yang dag byung // de bzhin gshegs rigs
93b2(rgyud): zhes bya dang / mi phyed brtan par byed pa dang // byang chub spyod pa rab spyod mchog theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ gdul bya ji bzhin 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// gtso bo'i spyod pa ji bzhin lhan cig/ 
93b3(rgyud): spyod/ sems can gdul bya ma yin snod mchog min// mthu chen rnams ni dngos grub rtsol mi mdzad// der ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin dag / yon tan mang po yang dag byung // sems can rnams ni gdul bya'i
93b4(rgyud): phyir/ rdo rje'i btsun mo dag las byung // de nyid sangs rgyas sra das bcas pa// de nyid 'khor lo'i grong khyer che// mchod pa sgo srung dang bcas pa// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag byung
93b5(rgyud): mgon po rdo rje gsang dbang phyug/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mobashad// rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yi// rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog/ sngon ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis// de bzhin dbusu rab tu
93b6(rgyud): gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs yin te// gsang ba'i sbyor ba yang dag byung // rdo rje dbyings ni ji skad brjod// de nyid gsang ba zhes byar brjod// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/ rgyas par phyag rgya dang
93b7(rgyud): bcas par// 'khor lo lnga yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ rgyas pa ru ni yang dag bshad// mdo sde'i gsang dbang rgyal po ni// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// gsang ba'i rgyud dang phyag rgya dang // dkyil 'khor
93b8(rgyud): 'khor lo zla ba dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni// de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad// rdo rje dbyings kyi snying rab mchog mdor na drug tu bshad pa yin// dam chos spyod pa dang ldan pa// de nas de bzhin
94a1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs// nus pa ji bzhin rigs pa bzhin// ji ltar spyod pa dkyil 'khor mchog/ ci rigs par ni cho ga bzhin// mchog tu rmad byung bshad par bya// sngon la de bzhin
94a2(rgyud): gshegs rigs kyi// sems dpa' nga yis dbye bar bya// nga yis mdo sde gsang dbang bshad// gang du byis pa dag rmongs pa// rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// gas
94a3(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya bcu drug ni// gsang ba nges par bslab par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// rkang lag thal sbyar rdo rje ni// kha gyes pa ni bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje can yang chags par bya// stong gsum gyi ni
94a4(rgyud): 'jig rten 'di/ zla ba gcig tu yongasu bsdu// rdo rje'i dbang phyu dag lha mong // dbus ma la ni yongasu bzung // sgeg pa dang ba ces 'gro bya zhing // rnam par 'phrul pas bzhin rmongs bya// 
94a5(rgyud): sgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje can yang mnyes par bya// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni// spyi bor thal mo sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings na su// bdag nyid yang
94a6(rgyud): dag byin gyis brlab/ sgom pa'i phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sku yi phyag rgya rnam par bcing // lag ngar lcags kyur bskum bya zhing // bdag nyid yongasu bsgrub par bya// de bzhin sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// 
94a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i mda' ni kun tu gang / log pas leg so zhes bya zhing // dpung pas bdag nyid go bgo bya// slar yang gsang bar bya ba ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu gnas// gas
94a8(rgyud): balha mo'i dbang phyug mchog/ de bzhin lagangar bkug bya zhing / spyi bor rdo rje bsam par bya// phyogs gcig tu ning 'dug ste/ rdo rje gnyis kyi go cha bya// thams cad rdo rje'i lus yin te// rin chen mi
94b1(rgyud): ni yong su gsalag/ gdong dang tshig ni dad+ma dang / me tog kun 'dar bsgom par bya/ byis pa bzhin du mig bskyod cing // bung med rgyu mtshan yang dag sprug/ smin ma bskyod cing khor gnyer gtsigs// khro ma
94b2(rgyud): lta bas mig gdangs pa// khro bo'i lta ba 'dod chags che// 'dzum bcas mig ni btsum par bya// mig gdangs pa yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i lta bas bgrad par bya// slar yang tshig ni rnam pa bzhi// ho ni
94b3(rgyud): rkan dang lkog ma la// dza ni lce yi dbus dang rtse/ oM ni lkog ma mchu dag la// mchu dang mchu yi rtsol ba// de rnams gsang ba rab rgyas pa// bskrad dang spyos dang bcad pa dang // bcing ba rdo rje tshig gis bya// 
94b4(rgyud): de bzhin kho nar zla dbus na// phyag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid// ri/ na chen chos dang de bzhin las// gsang ba'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya// cho ga thams cad rgyas pa ru// rdo rje gsang
94b5(rgyud): rjesu srung // ji ltar rnal 'byor yang dag gnas// de bzhin gas nga mchog 'dzin pa gnas// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bla na med// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag gnas
94b6(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya// dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' ni// phyi rol las grol yang dag gnas// langs sam yang na 'dug kyang rung // rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// theg pa chen po'i tshul dag pa/ 
94b7(rgyud): spyod pa chen po tshul chen po// bdag nyid chos chen rab bsgoms na// rdo rje'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'du byed sdug bsngal chen po las// dga' ba'i spyod pas spro bar bya// snying rje chen pos dmig
94b8(rgyud): nas ni// sems can btang snyoms dor mi bya// lce ni dkan la sbyar bya zhing / sna yi rtse mor bsgom par bya// rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ sna yi rtse mor de bzhin gnas/ snying ka'i spyi bo ce nus par
95a1(rgyud): / sku ni thams cad yongasu spro// rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pas/ sems ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur// rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje ste// rdo rje'i dbus bsgom par bya// rdo rje bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ 
95a2(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo yongasu spro// rang gi lus kyi mdun du ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dbusu// rdo rje kun gyi dkyil 'khor ro// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbu su ni// lte bar sangs rgyas/ 
95a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya// rdo rje rnam bsgoms sems gang zhig/ gzugs med bstan du med pa dang / rmongs pa med cing 'jigs pa med// rdo rje phra mor 'dir brjod// dngos po med
95a4(rgyud): cing rdzas med pas// snang ba med par rab tu sgom// bdag med saM mas can med pa ru// rnal 'byor pas ni rnal 'byor sgom// lus ni rdzas lnga'i bdag nyid can// khams bzhi la ni yang
95a5(rgyud): dag brten/ skye mched bcu gnyis nyid dang ni// gzhan yang kham sa ni bco brgyad dag/ sha dang rus pa khrag nyid dang // rka/ nga dang glad pas kun tu khyab/ sna tshogs rdzas kyis kun tu khyab/ 
95a6(rgyud): bad kan mkhris pa la sogs tshogs// sna tshogs srin bu'i rigs kyis khyab// dri ngan mi gtsang 'byung ba ru// rang gi lus la so sor brtag/ sdug bsngal gsum ni kun 'byung bar// nyin dang mtshan mo
95a7(rgyud): rtag tu ni/ lus ni rje su dran pa sgom// rang sems so sor brtag bya ste/ gang zhig de ru yang dag byung / 'gro ba med cing song ba med// de la 'pho ba yod ma yin/ de la 'byung ba yod min pa// gang las sems
95a8(rgyud): ni yang dag byung // yang dag ma yin kun rtog 'di// brdzun bzhin sems ni rmongs par byed// sems med tsam yang yod ma yin// brdzun bzhin 'byung bar snang bar 'gyur// 'di la gnas dang mtshan
95b1(rgyud): nyid dang / rang gnas 'byung ba yod ma yin// gzung bar dga' ba gti mug che// rdo rje phra mor brjod par bya// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis// sems sgom pa yi rnam pa bzhi/ lus dang sems dang tshor ba dag phra
95b2(rgyud): mo'i rnam par bsgom par bya/ suk+Sh+ma badz+ra/ rdo rje reg pa'i mtshan ma yi/ gnas ni yang dag shes por bya// de ni byung na spro bya ste/ stong gsum du ni yongasu sgro// s+pha ra Na badz+ra/ reg pas sbyor ba bsdu bya ste/ 
95b3(rgyud): skrag cing rmongs par mi bya'o// gnas gsum du yang bsdu bya ste// blo yos so sor brtag par bya// saM ha ra Na badz+ra/ chos la dmigs pa'i sems nyid ni// rmongs shing gzhom par mi bya'o// rdo rje de ni brtan
95b4(rgyud): bya zhing // rdo rje phra mo reg par bya/ badz+ra dI D+ha tiSh+Tha/ rdo rje sems dpa'a'ajigs med pa/ rgyal po tshangs pa'i gtsug pud can // spyi bor sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing // sku ni thams cad yongasu
95b5(rgyud): s+pho/ badz+ra At+ma ka/ dpral bar rdo rje rin chen ni// mnyam par ga/ zhag pas bsgom par bya// mtshan ma dag ni spro bya zhing // / sems dpa' kun yang spro bar bya// badz+ra rat+na At+ma ka/ rdo rje chos
95b6(rgyud): ni shin tu dag/ sna yi rtse mor bsgom par bya// de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing // lus rnams kun yang spro bar bya/ badz+ra pad+ma At+ma ka/ lus kun la ni yang dag khyab// chos kyi dbyings ni yongasu sgoms// de yi
95b7(rgyud): mtshan ma spro bya zhing // sems dpa' kun yang spro bar bya// sarba badz+ra At+ma ka/ sems dpa' de bzhin rin chen las// chos ni spyi bor bsgom par bya// de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing // sku ni thams cad yongasu
95b8(rgyud): s+pho/ sarba badz+ra/ sna la lcags kyu yang dag gnas// blo ldan mi yis bsam par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug bya zhing // rang gi lus ni brtan par bya// snying kha 'dod chags gnas ni// 'dod ma/ 
96a1(rgyud): rnam par dag pa bsam// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par 'gyur// leg so zhes pa gzung bya ste// spyi bor yang dag gnas pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas
96a2(rgyud): thams cad mnyes bya zhing // chos kyi dbyings ni yongasu spro// hr-i da badz+ra a ku shau/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra rA gau hr-i da ye/ a di badz+ra duSh+Ti/ snying khar rdo rje nyi ma ni// blo ldan mi yos bsgom par bya// 'od kyi gzi brjid spro bya zhing / 
96a3(rgyud): 'jig rten kun kyang spro bar bya// spyi bor 'a khri shing 'od bcas pa/ rgyal mtshan rtse mor rnam par bsam/ rin chen char dag sngo bya zhing / snod kyi sprin ni yang dag spro// bzhad pas bde ba bsams nas ni// shin
96a4(rgyud): tu sdug bsngal nges par sbyar// chos kyi char yang spro bya zhing // s+yA dang ba'i sprin yang spro bar bya// hr-i da ya badz+ra sUr+ya/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra d+hA da dzA gre/ hr-i da ya badz+ra hA sa/ spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams nas// 
96a5(rgyud): ral gri gtso bo bsam par bya// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bcad/ bya zhing // sems dpa' thams cad spro bar bya// snying khi'i 'khor lo'i gnas ni// chos kyi rgyu mthun sgom par bya/ nam/ 
96a6(rgyud): kun tu spro bya zhing // chos kyi dbyings ni yongasu spro// de yi rigs las byung ba'i sgra/ shes rab can gyis lce rtser bsam// chos kyi tshig ni spro bya zhing // phyogs rnams kun tu yongasu spro// hr-i da badz+ra g+ho Sha/ 
96a7(rgyud): tiSh+Tha badz+ra hr-i da ya/ pra be sha badz+ra wa gra/ spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams te/ mchod pa'i las ni rnam par bsam/ mchod pa'i phyir ni rdo rje sgo/ phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// snying khar rdo rje go cha ni// 
96a8(rgyud): shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsam// sdug bsngal kun las grol byed pa/ go cha'i rnam pa spro bar bya// spyi bo nas btsams rkang 'thal du/ rdo rje bsdams pa bsam par bya// rdo rje'i snying po gzhun
96b1(rgyud): bya zhing // rdo rje'i rang bzhin thams cad sgro/ yak+Sha pU dza hr-i da badz+ra ka ba tsa/ badz+ra muSh+Ti hr-i da ya/ grogs dang grogs min ma lus pa/ 'byung po kun la byams pa ni// ma lus lus pa med pa ru// mnyam du khya
96b2(rgyud): por spro bar bya/ kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal// 'gro ba lnga ru kun tu 'khyam/ nyin dang mtshan du rab sbyor bas/ snying rje nyid ni spro bar bya// nyin mtshan dge dang zhe sdang med// sems can dge ba don
96b3(rgyud): gnyer gang // rje su yi rang bde chen po// sems can kun la yongasu sgo/ rgal bar dka' ba'i lam zhugs shing // sangs rgyas byang chub la gnas pa// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// blo chen ldan pas
96b4(rgyud): btang snyoms gzhag/ ma hA mai tri s+pha ra Na/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya s+phar da Na/ sar+b+ba bud d+ha/ pra mo s+pha ra Na/ ma ho pek+Sha s+pha ra Na/ na mkha/ da'a'am ni phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par bsam
96b5(rgyud): sems can mnyam par dmigs pa yis// na mkha' kun tu yod/ su s+pho// badz+ra muSh+Ti b+ha ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// spyi nga kha rdo rje chos nyid brtan// don rnams thams cad bsgom par
96b6(rgyud): bya// chos kyi dbyings ni yongasu spro// sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams te// rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs nyid// de ni rang gi bdag nyid sgom// chos kyi dbyings ni yongasu spro// rdo rje phra mo gzhan dang ldan// chos rnam
96b7(rgyud): / thams cad rnam sgom pa// myur du phyogs kun yongasu spro// snying khar rdo rje bsgom bya zhing // ma hA bo d+hi satwa bi shwa/ bud+d+ha a nu smr-i te bi shwa/ badz+ra pA Ni dar sha ya sa ru paM// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// byang
96b8(rgyud): chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ sa man+ta b+ha dra bi shwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par bsgoms// badz+ra satwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// rdo rje'i bsnyems
97a1(rgyud): pha rol bcas pa/ badz+ra satwa sa ma ya sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na bi sha/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas gzugasu rang bdag nyid// ta thA ga tA sa mo haM// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms
97a2(rgyud): 'jug pa// rdo rje slob dpon dag gi bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// shes rab can gyis nges par bya// mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyi ni/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa bsam// ji bzhin mtshan gyi
97a3(rgyud): rgyan pa ru/ rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par sgom// ji ltar sangs rgyas de bzhin bdag/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas rtag tu sgom// sangs rgyas gang yin de bdag nyid// sangs rgyas mang por yang dag gnas// bdag ni
97a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs// rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag pa brjod// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa// sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyes par bya/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa mo haM// rdo rje sems
97a5(rgyud): dpa' rgyal po che// ji ltar sku mdog cho ga bzhin// dbang po gnyi sa ni yang dag gnas/ de bzhin bdag ni rtag tu sgom// oM nga?/ dzA sa twa sa mo haM// bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs// rdo rje'i
97a6(rgyud): tshig ni yang dag brjod/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// nges par 'jig rten pham par bya// khams kyi snying po gang yin dag/ de ni rdul bral dri med dag/ bdag ni rdo rje chos nyid du// rtag tu bsgom par bya
97a7(rgyud): ba yin// badz+ra d+harma sa mo haM/ bdag nyid rdo rje chos dang mtshungs// rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje'i chos ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje'i las ni bdag nyid// tha dad med
97a8(rgyud): cing rtags gcig gis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod de// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// oM badz+ra karma sa mo haM/ bdag ni rdo rje las dang mtshungs// rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang brjod/ dbang po gnyis
97b1(rgyud): ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur// nga ni rdo rje rin chen nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang sku dang // rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur// oM badz+ra raH
97b2(rgyud): sa mo he// bdag ni rdo rje rin chen mtshungs// rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang brjod// rdo rje rin chen sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dbang bskur thob par 'gyur// gzugs gnyis 'brel ba ni dbang po gnyis zhes bya'o// 
97b3(rgyud): bdag gis lus gang yin pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi sku gang yin pa gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'o// / stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di
97b4(rgyud): rdo rje gcig tu mos byas shing // sangs rgyas gzugs dang tshungs pa ru// dbusu bdag nyid sgom par bya// nam mkha' la ni/ rdo rje sgom// rdo rje gcig la yongs bsal ba// rdo rje sems
97b5(rgyud): dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi// dbusu bdag nyid sgom par bya// stong gsu ma gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// rdo rje gcig ni yongs bsal bas// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyi// dbusu bdag nyid sgom par bya// 
97b6(rgyud): ci nus par ni byin gyis brlab// rdo rje gcig ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu bdag ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing // rin chen bdag nyid dbus sgom/ 
97b7(rgyud): kun tu rdo rje'i dbus ni// rtag tu bdag nyid lasu sgom// gtso bo gang dang gtso dag gis// sku mchog cha byad ji bzhin du// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// sems can dam pa de nyid thob// bdag gtso/ 
97b8(rgyud): rdo rje'i tshig brjod cing // rdo rje'i thug su bsam par bya// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur// yang na sgom pa'i sbyor ba ni// rang dbang du ni rab bshad bya// ji ltar
98a1(rgyud): / yid las byung ba bzhin// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam par sgom// sna yi rtse mo la brten nas// sems kyi rgyun ni yang dag gnas// brgya las rtsa bdun lhag par ni// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom
98a2(rgyud): par bya// gal te sgom pas dngos grub 'dod// rdo rje sgom pa bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba yis// sgrib pa'i rnal 'byor yang dag gnas// sems dpa' rjes dran sbyor ba yis// gdon
98a3(rgyud): mi za bar nges par bya// gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid// bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom par bya/ sku mdog rnal 'byor ji bzhin du// ci rigs par ni sna tshogs bdag/ yang na rdo rje sgom gtso bo// grub pa yang ni bsgom pa
98a4(rgyud): byad/ e ma'o ngo mtshor rnam 'phrul 'khor lo byung // e ma'o// ngo mtshar spyod mchog dam pa sgrub// kye ma'o ngo mtshar gas/ dang mchog gnas thob pa// bdag ni rdo rje'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i
98a5(rgyud): mchog/ rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i sgrub pa ste// rnal 'byor rig pa sgrub byed pa// mchod pa sgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis// de nas mchod pa rab bshad bya// thun bzhi dang ni kha dog bzhi// dus
98a6(rgyud): bzhi yi ni rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor brjod byed cing // sangs rgyas la ni mchod par bya// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs spros shing // mchod pa rnams ni yongs spro zhing // sangs rgyas byang
98a7(rgyud): chub rab sgrub pas// rtag tu yang dag rnal 'byor sgom// mchod la spro ba yang dag sbyor// zhes bya tshos ni yongasu spro// ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te// chos kyi mchod pa rab tu bya/ oM ta thA ga ta badz+ra
98a8(rgyud): satwa/ a nut+ta ra pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di// yang dang yang du rab tu bzlas// rdo rje dbyings ni sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya lnga ni rab tu bya/ so sor rtogs dang mngon rtogs dang / 
98b1(rgyud): rdo rje de bzhin rdo rje bdag/ rgyas pa ru ni sngar bshad pa// rdo rje dbyings ni rab tu skyed// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ma lus pa// rang gi bdag nyid bsgoms nas// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// thub
98b2(rgyud): pa dbang phyug dag la dbul// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi// thub la mchod pa phul nas ni// bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad// bdag gi khams ni rnam par spros// byang chub sems ni
98b3(rgyud): spros na su// thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul// rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni// mchod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa/ a nut+ta ra pU dza s+pha ra na sa ma ye hUM// sangs
98b4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad dbang bskur ba// rdo rje rin chen spros nas ni// bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad// bdag gi khams ni rnam par spros// rdo rje sngags kyi 'grub par 'gyur/ 
98b5(rgyud): thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul// rin chen mchod pa rab spro/ zhing // bsdams pa'i sbyor ba rab tu sgrub// oM sarba ta thA/ ga ta badz+ra rat+na a nut+ta ra pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// snga ma ji lta
98b6(rgyud): pa bzhin du// rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin gyis// ji ltar sems dpa' phyung ba bzhin// de bzhin bdag ni bsgom par bya// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom na su// rmad 'byung chen po yongs spro zhing // 
98b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// rdo rje'i sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// de lta bu la snyoms zhugs te// rdo rje chos ni rab tu byung // phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing // sangs rgyas rnams la dbul
98b8(rgyud): bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma/ e nut+ta ra pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te// rdo rje las rnams spro bya zhing // sangs rgyas kun la dngul bya zhing / thams cad du ni rmA/ 
99a1(rgyud): / bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma a nut+ta ra pU dza s+phar na sa ma ye hUM// mchod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// thun pani ru ri skom par bya// mchod pa'i tshogs 'grung 'gyur te/ sdig
99a2(rgyud): pa can yang 'grub par 'gyur// mchod pa'i las ni bla na med// ci rigs par ni rab bshad bya// chos kyi phyag rgya'i rgyal por ldan// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// oM sarba ta thA ga
99a3(rgyud): sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma badz+ra a// rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// bdag nyid yang dang yang du ni// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ 
99a4(rgyud): oM sarba te thA ge ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma gri dza// rdo rje lcags kyu rang bdag nyid// phyogs kun du ni spro dbar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug bya zhing // thub pa dag la
99a5(rgyud): dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yata ni a na/ rA ga pU dza s+pha ra Na karma ba ni hUM b+h+yo/ rdo rje rigs ni rjes chags pa// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// chos rnams dag
99a6(rgyud): la mnyes byas shing // 'di brjod nas ni spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza s+pha ra Na karma duSh+Ti mo// rdo rje rin chen rnal 'byor che// bdag nyid yongasu sgom par bya/ 
99a7(rgyud): rin chen mchod pa bla na med// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a bai She ka ra t+ne b+h+yo badz+ra ma ni oM// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal po che// byang chub snying por dbang bskur/ 
99a8(rgyud): ba// sems kyang de ltar bsam nas ni// rdo rje rin chen nyid thob 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rje gzi brjid ni// phyogs rnams kun tu snang byed pa// sangs rgyas thams cad skul bya zhing / mchod pa
99b1(rgyud): gzi brjid yongasu spro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sUre b+h+yo// badz+ra te dze na dz+wa la hrIH// rdo rje rgyal mtshan kun tu mthong // shes rab can gyis rgyal mtshan sbeng // sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing // rdo rje'i
99b2(rgyud): sngags kyis bskul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a shA pa ri su ni cin t+ya mi Na d+ha dza a gre tre// grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyi lta// rtag tu bdag nyid dag
99b3(rgyud): bya zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab bskul bya// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pra ti pra mo dker b+h+yo badz+ra hA si hA sa// sems can thams cad chos chen po// bdag nyid chos chen dag pa ste// sangs rgyas thams
99b4(rgyud): cad rab bskul bya// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kun // dkyil 'khor grong khyer thams cad bdag/ shes rab can gyi bdag nyid bsam// rdo rje'i sngags kyi rab skul bya// oM na
99b5(rgyud): ma/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma tra sa to b+h+yo tu no mi ma hA d+harma a/ gri hrIHbdag ni shes rab ral gri rno// shes rab pa ro// la phyin pa'i tshul// 'khor lo'i yi ge rab tu bskor// mdo sde
99b6(rgyud): thams cad 'dzin pa yin// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tI b+hi ni ra hA re tu mi ma hA gu Sha nu ge d+ha// sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig/ bdag ni sems dpa' smra ba brtan// rdo rje smra ba gsang ba'i
99b7(rgyud): bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta swa b+hA ba shud d+ha se gi ti b+hai rge ya stu na mi badz+ra wa tse rbe// bdag ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin byed
99b8(rgyud): pa// rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongasu bsngo// mchod pa thams cad yongs spro bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsakra pa ri brte d+ha na sarba mu drA ni stu no mi sarba maN+Da le ma// bdag ni rdo rje las rgyal po// phyogs rnams/ 
100a1(rgyud): kun tu rab mchod byed// me tog bdug pa la sogs dri// rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa me g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ka ra// cho ga bgos pa dang ldan pa/ 
100a2(rgyud): me tog mchod pa 'bul byed pa// bdag nyid rang nyid rgyal po ste// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab skul bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sa ra s+pha ra Na pU dza karme ba ro// bdag ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te// nyon mongs za
100a3(rgyud): byed chos sgron 'bar// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing // snang ba 'bar ba yang dag spro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ka dzA la s+pha ra Na pU dza karma b+ha ra b+ha ra// rdo rje khu tshur yang dag nyid// dri yi snod dang yang dag
100a4(rgyud): ldan// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing // char rnams kun gyi rwa rab mchod byed// oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na pU dza/ karma ku ru ku ru// sems can kun don yang dag ldan// byang chub
100a5(rgyud): sems ni bskyed nas kyang // sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar/ bya// mchod pa mchog ni rab sgrub pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ba/ dz+ra a ma nir+yA ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ shes
100a6(rgyud): rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri// yan lag kun gyis rab btud bya// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bye zhing // phyogs rnams kun tu smra bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya nir+ya ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra
