100a7(rgyud): s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa ni// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas// rdo rje las rnams byed par 'gyur// rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis// rang bdag nyid ni dag
100a8(rgyud): bar bya// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing // rdo rje'i sngags kyang rab brjod bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA ga nir+yA ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs rnams kun tu mchod pa kun/ mkhas
100b1(rgyud): pa yis ni bsam par bya// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing // rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta nir+yA ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// phul nas shes rab can gyis ni
100b2(rgyud): rdo rje tsun mo'i ting 'dzin bsam// rdzas mchog ljon pas spro bya zhing // sangs rgyas kun la yongasu dbul// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+tA ra ha ra Shi ra ra ta pra ti su kha a nut+ta ra pra dz+nyA pU dza ma g+ha sa/ 
100b3(rgyud): mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod bya// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches// bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor thams cad kun
100b4(rgyud): bsdus pa/ shes rab can gyi dkyil 'khor bsam// mtsho dad pa'i tshogs ni bla med pas// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// tshe dang mdog dang
100b5(rgyud): nad mod nyid// phun tshogs bde bas thams cad 'thob// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gang zhig gis// nyin re bzhin du mchod byas nas// the tshom med
100b6(rgyud): par dngos grub kun// rdo rje rnal 'byor pas thob 'gyur// rdo rje'i sngags kyis bslab pa dang // phyag rgya thams cad bsam par bya// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// phyag rgya shin tu rgyas par
100b7(rgyud): bshad/ rdo rje'i las kyi go rims bzhin// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab// rdo rje dbyings dang rab mtshungs pa// slar yang rnal 'byor pa la bshad// 'jig rten mgon po rdzu 'phrul che/ 
100b8(rgyud): rtag tu de bzhin mchod bya ba// gsang mchog rnal 'byor pa dag a// de las gzhan yang rab bshad bya// gang tshe sngon du sems bskyed pa// rdo rje sems ni bla na med// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed
101a1(rgyud): nas// mchod pa'i bya ba bslab par bya// rdo rje slob dpon gyis sbyor ba// rdo rje dga' ba bsam par bya// 'dod chags dga' ba bskyed nas ni// dga' ba'i mchod pa rab tu mchod// 
101a2(rgyud): bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgom bya zhing // bsgoms nas mchod pa rab tu bya// dga' ba chen po'i bde don du// rig pa'i lha mo rab 'grol bas// bud d+ha at+ma ko haM/ byang chub sems ni rab bskyed
101a3(rgyud): nas// bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya// stobs dang mi 'jigs sogs rnams kyis// rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya// bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas// bdag
101a4(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya// rdo rje yi ni glu blang zhing // bang dag nyid mngon par mchod par bya/ bud+d+ha sid+d+hi ka ro mi/ ngang chub sems ni brtan bskyed nas// bdag nyid sangs rgyas
101a5(rgyud): zhes bsam bya// rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing // mkhas pas bdag nyid mchod par bya// bud+d+ha pU dza~M/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog/ sbyor bas de bzhin phyag byas shing / 
101a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byas nas// nges par phyag ni byas par 'gyur// pra Na mA mi/ rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung // sangs rgyas bsod nams chen po kun// rje suM yi rang mchog
101a7(rgyud): bdag gis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// oM nu mo de/ bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// mchod pa kun gyi sangs rgyas nyid// mchod pa'i bdag nyid can
101a8(rgyud): gyis mchod// bud+ha pU / rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung // dge ba'i tshogs ni thams cad kun/ yongasu bsngo ba'i mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshung par 'gyur/ pa ri rdza mchos
101b1(rgyud): kyi dbyings ni snying po che// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa// bzod nas dag pas skye ba med// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pad+ma mtshungs// sarba shud+d+ha/ chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa// bzod nas
101b2(rgyud): zhi zhing gos pa med// glo bur dri mas gos pa med// yi ge a yis rnam par sbyangs// sa man+ta b+ha dra/ e ma'o 'khor lo bde rang bzhin// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// chos rnams thams cad
101b3(rgyud): nyid kyi ni// 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu// d+harma tsakra/ sgra brnyan dang ni mtshungs pa'i sgra// med de gzhan yang yod ma yin// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin du// bdag ces bya ba 'ga'
101b4(rgyud): yang med/ ni sa pra pany+tsa/ sngon du blo dang ldan pas bsam// mnyam par gzhag pas sgom bya zhing // de 'og rdo rje sna tshegs brjod// de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sku dang
101b5(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i// rang gi lus ni phra rab dag/ rdo rje/ 'i gzugasu bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgo/ ma par bya// badz+ra kA ya/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i// 
101b6(rgyud): yan lag rnam pa ji snyed pa'i// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing // thams cad yongasu spro bar bya// d+har+m+ma kA ya/ rang gi lus la gnas pa yi// phra rab rdul ni ji snyed pa// rdo rje
101b7(rgyud): sems dpa' bsgom par bya// don yod mchod pas rab mchod bya// satwa kA ya/ de bzhin lus ni thams cad kyi// rang gi phra rab rdul rnams ni// kun tu bgod pa'i bsgom byas
101b8(rgyud): te// de ni sangs rgyas mchod por bshad// bud+d+ha kA ya/ sangs rgyas thams cad rje su mnyes// byang chub sems dpa' slob gang yin// shes rab can gyis mchog gsang bslab// sangs rgyas sa
102a1(rgyud): ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// lus rnams thams cad yongasu bsdams// yan lag kun la chags pa dang // ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa yis// lus kun
102a2(rgyud): la ni yongasu chags// bde ba'i mchod pa rang byung ba// e ma'o rjesu chags mchod bdag/ rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya// e ma'o yid 'ong e ma'o sdug/ e ma'o dga' ba rab tu mdzes// chos
102a3(rgyud): kyi chags pa 'dod chags che// gang la rab dga' chags 'gyur ba// chos dang gang zag bdag med pa// stong pa 'dod chags brjod par bya// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spang bya zhing // sems can
102a4(rgyud): yang ni dor mi ga/ sred pa dang ni chags dang spyod// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spang // ming dang gzugs ni shes bya de shing / mtshan nyid gsum ni rtogs par bya// theg chen bde ba zhe
102a5(rgyud): bya ba// 'dod chags chags par rab brjod par/ lta ba tha mas cad mi gzung zhing // srid pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par sba nga // rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med// sdug bsngal thams cad
102a6(rgyud): nges par gcod// phung po dang ni skye mched khams// rtog pa rdul tsam yod ma yin// de la 'dus byas yod ma yin// 'dus byas min pa nyid kyang med// skyes pa bud med dag nyid med// bdag dang
102a7(rgyud): sems can rnam rtog med// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs spangs// de lta bu yi chags pa yis// gang du rdo rje can chags 'gyur// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// 
102a8(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rjes chags bya// kha yi 'o na cho ga dag pa// gsang ba'i sbyor bas rab bsgrub bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa// rjesu chags pa'i tshig bstan// dpung padam por bsdams bya zhi
102b1(rgyud): 'dod chags chags par bstan pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rab 'grub 'gyur// chags pa lnga las rnam grol bas// 'dod la chags par mi bya zhing // blo ldan chos chags dga' ba yis// dngos
102b2(rgyud): grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis// gsang ba thams cad rab bstan bya// zhi ba thams cad mnyes bya zhing // rdo rje sems sogs mnyes par bya// sangs rgyas
102b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'am// rdo rje can dang dga' chen po// 'dod chags chen po 'di lta bus// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// oM sarba rA ga ra ti su kha yA mi hA// mchog tu gsang ba dan
102b4(rgyud): pa mchog/ gang zhig byas nas gsang ba kun// brtags nas 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ lhag par shes rab can dgyis bslab// mtshan ma brtan po rab 'grub nas// pad+ma'i
102b5(rgyud): lte bar 'dug bya zhing // mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlab/ sa nas// rang bdag rdo rje mtshungs pa nyid// mdo sdegs nga dbang rgyal po las// de yis shin tu gsang tshig gsungs/ 
102b6(rgyud): de ni dgongs pas gsungs pa ste// de ni dgongs par shes par bya// mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes byar brjod// brtan pa lhag pa nyid yin te// byang chub sems dpa'i phyag mtshan gang // mkhas
102b7(rgyud): pas lhag par bcang bar bya// pha rol phyin pa drug spyod pa// de yi mtshan mar rab tu bsgrags// gang phyir lhag par brten par bya// blo ldan rnams kyi rigs 'byung 'dod// mtshan ma brtan
102b8(rgyud): par rang gyur pa// de dag kho nar rab tu bsgrags// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni// rdo rje rig su brjod par bya// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// rdo rje mtshan mar 'di brjod bya// byang chub sems kyi
103a1(rgyud): / rab sbyor bas// mtshan ma brtan por brjod par bya// pad+ma shes rab pha rol phyin// pad+ma'i lte bar 'dug bya ba// shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi// rnal 'byor yang yang snyoms 'jug bya/ 
103a2(rgyud): b+ha ga ling ga'i sbyor ba ni// yang dang yang du bsten byas nas// g.yo dang nyes pa rnams spangs par// gdon mi za bar yang dag byung // shes rab dang ni byang chub sems// yang dang yang du bsten byas
103a3(rgyud): nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// byang chub gdon mi za bar 'gyur// bsgrub byar gyur pa'i chos 'di ni// lus can kun gyis rnyed par dka'// byang chub sems dang shes rab che// 
103a4(rgyud): mchod rten mtshan ma'i rjes chags bya// rnal 'byor pas ni nga 'di sgom dang // 'di lta bu yi sgrub pa dang // spyod pa gsang da pa 'di yis ni// rdo rje gsang ba nyid thob 'gyur// gsang ba dgongs
103a5(rgyud): pas bsdus pa yi// mod las rgya cher ji skad gsungs// ga/ sang ba'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad rnam par sgom// rdo rje gsang dbang bsdus pa yi// sgrub
103a6(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// gsang ba chen po bsgrubs na ni// skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur// kha cig nyin zhag de nyid la// yang dang yang du 'grub par 'gyur// nyi ma gnyis gsum bzhi lnga
103a7(rgyud): 'am// drug dang bdun la the tshom med// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // ci rigs pa yi cho ga yis// lo gcig tu ni rab sbyor bas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// rdo rje gsang ba'i
103a8(rgyud): cho ga rdzogs// / gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ rdo rje slob dpon cho ga ni// ji ltar rigs shing 'tsham pa ru// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// mdor na rig
103b1(rgyud): pa'i brtul zhugs na// gong drang kyil 'khor las bshad bzhin// ci ltar sgro zhing ci nus par// skyon du mkhas pas bshad par ga// rdo rje sems dpa' skal pa che// rgyal po kun tu khyab pa'i 'ong/ 
103b2(rgyud): the tshom med par stong phrag brgya// rtag tu rdo rje'i tshig brjod bya// sems dpa'i rdo rje go mis bya ste/ rdo rje rnal 'byor goms byas te// chos rnams dag bgoms par bya// goms pa tsam gyis
103b3(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// nyon mongs rab spong nyon mongs bzlog par bya// rnal 'byor goms pa yis ni rnal 'byor sgrub// bzlas pa tsam gyis dga' chen 'grub 'gyur to// rnal 'byor cho gas sgrub pa
103b4(rgyud): sgrub par 'gyur// yang na bzlas pa tsam nyid ni// bzlas pa ma chog gis bzlas par bya// rnal 'byor rig pa sgrub pa'i daphyir// dngos grub tshogs bzlas par bya// de ni rnal 'byor cho
103b5(rgyud): ga yis// skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// rnal 'byor/ ra tsho gas med par ni// 'grub min 'di la the tshom ma // rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis// gsang ba bzhi ni yang
103b6(rgyud): dag pa shad/ gsang ba chen po tshad med pa// bzhi po thams cad bsdus pa yin// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga dang // phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len pa// rig pa'i mchog gi cho ga ni// gsang ba bsdu/ 
103b7(rgyud): pa dang po yin/ gsad dang skem byed phur pas btab// gdeg pa dang ni mngon spyod dang // bgegs bskrad pa yi 'khrul 'khor 'di// gsang ba'i bsdus pa gnyis pa yin// go cha mi 'gyur
103b8(rgyud): bcing ba dang / spyod dang de bzhin rab bskyod dang / bdag nyid mngon par srung nyid dang // bgegs rnams bsal bar bya ba dang / rdzas 'phrog pa dang gzhim pa dang // gdug pa thams cad mngon su
104a1(rgyud): / pa// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba bsdus pa gsum pa yin// sngags dang phyag rgya mchod pa dang // de bzhin rig pa'i dngos grub nyid// bgegs rnams bsod nams nye
104a2(rgyud): pabar bsdu gsang ba bzhi par 'dod pa yin// gsang ba bzhi po thams cad ni// rang bzhin rdzu 'phrul kun bsdus pa// gsang ba mchog gi rgyud chen po// rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad// bzlas brjod
104a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg cho ga ni// de ni rgyud mchog las bshad bya// gang phyir rig pa 'dzin kun gyis// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg bsgrub par bya// bzlas brjod sbyor ba med par ni// rig pa'i dngos grub 'byung
104a4(rgyud): mi 'gyur// sbyin sreg tsam ni med pa ru// rig pa'i bya ba byed mi 'gyur// gang gis rnal 'byor brtson 'grus pa/ bzla nges pa'i rim pa bshad bya ba// rig pa 'dzin pa thams
104a5(rgyud): cad kyi// snying po 'di ni gsang mchog yin// gsang ba'i rigs 'dir bzlas pa ni// rnal 'byor nyi shu yang dag byung // ba zlas pa rnam pa nyi shu ni// gsang ba'i rgyud du nyi shu gcig/ 
104a6(rgyud): gnas ngan len gyi bag chags rtogs// rtog pa bag chags zhes bya ste// bzlas pa tsam gyis thi mo 'gyur te// bzlas pa tsam gyis brjod par bya// nyes pa byas pa spong ba dang // de bzhin srid pa
104a7(rgyud): sbyor byed cing // rmad 'byung sna tshogs mthong 'gyur te// de bas bzlas pa brjod par bya// byang chub spyod pa 'byung 'gyur zhing // tshul mchog mthong bar 'gyur ba ste// de bas bzlas pa'i
104a8(rgyud): cho ga ni// rnal 'byor pas ni nges par bya// gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di ru// hUM ni dang por rab tu bsgrags// gsang ba thams cad yang dag 'byung // hUM gis bzlas pa brjod par bya// sangs rgyas
104b1(rgyud): kun gyis gco ni// de bzhin yi ge hUM rab mchog/ gsang ba thams cad 'khor lor bcas// rigs lnga dag dang bcas pa 'byung // 'dir ni yi ge hUM 'byung bar// sngon la shes rab can
104b2(rgyud): gyis brtag/ lce sogs thams cad khong stong du// lus kun la ni brtag par bya// sbyor ba bcu las 'byung mi 'gyur// so las rnam pa kun tu min// lce dang rtsa ba las kyang min/ dkan las
104b3(rgyud): rnam pa kun tu min// gnas gang las ni sbyor ba 'byung // snying ka nyid las 'byung mi 'gyur// khong stong dngos po thams cad la// skyed pa nyid ni snang mi 'gyur// yi ge hUM gi sbyor ba yis// 
104b4(rgyud): rang gi dbyangs la yang dag sbyar// de nyid nyon mongs can mi 'gyur// kun gzhi sa bon thams cad pa// dkan dang lkog ma'i 'bad pa dang // lce yi tshegs las yang dag
104b5(rgyud): 'byung // yi ge hUM gi sgra byung ba// de ni mi rtog yang dag byung // de lta ra 'byung ba'i sbyor ba las// gnas kyi nyon mongs can mi 'gyur// tshig dang bcas pa'i ji bzhin sgra// 'dus
104b6(rgyud): byas thams cad dor bar bya// ji bzhin hUM gi sbyor ba las// chos rnams thams cad skye ba med// rnam par rtog las yang dag byung // de ni mi rtog yang dag 'byung // 'khor ba dag gi thog
104b7(rgyud): ma ni// ji ltar yang ni shos mi 'gyur// 'dir ni skye ba mi snang zhing // 'dus byas dag ni 'jig pa min// de bas yi ge hUM tsam gyis// 'dus byas so sor brtag par bya// dag cing mthar
104b8(rgyud): thug gnas nyid ni// hUM gis kyang ni sbyar bar bya// rang bzhin med pa'i sgra 'di ni// yi ge hUM las yang dag 'byung // 'di la dngos po yod ma yin// rang bzhin med cing bdag med pa// de bzhin/ 
105a1(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad kyi// rang bzhin nyid ni yod ma yin// bdag gam sems can gso ba med// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// zag pa med cing 'dus byas
105a2(rgyud): min// gnas ni dag pa brtan par bya// dngos grub sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// yi ge hUM ni yang dag 'byung // ye shes dag
105a3(rgyud): pa yang dag 'byung // chos kyi dbyings kyis brtan par bya// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po yang // 'dir ni nye bar mi dmigs te// gang phyir dus gsum gshegs snying po// sangs rgyas
105a4(rgyud): snying po tshogasu bshad// sangs rgyas sras bcas tham sa cad dang // rdo rje can ni rgyal sras bcas// hUM tsam dgyi ni sbyor ba yis// kun tu yang dag dgug par bya// yi ge'i sbyor
105a5(rgyud): ba gcig gis ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po bstan// gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// 'di ni rang gi sbyor bas gnas// chos kyi rgyu 'thun bag chags ni// byang chub sems
105a6(rgyud): ni ma rtogs par// thog ma med ldan 'khor ba las// 'byung ba cung zad yod ma yin// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal dang // byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul ni// byang chub kyi ni sems med par// / 
105a7(rgyud): 'gas kyang mya ngan 'da' mi nus// gal te sangs rgyas 'byung med na// nyan thos dag ni ga las 'byung // sangs rgyas 'byung ba yid min na// rang rgyal de ni 'byung mi 'gyur// gal te byang chub sems
105a8(rgyud): dpa' med// sangs rgyas rnams ni gang las byung // gal te byang chub sems med na// de bas 'khor lo 'di kun ni// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // byang sems gsang ba chen po ni// 
105b1(rgyud): yi ge hUM las yang dag byung // sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'byung ba// yi ge hUM gi snang bar 'gyur// gang phyir mtshan ldan gzugs can ni// rtag tu sangs rgyas rab 'byung ba// hUM yig gi ni sbyor
105b2(rgyud): ba hUM/ de nyid rdo rje yang dag byung // chos dbyings rab sbyor rdo rje ni// de las yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur// de las rdo rje rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bla na med// the tshom med par rnal 'byor
105b3(rgyud): kun// yi ge hUM gi sbyor bas 'grub// de lta bu yi bzlas pa yis// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ni// sngon ni bsdod mdzod pa ltar// rnal 'byor las byas dge ba bsngo// byang chub sems dpa'i
105b4(rgyud): mthu yis ni// rang gi sems kyang bsngo bar bya// rdo rje che na po mthar phyin byed// byang chub sems kyis bsgral bar bya// chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che// sems can thams cad gos
105b5(rgyud): pa med// thams cad de bzhin gshegs snying po// nyon/ mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med// ji ltar zla ba bzhin/ du dag/ zla ba gang ba'i 'od gsal ba// rtag tu yang dag rdzogs pa
105b6(rgyud): gnas// rab tu dang ba 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni dang po ches ye shes// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin// rtag tu dag par gnas pa ste// rang gi nyon mongs dag gis bsgribs// de
105b7(rgyud): bas rang sems rnam pa ni// zla ba gang bar shes par bya// bdag ni dga' yang yod ma yin// chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas shes// ye shes zla ba gang ba min// gang phyir bdag ni yod ma yin/ 
105b8(rgyud): zla ba gang ba dang mtshungs rigs// gang phyir dag cing gos pa med// sangs rgyas ye shes skyon med pa// zla ba'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// mthong nas shes rab can gyis bsam// 'di yang gang gis
106a1(rgyud): rtogs par 'gyur// yun ring du su sdug bsngal ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// nyon mongs pa yi bag chags kun// de bzhin sbyong bar byed par bsam// byang chub
106a2(rgyud): sems ni sems chen po// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms byed pa// chos kyi rgyu 'thun bag chags kyi// gnyen po ru ni byung ba yin// de bas 'di yi mthu yis ni// sangs rgyas ye shes rnam par
106a3(rgyud): sbyong // gnas ngan len ni bag chags bcas// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis gos pa med// nyi ma lta bu'i sems chen po// nyon mongs rtsa ni rab sreg byed// zla ba lta bu'i sems chen po// dge ba'i
106a4(rgyud): sman ni rnam 'phel byed// sos ka' tsha ba'i zla ba bzhin// nyi dma'i gdung ba rab sreg byed// shar bar gyur pas zhi bar byed// nyon mongs gdung bsam gdungs shing // mi shes pa
106a5(rgyud): la nyi ma nyid// byang chub sems ni zla ba che// nyon mongs gdu nga bzhi byed par// kun nas nyon mongs bag chags bca sa// gnas ngan len ni 'joms pa'i mchog/ khab len gyi
106a6(rgyud): ni lcags bzhin du// nyon mongs bag chags 'dren byed pa// rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pas// byang chub sems de bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas de ru// slar yang zla ba rnam
106a7(rgyud): par sgom// byang chub sems kyi mthu yis ni// bag chags thams cad sreg byed pa// ye shes de ru 'byung 'gyur te// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa spangs// rnam par mi rtog mtshungs med pa// bdag
106a8(rgyud): med de bzhin stong pa nyid// mi shes ra'o 'joms par byed// rdo rje dang mtshungs khong stong med// rdo rje'i rang bzhin snying po che// 'jig tshogs ri bo brtan pa ni// rdo rje des ni 'joms par byed// de phyir
106b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i rang bzhin brtan// de bas rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas// zla ba'i dbus zla ba mtshungs// zla ba gnyis dbus rdo rje yis// rdo rje'i ye shes brtan par bya// stong nyid de bzhin nyid de nyid// yang dag mtha'
106b2(rgyud): dang 'dus ma byas// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// yi ge hUM ni sgom par bshad// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mchog/ na mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa ni// zla ba'i dbusu bsgom par bya/ hUM gi sbyor
106b3(rgyud): bde yis ni// rdo rje'i mchog ni bsgom par bya// lus kun la ni spro bya zhing // stong pa nyid dang mtshungs par spros// gzugs 'di nyid ni ming tsam ste// dngos po 'ga' yang yod ma yin// cha shas kyi ni
106b4(rgyud): rnam dpyad na// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// 'jig rten ka/ na rdzob zhes bya ste// dam pa'i don du yod ma yin// de lta bu/ yi rang bzhin du// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// de dag
106b5(rgyud): pra rab rnam brtags kyang // phra rab zhes bya yod ma yin// 'jig rten kun rdzob zhes bya ste// dam pa'i don du yod ma yin// de lta bu yi rang bzhin du// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// gzugs
106b6(rgyud): de yod pa ma yin na// ji ltar yod ces bya ba yin// gal te gzugs de yod min na// maung yang de la yod ma yin// ming ni gang las yang dag byung // ming zhes bya ba ci 'dra bor// dngos zhes bya ba de
106b7(rgyud): dang mtshungs// ming des so sor brtags byas na// gnas gang zhig na rab tu gnas// dngos po gcig ni rnam phyen// ming ni mang po yang dag byung // re re yi ni dbye ba yis// sngar gyi ming ni nyams par
106b8(rgyud): 'gyur// de la ming ni yod min pa// ming ni yang dag 'byung ba med// gang la ming ni yod min na// ji ltar ming du brjod par bya// gang gis ming ni rab gnas pa/ rnam pa kun tu dmigs mi 'gyur// garma/ 
107a1(rgyud): ni nye bar mi dmigs la// de la gzugs ni ji ltar yod// 'di ni yang dag min rtog pa// bag chags dag gis kun nas dkris// gang du byis pa rab rmongs shing // mya ngan 'das
107a2(rgyud): pa thob mi 'gyur// ji ltar gzugs ni rnam bsgom pa// de bzhin tshor dang 'du shes dang // so so ru ni rnam phyed na// de la snying po dmigs mi 'gyur// gang la snying po yod min pa// de la dngos po ji
107a3(rgyud): ltar yod// gang la dngos po mi dmigs pa// dam pa'i don ni ji ltar yod// gang zhin bstan par mi dmigs pa// de ni yod min dngos por med// chos rnams thams cad med pas na// skye ba med par
107a4(rgyud): brjod par bya// gang zhig ma skyes de yod min// gang zhig yod min ji ltar yod// mkhas pas chos rnams tham/ das cad ni// 'gag pa med ces bya bar brjod// skye ba med cing 'gag pa
107a5(rgyud): med// de ni bzod nas zhi bar 'dod// de phyir rang bzhin mya ngan 'das// 'di ni stong pa nyid du brjod// 'di ni yang / dag de nyid che// yang dag mtha' ru brjod par bya// chos kyi dbyings ni// 
107a6(rgyud): snying po che// theg pa chen por brjod par bya// de ni snying po khong stong med// rdo rje'i brtan pa bla na med// lus kun la ni spro bya ste// bdag gis lus ni 'di lta bu// rdo rje'i bdag nyid ces bya gang // 
107a7(rgyud): yi ge hUM ni yongasu spro// sgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'di 'dra'i chos ni skye ba med// 'dir yang 'byung ba snang ba med// hUM zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba yis// skye bar/ 
107a8(rgyud): yang ni snang mi 'gyur// chos nyid dag pa bden pa gang // yang dag mtha' ni zag pa med// chos dbyings bstan pa dam pa ni// yi ge hUM du 'dir rab bsgrags// rdo rje yi ge hA de nyid// chos dbyings
107b1(rgyud): stug po bstan pa yin// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// rdo rje gang yin de nyid hUM// chos nyid dag pa 'di lta bu// rdo rje ye shes yid 'ong ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// rdo rje bdag gi lag
107b2(rgyud): naganas// de bas rdo rje can gun gyi// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor thams cad dang // yi ge hUM la sbyor ba yis// spros ming rnal 'byor bsam par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// snying ka'i dang/ 
107b3(rgyud): su bsgom par bya// zla ba de la zla ba gnyis// dbusu zla ba rab bsgom pa// zla ba'i dbusu rdo rje ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i dbus yi ge hUM// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya// 
107b4(rgyud): de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// lus kun rab tu bsgom pa/ bya/ rdo rje hUM mdzad bzlas pa yis// rdo rje'i bdag nyid mya dar du thob// hUM rdo rje hUM mdzad skem pa rdzog so// hUM gi sbyor ba
107b5(rgyud): bzhin du// yi ge thams cad rnam par bsgom// sem sa dpa' chen po'i sbyor ba yis// yi ge bcu drug dag pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi yi ge hUM// gang phyir sangs rgyas rigs
107b6(rgyud): byung ba// rdo rje can dag kun gyi hUM// drag po gcod kun rab tu sgom// oM ni rin chen yang dag ldan// hI ni pad+mar yang dag ldan// yi ge a ni sna tshogs brjod// de lta bur yang bsgom par bya// hUM ni
107b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje dag/ traM ni rdo rje snying po ste// yi ge hrIMHni rdo rje bstan// sna tshogs rdo rje yi ge a// hUM ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ ho ni rdo rje chags pa ste// rdo rje legs pa yi ge sa// oM ni rdo rje rin
107b8(rgyud): chen to// rdo rje gzi brjid yi ge a// dza ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje gzhad pa yi ge sa/ yi ge hrI ni rdo rje spyan// rdo rje rnon po yi ge d+hI/ mon rdo rje 'khor lo ste/ rdo rje smra ba yi ges/ yi/ 
108a1(rgyud): sha ni rdo rje las// rdo rje srung ba yi ge hUM// hUM ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te// rdo rje khu tshur yi ge baM// gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid// snying kar de bzhin bsgom par bya// yi ge hU~M ni rnal 'byor pa
108a2(rgyud): de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// gzugs gcig rnam par spro bar bya// yi ge hUM bzlas tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
108a3(rgyud): gnas par// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugasu ste// rdo rje gcig ni rnam par bsgom// rdo rje'i dbus kyi lte bar ni// de ru yi ge hU~M bsgom bya// theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus// ji bzhin
108a4(rgyud): mdo yi rjes 'brangs nas// ji bzhin rgyal po skyes bur bca sa/ yi ge hUM ni dang por bshad// de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byo dar pas// snying ka ru ni bsgom par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugasu
108a5(rgyud): ste// dbusu yi ge hUM bsgom bya// de bzhin yi ge thams cad kyang // rnal 'byor pas ni snying kar bsgom// zla ba'i gzu/ gas las yang dag gnas// bdag nyid yongasu bsgom bya zhing / 
108a6(rgyud): rigs kyi lha yi sbyor ba yis// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' gang 'ga' zhig/ gang dang gang zhig mngon 'dod pa// rig pa de ni snying kar sgom// yi ge hUM ni dang por sbyar// gang phyir de
108a7(rgyud): las rtogs pa 'byung // de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas// snying kar bsgoms pas bsgom par bya// yang nan mkha'i sbyor ba yis// yi ge hUM ni dang por sbyar// na mkha'i rang bzhin bsgom bya zhing // yi ge
108a8(rgyud): dag ni thams cad sbyar// yang nan mkha'i zla dbusu// gnas pa'i yi ge hUM bsgom bya// bdag nyid rigs kyi lha mor bsam// skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur// hUM ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin// sngags kun
108b1(rgyud): rab tu bsgom par bya// rig pa kun gyi gsang ba ni// rgyud kun yang dag bsdus pa ste// bzlas pa'i gsang ba nges sbas pa// gsang ba 'di ni rnam pa drug/ rig 'dzin rnams kyi snying po dang / rnal 'a
108b2(rgyud): rgyud ni bsdus pa dang // don yod shin tu rmad 'byung ba/ gsang ba las kyang mchig gsang bshad// bzlas brjod tsam gyi sbyor ba yis// lta ba'i ri bo 'joms par 'gyur// rang gi snying ka'i dbus rno
108b3(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dbus// zla ba gnyis pa bsgom par bya// dbugs 'byung rngub pa gang yin pa// rdo rje yi ge hUM du sgom// me bsrubs pa yi sbyor ba yis// steng dang
108b4(rgyud): 'og tu rgyu bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas// dbusu yi ge hriHbsgom bya// steng 'og 'gro ba bsgom par bya// yi ge hUM ni de sbyar nas// ji ltar shing skam gtsub brtan pa/ 
108b5(rgyud): gtsub shing yang dag sbyor ba yis// rtsol ba byas pacu ma gyis ni// skad cig gis ni me 'byung bzhin// yi ge a ni gtsub bstan te// yi ge hUM ni gtsub shing yin// rgyu ba'i rnal
108b6(rgyud): 'byor pa yis ni// skad cig gis ni ye shes skye// shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes// yi ge hrIHru 'dir brjod bya// byang chub sems ni yi ge hUM// me yi sbyor bas bsrub par bya// bsrubs pa'i
108b7(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ye shes dam pa skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje de ni bsreg bya ste// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// b+ha ga sangs rgyas kun shes rab// ling gi rdo rjer brjod par bya// byang chub sems gang de rdo
108b8(rgyud): rje/ b+ha ga ling kar rab tu sgrub// b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas ni// mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs so// b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mkhas pas ling ga gzhug par bya// gsang ba gzi brjid chen
109a1(rgyud): / po 'di// me bsrubs pa yi sbyor ba yis// 'ga' zhig gis ni 'di bsgrubs na// skad cig gis ni ye shes ni ye shes skye// bzlas pa gsang ba rnam pa bdun rdzog so// 
109a2(rgyud): sbas pa gsang ba rgyud chen po// 'di nyid rnal 'byor kun tu bsdus// de nyid chen po bsdus pa ni// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya// zla ba gang ba yang dag gnas// bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgoms par
109a3(rgyud): bya/ de yi dbusu rdo rje ste// rdo rje rigs kyi bzlas pa bya// zla ba gang ba la gnas par// bdag nyid pad+mar bsgom par bya// de yi dbusu pad+ma de// pad+ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya// zla ba gang ba la gan+da/ 
109a4(rgyud): par// bdag nyid nor bur bsgom par bya// de yi dbus rin chen dang // rin chen rigs kyi bzlas par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu ni// rdo rje rnon por rab tu sgom// de yi las kyi
109a5(rgyud): rigs mchog la// las kyi rigs kun bzlas par bya// sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams te// sangs rgyas gzu gsu rnam par sgom// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// sangs
109a6(rgyud): rgyas rigs kun bzlas par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen po// sems dpa' gcig ni rnam par bsgom// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// rdo rje rigs kun bzlas par bya// pad+ma'i sem
109a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po'i gzugs// 'jig rten dbang phyug rnam par bsgom// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// pad+ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya// nor bu rin chen skal ba che// rdo rje rin chen rnam par sgom// 
109a8(rgyud): de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// rin chen rigs kun bzlas par bya// sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las// sems dpa'i gzugs ni rnam par bsgom// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// las kyi
109b1(rgyud): rigs kun bzlas par bya// bden pa dam tshig mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas thams cad rab grol byed// thos pa tsam gyis thabs chen po// yang na snying kar rdo rang bzhin// sna tshogs bdag po bzlas
109b2(rgyud): brjod mtshungs// shes rab can gyis gang bsam pa// phun sum tshogs kun bde bar thob// gsang ba yang dag bshad par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// de yi thugs kar 'jug
109b3(rgyud): bya zhing // yid kyis thams cad bcug nas ni// de yi sku ni mtshungs par spro// de yi thugs ka'i dbus ni// rdo rje'i rigs ni rab tu bshad// ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
109b4(rgyud): thams cad spro// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na// the tshom med par sangs rgyas ku ngan// skad cig de nyid kyis 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje'i mda' ni zhi ba
109b5(rgyud): 'di 'di lta bu yi gzugs bsgom bya// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// rdo rje'i gar dang mtshungs par sgom// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i rigs can thams cad ni// the tshom
109b6(rgyud): med par dngos grub kun// ye shes bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma'i sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing // thugs kar ji bzhin 'jug par bya// sna tshogs thabs ni rab bsgoms na// pad+ma'i
109b7(rgyud): rigs can 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen bsgom bya zhing // thugs kar ji bzhin 'jug par bya// rin chen mdzod ni bcug na su// yang dang yang du spro bar bya// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje rin chen
109b8(rgyud): dga' chen po// the tshom med par dngos grub kun// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir// rdo rje lasu rnam par bsam// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// 
110a1(rgyud): / sna tshogs rnam 'phrul spro bar bya// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yi// sna tshogs mdzod ni rab spros nas// the tshom med par dngos grub kun// bzlas pa tsam gyi 'grub par 'gyur/ shin tu gas
110a2(rgyud): ba 'di lta ni// bzlas pa gsang ba bla na med// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// bzlas pa'i cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di// rgyud kyi snying po kun bsdus shing // nyon mongs thams/ 
110a3(rgyud): cad rab 'joms shing // rig pa 'dzin pas bzlas par bya// bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rig pa'i brtul zhugs nges par blang // gal te 'di ni dngos grub 'dang // rnal 'byor pa yis brtul
110a4(rgyud): zhugs bya// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga ni// rnal 'byor mtsho rog tu brtson par bya// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// bye ba gsum ni yongasu bzla// bye ba gsum ni bzlas byas nas/ sgrub
110a5(rgyud): pa dag ni brtsam par bya// byang chub sems ni dga' chen po// / shes rab can gyi dkyil 'khor bri// rdo rje sems dang / 'a rgyal po che// sems can cig gis yang dag bri// gang
110a6(rgyud): phyir rgyal po mchog gsang dbang // rdo rje mchog ni rab ster byed// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// de ni sngon du yang dag brtsam// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri// khru ni bcu par yang dag
110a7(rgyud): bri// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan// dar gyis chun pos rnam par brgyan// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// kha khyer dag gis
110a8(rgyud): shin tu spras// rin chen dra bas yongs bre// gser sku'i dril bu g.yer khas brgyan// sgo khyud dang ni mtshams rnams// rdo rje 'ching bas rab tu bcing // rdo rje rin chen rab tu bkod/ rdo rje thig
110b1(rgyud): gis thig btab pa// dri yi sbyor ba'i cho ga dang // phur bus bgegs ni bsal bya zhing // tshon rtsi lnga yi srad bu ni// rdo rje gsang bas bsrung bar bya// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// phyi rol dkyil
110b2(rgyud): 'khor thig gdab bya// ji skad sngar bshad de nyid ni// rdo rje gsang ba yongs bkod nas/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// rdo rje 'khor lo rab mdzes la// 'khor lo'i dbusu rab tu dgod// rdo rje
110b3(rgyud): chags pa yongasu dgod// tshon rtsi lnga ni rab tu dbye// ji skad gsang rgyud las gsungs bzhin// dkar po sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba// sngon po ser po shin tu 'bar// btsod sogs dang ni rab
110b4(rgyud): tu ldan// 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs ldan// sna tshogs tshon rtsis bre bar bya// 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar// rdo rje 'khor lo yongs bkod nas// zla ba gang bar rab
110b5(rgyud): dgod do// 'khor lo thams cad yongasu bzung // kha dog rdzi/ bzhin rigs pa bzhin// ji ltar mdzes shing shin tu dkar// ji bzhin zla ba nya ba mtshungs// zla ba gang ba yang
110b6(rgyud): dag bri/ zla ba gang ba'i dbus ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bri// gang gis mtshan ni bzung ba yis// skad cig gis ni sdig pa 'grol// 'dzum pa dang bcas zla ba'i mdog/ shin tu/ 
110b7(rgyud): chags pa dga' chen po// myur du rdo rje'i tshogs brjod do// rdo rje nyid kyi snying po yin// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa hUM dzaHhUM baM ho rdo rje'i glu ni blang bya zhing // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa che/ 
110b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed// 'dod pa'i chags pa yang dag dran// thams cad rjes chags bde ba thugs mchog mnga'// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba mchog/ kya khyod bde
111a1(rgyud): chen bstan pas 'phel mdzad pa// rab tu myur du sgrub pa 'grub par mdzod// rdo rje'i glu ni de lta bu// blang zhing 'khor lo spyan drang bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rje su chags shi/ 
111a2(rgyud): rab 'grub 'gyur// sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag gnas// rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog/ rol pa dang bcas spyan g.yo ba// snyems tshul chen po dga' ba che// g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje
111a3(rgyud): ni/ thugs ka ru ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ g.yon pa dril bu yang dag ldan// slar yang bsnyems tshul dang bcas pa// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje che// rgyal po chen po thub pa che// spyod pa chen po theg
111a4(rgyud): pa che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ rin chen chen po n+d+he che// rgyal mtshan chen po dran pa che// sangs rgyas dran dpa rdo rje che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ 'dod chag
111a5(rgyud): chen po bde ba che// bde ba chen po bla na med// sa dang pha rol tu phyin bde ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ sa rab chen po rdo rje che// rdo rje hUM mdzad las byung ba/ byang chub
111a6(rgyud): sems ni rdo rje che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// rdo rje chen po chags pa che// rgyal po chen po thub pa che// don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// chos kyi srid
111a7(rgyud): pa 'khor lo che// smra ba'i las ni bla na med// srung zhing bsrung ba drag po che// rdo rje khu tshur bdag grub mdzad// rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis// de nyid mchog tu bskul nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal
111a8(rgyud): po che// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ 
111b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sna ma dang mtshungs par// dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bri// de nas rdo rje las nas ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya// chos kyi rig pa 'dzin pa ni// dbab dang gzhug pa la
111b2(rgyud): sogs pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad yang dag bya// bum pa la sogs yo byad dang // spos dang me tog la sogs mchog/ rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams
111b3(rgyud): thams cad yang dag bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i rig pa yis// bum pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// de ni zhabs kyi drung bzhag na// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga ji bzhin
111b4(rgyud): 'jug bya zhing // rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches// bdag nyid da la ni dbang bskur bya// hUM gis yang dag zhugs nas ni// rdo rje mchod pas yang dag mchod// rdo rje sems dpa'i
111b5(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// ci rigs par ni bsgrub par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar gnas// phyag rgya chen po yongasu gzung // rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang bdag nyid ni/ 
111b6(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che// skad cig re re bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// brtan par 'gyur bar the tshom med// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bsgrubs nas ni// 
111b7(rgyud): shin tu brtan pa bla med pa// rjes chags sems dpa' chen po ni// skad cig gis ni bsgrub par bya// de 'dri'i mchog tu gsang ba mthar phyin pa// sems dpa' rgyal chen yongasu dag pa mchog
111b8(rgyud): dag pa'i tshul 'di cung zad mtshungs pa med// rjes chags 'dod chags yongasu dag pa mchog/ rdo rje rgyal mchog rab dag dri ma med// gsang ba las byung 'khor lo dam pa 'dzin/ rig pa'i gas/ 
112a1(rgyud): sngags tshul 'di byang chub byed// snying rje dang ldan spyod pa spyod byed pa// de bzhin rab 'jigs sdug bsngal chen po'i pha rol phyin gyur pa// mchog tu mkhas shing phra ba rgyud dang rgyud
112a2(rgyud): dag las byung ba// de ru srid pa dag gi dra ba chen po gcod mdzad pa// gsang sngags 'khor lo las byung ba yi 'khor lo ste// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis dgongs pa gcig/ sras kyi gtso bo
112a3(rgyud): dbang bsgyur rgyal po ste// de yis thar pa'i grong khyer rab tu bshad// gseng ba rnal 'byor chen po de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo las de bzhin gshegs
112a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mdo sde gsang ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzog so// de nas rnal 'byor gsang ba che// sangs rgyas thams cad
112a5(rgyud): kun bsdus pa// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i mchog/ na mkha/ 'a sna tshogs dngos ldan pa// ri dbang rgyal po chen po ste// sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa sprul// rdo rje dbang po che
112a6(rgyud): po'i gnas// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'das// rdo rje rgyal po rtse mo ste// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag byung // rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshungs// 
112a7(rgyud): rdo rje kun gyi rab mdzes pa// mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas de ru// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsungs bzhugs// sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs// gtso bos
112a8(rgyud): chos kun dbang du gyur// rol bcas rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas gcig ste// chos chen po'i rnal 'byor mchog/ sangs rgyas
112b1(rgyud): / thams cad 'dus nas ni// thub pa'i dbang phyug la gsol btag/ rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// byang chub sems dpa'i dga' chen po// sems dpa' byang sems las byung ba// rang gi rigs
112b2(rgyud): 'byung ba shad du gsol// rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po ste// rgyud kyi snying po gsang ba che// gsang ba chen po rigs kyi dbang // mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po ste// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// zhi ba
112b3(rgyud): byang chub 'grub 'gyur te// thams cad yang dag bsdus pa min// gtum po thams cad rab 'joms pa// rang rigs rtag tu bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po ste// kun tu mi gsu
112b4(rgyud): bzhugs par gyu// mi gsungs gsang ba ma gsungs te// zhi ba'i dbade ba la bzhugs gyur// gsang ba de bzhin gdagos pa mchog sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs
112b5(rgyud): rtogs shing gzigs par mi mdzad de// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor/ bzhugs par gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad// sangs
112b6(rgyud): rgyas gcig bzhin yang dag 'gyur// don yod grub pa bla na mdo// sangs rgyas thams cad rnal 'byor che// gsang ba 'dun las yang dag byung // rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje can la bsku
112b7(rgyud): bar gsungs// oM badz+ra satwa u tiSh+Tha// rdo rje bskul ba gsungs pa na// chos dbyings sangs rgyas gcig pu nyid// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhengs par gyur/ 
112b8(rgyud): thub pas mgon rnams la btud nas// tshig ni 'di skad gsungs par gyur// rnam pa kun tu ci zhig bgyi// bdag la sangs rgyas kun gyi gsungs// phyag na rdo rje brtan pa la// de nas sangs rgyas
113a1(rgyud): / kun gyis gsungs// gsang ba rdo rje rigs zhes pa// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas snang byed/ 
113a2(rgyud): rab tu btud nas tshig gsungs pa// mgon po rnal 'byor gzigasu gsol// bdag gi snod dang ldan pa'i mchog/ 'di na sems can 'ga' yang med// gang phyir mu stegs la chags shing // 
113a3(rgyud): skye dgu lta ba'i dri mas khyab// sems can 'di dag 'dul bya min// sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin// log pa'i lam du yang dag zhugs// mun pa stug po la gzhol ba// la la lha yi lta ba
113a4(rgyud): tshogs// kha cig brtul zhugs lta bu'i gnas// kha tsog/ dka' thub gdungs pas 'khrul// nyon mongs pas ni/ 'khrugs pa'i sems// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags
113a5(rgyud): skyo bar yang ni mi 'gyur te// rdo rje rigs kyi gsang 'di la// nam yang sbyor ba mi 'gyur ro// de dag 'dod chags che la chags// 'dod pa'i chags pa dag las rgyal// sangs
113a6(rgyud): rgyas byang chub chags bral ba// gsang ba 'di la sbyor ma 'gyur// lta ba'i chags pas rgyal bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i chags pas lta ba can// srid pa'i zhags pas shin tu chags// sangs
113a7(rgyud): rgyas postan po la chags bral// nga rgyal lhag pa'i nga rgyal cing // gdug cing drag la shin tu khro// snying rje med cing brtse med 'gyur// de la gsang ba rung ma yin// rmongs pa kun mkhyen yin/ 
113a8(rgyud): snyam pa// ye shes chen po la mkhas pa// gsang ba 'di ni rung ma yin// 'dren pa ji ltar bshad par bgyi// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po nyid// sha za 'byung po gsang ba ba/ lha la sogs pa/ 
113b1(rgyud): gdug chen po// bstan pa la ni 'jug mi 'gyur// nga ni sangs rgyas rab tu zhi// byang chub sems ni dga' chen po// sems can 'di dag shin tu gdug/ bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ 
113b2(rgyud): nga ni rgyal chen theg chen la// nam mkha' dbyings bzhin rab tu yang // kye ma sems can 'di dag dman// bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur// nga ni theg chen dag pa ste// nyon mongs 'dam gyi
113b3(rgyud): gos pa med// kye ma'o sems can 'di nyon mongs// bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// nga ni shes rab ye shes che// theg pa che la shin tu brtan// kye ma sems can shes rab ngan
113b4(rgyud): bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// bsod nams chen po/ ye shes che// nga ni mchod pa chen po'i tshogs// kye// ma' sems can bsod nams chung // bdag gi tshig 'di
113b5(rgyud): 'grub mi 'gyur// sems can 'di dag nye bar 'tshe// 'ji gas pa sna tshogs kun tu khyab// rnam rtog gis bskyod shes rab ngan// sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin// stong
113b6(rgyud): gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// bdag po chen po dbang phyug kyang // rmongs pa kun sel nyid gyur pa// stobs chen rdzu 'phrul chen po ste// de la rgyal po grog byed yod// sgyu ma'i sngags ni
113b7(rgyud): yongasu 'dzin// de ni mi rgyud ces bya ste// sems can rmongs byed lhur len pa// de ni rgyal po lha chen po// gci bo rgyal po chen po mtshungs// de ni dbang phyug che zhes bya/ gdug pa'i
113b8(rgyud): sems can 'joms byed pa// de yi gzugs can rgyal po che// bskyed byed byed pa po bdag po// tshangs pa chen po rgyal po che// lta ba sna tshogs rab ster ba// 'dod pa'i khams kyi rgyal
114a1(rgyud): po che dbang po zhes bya sha tsi'i bdag/ brtson 'grus dbang phyug chen po'i bu// gdodang drug rdzu 'phrul chen po can// dpung chen zhes bya'i ming che ste/ gzhon nu mig ldan
114a2(rgyud): 'od can pa// rgyal po chen po 'di lnga ni// khams gsum gyi ni bdag por bshad// rgyal po lnga ni gzi brjid che// lus gsum gyi ni ngo mtshar che// skul byed dbang phyug chen po ni// tshangs
114a3(rgyud): pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// de yi lus can rgyal po che// dbang phyug chen po zhes grags pa// sems can gdug pa shin tu drag/ sngags bcas 'khor dang bcas pa yi// rgyal po lnga po
114a4(rgyud): de dag ni// sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed// lta ba che dan po 'dzin byed cing // bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa ste/ nyon mongs chen pos rab nyon mongs// gzhan yang kun nas nyon mongs
114a5(rgyud): byed// sems can dag ni 'joms byed cing // bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid che// bdag nyid dam pa'i yid chen po// de lta bu yi rnam rtog
114a6(rgyud): gis// sems can rnam par rmongs par byed// tshangs pa 'byin byed skye dgu'i bdag/ byed pa rang bdag byed pa po// lta ba chen po de lta bus// sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed// khyab 'jug kun
114a7(rgyud): song khyab byed pa// khyab 'jug rang bzhin grong khyer kun// de ltar yang dag mi 'dzin pa// lta ba'i 'ching ba rab ster byed// rgya cher rgyal po 'di rnams ni// lta bar smra la nges par ston// rmongs pa/ 
114a8(rgyud): mkhas pa yin sems shing // sems can 'ching bar byed pa yin// sems can de rnams gzhan gyis bskul// lta ba smra bar nges par sten// khyab 'jug tshangs pa la sogs pa// dbang phyug
114b1(rgyud): chen po phyag byed do// sangs rgyas ye shes rnam kun du// bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi byed// sems can 'di rnams rmongs par 'gyur// de la gsang ba rung ma yin// de lta bu yi rnam pa'i
114b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' dga' chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyis mkhyen nas ni// rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsung bzhugs// mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun// thub pa nyi ma ma lus pas// gsungag ci
114b3(rgyud): gis ni gsang ba che// rdo rje yi ni tshig gsungs pa// kye ma'o sems can 'di gdul dka'// gdug cing drag la shin tu gtum// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi 'dul ba// de phyir bdag cag
114b4(rgyud): gsol ba 'debs// mgon khyod shes rab chen po ste// / de ni thabs chen brjod par bya/ byang chub sems ni thabs chen po/ nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms// gdug
114b5(rgyud): pa thams cad rab gdul ba// mgon po khyod la gso la ba 'debs// gdug pa 'dul byed rnam 'phrul pa/ thabs chen po ni rab tu gsungs// sangs rgyas kun gyis sam/ 
114b6(rgyud): can 'di// 'dul bar mi 'gyur snod min la// thabs chen khro bo chen po ni// thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig gsan nas// phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// tshig dag
114b7(rgyud): gis ni zhugs gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs// e ma'o gsang ba 'khor lo che// thabs chen bdag nyid chen po ste// chos kyi dbyings ni bstan pa'i dngos// thabs kyi
114b8(rgyud): 'khor lo rab ston pa/ ji skad du ni bka' stsal pa// de bzhin du ni bdag gis bgyi// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// drag po nyid ni bstan par bya// de skad gsungs nas sems dpa' che/ 
115a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// mi gsung bzhugs nas rnal 'byor gyis// drag po nyid la snyoms par zhugs// drag po'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog zhes bya'i ting dzi/ 
115a2(rgyud): de lta bu/ drag po chen po snyoms par zhugs// de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ba// drag po 'jig rung yi ge hUM// khro bo chen po brjod par gyur// rdo rje hUM mdzad khro rgyal po// mgon po thugs
115a3(rgyud): ka nas phyung gyur// sa bzhi ma lus g.yos gyur cing // sa 'di dag ni sgra sgrogs gyur// stong gsum ma lus 'di dag ni// hUM hUM zhes bya brjod par gyur// tshad med gzhal du med pa yi// khro bo
115a4(rgyud): rgyal po byung gyur pas// phyogs rnams kun tu gdug chen da ga/ skad cig de la gtum par gyur// slar yang gci/ gnyid gyur nas ni// gong bur byas nas rab bsdams te/ khro
115a5(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po sku chen po// 'jig su rung ba cig tu gyur/ de ni khro bo'i rgyal po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi grags chen po// khro rgyal mdun du 'dug nas ni// slar yang snying
115a6(rgyud): po rab tu brjod// hUM tA hU t+ya/ 'jig su rung ba'i spu langs byed// gnod sbyin kun bdag gnod sbyin to// rdo rje gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul che// khro bo chen po brjod pa yin// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig
115a7(rgyud): rten 'di// 'bar ba'i phreng po'i 'od kyis khyab// rdo rje me ni drag po che// ma lus gsal zhing me 'bar gyur// phyi rol gyi ni gdug po can// ma lus dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rdo rje me ni rab 'a
115a8(rgyud): pas// g.yo ba med cing shi bar gyur// lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams// gang dag rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gdungs nas// g.yo ba med cing 'bar bar
115b1(rgyud): gyur// de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin che// drag po'i gzugs can rab 'jigs byed// khro gnyer bsnyer ba'i gdong can te// de bzhin gnag dang sngo bar gyur// mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ 
115b2(rgyud): dbu skra gyen brdzes shin tu skrag/ spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa ste// de bzhin rdo rje bstan pa'i zhal// drag po rdo rje drag tshogs 'dzin// gcig pu 'bar ba rab ldan pa// zhags pa lcags kyu rnga
115b3(rgyud): rje bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa// sa rnams ma lus g.yo bar byed// sa 'di yang ni g.yo bar byed// gnod sbyin chen po 'byung po sogs// g.yo ba med cing 'og tu 'gye
115b4(rgyud): doni drag po gnod sbyin che// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jig das par byed// de yi spyan sngar 'dug nas ni// ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod// e ma'o byang chub kyi ni sems// 
115b5(rgyud): kun tu bzang po kun dge ba// sems can 'dul ba'i thab/ su ni// brtse med khro bo nyid du gyur// sngar ni rdo rje sem sa dpa' gang // zhi ba'i gzugasu rnam gnas pa// rdo rje gan// 
115b6(rgyud): sbyin 'dzin gyur nas// rdo rje drag po zhes byar grags// de ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin// 'jigs rung ba spu langs par byed// yi ge hUM bzhi'i phyag rgya yi// snying po gtum po nyid kyang gsungs/ 
115b7(rgyud): oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM phaT// shine tu gtum zhing cher grags pa// de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ste// zhal bzhi dang ni/ 
115b8(rgyud): phyag brgyad pa// bskal pa yi ni mi ltar drag/ rdo rje dus kyi me ltar byung // nyon mongs phyogs ni rab sreg byed// smin ma bskyod pas gtsigs pa'i zhal// de bzhin rnam par 'jigs pa'i
116a1(rgyud): / gdo / 'jig rten gsum sreg dam tshig ste// rdo rje can kun sreg par byed// 'bar phreng kun tu 'khrigs pa'i sgra// rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag/ 
116a2(rgyud): rgya ni// phyag gnyis kyis ni yongasu bzung // rdo rje bsdams pa 'dzin rgyal po// lcags kyu dang ni zhag pas brgyan// rdo rje yi ni lug rgyud// phyag gnyis na bsdams 'jigs rung zhal/ sa/ 
116a3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad sdigs byed pa// rdo rje gtum pas yang dag byung // drag po bka' ni nid par byed// myur ba ru ni bka' stsol cig min ni sangs rgyas khyed rnams kun// the tshom med par
116a4(rgyud): bza' bar bya// de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi gsungs/ 3)hU~M dza hUM shin tu drag/ rigs dang bcas par lnga chen po// stobs chen po yis dgug par gyis// de nas rig pa'i
116a5(rgyud): mchog rgyal po// snyems pa'i tshul gyi bshang byed cing / khro bo drag po rnga sgra sgrogs// rdo rje zhags pa bskul bar bya/ rdo rje zhags pa drag po che// dpung bcas grogs dang
116a6(rgyud): bcas pa dang // de bzhin rigs dang dkyil 'khor bcas// song la dbang phyug chen po khug/ badz+ra pA shahUM// dbang ldan rgyal po chen po ni// sna tshogs rang gi 'khor na gnas/ 'jig
116a7(rgyud): byed ma dang lhan cig tu// 'dod pa can ni mchog tu rol// rdo rje nags pa der seng ste// khro bo'i dgra yis bsdigs par gyur// dbang ldan rgyal po la smras pa// khyod la smon pa stan 'dun/ 
116a8(rgyud): mdzad// skrag cing khros nas lha chen pos// 'jigs pa yin tshig brjod pa// nga ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal po// nga la ston pa gzhan yod dam// rdo rje zhags pas khro bo ches/ tshig ni/ 
116b1(rgyud): lan gsum brjod par gyur// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che// khyod la shin tu spyan 'dren mdzad// lha chen dbang phyug chen po yis// slar yang lan gsum smras pa dang // nga ni kho na rgyal po rang
116b2(rgyud): nga la spyan 'dren gang zhig yod// de nas zhags pas bka' bzhin byed// khro bo drag por rab 'jigs pas// yan lag thams cad bcings nas ni// dbang phyug chen po bkug par gyur// 
116b3(rgyud): 'jigs shing skrag nas lha chen po// shin tu smre sngags 'don cing du// skabs ni gang yang yod ma yin// 'jigs pa chen po kun du byung // stobs dang de bzhin nga rgyal gyis// stobs dang
116b4(rgyud): shugs ni bstan nas// zhags pa bcad nas bris paragyur// rang gi gan su song gyur nas// 'jig rten gsum dgyi lha rnams bos// lha dang lha min dri zar bcas/ 
116b5(rgyud): skad cig gis ni 'dus gyur na// 'khor rnams dag ni du bar gyur// ji ltar sngon gyi ma byas pa'i// de lta bu na yang dag mthong // sems can rab drag 'di su zhig rdo rje
116b6(rgyud): zhags pas 'dun song ste// rdo rje rig pa mchog la zhus// dbang phyug chen pos bdag bcad de// drag po tshangs pa rab tu bros// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// khro bo gtum po shin
116b7(rgyud): tu drag/ de lta bu yi tshig gsan nas// thams cad du ni 'bar bar gyur// khro bo rdo rje lu gu rgyud// drag po yis ni bka' bsgo ba// myur du song la lha chen po// rigs chen po dang bcas
116b8(rgyud): pa khug/ khro bo'i rgyal po lu gu rgyud// gsan nas dbang phyug che gnas song // yan lag thams cad bcings nasu// lha mo dang bcas kun tu bkug/ skad cig 'jigs pas ngu byed cing // 
117a1(rgyud): rnams thams cad shin tu 'jigs// 'jigs pas sdug bsngal smre sngags 'don// di ring 'dran lha chen min// stobs dang shugs ni thams cad kyis// rdo rje kun pa
117a2(rgyud): 'thab par 'gyur// mthu dang stobs dang shugs kyis ni// bcag nas thams cad bros par gyur// lha chen la sogs thams cad ni// phyogs rnams kun tu bros par gyur// mun pa yis ni
117a3(rgyud): kun tu 'khrug/ phyogs rnams kun tu 'jigs par 'gyur// khro bo lu gu rgyud 'ongs nas// rnam pa kun tu smra bar byed// ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// bdag cag nas ni bros par gyur// khro
117a4(rgyud): bo rdo rje rig pa mchog/ slar yang shin tu khros par gyur// / 'bar ba'i phreng bas rab 'bar zhing // rdo rje drag po nyid rgyu/ dar// drag po ha ha zhes bzhad dgod// rang gi yan lag za bar byed
117a5(rgyud): rang gi mgo la rdeg byed cing // rdo rje gsor ba bskor bar 'bar// de lta bu yi khyad par dang / bcas pas khro bo yang gtu slar yang rang gi bdag nyid dran// khro bo'i rgyal po brjod par
117a6(rgyud): gyur// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho b+ha ga ban badz+ra hUM phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po bcas nas ni// yi ge dza ni yongasu brjod// rdo rje lcags kyur rab tu bsngags// 
117a7(rgyud): stobs dang ldan pa khug le shog/ oM badz+ri dz+wa la ag+ni sa triSha/ oM ku sha dza dza// rdo rje 'bar ba lcags kyu ni// song nas phyogs kun bdag nyid che// skad cig gis ni stobs chen rnams// lha rnam
117a8(rgyud): thams cad bkug par gyur// rgyal po dbang phyug lnga dang ni// lha rnams thams cad grangs med par// rigs bcas dpung dang bcas pa nyid// gcig nyid du ni bsdus par gyur// rdo rje lcags
117b1(rgyud): sgrogs rab tu mngags// chings shig stobs chen dang ldan pa// tshogs dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kun// bcing ba lnga yis bcing bar gyur// nang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs// lha tshogs
117b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin srin po dang // lha min rlung dang 'byung po'i tshogs// gzhan yang gdug pa'i tsho gas rnams ni// thams cad bcing bar gyur nas ni/ rdo rje bzhags pa rab tu mngags// rdo rje lcags kyu dang
117b3(rgyud): bcas par// song la dkyil 'khor dag khug shig/ rdo rje zhags pas mngon chags pas// yan lag kun las yongasu spro// rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhags pa ste// brtan par gyur par the tshom
117b4(rgyud): med// bye ba dag ni grangs med bcu// rdo rje lcags kyuratu byung // lha la sogs pa'i re re zhing // spyi bo nas 'a/ dgas yang dag spyor// lha chen dbang phyug chen po yi// spyi bo'i
117b5(rgyud): gtsug tu btab nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po yis dbang phyug chen po 'gug par byed// lha sogs 'khor da nga bcas pa kun// phan tshun du ni ngu bar byed// shugs
117b6(rgyud): rings kun tu phyung nas ni// phan tshun du ni smra bar byed// kye ma'o sdug bsngal kye ma'o shi/ tshogs kyi gang du khyer bar gyur// rdo rje 'bar ba chen po des// skad cig de la bsregs gyur nas// 
117b7(rgyud): / rirab ri yi rtse mo ru// lha la sogs pa thams cad bkug/ gnas da ru ni thams cad dag/ yongasu bskor nas kun tu gnas// rdo rje kha khyer phyi rol tu// lha rnams de dag thams cad gnas// rdo rje/ 
117b8(rgyud): raba'i phyi rol du// lha la sogs pa thams cad bkug/ phyi rol rdo rje ra ba ni// lcags bsregs rang bzhin rdo rje mtshungs// rdo rje can gyi rdor 'bar mes// nang nas shin tu gdungs pa/ 
118a1(rgyud): / 'gyur// lnga tshogs sems can de dag kyang // 'jig su rung ba'i 'dod 'bod// stong gsum 'di dag thams cad kyang // hUM hA smra ni yongasu brjod// 'odong bos nas smra bar bya
118a2(rgyud): ngan song dag ni ci zhig byed// sngon ma mthong ba 'di ci zhig/ 'dir ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin par rgyal po de// slar yang thugs rje kun tu skyes// thams cad bcings pa las bkron
118a3(rgyud): te// rdo rje me yi nye bar mdzes// rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/ rang gi dkyil 'khor nas phyung ste/ lha la sogs pa kun pos te/ nga yi tshig 'di rab tu nyon// de nas lha rgyal la sogs pa// khyod ni su
118a4(rgyud): yin smra bar byed// nged kyis khyod ni sder ma mthong // ga nas mchog 'di yang sngar ma mthong // rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/ ha ha zhes dgod bzhad pa yis// smras pa rdo rje gan
118a5(rgyud): sbyin de// thams cad za byed bzod dka' ba// de nas lha chen gyis smras pa// rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes/ nga sa khyod ni sngar ma mthong // bdag nyid kho na rang byung gA/ rdo
118a6(rgyud): drag pos rab smras pa// nga yi bka' las myur gnas gyis// min na rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis// rang gi rigs ni sreg par byed// lha chen po yis tshig smras pa/ bstan pa la ni nga mi gnas/ 'jig / 
118a7(rgyud): gsum gyi dbang phyug nga// su yi bstan pa la gnas pa// 'khor dang bcas pa'i stobs gang yin// de ring nga yis bstan par bya// khyod la stobs ni ci yod pa// stobs chen ldan par bstan par
118a8(rgyud): gyis// dbang phyug chen po rgyal po che// 'byung po'i tshogs bcas lhan cig tu// tshig dag smras par gyur pa ni// drag po nyid ni bstan par bya// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ 'od zer 'bar
118b1(rgyud): ba'i phreng bas khyab// ha ha zhes bya shin tu drag/ dbang phyug chen pos bstan par bya// oM shU la a tri shU la ma hA sa ha sra shU la A yu d+he// rtse gsum mngag gzhug rgyal po ni// stong phrag gcig
118b2(rgyud): ni 'byung bar gyur// rtse bcas kun tu 'bar ba yis// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thob// nA rA ya nes smras pa// oM ma hA sa ha sra tsikra a yu d+he// khyadab 'jug gis ni de dag smras// 'khor lo gcig tu
118b3(rgyud): rnam pa stong // thams cad 'od zer 'bar bas khyab/ rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// brgya byin gyis smras pa// oM ma hA sa ha sra badz+ra A yu d+hi// rdo rje stong ni byung bar gyur// rdo rje 'bar ba tshabs khyab/ 
118b4(rgyud): brgya byin gyis ni smras pa yin// rdo rje can dang lhan cig/ thab// gzhon nus smras pa// oM ma hA sa ha sra shAkya a yu d+he/ gzhon nus de skad smras nas ni// mdung ni rtse gsum
118b5(rgyud): stong byung gyur// sgra ni drag po sgrogs byed cing // rdo rje ca na dang lhan cig 'i thag tshangs pas smras pa// oM ma hA sa ha sra daN+Da A yu d+he// tshangs pas de skad smras nas ni// dbyug
118b6(rgyud): to stong ni byung gyur nas// mtshon cha drag po 'jig byed pas// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// gzhan yang lhag ma ma lus pa// rnams kyis yang ni mtshon cha dag/ ra re stong phrag gcig
118b7(rgyud): gyur nas// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// tha na sprul pa gang yin dang // phyi rol gyi ni dam ldan pa// de rnams nges par stong gyur nas// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// me yang kun tu 'bar
118b8(rgyud): gyur cing // 'jigs par byed pa'i rlung yang byung // 'brug gi sgra dang glog chen pos// khyab par srid gsum gnas par gyur/ ha la ha li'i sgra chen po// na mkha'i bar snang la ni drag rdo rje drag po
119a1(rgyud): / tshogs chen po// lha rnams thams cad 'thab par byed// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// gtum po drag po 'jig byed pas// lha yi lan gyi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje yi ni snying po gsungs// 
119a2(rgyud): oM ma hA sa ha ra badz+ra tsakre/ oM ma hA badz+ra shU le/ oM dip+ta dz+wa la ag+ni badz+ra/ oM badz+ra shak+Sho/ oM ma hA badz+ra ni dI// de lta bu'i rnam pa ru// snying po dag ni stong phrag gcig/ srid gsum zhi
119a3(rgyud): bar bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'chang ni chen pos phyung // gtum po 'od zer 'bar bas khyab// rdo rje me dang yang dag ldan// drag po'i snying po las byung gyur// rdo rje 'chang ni dbus na bzhugs// lha tshogs
119a4(rgyud): phyag rgya de dag ni// rnam par bshig cing dum bur byas// / bcom zhing bsdams te bsreg nas ni// phyogs rnam sa kun tu thim par gyur// rdo rje me yi rab bsdams pas// 
119a5(rgyud): lho yi rgyal po 'bar bar gyur// 'og nas sa ni rab tu' bar// steng nas me ni shin tu gdungs// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches// dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa// lus srul pa
119a6(rgyud): ni drag po che// nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// dur khrod gnas la rab tu dga'// lus la thal ba dag gis byugs// mi yi sha ni za bar byed// nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// khrag rlon gyi ni
119a7(rgyud): rab tu bskus// lpags pa rlon pa gosu gyon// lha rnams thams cad khyod kyi 'khor// nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// gdug pa drag chen mtshan mo rgyu ba slongs mo ba// khrag la spangs pa'i lpan
119a8(rgyud): can lus la thal bas byugs// nga yi bka' nyon drag po'i sems ldan lus srul po// min na bskal pa'i me yis rtsa bzhin khyod bsreg bya// ro bsregs thal ba'i phung po bzhin du thal
119b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur// bskal pa'i me chen dang mtshungs pas ni rab 'jigs 'gyur// rigs bcas dpung ldan dkyil 'khor dang bcas gnod sbyin drag/ rdo rje drag po yis ni rab gzhom gzhig pa
119b2(rgyud): bya// dbang phyug chen pos smras pa// nga ni ma lus dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur// 'jig rten gsum gyi lha tshogs ma lus pa yi 'khor// shin tu drag cing rnam gtsigs
119b3(rgyud): 'jig rten khyod yin yang // khyod kyi nga yi bka' ni gnyan par gyis// gdug dang sangs rgyas mang po'i 'khor ni sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas nga yis sprul// zhi zhing de la rnam 'dul
119b4(rgyud): gsang ba dri mod nyon mongs med pa'i pha rol phyin// de 'a dadra'i mgon po dga' ba dus gsum bzhugs pa thams cad ngas dbang bskur// slar yang nga yis 'byung po'i tshig nyon
119b5(rgyud): zhes pa'i tshig ni 'di lta bu// de nas rgyal po rdo rje'i na// 'dul ba'i don la shin tu mkhas// khro bog/ dug pa gtu mchen po// rab 'bar khro bo'i rgyal po ni// 
119b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i byin rlabs phyag rgya las// bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs nas sems dpa' ches// rang rig khro bo las byung ba// gdug pa rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// khro bar
119b7(rgyud): chos kyi tshul bzung nas// rkang pa nas brtsams spyi bo'i bar// lus kun las ni rnam par phyung // oM badz+ra kro d+ha u b+hi Sha hUM// rdo rje'i gtsug tor khro bo che// 'bar ba'i spyi bo nas phyung
119b8(rgyud): nas// sa rnams thams cad g.yo byed cing // khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad 'joms// oM badz+ra b+h+ri ku Ti kro d+ha hUM// khro bo'i rgyal po khro gnyer can// mdzod spu nas ni rab tu byung // 'jigs
120a1(rgyud): / byed drag po yang dag ldan// lus rnams thams cad 'bar 'gyur ba// oM ni sum+b+ha badz+ra hUM// rdo rje rigs pa mchog rgyal po// kha las rab tu byung bar gyur// spyi bo nas ba
120a2(rgyud): rkang mthil bar// rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan// Tak+ki hUM dzaM/ thugs kyi khro bo rgyal po che// thugs ka nas ni rab tu byung // 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku// 'jig su rung ba spu langs byed// oM baH
120a3(rgyud): oM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya hU~M// rdo rje lcags kyu khro bo che// phrag pa g.yas nas rab tu byung // rdo rje lcags kyu gsor byed cing // rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan// oM badz+ra pa sha kro d+ha A kaD+D+h+ya hUM phaT// rdo rje
120a4(rgyud): zhags pa khro bo che// phrag pa g.yon nas rab tu phyung // rdo rje da'abar yang dag ldan// rdo rje zhags pas bskor bar byed// oM badz+ra kI li kro d+ha hUM phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu thog
120a5(rgyud): lte ba'i dbus nas rab tu phyung // kun nas 'bar ba yang de ga ldan// blo mchog rdo rje gnod sbyin mtshungs/ oM ba~Mn+da me khA la kro d+ha hUM// khro bo chen po ske rags ni// rkang pa'i
120a6(rgyud): / rdorje rab tu phyung // kun nas 'bar bar yang dag ldan// phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig ldan// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ba la hUM// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po stobs// dpung pa g.yas nas rab tu phyung // rdo rje 'bar
120a7(rgyud): pabs 'bar bar gyur// me yis shin tu nga rgyal gyur// oM badz+ra pA la ya kro d+ha hUM// khro bo'i rgyal po gdu bu ni// dpung pa g.yon las yang dag byung // gsang zhing rdo rje 'bar bas phyag/ rdo rje khro bo
120a8(rgyud): rab tu khengs// oM sa ma ya badz+ra kro d+ha hUM hUM phaT// dam tshig khro bo'i rgyal po ni// de bzhin khro bo'i gnod byed pa// khu tshur g.yas nas rab tu byung // kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan// oM badz+ra/ 
120b1(rgyud): muSh+Ti kro d+ha hUM phaT/ khro bo khu tshur drag po che// khu tshur g.yon las rab tu byung // rdo rje 'bar ba dag gis gsal// rdo rje me yis rab tu brgyan// oM badz+ra ban d+ha kro d+ha hUM sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra
120b2(rgyud): any+dzi li ban+da d+hi kro d+ha hUM sa ma ya hU~M// rdo rje 'ching ba rgyal po che// de bzhin rdo rje ser mo nyid// khro bo lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi// sor mo dag las yang dag byung // oM badz+ra na kha hUM/ oM badz+ra
120b3(rgyud): krod+ha aM ku li ma hA kr-i d+hI hUM// rdo rje sder mi khro bo che// de bzhin rdo rje sder mo'i gdod// phyag ni g.yon dang g.yas pa yi// sor mo dag las rab tu byung // oM badz+ra ko mA ra kro d+ha ki ha~M rA ga ts+tsha/ 
120b4(rgyud): oM badz+ra ku mA ra kro d+ha mu d+ha d+hi ka hU~M phaT// khro bo'i rgyal po rked pa dang // de bzhin khro bo spyi btsugs dag/ rgyal po dani g.yon pa dang // g.yas pa dag las rab tu byung // oM shrI
120b5(rgyud): le ma hA kro d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro dA a sha ban d+ha hUM// gnam lcags rdo rje lu gu rgyud// khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// rgyal po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab// dbus
120b6(rgyud): mo'i lha de dag las byung // oM badz+ra ban d+ha kro d+ha ha ma hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha aM ku sha hUM phaT// rdo rje dbyig pa khro bo che// rdo rje yi ni yan lag drangs// 'bar ba dang bcas gnod sbyin gnyis// rje ngar/ 
120b7(rgyud): dag las rab tu phyung // oM b+hu d+ha ba kro d+ha hUM// oM d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha ma g+ha be ga a na ya hUM phaT// de nas dka' thub khro bo che// de bzhin rdo rje don yod nyid// rgyal po shugs chen gnyis po ni// gdong gi
120b8(rgyud): mchu las rab tu byung // oM badz+ra ban d+ha ha la kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pa ta la mA ra ya kro d+ha hUM phaT// rkang pa khro bo shugs chen po// de bzhin mthil gyi khro bo nyid// 'bar ba 'phro ba lhur len pa/ 
121a1(rgyud): / gnyis po zhabs kyi mthil las byung // de dag la sogs rgyal po ni// dpag tu med par rab tu byung // gang ga'i bye snyed grangs med par// phra rab rdul gyi khams dag ni// ba spu'i
121a2(rgyud): gseb ni thams cad dang // lus kyi gseng ni thams cad nas// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che// rang gi snying po las byung gyur// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs spro te// slar
121a3(rgyud): yang gcig tu gyur nas ni// dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag gnas// sangs rgyas kun tu spyan sngar 'dus// ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po// e ma'o ye shes
121a4(rgyud): shin tu bzang // sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// theg pa chen po zhes byar bshad/ e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni// dpag tu med pa zhes byar gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi
121a5(rgyud): bo 'di// thams cad rdo rje rigasu bshad// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen po// de nas de yi gsang ba'i mtshan// thams cad rdo rje'i
121a6(rgyud): su bshad// khro bo che las yang dag byung // rdo rje khro bo'i dbang phyug bshad// rdo rje gtsug tor rdor 'dzin sku// gnod mdzes bdag cag stobs po che// thugs kyi khro bo rgyal po che// rgyal pos
121a7(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba dang // rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje nags// rked pa'i khro bo stobs po che// de rags stobs ldan nyid dang ni// lag gdub de bzhin dmachog dang // rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje bsdams
121a8(rgyud): rdo rje sor mo shin tu drag rdo rje sen mo rdo rje gdong // de bzhin rked pa khro rgyal po// khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po lugu rgyud// rdo rje gnam lcags rdo rje dbyig rdo rje khro ba yin/ 
121b1(rgyud): lag drag/ rdo rje dka' thub rdor don yod// rdo rje zhags dang de bzhin mthil// dam tshig rdo rje rgyal po 'di// rdo rje yi ni rigasu bshad// de dag la sogs rgyal po ni// rgyal po chen po rdzu 'phrul/ 
121b2(rgyud): che// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // rtag tu gzhan yang grang med pa// khros pas rang gi sha za zhing // 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab par gnas// bskal pa yi ni me ltar 'bar// rdo rje khro bas
121b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje rigs ni bskyed nas kyang // rab tu drug 'dzin bka' bsgom pas// gdug pa rnams ni 'dul bar gyis// nga yi bka' yang mnyan par gyis// rdo rje can kun rang nyid kyi
121b4(rgyud): bka' thob nas ni bzung bya ste// lha rnams kun gyi gsung ga ngag gis// reg pa 'di ni brjod par gyur// oM ni sud+ha badz+ra hUM phaT// rdo rje khro ba stobs po che// gtsug tor la
121b5(rgyud): sogs kun gsungs pa// lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams// / 'og tu kha ltas 'gyel bar gyur// rdo rje khro bo stobs po che// lha rnams rgyal bar gyur nas ni// rdo rje 'bar ba 'ab
121b6(rgyud): zhes pas// snying po dag ni yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra an la ngaha pa tsam pa bAny+dza ra Na hUM phaT// khrobo chen po rdo rje'i me// skad cig de las byung nas ni// lha rnams de dag bsregs nas kya
121b7(rgyud): de bzhin 'og tu sbrel bar gyur// rdo rje mas ni rab tu sreg/ rdo rje 'bar bas 'bar bar gyur// tshig cing bcos par gyur nas ni// lha la sogs pa 'dod 'bod// rdo rje khro chen de rnams de/ 
121b8(rgyud): de bzhin khro tshan la sogs pas/ thams cad gsung cog byas nas ni// slar yang snying po gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra a be shas// rdo rje dbab pa'i khro ba che// rdo rje can gyi thugs las/ 
122a1(rgyud): / byung // lha rnams kun gyi gnas song nas// de bzhin lha chen la sogs pa// lha rnams kun la yang dag babs// rdo rje dbab par rab sdug bsngal// babs nas rang gi yan lag
122a2(rgyud): dang // gcig la gcig ni za bar byed// rdo rje can dang bcas pa kun// rdo rje zhags pa yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra dz+wa la ag+ni/ pra dip+ta ma hA badz+ra aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya hUM// rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal
122a3(rgyud): song nas// skad gcig gis ni yang dag 'gug/ lha rnams thams cad bkug nas ni// spyi bo ru ni ltung bar byed// rdo rje lcags kyi yang dag 'gugs// rdo rje zhags pas drangs par gyur// 
122a4(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar bas rab bsregs nas// steng du rkang pa 'og tu ma dgo/ ha ha zhes ni sgrogs byed cing // 'jigs pa'i skad cig sdug bsngal gyur// rdo rje can la gsol ba 'dzin
122a5(rgyud): stobs chen gzhom par ma mdzad cig/ de bzhin lha laso// gas pa kun// dkyil 'khor du ni dgug par gyur// rdo rje can dang bcas kun gyis// rdo rje lcags sgrog yang
122a6(rgyud): dag brjod// oM badz+ra phaT ban d+ha hUM phaT// lha tshogs gdugs pa de dag ni// 'ching ba lnga yis bcings par gyur// rdo rje lcogs sgrog khro bo che// 'ching ba bstan pa bcings par gyur// 
122a7(rgyud): khro bo rdo rje rgyal po che// shin tu gtum pa stobs po che// slar yang snying po yang dag dran// rang gi snying po yang dag brjod// hUM snying po drag po brjod pa yis// gdug pa de rnams rab tu
122a8(rgyud): 'gyel// g.yo med shi ba bzhin du gyur// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar thob// de nas rgyal po rnam snang mdzad// tshes kun dbang phyug dbang dang ldan/ rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che// rdo rje cha
122b1(rgyud): la bos par gyur// sems dpa' chen po mnyan par gyis// 'di rnams sems can rang 'jigs byed// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di// srog ni gzhom par mi bya zhig/ de nas rgyas
122b2(rgyud): po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje kun bdag dbang ldan pas// sangs rgyas gsung ni thos nasu// rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra uta tiSh+Tha// rdo rje slong ba rdzu 'phrul che// de ni brjod pa tsam
122b3(rgyud): gyis ni// lha la sogs pa thams cad ni// slar yang gson pa nyid du gyur// sdug bsngal kun dang rab tu bral// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar gyur// rdo rje sgreng ba'i byams pa yis// sangs
122b4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas// de nas lha la sogs pa kun// sangs rgyas byams pas langs par gyur// thal mo sbyar nas tshig gcig gis// bcom ldan 'das
122b5(rgyud): la zhus gyur pa// bcom ldan nyes pa gang gi ni// bdagacag 'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad// sangs rgyas thug/ sa rje can kun gyis// bdag cag yongasu bskyab tu gsol
122b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyed cag yongasu bskyab pa dang // phan gdags par ni ngas mi nus// 'di ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag por bshad// 
122b7(rgyud): de rnams kyis gsol pa// khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don// ji ltar rung lags mi 'tshal lo// gang zhig sangs rgyas bdag por gyur// sangs rgyas 'phags pa ji lta bu/ 
122b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub gang // de ni rdo rje can du gyur// byang chub sems gong de rdo rje// rdo rje gang yin drag po 'dzin// de rnams kyis
123a1(rgyud): gsol pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu zhi// de ni byang chub de dang mtshungs// brtse dang byang chub sems las byung // de 'dra'i drag pog las byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
123a2(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// 'di ni thabs kyis 'dul ba ste// gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje khro bo
123a3(rgyud): bdag chen pos// lha tshogs kun la bos nas ni// dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa// nga yis bstan pa'i bka' dag ni// kye bdug padag mnyan par gyis// min na rdo rje 'bar ba yis// rigs dang ba
123a4(rgyud): pang yis bsreg / khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams kyis// tshig gcig tu ni 'di skad zhus// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po de bzhin bgyi// de nas lha chen
123a5(rgyud): gyis smras pa// rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes// nga ni rang nyid rgyal po ste// nga yis bka' ni mnyan par gyis// lha na na po yi tshig gsan nas// rdo rje khro bo rab 'bar bas// rdo rje
123a6(rgyud): gnod sbyin 'joms zhes pa// khro bo'i rgyal po yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra ni sum+b+ha hUM// shin tu gtum pa stobs chen po// khro bo 'di ni brjod pa yis// dbang phyug chen po brgyal gyur nas/ 
123a7(rgyud): de bzhin sa la 'gyel bar gyur// g.yo med 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur// shing 'gyel bzhin du gnas par gyur// 'gul ba med cing g.yo ba med// rdo rje khro bos gdungs par gyur// bcom ldan 'a
123a8(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje khro bo thams cad mkhyen// bdag nyid chen po 'di yis ni// srog gi rgyu ni zad pa dang // de nyid nyams par ci phyir byed// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas thugs
123b1(rgyud): rjes bskul ba yin// rdo rje tshe zhes bya ba ste// rdo rje rigs pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra a yur rig pa 'di ni brjod pa yis// dbang phyug chen pos yang dag langs// rdo rje tshe yis gson byas nas/ 
123b2(rgyud): bde ba chen po thob par gyur// rnam par snang mdzad thub chen la// zhabs dag la ni btud nas gsol// dgon po bcom ldan skyabasu gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pa de gdug min// kun mkhyen bcom
123b3(rgyud): ldan dka' stsal pa// nga yis brtse bar bya mi nus// 'di ni gdug pa shin tu drag/ de nyid la ni skyabs song // rdo rje khro bos lce chen po// kun tu bos nas 'di skad smras// nga yis bstan pa'i ba/ 
123b4(rgyud): dgra ni// gdug pa chen po mnyan par gyis// rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag chen la// lnga chen po yis sgyur smras pa// dab chen po bzod nus kyi// khyod kyi bka' la gnas mi byed// 
123b5(rgyud): rdorje khro bo drag po che// khros pas gdug pa 'phel gyur na // tsun shin tu 'jigs byed pa// snying po dreg po brjod par gyur// hU~M l-ig tu ni brjod pa yis// dbang drug chen ma
123b6(rgyud): slar yang 'gyel// rdo rje khro bo drag po che// rkang par dkrug pa yang dag brjod// oM pA ta A kaR+Sha Na badz+ra hUM// de nas rdo rje dbang po 'di// brjod pas rdo rje khro bo phyung // tshig ni 'di skad brjod par
123b7(rgyud): 'gyur// bka' stsol brjod cig 'od chen po// rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa// oM pa ta A kaR+Sha ya sarbe badz+ra d+had+hA ra ke tsa ra phaT badz+ra d+hadz+ra// khro ba chen pos 'di gsungs nas// dbang phyug che
123b8(rgyud): po su mar bcas// rkang pas 'gug pa'i rdo rje yis// rdo rje dang bdag gis bkug/ rdo rje khro bo de dag 'gug/ steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo// 'jig rten thams cad dgod gyur cing / rdo rje gdung / 
124a1(rgyud): / bas gdungs par gyur// de nas rgyas po rdo rje 'dzin// dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas// zhabs kyis mnan nas rdo rje yis// dbang phyug chen po rdeg par byed// des ni rkang pa
124a2(rgyud): g.yon pa yis// dbang phyug chen po mnan byas nas// g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi// nu ma dag gi bar du btsir// rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni// dbang phyug chen po rab tu mnan
124a3(rgyud): oM badz+ra a kra ma ho// slar yang dbab pa'i rig pa ni// rdo rje khro bos yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra a be sha ha na hi na traT// dbang phyug chen po babs gyur pas// rang gi lag pas lan stong
124a4(rgyud): du// rang gdong 'jig su rung la brdeg/ stong phrag cig/ tu yang dag gyur// 'jig rten gsum gnas thams/ cad ni// 'dod chen po 'bod par gyur// bdag cag gis
124a5(rgyud): ni rgyal po 'di// 'di lta bu yi bdag nyid gyur// de nas rgya la po rdo rje 'dzin// brtse dang snying rje skyes par gyur// snying rje steng du gzhug bya ste// sangs rgyas byams pa yang dag brjod/ 
124a6(rgyud): oM bud+d+ha mai tri rak+Sha// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gtso bos// de nas sngags 'di gsungs pa yis// dbang phyug chen po'i sdug bsngal de// skad cig de la nye bar zhi// phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs dag gis// reg
124a7(rgyud): pas dbang phyug chen pos ni// sa chen po ni yang dag 'thob// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs de bzhin// tha mal pa yi lus bor nas// rdo rje 'dzin la phul bar gyur// lha chen 'di nas shi 'phos
124a8(rgyud): nas// sha bzhin lus ni bor nas su// gang gA sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi// bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam// thal bas g.yogs pa'i gnas zhes pa// sangs rgyas zhing ni yid 'ong ba// de ru song / 
124b1(rgyud): nas lha chen po// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang bstan par gyur// thal ba'i dbang phyug sgra dbyangs can// de bzhin gshegs pa der gnas gyur// de nas shi ba'i lus de yis// ched du brjod
124b2(rgyud): pa yang dag brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni// tshigs bcad gcig ni mngon par brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// bsad nas skad
124b3(rgyud): cig dag gis ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas dgod mdzad// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches// dbang phyug chen po yang dag phyung // khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams la// kun tu bos nas 'di gsu/ 
124b4(rgyud): pa// rab mchog dkyil 'khor 'di ru ri// gtso bo rab tu gzhugs par gyis// gal te de bzhin mi byed na// dab phyag chen po bzhin du bya// de nas lha kun 'jigs gyur te// 
124b5(rgyud): skrag nas thams cad kyis zhus pa// de bzhin du ni dgyid par 'tshal// bdag cag khyed kyi bran du gyur// rgyal po khyed kyi dam tshig ni// ji ltar sgrub par mi bgyid lags
124b6(rgyud): bdag cag rnams ni khyod kyi'i khor// skal ba chen po bka' stsol cig/ rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// srub su rab tu 'gro bar gyis// byang sems
124b7(rgyud): yang dag bskyed nas ni// sems can kun la yang dag sbyor// srog gcod pa ni spang bar gyis// rku dang brdzun du smra ba dang // gzhan gyi chung mde bzhin du// de ni dang por spang bar gyis// 
124b8(rgyud): sems can gnod dang ldan pa ni// ci nas kyang ni mi bya'aM// byang chub spyod par basbyor ba// de la lcid min btsun par bya// nga yi bstan pa'i bka' yin// 'di dag ma tshag yang dag brjod/ 
125a1(rgyud): nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis// min na khyod ni kun tu bsregs// de nas 'jig rten gsum 'khor los// de nas tshig ni blangs nas kyang // byang sems yang dag
125a2(rgyud): bskyed nas ni// dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu song // rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches// kun tu phyag rgya byin nas kyang // phyag rgya'i snying po 'di yis ni// rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi// dkyil 'khor du/ 
125a3(rgyud): ni bcug gyur pas// oM badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sa ma ye/ badz+ra satwa sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya dza/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ a pra ti ha ro me b+ha ba sarba karma su tsa me tsiH
125a4(rgyud): shre ya/ ku ru ha ha ha ha hUM// de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni// / phyag rgya kun tu babs par gyur// rdo rje ti rin tir yi// phyag rgya kun tu bstan par gyur// de dag rim bzhin bcu
