125a5(rgyud): nas ni// rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje mtshan ma/ lag byin nas// rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur gyur// de/ la lha rnams thams cad ni// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur
125a6(rgyud): 'gyur// sngon la 'jig rten gsum bdag po// go rims bzhon du dbang bskur 'gyur// khyadab 'jug zhes byar gnas par na// sgyu ma'i rdo rje zhes byar grags// gzhon nu rdo rje dril gyi
125a7(rgyud): ste// tshangs pa rdo rje thub pa nyid// dbang po rdo rje mtshon cha nyid// de dag rig pa'i bdag por bshad// rgyal po bzhi po gzi brjid che// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs chen pos// bar sna
125a8(rgyud): la ni rgyu ba nyid// rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur gyur// nyi ma rdo rje 'khyil pa ste// de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'od// dbyig chen rdo rje dbyig to ste/ ser spyi rdo rje ser skya yin// de la sogs pa khri
125b1(rgyud): rgyal po// rdo rje khro bor dbang bskur gyur// de nas mkha' spyod lnga rnams ni// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur gyur// myos chen rdo rje mos pa ste// rdo rje phreng ba sbrang rtsi byed// rnam par rgyal dang / 
125b2(rgyud): rgyal byed dang // rdo rje shis dang rgyal bar ldan// tshogs kyi rgyal po bdag po dag/ zhes bya la sogs dbang bskur gyur// de nas sa la gnas pa rnams// rdo rje'i ming gis dbang
125b3(rgyud): bskur gyur// gtun shing mdzod ni srung ba ste// me ni de bzhin rdo rje me// rdo rje rlung ni rlung chen po// rdo rje 'jigs byed ngan rdo rje// de 'dra la sogs pho nya rnams// rdo rje mchog gi dbang bsku
125b4(rgyud): gyur// de nas sa rig gnas pa ni// rdo rje lcags kyu rkang de zab// de bzhin gshin rje rdo rje gnag/ sa yig/ cug ni bgegs rdo rje// chu lha mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/ 
125b5(rgyud): de nas lha mo ji bzhin du// go rims bzhin du dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur gyis// yum gyi mamo ga rnams dbang bskur gyur// khyab 'jug ma ni rdo rjegs
125b6(rgyud): drug ldan rdo rje gzhon nu ma// tshangs pa rdo rje brgyud cu me// dbang po rdo rje khu tshur ma// gsod byed rdo rje gsod byed ma// snar ma rdo rje 'od ldan ma// de las dbyibs pa rdor mchog ma// 
125b7(rgyud): 'phrog ma rdo rje ske rags te// gsod byed rdo rje 'jig ma ste// gnam lcags rdo rje gnam lcags ma// nam gru rdo rje dbang ldan ma// gos can rdo rje gos can ma// rdo rje po nya zhib ma/ 
125b8(rgyud): rlung lnga rdo rje shugs sanam/ lus nganam ni rdo rje gdengs// me lnga de bzhin rdo rje 'bar// phag mo rdo rje gdong can ma// rdo rje nag mo tsA muN+Di// chu lha rdo rje chu srin ma/ sna tshangam/ 
126a1(rgyud): ni sbrul mo ste// de 'dra la sogs grangs med pa// lha mo rnams ni dbang bskur gyur// rang rang rigs ni rtogs nas su// ji bzhin lha yi bdag por bshad// 
126a2(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya bcing ba byin// de bzhin dam tshig snying po'o// lha rnams kun gyi bdag po kun// bkug nas de bzhin dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas// sdig mdzub dang ni
126a3(rgyud): lcags kyu bcings// 'ching ba dang ni grol byed par// dngos po bya ba'i don sems dpa'// de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni// bya ba sgrub phyir gnas par gyis// khyod kyi srog ni nyams gyur pa'i// 
126a4(rgyud): de bzhin dam tshig sbyin mi bya// rgya cher phyag rgya chen por da ni// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor de sbyor byed pa// de nyid zhes bya bstan pa yis// dkyil 'khor
126a5(rgyud): mchog rnams de dag dang // de bzhin lha la sogs pa ku/ na// bkug cing rab tu bcug par gyur// rdo rje can gyi/ sa dbang byas nas// rdo rje thams cad dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje
126a6(rgyud): ming gis mtshan par byas// lha chen po ni gcig pu nyid// zhabs kyi 'og tu brtabs nas bzhag/ 'jig rten 'dug pa cher gyur pa// gdug pa'i snying po zhes byar grags// gdug pA/ 
126a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rgyal po yi// sems can 'ongs par the tshom med// thang cig tshes grangs re re ma// gang du zla gcig dkyil 'khor du// sems can stong phrag brgya dag ni// skad cig de la
126a8(rgyud): sdug bsngal byed// yid ni nye bar mjal bar byed// mdangs ni nye bar 'phrog pa'i nad// mi yi skye bo gsod pa dang // tha na dug chen nyid dang ni// grong khyer dang ni grong rdal dang / grong dag
126b1(rgyud): 'joms par byed pa dag/ sems can rnams ni gcod byed dang // skye bo stong pa sbyor byed dang // de ltar drag cing 'jig su rung // brtse ba med cing sdig byed dang // gsod pa dang ni 'joms/ 
126b2(rgyud): par byed// shes rab 'phrog par byed pa dang // drag po sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin pa// dud 'gro'i 'gro ba'i bar dang ni// sems can rnams la gnod byed dang // myur du mdangs ni 'phrog pa
126b3(rgyud): dang // lo nyes thog dang char dang ni// char ni mi 'bab byed pa dang // grang dang dro ba'i gdung ba dag/ skad cig de la skyed pa dang // gdon ni 'bab par byed pa dang // de bzhin gdung mchog
126b4(rgyud): bskyed pa dang // sems ni rnam par g.yeng byed dang / de 'dri gnod sbyin mtha' yas dang // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dkon mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ste// skye dgu
126b5(rgyud): sna tshogs nad kyis btab// ye shes kyi ni spyan gyis gzigs// dam tshig sdang ba'i sems can dang / yams dang de bzhin nye bar 'tshe// rims dang gdon dang
126b6(rgyud): dug drag po// skye dgu 'di rnams 'joms par byed// sna tshogs sdug bsngal kun tu 'khrugs// 'jigs pa sna tshogs dag gis khyab// thams cad nyams shing zil gyis non// 
126b7(rgyud): sdug bsngal drag pos sdug bsngal gyur// slar yang bde bar bya ba'i phyir// neg po'i sngags ni yongasu bzung // mkha' 'grom mo rnal 'byor mas// 'gro ba'i don ni kun tu khyaba'im/ 
126b8(rgyud): dang gdon dang 'byung po dang // mkha' 'grom mo 'byung po dang // gdug pa rnams kyis kun tu khyab// 'jig rten sdug bsngal snod 'di ni// gzigs nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bas// thugs / 
127a1(rgyud): // dag ni bskyed par gyur// kye ma'o sems can 'di sdug bsngal// de la rjes brje byed med// nga ni kho na rang byung ste// de bzhin sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog/ nga la log par
127a2(rgyud): rtog pa ste// skye dgu de la brtse ba med// dbang phyug chen po gang yin dang // gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed// yang dag byang chub rang byung gyur// skye dgu ma lus bskyab par bya// thams cad
127a3(rgyud): dag ni dgug bya zhing // de bzhin dam tshig bsrung bar bya// gnod dang phan pa byas nas ni// skye dgu 'di dag rnam par grol// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor skyob dang phan 'dogs pa/ 
127a4(rgyud): zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// sems dpa' chen po snyom/ rnas par zhugs// mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun/ 'di ltar bka' ni nod par byed// de nas sangs rgyas thams
127a5(rgyud): cad kyi// de bzhin snying po phyung ba gyur// oM badz+ra sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas bka' ni bzung nas kyang // phyi rol dkyil 'khor dgug
127a6(rgyud): pa'i phyir// lcags kyu'i snying po rab tu phyung // oM ba dz+ra sa ma ya A kiR+Sha ya sarba maN+Dal badz+ra d+ha ra satwa mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ rig pa 'dzin pas brjod par gyur pa yis// rdo rje lcags kyu
127a7(rgyud): shin tu brtan// lcags kyu bdag nyid che mchog ni// brgya phrag grangs med byung bar gyur// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// rims bzhin rab tu thim par gyur// gang zhig phyogs
127a8(rgyud): rnams bcu po ru// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur// gdug pa de rnams bkug nas kyang // de bzhin gong bu gcig tu bya// rdo rje me yis kun tu gdungs// ri rab rtse mo pham
127b1(rgyud): nas ni// tshad med bgrang du med pa rnams// phyi rol gyi ni dkyil 'khor 'ongs// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas kun du// 'khor nyid du ni yang dag gnas// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// gdug pa'i
127b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bos nas ni// kye gdug skye dgu rnams la ni// rnam par 'tshe ba spang bar gyis// khyed rnams kyis ni dam tshig long // srog chags thams cad gsod pa spongs// min na khyod
127b3(rgyud): rnams g.yas 'bar bas// de bzhin nga yi thal bar bya// gdug pa'i dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyis// tshig gcig tu ni zhus gyur pa// mgon po bdag cag sha za ste// ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol
127b4(rgyud): cig/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos// ma bsdams pa yi tshe/ ga gsan nas// rdo rje khro bo rab brjid bka'// snying po drag po gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha na da ha patsa
127b5(rgyud): bid+h+waM sa ya bi kri ta sarba duSh+TA na/ sa ma ya mu dA maN+Da la/ b+hAny+dzab+hany+dza/ marda marda/ khA da khAd/ pa ra maN+Da/ badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ khro bo chen pos 'di brjod pas// rab drag gdu
127b6(rgyud): pa de dag ni// tshig cing rab tu 'gyel gyur cing // dam tshig phyag rgya nyams par gyur// 'o dod 'bod cing ngu bar gyur// gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// ji skad smra ba bzhin byas te// 'on
127b7(rgyud): kyang bden pa smra mi bya// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po che// rang bzhin gyis ni sangs rgyas bdag/ stobs chen gsang ba'i dbang po yis// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// 
127b8(rgyud): oM ni sum+b+ha ha na da ho pa tsa gr-ih+Na ban d+ha hU~M phaT// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas bka' la rab gnas pas// rdo rje khro bo rab za byed// snying po drag po brjod par gyur// oM ma hA badz+ra kra/ 
128a1(rgyud): d+ha bAd sa rba duSh+Ta muN+Dal b+hISha shA ya/ san du Sh+Ta sa ma ya yan bkir bi ng+ga sa ya s+pho Ta ya/ b+hA dza ya b+hA dza ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu da ban+d+ha/ gr-ih+Na ha na da ha pa tsas rbaduH
128a2(rgyud): sa ma ya satwa sa ma ya hUM phag/ de nas 'di ni brjod tsam gyis// rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che// gtum po drag po shin tu 'jig/ rdo rje khro bo rab tu byung // rigs bcas dpung dang bcas ldan pa// 
128a3(rgyud): dam tshig sdang ba bzung nas ni// shin tu 'jigs pas skrag gyur cing // rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu sprul// phyag rgya rab 'jigs de dag gis// rnam par bcom cing zil gyis mnan// rdo rje me yis
128a4(rgyud): bsregs nas ni// thams cad du ni thal bar byas// bya sems las byung rdo rje can// ji ltar sems can sre dag par byed// 'di ni gzhug pa'i tshig yin te// 'phan pa'i
128a5(rgyud): rigs can rgyal bdag skyes// 'dod chagaso skyon la so/ gas lta ba// nyon mongs dri ma gang shes nas// rdo rje can gyis dri ma 'di// bzung nas ye shes me yis bsreg
128a6(rgyud): sems can shin tu 'jigs te skag/ byang chub spyod pas byang chub gnas// mi bskyod pa yi gnas skyes shing // rdo rje can ni mchog tu gyur// phyag na rdo rje sems dpa' che// rdo rje chen po
128a7(rgyud): phyag rgya 'gugs// zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// 'jigs pa med par snyoms par zhugs// mkha' 'gro ma ni rjes sbrang phyir// rgyal ba la ni bka' nod gyur// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen
128a8(rgyud): la// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// oM ha na ha na badz+ra hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsungs thos nas// 'jigs pa 'gugs pa'i rdo rje ni// rang nyid
128b1(rgyud): kyi sngags 'di brjod// oM badz+ra a kar+dz+dza.Ar+dz+dza shra/ sad duSh+Ta gan brda d+hab ten d+huH// de nas brjod pa tsam gyin// mkha' 'grom na mdangs 'phrog pa// rnal 'byor sngags dang phyag rgya/ 
128b2(rgyud): bcas// ri rab tu ni kun tu 'dus// rdo rje legs kyus bkug nas ni// 'bar bdang bcas 'bar bar gyur// spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas tshig/ smras pa rdo rje 'dzin pas spobs// skal sa
128b3(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis gsungs// kye gdug pa'i tshogs chen myur ba ru// gsod pa spongs la bka' nyan gyis// de dag re re zhing smras pa// bdag cag 'di rnams sha za ste// gang zhig rtag tu
128b4(rgyud): gson gyur pa// bdag cag la ni thabs bstan gsol// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // de yi thabs ni 'jigs ngaso// zla gcig lon nas shi ba gang // de ni bza' ba
128b5(rgyud): blang bar gyis// byang chub sems la chags bral nas/ gsang ba smod pa lhur len pa// khyod dang lhan cig/ yang dag sbyor// de bza' ba ni gnang bar gyis// phyag
128b6(rgyud): rgyu yin snying po 'di// rtag tu bcang bar bya ba ste// phyi rol thams cad spangs nas ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung bar gyis// oM badz+ra pr-i ti grah+Na hr-i da ya A kaR+Sha ya/ tsar+ya yaM mas
128b7(rgyud): d+hid+hi na mi ni ya te ha si ra d+ha yi ni/  mdus ma ya hU dzo// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya ldan// khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po ni// rnal 'byor pa ni de yis spros/ 
128b8(rgyud): gal te dam tshig las 'das na// khro bo bdag nyid chen po yis// rtag tu mgo bo 'gas byed cing // rigs dang bces pa nges par sreg/ bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal po zhes// bya ba de 'dro'ote/ 
129a1(rgyud): 'dzin la// sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs nas// nad kyi don du tshol bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM ba dz+ra phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ 
129a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'jigs byed pas// nad rnams thams cad bkug nas ni// 'gugs pa yi ni snying po brjod// oM badz+ra sa ma ya a na ya sarba duSh+Ta dza ri ni de na shA ya hUM phaT/ de nas
129a3(rgyud): brjod pa tsam gyis kyang // nad dang gdon gyi tshogs kun dang // rims sogs kyis ni de thos nas// steng du rkang pa'i 'og tu mgo/ 'bar ba'i me dang yang dag ldan// ha he zhes sdigs 'jigs
129a4(rgyud): par byed// bdag cag rims ni ma gzhom par/ khro bo chen po bka' stsol cig/ rdo rje rnal 'byor tshe/ na pos gsungs// nga yis bka' ni rab tu nyon// sems can
129a5(rgyud): nye bar 'joms pa spongs// mdangs kyang 'phrog par ma byed cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ kye rgyal po rdza rje bdag cag gi/ srog gi srung ba mdzad du gsol// bdag cag kun
129a6(rgyud): ni gzi brjid za// thabs ni cung zad bskul du gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de nas stobs chen gyis smras pa// nga yi sngags dang phyag rgya dag/ gang zhig bsrungs la gnod ma
129a7(rgyud): byed// oM badz+ra karma bi sho d+ha ya sarba A pa ra NaM ni bud d+ha sa twa ma sa ye hUM// de nas phyag rgya chen po kun// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// mdo sde gsang ba rgyal po la// yongasu bshad pa
129a8(rgyud): thams cad kun// sngags dang phyag rgya gnas gang na// rtag par rab tu spyod byed pas// gnas de ru yang rtag pa ru// khyed rnams shin tu gnod ma byed// de skad gsungs pas gdon kun
129b1(rgyud): ni// hi hi zhes ni sgrogs par gyur// spyi bo'i rnal 'byor pa la ni// gnod pa byed pa thams cad gtad// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug gis// sdig pa
129b2(rgyud): dral ba'i phyag rgya che// blo gros chen po snyoms par zhugs// ngan song bcing bar bya ba'i phyir// mgon po dag la bka' nod byed// mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// kun nas
129b3(rgyud): snying po brjod par gyur// oM shak+ka pa ya badz+ra swA hA/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thabs chen po// rdo rje las ni yang dag byung // sems can rnams la brtse bya'i phyir// sdig pa thams cad bkug
129b4(rgyud): par gyur// oM sarba pa paM a pA ya bi shod+ha na pa sa ma ya hUM phaT// de skad brjod nas rnal 'byor ches // skad cig gis ni ngan song bkug/ ri yi rgyal po nye ba ru// ngu 'bong
129b5(rgyud): la sogs snang bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rnal 'byor ches// ngan song sems can la smras pa/ dkon mchog gsum dngang bstan la// myur du bstan pa skyabs/ 
129b6(rgyud): su song // de dag thams cad kyis smras pa// stobs chen bdag cag bsgrub tu gsol// gtso bos ji skad bka' sprul pa// de bzhin du ni bgyi bar 'tshal// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ 
129b7(rgyud): sdig pa dral ba nges 'ching ba// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa// mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra pI ni ba s+pho Ta ya/ sarba A pA ya ban+d+ha ni pra mo k+Sha ya sarba pri ya ga te b+h+yaH
129b8(rgyud): sarba satwa sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ye tra tha// sems can ngan song rgyu can rnams// rig pa 'di yis dbang bskur bas// ngan song 'khor lo dral bar gyur// rgya mtsho ru ni rab tu ltung // de bzhi
130a1(rgyud): ngan song shi 'phos nas// de kun rab tu grol bar gyur// sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas thob gyur// de bzhin thub parje snang gi/ zhabs drung du ni skyes
130a2(rgyud): par gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// de bzhin mi khom zad par gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// de nas skad cig des ni thog/ rmad 'byung sna tshogs gsang chen po// cho 'phrul
130a3(rgyud): dag ni skyes par 'gyur// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin gnas// rin chen bdun gyis rab tu sbas// rdo rje rin chen gyis rab mdzes// de yi rigs kyi ngan song
130a4(rgyud): kun// sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyangs// sems can bde ba skyes par gyur// rdo rje bde ba yang dge ldan// ma cho ga chen po yi zhing 'di ni// dag pa'i zhing du rab tu grags// 
130a5(rgyud): sems can dag pa kun tu khyab// de bzhin rnal 'byor rdor rang bzhin// slar yang shing gi nags la sogs// rmad/ 'byung chen po snang ba med// rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin
130a6(rgyud): kun// nags dang rtsa la skyes par gyur// mthon dman dag dang rnam par bral// lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par snang // ka tsa la ltar reg na bde// stong gsum rab tu gnas par gyur// dmyal/ 
130a7(rgyud): ba la sogs sdug bsngal kun// dang por ngan song nye bar zhi// bkres dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal dag/ kun tu 'gags par rnam par gnas// rgya mtsho kun tu thim par gyur// ri bo gzugs
130a8(rgyud): kyang kun tu khyab// gzhan 'phrul gyi ni lha rnams dang // mtshungs pa ru ni ma rnams gyur// slar yang mu khyud 'khor lo med// ri rab man dar dag med// lha yi 'jig rten gnas kyang med// 
130b1(rgyud): rgya mtsho med cing lha min med// klu yi gnas bzhi dag kyang med// mi yi khyim dang khang pa med// grong khyer ljongs dang yul 'khor dang // phug dang bcas par rnam par bral// mi yi gnas
130b2(rgyud): kyang med pa nyid// chu bo phug dang lung ba med// mi dag gi ni lus kyang med// sems can 'ga' yang 'dir mi snang // ngan song 'khor lo dag kyang med// mi khom med cing sdug bsngal med// 
130b3(rgyud): bud med skyes pa la sogs med// rnga mo glang po lug kyang med// dpag bsam shing dang spos kyi shing // rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin mdzes// spos kyi chu yi rgya mtsho dang // rin chen sna
130b4(rgyud): tshogs rnams kyi mdzes// shing ni yid 'ong thams ca/ da la// rol mo'i sgra ni mngon par byung // rol mos cho das kyi sgra dag kyang // stong gsum du ni yongasu byung // ji ltar
130b5(rgyud): rje dbang po'i gnas// ri rab ri yi brtse mo ltar// de bzhin stong gsum gyi ni gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs 'od 'ab ra gyur// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// gru bzhi rab tu
130b6(rgyud): gnas par gyur// kun nas phyi rol gnas rnams ni// kha khyer du yang snang bar gyur// slar yang nyi ma zla ba med// skar ma med cing lnga yang med// rang gi khang pa'i nang du yang / lnga rnams nyid
130b7(rgyud): kyang mthong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'od kyis yongasu gsal// 'od zer sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa// gang gis zhing ni yang dag sbyangs// rdo rje rin chen yid 'ong ldan// rdo rje dbang po'i gan
130b8(rgyud): nyid kyang // slar yang snang bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan du gzhi ni gcig pa'i gnas// gang du sangs rgyas rnams 'phrul pa// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// lha yi pad+ma yongasu gsal// 
131a1(rgyud): / rin chen sna bdun rab tu mdzes// dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong ldan// bskal pa chen po'i zhing gi dbus// dkyil 'khor shin tu sdug steng du// dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cus/ 
131a2(rgyud): rdo rje seng ge'i khri byung gyur// kun nas phyogs rnams thams cad du// dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu ldan// rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin mdzes// seng ge'i khri na bzhi byang gyur// rdo rje bla re rnam pa
131a3(rgyud): bres// dar gyi chun pos rnam par 'phyang // dril du'i dra ba rnam par 'phyang // zhing ni kun tu rab tu spras// me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram// sna tshogs sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs// sna tshogs
131a4(rgyud): dri yis kun tu khyab// dpag bsam shing gis nye bar spras// / dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan// rdo rje'i rol mo ma dzes pa dag/ sgra ni mngon par 'byin par byed// 'di nyid dang
131a5(rgyud): ni lhan cig zhing // sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du// phyog/ sa rnams kun tu snang bar gyur// slar yang 'jigs/ par 'gyur ba med// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// 
131a6(rgyud): gang ga'i bye snyed grangs med pa// shin tu phra ba'i rdul snyed kyis// sangs rgyas thams cad yongasu gsal// til gyi gang bu gang ba bzhin// sangs rgyas thams cad yongasu gsal// 
131a7(rgyud): phyogs rnams kun nas ma lus par// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir gshegs 'gyur// dbus kyi seng ge'i gdan dag la// chos dbyings 'jigs pa med pa la// rnam par snang
131a8(rgyud): mdzad stobs chen po// ston pa bcom ldan bzhugs par gyur// shar du yang ni mi bskyod pa// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan te// nub tu 'od dpag med pa yin// byang du na yod grub
131b1(rgyud): pa ste// mgon po chen po phyogs bzhi ru// rdo rje yi ni steng du bzhugs// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu ni// mnyam du dmigs nas rnam par gnas// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa
131b2(rgyud): gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan par bzhugs// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad// sangs rgyas grangs med thams cad ni// rdo rje can ni lnga la
131b3(rgyud): bzhugs// phyogs ni re rer khyab gyur pa// sangs rgyas gcig gis yang dag bzhugs// mtshams dang steng dang 'og dag gi/ rnam snang mdzad kyis brtan par mdzad// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan
131b4(rgyud): gyur pa// dbus kyi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bzhugs// de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// chos dang longs spyod rdzog/ des snying po// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul pa/ 
131b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad rang nyid kyi// seng ge'i khri ni lnga la/ bzhugs// grangs med tshad ni med pa yi// sangs rgya sa chos nyid ma lus pa// ri mo gsal ba dang mtshungs
131b6(rgyud): par// stong gsum dag ni ma lus gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba che// pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par gyur// dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag ldan// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// sangs
131b7(rgyud): rgyas rol pa dang ldan par// rdo rje can ni thams cad bzhugs// shar gyi cha la yang dag bzhugs// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// rdo rje rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs
131b8(rgyud): par gyur// lho yi phyogs na thams cad gnas// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// rin chen rnam 'phrul yang dag ldan// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// 
132a1(rgyud): / nub kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas// pad+ma'i rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// bye bdag ni grangs med lnga// byang gi phyogs na rnam par gan// 
132a2(rgyud): las kyi rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// gsang dang mchod pa gang yin dang // lha mo rdo rje lha mo ni// grangs med tshad ni med pa dag/ bcu gnyis kyi ni
132a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gang // sgo bsrungs dag ni grangs med pa// rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan pa bzhi// rgyal po shar dang lho dag tu// nub dang byang dang yang dag gnas// chos kyi sku las yang dag
132a4(rgyud): byung // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa// sems da dpa' chen po de dag kun// chos dang longs spyod rdzogasade la byung // gang zhig phyogs bcu dag gi yi // byang chub
132a5(rgyud): sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// rnal 'byor chen po'i sarbo ba pa// de dag kun kyang 'dir 'ongs pa// sangs rgyas zhing ni gang gA yi// bye ma dang mnyam ji snyed pa/ yongs su
132a6(rgyud): gang bar gyur pa'i tshogs// de dag thams cad yang dag gshegs// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni// zhing dag rgya ni chen por gyur// yul rnams thams cad bya ba yang // gnod pa
132a7(rgyud): med cing 'tshe ba'ang med// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten pa'i// ji ltar sngon ni bar med pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// bar med pa ni de bzhin gnas// gang nas sangs rgyas
132a8(rgyud): mi snang ba// phyogs ni rdul tsam yod ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor che// gang dgas ni bzhi bcu dang // yang na chos las byung ba nyid// sangs rgyas sras ni grags pa/ 
132b1(rgyud): che// rigs lnga byung ba la sogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa dang // 'dir gnas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// mchog rnams phyogs dang phyogs mtshams mthong // sangs rgyas dag/ 
132b2(rgyud): ni grangs med kun// lha rnams yang dag gnas 'di ru// sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur// sangs rgyas dgra bcom ma gtogs par// zhing 'dir 'go' yang mthong ma gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi
132b3(rgyud): 'khor lo min// dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshogs kyang min// dbus dang phyogs ni yang dag bzhugs// sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur// dbang phyug chen po gnod byed pa'i// rdo rje khro bo mthong bar
132b4(rgyud): gyur// sangs rgyas lnga dang de bzhin du// khro bo drug bdun rnam par gnas// tshangs sogs lha rnams de dag kyang // ngo ma tshar dag ni skyes par gyur// 'jigs shing skrag nas lha de dag
132b5(rgyud): gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// gtso bo ji bzhin mthong 'gyu/ rare zhing // shin tu ngo mtshar ci zhig snang // slar yang lha/ yi 'jig rten dag/ srid pa nang du mthong ma gyur// 'gro ba/ 
132b6(rgyud): lnga yi sems can min// ri rab dang ni rgya mtsho min// zla ba nyi ma ma mthong zhing // ri dang khang pa dag kyang min// ci bdag cag ni rmongs gyur tam// yang na mig ni long bar gyur// yang na bdag
132b7(rgyud): cig sems g.yengs pa// sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul 'di ci zhig/ bdag cag gis ni sngar 'jigs mthong // drug cing bkug nas thal bar byas// ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru// sdug bsngal chen pos gzir
132b8(rgyud): bar gyur// slar yang ri rab yod ma yin// khro bo rdzu 'phrul chen po med// gzhan dang khro bo chen po gcig/ dbang phyug chen po gnod par byed// gnas ni chung ngur gyur pa yang // rgya chen po ru
133a1(rgyud): 'di ru snang // stong gsum 'di yang mi snang ste// bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin// de ltar brjod pa sna tshogs pa// gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// mi smra bar ni gnas gyur nas// / 
133a2(rgyud): rdo rje can la lta bar byed// gnod sbyin 'byung po sha za sogs// gdug pa kun dang gdon sogs kyis// mun par khyab pa bzhin du ni// stong gsum 'di ni mthong bar gyur// gzhan ni cung zad ma mthong / 
133a3(rgyud): ste// gzhan du phyogs dag mun pas khyab// rdo rje khro bo 'khrul gyur cing // kun tu rmongs pa nyid gyur cing // gcig la gcig ni rmongs par gyur// ha ha zhes bya'i sgra sgrogs shing // bdag cag 'dir
133a4(rgyud): ni gang du phyin// tshig ni rab tu brjod byed cing // gcigang la gcig ni smra bar byed// 'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang // 'di ni su yi gam du phyin// bdag cag rang gi gnas na ltung // bad/ 
133a5(rgyud): cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin// rdo rje khro bos bsad par/ gyur// 'o na 'di ni ci zhig yin// lha yi gnas kyang ma ma/ thong bzhin// rdo rje can yang mthong ma gyur// sangs rgyas
133a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo min// bdag cag rnams ni mun par gyur// rang gi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing // ri rab nyid kyang mthong ma gyur// mtsho dang rgya mtsho dag kyang min// skar ma zla ba nyi ma min// bdag
133a7(rgyud): cag thams cad gang nas 'ongs// yul gang zhig tu 'gro bar bya// 'gro ba lnga yang yod ma yin// 'jig rten med cing ma mo med// mi dang mi ma yin pa dag/ rnam pa kun tu mthong ma gyur// sngon ni/ 
133a8(rgyud): ji ltar de bzhin phyis// rmad du byung ba nyid ma gyur// gzhan du sa ni g.yos par gyur// rlung dag gis ni rnam par bskyod// 'brug gi sgra dang glog chen po// sdug bsngal thams cad yang dag ldan/ bkres
133b1(rgyud): skom la sogs sdug bsngal dang // bral min kun tu sdug bsngal gyur// der ni lha chen rdzu 'phrul dag/ cung zad kyang ni mthong ma gyur// dmyal ba yi dgas dud 'gro dag/ rnam par nyams shing bshig
133b2(rgyud): par gyur// sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya yis// ngan song gsum ni nye bar zhi// lha gang 'du shes med pa dang // gzugs med pa na spyod par gnas// phung po lnga ru rang bdag nyid// ngo mtshar de bzhin
133b3(rgyud): mthong gyur nas// rang bdag nyid la'ang rtog par byed// gcig la gcig kyang lta bar byed// de bzhin thams cad skrag cing 'jigs// ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di ci zhig/ tshad med bskal pa chen po ru// 
133b4(rgyud): bdag cag dag par gnas par gyur// bdag mchog las ni bdag cag grol// slar yang bdag tu 'dzin par gyur// sngo/ na gyi bag chags mngon 'dod la// srid gsum gnas ni mthong
133b5(rgyud): bar gyur// srid pa gsum yang mthong ma yin// de bzhin 'gro ba lnga yang med// gzhan du shin tu dag par gcig/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par sprul// sangs rgyas lnga nyid mthong ba
133b6(rgyud): gyur// srid gsum gnas ni gzhan dag min// tshogs la thams cad mnyes par gyur// gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// 'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang // bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin/ 
133b7(rgyud): sngon ni bdag gis 'jig rten 'di// 'gro ba lnga bcas de bzhin du// ri rab dang ni rgya mtshor bcas// lha rnams drug ni 'khor bcas mthong // srid pa gsum gyi lha rnams ni// gang zhig 'di ni
133b8(rgyud): mthong ma gyur// gzhal yas khang dang sems can ni// gtso bo ji bzhin mthong bar gyur// de 'dra'i ngo mtshar sna tshogs pa// gnas chen 'di ru mthong bar gyur// byang chub sems kyi rnam
134a1(rgyud): 'phrul 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis rol pa yin// gang zhig stong gsum 'di yi ni// rang rgyal bdag nyid mchog gyur pa// de yang kun tu rmongs gyur nas// rnam par 'phrul
134a2(rgyud): ba'ang mthong ma gyur// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma yin// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyang min// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan zhi ba// gnas ni de ru mthong ma gyur// gzhan du stong ni gsum po 'di// rnam
134a3(rgyud): pa kun tu ma mthong nyid// sa dang me dang chu khams min// gser gyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang min// 'gro ba lnga yi sems can min// zla ba nyi ma dag kyang min// skar ma gza' dang rgyud skar min// sems
134a4(rgyud): can dag kyang khams gsum min// 'di dag thams cad stong par gyur// gzhan du na mkha'i dkyil 'khor min// de drag thams cad 'jig skrag nas// mya ngan 'das pa nye bar thob/ 
134a5(rgyud): gang yang phyogs rnams bcu po yi// nyan thos 'jigs pa/ med pa rnams// byang sems can ni chen po yis// de dag/ kun ni skrag par gyur// rang rang gi ni zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas
134a6(rgyud): nyid kyang mthong ma gyur// 'dus pa chen po dag dang ni// chos rnams ston pa dag kyang min// zhing de yi ni sems can min// lce dang mi rnams dag kyang min// khang pa med cing zhing yang med// sa dang / 
134a7(rgyud): me dang rlung yang med// rang gi zhing yang ma mthong zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs par gyur// skad cig gi ni mi dgar gyur// thar cig du ni rmongs par gyur// de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul du// byang
134a8(rgyud): chub sems ni rab tu snang // snod kyi bskal pa chen po la// 'khor lo rnam par 'khrul pa bstan// bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas// de lta bu ni byin gyis brlabs// sems can gang dag
134b1(rgyud): 'di na gnas// nyin dang mtshan mo mi shes gyur// de nas de nyid bsang ba che// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i tshogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sangs rgyas// de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul byung // stong
134b2(rgyud): gsum yongasu bsdus pa yi// lha yi gnas ni bkod par gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas gcig pu// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// la lar sngon po rab tu mdzes// sa yi phyogs
134b3(rgyud): ni rab tu spras// rdo rje sngon pos rab tu rgyan// la lar gser gyi mdog tu snang // kha dog ser pos rnam par rgyan// sa yi cha yang rab tu spras// rdo rje ser pos rab tu rgyan// la lar kha dog dmar
134b4(rgyud): po ni// byi ru lta bus rab tu mdzes// sa yi cha yang rab tu spras// rdo rje dmar pos rab tu rgyan// la lar btsag gi/ mdog can gyi// bai DUR+Ya mtshungs rab tu mdzes// sa yi na/ 
134b5(rgyud): yang rnam par spras// rdo rje gcod kyis rnam par mdzes / le lar shel gyi mdog can gyi// shin tu snang bas ra ba tu mdzes// sa yi char yang rnam par spras// rdo rje shel
134b6(rgyud): gyis rnam par rgyan// shar du sngon po chen po ste// lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan// nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste// byang ni btsod dang yang dag ldan// dbus kyis yi cha dag ni// shel gyi mdog can bla na med// 
134b7(rgyud): rdo rje chen pos shin tu dag/ chen rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes// cha mnyam legs par bgos pa ste// go rims dang ni yang dag ldan/ 
134b8(rgyud): kun nas phyi rol gnas dag na// rdo rje kha khyer yang dag ldan// kun nas kha khyer dang ldan zhing // sgo yi kha khyer dag gis spras// ri mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin// gzhan yang gser gyi mdog can dang / kha dog dam
135a1(rgyud): po mchog dang ni// gzhan yang shel ni bzang po dag/ rin chen kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdzes gyur pa// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mchog rdo rje la
135a2(rgyud): mo tshogs kyis mchod// dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// g.yer ka'i dra bas kun tu khebs// dril bu'i mchog ni kun tu 'phyang // sna tshogs shing ni yid 'ong ldan// dpag
135a3(rgyud): bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan// spos dang me tog de bzhin dri// snang ba'i shing mchog yang dag ldan// sna tshogs bkod pa nye bar ldan// sna tshogs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu// mtsho mchog chu yis gang bar
135a4(rgyud): gyur// rdo rje rgya mtsho rgya chen ldan// me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram// sna tshogs gdug pa dag gis bdugs// sna tsho/ des dri yi chu yis gtor// sna tshogs dri yis kun tu khyag drag
135a5(rgyud): po chen po sras bcu dag/ de nas nyams dga' ba dag byung // shing dang pad sogs thams cad las// chos rnams 'a/ byung ba thos par gyur// phyogs rnams kun tu rnam phyung nas// 
135a6(rgyud): dag pa'i zhing du stong nyid bcas// rnam par sgra ni gang zhig grag/ chos kyi bde ba 'byung bar gyur// ye/ le/ sha/ baM/ oM badz+ra satwa kro d+hA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha rA gA
135a7(rgyud): ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha ya sA d+ha sA d+hu hUM phaT// khro bo rdo rje rin chen mchog/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba bkod bka' bas// khro bo rdo rje bla na med// mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur// oM/ 
135a8(rgyud): badz+ra b+hi ku Ti kro d+ha ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badz+raM su ru mi hA dz+wa la kr-id+ha ma la dz+wa la ya sarba hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ki tu ma hA kro d+ha d+he ni hUM phaT/ oM an+d+ra hA sa badz+ra man+t+ra hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hU~M phaT// khro bo chen po
135b1(rgyud): / ya ma /  shes rnams 'dzug/ 'kho mo'i ma phra ma mi
136a1(rgyud): chen po'i tshogs kyis khrug/ dkyil 'khor chen po yang dgu ldan// gnas chen po dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor chen po kun bsdus pas// shin tu gsang ba chos chen go/ 
136a2(rgyud): dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// de nyid snying po gsang ba che// thar pa chen po grong khyer mchog/ dkyil 'khor rgyal po chen po ste// sems can don kun yang dag ldan// chos nyid rtogs par byang chub pa
136a3(rgyud): 'di 'dra chos dang longs spyod rdzogs// rigs lnga'i gsang ba gang yin pa// gdon mi zla bar byed pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nib// gang phyir dag pa'i tshogs chen po// de bzhin rdo
136a4(rgyud): rigs dag pa// gang phyir lha chen rang 'dul byed// lha chen la ra sogs sprul byed pa// de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs mchog ste/ gang phyir gdul bya'i sems can rnams// sprul pa sna tshogs
136a5(rgyud): yang dag byung // sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhi ba ste// drag po'i mtsho/ dpa rab bskor ba// sna tshogs rigs can 'khor lo ste/ rigs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i

136a7(rgyud): pa// gsang ba'i dbang phyug rgyal po che// gang phyir gsang ba'i bdag por bshad// rdo rje thams cad kun bsdus pa// rang gi rigs mchog bshad nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po ches// dkyil
136a8(rgyud): 'khor chen po kun tu sprul// lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun// skad cig de la yang dag bkug/ slar ni bcug par byas nas kyang // skad cig gis ni da mchog dog/ rdo rje mtshan ma'i dbang ba
136b1(rgyud): dadam tshig ldan byin nas ni// bkug ste rab tu bcug nas kyang // de bzhin bcings te dbang phyus// dam tshig la ni brtson byas te// dam tshig sdom pa de bzhin no// mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir/ 
136b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchog ni gsungs par gyur// 'khor lo chen po grong khyer che// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po ste// khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes byab// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// 'jig rten
136b3(rgyud): gsum tshogs pam byas nas// lnga la sogs pa rab bcug 'gyur// de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gnas// 'khor lo chen po grong khyer che// gang ming bzung ba tsam nyid kyi/ sems can
136b4(rgyud): rab tu bcom nas ni// gdon la sogs pa 'bros par byed// rims dang gdon dang dug dag dang // drug po gdug pad// tshig dang // mtshan bzung ba yi mod nyid la// skrag pa dang / 
136b5(rgyud): ni g.yo bar gyur// sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchogami gang dag ni gdul bya min// de bas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par gyur// rdo rje slob dpon
136b6(rgyud): skal ba che/ shin tu byung zhing rab tu mkhas// dgongs pa yi ni chog shes// gzhung rnams thos shing don la mkhas// rab tu dang zhing blo ldan brtan// rigs dang rigs min rab tu shes/ 
136b7(rgyud): byang chub sems la brtson par gyur// lha gzhan dag la 'dod ldan min// gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong ba// snying rje bdag nyid brtser ldan pa// dag cing des la rnam par dul// rang gi ngang
136b8(rgyud): gis rnam par gnas// zhen cing chags la gdug pa min// rmongs pa med cing le lo med// brtse ldan phan pa'i bsam pa can// rtags tu rnam par dgod la dga'// gzugs sogs
137a1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i yon tan la// chags shing lhag par rgyal gyur nas// srid la sems ni skrag par byed// srid la mngon par chags pa med// theg pa chen po'i tshul la brtson// theg pa
137a2(rgyud): gzhan la 'dod ldan min// sems can rnams kyi don la brtson// dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog byung ba// nyon mongs kun tu chags pa spangs// gnyen po dag ni rab tu sgom// 'dod chags la
137a3(rgyud): sogs nyon mongs che// mi sdug pa la sogs pa sgom// rigs dang rigs min cho ga shes// sngags dang phyag rgya shin tu mkhas// dkug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya dang gshegs
137a4(rgyud): gsol dang // ji skad rdo rje dbyings bshad bzhin// sngon du rig pa'i brtul bzhugs bya// kha na ma tho rdul tsam la // kun tu 'dzem par bya ba yin// tshad dang tshon rtsi srad bu dang / 
137a5(rgyud): yo byad cho ga yang dag ldan// bcing dang phur bus gdab pa nyid// sngar bshad rdo rje dbyings bzhin du// bza' ba dang ni mi bza' ba// rdo rje snyems tshul ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje
137a6(rgyud): dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// sngar ni ji ltar de bzhin bya// de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// dkyil 'khor chen po mchod gyur pa// rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs// dngos grub thams
137a7(rgyud): cad byed pa'i mchog/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyan// thig pazhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar gyis chun pos rnam par rgyan// rgya che ji ltar rigs pa ru// rdzing
137a8(rgyud): rdo rje grong khyer che// rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i grong khyer bri/ 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan// ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan// de dbus rang bzhin 'khor lo yi/ 
137b1(rgyud): dang gra sangs rgyas dgod par bya// rnam par snang mdzad ston che// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs dkyil 'khor// sangs ca
137b2(rgyud): spyad byur rdo mA~M/ 'bar du ma god par bya// rdo me ltung ba nyid ni// drug tu 'dzis rten gas 'joms pa// ga~Ml su na chen drug rgyam// 'ab 'i di rgyu god par ga// g.yon
137b3(rgyud): hU~M drug r+b+ha // d+has rdo rnon ni// 'byung ba'i brisri dag par bya// drug tu mni rgyal ba bzhi// 'bar pa'i medang rab tu ldan// rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'kho che// chos dkyi ma

137b7(rgyud): tsita tra sa ma ya hUM// phyag rgya gang zhig dgod par du// snying po thams cad dgod par bya// sngar ni dgod pa gang yin pa// rdo rje gzugs ni bskor byed pa// rdo rje hUM mdzad dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shuH
137b8(rgyud): kyi song nas kyang // rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// mi bskyod shin tu mnyam bzhag pa// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// 'che bdag ni cung zad gtsigs// khro ba'i rgyal po 'bar bas khyab/ phyag na
138a1(rgyud): phyag rgya dang bcas mtshon// rdo rgyu mdzad phyag rgya ni// steng du phyag gnyis yang dag ldan// de bzhin kho nar phyag gnyis dag/ lcags kyur 'brang ba yang dag ldan// phyag gcig/ 
138a2(rgyud): gis ni zhags pa bsnams// gcig gis rdo rje yang dag bsnams// mda' 'gengs pa yi phyag rgya dang // phyag gnyis dag ni shin tu ldan// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ste// dbang phyug chen po kun tu man// 
138a3(rgyud): g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi// nu ma'i bar du gnon par byed// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo dgod par bya// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar// khro bo 'jigs par byed pa
138a4(rgyud): mchog/ mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ste// g.yasu rdo rje da rgyal po'o// g.yon du rdo rje chags pa ste// rgyab turje legs pa'o// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // lho ru khro
138a5(rgyud): bo'i dkyil 'khor ni// khro bo'i rgyal po khro gnyer can// khro bos yongasu bskor ba bri// thams cad 'bar ba'i/ phreng bas khyab// gdong ni khro bcas bzhad ldan pa// rdo rje dbang phyug
138a6(rgyud): phyag rgyar ldan// khro gnyer can ni yongasu brjod// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che// sngags dang phyag rgya yongasu bsdu// rang gi gnasu yang dag bri// mdun du rnga
138a7(rgyud): rje rin chen te// g.yasu khro bo gzi brjid do// g.yon du rgyal mtshan drag po ste// rgyab tu khro bo bzhad pa'o// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // nub kyi phyogasu dkyil 'khor ni// khro bo chen po rje
138a8(rgyud): hrI ste/ khro bdag chen po rnams kyis bskos// rdo chos ni mdun du ste// rdo rje rnon po gal su'o// de bzhin g.yon du rdo rje rgyu// rgyab du rdo rje smra ba'o// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / dkyil
138b1(rgyud): 'khor dag ni mchog bzhi pa// rdo rje dbab pa las chen po// khro bo chen pos yongasu bskor// rdo rje las ni mdun du ste// g.yas rdo rje srung ba'o// g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te// rgyab tu rdo rje khu tshur
138b2(rgyud): ro// dbus kyi 'khor lo'i mtshams bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// mtshamasu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri// phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnamasu// rdo rje me tog
138b3(rgyud): la sogs bri// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// ji skad sngar bshad cho ga bzhin// sgo bzhi dag ni thams cad du// sgo srung rnams ni dgod par bya// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / 
138b4(rgyud): dril bu dbab pa bla na med// rang gi phyag rgya snying kar bzhag/ rang rang gi ni snying po yis// rdo rje dril bu yid 'ong ldan// / rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dgod// bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo na/ 
138b5(rgyud): gtso bo rdo rje rig pa mchog/ rdo rje rgyal po mchog byin rlab/ rang nyid rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog/ de yis dkyil 'a/ khor de bris nas// rdo rje ti rin ti ri 'jug/ yang dag par ni
138b6(rgyud): brtag byas la// lan bdun du ni bskor ba bya// chad pa gang yin yongasu dag/ mkhas pas lhag par dbri bar bya// rdo rje dril bu rtogs par bya// grub par 'gyur te nyes pa med// rdo rje lcags kyu la
138b7(rgyud): sogs kun// mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya// 'khor lo'i dbusu zhugs nas ni// mkhas pas sgo ni dbye bar bya// yid kyis rdo rje ri mo ni// bteg cing kun tu phye nas kyang // rdo rje sgo ni
138b8(rgyud): bzhi po dag/ yid kyis dbye bar bya ba yin// de la snying po ni 'di yin te// oM badz+ra d+har ud g+ha Ta ya pra be sha ya sa ma ya hUM// dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams// phyi yi rdo rje rigs dag bri/ khyad
139a1(rgyud): 'jug la sogs lnga rnams ni// kha khyer gyi ni phyed la gnas// 'khor lo dang bcas rigs bcas te// sems can gdug pa gdon la sogs// rims dang 'byung po sha za dang / 
139a2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro 'byung po me mo dang // lha mo mtshon cha dang ldan kun// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri// phyi rol kha khyer gnasu ni// rdo rje kha khyer mdzes pa rnams// de nas sngon la slob dpon ches// dkyi
139a3(rgyud): 'khor dbusu 'dug nas ni// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas te// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug bya// ji ltar rdo rje rigs byung ba// de bzhin bdag nyid rnam par bsam// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid
139a4(rgyud): yang dag byin gyis brlab// rdo rje khro ba rgyal po mchog/ zhes bya de 'dra'i ting nge 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi// skal ba chen po snyoms zhugs nas// ji skad gong du grags
139a5(rgyud): pa bzhin// shes rab can gyis thams cad bsam// ji ltar/ rdo rje rigs 'byung ba// ji ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni// rgya chen gsang ba chen po dang // rdo rje slob dpon cha
139a6(rgyud): ga mchog rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba// rtog pa 'di las rab tu bshad// de nas dbusu 'dug byas nas// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches// khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// phyag rgya thams cad
139a7(rgyud): yongasu bcings// khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu bcings// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya// rdo rje me tog sogs mchod pa// 'dren
139a8(rgyud): pa thams cad mchod par bya// gsang ba'i mchod pa gang bya ba// phyag rgya thams cad yongasu bcing // phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ldan// de bzhin du ni mchod pa nyid// phyag rgya'i lan la sogs
139b1(rgyud): bkun// cho ga rab tu ldan pa dbul// rdo rdul bung dkrol ba zhing // gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdigs par bya// gdug pa'i sems ni gdul bya zhing // nyon mongs mchog tu bsad par bya/ ba
139b2(rgyud): cing brjod pa nyid du bya// rdo rje mchod pas mchod par bya// glu dang mchod pa yang dag ldan// rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya// rdo rje yi ni glu 'di dag/ phreng zhing mchog rnams mnyes par bya// btud cing dngul
139b3(rgyud): bar bya ba nyid// rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya// sha ta sha te ma ta sa ta ti ri/ Ta ta Ta ta pri ti pra ta ha te/ ma ta sha pra ta ka ta/ ku Ta bi Ta biT Ta Ta Ta baT/ i ti ta Ta Ta Ta/ ka ra Ta ra Ta ra ra Ta/ rdo rje ti rIn ti ra la/ 
139b4(rgyud): phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur bya// ji ltar 'dod pa bka' mno ngas nas// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul// sngon po dgos kyis stod g.yogs bya// sngon po yis ni mig dgapa
139b5(rgyud): bya// rdo rje ta rin ti ri yi// phyag rgya rdo rje slob ma bcing // oM grAhA badz+ra sa ma ya hUM ba// ci rigs par ni gzhug bya/ zhing // rdo rje'i sngags ni bskul bar bya// rdo rje yi ni sngags
139b6(rgyud): 'di yis// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya pra be sha yA mi// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// rgyas par ji ltar snga ma bzhin// ye shes dbab pa'i las dag ni// mkhas
139b7(rgyud): pa dag gis byi nyid// mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid// rdo rje can gyis sngar gsungs nyid// shes rab can gyis kun bslab cing // bdag nyid dang bas rab tu bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yi// 
139b8(rgyud): shes rab can gyis hUM bsgrub bya// lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun// bkug cing de ru gzhug par bya// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bslab bya zhing // bdag nyid dam ni gzhan yang rung // rdo rje phreng
140a1(rgyud): bas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje mnu yi phyag rgya yis// sngon la mna' ni bsgrags par bya// rdo rje ye shes ye shes che// rdo rje ye shes rab bsgru bya// lag pas rdo rjem
140a2(rgyud): ma gzung rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje mtshan ma rab tu sbyin// oM badz+ra pA Ni karma ka rod b+ha ba// de nas ming gi dbang bskur zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab tu
140a3(rgyud): bskul// rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba// oM badz+ra kro d+ha s+t+waM a b+hi Shi ts+tsha ma~M// oM badz+ra na ma a b+hi ShiShe ka ta he badz+rAn ma// ye shes 'byung ba phun sum tshogs/ mkhas
140a4(rgyud): pa yis ni bsgom par bya// shes rab mchog gis bslab bya zhing // rdo rje rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub// snying kar rje bris nas ni// sna tshogs las rnams yang dag ldan/ 
140a5(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar// snying kar rdo rje bsgom par bya// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongasu bsgom par bya// rgyal ba las rnams thams cad 'dzin/ 
140a6(rgyud): bdag nyid yongasu bsgom par bya// yang na khro bo'i nang nas gcig/ bdag nyid yongasu bsgom par bya// rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// 'gro ba thams cad dbab par bya// hUM satwa badz+ra kro
140a7(rgyud): d+ha A be sha a// khro bo rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje rin chen yang dag bris// bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen te// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya// rdo rje pad+ma 'grin bcings nas/ 
140a8(rgyud): zhig ma'i phyog su yang dag bri// bdag nyid rdo rje chos bsgoms nas// de nas nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// spyi bor rdo rje dri bya zhing // rdo rje 'bor ba 'dzin pa de gong// bdag nyid rdo rje la
140b1(rgyud): bsgoms nas// gdug pa thams cad bsal bar bya// ho badz+ra rat+na kro d+ha ba sha ma nA ya tra/ hriHbadz+ra d+harma kro d+ha nA sha ya phaT/ hUM karma badz+ra kro d+ha rak+Sha// lha tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni// phyag rgya / 
140b2(rgyud): bcas dgug par bya// ye shes rlab cing de nas bzung // de bzhin kho nar yang dag rlab// lag par rdo rje lcags kyu bri// bsdigs mdzub yi ge hUM ldan pa// khro bo yis ni ser mo bskyod// lha rnams/ 
140b3(rgyud): 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT// de bzhin 'og tu rkang 'thil la// rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bri// de yis lha ni gang zhig mnan// de ni dgug pa'i mchog yin no// 
140b4(rgyud): oM badz+ra kro d+ha a kra a~M ku sha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT// dpung pa bai rkyang dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje lcags kyur yang dag bri// lA da ni gang dang gang la mnan// de dang de ni dgug pa'i mchog
140b5(rgyud): badz+ra kro d+ha na A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ stan la rdo rje lcags kyu ni// yang / dag bris pas de mnan zhing // lha ni gang zhig kun tu ma nan// de dang de ni 'gugs pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha As
140b6(rgyud): na A gats+tsha ya A kaR+Sha yaM mi te he badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu smar hUM phaT/ phyag rgya dbab par yang dag dbab// mkhas pas ye shes bslab par bya// rdo rje sbyor ba thams cad kyi// sgrub pa dag kyang yang dag brtse
140b7(rgyud): g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas rnams su// bdag nyid khro bor bsgom par bya// myur du sangs rgyas ye shes ni// ring por mi thogs yang dag dbab// oM badz+ra kro d+ha kA ya A bi sha hUM a// rdo rje hUM mdzad
140b8(rgyud): yang dag sbyor// khro bo bdag nyid bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag dgug/ rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul// oM badz+ra bi d+yota ta ma ma hA kro d+ha A na ya haM b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hU~M phaT// bdag nyid/ 
141a1(rgyud): khro bo bsgom bya zhing // khro bo'i ltabs blta bar bya// 'khor ba'i brtson ra 'jigs rung bar// sems can thams cad bsad par bya// oM dr-iSh+Ta ma hA krod+ha mA ra ya sarba satwa hUM/ rtag
141a2(rgyud): tu rang nyid go dgos par// yid kyis bdag nyid bsgom bya zhing // gzhan dag kyang ni bsgom byas nas// 'gro ba 'di kun srung bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba satwa hUM phaT// gsang ba'i phyag rgya
141a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor che// rnam pa bzhi ni brlab par bya// rdo rje ye shes de nyid che// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes bsam// rdo rje khri bo snyoms 'jug pas// sems can gang phyir kun tu chags// yid kyis
141a4(rgyud): gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing // yi ge hUM ni rab tu brjod// rdo rje/ sbyor ba 'di dag ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yis// sems can gang la yongasu chags// de yi nyon mongs rnam par
141a5(rgyud): nyams// Tak+ki a sa la pe/ a la paM ats+tsha Tak+ki hUM phaT/ 'di ni lan gcig brjod pas kyang // kun nas nyon mong sa zhu zhing g.yo// Tak+ki dza/ sems can gang gi rgyud la ni/ rdo rje
141a6(rgyud): yi ni lta bas bltas// rdo rje rnal 'byor spyan chen pas// de yi sdug bsngal nyams par gyur// Tak+ki hUM/ yi ge hUM ni gyur pa las// nye ba'i sems can gang yin pa// de yi snying kar rdo rje yang / 
141a7(rgyud): rab can gyis yid kyis bsam// de nas 'jigs pa thams cad las// phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya yang // rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dang // rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab par bya// Tak+ki ho// rdo rje rnal
141a8(rgyud): 'byor rmang 'byung che// rdo rje rnal 'byor rdo rje gang // rnal 'byor mkhar 'gro dkyil 'khor no// shes rab can gyis mchog gsang rlab/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// yan lag kun la yo/ 
141b1(rgyud): su 'khyud// yi ge hUM ni sbyor byed pa// sdug bsngal rnam par nyams par gyur// rdo rje khro bo rab drag 'dzin// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// de yi khro bo'i sku gang yin// gcig tu mchog tu gas
141b2(rgyud): ba bdag/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpe'ang rung // bdag nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ru// lus ni yang dag sbyor ba ni// dbang po snyoms 'jog brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
141b3(rgyud): 'am// rdo rje khro bo'am// sems dpa' gzhan de'i lus gang yin pa dang bdag gi lus gang yin pa mtshungs par shes pa nyid 'di ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// / 
141b4(rgyud): yang na rnam par sgom pa yis// ji skad bshad bzhin yan la/ dag 'khyud// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// dpung pa dam por bsdam par bya// yan lag kun la yongs 'khyud pas// / 
141b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni snyom sa 'jug pa// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags partog mi bya// 'di/ yis mtshungs par bsgoms pa yis// mtshungs pa nyid ni dpang
141b6(rgyud): po yin// haM tre hUM gi sbyor ba'i so dag gi/ mchu bzung nas ni 'o bya zhing // sems can gang zhig rnam sgom pa// des ni bde ba don yod thob// hUM dzaM/ sems can thams cad bde byed pa// yi ge hUM de rab
141b7(rgyud): sbyor zhing // bdag nyid khro bor rnams sbyangs nas// de nas bde ba thob par 'gyur// hUM/ gang gis hUM ni rab sbyor zhing // sems can dag ni gang dag gis// yan lag thams cad bsdus byas na// 
141b8(rgyud): de yi nyon mongs bsrabs par 'gyur// hUM phaT/ ye shes chen pos thabs ldan pa// rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad nyid// de bzhin 'khor lo'i 'khor bcas pas// mkhas pa yis ni bslab par
142a1(rgyud): bya// sangs rgyas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu bdag ni bsgom pa ga / rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldanag/ sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par sgom// sgom pa'i sbyor ba de yis mi
142a2(rgyud): skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thong 'gyur// a rdo rje'i rigs pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongasu bsgom par bya// hUM/ rdo rje khro bo khro ga nyer can// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// rje rdo rje sde ru
142a3(rgyud): bdag nyid// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// hri rdo rje dbab pa khro bo che// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// a/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems la ni// rdo rje sems dpar rnam par sgom// hUM badz+ra satwa/ 
142a4(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po bdag bsgom bya// dza badz+ra rA dza/ rdo rje tshogs par ba sam par bya// ra badz+ra rA ga/ khro bo legs par bsgom pa dar bya// sa sA d+hu/ de nas rdo rje rin chen no// oM badz+ra rat+ne/ rdo
142a5(rgyud): gzi brjid de bzhin no// dz+wa lA ya/ bdag nyid rdo rje rgyal mtshan sgom// de hi/ rdo rje bzhad pa rnam par sgom// ha sa badz+ra hAs/ rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya// sho d+ha ya/ rdo rje rnon po
142a6(rgyud): rnam par sgom// ts+tshin da/ rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che// pra be sha ya/ rdo rje smra ba rnam par sgom// b+hA Sha/ rdo rje las ni bsgom par bya// karma/ rdo rje go cha rnam par sgom// rak+Sha/ rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgom pa
142a7(rgyud): bya// khAng/ rdo rje khu tshur rnam par sgom// baM/ gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid// rigs kyi lha ni ci 'dra bar// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// de ni 'di yis skad cig 'grub// hUM/ rdo rje phyag rgyas lan/ 
142a8(rgyud): cig bcing // mkhas pas rdo rje bzlas pas brjod// ji skad bzlas pa'i rgyud du bshad// gzhan du khro bo bzung bar bya// yid kyis kyang ni brjod bya zhing // lus kyi phyag rgyas bskul bar bya/ dkyil
142b1(rgyud): 'khor gsum ni mnyam sbyor bas// skad cig de la mkhas pas sgrub// de nas nyams dga' rdo rje'i rigs// phyag rgya chen po grangs med pa// lus kyi phyag rgya yang dag ldan// gang phyir sems
142b2(rgyud): can snod min pa// de yi phyir na nyung bar gsungs// phyag rgya chen po yongs bsdu ba// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba// rgyud der rab tu bshad pa yin// 
142b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i cho ga 'di yis ni// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis// skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub// 'dir ni phan yon mang po dag/ rang gi las la nges pa
142b4(rgyud): sbyar// gang zhig brtul zhing mngon par sbyor// skad cig gi/ das ni sangs rgyas 'grub// mtshams med lnga po byed pa ya dang // zhugs nas mngon par brtson 'gyur zhing // rnal 'byor tshe/ 
142b5(rgyud): ga sgrub byed na// 'grub par 'gyur bar the tsam med// tshe 'di/ la ni rnal 'byor pas// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob 'gyur/ ra// gang gis rdo rje can sbyor bas// gdon mi za bar sa
142b6(rgyud): thob 'gyur// bskal pa grangs med dka' ba ni// spyod pa'i bdag nyid med par min// rnal 'byor 'di la mngon par brtson// de bas sa ni rnyed dka' min// theg chen 'di ni gsang ba ste// sangs
142b7(rgyud): rgyas chos kyi tshul bstan pa// sangs rgyas byang chub snying po che// de las sa ni thob dka' min// g.yon brkyang cha lugs gnas nas ni// khro bo'i tshig ni rab tu brjod// khro bo'i lta bas yang dag
142b8(rgyud): khros// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdo sde'i dbang po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gsang ba de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal
143a1(rgyud): po rdo rtse mo las/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba rnam par bshang nga gsum pa rtogaso// rdo rje'i rigs las le 'ang po'o// de nas gsang byung / 
143a2(rgyud): ni kun bsdus mchog/ sems kyi dga' ba kun sbyor yang dag byung // bya ba byas shing mchog tu rnam par mdzes// rdo rje dbang phyug thams cad rnam 'phrul chags// de nas sangs rgyas kyi ni ro / 
143a3(rgyud): chen mchog/ rdo rje snying po'i thugs byung bde ldan pa// shin tu gsang ba'i yon tan mchog bsdus pa// rdo rje rgyal po bud med gzugs can gyur// e ma'o bud med dga' ba che spyod pa/ gas/ 
143a4(rgyud): ba kun tu bsdus pa las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' mtsho dag tu 'jigs mi mnga'// de yis gsungs nas cang mig sung bzhug so// gzungs kyi dam tshig yang dag byung ba mchog/ 
143a5(rgyud): ting 'dzin gnas nas chos nyid gsang ba'i ni// spyi bo rkang ma/ thil kun bsdus bstan pa las// de yi rigs kyi / kyil 'khor tshogs dag phyung // hri/ de nas dga' ba'i ming
143a6(rgyud): can dag kyang phyung // rdo rje bud med thugs las byung ba mchog/ gzugs khams mchog gi lha las shin tu 'das// rdo rje'i mtshams rnams lha mo'i tshig dag grag/ dga' bcas 'dzum pa dang
143a7(rgyud): ldan spyan mnga' ba/ bzhad cing sgeg dang bcas pa'i zhal ldan pa// tshangs sogs rigs kyi lha yi lha mo ste// yid 'ong dga' ba chen pos rgyal 'gyur ba// lha mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma de yang // 'khor
143a8(rgyud): lo'i dbusu gnas nas rtog byed pa// de yi rigs bsdus mdzes shing yid du 'ong // rdo rje chen po rdo rje rmongs byed ma// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA rA ga ma ha na ya haM// snying po sangs rgyas rmongs par byed/ 
143b1(rgyud): pas gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog kyang rmongs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi dga' ba rmongs byed dga'// sangs rgyas gzugs dag yongasu sgyur ba mchog/ rnam snang thub pa'i
143b2(rgyud): dbang phyug mchog de ni// bud med gzugs kyi sprul pa nyid du gyur// dbang phyug rngu 'phrul chen po mchog de ni// 'khor gyi sring mo gang yin bzhi por gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ye sI// de nas gsang
143b3(rgyud): ba'i brtan pa'i cho gas zhi ba// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs skus kun khyab pa// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug rmongs byed bdag/ sangs rgyas btsun mo chos nyid la gzhugs pa'i// sa ni rnam pa drug
143b4(rgyud): tu g.yos par gyur// 'od zer sna tshogs phyogs bcu dag tu gsal/ lha mo lha dang bcas pa'i lha mo rnams// zil gyi ra sa mnan cing shin tu rgyas par 'gyur// rigs kyi dkyil
143b5(rgyud): 'khor dang tshungs lha mo'i tsho gas// de dag rang gi gzhal ya/ sa khang na gnas// de nas sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung / ba yi// gsang ba'i dbang phyug 'dren pa ste// rdo rje dga' ba chen
143b6(rgyud): po rnam par dgod// gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug yi ge sni// snying po las byung chos nyid dag pa ste// rdo rje btsun mo bzhi dang dbus ma lnga// dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi shar phyogs cha la gnas// 
143b7(rgyud): mi bskyod pa yi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog/ de nas rdo rje rigs can las byung ba'i// shar gyi dkyil 'khor khro bcas dkyil 'khor bcas// mi bsod dam pa'i bdag nyid can// de yis snying po
143b8(rgyud): bskul ba gsungs par gyur// snying po rab mchog 'byung ba gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ye dzi/ oM badz+ra ro la aM ku sha A na ya sarba dzi/ oM badz+ra ro Sha karma badz+ra na shi ma A na ya dzi// 
144a1(rgyud): oM badz+ra dASh+Ta krod+hA tiSh+Tha ya sa rba rdi// rin chen 'byung ldan de ni bud med gzugs// rin chen mchog tu yid du 'ong ba des// 'khor gyi snying po dag ni bzhi po gsungs// mo badz+ra d+hig+ha
144a2(rgyud): kro d+ha ha ra ha ra sarba gar+b+ha dza~M/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la mA la pra be sha ma hA kro d+ha ag+ni dz+wa la ya sarba ra bi shA dza dzi/ oM badz+ra d+ha dza a g+na ke yU ra~M ma hA kro d+he de hi sarba dzi oM badz+ra aT+TA T+Ta d+ha si ni hA sa ma aT+TA T+TA ha ra ha ra dzi/ 
144a3(rgyud): yi ge dzi ni shin tu brtan par gnas// snying po shin tu mchog tu gyur pa gsungs// rin chen dbang phyug dam pa de yis ni// snying po bskul bar byed pa'i mchog dag gsungs// snying po mchog de
144a4(rgyud): gsungs par gyur// 'od dpag med de bud med gzugs gyu dar ba// rdo rje btsun mo dam pa 'byung ba'i mchog/ snying po da bzhi po dag ni gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra shud d+hi ha na du
144a5(rgyud): d+hi oM tIk+Sh+Na kro d+ha tshin+d+ha na sarba d+ha ri/ badz+ra he tu ma hA kro d+ha pra ba ya sar+b+ba d+hiHoM badz+ra dzi ha ma hA kr-i d+ha b+hA Sha pa tsa uta ga rA ya d+hi snying po rigs mchog brtan pa gsungs par gyur/ 
144a6(rgyud): pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang dang ldan pa mchog/ 'od dpag med pa'i gsang mchog bstan pa ste// snying po bskal ba'i mchog ni gsungs par gyur// Ni/ dga' ba chen pos mtshan ma dag kyang phyung / 
144a7(rgyud): don yod grub pa bud med gzugs gyur pas// las la shin tu bskul ba dang ldan te// 'khor gyi snying po dag ni bzhi po gsungs// oM sarba mu khe karma badz+ri Ni ma hA kro d+ha ku ru sarba Ni/ oM badz+ra ka btsa
144a8(rgyud): kro d+ha rak+Sha maM ni/ oM badz+ra kr-id+hi ma hA ya k+Shi Ni badz+ra daSh+T+rA ka rA le bi la beg sarba Ni// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti badz+ra kro d+hi ni// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dag/ mchog tu gsang ba bsdus pa dga'
144b1(rgyud): chen po// dbus kyi gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor bskul byed pa// las kyi btsun mo'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs// hUM/ dbus kyi gsang ba sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba// gtso bo 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad
144b2(rgyud): gsungs/ oM badz+ra shwa ri hUM/ oM rat+ne sha ri hUM/ oM pad me shwa rI hU~M/ oM karmA sha ri hUM/ rdo rje rgyal po dang bcas bskul ba las byung gang yin pa// rdo rje btsun mo rnal 'byor bzhi yis dbus kyi dang
144b3(rgyud): phyug nyid du gnas// rdo rje rin chen tshis ldan btsun mo yan lag mdzes pa dang ldan pa// 'di ni gsang ba'i tshogs las gzhan du rnal 'byor mchog ni 'ga' yang med// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu
144b4(rgyud): 'jigs mi mnga'// de ni rang gi 'khor tshogs dbus na bzhugadas// des ni brtse dang phan pa'i sems kyis ni// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gsungs gyur// de nas 'khor/ 
144b5(rgyud): lo'i grong khyer bstan byas nas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i bdag nyid de// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bcu na mo yi// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag bri/ 
144b6(rgyud): grong khyer rnam pa gnyi su yang dag bri// 'khor lo rnam pa gnyi su sbyar bar bya// de bzhin grong khyer 'di ru yang dag 'ong ba dang // yang na ji ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag bri// de yang phyag rgya dag gi cho ga
144b7(rgyud): dang bcas// sgom par 'os pa rdo rje yang dag bri// yang na gsang ba'i chos kyis mchod gyur pa// nga ni gzugs dang ldan pa yang dag bri// dbus kyi rim par rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs/ zhags
144b8(rgyud): padang ldan 'khor gyi phyag rgyabacas// rdo rje bar nga nor bu d+ma las// 'bar ba dang bcas medang ldan par gzhag/ sher gyi dkyil 'khol 'khor lo lnga mi bdag nyid che// rdo rje'i dkyil latsho
145a1(rgyud): / gang du mi bskyod gtso// rdo rje'i phyag rgya che dang rol par gyur// dbang phyug chen po rtse gsum ldan non mchog/ de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag dang // rdo rje lcags kyu mnga' dang dga'
145a2(rgyud): dag/ 'bar ba'i me yi 'od zer yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyag rgya lnga// de nas rin chen rigs ni yid 'ong ba// rdo rje'i dbus na rdo rje rin chen bzhugs// de nas phyogs bzhi'i
145a3(rgyud): gnas dag tu// rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan panang phyag rgya// de bzhin pad+ma'i rogs ni yid 'ong la// rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgya ste/ de nas phyogs bzhi'i mtshams dag tu// pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo de
145a4(rgyud): bzhin smra// de bzhin las kyis byas pa'i rigs de las// rdo rje rnon po me chen dang ldan pa// de yi phyogs bzhi'i mtsham ngas ni brtan pa ru// las dang gnod sbyin srung ba'i khu tshur rnams//

145a7(rgyud): lag brlab// mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa'i phyag rgyar brjod// de nas sgo dang mtshams bcas dkyil 'khor du// btsun mo dag pas gnam lcags gnod sbyin mchog/ de nas sgor

145b1(rgyud): a/ de dgas pa'i ga sa chog chu / de nas lanA ldag phre tshogs ldam// ba cu / nas nga ba rol mo // par+m+ma// de banagazhan dgang kyilal/

145b3(rgyud): zer snang ba rab tu s+ho// badz+ra kr-id+h+ra/ de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs kyis dgug par bya// dga' bas mnyes pa rdo rje yang dag ldan// oM sid d+hi ya badz+ra/ A na ya badz+ra/ de nas chags pa'i sa dang 'dzi
145b4(rgyud): chags pa// rAg ya badz+ra/ a hi badz+ra/ de bzhin nyi ma la da lta ba dz+wA la ya badz+ra/ rgyal mtshan g+hi ni de hi badz+ra/ ban dad po'i ni ha sa badz+ra// de bzhin rjesu chags pa ni kA ma ya badz+ra/ 
145b5(rgyud): ral gri gzung bar bya ba ni ts+tshe da ya badz+ra// gzhan yang bsgo ra ba yi ni// b+h+ra ma ya badz+ra/ de nas tshig gi tshogs dbyung ba bru hi badz+ra// las kyi mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan
145b6(rgyud): pa'i cho gas nI ti badz+ra// de nas go che ba ni rak+Sha badz+ra/ de bzhin du bza' ba'i ni khA hi badz+ra/ yid 'ong lus ni brtan par bcing bar bya// ban d+ha ya badz+ra/ de nas ye shes kyi ni de bzhin brkyang /

146a1(rgyud): ses smra ga du// rgyus pa na yongs // gas mchog rnas/ de nas rgyal da dzin// kun mchog gnas

146b8(rgyud): suk+Sh+ma badz+ra ts+tshed kro d+ha ts+tshind tsI ne hUM phaT// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas nas// rdo rje 'kho lo dang mtshungs 'gyur// oM badz+ra sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kA ra kro d+ha tsakra ts+tshin da pA ta a shwa ri/ pra pe sho hr-id yaM
147a1(rgyud): / ts+tshind hU phaT// nga ni brjod byed brjod pa min// bdag ni rdo rje sgrub brtan// chos 'dod pa nyid brtan byas nas// rdo rje smra ba thob par gyur// oM swA k+Sh+ma badz+ra hA ka ra krong+ka ha ra pa tsa ya la/

148b5(rgyud): phyug chen po dang bcas pa// lha rnams thams cad dgug bya zhing // bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo yis// khro bo'i mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma sa ma ya/

148b7(rgyud): mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka pA sha sa ma ba s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza A kaR+Sha ya bi d+hi bsti ra sa ma ya hUM// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par snang // rdo rje chos kyi brtan
148b8(rgyud): pa bdag/ chos kyi mchod par rab mchod pas// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+ha tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza b+hi bstir sa mi ya hUM/ bdag nyid rdo rje las
149a1(rgyud): / nyid ni// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing // las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta lo ka d+hA tu dzi bi ta ma hA
149a2(rgyud): karma pU dza bi d+hi bsti ra sa ma ye hUM// phyag na rdo rje bdag rdo rje// de bzhin gshegs rnams dgug par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod pas// mchod pa ru ni bsgom par bya// oM badz+ra saH/ 
149a3(rgyud): sid+d+hi dz+nyA ni sa ma ye hUM dzaHrdo rje lcags kyu brtan pa'i mchog/ rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// sgom pa sgrub pa bye ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya// oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha dz+nyA
149a4(rgyud): na saM ma ye hUM dza/ rdo rje chags pa bdag nyid ste// bkug dpa rnams ni mnyes par bya// rdo rje chags pas rab mtsho dad pas// bsgrub par bya zhes yang dag sbyar// oM badz+ra ra
149a5(rgyud): ti rA ga sa ma yai hUM dzaMHrdo rje legs pa rang bdag nyid// sgra ma zhing rgyal ba mnyes par bya// rdo rje legs pas ra/ kha mchod pas// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya/ 
149a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra sU d+hA karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dzaHrdo rje rin chen rgyal po che// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing // rin chen char ni kun tu dbab/ oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku
149a7(rgyud): Ti ba shI ku ru hUM// rdo rje nyi mar rang bdag nyid// 'od zer phreng ba dang ldan sgom// sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang bya zhing // phyogs rnams ni 'od zer spro// oM badz+ra sUr+ya maN+Da la bai shaM
149a8(rgyud): ku ru hUM// de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing // bdag ni pad+ma'i rgyal po nyid// sems can bsam kun rdzogs par bya// rin chen rgyal mtshan rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra d+h+wa dzA gra
149b1(rgyud): ke 'u re ba shrI ku rA d+ha// haha zhes dgod bzhung bya zhing // rdo rje bzhad pa bdag nyid de// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya// banang pa'i mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra AT+TahA/ 
149b2(rgyud): se nai pa shI ku ru hrI// bdag ni pad+ma'i rgyal po nyid// sems can bsam kun rdzogs par bya// bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes chags bya// 'dod la chags pas rab tu mchod// oM
149b3(rgyud): pad+ma rA ga ya hU~M// bdag ni rang nyid rnon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin pa brtan// bdag gis nyon mongs bcad bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs rnams chags par bya/ oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na ru ga
149b4(rgyud): ya hrI// lha mo rdo rje sgrol ma dag/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// bdag gis rdo rje can mnyes bya// 'dod cha gus brtan pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra maN+Da la rI ger
149b5(rgyud): gA yai hUM/ na mkha'i lha mo chos smra ba// brjod du med pa/ 'i bdag nyid bstan// dag pa'i chos la dga' bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs rnams mnyes par bya// 
149b6(rgyud): oM bA ki rA ge rA ga ya hUM// bdag ni rang nyid las yin te// phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu grags// bdag ni na mkha'i mdzod kyang yin// mchod pa'i char gyis rab tu mchod// oM
149b7(rgyud): badz+ra karma sa ma yaM pU dzi hUM/ bdag ni rang nyid srung ba ste// sangs rgyas byams pa brtan pa bdag/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod pa bya// chos kyi mchod pas kun tu mchod// oM badz+ra
149b8(rgyud): ka ba tsa ban d+ha rak+Sha hU~M// bdag gis nyon mongs bza' bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin brtan pa bdag bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par bya// chos kyis mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra ya/ 
150a1(rgyud): mA ra ya badz+ra daMSh+Ta hUM phaT// nga ni sangs rgyas byang chub yin// rdo rje khu tshur rang bdag nyid// phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste// las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM bar+Na/ 
150a2(rgyud): karma muSh+Ta sid d+h+ya sid+d+ha hUM phaT// 'di 'dri'i sna tshogs mchod po kun// ye shes gsang sngags rab thob byed// ma lus lha mo sems dpa' kun// rgyal po ji bzhin rab snying hUM/ sgeg mo phreng / 
150a3(rgyud): bde bzhin glu/ gar mo me tog sogs sbyor bas// sems dpa' la sogs lha mo dag/ shin tu srung ba'i mchod pa yis mchod pa'o// / de nas las ni thebs chen
150a4(rgyud): po// gang gis myur du rab grub 'gyur// gang gis dga'/ ba la sbyor ba// sbyin sregs las kyi cho ga'o// ji/ ltar sbyin sregs dngos grub kyis// las ni bla na med pa ltar
150a5(rgyud): de bzhin rig pa'i las rnams kun// de lta bu ni byed pa min// sbyin sreg rnam pa mang ldan pa// mdo ru bsdu na rnam pa lnga// rgyas par rnal 'byor chen po yi// gsang ba'i mdo
150a6(rgyud): las rab tu bshad// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnam 'phrul pa// ji ltar sbyin sreg rnam pa yis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur ba// mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya// sbyin sreg las ni
150a7(rgyud): rnam pa lnga// re re zhing yang rnam pa mang // zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa nyid// mngon spyod kyi ni gsum pa ste// dgug pa yang ni bzhi pa yin// lnga pa dbang dang yang dag ldan// sbyin sreg lnga po de rnams
150a8(rgyud): ni// dbang du byed pa mchog yin no// de nas thab khung rab bshad bya// sbyor ba ji bzhin sbyor bar bya// zhil thab khung zlum po ste// kun nas yongasu zlum po yin// rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi ste// mngon
150b1(rgyud): spyod la ni gru gsum yin// thab khung rdo rje'i rnam pa can// kun tu dgug par byed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin thab khung ring por bya// dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no// de dag rnam pa lnga ru
150b2(rgyud): bshad// thab khung las ni bla na med// srod kyi dusu zhi ba bya// snga dro'i dusu rgyas pa'i las// nyi ma phyed na mngon spyod kyi// drag po'i las ni nges par bya// dgug pa dus rnams thams cad du/ 
150b3(rgyud): mtshan mo dbang du bya ba yin// sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni// mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya// shar du kha bltas zhi don du// rgyas pa byang du yang dag gnas// lho ru kha bltas gyur/ 
150b4(rgyud): pa yis// mngon spyod kyi ni las rnamaso// steng du kha blta/ das de bzhin dgug/ phyogs rnams kun tu bltas dang radu bya// phyogs mtshoms thams cad mnyam sbyor bsam// 
150b5(rgyud): yang na nub kyi phyogasu bshad// zhi la sangs rgyas phyag ste// rgyas la nor bu'i mtshan maso// rdo rje khro bo/ mngon spyod la// dbang la pad+ma'i rigs kyis// shin tu
150b6(rgyud): dgug pa dang ldan pa// rdo rje lcags kyu dgug pa lo// sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sgrub// zhi ba'i shing ni mngar ba ste// rgyas pa de bzhin 'bras bur bcas// tsha ba
150b7(rgyud): mngon spyod las dag la// dgug pa la ni tshar ma can// dbang la me tog bcas par bshad// de rnams yam shing gi rims bzhin// sngon la yam shing rnam pa lnga// rnal 'byor pa yis yang
150b8(rgyud): dag sbyar// de la 'dam gyis zhugs pa yi// shing la zhi rab tu bsgrags// gang du sdig pa rnams 'jig shing // kun tu 'khrug par bsregs 'gyur ba// bud shing mngar bdag gi me/ mnyan/ 
151a1(rgyud): par gzhag pas rab sbar nas// til mar gyis ni sbyin sreg byas// sdig pa thams cad sreg par 'gyur// oM sarba pA pa da ha na badz+rA ya swA hA// bud shing mngar bdag gis ni/ 
151a2(rgyud): shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sbar// 'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas nas ni// bsod nams chogs ni 'phel bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA// bud shing mngar po dag gis ni// mnyam
151a3(rgyud): par gzhag pas me sbar nas// mar skyugs dur ba'i sbyin sreg gis// rdo rje tshe ni mngon 'phel 'gyur// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA// yem shing de dag nyid kyis ni// dge ba 'byung bas me/ 
151a4(rgyud): sbar nas// ku sha'i myu gu'i til mar gyis// 'jig rten gsum yang srung bar 'gyur// oM a pra ti ha ta/ badz+ra ya swA hA// sngon la zhi ba sbyar bar bya// dbus kyi gnyis
151a5(rgyud): la rgyas de bzhin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa yi// sbyin sreg las ni dang bar 'gyur// shing ni tsha ba'i yam shing gis// mngon spyod kyi ni las dag la// mngon spyod dang ni
151a6(rgyud): bcas pa yi// dgug pa la yang de nyid kyi// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyi// sngo la tsha ba'i yam shing gis// khros pas me ni rab sbar nas// mkhas pas tsher mas sbyin bsreg bya// tsher
151a7(rgyud): ma dang bcas shing dag kyang // tsher ma can gyis nges par dgug/ gang dang gang ni 'dod gyur pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par 'gugs// oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ bud shing me tog
151a8(rgyud): dmar sogs kyis// rab tu 'bar ba'i me sbar nas// me tog 'bras bu dmar po yang // sbyin sreg byas na dbang byed mchog/ hUM badz+ra pA sha ya dzaH// tsha ba'i yam shing dag bya zhing // rab
151b1(rgyud): tu drag po'i me sbar nas// 'bras bu kha ba bsregs byas na// mngon spyod kyi ni mchog yin no// hUM badz+ra mA ra ya phaT/ gsang ba'i sbyin sreg thams cad ni// de nas gzhan yang rab bsha
151b2(rgyud): bya// sbyin sreg 'khor lo cho ga yi// de nyid du ni ji bzhin sbyar// yam shing tsha ba dag gis ni// shin tu drag pas me sbar nas// 'jigs rung lcags kyus sbyin bsreg bya// gdug
151b3(rgyud): pa thams cad rab 'jigs 'gyur// oM badz+ra ban d+ha ya phaT// me tog dang bcas shing me la// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// sngags sogs 'bras bu'i sbyin sregs ni// dbang du byed
151b4(rgyud): pa mchog yin no// oM badz+ra ba shaM ka rA ya swA hA// kha ba dadang ni mngar ba nyid// yam shing mngar po sbyar bya zhing // 'dod pa'i me tog 'bras bsregs ni// 'dod pa'i gzugs/ 
151b5(rgyud): can mchog tu 'gyur// oM badz+ra kA ma rU pa Ne swA hA/ de na sa bud shing de dag nyid kyis ni// rab tu khros pos me sbar nas// smyug ma'i 'bras bu phra mo bsregs// myur du mi
151b6(rgyud): snang nyid du 'gyur// oM badz+ra a tri Sha ya// shes rab bud shing de nyid kyis// drag po'i me ni rab sbar nas// na mkha' stobs kyi me tog dang // ba sreg na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// oM
151b7(rgyud): badz+ra khe tsi ri ni swA hA// de nas mngag gzhug pa dang g.yog/ bka' bzhin byed pa rab tu bskul// ci nas kyang ni myur 'grub pa'i// go rim bzhin du rab bshad bya// shing ni kha bos
151b8(rgyud): bud shing bya// thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibasu brko// khros pas rdo rje me tog sreg/ yi ge dza ni yongasu brjod// sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul// rdo rje me tog dag
152a1(rgyud): / bsregs na// bka' byed mchog ni rnyed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra A dz+nyA kA ra ya dza// yam shing de dag nyid dang ni// thab khung de nyid brko bya zhing // byang chub sems dpa'i sman ma/ 
152a2(rgyud): gang // bsreg na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra so ra ba shaM ka ra ya dza// bude shing de dag nyid kyis me// kun tu thab khung de kho na// rdo rje sems dpa'i sman ma ni// bsregs na
152a3(rgyud): bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// hUM badz+ra pA Ni ba shaM kA ra ya dza// yang na sangs rgyas dman ma 'am// yang na bdag dang mtshan ma dag/ sgrub pa'i sbyor bas sbyin bsreg bya// sangs rgyas bka'
152a4(rgyud): bzhin byed par 'gyur// oM bud d+hi shaM ka ra ya dzaHtshig gi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sbyin bsreg bya zhing myur du grub// rdo rje'i sbyor bas dngos grub kun// the tshom mang por 'grub
152a5(rgyud): par 'gyur// rdo rje rigs la sogs kun kyang // de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rab sgrub phyir/ DA/ la 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya// rig pa gang zhig yid 'ang ba
152a6(rgyud): sring mo'i rigs ni thob pa'i phyir// rig pa'i lha mo dang ldan par// shin tu rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya// bud med ldog dang lhan cig tu// mkhas pas gdug bsten par bya// mdo sde gsang
152a7(rgyud): dbang rgyal po las// de nyid du ni ji skad bshad// kun tu gur gum phye ma dang // b+ha ga ra mig sman bcug nas ni// de yi sems dpa' shes par bya// gang phyir dgongs pa rab tu bsgrag
152a8(rgyud): sdug pa de yi rig pa ni// mngon par 'dod pa gang yin 'od// rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang // de ni bud med zhes byar grags/ rig pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni// rang gi rig kyi lha dag sgrub// mig sman
152b1(rgyud): la sogs gzhugs pa ni// pad+ma'i steng du yang dag dgod// b+ha ga pad+ma zhes bshad te// gzhug pa dgod par bshad par bya// b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mig sman dag ni bsgrub par bya// 
152b2(rgyud): b+ha ga mig sman gzhug pa ni// pad+ma'i steng du yang dag dgod// pad+ma dang ni lhan cig dgod// rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur// oM gu h+ya ra ti badz+ra she ka ri sid+d+hi hUM// gro dang du ba'abar dang rdul// rnam pa
152b3(rgyud): bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur// oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid+d+hi hUM// b+ha gar gi wang bzhag nas ni// gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzhag par 'gyur// mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi dag gis// dngos grub rnam pa bzhi ru bsha
152b4(rgyud): oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid+d+hi hUM// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya yis// b+ha gar gur gum bcug nas ni// dgab cing de ni 'bar 'gyur na// rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur// oM badz+ra d+ha
152b5(rgyud): ra gu h+ye sid+d+hi hUM// rdo rje bya ba'i sbyor ba dang // rdo rje phyag rgyab sdus pa dang // rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug dang // rdo rje khu tshur sbyar ba dang // dam tshig mchog ni 'di dag dang // hUM gi
152b6(rgyud): sor mo'i sbyor ba dang // chos kyi phyag rgya de bzhin 'dir// oM la sogs pa'i yi ge dang // sbyin sreg cho ga 'di yis ni// ye shes phyag rgya rab sgrub bya// rgyas pa ru ni thams cad dag gis
152b7(rgyud): ba'i rgyud du rab tu bshad// cho go'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje'i slob dpon dka' thub ches// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas ni// mchog nyid sgrub par 'gyur ba yin// rdo rje rigs chen yid 'ong ba/ 
152b8(rgyud): rgyud chen kun las btus pa la// gang zhig mngon par brtson 'gyur ba// de na yod pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang // sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru/ gsapa
153a1(rgyud): pa'i ring po chen po 'di// thos pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro// gsang pa'i rnal 'byor mi tshig rdzogaso// de nas gsang ba'i drug rgyu ba ni/ dkyil 'khor mkhas pas
153a2(rgyud): bslab par ga// ye shes de nyid gsang ba yang // yong su sgrub pas rab tu bskor// shin tu gsang ba chen po ni// dngos po thams cad khyab la dgod// 'di na rdo rje drug po bzhi// rang nyid lnga pa dang / 
153a3(rgyud): bcas pa// gsang ba'i brjod du med pa mchog/ ye shes mchog gi tshul thob byed// bde ba chen po rang gru ba don// dga' ba chen po shin tu brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ 
153a4(rgyud): hUM badz+ra ma Ta/ oM badz+ra pra ta b+h+r-i ku Te badz+ra ra ta/ oM pad ma badz+ra ti data/ oM badz+ra karma a tri kro d+ha// shar dang lho yi / dgas cha dang // nub dang byang gi phyogs cha dang // dbus dang
153a5(rgyud): phyogs bzhi dag tu ni// sbyar bas phyag rgya dgod par bya/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam de ni// thams cad bla zhing dgod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mthong
153a6(rgyud): 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// ji skad bshad pa'i rnal 'byor bzhin// rdo rje rnal 'byor rjes sbyor skyes// rnal 'byor dag ni lhag ma dag/ de dag thams cad brtan par bya// shin tu gsang
153a7(rgyud): bde nyid che// mchog tu gsang ba de nyid mchog/ gsang ba chen po gsung ba 'dzin// rdo rje gsang ba brtan pa che// rig pa mngon par 'dod 'gyur ba// rang gi lag gis yang dag bri/ 
153a8(rgyud): rgyal mo chen mo brjod byas na// dkyil 'khor du ni skad cig 'grub// oM sarbata thA ga ta bi shud+yA d+harma hoH// rang gis dkyil 'khor che bris nas// rig pa brjod pa la brtson pa/ byams pa
153b1(rgyud): dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor ba snying rje spyad par ga// oM bi shung d+ya d+heSh+Tu dzaH/ rang gis gsang sngags bris nas ni// bu mo'i mchul 'o byas te// 'jig rten dbang phyug btsun mo che// shes pa
153b2(rgyud): pha rol phyin lha mo// oM sa b+hA ba bi shud d+ha mu khe hA// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa yi// byang chub spyod parab rnyed dka'// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor brtan gyur na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 
153b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di ni 'jug bya zhing // 'dod pa'i yon tan mchog lnga yis// rol cing dga' ba nyid du bya// mdo sdegasang dbang las bshad pa// gsang ba lnga ni rab sgrub pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan
153b4(rgyud): lnga ru bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs// / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru brjod// 'dod pa'i sbyor ba 'di nga yis ni// skal ba can gyis dngos grub thob// gsang ba de nyid
