153b5(rgyud): chen po ste// rigs lnga dag ni rab sgrub pa// 'dod chags/ chen po rab sgrub phyir// rol cing rab tu dga' bar/ bya// bde ba chen po grub don du// spyod pa chen po tshul
153b6(rgyud): chen po// de nyid rnal 'byor kun bsdus pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// ji ltar yi ge hUM las byung // gsang ba rgyal
153b7(rgyud): po chen po byed// rdo rje hUM mdzad sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// de ltar min na phyag rgya che// dam tshig zhes bya gtan mi 'grub// phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus nas// rdo rje phyag rgya
153b8(rgyud): yongasu gzung // de nas grub pa'i phyag rgya che// grub pa cho ga yong dag gis// myur du rab tu 'grub 'gyur ba// rmang byung chen po rab bshad bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma yai hUM/ zla ba'i dkyil
154a1(rgyud): / 'khor gang bar bzhugs// drug rgya chen po yong su gzung // rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing // sangs rgyas byang chubarab tu sgrub// hU badz+ra ma ta/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal
154a2(rgyud): bdag nyid yongasu bsgom bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad 'jig byas na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// oM b+h+r-i ku Ti ba ra ta/ rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur ba// rin chen phyag rgya yongs
154a3(rgyud): gzung // rin chen char ni rab phab nas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// oM pad ma badz+ra hrIHwa/ shes rab sbyin du rang bdag nyid// rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing // pad+ma'i rigs
154a4(rgyud): chen bskul bar bya// hUM kaR+Sha badz+ra kri ti ti/ sna tshogs rdo rje rgyu dal po che// bya ba sna tshogs bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas thams cad mchid byas na// dngos grub las ni thob par
154a5(rgyud): 'gyur// bud mod sdug deng lhan cig tu// dkyil 'khor/ dag ni yang dag bya// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po la/ sa// rnam pa bzhi ni rab tu byung // de nas mtshan nyid sna
154a6(rgyud): tshogs yongs bsdus pa// rab tu spyan yang dga' ba chen po mchog/ de bzhin tshogs dang rdo rje spyan ldan pa// shes rab sbyin gyis btsun mo mchog chen ldan/ 
154a7(rgyud): oM badz+ra karma ho// badz+ra hUM hA/ ka Ta ma Ta/ ra Ta pa Ta/ ka ra Na badz+ri gri/ badz+ra gu ru/ badz+ra phaT/ ka ra ra gr-i/ shud d+hi g+hi/ shud d+hi/ shud d+he gri/ bud d+ha/ satwa rA dza/ rA ga/ duSh+Ti/ rat+na/ 
154a8(rgyud): tedza/ katu/ hAs/ d+harma/ tIH/ heH/ g+ho She/ d+yaH/ rak+Sha/ 9\u0f7f/ san+d+hi saud+d+hi/ yog/ kuH/ bi shaka/ r+ra/ tsir/ dz+nyAn/ rat+na/ sa~Mb+ha/ taka kr-i/ d+hu Ta/ hUMg tu mo/ d+hum/ d+hu/ 
154b1(rgyud): d+hA/ \u0f88\u0f90/ b+h+ya/ d+hu/ sa// // / d+hA/ n+ya// // / smos blag saHdz+haiM/ yos rgyu ga tam/ 
154b2(rgyud): thig / oM sarba ta thA ga ti tsikrId+d+hi/ oM au nuta pon nA ai.au an+d+rar+yA ta AM/ o a na le au/ i nI le i/ o r-it+na su/ oM rat+na u/ o se ur/ o la e ri/ 
154b3(rgyud): / o a ta laM/ oM A hA ra ra lo// oM a sha ne e/ o b+haM ha g+ne ai/ oM sarba shI pa ri pUr+the o/ oM b+ha ra de o// oM s+pha ra Ne au/ o bi shwa aHo maho tse br-i ka/ oM tiSh+Tha khA/ 
154b4(rgyud): oM a mu kha ga/ oM e b+hi She g+na/ oM dz+nyA neng / oMts+tsha tsa/ oM bA ra hir+ya tsha/ oM b+h+yA shai dza/ oM b+hu d+he dz+nyA/ oM pra sha meny+dza/ oM kro d+hi Ti/ oM ha ra NIH/ oM b+hI g+ha Da/ oM kA peT+Ta/ 
154b5(rgyud): o aN Na/ oM Tak+ki le ta/ oM bi su le the/ oM d+hA ra NaM / oM bta ke d+ha/ oM ba lo ke na/ au tra te pa/ oM sarbaH/ ra Ni pha/ oM b+hu sha ni ba/ oM b+hi ba shi ni b+ha/ oM A re te ma
154b6(rgyud): / oM a li ni/ ya/ oM tra hra ra/ oM ba sha la/ oM bud d+he wa/ oM d+ha me sha/ oM yaM b+he Sha/ oM sar+b+be sa/ oM d+ha li ni ha/ ho tha/ hUM dzeHhA sa/ oM a/ ba haM/ a ro/ ni bi/ da sha/ tra ra d+hi/ b+hu ba/ sa ya/ 
154b7(rgyud): a hi/ kro d+ha/ d+ha ma sha/ b+ha ra ya/ yuk+ti/ der sha na/ hA sa ya/ he ma hA Ne/ d+ha ra Na/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa bi dz+nyA ma hA mu Ne rA dza gar+b+ho rA dza kra ya hi hUM hUM hA hA ha/ de bzhin
154b8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di// mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs pas// chos dbyings brtan pa'i rang bzhin te// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung // bde legs sgom pa byas dang / 
155a1(rgyud): mtshungs pa med// e ma'o gsang pa chen po gsung bkun bsdus pa/ rnal 'byor rgya cher bsdus pa'ang mtshungs pa med// bde chen po 'di ni brtan pa'i dngos por chu
155a2(rgyud): dga' ba chen po'i slob dpon dga' chen nyi ma ste// mchod 'os gsang ba'i kun bsdus pa// kun mkhyen gsung las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// tshogs rgyas rab tu 'phel bar gyur
155a3(rgyud): pa gsungs pa yin// rdo rje chen po skal ba ches// gsang ba thams cad rje suM bslag/ de nyid tshes ni rnal 'byor che// stug po bsdus pa 'jug par bya// brgya dang sum cu rtsa drug lhag// tshogs kyi/ 
155a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// bri dang rdor tshig yi ge yi/ das// dkyil 'khor gsang ba bslab par bya// rgyud kyi de dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di
155a5(rgyud): ru ni// de nyid yi ge rnam dag pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po'/ jug par bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi sa ni rnam par brgya ni// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ 
155a6(rgyud): dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis// sdug po gsang ba shin tu brtan// de nyid gsang ba bslab bya'i phyir// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab// a ma
155a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyar ba yis// gsang po'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod// gru bzhi mnyam pa'i rim pa ni// de nyid kyi
155a8(rgyud): ni nang du bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// ci rigs par ni yang dag bri// ngos bzhi'i rang bzhin
155b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la// yi ge sum cu rtsa drug dgod// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// yi ge bcu drug yang dag bri// yi ge bcu drug rgyal po ni// phyag rgya'i tshogs dang 'od bcas pa// dkyi
155b2(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i logs bzhi ru// yi ge rnams ni yang dag bri// yi ge sum cu sum cu ni// phyogs rnams kun tu dgod par bya// sangs rgyas thugs ka'i dbus ni// yi ge hUM ni sbyar ba
155b3(rgyud): bya// gang zhig sbyor ba'i ming can gyi// sangs rgyas dbusu dgod par bya// rdo rje yi ge rab sbyor byed// shes rab can gyi yi ge rnams// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yis// dbusu rdo rje rdo rje bzhi
155b4(rgyud): shar du yi ge sum du bri// yi ge sum cu de bzhin lhor/ sum cu byang gi phyogs cha ru// nub tu sum cu sbyar bar dbya// yi ge bcu drug yang dag sbyor// dbusu sangs rgyas bzhi
155b5(rgyud): ldan bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor/ dbang phyug dbang phyug che// dpal ldan 'jig rten rnal 'byor ldan// dbab pa brtan pa'i tshogs gyur pa// sgrub
155b6(rgyud): les byung rgyal ba che// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'jug par bya// u ro ti ko ta ma hUMr+ya yo d+hAr+ya bar te nA ma ne// de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje 'khor lo gzhug par bya// ha ha ho haM gas
155b7(rgyud): chen po'i// rtse gsum ral pa gsum 'dzin pa// rgya chen gzi brjid chen po'i don// rdo rje thig gis yongasu bskor// slob dpon chen pos blta byas nas// yi ge rab tu brjod par bya// 
155b8(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yis// rdo rje'i 'khor lo kun tu spro// a A'i rnal 'byor yang dag gzung // oM I dbang phyug chen po'i 'od// u u rnon po 'chang ba ste/ oM e s+tha
156a1(rgyud): / dbyangs rab bskul ba// oM oM skyabs byed rtsibs chen po// a aHshes rab spyan bzang ba// rdo rje lcags kyu 'di yis kyang // rdo rje 'chang ni bskul bar bya// ji ltar
156a2(rgyud): 'khor lo ji ltar rigs// ji 'os ji ltar rdo rje'i tshogs// de bzhin 'khor lo yongasu dgod// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// skal ba chen po gsang ba 'di// rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag
156a3(rgyud): sbyor// rnam 'phrul de ni rab tu bskor// 'khor lo dbab dang gzhug pa dang // cho ga ji bzhin 'jug par bya// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// rgyas par ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// 
156a4(rgyud): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // 'khor lo dkyil de 'khor dang ldan pa// 'khor lo'i gnas ni dbang du gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan// rdo rje 'gugs
156a5(rgyud): dang skal ldan dang // nges byed rin chen gzi brjid dang / rgyal mtshan bzhad pa yang dag ldan// chos dang rna ni po gtso bo mchog/ rgyu dang gtum po drag po che// las dang
156a6(rgyud): srung ba gnod sbyin grub// sna tshogs sbyor ba yang dag ldan// 'khor lo'i rnam par 'bral pa 'byung // de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje 'khor lo kun tu bri// rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon
156a7(rgyud): gyis// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya// bu dang slob ma min pa la// gsang po'i tshogs chen sbyin mi bya// gzhan du skal ba dang ldan pa// gzhung 'di khyed kyis ci bder byin// 
156a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo las rdo rje rigs kyi de kho na
156b1(rgyud): nyid shin tu gsang ba'i bshad pa ste le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pas slar yang de bzhi/ 
156b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur te// rdo rje hUM mdzad rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje mchog 'dzin rdo rje'i mngal// rdo rje khrog
156b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i lus// rdo rje 'bar ba rgyal mtshan che// rdo rje gang rgyangs rdo rje'i bdag/ rdo rje sde ste chos mchog 'dzin// rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tu no// rdo rje 'khor lo bzlas pa che// las kyi rdo rje
156b4(rgyud): rje che/ rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jigs chen po// rdo rje phyag rgya chen po// rdo rje khu tshur brtan pa che// rdo rje 'bar ba las chen po sna ma' chen po// rdo rje legs bdag
156b5(rgyud): che/ rdo rje rgyun ni 'brog byed pa// rdo rje da rgyal mtshan che// rdo rje tshams ni rabadag rag// rdo rje pad+ma shin tu gcod// rdo rje la 'khor rdo rje reg/ rdo rje lpags te/ 
156b6(rgyud): sna tshogs che// sna tshogs mtshon chen skye dgu mnga'// go cha chen po rdo rje sku// rdo rje mche 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje bsdoms pa rdo rje che// rdo rje khro bo gzhu chen po// rdo rje lcags kyi
156b7(rgyud): mdzod chen po// zhags pa chen po dadang chen po// rdo rje lcags sgrogs 'bebs po che// rdo rje dbabang 'jigs byed pa// yi ge dza ste yi ge hUM// yi ge hUM ni dam du 'ching / yi ge tshaM sde yi gas
156b8(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgya dregs pa mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' khri chi// lcags kyu bsdigs med dri rje gro// rdo rje bdud sngo bdud kyi mchog/ bdud kyi bdud ni rab jom sa pa// rdo rje dga' bani
157a1(rgyud): rdo rje dka'abub shis mdzud ga// rdo rje drug po shin tu gdug/ rdo rje rang dbang blo mdzad// rdo rje dod pa khro che// rdo rje sgra ste sgra chen po// sangs rgyas hUM mdzad yi ge hUM/ yig/ 
157a2(rgyud): phaT sogs dang mnyam pa// yi ge phaT ni 'bar ba'i bka'// yi ge swA hA rang bdag med// gtso bo gsod dang slob mdzad pa// dri med skrag dang dbugs 'byin mdzad// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
157a3(rgyud): khro bo che// khro bo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags las byung de bzhin nyid// rdo rje khro bo khyod phyag 'tshal// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// nyin re zhing du lan gcig ni// gang
157a4(rgyud): zhig 'don par byed pa de// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// de dag la ni 'jig pa med// phongs dang bran dedag nyid mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bstan pa// dngos
157a5(rgyud): grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyod la gsol/ ba 'debs// gdug pa rnams ni gdul ba dang // de ba zhin sems can don bya'i phyir// tshul chen bskyed par
157a6(rgyud): mdzad du gsol// gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badz+ri zhal snga
157a7(rgyud): nas dang // lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyi sgyur cing zhus pa'o// bam po bcu gnyis pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ra ha s+yo nA ma tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ thams cad gas
157a8(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'byung lnga nyid kyis lnga yi bdag nyid can// mi rnams lus la nges par mthong ba dag
157b1(rgyud): rang sems rab tu bsgom par gyur na ni// dngos der bsgom pas nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur// rang shes gsang bdam pa ni// sangs rgyas ye shes du med de// gnyis med gnyis
157b2(rgyud): tshul can te// sangs rgyas rtag par rab tu 'dud// yang dag bdag med las byung zhing // gnyis med ye shes las byung ba/ sdug dang mi sdug rnam spangs pa// ci la'ang phyag ni mi
157b3(rgyud): te/ ma skyes pa ni yang dag skyed// skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni// sangs rgyas skur ni sgom pade// rang gi ye shes mchog phyag 'tshal// rnal 'byor pa dang sems can kun
157b4(rgyud): ma skyes pa ni yang dag skyed// skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni/ nyon mongs bag chags kyis sun 'byin// lus can rnams ni 'khor gyur pa// sdug dang mi sdug rnam
157b5(rgyud): 'byed yin// sems gang de nyid sdug bsngal te// se/ mas can rnams kyi lus 'byung ngo // sems de yi ni rgyun nyid kyis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod par 'gyur
157b6(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mgon// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus gcig pu// sangs rgyas thams cad rtogs gyur pa// sangs rgyas 'khor ba sgrol ba po// sems can
157b7(rgyud): kun la phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje'i nyams dang yang dag ldan// rgyu yi de nyid mnyam sbyor bas// 'bras bu'i de nyid rnams kyang ston// 'bras bu'i de nyid yang dag zhugs// rgyu yi
157b8(rgyud): de nyid mi 'dod do// gang du 'dod pa skyes gyur pa// de nyid 'khor ba'i bag chags yin// mkhas pa yi ni cho ga yis// sgom pa ru ni yongasu brtags// gang zhig slar yang gcig/ 
158a1(rgyud): gyur pa/ rnal 'byor ba yirna la 'byor drung // sangs rgyas rjes dran la dmigs shig/ chos ni rje su dmigs pa yi// tshogs gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rlung gnyis das/ 
158a2(rgyud): pa nyid du 'gyur// b+ha gar ling go rab gzhag s+ho// sangs rgyas skur ni rnam par bsgom// sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sprin ni bsgom par bya// b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhan
158a3(rgyud): ste/ rdo rje chos ni rnam par sgrom// chos ni rjes dran rnal 'byor pa// chos kyi sprin las char rab 'bebs// mtshan ma ling gzhes bshad de// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma rnam pa bani// 'joms pas
158a4(rgyud): b+ha ga zhes bshad de// nyon mongs 'joms pa'i dam pa yin// sems can kun gyi dngos kun gyi// rang sems chos ni ba sdus pa yin// chos bdag med pa'i sbyor ba yis// gsang
158a5(rgyud): na rang nyid 'chi bar 'gyur// rang gi sems nyid rdzogs sa ngas rgyas// rtogs par bya ba sems nyid yin// ra gi sems nyid bsad bya ba// sems nyid kho na bsad pa
158a6(rgyud): bya// sbyor ba nyid dang yang dag 'bel// gang yang srid pa 'byung ma yin// gang tshe sangs rgyas de tshe ni// sbyor lnga sangs rgyas bdag ces sgom// ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba// sangs rgyas nyid
158a7(rgyud): phyir mdor bsdus pa// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor med par ni// rnal 'byor pa ni 'tshang mi rgya// phra mo'i dngos po ji bzhin mthong // sdug pa'i dngos por de bzhin te// dngos dang dngos med khyad par ni/ 
158a8(rgyud): sgom pa kun tu brtags pa yin// dngos po sgom pa'i dngos ma yin// sgom par bya ba sgom pa min// dngos po sgom par gyur pa yis// rang gi sems ni yongasu sbyang // sangs rgyas sangs
158b1(rgyud): rgyurgyas yul ma yin// sems can yul du'ang mi 'gyur gyi// rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rdzogs pas min// gnyis med sbyor ba 'di la yang / ting nge 'dzin
158b2(rgyud): gyi ye shes brtag/ rgyu yi de nyid ji ltar mthong // 'bras bu'i de nyid de nyid yin// rgyu yi de nyid cung zad med// 'bras bu'i de nyid de bzhin no// de nyid de ni de bzhin shes// de nyid rnal 'byor pa
158b3(rgyud): kun spyod // rgyu yis rgyu ni dngos por min// 'bras bu'i dngos por 'bras bus min// rgyu de 'bras bu'i dngos por rung // rang gi sems ni so sor snang // ye shes de ni rgyu dngos te// gsang de 'bras bu'i dngos
158b4(rgyud): po yin// gsang ba gnyis med spyod pa yis// de yis dngos dpos mchog yin no// de nyid de nyid rtogs gyur pa// gas dang de gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba de rig shes pa ste// 
158b5(rgyud): mchog ni mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// sdug pa'i ngo bor gang bshad pa// mi sdug pa yang de yi dngos// sdug dang mi sdug gzugs gang yin// mi mthong de ni de bzhin gshegs/ 
158b6(rgyud): rnam shes tsam ni med pa ru// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor 'byung mi 'gyur// ji ltar ye shes mchog dag pa// de ltar dag pa de bzhin gshegs// rnam par shes pa rnam pa bzhi// phyag rgya
158b7(rgyud): bzhi yi cho ga yis// gsang ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis// sku gsung thugs ni yang dag byung // thugs ni phyag rgya chen po ste// dam tshig phyag rgya kun tu 'gro/ chos kyi phyag rgya gsung
158b8(rgyud): gi ste// las kyi phyag rgya sku yi yin// rgya yis rgyas btab dngos po ni// gsang bdag gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa'o// rang rig pa yi ngo bo yis// tingange 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin// 
159a1(rgyud): lus ngag sems su rnam brtags pa'i// bya ba rgyud du rnam brtags pa// gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// rdo rje las can sna tshogs bzhin// sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag
159a2(rgyud): nyid ni// gsang ba'i ye shes bla med yin// phyag rgya bzhi po gsang ba de// rnal 'byor pa yis las grub byed// 'byung ba chen po bzhi po yang // phyag rgya bzhi zhes bshad pa yin// phyag rgya bzhi
159a3(rgyud): yis mnyam sbyor ba// lha mo bzhi dang yang dag sbyor// sa ni spyan zhes bshad pa yin// chu ni mA ma ki zhes bshad// me dang rlung zhes grags pa ni// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma yin// dbang
159a4(rgyud): chen sa yi khams yin te// chu yi khams ni chu dkyil 'a khor// me ni me yi khams yin te// rlung ni rlung gingadakyil 'khor ro// dbang chen kha dog ser po ste// gru bzhi pa
159a5(rgyud): ste rgyas pa yin// chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ste// dkar/ po'i mdog can zhi ba'i yin// me yi dkyil 'khor kha dog dmar// gru gsum dbang gis las rnams la'o// rlung
159a6(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs// nag po'i gdug pa'i las rnams la// 'byung ba che'i bdag las grub pa// las kyi dngos grub yon tan bzhi// las kyi dngos grub dngos grub mchog/ 'khor
159a7(rgyud): los bsgyur ba rnam pa bzhi// zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul// rgyas pa pad+ma'i rdo rje can// dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas// rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la'o// zhi ba dgongs ka bya ba yin// de bzhin rgyas pa
159a8(rgyud): lnga dro la// gdug pa'i las rnams nyi ma'i gung// dbang gi las ni mtshan phyed bya// zhi la dkar po sbyar bar bya// ser por snang ba rgyas pa la// dbang gi las la dmar po ste// gdug pa nag po rab
159b1(rgyud): tusbyar// ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba// las kyi sgrub pa dam pa yin// bcom ldan dag pa bsgom bya ste// sangs rgyas kun las mi g.yo gyur// b+ha ga'i dbusu gsang ba'i bdag/ rdo rje
159b2(rgyud): dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs// lnga yi bdag gyur bdag nyid ni// bsgoms na g.yo ba med par 'gyuraro// snying la gnas pa'i lha mo che// rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor bskyed// sangs rgyas thams
159b3(rgyud): cod bskyed mdzad yum// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang pos bshad// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// 'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug mi mnga'// rdo rje dbying
159b4(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs// chags dang sdang dang rmongs pa rnam nas// bsgoms nas khams gsum pa yi bdag/ sang das rgyas bcom ldan 'das gyur te// sangs rgyas bden pas
159b5(rgyud): dug bcom mo// rang sems so sor rtogs pa yis// gti mug sems ni de bzhin gshegs// rmongs pa nyid ni 'jig rten gyur// sems can kun la blta bar bya// zhe sdang
159b6(rgyud): sems ni de bzhin gshegs// phra mo'i ye shes yang dag bskyed// sdang gyur rdo rje nyid du gyur// sems can thams cad gzhig par bya// 'dod chags sems ni de bzhin gshegs// 
159b7(rgyud): byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// chags gyur bzang po nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas thams cad chags par bya// byams pa'i sems ni de bzhin gshegs// nga rgyal yang dag bskyed nas ni// 
159b8(rgyud): mdza' bor gyur cing kun nyid gyur// sangs rgyas kun la 'khyud par bya// chags pa'i lta bas byams pa ste// thugs rje'i chos ni smra ba dang // kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang // sangs rgyas
160a1(rgyud): thams cad mnyes bya'o// rnal 'byor sbyin las rab dga' ste// tshul khrims ldan las dri med 'gyur// bzod pa las ni 'od byed pa// brtson las 'od 'phro can dang ldan
160a2(rgyud): bsam gtan las ni sbyangs dka' ba// shes rab kyis ni mngon gyur mthong // thabs chen las ni ring du song // stobs dang ldan las mi g.yo 'gyur// smon lam gyis ni legs blo ldan// 
160a3(rgyud): ye shes ldan las chos kyi sprin// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni// rang ri bdag nyid bcu gcig 'gyur// pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams dang // stobs dang dbang ni rdzogs gyur cing // 
160a4(rgyud): sa bcu las ni 'das gyur pa// mtshan ma brtan gyur de da las ni// rdo rje chu ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// chos kyi bdu dad rtsi bcud len yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtha' yas pa// 
160a5(rgyud): gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yin// chos kyi bdud rtsib cud kyis len// rdo rje'i chu ni dag 'thungs pas// rdo rje/ slob dpon rnal 'byor pa// gdod nas dag par de tshe 'gyur// 
160a6(rgyud): gdod nas dag par gnas gyur pa// de nas byang chub semasu 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi bdag can 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// rnam par grol ba'i ras kyis
160a7(rgyud): g.yogs// byang chub sems ni bla na med// yang dag bskyed gyur rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje sems dpa' snying la 'dug/ sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa'i// mar gyur dam tshig
160a8(rgyud): 'dzin byed pa// rdo rje dam tshig gis spyad na// rtag tu dam tshig gnas par gyur// khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// bud med ces bshad ji snyed pa// cho ga bzhin du kun spyad
160b1(rgyud): cing / thugs kyi rdo rje smad mi bya// rdo rje gsum gyi sku la gnas// dam tshig phyag rgya ji snyed pa// rdo rje dam tshig gsum gyis bya// gsung gi rdo rje skad mi bya// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung/ 
160b2(rgyud): ba'i// phyag rgya kun ni bud med bzang // de rnams bstan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// phyag rgya thams cad dbang du 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// bud med ces bya ji snyed pa/ 
160b3(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis// de dag kun la nye bar spyad// gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// nga rgyal ma
160b4(rgyud): yin hU~M ma yin// rig pa ma yin sngags rig min// lag pa'i phyag rgya'ang mi bca'o// mchod rten gyi ni la das mi bya// glegs bam dag kyang bklag mi bya// dkyil 'khor
160b5(rgyud): dag ni mi bya zhing // rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi 'tshal/ slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// khyod kyi srog chags bsad par bya// brdzun
160b6(rgyud): gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// khyod kyis mo byin blang bya zhing // gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya// sbyin sreg yang na bsam gtan min// lus ngag yid ni mi phyed pa// gzhan min
160b7(rgyud): sems kyis bya ba ste// 'di ni bsad pa'i mchog yin no// sngags rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub// rnal 'byor kun kyang rnam kun tu// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyang // sangs
160b8(rgyud): rgyas chos nyid sgom par bya// ma 'dres chos ni bco brgyad po// sangs rgyas chos zhes bshad pa yin// de rnams rtag tu sgom pa ni// sangs rgyas chos ni sgrub byed yin// bsam gtan
161a1(rgyud): bzhi dang gzugs med bzhi// rtag tu thob par byas pa dang // 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug de yis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu sgrug/ byang chub phyogs ni sum cu 'dun/ chos
161a2(rgyud): su yang dag bshad pa gang // de rnams bsgom pas dag pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba na yin// 'gro ba rnams la spro ba'i sems// brtan zhing snying po rab bsgoms pa// stong pa de nyid
161a3(rgyud): las byung ba// rdo rje ye shes zhes bya bshad// chos bdag me los yang dag byung // gnyis med ye shes dam pa ste// chos nyid mchog gi ye shes ni// chos kyi dbyings zhes yang dag bsha
161a4(rgyud): 'di ni chos dbyings ye shes te// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes // rdo rje ye shes rang bzhin sems// rdo rje dbyings zhes bya dpar bshad// sems kyi spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// phra mo'i ye
161a5(rgyud): sogs sbyor ba// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/ rnam par snang mdzad ces byar bshad// byams pa sgra ba'i sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba spyod par byed pa'i mchog zag
161a6(rgyud): med brtan par gyur pa yi// thugs ni mi skyod pa zhes bshad// thugs rje spro nga'i tshul gyis ni// sems can phan 'dogs mdzad pa po// thugs ni 'gro don yang dag ldan// rin chen 'byung ldan
161a7(rgyud): zhes bshad do// dga' bas spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// theg chen mchog ni dri ma med// thugs ni 'od gsal dag pa ni// 'od dpag med ces de bshad do// btang snyoms spro bar mdzad pa'i shugs// 
161a8(rgyud): sems can thams cad rtogs mdzad pa// don yod bla med bya ba ni// don yod grub par de bshad do// byang chub rang bzhin ye shes mchog/ de 'dir rdo rje zhes bshad de// rdo rje ye shes las
161b1(rgyud): byung ba// rdo rje sems dpar de bshad do// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pa// rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad de// rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun gyi rgyal// rdo rje rgyal por de bshad do// sangs rgyas/ 
161b2(rgyud): thams cad chags byed pas// mnyes par byed pa zhes bshad do// bdud kyi sbyor ba chags pa che// rdo rje chags par de bshad do// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing // leg so zhes pa rab
161b3(rgyud): sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed pas// rdo rje legs par de bshad do// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang // mkha' mnyam rdo rje las byung ba// don yod rin chen chen po de// rdo rje
161b4(rgyud): rin chen de bshod do// ma rig bral ba'i ye shes ni// cho ga ras dag las ni nges par byung // thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che// rdo rje nyi mar de bshad do// rnam pa kun gyi dngos ye shes/ 
161b5(rgyud): thar pa'i lam 'jug thob mdzad gang // chos kyi rgyal mtshan/ tog chen po// rdo rje dpal du de bshad do// rdo rje bzhad pa/ rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun 'byung rmad byung ba/ 'di ni
161b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' che// rdo rje bzhad par de bshad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas chos ni rtogs mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dag pa/ rdo rje cho su de bshad
161b7(rgyud): do// shes rab rnon po theg pa che// nyon mongs thams cad nges gcod mdzad// sheso bya'i sgrib pa gcod pa po// rdo rje rnon por de bshad do// sangs rgyas rol mo'i 'khor lo ni// chos kyi
161b8(rgyud): 'khor lo rab bskor bas// sems dpa' chen po theg pa che// rdo rje rgyu zhes de bshad do// shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag/ gsung gi sgra ni rnam par spang // 'jam pa'i gsung gi bdag nyid
162a1(rgyud): gyur// rdo rje smra bar de bshad do// pha rol phyin pa kun gyi zhabs// chos rnams thams cad rtogs mdzad pa// sems can kun don sprul pa po// rdo rje las zhes bya bar bshad/ 
162a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas rjes dran yang dag grub// theg pa dman pa rnam spangs shing // byang chub sems la rab zhugs pa// rdo rje srung bar de bshad do// sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing // de bzhin nyon mongs
162a3(rgyud): rnams sreg la// nyon mongs zad pa nyer len pas// rdo rje'i gnod sbyin de bo shad do// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// bcing ba ru ni yang dag gyur// de nyid de nyid ye shes te// rdo rje khu tshur zhes
162a4(rgyud): bshad do// dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni// rdo rje bsdams las yang dag byung // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gyur pa// las dkyi phyag rgya zhes bshad do// nga rgyal med cing snang ba med// 
162a5(rgyud): mtshan ma med cing zhen pa med// bdag med mnyam nyid ye shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad// gsang ba'i mnyam par 'byor pa 'dir// ye shes pha rol phyin dag
162a6(rgyud): ba// rnam pa bcu gnyis yang dag byung // rdo rje pha rol phyin pa'i 'od// byang chub sems ni rab bsgom pas// pha rol sangs rgyas nyid son pa'i// pha rol phyin thob ye shes ni// rdo rje sems mar
162a7(rgyud): bshad pa yin// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams ni// shes rab pha rol phyin rdo rje// chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa ni// rdo rje rin chen mar bshad do// gsang ba'i ye shes ye shes che// de nyid
162a8(rgyud): pha rol phyin dge ba/ pha rol phyin pa che las byung // rdo rje chos mar shes par bya// pha rol phyin pa'i dge ba ni// sbyor ba'i thabasu rab bstan pa// rdo rje las mar shes par bya// gang phyir de ni rol pa dge/ 
162b1(rgyud): sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// tshul khrims pha rol phyin dge bas// rgyan pa'i yan lag yid 'ong yin// glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin// cheng du brjod pa'i chos brjod pa'o// gar ma brtson
162b2(rgyud): 'grus pha rol phyin// myur du sangs rgyas nyid ster ba'o// gdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin// kun tu khyab par spros phyir ro// me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma
162b3(rgyud): gos pa'o// mar me smon lam pha rol phyin// phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yin// dri ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// dri ngan thur sel dge ba yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// dbye ba
162b4(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi yis gnas// thams cad 'dod pa'i thabs tshe ngan po// rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad do// byang chub spyad/ rapa spyod byed pa// rdo rje zhags pa zhes bshad do// theg pa 'di la
162b5(rgyud): brten gyur gang // rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bshad do// cho sa rnams thams cad ma skyes shing // gdod nas zhi ba ma/ kha' dang mnyam// de lta'i tshig ni rab 'jug pas// rdo rje dril bu
162b6(rgyud): zhes bshad do// tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis// sems can kun gyi don ston pa'i// sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// yang dag rdo rje rtog
162b7(rgyud): pa ste// 'dzin pa'i sbyor nyid lcags kyu yin// phra rab 'bigs pa mda' zhes bya// dgyes pas legaso zhes bya ba// spras pas rin po che ru bshad// gzi brjid ces bya nyi ma yin// sgreng
162b8(rgyud): bas tog tu bshad pa ste// rnam par 'byed pas bzhad par bshad// 'dod chags dag pa pad+ma yin// nyon mongs dgra bcom ral gri ste// dkyil 'khor sbyor bas 'khor lo yin// gang
163a1(rgyud): gi brjod pas smra bar bshad// kun nyid sna tshogs rdo rje yin// gzhig dka'i sbyor bgo cha yin/ 'jigs pa'i spyod pas mche ba ste// phyag rgya'i sbyor nyid bcing ba yin
163a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ni gang bshad pa// yid kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// gzhal yas khang ni ye shes te// sems kyi brtsegs pa spring ba yin// phyi yi gru bzhi pa gang yin// tshad kyis mnyam
163a3(rgyud): nga nyid gyur pa// byams pa la sogs sems gang yin// thig bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin// chos kyi sbyor ba rjes dran nyid// gang de rdo rje thig du bshad// lta ba kun las rnam grol ba/ 
163a4(rgyud): ye shes thig tu bshad pa yin// tshul khrims tshogs kyi dam pa ni// gang zhig rgyun du bshad pa yin// dang dadabang la sogs sems gang yin// rab lngar ni yang dag byu
163a5(rgyud): rnam par thar pa bzhi po ni// sgo rnamasu ni yang dgra bshad / yang dag spong ba bzhi po ni// rta babs rnams dang ka bar byung // dran pa nyer bzhag bzhi po ni// khyams rnams
163a6(rgyud): bzhi por shes par bya// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni// de ni sgo khyud rnam bzhi yin// byang chub yan lag bdun po ni// phreng ba me tog chun rgyan pa// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad po
163a7(rgyud): ni// ka ba brgyad ces bya bar bshad// sgrib pa gnyis las rnam grol zhing // ting 'dzin ye shes kyis brtags pa// lam gyi ye shes khyad par rnams// rnga yab ces ni yang dag bshad// 
163a8(rgyud): nyon mongs thams cad nges gcod cing // nyon mongs 'phrog pas dra ba ste// yang dag gcod cing spong ba nyid// sel ba'i spong ba la gnas pa// tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba nyid// nyon mongs
163b1(rgyud): pa yi phyed 'phrog pa// dra ba phyed ces bya bar bshad// rang bzhin 'od gsal gang yin de// byang chub sems ni bla med yin// sems ni don kun bskyed byed pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ 
163b2(rgyud): yin par bshad// shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes// thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// tshon rtsi lngar ni yang dag
163b3(rgyud): zhes// lta ba lnga yi me tog yin// ye shes lnga yi nges sbyor nyid// sangs rgyas lnga zhes yang dag bshad// nam mkha' bzhin du bdag med pa'i// rnam shes ye shes dam pa yin// 
163b4(rgyud): ye shes de yi rgyan bshad pa// chags pa'i sems zhes bya bar bshad// chags bral las ni byang chub 'byung // chags pa'i sems las gzhan yin no// de bas chags
163b5(rgyud): dang chags bral ba// byang chub sems zhes yang dag pa shad// 'jig rten chags dang bral bas 'dul// phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las byung // der ni thabs kyi
163b6(rgyud): sgom pa dag/ dngos grub thams cad ster ba yin// ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur ba// de ltar rnal 'byor pa yis spyad// ji ltar gdul bya dag gyur pa// zhen pa kun tu mchod par
163b7(rgyud): 'gyur// mtshan nyid gang zhig yang dag bshad// mtshan nyid des ni mtshon par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yis// rgyas btab ye shes yin par bshad// phyag rgya
163b8(rgyud): bsgoms pas rnal 'byor pa// rtag tu phyag rgya'i bdag can 'gyur// rgyas btab dngos po shes nas ni// bsgoms na phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur// mtshan dang mtshan nyid 'bral ba/ 
164a1(rgyud): / ni/ shes nas rnal 'byor yang dag spyod// ji ltar mtshan nyid yang dag grub// de bzhin dag pa myur du 'grub// g.yas pa'i cha yi mtshan ma ni// shes rab can
164a2(rgyud): ni rab tu bstan// g.yon gyi mtshan ma ji ltar mthong // de yis thugs rje mtshon pa yin// phyag ni gnyis ka'i mnyam sbyor las// ting 'dzin gnyisu bshad pa yin// zhabs gnyis kyi ni mtsha
164a3(rgyud): ma yis// tshogs gnyis dag ni bstan pa yin// sor mo lnga yi mnyam sbyor las// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rgyan pa yin// sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon byang chub// rim pa bzhin du bstan bya ste/ 
164a4(rgyud): gang zhig gung mo ston pa ni// nam mkha' las ni byung ba mtshon// gang zhig mdzub mo ston pa ni// des ni dbang chen dkyi ngal 'khor yin// srin lag tu ni yang dag bshad// chu yi
164a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor zhes bshad do// gang zhig mthe bo ston pa ni// de yis ma ni mtshon pa yin// gang zhig mthe'u chung ste/ na pa ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur// gang zhig/ 
164a6(rgyud): lte ba ston pa ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug bshad// gang zhig snying ka ston pa ni// rdo rje sems mar rjesu dpag/ gang zhig smin mtshams ston pa ni// rdo rje rin chen ma zhes bya// gang
164a7(rgyud): zhig lkog ma ston pa ni// rdo rje chos mar shes par bya// gang zhig spyi bo ston pa ni// rdo rje las mer shes par bya// byang chub lngar mngon byang chub pa'am// yang na ye shes lnga rnams sam// 
164a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas lnga dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor byang chub yin par bstan// sngon gyi sgrar ni ji skad bshad// mdun du de ni rab tu bstan// rgyab kyi sgrar ni ji ltar bshad// phyi ma de ni ya
164b1(rgyud): dag bstan// gang du thog ma'i slar gyur pa// de ni r+b+ba yi sku ru bstan// gang zhig tha ma'i sgrar gyur pa// 'dir ni 'bras bur yang dag bstan// sangs rgyas bcom ldan gnyis mi mnga'
164b2(rgyud): rgyu dang 'bras bur ldan gyur min// grang phyir thog ma tha ma med// de phyir rta gang zhes bshad do// rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te// rtogs par bya ba'ang sems nyid yin// sangs
164b3(rgyud): zhing zhes bshad pa dang // byang chub sems su shes par bya// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems can ni// kun tu rig par yang dag bshad// sems can rang bzhin dag pa ni// byang chub sems
164b4(rgyud): su shes par bya// dang por gyur pa snying kar rdebs// brtan po/ da'idri'ang rang nyid 'gyur// sgra 'dzin pa ni ral pa'i dbus // 'od dpag med du mnyam bzhag yin// tsum pa na ni rjes
164b5(rgyud): bshad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gsung // dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba/ rnam par snang mdzad ces par / de // bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis par// skyes mchog
164b6(rgyud): thub pas gang gsungs pa// pha rol phyin pa bcu gnyis su// gsungs kyi gzhan du mi btag go// bu mo lo grangs bcu drug par// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa/ rdo rje sems
164b7(rgyud): sogs sems dpa' yi// sgom pa'i don gyi sgra yin no// lha mo lo grangs nyi shu par// 'khor los bsgyur bas ji skad gsungs// mchod pa nyi shu'i bdag nyid can// nyi shu po dang rims
164b8(rgyud): bzhin no// rang gi chung ma rang rig las// byung ba'i rang rig yin par bshad// gzhan gyi chung mar gang bstan pa// gzhan sdug gzhan gyi rig pa yin// gci dang rdo rje nis bshad pa/ rdo
165a1(rgyud): ye shes bla med yin// bshang dang pad+ma zhes bshad pa// chos kyi ye shes snyoms med yin// yongasu gsal ba rnam shes pa// dkyil 'khor thugs kyi dam pa yin/ 
165a2(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi spyod pa yis// 'bad pa yis ni mchod byed pa// rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan// dbang po gnyis las byung ba yi// rang gi khu ba thig le yis// rdo rje sems dpa' mchod par
165a3(rgyud): bya// tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// gnyis med gnyis nyid la bsten pa// thugs rje nyams dang yang dag ldan// dbang po gnyis kyis mnyam
165a4(rgyud): sbyor bas// rang gi khu ba mkhas pa yis// rnal 'byor chen po byung nas ni// dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab/ dge dad dam rab tu smra ba'am// sangs rgyas rol mo'i gar byed pa/ 
165a5(rgyud): lha mo bzhi yis mnyam sbyor bas// rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyi/ sa rol// gsar zhing legs par bsgril ba dang // tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa yis// shes rab can gyi thig gdag
165a6(rgyud): pa// sku gsung thugs ni bsgom pas// zur bon pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// grwa yi mtshams ni
165a7(rgyud): thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su// rdo rje rin chen spras pas ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gad ba bo// rdo rje'i thig gis yongs bskor cing // ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ 
165a8(rgyud): ka ba brgyad kyi nang gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor brgyad par brtan pa dang // grwa yi dkrol 'khor dor bar ni// rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod// 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ dkyil 'khor lnga
165b1(rgyud): yis rnam par rgyun// dra ba dra phyed kyis rgyan cing // rnga yab kyis ni nyer smras pa// khru ni bcu gnyis bya ba'am// khru bcu drug tu rab tu brtag/ yang na khru ni nyi shu tsam// nyi shu lnga dang ldan pa
165b2(rgyud): yis// khru ni nyi shu lnga pa yis// dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab// sgo rnams kyi ni dbus mi'i cha// cha dgu ru ni rnam dbye ba// dkyil 'khor sgo ru bsams nas ni// sgo khyud der ni bya ba
165b3(rgyud): yin// sgo khyud dkyil 'khor rnam pa ni// snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang mnyam par// dgu cha ru ni rnam bgos te// grwa yi dkyil 'khor dor bar bya// tha mar khyams dang ldan pa yi// dkyil
165b4(rgyud): 'khor lngas ni rgyan pa dang // kha dog lnga dang yang dag ldan// gru bzhi par ni brtag par bya// lta ba lnga po bgod dka' che// kha dog lnga yi de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas
165b5(rgyud): lnga dang mnyam sbyor bas// sa ni tshon gyis rab tu bsgyur/ dkyil 'khor lnga yi dbus ni// sangs rgyas lnga ni dgodapar bya// kha dog lnga dang ting 'dzin gyis// 'dod pa'i yon
165b6(rgyud): tan+da lnga yis khyod// shal dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang mdzad// dpa' bo'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ in dra ni
165b7(rgyud): la'i 'di 'dra zhing // rdo rje thams cad gcig bsdus pa// mi bskyod ye shes las byung ba/ rdo rje'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs// 'dzam bu'i gser gyi 'od 'dra zhing // sangs rgyas thams
165b8(rgyud): cad gcig bsdum pa// sems can kun gyi na du byung // 'bar ba'i lta ba de bzhin ga shegs// dpa' di chen po drwa // bad+ma nag nor pa'i 'o// chos kyi ye shes las rgya
166a1(rgyud): sa chags pa'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs// mnad kyin 'od 'dra zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// sangs rgyas kun gcig las byung ba/ byams pa'i nga/ 
166a2(rgyud): bde bzhin gshegs// dbus ma'i sa yi gzhi dag pa// nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra ba/ shar phyogs nyid du sngon po che// lho ru ser po yang dag ldan// nub phyogs der ni dmar po ste/ byang du la
166a3(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan// kun tu khyams dang ldan pa la// sgor ni khyams dang bral ba'o// gang zhig dbusams yang dag bshad// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med yon// gzhan dag don kun yang / 
166a4(rgyud): ldan// ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin// na mkha'i du ngas kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dmad/ dbasam// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// spyan ni dbu
166a5(rgyud): su bsam par bya// bzhin bzang spyan ni yangs pa dang / na bu chu shel mdog 'dral/ mtshan rnams thams cad / ngasu rdzogs// bud med sgyu ma'i mchog 'dzin po// phyag
166a6(rgyud): tu 'khor lo bsgom bya ste// khams gsum pa ni dbang byed pa// dngos kun grub byed ye shes ni// 'khor lo yid bzhin nor bu'i mdog/ na mkha'i rdo rje dbus chud par// zla ba'i dkyil
166a7(rgyud): 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// na mkha'i rdo rje mchog sgom mo// zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang // ud pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog/ mtshan rnams
166a8(rgyud): thams cad yang dag rdzogs// na mkha'i sgyu ma'i mchog bsam mo// phyag tu ud pal sngon dmar te// khams gsum pas ni phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i
166b1(rgyud): mchog gsang ba'i dngos grub rdo rje can// na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus chung par// zla nga'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas sku ni rnams bsgoms la// rdo rje chos mar rnam par
166b2(rgyud): bsam/ mdzes pa'i zhal la spyan yangs ma// pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog/ sku mdog dmar po yang dag byung // chags pa'i pad+ma 'dzin sdug pa// mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag
166b3(rgyud): rdzogs// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// phyag tu ud pal dmar po ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa'o// chos kyi ye shes byed pa mchog/ gsang ba dam tshig
166b4(rgyud): rdo rje can// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus chud par/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam po bsam// sangs rgyas gang+gA dgas ni rnam bsgoms la// sgrol ma mchog ni bsam
166b5(rgyud): par bya// zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang // sna tshogs rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// kha dog ser po nyid bsam ni/ bud med sgyu ma'i dregs bdo ba// phyag tu ud pal dam
166b6(rgyud): pa ni// ser po snang ba bsgom par bya// rdo rje nyid 'dzin las byung ba// sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa'o// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sing d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA// oM na/ 
166b7(rgyud): ka re shAn+ti ka re g+huT+Ta g+hAT+Ti ni g+ha ta ya g+huT+Ti na swA hA// oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka Ta ka Te swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// rig pa'i lha mo bzhi'o// sku ni lus kyi ngo bo yis// thugs ni
166b8(rgyud): sems kyi rnam pa nyid// gsung ni ngag gi rnam pa yis// mchod na mchod pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsrung bya ste// bsrungs na/ 
167a1(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba mi// rtag par kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur// dngos po yong su dag pa ni// med pas kun tu bdag mi 'byung // rnal 'byor pa yis rnal 'byor chog/ 
167a2(rgyud): tshogs med yang dag mi mthong ngo // de bas gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung // rnal 'byor kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin/ 
167a3(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad rnam dag pa// dag pa nyid du myur pa ni// ji ltar lnga yi nor bu ni// rang gA'od kyis rtag tu snang // srid pa yong su dag pa yang / rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thob byed yin/ 
167a4(rgyud): dbyings ni gsang chen du// gang zhig dbang bskur mkhas dpal// thugs kyi gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog mkha sa pas de la bshad par bya// thams cad gsang ba zhes bya
167a5(rgyud): nga'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma kAr brda dang / zhu chen gyi'o/ tsA ba dge slong rin chen pozang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gta
167a6(rgyud): la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ trai lo kya bi dza ya ma hA kAl+ma rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po// dpal rdo rje sems
167a7(rgyud): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab ri'i rtse mon// rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ byang chub sem/ 
167a8(rgyud): dpa' bye ba phrag du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / mi rnams dang / bltar rung ba dang / bltar mi rung ba dun
167b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dang pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bcugs te// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyagan rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam pa'i dkyil nas dbas te/ 
167b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lnga chen po la
167b3(rgyud): sogs pa sems can ma rung po de dag la dam tshig 'dzin du stsal bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slang du bdag la bka' stsal du gsol// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa'
167b4(rgyud): chen po'i tshig bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po de bani na gshegs pas gsan nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs// gnod sbyin khyod shin tu khengs pa// shin tu
167b5(rgyud): khrob/ shin tu 'thur ba/ de ji ltar khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems
167b6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can ma lus pa 'dul bar bgyid do// gang gi phyir na bdag gis 'dod pa'i bde ba can
167b7(rgyud): rnams dbang du bgyi ba lags pas btul nas bla na med pa'i bde ba la dgod par 'tshal lo// sems can ma rungs pa rnams bsad pa la sogs pas sbyangs te/ zhi ba la dgod par 'tshal// 
167b8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje legs leg so// 'jig rten thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang / phan pa'i phyir dang / 
168a1(rgyud): bde ba'i phyir snying po 'ang smos shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' lha thams cad nas/ mi rnams thams cad kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon pa
168a2(rgyud): dad pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag sangs rgyas la skyabasu deng shig/ nga'i bka' yang rje su skyongs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes
168a3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po 'di gsungaso// oM su b+ha ni su b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/ 
168a4(rgyud): de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum thams ca da g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul rab tu 'a gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul lo// 'phar rab tu 'phar/ 
168a5(rgyud): kun tu rab tu 'phar ro// de nas lha thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad 'dar yid yod nas bcom// ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ kho ra khor yug dang khor
168a6(rgyud): khor yug chen po'i ri la sogs pa tshun chad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad kyis gang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gling bzhi pa'i
168a7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi kham su tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas 'di skad gsung so// grogs po rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa la skyabasu 'gro bar khas long zhing // nga'i bka'
168a8(rgyud): yang rjesu skyongs shig/ de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor chen po thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje skrag ste 'dar yid yod nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabasu dong ngo // 
168b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha chen po'i lha dang / mthu bo che dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sems can 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar
168b2(rgyud): byin che zhing bdag cag 'chos pa 'di su lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bstan pa'i phyir tshigasu bcad pa 'di glengs te gsung so// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// sangs
168b3(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad nyid skyes 'di// phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che// ma rungs 'chol la dbang ba ste// gang ming brjod
168b4(rgyud): pa de yis ni// sangs rgyas pa yang thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yang gsu dngas pa// kye kye lha dag sangs rgyas la skyabasu deng la nga'i
168b5(rgyud): bka' bzhin du yang gyis shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba gcig tu 'a bar bar gyur pa 'dis khyed thams cad gtan bsregs par gyur ta re// de nas lha chen po la sogs pa rnams
168b6(rgyud): kyis 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni gnod sbyin nged ni lha bas na nged kyis gnod sbyin gyi bka' rjesu skyong bar mi nuso// de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di thos nas khros te/ bcom ldan 'das la
168b7(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar dbang bskur te bskoso// de bas na gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
168b8(rgyud): la bka' stsal na lha chen po 'di 'dul bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha chen po la 'di skad ces gsung so// sems can chen po khas long shig/ 'dis khyod gsad dpe
169a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum thams cad kyi dbang po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin ma rungs pa/ 
169a2(rgyud): 'di'i bka' bzhin byed pa bdag cag ma lags so// de nas lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das phrag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// 
169a3(rgyud): kye gnod sbyin nga ni thams cad kyi dbang po chen po/ byed pa po/ 'joms pa po/ skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa'o// gtogs 'dod do// dbang phyug chen po'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sem/ 
169a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po khros nas 'di skad gsung so// khyod ni lus bsrul po me sho za ba/ ma rungs pa/ drag shul gyi da las byed pas nA gtum po ste/ sha za'i lus srel ba na ji ltar
169a5(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang phyug chen po yin/ tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba'o// gtogs/ 'dod ces bya ba ni thar pa'o// dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 
169a6(rgyud): 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po de nga yin pas 'dul nus so// de nas dbang phyug chen po lha chen po khros nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
169a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te/ 'jig su rung ba chen po'i gzugs khros pa chen po'i gad mos bgad nas 'jigs pa chen por byed pa/ 'bar ba chen po gtong ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
169a8(rgyud): mtha' med par gzugs sna tshogs byas/ 'bar ba chen po'i grub pa/ mi mtshungs pa/ rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / shaka ti dang / be tson dang / mi mtshungs pa'i
169b1(rgyud): cha 'bebs shing gtong ba rnams kyi tshogs dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas par kun btan to// bdud dang / bgeg byed pa dang / mtha' dang mu med pa'i gzugs sna tshog su sprul khro bor
169b2(rgyud): tu mi bzad pa ma rungs pa'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu rab tu 'thab cing shin tu 'gyed pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan mo'i mun nag tu byas/ 'bar ba chen po'i phung pos/ 
169b3(rgyud): blangs te rab tu snang bar byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'chang ba chen po cung zad du mche ba'i thog ma gtsigs pa/ smin ma'i mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod pa/ 
169b4(rgyud): mig g.yon pa cher bgrad de/ rdo rje'i lta ba'i khro ba dang brtsangs pas zab mo'i tshig gis shigs pa/ snying po mtsho ngag 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya
169b5(rgyud): ba 'di gsung so// hUM de nas hUM zhes bya ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun spangs gang nas/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 
169b6(rgyud): 'khrol rab tu 'khrol/ kun tu rab tu 'khrol lo// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i tshogs thams cad bcom ldan 'das la bskyab du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bskyab
169b7(rgyud): tu gsol zhes nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so// gang 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra ba ni khyod rab tu mi
169b8(rgyud): bsrungs so// de nas phyag na rje rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ yang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'idi gsung so// oM musta ni suswA hA/ gr-iha gr-i
170a1(rgyud): gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs pa lha'i bdag po thams cad 'khor dang bcas
170a2(rgyud): par bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gang na ba dir mgo rkang bzlog ste/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas brlams par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs
170a3(rgyud): g.yon pas mnan te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la leg so leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis 'di 'dra bar sems
170a4(rgyud): can 'dul bar byed pa legaso leg so// de bas na thul la dbugs phyung shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi don gyi phyir rdo rjes
170a5(rgyud): bcings pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sar+b+ba/ na swA hA// de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di gsungs pa tsam/ gyis lha chen po la sogs pa de dag dran pa rnyed do// de nas
170a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad gsung so// grogs po dag sems can chen po 'di'i bka' bzhin byed par khas long shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la de dag thams cad mgrin
170a7(rgyud): gcig tu bdag cag mchid kyis 'tshalo zhes gsol to// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang rang gi snying po 'di gsung so// hUM Tak+ki ho/ de nas 'di brjod pa
170a8(rgyud): tsam gyis lha la sogs pa thams cad dbang du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas mchi ma blags te nga ro bton nas skyabasu dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la skyab tu gsol/ 
170b1(rgyud): de bdag cag khyod kyi bka' nyan na ji ltar bgyi ba skul du gsol zheso// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de rnams la gsungs pa/ grogs po dag byang chub
170b2(rgyud): kyi sems dang / sdom pa gzung bar khas long shig/ de dag gi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing byang
170b3(rgyud): chub tu sems bskyed par 'tshal lo// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor du gtsud nas sdom pa bzung du bcug ste
170b4(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas pa/ sems can thams/ cad bde ba stso la/ phyag na rdo rje bdag che dang / 'dod pa smad par mi bya'o// 'di ni gsang ba yin no// de nas bcom
170b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi de dag sdom pa 'dzin du bcug nas dam tshig byi na pa ni/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa bi rA ga ya sar+b+ba kA mAn hUM phaT// de nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'di ni bdud kyis/ 
170b6(rgyud): smras pas na/ bdag cag mi nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la khyed cag gis 'di la ma brnyas shig ces gsungs pa dang / de dag gis gsol pa/ ji ltar
170b7(rgyud): 'dod chags dang bral ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye grogs po dag nga ni ji ltar 'dul bzhin
170b8(rgyud): byed pa ste/ de nyid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sun 'byin te/ ji ltar bde la mi chags pa dang / sdug bsngal 'dod chags pa ji lta bus 'jig rten 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i chos sangs
171a1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'chad par mdzad de/ de dag sbyang ba'i phyir 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpas ci nas kyang 'dod
171a2(rgyud): chags dang bral bar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsA ma bi rA ga ya sar+b+ba kA mau hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gis ji ltar bcom
171a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa bzhin no zhes gsol to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes lag tu rdo rje byin te/ rdo rje dbang bskur ba 'di byin no// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+ha rad twe badz+ra
171a4(rgyud): pA Ni hri ha ha ha ha/ de nas rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byi/ na pa ni 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug chen po ni rdo rje rig snga dgas mchog/ mthu bo che ni rdo rje sgyu ma'o// tshangs pa ni
171a5(rgyud): rdo rje mi smra ba'o// sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o// dbang po ni rdza rje 'thab cha ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gsu ma gyi dbang po thams cad rig po'i blon po chen por dbang
171a6(rgyud): bskur ro// de nas bar snang la rgyu ba rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni/ rdo rje 'khyil pa'o// zla ba ni rdo rje 'od do// be con rtse mo ni rdo rje be con no// 
171a7(rgyud): skye gleng ni rdo rje skra gleng ste/ de rnams ni rdo rje khro bor dbang bskur ro// de nas na mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ chang gis myos pa ni rdo rje srin po'o// 
171a8(rgyud): chang byed ni rdo rje phreng ba'o// rgyal ba ni rdo rje dbang ngo // rgyal ba skyed pa ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi bdag por dbang bskur ro// de nasas pa rnams rdo rje ming gi
171b1(rgyud): dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ mdzod skyong ni rdo gru shing / rlung ni rdo rje rlung ngo // me ni rdo rje me'o// ku ber ni rdo rje 'jigs pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje po nyar dbang bskur ro// 
171b2(rgyud): de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i dbang po thams cad rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ phag ni rdo rje kyo ba'o// gshin rje ni rdo rje nag po'o// sa'i spyi bo ni rdo rje rnam 'dren no// bAru
171b3(rgyud): Na ni rdo rje glu ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran du dbang bskur ro// de nis 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams kyis lha mo thams cad kyi lag tu rdo rje byin te/ rdo rjes dbang bskur nas/ 
171b4(rgyud): rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ nyon mong ngas pa ni rdo rje khro ba ma'o// nor can ni rdo rje gser ma'o// tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ba'o// dug mo ni rdo rje gzhon nu me'o// 
171b5(rgyud): dbang po ni rdo rje khu tshur te/ de dag la sogs pa ni rigs kyi blon mo chen mor dbang bskur ro// de nas par sna nga la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur babyin pa ni 'di lta ste/ 
171b6(rgyud): bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje bdud rtsi ma'o// khrung ma ni rdo rje sdug gu ma'o// be con 'chang ma ni rdo rje be tson rtse me'o// skye 'phrog ma ni rdo rje bskyed 'chings ma ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro mor
171b7(rgyud): dbang bskur ro// de nas na mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ gsod ma ni rdo rje gsod ma'o// thob mo ni rdo rje za ba ma'o// gos ni rdo rje bgo ba mo'o// dga' mo
171b8(rgyud): ni rdo rje dbang mo ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje cho gas ma mor dbang bskur ro// de nas sa la rgyu ba'i mdabang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ zhim ni rdo rje pho nya me'o// rlung ma ni rdo rje mgyogs ma
172a1(rgyud): me ni rdo rje 'bar ba'o// ku be ra ma ni rdo rje thag gum ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya mor dbang bskur ro// de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni
172a2(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ phag mo ni rdo rje gdong ngo // mgo lpags ma ni rdo rje nage mo'o// sna chang ma ni rdo rje phyags ma'o// klu mo ni rdo rje chu srin ma ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni bran mor dbang bskur ro// de nas phyag
172a3(rgyud): na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos btsud pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed nas rdo rje'i dam tshig byin pa'o// oM ba li tod pa li tod badz+ra A kaR+Sha yaM hUM dza/ lha rnams
172a4(rgyud): dgug pa'o// oM badz+ra a gra bi Ta ya sa ma ya hUM/ bar snang la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra mA lA gra li/ phreng ba' chang ba rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra ban d+ha haM/ sa la rgyu ba rnams
172a5(rgyud): kyi'o// oM badz+ra pA ta la ban+d+ha bany+dza hUM phaT/ 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o// oM he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ sa ma ya mu pra b+han d+ha tsakra hUM phaT/ ma rnams thams cad kyi'o// 
172a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad 'dul ba lags na/ bcom ldan
172a7(rgyud): 'das ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi dkyil 'khor de dag la ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gang gis sems can de rnams sems can thams
172a8(rgyud): cad la phan pa byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid la chud cig/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes gsol
172b1(rgyud): pa/ bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i 'di dag la nan tan ji ltar bgyi/ rims la sogs pa ji ltar bgyi/ dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song gi rnams ji ltar bgyi/ bcom
172b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ dam tshig de nyid la nan tan byed du chud cig/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'di rnams ji ltar nan tan bgyi/ bcom ldan
172b3(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du chud cig/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du btsud nas dam tshig gi dkyil
172b4(rgyud): 'khor du tshud cig/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du btsud na das las kyi dkyil 'khor du chud cig/ de nas phyagan rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ bcom ldan 'das
172b5(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te/ tshig su bcad pa 'di smras so// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs te// grub pa thams cad
172b6(rgyud): byed pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen por bshad par bya'o// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul 'dra bar// dkyil
172b7(rgyud): 'khor thams cad thig gdab po// de la slad bu bri ba'i cho ga ni 'di lta ste/ gsar zhing legs par byas pa dang // tshad ma bzang po'i slad pu yis// shes rab can gyis srang
172b8(rgyud): bre ba/ 'jig rten gsum rgyal dran zhing ngo // de yi dbu su gdab pa ni// seng ldeng phur rab brtan par ro// de las srang bu bre gsungs pa// srad bu nyi lngab kyis bya ste// cu
173a1(rgyud): drug cha ru bgo bar bya// thams cad du ni rim gsum mchog/ khor khor yug rig dag kyang // phur bu yis ni de bzhin no// de yi nang du byung ni// srad bu'irim bdun ldan par
173a2(rgyud): te/ tsho na ser dri zhim ldan pa yis// thig rnams kyang ni gdab par bya// de yi dbusu bzhag pa ni// shin tu bkrabs pa'i nas phul bzhi'o// de yi steng du mgon po ste// sangs rgyas gzugs
173a3(rgyud): bstan bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas thang 'khor thams cad du// byang chub brgyad ni rim bzhin par/ dri'am yang dag bzhag par bya// tshon sna lnga mchog rnams kyiso// sangs rgyas spyan lnga de ru ni// 
173a4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de bzhin no// bri'am bzhag par bya ba ni// rdo rje ngo hUM zhes par 'dus pa'o// de yi zhabs ni g.yon pa yis// // dbang phyug chen po gnan par bya'o// g.yas pa'i zhabs
173a5(rgyud): kyis btsir ba ni// nyon mongs ma yin lha mo'o// 'dod grub spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang // srad bu rim bdun par dag tu// bri'am yang na bzhag par bya// rdo rje shugs kyis
173a6(rgyud): dgongs nas su// phyi rol byung nas de ru yang // gling rnams bzhi yang bri bar bya// dbyibs dang cho ga ji bzhin du// gra yi ri mo legs par dgod// gling rnams kyi dbus thams cad du// 'jig rten
173a7(rgyud): ji bzhin sogs par bya// tshangs pa la sogs de bzhin rnams// de ru 'jig rten dbang po dgod// khor khor yug pa'i ri dang // gling rnams kyi yang bar dag du// phyi yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi// 
173a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// sgo srung bri bar bya ba yang / rdo rje sgo ba ni de dag tu// rdo rje kyo bzhags pa dang // srog dang dril bu de bzhin no// khor khor yug ri li ni// phyi rol dmyal ba brgyad
173b1(rgyud): rnams so// gnam ngal dang ni na ngag dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon dag rnams// bzhag gam yang na bri bar bya// chos min can ni gzhig phyir ro// de yi phyi rol du dgod pa// gtor
173b2(rgyud): ma sna tshogs mchog rnamaso// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga 'byung ste// de la thog ma nyid du slob dpon gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'jug pa ni gtsang
173b3(rgyud): mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ se ral thag gu dmar po thogs nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ de'i steng du dri zhim po'i me tog bzhag nas snying po 'di brjod la zhugs shig
173b4(rgyud): oM badz+ra pra tIts+tsha ma ha ha ha ha hi/ de nas dbus mo g.yas dpa'i lhangs la btsugs nas du ru ka'i bdug pa'am/ ci bdog pas gsol to// rdo rje 'dzin ma mdzub mo gnyis
173b5(rgyud): kyo btang du byas la snying po 'di brjod do// oM u ru grA gra bi ri Ni bi ri Ni badz+ra ma ya hi b+hi da ye swA hA// nyi shu R+Sha gcig bzlas na de las mtshan ma 'byung ba ni ba spu g.yo ba la
173b6(rgyud): sogs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'am/ dri zhim po 'am/ 'od zer mthong ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor me tog gtor cig/ de nas slob ma gzhug ste/ de thog ma nyid du bkug nas slob
173b7(rgyud): mgos gtsang ma bskon te/ gsum la skyabs su btang ba dang / bslab pa'i sdom pa la so sor gnas par byas nas/ de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed cig/ de nas gdong ras kyi g.yog
173b8(rgyud): nas mgo gtsug tor du byas te/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la chug shig/ bcug nas me tog gtor to// de nas gang la 'bab pa de ni de'i lha'o// de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas
174a1(rgyud): rang gi rig pa'i lha ston la/ de la mchod cing slob dpon la yang ci 'dod pa'i yon dul nas de rang gi rig pa'am/ sngags bzlas te phyag rgya yang bcing ngo // 'jig rten
174a2(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o// de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byung ste// rdo rje phreng ba mnyam
174a3(rgyud): ldan pas// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// 'jug par bya ba de bzhin te// las kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas ni// de bzhin rdo rje gsor bar bya/ 'jig rten
174a4(rgyud): gsum rgyal rab bslabs nas// rdo rje mchog ni bsgrub par bya// de la rdo rje sgrub pa'i cho ga ni lag pa gnyis rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje bzung nas ji srid du 'gul pa de srid
174a5(rgyud): bzlas so// de phyin cad rdo rje des las thams cad byed do// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi / kyil 'khor 'byung ste// dkyil 'khor chen po kun bris
174a6(rgyud): nas/ mtshan ma thams cad bstan par bya// 'jug pa rdo rje dril bu dang // rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyag rgyas so// de la rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin no// rdo rje 'dzin ma kun byas nas// rdo rje
174a7(rgyud): kun tu brtag bya ba// g.yas par bzhag nas g.yon pa yis// dril bu bsil nas 'jug par bya// btsud na su ni dril bu da/ mnyam par gzhag pas bsil bar bya// slob dpon gyur cig
174a8(rgyud): dam tshig kyang // rtag tu bsrungs shes brjod par bya// ji ltar dril bu'i sgra 'di ni// de yi mo rtag pa ru gsungs// de ltar khyod la byin na no// rdo rje chen po zhes bya 'dis/ nges par sreg
174b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ba ni// de ste rdo rje 'dzin dang dang // skyabs gsum brtul zhugs de bzhin te// ji ltar byang chub sems 'dod rnams// khyod kyis de tshe spangs gyur na'o// de la 'di na
174b2(rgyud): dam tshig gi sngags// oM ha na sa ma ya hUM phaT// de nas de bzhin du 'dug la de nas rdo rje'i chu 'di byung ngo // de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas cho ga bzhin du bya'o// dam tshig gi dkyil/ 
174b3(rgyud): 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nasu// cha lugs mang po bzhag par bya// btsud nas las rnams thams cad kyang // slob dpon gyis
174b4(rgyud): ni de bzhin brlab// de nas las kyi rab tu sbyar ba 'di'o// dbacom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thab gru bzhir byas la dmangar po'i yam shing la me bus la mngar po'i me tog dang
174b5(rgyud): 'bras bu rnams sbrang rtsi dang mar la sbags te/ bla gosagaya su gzar la ku sha'i bam po la 'dug ste/ rje'i tshig tu bzlas shing / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang / 
174b6(rgyud): du bya ba la sogs pa zhi ba'i las rnams la lag pa g.yon pas bdag gis phyag rgya bcings la/ g.yas pas bsregs na de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab tu
174b7(rgyud): thab zur gsum du kha ba'i tsher ma rnon po'i yam shing dang / mdab ma dang / me tog dang / yal ga rtse mo dang / sdong bu dang / 'bras bu yang de dang 'dra bar rang gi khrag gi skus na stan mkhrang po la
174b8(rgyud): 'dug ste/ bla gos g.yon du gzar la/ khros pa'i tshig gis bzlas shing g.yon pas bsregs na dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gzhom pa dang / 
175a1(rgyud): btsir ba dang / bskal ba dang / myos par bya ba dang / stan 'pho ba la sogs pa las drag po rnams rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
175a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / dam tshig gi bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa grub pa thams cad kyi las ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yasu rtsa 'jam po bting ba la
175a3(rgyud): 'dug nas/ stod g.yogs sbyar ma ltar bgos te/ ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlos shing 'khor lo lte bu'i thab tu ngu ba med pa'i 'dag ma la til dang 'bras la sogs pa nas 'bras g.yas
175a4(rgyud): g.yon gyis sreg go// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du rdo rje lta bu'i thab byas la stod g.yogs kyis yan lag tha/ dmas cad bcings la rlod stan 'jam po la 'dug nas/ 
175a5(rgyud): yam shing thams cad 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'dzings pa'i me la lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa rdo rje khu chu/ ragyi phyag rgya bcings nas lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur
175a6(rgyud): 'dzin pas gzar bu gzung nas 'dzum zhing dga' bar byas te// rdo rje tshig gis zlos shing ro thams cad bsregs na/ rdo rje 'dzin pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba
175a7(rgyud): dang / dbang du byas pa la sogs pa dam pa 'grub po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las dkyil 'khor thams cad
175a8(rgyud): kyi cho ga'o// de nas yod byad bshad par bya'o zhes nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad mthong nas sgrub bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
175b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ni mazhugs sam// dam tshig spangs par gyur pa ni// phyag na rdo rje mi 'grub pa// gsang ba yang dag ma shes pas// bcom ldan sems dpa' 'dod pa'o// chags
175b2(rgyud): drung rdo rje de nyid de// de la chags par mgyur na// phyag na rdo rje mi 'grub bo// de bas yang dag ma mthong bas// dkyil 'khor du ni grub ma gsungs// yang dag ma mthong chub pa ni// 
175b3(rgyud): the tshom can gyis mi grub bo// bar du 'jigs pa rnyed nas// nad kyis kyang ni 'jigs par byed// gdon yang de la rtson par 'gyur// shi nas ngu 'bong du ltung ngo // de ltar dkyil 'khor
175b4(rgyud): thams cad du chug la nad dang gdon la sogs pa ston dag/ bcom ldan 'ang so de bzhin gshegs pa dgaser gyi kha dog ras la bri bar bya ste// de'i thang 'khor
175b5(rgyud): kun tu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad bri ba ni 'di lta ste/ g.yas phyogasu ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma
175b6(rgyud): thug tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// g.yon phyogasu ni rdo rje khu tshur dang byams pa dang / na mkha'i mdzod do// steng du na mkha'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi
175b7(rgyud): 'og tu ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pa lag pa gnyis kyi bcing ngo // lag pa gnyis po gzhan la g.yas pa ni rdo rje gsor/ g.yon pas
175b8(rgyud): ni me tog gi gzhu dang mda' lnga bsnams pa/ sku mdog ni ud pal sngon po lta bu/ yid tsam 'dzum la mche ba cung zad gartsigs la/ khro ba dang bcas pas
176a1(rgyud): bzhad pa'i zhal/ phyir brkyang bskum du gnas pa// rgyun thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon pasA lnga chen po ldan pa g.yon par mnan/ zhabs g.yas
176a2(rgyud): pa bskum pas u ma'i nu mar btsir te/ stod g.yog khra bos yan lag g.yog pa/ ko rlon gyi smad g.yog can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbu rgyan du thogs pa'o// 
176a3(rgyud): de nas ches zhabs gcig nas bgo brtsams te/ tshes bco lngar ram/ zla bar ram lo'i bar du nyin re zhing brgya stong bzlas te/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos la bdag gi khyim du gnas
176a4(rgyud): shing zas gtsang ma yid bzhin du zos te bzlas na de nas zla dab gcig lon pa dang / zla ba dang pos ni hUM zhes bya bas phyi rol gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnyis kyi
176a5(rgyud): ni las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gsum gyis/ ni bcom ldan 'das rmi lam du ston cing 'das pa dang // ma 'ongs pa thams cad ston to// bzhis ni sems can
176a6(rgyud): thams cad dgug pa dang / dbang du bya bar nus so// zla ba lngas ni yid bzhini snang ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ro// zla ba drug gis ni ci 'dod pa thams cad kyi gzugasu 'gyur ro// zla
176a7(rgyud): ba bdun gyi ni bdag gi lus sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyag na rdo rjer ston cing cho 'phrul thams cad kyang ston to// zla ba brgyad kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen
176a8(rgyud): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / btsong ba dang / dbang du byed cing la su bsgo'o// zla ba dgus ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams
176b1(rgyud): cad dgug pa dang / gzug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byed do// zla ba bcus ni sa bcu thob par 'gyur ro// zla ba bcu gcig gis ni bcu gcig pa sangs rgyas kyis thob bo/ 
176b2(rgyud): zla ba bcu gnyis pas ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas slob pa bstan te/ ras la rdo rje hUM zhes pade bzhin du bris la/ de'i thang 'khor thams cad du mthu chen po la sogs pa nas
176b3(rgyud): klu ba ru ni'i mtha' bar du bcom ldan 'das la sgong zhing dbus mo gcugs pa bris la/ de nas de bzhin du bzlas pa ni rdo hUM zhes pa ni phyag rgya grangs med par bzlas te/ zla ba'i mtha'
176b4(rgyud): bair du/ tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ nang par thams cad 'ong ngo // 'ongs nas kyang dbang du 'gyur te thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du byed do// de nas sgrub
176b5(rgyud): pa gzhan 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du drin/ sa gser gyi 'dangs kyi lha mo la sogs pa thams ca da rang rang gi phyag rgya sgreng nas gar byed cing mi sdug pa
176b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i gzugasu bri'o// de nas de bzhin du zla ba gcig gis mtshan thal byung du zlos shig/ de nas nang par kun lhags te/ de bzhin du gar dag gis sgrub pa po la mchod do// 'di
176b7(rgyud): la rtog pa 'dir bris pa bzhin no// snyam du bsams nas des mi 'jigs par bya'o// de nas dbang du 'byung ste/ rtag tu las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyur ro// de nas cho ga
176b8(rgyud): gzhan te ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bris la/ de nas de bzhin du brgyad stong du bzlas na nub tha ma la rdo rje 'dzin pa thob ste/ ci 'dod pa grub pa'i mchog kyang thob bo// gzhan yang
177a1(rgyud): sgrub pa dag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum zlos shig/ de nas bgos pa kun bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad do// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar ci 'dod par yam shing thams cad kyi/ 
177a2(rgyud): sbyin sreg gis lo ga cig gis bar du bsregs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa bris pa de'i spyan sngar lo gcig gis bar du grangs med par zlos shig/ de nas tha ma
177a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rang gi ci 'dod pa'i mchog col bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings de bzhin gshegs pa 'gul
177a4(rgyud): gyi bar du zlos shig/ de nas phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// // grub pa des na dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gde zhug pa da / drang ba dang / ltung ba dang / dbang pa dang / stan
177a5(rgyud): 'pho ba la sogs pa las phan tshegs kyi bcings pas hUM/ zhes pa mdzad do// de nas cho ga gzhan te rig pas dbang bskur bar bya bar 'dod na dri'am 'ji ba las phyag na
177a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i cha lugs byas la phyag gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dzin to// de zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du mar bzhi bre brgyad kyis khrus shig/ de nas tha mar
177a7(rgyud): mtshan thal byung bzlas so// de nas nang par gzugs de bzhad de/ de nas rig pa thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
177a8(rgyud): 'das kyi cha lugs dri'am 'jib la de bzhin du phyag brkyang ba rdo rje 'dzin par byas la de'i zhabs kyi bar du spos chus bkrus nas/ de phyin chad yid bzhin du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 
177b1(rgyud): de nas sgrud pa gzhan te ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi par byas la/ de'i phyag g.yas par pad+mo// g.yon par rdo rje/ g.yas par rdo rje hUM zhes pa/ g.yon par mda' dang
177b2(rgyud): gzhu/ de nas de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya zlas po'i 'jug tu zhag gsum bsnyung ba byas te/ mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ dri'i nang par de dang 'dra ba'i gzugasu 'gyur te/ bskal par
177b3(rgyud): gnas shing mi dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor mthong bas lci
177b4(rgyud): ba gsum gyis khrus byas/ dus gsum du gos brjes la// rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas brgyad stong dus ga/ sum du nyin bdun bzlas na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje slob dpon
177b5(rgyud): gyi gzugasu byas nas rmi lam du thams cad smra'o// de na/ sa dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan 'byung ste/ dkyi/ la 'khor chen po mthong bas zla ba gcig gis bar du de
177b6(rgyud): bzhin du dus gsum du khrus byas nas dus gsum du gos brdzes/ dus gsum du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ rno lcags kyi mtshon chas der rdo rje bris la/ de la lta zhing rdo rje
177b7(rgyud): 'dzin mo'i phyag rgya bcings te/ brgyad brgya bzlas na zla ba gcig gi mthar bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // de nas rdo rje sgrub pa 'byung ste/ rdo rje ras sam/ rtsog pa'am/ shing leb la
177b8(rgyud): bris nas de la mchod pa byas te rdo rje khu tshur gyi bzung la/ lo gcig tshun cad rdo rje nam 'bar gyi bar du zlos shig/ 'bar ba des nan mkha' la 'gro ba dang / lo gcig lon pa'i
178a1(rgyud): lus phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs dang / stobs dang / mdog tu gyur te/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad/ 
178a2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// tshe yang lo stong phrag brgyar 'gyuraro// de nas ral gri sgrub pa 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi ral gri bzung la lo gcig gi bar du bzlas na rigs 'dzin thams cad kyi bdag
178a3(rgyud): po rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor lo sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris la lcags kyi 'khor lo thogs nas/ nam rdo rjer gyur cing slar yang 'khor lor gyur
178a4(rgyud): gyi bar du bzlas so// de nas de thogs pas na rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// de nas kyo btang sgrub par 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar gser
178a5(rgyud): gyi kyo btang byas te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la/ grub pa rnam gsum du gyur gyi bar du ba zlas la dris pa tsam gyis thams cad kun 'gugs nus
178a6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// dud pa byung ba tsam gyis thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// 'bar bas ni thams cad 'gugs nus pa dang / dbang du bya nus shing rig 'dzin gyi rgyal por 'gyur
178a7(rgyud): de nas lha la sogs pa 'gugs pa 'byung ste/ lha chen po la sogs pa lha rnams gang yang rung ba'i cha lugs rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ 
178a8(rgyud): bsdigs shing zla ba gcig gi mtha'i bar bzlas na lha thams cad lhags te/ las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na klu'i mtshar lte ba man cad
178b1(rgyud): chu'i nang du bcug la lo gcig tshun cad klu thams cad rang gi gzugasu ston cing las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu gyur gyi bar du bzlaso// gnod sbyin dbang du bya bar 'dod pas gnod
178b2(rgyud): sbyin gang la gnas pa'i gnas der rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la gnod sbyin de dag lhags te bka' ci stsal ces smra ba'i bar bzla so// de phyin cad bka' thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu
178b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro de nas ma rnams thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod pas ma'i gnas song nas khro mo'i snying kar rdog pas gnan la zla ba gcig lon gyi bar du bzlas na tshes nyi shu dgu la 'jig su rung ba'i
178b4(rgyud): sgra chen po 'byin par byed de/ de nas dbang du gyur nas bka' bzhin byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyur te/ phrag pa dal khyer nas mtho ri su khrid de slar yang khrid de 'ong nas tshogs
178b5(rgyud): kyi bdag por bcug cing de dag gi mchod de/ sngon ma/ byung ba'i don thams cad dang / 'dod pa thams cad da ngo / na chung thams cad 'gugo/ 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor
178b6(rgyud): yang ster te/ rnal 'byor gang gi khro bo 'jig rten du yang 'gro zhing phyir yang 'ong ngo // de la sus kyang cung zad kyang byed mi nus so// de nas dpal chen mo sgrub par 'dod pa des phyag na rdo rje'i
178b7(rgyud): spyan sngar bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sku las lha mo'i lus mthong gi bar du ste/ de las ma 'gul ces bsgo'o// de phyin cad don thams cad ster bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas pa yang ster ba'i
178b8(rgyud): bar du'o// de nas mtsho dbyangs ma dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar yi ge phreng bar byas la phreng ba'i yi ge bkod cing mthar phyin pa'i bar du bklags te/ nyin re zhing
179a1(rgyud): / dus gsum du las byas la/ de nas brgyang stong bzlas na zlang gcig lon pa dang mcho byangs ma mthong ngo // de byin cang thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ 'dzi/ 
179a2(rgyud): rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag thams cad dang / shes nyen can du bya ba thams cad dang / bzo thams cad kyang ma bslabs par des rab tu shes so// de nas yig tu
179a3(rgyud): mig dang / gur gum dang / ldong ros dang / babla rnams la sgrub pa 'byung ste/ lig bu mig blangs la/ 'dzem pa'i steng du bzhag nas lag pas mnan ste grub pa rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlas
179a4(rgyud): so// gcig gis ni mi smang bar 'gyur ro// gnyis pas ni gzugs mang por 'gyur ro// gsum pas ni gan sa gong mar 'dzeg pa na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gur
179a5(rgyud): gum la sogs pa bzung ste/ 'jom pa'i bu gar bcugal rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan nas 'dod pa tham/ sa cad kyi bdag po dang / rig 'dzin dang / thams cad du
179a6(rgyud): 'gro ba dang / tshe lo stong du thub par 'gyur ro// de nas sA la b+hany+dzi ka sgrub pa 'byung ste/ gnas gang na sa la b+hany+tsi ka ri mo bris pa'am/ gzugasu byas pa de'i 'jom pa la sor mo bzhi
179a7(rgyud): ste/ zla ba gcig gi bar du zlos shig/ de nas zla ba gcig gi mthar mtshan thog thag zlos shig/ de nas nang par rang gi gzugasu bstan nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'i chung mar
179a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin ma sgrub par 'dod pas gnod sbyin ma gang na 'dug pa'i gnas der 'dug la rang gi gzugasu 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas na de la 'dod pa thams cad ster ngo'i bran mor 'gyur ro//
