179b1(rgyud): de nas sha za mo sgrub par 'dod pas phyag dar phung po mes btang ste/ lag pa g.yon pas rang gi mtshan ma de bzung la g.yas pas zegs ma sregs pa ni phyag dar gyi phung po de las ji tsam
179b2(rgyud): du sha za mo gdong mangs gzugs mi sdug pa 'ongs te rang gi gzugasu gnas so// de yang de bzhin du bran mor 'gyur ro// de nas ci bgyi sgrub par 'dod pas nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas
179b3(rgyud): la/ tshe nyi shu dgu la brgyad stong bzlas te/ de nas zla ba gcig slong mo la za zhing grangs med par bzlas te/ zla ba cig lon pa dang nub gsum skung nas mtshan thog thag zlaso// de nas nang
179b4(rgyud): par ci bgyi 'ongs nas des mi 'jigs par byas te/ de nas/ de rang nas 'grub bo// de phyin cad 'dod pa thams cad 'bul ba'i g.yog tu 'gyur te/ mtho ris kyi lha mo yang 'grub
179b5(rgyud): cing 'bul lo// de yang skyel zhing slar yang 'dug go'ang / sa pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi thams cad/ kyang smra'o// gzhan gyi nor thams cad kyang phogs nas
179b6(rgyud): 'bul lo// de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya bar 'dod pa dngos grub med pa gang yin pa des zla ba drug gi bar du nyin zhag bcu bcu zhing // spyad pa snga ma brjes la slong mo'i kha zas la sogs
179b7(rgyud): pa nas rlung bza' ba'i bar du'o// de nas 'jug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par sangs rgyas pa yang sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas nyin re zhing bco brgyad kyi bar du sngon gyi spyad pa rnams
179b8(rgyud): byas la de'i 'jug tu mtshan thal 'byung bzlas na nang par las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ni hUM zhes thang cig brjod pas kyang ngo // de nas ro langs sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma smras ma nyams
180a1(rgyud): pa'i mi ro blangs la legs par bkrus nas byug pas legs par byugs te/ me tog gi phreng bas btags nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la dbugs 'byung gi bar du bzlas na de/ 
180a2(rgyud): ldang ste langs pa dang / de zhon na thams cad du 'gro zhing tshe yang lo stong phrag rgyar 'gyur ro// de nas ro langs kyi grub pa mchog sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma smras ma nyams pa'i mi ro blangs nas de
180a3(rgyud): bzhin du rab tu brgyan ba zhon te langs shing yang bgyel ba'i bar du bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro// de phrag pa la khyer na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad srel ba'i rig 'dzin
180a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang / tshe yang skal par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungaso// de nas ma sgrubs
180a5(rgyud): kyang dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid kyi lasu 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ thang cig brjod pas ni bdag dang / gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / rgyal po la sogs pa srung bar 'gyur/ 
180a6(rgyud): mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa ni brtan par blta bas mtshams bcad pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mi mnga' na gzhan lta ci smos/ sa'i dkyil 'khor dang / nam mkha' dang / 
180a7(rgyud): phyogs bcings pa yang lta ba de so// dbab pa ni reg pa dang ma reg pas ral gri dang / me long dang / snod dang / mthe bo dang / shing ljon pa dang / bris pa dang / cha lugs dang / gzhu dang / 
180a8(rgyud): mnga' dang / rdo rje la sogs pa dbab pa'i phyag rgya gos kyi g.yog la bcings te/ gul gul gyi gdug pas dbang po// gdon zhi bar bya be ni hUM zhes paso// hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgyas ni sems ca
180b1(rgyud): thams cad 'phungs par byed do// rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas ni byang ma'i gdon las thar par 'gyur ro// he ru ka rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan pas ni byang mas bsad pal slar gso bar bya'o// rdo rje
180b2(rgyud): phyag rgya bzung bas skra las bzung ste/ bslangs pas ni dug mnan pa dang / dug bslang ba dang / dug zhi bar bya ba dang / dug spo ba dang / dug gzhig par bya ba dang / dug gi shi ba las
180b3(rgyud): gso bar bya ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes pa gcig gis so// gter 'byung ba ni zangs kyi ril ba chus bkang la/ rdo rje hU~M zhes pa'i mdzub mo dang gu gul gyis bdug po byas te bzlas na gal te gter
180b4(rgyud): yod na ni chu de ldung ngo // de ste med na ni 'khyil lo// de nas 'a'ajig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i hUM zhes rapa bzlas te blang ngo // snang ba dgug pa ni dong ka'i ljon pa'i yam
180b5(rgyud): shing gis ma bus te/ zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi sa ra rdza/ ko sha ti ka'i me tog la bskus nas stong phrag pa rgya bsregs na snang ba thob bo// 'og gi gnas rdo rje 'og gi phyag
180b6(rgyud): rgyas 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas te zhugs na de la sus kyang gtse bar mi 'gyur ro// gtogs 'dod kyi 'khor los kyang ci yang byed par mi 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo/ 
180b7(rgyud): rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje'am/ nor bu ma ra ga ti'am/ pad+ma rA ga'am/ mu tig gam/ gser ram/ dbyig gam/ gzhan ci yang rung ba 'am/ skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ sangs rgyas
180b8(rgyud): kyi sku gzugs la lo gcig gi bar du dus gsum du brgya brgyar bzlas nas/ de nas lo gcig lon na brgya 'gyur du 'gyur ro// de snyed du brgyar bzlas na de nyid kyi brgyar 'gyur ro// de nas stong/ 
181a1(rgyud): / du bzlas na yang stong du 'gyur ro// longs spyod dgug pa ni stong phrag brgyar bzlaso// dgug pa ni rdo rje kyo btang gi phyag rgyas zla ba bzhis khugs so// dbang du
181a2(rgyud): bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// sems can thams cad gtan 'pho ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings te stong phrag brgyar bzlas na/ sems can thams cad yid
181a3(rgyud): kyis dmigs pa bzhin gtan 'pho'o// chu mnan pa ni rdo rje phyag rgya bcings la chu'i steng du 'gror rung ba'i bar du bzla so// me mnan pa ni thang cig bzlas paso// lo tog srung ba ni rdo rje blta ba
181a4(rgyud): ste/ de la srog chags rnams gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / byi ba la sogs pa yang 'da' bar mi byed do// rdeg pa spong ba ni khro bo'i lta bas te gang du bltas
181a5(rgyud): pa der 'pho'o// bza' ba dang btung ba thams cad spong ba/ ni 'bar ba'i lta bas rang gi snod du 'pho'o// sdig pa dang sbrul thams cad med par bya ba ni thang cig brjod pas
181a6(rgyud): so// gcan srin thams cad la thang cig bzlas pas med par 'gyur ro// rkun po thams cad pham pa ni rdo rje khu tshur bcangs paso// dmag las sgrol ba ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas so/ 
181a7(rgyud): gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung dang / rgyal mtshan mnan nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas te/ de thogs na dmag thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// zhal che la ni thang gcig brjod pas
181a8(rgyud): rtsod pa'i lan thebs par 'gyur ro// zhi ba thams cad ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so// rgyas pa thams cad ni yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis so// gtan 'pho ba thams cad ni cher ma'i sbyin
181b1(rgyud): sreg gis so// 'tshe ba dang / gnam dal dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba ni til dang / 'bras kyi sbyin sreg gis so// gzhom pa thams cad ni hUM zhes paso// dgong du gzhug pa
181b2(rgyud): dang / myos par bya ba thams cad la phaT ces bya ba so// thams cad gnyid log tu gzhug pa ni bskum la mig btsums te/ brgya bzlas pas thams cad gnyid log par byas pa yin no// 
181b3(rgyud): sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas bltas na rgyas btab par 'gyur te/ nyin bdun las lhag par mi gson no// ngagang brog pa ni rang gi lce sos bzung nas hUM zhes
181b4(rgyud): bya ba'i bar du sbyor ba'o// snying drang ba ni rdo rje sor mo'i phyag rgyas dpung pa bsnol te/ rang gi mtshan khung du glong zhing snying po bzlas na nub bdun tshun cang 'pho bar 'gyur ro// snying
181b5(rgyud): bcad pa ni rdo rje blangs te bcad par bya'o// snying dbye ba ni rdo rje lcags phur gyis btab ste/ ming nas smos shing gzug so// snying spo ba ni lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje blangs te/ 
181b6(rgyud): mtshan bdun du rab tu sbyor ba byas pas 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams las thar par bya ba bshad de/ des rgyas 'debs pa la ni khu tshur dam paso// ngagang brog pa la ni
181b7(rgyud): rdo rje ngag gis bzlas paso// snying 'dren pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya snying kar dgrol lo// bcad pa la ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas nas 'o mas khrus shig/ phye ba la phur bu phyung nas rdo rje
181b8(rgyud): dris skus shig/ snying spos pa la ni rdo rje snying pos thar par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang ma'i phyag rgya yang spo bar 'gyur ro// snying sgrub par 'dod na bud med kyi snying kar bzlas na de'i snying
182a1(rgyud): / nas sgra thos par 'gyur ro// skyes pa'i snying kar yang de bzhin du bya ste/ snying ka thams cad du yang de ltar ro// de nas pha rol gyi sems shes pa sgrub par 'dod pas ni rdo rje hUM zhes/ 
182a2(rgyud): pa brgyar bzlas na pha rol gyi sems shes so// sngon gyi gnas shes par bya ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes bzlas paso// rmi lam mthong bar 'dod pas ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas shing gdug
182a3(rgyud): pas ka pi tsis bdugs te/ gnyid log na de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi shes pa ston to// tshig sgrub par 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gi stong phrag brgya
182a4(rgyud): bzlas na rdo rje tshig gis rang gi lces smras pa thams cad bden par 'gyur te ci bslangs pa de stsol to// cho 'phrul ston pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa tshig gis brgyad brgya bzlas na rang gi lus la cho
182a5(rgyud): 'phrul du gyur pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / lha dang // klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa sems can thams cad
182a6(rgyud): gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du ston to// rang gi gzugs ci dga' bar bsgyur bar 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gis rdo rje bzlas pas stong phrag brgya bzlas na gzugs gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang bdag sa
182a7(rgyud): rgyas kyi gzugasu yang byed par 'gyur ro// mi snang bar 'dod pas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung la rdo rje bzung bas/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas so// btang bas ni 'grol
182a8(rgyud): lo// khri'u la 'dug nas rdo rje lag tu blangs te/ nam 'phar gyi bar du bzlas so// gdon gyis 'dzin du 'jug na rdo rje hUM zhes paso// gdon gar byad du 'jug pa ni hi zhes paso// gdon bskyod pa
182b1(rgyud): ni rtag ces paso// gdon gzhom pa ni phaT ces paso// gcer bar bya ba ni mi'i sku'i skud pas rang gi dpung pa bcings na gcer bar 'gyur te gos brje bar 'gyur ro// sdang bar bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur
182b2(rgyud): gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgral bso// skad pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'phang ngo // dgos pa bskyed pa ni mtshan thog thag sha chen rang gi khrag gis bskus te sreg go/ gzhan gyi bud med dgug pa ni rdo rje
182b3(rgyud): bzung nas snying po bzlas shing dgug gam/ yang na thams cad du khyab pa hUM zhes pa thams cad bya'o// bud med thams cad dga' bar spyod pa ni rang gi rtags rdo rje bcings pas bzung la
182b4(rgyud): nyin bdun dus gsum du langs kyi bar du bslab bo// de nas mthu dag tu na me phyed bar du bslabs na rtag tu ldang la mi snyoms shing bcud mngal rtags shugs drag por 'gyur ro// 
182b5(rgyud): bu mo spyad pa ni rdo rje bzung nas thams cad du khyab pa hUM zhes bya ba/ byas nas spyad do// bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcing la stong phrag brgya bzlas
182b6(rgyud): na/ bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag rgya bzlas na bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro// 
182b7(rgyud): sems can thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje khu tshur gyi bcings pas rdo rje bzung la nam 'gul gyi bar du bzlas so// snang ba la dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje blangs te/ rang gi spyi bor
182b8(rgyud): bzhag la spyi bor rdo rje brtan par gyur gyi bar du bzlas so// de nas snang ba'i mdun du 'dug na des snang bar rang gi dbang bskur ba yang stsol to// nor dgug pa ni rin po che'i gtso bo'i phye mas
183a1(rgyud): sbyin sreg byab so// char dbab pa na gri hUM zhes pa stong bzlaso// char bcad pa ni hUM zhes pa'o// ser ba bcad pa ni rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so// gdon dgag pa yang duH
183a2(rgyud): rgya de nyid kyis so// sprin dgag pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa brgyar bzlas paso// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas me tog dang / bdug pas mchod de/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la
183a3(rgyud): rje langs kyi bar du bzlas so// de thogs nas sa bskor na ci 'dod pa bzhin du rgyu'i las rnams ston te/ rdo rjes bskor bas dus ma yin par shing la 'bras bu dang / me tog mthong ngo // na mkha'
183a4(rgyud): le me tog gi phreng ba chags par bya ba ni dbugs bsdams la rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gtor na 'chags so// lugs bzhad par bya ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya so// gar byed par bya ba na
183a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin mas so// smra bar bya ban hUM zhes paso// rlug par bya rdo rje dgug pa'i phyag rgyas so// smin ma gul bar byan rdo rje phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje thogs la'ang gi sam
183a6(rgyud): mtshams su bskul bas so// sa g.yo bar bya na rkang pa g.yon pa brdabs paso// khyim bskul ba ni rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya so// khang pa dgug pa ni rdo rje khros pa'i kyo btang gi phyag rgya
183a7(rgyud): bcings pas so// sprin med par char dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes bzlas pa so// skad cig tu sprin 'du zhing ston pa ni rdo rjes bskor bas so// zla ba dang / nyi ma dbab cing bstan pa ni 'drab pas
183a8(rgyud): so// nyi ma dang / zla ba mang por bstan na/ rdo rje bzhin na mkha' la gtor bas so// dmag rnam bzhi bstan na rdo rje bskor bas so// mtshan mo nyin par du bya na rdo rje 'bar ba bskor bas so// 
183b1(rgyud): nyin par mtshan mor bya na mig brtsams la rdo rje bskor bas so// thams cad nas rdo rje bstan na brgya bzlas te rdo rje bskor bas so// thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' bstan na stong
183b2(rgyud): bzlas te rdo rje bskor bas so// phyag na rdo rje thams cad la bstan na stong phrag brgya bzlas te bskor bas so// thams cad nas sangs rgyas bstan na rdo rje la bye ba bzlas so// 'jig rten
183b3(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i rtog pa chen po rdzogs so// / de nos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
183b4(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sad des rgyas kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsung so// dngas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gang 'jig
183b5(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir brtson par 'gyur ba la de bzhin gags pa'i snying po 'di sbyin no// de nas phyag na rdo rjes
183b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas cog tsog por 'dug ste mnos pa oM badz+ra bid swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ji
183b7(rgyud): rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos so// sems can thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas phyag 'tshal zhing dbang du gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
183b8(rgyud): chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rdo rje rig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dkyil 'khor thams cad
184a1(rgyud): brtags te/ de'i dbus su nas phul bzhi la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje yid kyis kyang cog tsog por bzhag go// de nas de bzhin dug
184a2(rgyud): zhugs nas 'di skad du khyod deng nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do// de ste dang na de bshad do zhes bsgos shig/ des smras pa/ gsungs shig ces pa dang / de nas khyod deng phan cad de bzhi
184a3(rgyud): gshegs par gyur to zhes smros shig/ des smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phyir zhes des smros shig/ gang dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhug pa de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du
184a4(rgyud): blta ste/ des sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang tshe 'di nyid dam// pha rol la thob par 'gyur ro// zhes smras nas/ phyag rgyu slobs shig de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// 
184a5(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'a tshal nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bshad do// dkyila'/ khor de bzhin du bris nas bcug la/ rdo rje'i sgrub pa sgrub
184a6(rgyud): go/ lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje gzung la rang gi phyag rgya sgom mo// rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di ci yin// snying po sgom pa ste/ rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na des de bzhin gshegs pa yang tshe 'di 'am
184a7(rgyud): gzhan la thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje dkyil 'khor ro// thams cad dam tshig chen po'i tshul du byas la 'di smros shig/ dang brtan phyag na rdo rje la// de bzhin gshegs rigs de bzhin
184a8(rgyud): no// sems can thams cad mgu ba ru// khyod kyi de ltar brtag par bya// deng nas khyod kyi de ltar ma byas na// sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// 
184b1(rgyud): yang dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcug nas las rnam bzhi yang bslab bo// lus thams cad kyis gtugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas de nas langs te
184b2(rgyud): yan lag lngas phyag byas te sdig pa thams cad bshag so// de nas langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ dbus mo gnyis sa la gtugs nas/ bsod nams thams cad kyi rje su yi rang ngo // de nas
184b3(rgyud): langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la gtsugs la/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig gi badz+ra bi brjod cig
184b4(rgyud): des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / phyag na rdo rje nga la phyag bya ba dang / bkur sti dang / mchod par 'gyur dar ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa
184b5(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i cho ga'o// / nas phyag na rdo rje'i rig pa sgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil/ 'khor mthong nas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
184b6(rgyud): pa bris la de'i g.yasu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po// g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa bya'o// de nas gso sbyin can du dus gsum du khrus byed pa/ dus gsum du bkrus pa'i
184b7(rgyud): gos gyon la/ stong phrag brgyar bzlas so// de'i 'jug du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs
184b8(rgyud): te zhal ston to// mchog ci 'dod pa stsal te/ sangs rgyas pa'i bar du yang stsol to// de nas yang cho ga bzhin te/ ras la de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par byas la/ de'i spyan
185a1(rgyud): sngar phyag na rdo rje thal mo sbyar te/ gcog tsog por 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogasu rdo rje phyag na rdo rje ya gcig gi
185a2(rgyud): rdo rje gsor g.yon pa na pad+ma'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogasu rdo rje khu tshur te khu tshur gnyis kyi rdo rje bsnams par byas la/ de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig de bzhin du bzlas
185a3(rgyud): la zla ba tshang nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byon nas/ mchog ci 'dod pa stsol to// yang cho ga gzhan ni ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris
185a4(rgyud): la de'i spyan sngar zla ba drug de bzhin du bzlas te/ 'jug la nyin mtshan gsum du bsrung te phyag na rdo rje byon nas phya/ dag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid byin gyi bar du bzlas so// de bzhin
185a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du stong phrag brgya bzlas na 'jug tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // namakha 'al ltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas nan mkha' la de bzhin
185a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad mthong ngo // des de la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyin cig bzhin stsol to// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na mchog 'thob bo// phyag na
185a7(rgyud): rdo rje spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes 'dod pa thams cad stsol to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sder stong phrag brgya bzlas na spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
185a8(rgyud): pos lag nas bzung ste/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du khrid cing slar yang khrid de 'ong ngo // 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las de bzhin gshegs pa'i
185b1(rgyud): rtog pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten
185b2(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ri ltar mi g.yo ba yang bskyod cing 'dren na sems can
185b3(rgyud): gzhan lta ci smos/ gang dran pa tsam gyis kyang 'jig pa thams cad rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// gang brjod pa tsam gyis kyang mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par
185b4(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad la srung bar 'gyur ba/ dang / phyag na rdo rjes kyang 'dod pa thams cad stsol/ dpar 'gyur ba dang / mchog stsol ba dang / don thams
185b5(rgyud): cang sgrub pa dang / dgongs pa thams cad byed cing rtag par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang / gang bsla bas pa tsam gyis sgrub pa thams cad mngon par 'gyur
185b6(rgyud): bar sprul bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis legs
185b7(rgyud): par smros shig/ ngas kyang bzung ngo // de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje snyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor te/ rang gi snying khar stong pa'i tshul gyis bzung nas rang gi snying po 'di gas
185b8(rgyud): so// Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ 'phar rab tu
186a1(rgyud): 'phar/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu bskyod par gyur to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ma rung bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po/ 
186a2(rgyud): gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brtan par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa yang sra bar gyur to// bdud dang mi 'grungs pa'i phyogs/ 
186a3(rgyud): thams cad kyang brlag par byas so// gdon thams cad bcos bsad bcom ste/ 'dar pad pad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag/ 
186a4(rgyud): skyobs/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag skyobs shi dag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka/ 'astsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid la skyabasu deng shig/ 
186a5(rgyud): 'di nyid khyed la skyob par byed do// phyag na rdo rje'i snying ka nas kun tu 'bar bas bskor bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan
186a6(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan po 'dzum zhing khro ba/ phyag gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM zhes pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo phyung nas
186a7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun 'dod pa'i khro bos sbyangs na phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'dug ste bka'i nod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
186a8(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig ces so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsung so// lag na rdo rje bsan
186b1(rgyud): khyod snying po gang gis sems can 'di dag thams cad brgyal ba dang / bcos pa dang / bcom pa kun 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan dag kyang rdo rje'i lus thob par
186b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba de smyos shig/ oM Ta rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya 'dis/ bdag nyid go bgos na rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje'i tshe thob cing srung bar yang 'gyur te/ nam 'tsho bar du thams cad kyis mi chu
186b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungaso// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshe/ 
186b4(rgyud): gru bzhi pa de sgo bzhi pa'o// rta babs bzhi dang bcas pa ste/ bcu drug cha dang ldan par ro// rdo rje'i rabs mdzes dpa ste// gradang sgo yi zur dag dang // de bzhin rta babs mtsha
186b5(rgyud): rnams su// rdo rje rin chen ldan par bya// bdan phreng ba dril gyis brgyan// dang po'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ snying po bzlas shing bri bar bya// de yi nang gi 'khor lo yang / 
186b6(rgyud): rdo rje srang bu mnyam ldan pa'o// rdo rje ka ba brgyud ldan zhing // rdo rje'i kab mdun gnas su// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag pa'o// de yi dbu su sems dpa
186b7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje bzhugs par bya// sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad dag/ dbu rgyan du ni brgyan thogs pa// cung zad tsam du bzhad pa'i zhal// rdo rje snyems par mdzad pa ste// me tog mda' gzhu 'chang
186b8(rgyud): ba'o// de las gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs nyid de// khro gnyer bzhad pa'i zhal ngo can// gnyis kyis me tog gzhu 'gengs shing // gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad pa'o// 
187a1(rgyud): na gyis g.yas rdzogs// rdo ga 'brub bya// snying khur rdorje brtan 'dzin cing // 'khyud pa zhub sgru ba 'o// drug rdzorje'i rgya na// chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba/ 
187a2(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje dpal can te// rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs// rdo rje can gyi g.yon bris pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dmar po ste// gnyis kyis rdo rje sems pa 'dzin// sgeg pas mchod cing 'dud/ 
187a3(rgyud): pa'o// dkyil 'khor grwa yi gnas rnams// mchod pa'i lha mo bri bar bya// dpyid kyi rdo rje rdo rje'i sprin// ston ka'i rdo rje khab mo// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gra dag tu// 'dod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa
187a4(rgyud): bri sgo yi dpung rnams thams cad du// rdo rje 'dod pa'i kyo bsogs// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po der// rdo rje skyo rab dpon nyid rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la zhugs la 'di
187a5(rgyud): skad du smros shig/ sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing / sems can kun la bde ba stsol// sems can kun gyi/ par gyur pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag dang 'grub/ 
187a6(rgyud): Tak+ki hU~M dzi/ de nas de skad smras pa dang 'bab par 'gyur te/ de ltar babs pa tsam gyi phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bstan pas grub pa thams cad kyang stsol
187a7(rgyud): te/ la la ni rdo rje 'dzin/ la la ni 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob ma gzhug ste/ snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la/ des phreng ba bzung nas gos dmar pos yan lag bcings la// ras dmar
187a8(rgyud): pos mig gnyis bkab ste bcug nas 'di skad ces smros shig/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mi mkhas pa su la yang gsang ba 'di dag mi bsnyad par byos shig 'byung po'i gdo
187b1(rgyud): dang / 'dra men ma la sogs pa'i gdon gyis bsad par gyur ta re/ shi nas kyang dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes sgo nas gdong khrol cig/ de nas 'di skad ces smros shig/ gang dpung na ba 'di
187b2(rgyud): ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ste/ 'di ni dang po'i sems dpa' 'dod pa'i dbang po kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa'o// gang mdun na pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'di'i thugs yin te 'dod
187b3(rgyud): pa'i khro ba'o// gang g.yas na ba 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi reg pa'i bde ba ste/ rdo rje dga' ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o// gang rgyab na ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das bdag
187b4(rgyud): nyid che ba'i rgyal mtshan te/ sems dpa' thams cad kyi byams pa slong ba dang nor sbyin pa'o// gang g.yon po gsan pa 'di ni bdag nyid che ba'i bdud// sems can
187b5(rgyud): thams cad chags par byed pa'o// gang grwa'i bzhi po rin rnams ni dus kyi mchod pa// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri'i lha'o// gang phyi'i grwa'i gnas na bde
187b6(rgyud): dag ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan no// gang sgo bsrung de dag ni mig dang 'dod chags dang / 'dza' bo ste/ kyo ba tang dang / zhags pa dang / sgrog dang / 'bebs pa dag ni rgol
187b7(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ro// khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po la smod par ma byed cig/ gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems can thams cad rnam par dag par
187b8(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba 'chad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mu stegs can gyi rnams 'dod chags bral ba'i chos des thar pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chags pa
188a1(rgyud): / rnams ni sems can thams cad la chags pas na thar pa ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi chung mas kyang sems can sdud par byed// 'dod chags ni drang
188a2(rgyud): chub tu bstan pa'o zhes so// de nas snying po byin cig/ Tak+ki hUM dza/ 'di bsgrubs na bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das grub pas na 'dod pa'i
188a3(rgyud): khro bo grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying po 'di bdag nyid che ba ste/ Tak+ki zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// hUM zhes pa ni khro bo'o// de nyid dgug pa'i phyir dza zhes bya ba ni/ 'di khyod kyis
188a4(rgyud): bsgrub par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po shes par slob das shig/ de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i thugs bslabs nas log pa gnyi su rdo rje sbyin
188a5(rgyud): pa'i snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra d+ha ra badz+ra pra tang d+hA ra ya sid+d+hi Tik+ka hUM dza/ de nas phreng ba phyag na rdo rje la phul bas de'i mgo la bskon no// de nas rdo rje ming gis dbang sbyin
188a6(rgyud): pa snying po 'dis so// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba karme shwa rad tA i da badz+ra nA ma na ma a d+hiSh+Ti ta dr-i b+ho s+ya b+ha bi/ oM Tik+ki hUM dza/ de nas der 'dug ste/ phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje
188a7(rgyud): tshig gis brgyad stong bzlas na de nas sa g.yo ste/ grub pa thams cad lan gcig bzlas pas 'grub bo// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings lo brgya bzlas na de'i thugs dbang du
188a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de phyin cad sems can thams cad kyi snying shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying la dbang byed do// thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// thams cad
188b1(rgyud): kyi brtan par chags so// snying thams cad las tshig thos par 'gyur ro// gyur pa dang / 'gyur ba dang / da ltar gyi tshig bden par 'gyur ro// bdag gi snying las kyang cho 'phrul rnam
188b2(rgyud): pa bzhi mthong zhing gzhan la yang ston to// de'i snying las rdo rje 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des na sems can thams cad kyis mi gsod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / mi gcod pa dang / mi
188b3(rgyud): phyed pa'i rdo rje'i lusu 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung so// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ste/ rdo rje'i thugs stong pa'i glus bstod do// de phyin cad grub pa
188b4(rgyud): thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thamasacad dang / gsang ba'i mchod pa thams cad myor du/ dgrub par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod pa thams cad kyis
188b5(rgyud): 'dra bar mchod nas/ ji snyed pa'i zas dang / ro dang / spyad pa thams cad kyi tshim par byas nas 'byung ngo // rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// 
188b6(rgyud): de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin bris te zhugs nas mchod pa'i lha rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pas snyim pa ma stong par byas te/ rdo rje sems
188b7(rgyud): dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rdo rje'i glu'i rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'bum bzlas so// de nas rdo rje de lci bar 'gyur ro// de nas slar yang bar 'gyur ro// de nas de ltar
188b8(rgyud): mtshan gcig thal byung du bzlas na nang par rdo rje 'dzin tam/ rdo rje khre'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bdag po lha'i gzugs dang / mdog dang / rgyan dang / 
189a1(rgyud): / spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa rdo rje 'dod pa'i mdangs dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tsher 'gyur ro// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas dam tshig ging dkyil ba
189a2(rgyud): te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i srad bus thig bdab te/ de nas lha mo rnams bris la de'i dbusu bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas 'di skad smos shig/ ho badz+ra satwa su ra ta s+t+waM/ ngo'i
189a3(rgyud): spyan sngar rdo rje gzhung gengs pa'i gzhu bris te/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra a shwe hUM/ g.yas rdo rje dga' mgu 'khyud par bya'o// de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra ki li hUM/ rgyab tu chu srin rgyal
189a4(rgyud): mtshan 'chang ba byams pa'i rdo rje bri/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// / badz+ra a gri ho/ gi yon du rdo rje snyems ma bris te/ rdo rje g.yon du sbyor bar bya/ de'i phyag rgya 'di'o// badz+ra gar+b+he hi na/ de nas
189a5(rgyud): grwa dang sgor yang rang gi lha mo bri/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon nyid shin tu chas la rdo rje lag tu thogs bud med kyang brgyan te/ lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la/ dpung pa gnyis
189a6(rgyud): kyis 'khyud de zhugs la 'di skad brjod do// sa ma ya s+t+waM a ho/ su ra ta hoTaki hUM dza/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das ston par mdzad de/ phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa dang / 
189a7(rgyud): dam tshig thams cad 'grub pa yang stsol to// de nas de bzhin du snying po'i rdo rje de nyid kyi bcud nas 'di zhes smros shig/ khyod kyi dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' shig/ mi bde ba ma spangs
189a8(rgyud): par myur du shi zhing ngu 'bod chen por skyes par gyur ta re/ de nas dam tshig brjod do// bdag che kun gyi phyag rgya ni/ 'dod pa bsam las yang dag 'byung // de bas khyod kyis sdig med pa'i
189b1(rgyud): 'dod dang bsam pa ma btang shig/ 'di ni dam tshig srung ba'i sngag so// oM Tak+ki hU~M phaT/ 'dis rdo rje'i chu blung ngo // gang dngos po gzhan thams cad kyi phyir yang mnas bsgag ste/ de dag la
189b2(rgyud): yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas blud do// gang gis 'di las 'das na/ zla ba phyed kyis snying 'gaso zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig chen pos gsung so// de nas phyag rgya bcing
189b3(rgyud): pa bslab po// de nas de bzhin du 'byung ngo // shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas nyid kyi sku'am mtshan ma
189b4(rgyud): bzhag go// der btsud nas las rnam bzhi bslab par bya'o// de la dang po nyid du 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje 'dzin phyag
189b5(rgyud): bzhi pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i skur bdag nyid mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas so// de phyin chad 'dod pa thams
189b6(rgyud): cad nus par 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo'i las bslab ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcing la bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thang cig bzlas te/ hUM zhes pas bsdigs na
189b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'gyel bar 'gyur ro// de phyin chad 'gro ba gnas pa thams cad kyang 'gyel nus par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje las 'byung ste/ sems can thams
189b8(rgyud): cad 'dod pa dang / khro bo gnyis kyis 'dul bar 'dod na/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas me tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas te/ rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bdag gi snying khar bcings
190a1(rgyud): la phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'dzin thob pa de srid du bzlaso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las byed pas 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed la
190a2(rgyud): sbyin pa sbyin/ tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom/ brtson 'grus brtsam/ bsam gtan la snyoms par bzhag/ shes rab yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ ci 'dod ci nus kyi bya zhing rtag tu
190a3(rgyud): bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sku'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bskur mthong gi bar du bya'o// de nas sa bcu po 'thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i las byed pa'i byang chub sems dpar
190a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs par// dam tshig shes pa ma yin dang // slob ma ma yin gzhan rnam/ 
190a5(rgyud): la/ mi zad snying po 'di mi sbyin// dkyil 'khor mthong khaMs sgrub pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya pa/ zlas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ras la bris
190a6(rgyud): te/ ras kyi dbusu ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bri// de'i g.yasu phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi pa'i thugs 'byung ba de bzhin du bri/ g.yon du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyag bzhi
190a7(rgyud): pa ste/ gnyis na ni pad+mo'i ting nge 'dzin 'chang / gnyis kyis ni me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa/ kha dog dmar po bri/ spyan sngar de bzhin du rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo bri'o// steng du na mkha'i snyi/ 
190a8(rgyud): po bri/ grar mchod pa'i lha rang gi mchod pas bkram pa dang mgo bor ro// de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zla ba bzhin dus bzhir stong bzlas shing bsgrubs na de na zla ba tshang ba dang / de bzhin
190b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'ang rtsol bar 'gyur ro// ras la bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la/ sems dpa' chen po dang / lha mo yang de bzhin du bya'o// de'i spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu grang
190b2(rgyud): med par bzlas shing 'dod pa thams cad zos la bsgrubs te/ de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang / phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par rdo rje 'dzin
190b3(rgyud): 'thob bo// ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar zla ba phyed kyi bar du rtag par bzlas pa mi nyal mi mnal bar bzlas te/ de nas zla ba phyed lon pa dang / 
190b4(rgyud): mtshan mo yang thal byung du bzlas na nang por phyag na rdo rje da// da mtshungs pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod chen po// dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyang 'thob cing thams
190b5(rgyud): cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ras la bcom ldan 'das khwa bo de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na des 'grub par 'gyur
190b6(rgyud): te/ bsgo ba bzhin du las thams cad byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang khyer zhing slar yang khyer te 'ong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad khyer te
190b7(rgyud): 'ongs nas de la sbyin no// des kyang longs spyod par nus na lha'i bu mo thams cad lta ci smos/ brgya byin yang stsol to// phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du bsgo bas stsol bar
190b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste dbang du byed do// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag
191a1(rgyud): / brgya bzlas na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi dpal gyi lha mo khrid de byon nas sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dor ro// de nas sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid bdag nyid grub par
191a2(rgyud): gyi 'di ci 'tshal zhes smros shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes te/ ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// grub pa thams cad kyang 'grub bo// spyan ras gzigs dbang
191a3(rgyud): po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang pos mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// na mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na dbang stsol bar 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongasu
191a4(rgyud): rdzogs par mdzad do// rdo rje bzhag ste de'i mdun du 'bum bzlas na de nas las thams cad yid bzhin du grub par byed do// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas 'bum bzlas na phyag
191a5(rgyud): na rdo rje 'dzin gyis mchog stsol to// dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin mngon du mtho zhing phyag rgya'i las kun grub pa yang stsol bar 'gyur ro// 
191a6(rgyud): rdo rje lag tu thogs nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung ba tsam gyi mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo thigs te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo'i rigs 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 
191a7(rgyud): tang thogs te 'bum bzlas na/ kyo btang nges thams cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro// zhags pa thogs te 'bum bzlas na zhags pa des thams cad drang nus par 'gyur ro// lag pa
191a8(rgyud): gnyis rdo rjes bcings pa bsdams te/ 'bum bzlas na sems can thams cad bcing nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na gnas pa dang 'gro ba
191b1(rgyud): thams cad dbang nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na hUM zhes bya ba gcig gi gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad gang cig gis ltung bar byed nus pa/ 
191b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lha chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal po'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ zla ba gcig tshun cad kyis der 'ongs te dbang du
191b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mthu bo che rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo thob ste/ 'khor lo thogs na 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na tshangs par spyong
191b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// brgya byin rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/ dbum bzlas na rdo rje sbyin par 'gyur te/ rdo rje bskor ba des char bcad pa dang / dbab pa dang / zang gcig gis ni
191b5(rgyud): gnam lcags dang / ser ba 'beb so// sa nad gzhon nu mnan te 'bum bzlas na/ gzhon nu ma thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// las thams cad kyang byed par
191b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nyi ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bdud rtsi rna cha sbyin par 'gyur te/ des na lha'i lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zla ba la 'bar ba'i lta bas mgu bar bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas
191b7(rgyud): na gnyisu mthong ste/ de phyin chad zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang mdangs su 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi mig tu mdzes shing sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur
191b8(rgyud): ro// bza' chen po'i gzugs la bltas te 'bum bzlas na de nas be con thogs te/ be con des ni 'thabs na dgra las rgyal te nor thams cad 'thob bo// skya slong gi gnas song ste/ 'bum
192a1(rgyud): bzlas na skra sbeng las kun byed do// rgun gyis myos pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na chang gi snod thams cad nam 'tsho'i bar du mi zad par 'gyur ro// ma d+hu ka ra la bltas te
192a2(rgyud): phrag brgya bzlas na dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba la bltas te 'bum bzlas na 'thab mo dang rtsod pa'i g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba thob pa mnan te
192a3(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// mdzod skyong rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na bza' ba dang btung ba mi zad par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang 'di
192a4(rgyud): la zad par mi nus so// rlung mngon du byas te stong phrag ba rgyo bzlas na rlung gis de dang 'thun par 'dod pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// me la bltas te 'bum bzlas na me'i
192a5(rgyud): dbusu 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro na yang mi 'chi/ ga ste me'i gzer gyur cing nyin gcig kyang gser srang re re sbyin no// ngal bso bo mnan te 'bum bzlas na gan
192a6(rgyud): sbyin thams cad kyi bdag por gyur nas nor thams cad kyang sbyin par 'gyur ro// phag mo mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na sa la 'dug pa'i gter 'byin no// gshin rje
192a7(rgyud): mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gnam 'dren pa'i cha lugs la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na de las thams cad pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// klu ba ru Na man/ 
192a8(rgyud): te 'bum bzlas na klu thams cad las kun byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// ma'i gnas song nas stong phrag brgya bzlas nam thams cad g.yog byed cing don thams cad byed
192b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// sa la 'dug ste 'bum bzlas na sa'i dbang por 'gyur ro// na mkha' la bltas te 'bum bzlas nan mkha' la 'gro ba'i sems can thams cad bsgyel ba dang / 
192b2(rgyud): dbang byed par 'gyur zhing na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sa'i 'og mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na sa'i 'og na 'khod pa kun la dbang du 'gyur ro// rin po che thogs
192b3(rgyud): te 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gser gyi dong tshe la sogs pa yang de bzhin no// skyes pa bzung ste 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// 
192b4(rgyud): bud med bzung ste stong phrag brgya bzlas na stong phrag brgya dar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rta la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// glang po che la zhen te 'bru
192b5(rgyud): bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ba lang la so// sa pa phyugs kyi rwa gnyis bzung te 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gos dang rgyan gyi
192b6(rgyud): chas la stong phrag brgyar bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dpal mo la bltas te 'bum bzlas na dbang du 'gyur ro// mcho dbyangs ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas
192b7(rgyud): na tshig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de nas slangs na ci bslangs pa de kun ster bar 'gyur ro// gtsug lag thams cad dang rnam par shes pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// 
192b8(rgyud): grub byed ma bzung nas 'bum bzlas na 'das pa dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa kun kyang ston cing ched du ma bslangs par nor sbyin par 'gyur ro// sA la b+han cig mnan nas
193a1(rgyud): / 'bum bzlas na nyin re bzhin yang gser gyi dong tshe brgyad brkyang ster bar 'gyur ro// gos kyi sgrog ma la mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi zad par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang gi
193a2(rgyud): snod mnan te 'bum bzlas na de dang de mi zad par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi cha lugs mnan te 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin gyis ci dang ci 'dod pa kun sbyin par 'gyur ro// srin po
193a3(rgyud): mnan te 'bum bzlas na de de'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// 'byung po mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// sha za'i cha lugs bris pa mnan te 'bum bzlas/ 
193a4(rgyud): na de de'i g.yog byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gnod sbyi na ma la sogs pa yang sgrub bo// ri la 'dzegs te/ dbu ma bzlas na ni ri thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// phyugs
193a5(rgyud): kyi lha su 'dug te 'bum bzlas na phyugs thams cad la da bang du 'gyur ro// shing ljon gyi drung du 'bum bzlas na shing ljon pa'i lha rnams mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// 
193a6(rgyud): zhing la 'dug te 'bum bzlas na bza' 'bum dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshong pa dang bcas pa'i grong du 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad ma bslabs par thob par 'gyur ro// gnas byin can
193a7(rgyud): du 'bum bzlas na thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro// grong du 'bum bzlas na zla ba gcig tshun chad kyis grong de thob bo// gtsug lag khang du 'bum bzlas na gtsug lag khang na
193a8(rgyud): gnas pas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha'i stan du 'bum bzlas na lhas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// khang pa stong par 'bum bzlas na sha za thams cad de'i g.yog
193b1(rgyud): tu 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad sbyor bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i gan su 'bum bzlas na snang ba dang du 'gyur ro// bskyed mos tshal du 'bum bzlas na bskyed mos tshal gyi matog
193b2(rgyud): dang 'bras bu thams cad rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshor 'bum bzlas na mtsho de'i lha la dbang bar 'gyur ro// gter gyi gan su 'bum bzlas na gter rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dgod
193b3(rgyud): cing 'bum bzlas na rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur te/ 'gang pa tsam gyis las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// khros pas 'bum bzlas na thams cad gtan 'pho bar nus par 'gyur ro// 
193b4(rgyud): cang mi zer bar 'bum bzlas na sems can thams cad nga dbang du 'gyur ro// lkugs pa'i brtul zhugs kyi la dbu ma bzlas na tshig thams cad kyi dbang du 'gyur ro// bu
193b5(rgyud): med kyi 'joms par rtags btsugs te/ 'bum bzla san 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang na mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jom pa la mdzub mo
193b6(rgyud): btsugs te 'bum bzlas na de byas pas gnas pa dang / 'gro ba dang thams cad 'dren cing 'gugs pa/ gtong ba dang / 'gyel ba dang slong bar 'gyur ro// 'jom pa lta zhing 'bum
193b7(rgyud): bzlas na bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'jom par lig bu mig bcug ste 'bum bzlas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'jom par gur gum bskus te 'bum bzlas na des bskus
193b8(rgyud): pas 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyur ro// 'jom par rab bla bcug ste 'bum bzlas nan mkha' la 'gro bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jom par ldong ros bcug ste 'bum bzlas na rig 'dzin
194a1(rgyud): / du 'gyur ro// ral gri thogs te 'bum bzlas na ral gri can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// 'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyuraro// kyo btang
194a2(rgyud): thogs te 'bum bzlas na kyo ba tang des thams cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje gsor nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje lag gi bzung nas
194a3(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa la lag gis gzung ste 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
194a4(rgyud): cad la mchod pa byed pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi rig 'dzin du'o gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjesu dran zhing 'bum bzlas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
194a5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes kyang de mchod na gzhan gyi lta ci smos/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs las bzung ste 'bum
194a6(rgyud): bzlas na ting nge 'dzin thob bo// rdo rje snying po bzung nas 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bsdam
194a7(rgyud): pa tsam gyi las kun byed nus par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhon nu la blta zhing 'bum bzlas na na mkha' la yi ge snang ste/ thams cad smra ba dang / spobs pa thogs pa med par
194a8(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bskor cing 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// 
194b1(rgyud): namakha'i mdzod la ltas te 'bum bzlas na na mkha' la rgyu ba thams cad dang / don thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyi bar du ston to// 
194b2(rgyud): byams pa'i zhabs la bzung ste 'bum bzlas na mtho ris kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad nyam su myong bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor bris nas 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
194b3(rgyud): bdag po slob dpon dang / yid kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen por brtags te zhugs nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang
194b4(rgyud): bcas par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar phyag rgya chen dpo bcings la dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste/ rdo rje de'i bzlas pas stong phrag brgya rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na dngos
194b5(rgyud): grub thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes nyen thams cad dang / las thams cad kyang nu sa par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i bdag po dang / dbang phyug
194b6(rgyud): dang / byed pa po dang / 'byin pa dang / mi bzang mi nyams pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad nyamasu myong zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad snyed cing 'thob ste sems can thams cad
194b7(rgyud): la phan pa dang / bde ba 'grub pa'i sbyin par 'gyur ba dang / de rang gi gnyen dang bshes gnyen dang / grogs thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo // de dag la yang 'grub par byed do// 
194b8(rgyud): bsam pa tsam gyi sgyu ma thams cad ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho 'phrul yang ston to// de bzhin
195a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang ston to// skad cig gi gzugs sna tshog su ston par 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshe dang / stobs dang / gzugs dang / 
195a2(rgyud): na chod dang shes pa ci tsam pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungaso// dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas khro bo'i
195a3(rgyud): tshig gi bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing don gyis 'bum bzlas na des rdo rje khro bo lta bur bdag gi lus 'gyur ro// hUM zhes pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang 'dzin pa dang khams
195a4(rgyud): gsum gyi dbang po dang / spyan gsum pa'i khro bo chen po dar gyur nas ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa dang / sems can thams cad
195a5(rgyud): grub pa gsol te/ de ltar mi zad ma nyams par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung so// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i
195a6(rgyud): rgyal po las phyag na rdo rje'i rtog pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gas
195a7(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di stsal to// gang brjod pa tsam gyi de bzhin gshegs
195a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du grub pa dang / 'jig pa dang / gnam ngal dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phags pa
195b1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ leg so leg so// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyi smos shig/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras
195b2(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungaso// a ro li ka/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhan
195b3(rgyud): gcig tu 'dus te/ ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po
195b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du gyur te zhug so// de nas 'phags pa sgra na ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor
195b5(rgyud): 'di gsungaso// de nas yang dag par bshad pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// 'jig rten gsum rgyal tshul bzhin du// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de dbus
195b6(rgyud): srad bu mnyam pa ru// grwa bzhi par ni gdab pa ru/ gnyis pa'i grwa ni sgor bstan te// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste// dbusu thig ni bzhi yang
195b7(rgyud): bri// tshon rtsi dmar po dag gi ni// pad+mo 'dab brgyad bri bar bya// de yi snying po dbusu ni// 'jig rten mgon po bzhugs par bya// 'dab ma kun gyi steng rnamasu// sangs rgyas cha lugs
195b8(rgyud): bri bar bya// pad+ma che mchog phyag rgya yis// der ni slob dpon zhugs nas kyang // dkyil 'khor gnasu 'dug nas ni// rnal 'byor snyoms par 'jug par bya// ji ltar pad+mo chu rnam
196a1(rgyud): dang // nyes pa'i bag chags mang po yis// chags par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir// 'gro ba chags pas dag par gyur pa yin// 'di lan cig brjod nas bsgom ste/ de nas
196a2(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis kyi kyo ba tang gis kun drangs la pad+mo chen po de spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar grol lo// de la pad+mo chen po'i kyo ba tang ni 'di'o// oM ma hA pad+ma hUM dza hrIHde nas
196a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po nyid byon te/ slob dpon la zhal ston par mdzad nas yang na 'od zer yang 'gyed do// de nas phyag rgya de nyid kyi slob ma gzhug/ 
196a4(rgyud): dkar pos g.yogs la gos dkar po bgos la// thod/ dkar pos mgo la gtsug tor byas nas bcug ste/ datshig su bcad pa 'dis brjod nas don kyang bstan par bya
196a5(rgyud): de nas lag pa g.yon par pad+mo byin/ g.yas par snga/ gas kyi nor bu bskur la 'di skad smros shig/ sangs rgyas thams cad pad+mo che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam
196a6(rgyud): pa ste/ rtag par ru ni rtag par bya// khyod ni deng nas spyan ras gzigs// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba dang // ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa bslab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa
196a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po pad+mo zhes bya'o// de nas pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la dbus kyi snying po la 'dug nas de bzhin
196a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la pad+ma 'dab mkha'abyed pa'i tshul gyi lta zhing stong phrag brgya bzlas na 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thob bo// pad+ma'i
196b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung te/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas la de'i dbus pad+mo stong bzhag ste/ de nas pad+mo re re zhing bzang po thang res bcom ldan 'das la
196b2(rgyud): pad+mo stong 'bul lo// de nas slob ma bcug ste dam tshig brjod do// slob min bu min ma yin te// dam tshig can la dam tshig bstan// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad ni// dag pa nyid ni pad+ma// 
196b3(rgyud): bzhin// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin bris la mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod do// sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis te// phyag na rdo rje'i tshig giso// 
196b4(rgyud): lus kyis 'jig rten mgon po ste// na mkha'i snying po la/ sa kyis so// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom da ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang pos sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di
196b5(rgyud): gsung so// ras la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po ri rab ri'i rtse mo na/ rang gi ting nge 'dzin du bzhu gas shing de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad mtha' kun tu bzhugs
196b6(rgyud): par bri/ de nas zla ba yar gyi tshes zhag gcig nas brtsams nas rtag tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun tu bzlas te/ nam spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i zhal nas de bzhin
196b7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i pad+mo'i dbu su zhugs te/ yang de las gzhan pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i dbang bskur ba'i gnasu brtan par 'gyur gyi bar du bzla so// de nas
196b8(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi skur kun gyur te/ skad cig cig gi bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'gro zhing ldog go/ sems can thams cad kyang mthong ste/ tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur
197a1(rgyud): / de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'bum bzlas na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// nyis 'bum bzlas na mtshams med pa la sogs pa sdig pa thams cad ma lus
197a2(rgyud): par byang bar 'gyur ro// sum 'bum bzlas na bsod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyur// de nas dngos grub thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang / phun
197a3(rgyud): sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes nyen thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na de'i nang par de/ 
197a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas de'i snying khar zhugs te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thob bo// ya nga na khar zhugs na spyan ras gzigs dbang po thob bo// 
197a5(rgyud): de nas ma bsgrubs kyang la su 'gyur ba ni dang po brjod pas/ bdag srung ngo // gnyis brjod pas ni gzhan dang / gro/ nga dang grong khyer srung ngo // gsum pa brjod pas ni las
197a6(rgyud): thams cad byed do// dbab pa ni tsan dan gyi bdug paso// gdon thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni hri zhes bya ba so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje me tog bzlas te byin no// sems
197a7(rgyud): can thams cad mnan pa ni sa ser pos so// bud med dbang du bya ba ni sum ni me tog la bsngags pa so// chom rkun mnan pa ni yung kar gyi sbyin sreg giso// ri dgas dang bya mnan
197a8(rgyud): pa ni yungs kar gtor bas so// sgyu ma mnan pa ni rma bya'i chang bus so// rmi lam mthong bar bya ba ni dus gsum du bzlas pas so// rmi la mngon pa gzhil ba ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis
197b1(rgyud): so/ sems can thams ca dadabang du bya ba ma thos bya sbyin sreg gis sa// blamathar bang dang bya ban kya bana'i sbyin sreg gas so// sngags sa mo dang du bya bahU~M drung med pas/ 
197b2(rgyud): gi sbyin sreg gis so// bung med pams cad dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi dbang po'i sbyin sreg gis so// 'dod pa thams cad dang du bya ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ros gzigs dbang po
197b3(rgyud): la mchod pa byas nas/ nub gsum rangs par bzlas na de nas 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu thob par 'gyur ro// spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sder nyin ro zhing dus gsum dulan gsu
197b4(rgyud): bzlas na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum gyis reb ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// sang sa rgyas kyi sgron sngar zla ba gsum gyi bar du nyin mtshan
197b5(rgyud): gsum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par na/ lab rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las spyan ras gzigs kyi
197b6(rgyud): dbang po'i rtog pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
197b7(rgyud): 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal por rang gi snying po 'bul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhesu gsol/ 'dis sems can
197b8(rgyud): thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' la
198a1(rgyud): / skyes bu chen po smos shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsung so// tri bA bA Tu Ta haH/ 
198a2(rgyud): de nas 'di brjod pa na mkha' la dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa rin po che'i rgyan thams cad gos dang / gser dang / nor rin po che'i dbyigs la sogs pa thams cad kyi char
198a3(rgyud): bab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku kun tu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te bzhugs so// de nas na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsung so// rdo rje'i dkyi
198a4(rgyud): 'khor tshul bzhin te// rdo rje rin chen mnyam ldan zhing / dgra brgyad shin tu mnyam par bya// rin chen kun dang lnga ngan par bya// der slob dpon zhugs te rdo rje rin po che'i
198a5(rgyud): phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gnasu bzhag la zhugs nas 'a/ di zhes brjod do// re ba thams cad grub pa yi// nam/ kha' grub pa mchog yin te// grub shig grub shig
198a6(rgyud): sems chen po// bcom ldan thams cad grub par ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' byon gyi rlob par mdzad do// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
198a7(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bzhag la de'i thang 'khor kun tu phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa brgyad bzhag par bya'o// de nas slob ma rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzhug go/ bcug nas 'di
198a8(rgyud): skad ces brjod do// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir// don shes bstan pa gang yin de// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// de nas sbyin pa
198b1(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi bslab bo// de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa dang // nor sbyin pa dang / zas sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa'o// de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'o// nor sbyin
198b2(rgyud): pa ni sems can thams cad la'o// zas sbyin pa ni byol song thams cad la'o// chos sbyin pa ni sems can mi snang ba thams cad la'o// de nas snying po byin la/ rin po che thams cad
198b3(rgyud): kyi byin gyi rlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te 'di zhes brjod do// oM badz+ra rat+na b+hi Shi kA b+hi Shany+tsi sarbA d+hi pa t+yai hUM bA bA Ta Ta ha ha// de nas rdo rje nor bu'i khu tshur gyis phyag rgya slab ste/ 
198b4(rgyud): sngags ni 'di'o// hUM bA ta ha/ de nas rdo rje rin po ches phyag rgya bcings te sngags ni 'di'o// oM bA bA ta mu/ de nas mchod pa rnam bzhi bya ste 'byung ngo // dbang tham
198b5(rgyud): cad bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rdo rje rin po che 'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ rdo rje rin po che dbu su bris la lag tu nor bu thogs nas rdo rje rin po che langs kyi bar
198b6(rgyud): du bzlas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon te dbang bskur bar mdzad do// dbang bskur ba des na thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur ro// rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig
198b7(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor te/ na mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bris la/ spyan sngar nor dang gser dang / mu tig dang / nor bu rin po che la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bzhag la de nas de tsud de
198b8(rgyud): thams cad bstan nas/ dam tshig 'di sbyin no// sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' dag/ gal te nyin re mchod stong na// khyod kyi nor dang don bsags pa// tshe rabs kun tu 'jig
199a1(rgyud): par 'gyur// de la 'din ma'i snying po'o// oM ShA bA Ta Ta ya swAhA/ de nas chus dbang bskur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// las kying dkyil 'khor bris la de bzhin
199a2(rgyud): gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya ste/ de'i dbusu bzhag nas der btsud de/ de nas las rnam pa lnga slab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dbang sbyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa
199a3(rgyud): thams cad la mchod pa bya'o// de nas nor sbyin pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa la ci nus kyis sbyin no// de nas zas sbyin pa ni byol song rnams la sbyin no// de nas mi 'jigs
199a4(rgyud): pa'i sbyin pa ni gyong khrid thams cad la sbyin no// de nas dachos sbyin pa ni mi snang ba'i sems can rnams la sbyi don no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa 'byung
199a5(rgyud): ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin pa che'i dbang bskur bas dbang skur pa bris te/ de'i g.yas
199a6(rgyud): phyogasu 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba'i phreng bas dbang bskur ba'o// g.yon phyogasu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
199a7(rgyud): pa'o// de nas ras la bris pa de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas pa'i mjug tu nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te/ phyi de nyin gyi nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas na de nas bcom ldan 'das na mkhi
199a8(rgyud): snying po ras la bris pa de las byung nas sgrub pa po de la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro// dbang bskur ba de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs/ 
199b1(rgyud): par yang la su 'gyur ba ni 'bum bzlas na don thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na gter chen po rnyed do// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyu
199b2(rgyud): gi spyan sbyar 'bum bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang pos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// namakha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na rgyal srid thob bo// 
199b3(rgyud): khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la khu tshur bcings pas gser gyi dong tshe 'byung ngo // 'jam+ba dpal gzhon nu la bltas te 'bum bzlas na chos kyi nor dang gzungs thob/ 
199b4(rgyud): bo des nor yang skye bar byed do// rdo rje 'khor lo sraM na lag gi sor mos mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// na mkha'i mdzod kun nas 'khyud
199b5(rgyud): de 'bum bzlas pas na mkha' las nor thams cad dang zas thams cad kyi yo byad zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// byams pa la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bcom ldan
199b6(rgyud): 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan rnams kyi dbang mchog byin nas slar yang 'ong ngo // de phyin chad 'dod pa thams cad kyi nor gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten
199b7(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las na mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa'o// // de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis byang chub sems dpa'
199b8(rgyud): thams cad 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad bskyod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa
200a1(rgyud): chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul bar bgyi ste/ bdag gis bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la rdo rje'i ri rab de bzhin gshegs pa las blangs te/ des
200a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can rnams 'grub pa thams cad grub par byas te/ de'i bskyed pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs kyi bar du'o// de nas brtse
200a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis rdo rje khu tshur byang chub sems dpa' chen po la leg so zhes bya ba byin te leg so leg so// rdo rje khu tshur khyod kyis smros shig/ de nas rdo rje khur gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
200a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas nas/ rang gi snying po 'di gsung so// oM ru Tu ru Tu hU~M ma tha/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
200a5(rgyud): thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / 'khor thams cad dang bcas na ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de ra lhags te lag pa gnyis kyis rang gi khu tshur gyi phyag
200a6(rgyud): rgya bcings na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub la dmigs shing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bkod do// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis de
200a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
200a8(rgyud): 'dra ba ni/ rdo rje khu tshur zhes gsung so// de yi dbusu sems chen po// rdo rje khu tshur bzhag par bya// rdo rje'i khu tshur rdo rjer bcas// lag pa gnyis ni btsir bar bya// de yi ngos ni tham
200b1(rgyud): cad du// sangs rgyas gzugs rnams bzhag par bya// de dag gi ni gra kun du// byang chub sems dpa' kun bri'o// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir rdo rje slob dpon gyi rdo rje dang bcas
200b2(rgyud): pa'i khu tshur gyi/ tshig gis phyag rgya bcings te/ zhugs la 'di brjod cig/ hUM da k+Shi NI sma ra Na phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur slob dpon la grub par 'gyur te/ de la phyag
200b3(rgyud): rgya yang brtan par 'gyur zhing sus kyang dbye bar mi nus so// de nas snying po 'dis bdag gi snying khar dgrol lo// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti hUM/ de nas slob ma gzhug pa ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi
200b4(rgyud): phyag rgya rdo rje dang bcas pa/ phreng ba dang bcas par bya ste/ de ba bzhin du ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkab ste/ de nas 'di zhes brjod do// deng khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams
200b5(rgyud): cad kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang / rdo rje 'dzin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kyang btab bo// khyod chos dang rdo rje/ las gang 'dod/ des smras pa/ gnyis ka'o zhe na/ de nas
200b6(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon gyi rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha lugs blangs nas phreng ba de'i mgo la bzhag ste/ dgrol ba'i snying po de nyid kyis phyag rgya snying kar dgrol lo// de nas lag tu
200b7(rgyud): sbyin pa ni lag pa g.yon par rdo rje'o// g.yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes zer na de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyin no// de ste rdo rje'i zhes zer na
200b8(rgyud): de'i lag pa g.yon par rdo rje byin la 'di skad bsgo shig/ 'di gnyis ni khyod kyi grub par dmigs la rtag tu mchod pa gyis shig/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa dkrol la dkyil 'khor ston
201a1(rgyud): // la 'di smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje rnams// bsdus pa khu tshur zhes bya ste// bcings na rdo rje khu tshur bshad// de nas snying
201a2(rgyud): po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba slobs shig/ dam tshig gi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin du/ dkyil 'khru
201a3(rgyud): thams cad yang dag bri// de yi dbusu ci rigs par// sangs rgyas sku lus bzhag par bya// thams cad rgyan gyi brgyan pa yi// rdo rje khu tshur kun 'dzin pa'o// de yi ngos ni thams cad du/ 
201a4(rgyud): mchod pa rnam bzhi bri bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor dbus rnam das su// rdo rje rin chen yang de bzhin// de bzhin rdo rje pad+mo de'i dbus/ rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya// grwa yi phyogs rnams thams
201a5(rgyud): cad du/ mchod pa rnam bzhi bri bar bya// de nas btsud nas bya/ gargya kun// bcing ba yang ni bslab par bya// sgrub pa ga sang ba dag dang ni// bskul ba gsang ba bslab par bya/ 'di
201a6(rgyud): rnams thams cad kun bris nas// bsgrubs shig ces ni brjod par bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du mtshan ma bzhag nas 'di zhe
201a7(rgyud): brjod do// ci ste dkyil 'khor ma mthong na// phyag rgya shes pa brtan na ni// rdo rje rin chen rgyal ba dang // sna tshogs pas khyod gsod par 'gyur// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi
201a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'byung ste// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar phyag rgya'i las bslab bo// de la phyag rgya bcings pa ni 'di'o// rdo rje bcing ba kun byas la
201b1(rgyud): sor mo thams cad dgug bya ste// rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya bcing // de nas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo // de lta bur mi ldan na 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub
201b2(rgyud): pas ni dam tshig chen po yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snying po thang cig bzlas pas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi ni ma yin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bci ma
201b3(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sgrub pa 'byung ste// 'o ma mthung zhing rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na sngar snyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ras la bri bar bya ste/ 
201b4(rgyud): ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje khu tshur rgyan tha/ mas cad kyi brgyan pa bris la phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje dang ba ces pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa rdo rje dbang skur ba'i dar
201b5(rgyud): gyi bcings la de'i thang 'khor thams cad du/ bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang phyag gnyisaka/ 
201b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur du bcings par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs par bya'o// de nas de'i spyan sngar de
201b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu zhag bdun srungs nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur sgoms la/ mtshan
201b8(rgyud): thal byang du bzlaso// de nas nam phyed nas bdud kyi las sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'di brjod cig/ oM badz+ra maSh+Ti ha na ha na sarba mA ra Na phaT/ de nas nang par gyi dus
202a1(rgyud): na bcom ldan 'das thams cad byon te lus kun tu 'jug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'gyur ro// yang ras kyi
202a2(rgyud): ga 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris te de'i g.yas phyogasu bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 
202a3(rgyud): sku mdog stobasangs ud pal sngon po lta bu rdo rje khu tshur gyis phyag g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ste/ de'i g.yasu bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje
202a4(rgyud): dam tshig gi khu tshur can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pag zhon nu ma dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi rdo rje dam du 'chir ba ma dog dmar po bya'o// de'i thang du rdo rje'i gsel bur ma rgyan
202a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ lag pa/ gnyis kyis rdo rje gas lnga thogs pa'o// bcom lnga na 'das kyi g.yon phyogasu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
202a6(rgyud): po thor tshugs kyi dbu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+mo dang mchod sbyin gyi phyag tu byas la/ de'i g.yon du pad+ma chen po'i rdo rje byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje'i sde zhes bya'o// de'i
202a7(rgyud): g.yon du rdo rje'i dpal mo dang / rdo rje phonya mo'o// rdo rje dpal mo ni ser gyi sku mdog go/ dpal gyi gzugs 'chang ba phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje phonya mo ni mdogo sngon mo la rdo rje khar
202a8(rgyud): pa'achang po'i// de nas thab sar gyi ches gciganas brtsams te/ rdo rje la tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyabacings nas stong phrag rgya bzlas na/ ga zugs kyi ma de les pa ces
202b1(rgyud): bzos nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te/ de phyin cad na mkha'i dkyil na spyod cing 'dod pa mi snang bar 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong du phar yang 'gro zhing gyen
202b2(rgyud): du yang 'gro'o// ci 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyur ro// kun tu 'khyil bas 'khyil ba'i sgra can lo bcu drug lon pa'i lusu gyur nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la ci 'dod pa bzhin longs
202b3(rgyud): spyod par 'gyur ro// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / chad pas bcad pa la sogs pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// gzugs bzang po bskal
202b4(rgyud): par gnas shing / rga ba dang shi bar yang mi 'gyur ro// yang cho ga gzhan te ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin dag shegs pa bris la/ de'i g.yas phyogasu phyag na rdo
202b5(rgyud): rje rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa la sku mdog ud pa la spro/ na po'i kha dog phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pas rdo rje khwar+g+ha rabacings te sbyar la bcom ldan 'das la 'dud par
202b6(rgyud): bya// de'i g.yon phyogasu bcom ldan 'das mdam tshig gi khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa yid tsam 'dud pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba/ lag pa g.yas pa na
202b7(rgyud): a mra'i 'bras bu 'bul ba/ g.yon pa na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'dzin to// de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zhag gsum bsnyungs la/ gu gul gyi ril bu sran ma tsam du ru ka'i
202b8(rgyud): 'bru mar la skyugs la brgyad stong du ba med pa'i 'da' me la sreg go/ de nas gzugs de 'gul te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu
203a1(rgyud): tshur gyi mchog stsol ba ni rgyal po 'am/ 'khor lo bskor ba'am/ lha ma yin pa dbang ba 'am/ sa brjod pa'am/ sa'i 'og pa'am/ khams brjod pa'am/ 'don
203a2(rgyud): pa'i khams mi snang ba'am/ namakha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang sgrub pa gzhan gyi cho ga ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris la/ de bzhin
203a3(rgyud): du rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa ud pa la sngon po'i mdog tu byas la de'i spyan sngar dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug nyin mtshan
203a4(rgyud): gsum thal byung bzlas na nam byed nas bcom ldan 'das/ nyid byon te/ mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// ras sam// shing leb 'am/ rtsig ngos la bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje khwa
203a5(rgyud): tshur de bzhin du rdo rje dang a mra'i 'bras bu thogs par byas te/ de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag rgya tham sa cad bcings pa tsam gyis las thams cad gdon mi za
203a6(rgyud): bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas ma sgrub pa'i las rnams 'byung ste/ rdo rje dam tshig gi khu tshur bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ khu tshur bcings pas na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lag
203a7(rgyud): pa g.yon pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings na phyag na rdo rje la sogs gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'bum bzlas paso// lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te stong phrag
203a8(rgyud): brgya bzlas na/ khu tshur bcings pa des mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bral na snang bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje bcing ba'i khu tshur byas la 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bcangs pas bcing ba dang / rangs pa
203b1(rgyud): bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// na mkha' la rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te/ 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur byab pa tsam gyis na mkha' la nor dang / gser dang / 
203b2(rgyud): mu tig dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / me dang / chu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / myu gu dang / yi ge dang / 'thab cha dang / ston skyobs dang / mtshon
203b3(rgyud): cha dang / glegs bam dang / rtog pa dang / mdo sde dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa dngos po gnas pa dang / 'gro ba ci 'dod pa dgug par byed do// g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la 'bum
203b4(rgyud): bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur bstan pas gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dgug pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gyel bar nus par 'gyur ro// khu tshur bsgyur bas thams cad bstan
203b5(rgyud): 'pho nus par 'gyur ro// g.yas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcing / sa la stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur byabs pas tha mas cad las nor dang / gser dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / 
203b6(rgyud): mtshon cha dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad dgug go/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya las dam pa thams cad kyang dgug go// bud med kyi nu ma dang
203b7(rgyud): mngal phyogs dang / mig dang / sna dang / mchu dang / rna ba dang / mgo dang / brla dang / ska rags dang / gsang spu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad kyang 'gug go/ bkrol na thar par 'gyur ro// 
203b8(rgyud): nyin zhag gcig bsrungs pa lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu chur bcangs te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na de phyin chad khu tshur bcangs pas las thams cad byed do// de la las rnams ni dgug pa dang / 
204a1(rgyud): gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / rmugs par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / bslang ba dang / drang ba dang / bsgyel ba dang / 
204a2(rgyud): brdabs pa dang / skud pa dang / dbye ba dang / go bzlog pa dang / gtan 'pho ba dang / gso ba dang / sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa dang / dus tshigs bsgyur ba dang / sa la sogs pa g.yo ba dang / thams cad
204a3(rgyud): la dbab pa dang / dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / gar byed pa dang / glu len pa dang / sngon ma byung ba'i sbyor ba dang / so sor lung ston pa dang / khrul 'khor thams cad gzhom pa dang / sgo thams cad
204a4(rgyud): dbye ba dang / gdon thams cad 'jug pa dang / dug thams cad bslang ba dang / ma rungs par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhom pa dang / thams cad 'gebs pa dang / 
204a5(rgyud): gas pa sbyar ba dang / sbrul bskrad pa dang / bzung ba dang / btang ba dang / ser ba dang / char dbab pa dang / klog nga nga ba dang / thams cad bslar bcad pa dang / sngan chad med
204a6(rgyud): pa'i gos dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / bya dang ri dgas dgug pa dang / gtong ba dang / gzugs mang po ston pa dang / mi snang ba dang / na mkha'
204a7(rgyud): la 'gro bstan pa la sogs pa 'dod pa bzhin las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje khu tshur gyi rtog pa'o// 
204a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi kyang rang gi snying po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
204b1(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rtog pa 'dir stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod brjod par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur/ 
204b2(rgyud): pa la rigs kyi bu khyod kyi smos shig ces gsungaso// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ a ra pa tsan/ de nas 'di brjod ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
204b3(rgyud): thams cad mnyam pa nyid las yi ge mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ba bshad do// de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ste/ 'khor
204b4(rgyud): lo'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga da la bris te/ de'i dbus kyi lte bar 'jam dpal bzhugs dpar bya'o// rdo rje ral gri dang glegs bam thogs par byas la/ 
204b5(rgyud): de'i thang 'khor thams cad du yi ge a ra pa tsan la sogs pa 'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje ral gri dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhugs te/ ni ShA pany+dza gra
204b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'di brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slob dpon la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa yang stsol te/ de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyis na mkha' la yi ger bris te thams
204b7(rgyud): cad gsung ngo // de bzhin du slob ma bcug ste/ 'di zhes smros shig/ deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thob par 'gyur gyis/ snying po 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig
204b8(rgyud): de la gsang ba'i yi ge 'di rnam so// a ra pa tsan zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa thams cad thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// ra zhes bya ba ni chags pa'o// pa zhes bya bani
205a1(rgyud): don dam pa'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'o// na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o// de ltar 'dod pa dang / chags pa dang / don dam pa dang / spyod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi snying po 'di
205a2(rgyud): bsgoms te bsgrubs na 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi snod yin te/ de bas na snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin kyang mya
205a3(rgyud): du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings pa bslab bo// spros pa med pa'i mchog ces bya'o// de nas ral gri'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du rdo rje dkyil 'khor bris la de'i
205a4(rgyud): dbu su ral gri bzhag ste/ mdun du snying po 'di bsgrubs na/ des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bsgrubs par 'gyurd ro// rdo rje ral gri'i dkyil 'khor ro// dam tshig gi dkyis
205a5(rgyud): 'khor ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin du bris la zhug/ sa nas 'di zhes brjod do// a kA ro mu khe sarba d+harmAH/ Ad+ya nud panan tuta/ a zhes bya ba ni chos thams
