230b2(rgyud): pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po
230b3(rgyud): 'dis brlab par bya ba'i phyir don yod gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlangs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang thugs ka nas sngags 'di byung nas lha de da
230b4(rgyud): dam tshig can du byin gyis brlabs so// oM sarba bi drA ba dadz+wa a d+hiSh+Tha na dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de ltar ting nge 'dzi nal snyoms par zhugs nas kyang gdon mi za bar mi chom
230b5(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi/ 
230b6(rgyud): thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sar+b+ba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na bi shud d+he swA hA/ rig pa chen mo 'di bshad ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi/ 
230b7(rgyud): ngan song gi rgyud kyi bcing ba thams cad rnam par chad do// ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par sbyang so// sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnams rab tu zhi te/ skye bo mang po rnams bde ba dang
230b8(rgyud): ldan par gyur to// de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i snying po 'di gsungaso// oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ya sar+b+ba a pA ya sarba satwa b+h+yo hUM/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
231a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying po'o// oM sar+b+ba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ne hUM phaT/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// 
231a2(rgyud): traT/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i snying po'o// haM/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang mdor na dran pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams chung ba'i sems
231a3(rgyud): can rnams ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las bde blag du rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba ni 'ang yin no// oMn mo b+ha ga te san+na dun ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+yA ta
231a4(rgyud): sa bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni da sho d+ha ni/ sar+b+ba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A bA ra Na bi shud+d+he swAhwA/ oM sar+b+ba bing+ga sar+b+ba A
231a5(rgyud): ra Na be sho d+ha ya ha na hUM phaT/ oM sarba bid hUM/ oM sarba tri da phaT/ oM sar+b+ba bid a/ oM sar+b+ba bid traT/ oM sa rbA bid oM/ oM sar+b+ba bid swa/ oM sarba bid a/ oM sar+b+ba
231a6(rgyud): bid+yA hUM/ oM sar+b+ba bid trAT/ oM sha/ oM b+hi/ lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di rigs kyi bu
231a7(rgyud): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas ming tsam yang nyan tam/ bcangs sam/ klags sam/ bris nas kyang / mgo bo/ gtsug pud dam/ dpung pa'am/ mgul du btags
231a8(rgyud): te 'chang na tshe 'di nyid la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dam/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang 'brel pa rmi lam gyi rnam pa'am/ ngan song dang 'brel ba'i mtshan ma de dag thams cad rmi
231b1(rgyud): lam tsam du yang mi 'byung na/ dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs la/ zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur la snying po yang bzlas/ sngags kyi don yang sgom pa gang yin pa lta smos
231b2(rgyud): kyang ci dgos te/ de dag la ni sdig pa gang yang nye bar mi 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// skyes pa'am bud med dam/ lnga'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin pa/ 
231b3(rgyud): 'am/ byol song ngam/ yi dgas sam/ sems can dmyal ba la sogs te/ gang yang rung ba shi ba'i lus dkyil 'khor du bcug te dbang bskur na/ de sems can dmyal
231b4(rgyud): bar skyes na yang de ma thag tu rnam par thar nas/ lha'i rigasu skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i rigs der skyes nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid
231b5(rgyud): mngon sum du byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yang byed/ phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur/ rgyud nges pa can du yang
231b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu yang skye/ sgrib pa rnams rab tu spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs sam/ lha'i rigs sam/ gzhan grang
231b7(rgyud): yang rung bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po mdor na 'jig rten nam/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan pa dang bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i
231b8(rgyud): dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du bskor ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad kyi dbang
232a1(rgyud): gyur pa rnams la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can de dag ngan song thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyi ba dang / bla na ma mchis pa
232a2(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ rje cig bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshes
232a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad
232a4(rgyud): yongs spyod ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dal 'khor chen po 'di gsung so// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa// rgyal
232a5(rgyud): pa'i gsungs pa'i ye shes gang // de ni du kyil 'khosnying por gsungs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyis sems can thams cad la thugs brtse
232a6(rgyud): slad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// gtsug lag khang dang skyed mos tshal// mchod rten lha khang kun dga' sogs// ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis// gnas ni byin gyis
232a7(rgyud): brlab pa brtsam// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa dang // them skas bzhi yi phreng ba
232a8(rgyud): dang // seng ge ba glang rnams kyis rgyan// dar dang lda ldi do shal phreng // dril bu dang ni rngams rgyan// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas rgyan// srad bu brgyad pa
232b1(rgyud): ldan pa dang // phyi yi sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan// dgu yi char ni bgos pa las// sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya// rdo rje srang bus thig gdab bo// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa/ 
232b2(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la// lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug/ rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la// rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya// dbus kyi phyogasu kun rig ni// dung dang kun du
232b3(rgyud): zla 'dra la/ zhal bzhi pa la rdo rje yis// seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang // ting 'dzin phyag rgyar ldan pa dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri// de yi spyan sngar ngan song kun/ spyong
232b4(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po bri bya ste// phyag gnyis ting 'dzin tshul du ba da snol// zla ba rgyas dang pad+ma'i mdog/ rgyan rnams ku dan gyis legs rdzogs la// rgyal mchog skyes bu gang
232b5(rgyud): bar bri/ rgyang du shAkya'i rigs dbang po// gtso bo brub bri bar bya// g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyogs char ni/ rgyal mchog rin chen me tog gnyis// lo can dang mA ma
232b6(rgyud): ki/ de bzhin dkar mo sgrol ma rnams// rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhin// grwa yi phyogs ni kun tu bri// rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog/ 
232b7(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sems dpa' rnams// go rims bzhin du bri bar bya// mkhas pas lA s+yai la sogs pa// mchod pa grwa yi phyogasu bri/ sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du// sgo ba bzhi
232b8(rgyud): ni bro bar bya// rta babs khyams ni thams cad du// byams pa la sogs bri bar bya// nyan thos rgyal ba thams cad dang // de bzhin rang rgyal gtso bo rnams/ khro bo mngag pa po nya sogs
233a1(rgyud): // bri bra yang na ming yang rung // phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du// gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya// 'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa bri// byang phyogs ni dbang phyug che// shar dang nub kyi
233a2(rgyud): gling du ni// brgya byin gtogs 'dod thams cad ni// 'khor dang bcas par bri bar bya// gzhan dag rnams kyang de bzhin te// lha min dri za na mkha' lding // gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che/ 
233a3(rgyud): 'byung po yi dgas 'dre rnams dang // klu dang grul bum ri rnams dang // rgyal po bzhi rnams bri bar bya// bza' dang skar ma rgyu skar dang // khro bo ma rungs 'tshe ba yi// bgegs dang bI nA ya
233a4(rgyud): ka rnams// sems can kun la phan byed pa'i// drang srong ska ngal ba chen po rnams// 'phra men ma dang bud med bri/ de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma// 'byung ba bzhi yi lha chen po// 
233a5(rgyud): khyim dang ri la gnas pa dang // shing dang kun dga'i nags la sogs// dur khrod grong khyer gnas pa'i rnam sa/ ming dang brda'a'am yang na ni// thig le rnams kyang bri bar
233a6(rgyud): bya// de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor la// bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang // gdugs dang rnga ma lnga ldi dang // 'phan dang sna tshogs na bzas mchod// gser las byas pa'i bya rnams ni// 
233a7(rgyud): brgyad dang bcu drug lhag kyang rung // dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang ba'i// bum pa lnga ni bzhag par bya// mar me gtor ma bum pa dang // mdzes pa'i bshos rnams bzhag bya ste// 
233a8(rgyud): bza' ba btung ba sbyar lags dang // bca' ba sna tshogs bzhag par bya// gnod sbyin srin po'i kha za su// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag/ 'byung po dag dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi men
233b1(rgyud): de bzhin te// me tog dri rnams sna tshogs dang // 'o ma mar dang kha rar bcas// rnam rgyal bum pa dri yi chus// rab tu bkang ba bzhag par bya// de nas khrus la sogs byas la// dri dang phre/ 
233b2(rgyud): mchog phreng ba can// dri zhim kha bkeng mchog mdzes pa// rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang // me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug/ gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'khor// mang po rnams ni spyan
233b3(rgyud): drangs te// phyag rgya sngags dang bdag ldan zhing // lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis// dzaHhUM baM ho// thugs rje bdag/ tshur gshegs ces ni brjod nas kyang // gsang ba'i bcing ba
233b4(rgyud): bcings nas ni// mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya// zhags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang // de nyid lcags sgrog tshul du bya// mtheb gnyis nang du bkug nas ni// 
233b5(rgyud): bskyod par gyur nas dbang du 'gyur// de nas mtshan ma skye sa nas ni// thog ma med pa mngon sum mthong // arga mchog brtags bsang la sogs pa yi// dbyangs snyan pa
233b6(rgyud): yi bstod dang lha rdzas kyi// mchog gi dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod// de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya// sems can bkres shing skom pas gdungs pa dang // phyogs na
233b7(rgyud): gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtag/ de yi gtor ma ji ltar 'thun par bya// de nas sngags pas bla med byang chub kyi// gan su slob ma yongasu smin bya ba// 'gro la phan phyir myur du byang
233b8(rgyud): chub par// de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyed du gzhug / de rnams byin brlabs byang chub smon lam gdab// zab cing rgya che ba yi chos bsgrags la// srung bar byas nas brtul
234a1(rgyud): zhugs sdom gnas pa// rang gi kha nas sngags brjod gzhug par bya// dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g.yogs nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin ma dpal gyi lag gnyis bya// me tog
234a2(rgyud): rin chen la sogs de// rgyan la yon gyis lag pa bkang ste gzhug par bya// sngags ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra pra be sha hUM/ 
234a3(rgyud): a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye hUM// de nas sngags 'dis me tog la sogs pa dor bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas ni// 'gro la phan
234a4(rgyud): phyir gtso chen gyis// sman par dgongs nas bzhesu gsol// oM badz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hUM/ oM pra tIts+tsha/ badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM// me tog rin chen la sogs gang // bab par gyur pa'i
234a5(rgyud): rigs kyi lha// gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs na ni// dngos grub 'gyur te the tshom med// de nas sngags pa ma khas pa yis// sngags 'dis dam tshig sbyin par bya/ 
234a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hri da ya me pra be sha d+ha T+Ta tiSh+Tha tsA// de nas 'dris dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyis dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par
234a7(rgyud): byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grug/ ci ste dam tshig 'das na ni// de ma thag tu bkas nas gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang / bdun
234a8(rgyud): brgyud rigs ni brlag par mdzad// de bas rtag tu bu khyod kyis// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang // sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'// shin tu mos pas bsrung bar bya// khyod
234b1(rgyud): kyis srog chags bsad mi bya// ma byin par yang blang mi bya// brdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams// dngos grub 'dod pas bya ma yin// chang 'di btung bar mi bya zhing // shal sogs pa
234b2(rgyud): bza' mi bya// sems can gnod par sbyor ba ni// nam kyang bya ba ma yin te// dkon mchog gsum ni yongs mi sdung // dus kun du ni byang chub sems// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya
234b3(rgyud): dang // lnga dang bla ma de bzhin no// sdig la sogs pa gang yin dong // bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya// lha la phul ba'i rnying pa dang // de yi grib ma 'gom mi bya// phyag rgya'i gzugs la
234b4(rgyud): de bzhin te// sngags dang lha la'ang smad mi bya// gdon gyi / la sogs bya ma yin// mu stegs can la'ang smra/ dad mi bya// mdor na yid gnyis som gnyis the tshom mi
234b5(rgyud): bya ste/ bdag gi de nyid dang ni sngags de bzhin no// mos pa brtan dang ldan pas dam bcas nas// sarba bid+yA sa ji bzhin dbang bskur te// bum pa la sogs ji snyed
234b6(rgyud): mang thogs pas// bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur// de nas lag tu dril dang rdo rje byin// 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs la// mi dbang dbang phyug 'khor/ 
234b7(rgyud): lo thob pa dang // sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya// sngags sgrub phyir ni mos ldan slob ma la// sngags pas bka' ni rab tu bsgo bar bya// des kyang mos pas spyi bos phyag
234b8(rgyud): 'tshal te// ci ste nor yod bla ma dbul bar bya// nor dang gter dang 'bru deng dbyig dang gser// gzhon dang khyim gdan bu pho bu mo rnams// skyes pa dag dang bud med yang na ni// grong nga/ 
235a1(rgyud): grong khyer de bzhin ci bzhed rnams// rang gi sems ni rab tu dad pa yis// yon gyi mchog nyid dbul ba nyid du bya// myur du 'grub phyir mos pas bla ma la// mdor na rang gi lus
235a2(rgyud): kyang dbul bar bya// tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang // 'jig rten phyi ma'i bde mchog dang // sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na// lha yi bde ba smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas kun dang bla mar
235a3(rgyud): mnyam// rdo rje slob dpon brnyas na ni// rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur bas// cung zad tsam yang brnyas mi bya// rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang // rdo rje ma rnams nyid la ni// rnal 'byor can
235a4(rgyud): gyi brnyas ma yin// rtag tu khon gyi gcugs mi bye// // na mchog gsum la gnod byed dang // bla ma snod byed dam rungs pa// dam tshig las ni 'das pa dang // de la so ga/ 
235a5(rgyud): ngapa'i gnod byed la// bzod pa bsgom par mi bya ste// de lta ra gyur na kun rig gis// gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sems can kun la phan pa dang // 
235a6(rgyud): brtser ldan dngos grub thob par 'gyur// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang lha'i 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde
235a7(rgyud): ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsung so// ras la bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de bzhin du bris la/ g.yas ni de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs sbyong ba ga
235a8(rgyud): brjid kyi rgyal po// g.yon phyogasu ni shAkya thub pa ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i 'og tu ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na pad+ma bsdams pa'o/ 
235b1(rgyud): thub pa'i 'og tu ni phyag na rdo rje de gnyis kyi bar du sman gyi bla mdog sngon po phyag gcig na 'bras bu a ru ra bsnams/ phyag gcig ni mchog sbyin du bya/ rta 'grin dang / 'jig rten
235b2(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ma rungs pa 'joms pa la brtson pa gnyis ni rang gi lha la rten par bri/ de gnyis kyi dbu su lo tsa na dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgron mnam/ 
235b3(rgyud): rang rang gi mtshan ma phyag na bsnams par bri/ de dag gi 'og tu pad+ma'i rdzing bu chu dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa dkar po dang / nya khar ba la sogs par bcas
235b4(rgyud): pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa du mas yo dang su grang bar bri/ bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / bshos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam
235b5(rgyud): pa sna tshogs pa bri/ de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po nyid thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par bri/ de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs de mngon par mchod de/ bdag nyid
235b6(rgyud): kyis spyan dbye ba bya zhing bden pa la byin gyis brlabs par dmigs par bya'o// de nas ci ste mtshan ma zhig mthong na ni myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// 'on te ma mthong / 
235b7(rgyud): na ni ring mo zhig nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang // dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dang // dge slong bram ze pho mo dang / 'bras bu mthong na myur du ni// mchog
235b8(rgyud): dang bar mtha ma 'grub/ de nas gzugs de gsang sngags dang // phyag rgya mngon par byin rlabs nas// ci bdog pas ni mchod par bya// rtag tu mngon sum 'dug nas kyang // 'jig rten
236a1(rgyud): gsum las rnam rgyal gyis// bdag srung la sogs byas nas kyang // bdag gi de nyid bsams na su// dngos grub mtshan ma byung bar du// 'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'bum
236a2(rgyud): bzlas// de nas dben pa'i gnas ni// brgyad brgya nyid du tshang bar bya// sngags ni 'khrul pa med par bzlas// de nas bzlas pa'i mjug tu ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la// mchod pa
236a3(rgyud): rgya chen byas nas kyang // mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya// ci ste gtse 'am de yi sras// yang na lha rnams mthong gyur na// bsod nams snod la ci dga' bar// dngos grub mchog ni gsol
236a4(rgyud): bar bya// lha ni dngos grub 'bras bu ni// de la rtag tu dgyes na sa stsol// phyag 'tshal dngos grub la sogs blang // / dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma la// skal ba re re phul nas ni/ 
236a5(rgyud): de nas rtag tu bdag spyod cing // med na mkhas pa bdag nyid kyi sa// blangs nas bdag nyid spyad par bya// sems ca na kun la phan brtson par// bskal pa du mar gnas par
236a6(rgyud): 'gyur// ci ste dngos grub ma gyur na// las rnams thams cad nus par 'gyur// gnod sbyin skar mda'i gdong la sogs// chad pas bcad cing bka' tsam gyis// zhi ba la sogs la
236a7(rgyud): kun ni/ bran bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sdig pa bgyis pas sen
236a8(rgyud): dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams ji ltar na sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal spang ba'i slad du sgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
236b1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa byed pa/ sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag ci nas kyang sems can da
236b2(rgyud): ba'i sdug bsngal las thabs slabs grol bar 'gyur ba nyon cig/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// snga ma bzhin du bum pa la// brgya cu brgyad du bzlas nas ni// dbang bskur ba nir/ 
236b3(rgyud): tu brtag/ de nas sdig pa kun sbyangs te// dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las// de ni myur du rnam par thar// sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid de// dag par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi/ rig
236b4(rgyud): su skyes par gyur nas kyang // de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas dang // chos 'gro ba ni thos par 'gyur// de yi gzugs brnyan bri ba'am// gur gum gyis ni ming yang rung // ngan song// 
236b5(rgyud): gsum gyi sdug bsngal las// sems can rnams ni sgrol ba'i phyir// sngags mkhan gzhan la phan pa rtson zhing // snying rje can gyis dbang bskur ro// de nas rnal
236b6(rgyud): 'byor can gyis ni// sngags dang phyag rgya de dbang bskur// lha yi gzugasu brtags nas kyang // mchod rten dbusu bzhag par bya// rang gi lha 'am lha gzhan gyi// snying po snying kar
236b7(rgyud): bris nas kyang // lha 'dra bar ni sems bskyed der// khyim gyi nang du bzhag par bya// de yi ming yang smos nas ni// gur gum bzang pos sngags bris la// rim gyis 'bum ni tshang tsam du// 
236b8(rgyud): mchod rten las ni rab tu bya// sdig can sdig ni zad bya'i phyir// bye ba snyed ni tshang bar bya// de ltar byas nas nges par ni// dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur// yi dgas byol song sdug
237a1(rgyud): / bsngal las/ grol te lha yi gnas skye// de nas ming yang brjod nas ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags bzla zhing // 'bum phrag stong ngam yang na ni// brgya phrag stong du tshang ba dang // bye
237a2(rgyud): ba stong du rab bzlas na// lha yi gnasu nges par skye// de yi ming nas brjod nas kyang // mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya 'am ni// yang na brgya phrag stong snyed du// sbyin sreg byas par gyur na ni// dmyal
237a3(rgyud): ba chen por gyur pa yi// sdig pa de las thar par 'gyur// ji srid mtshan ma shin tu ni// 'bar ba'i gnas na skyes gyur par// til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang // ra yi 'o mar ldan pa dang / 
237a4(rgyud): dri yi bskus pa'i yam shing gis// cho ga bzhin du sbyin bsre dgas bya// de nas de ni nges par yang // lha yi gnas skye sa gyur nas/ de yi mtshan ma ston par byed// yang na lha yi
237a5(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur// yang na ho khung nang du ni// me yi ltas ni ston byed cing // lha yi gnasu skyes pa dang // sdig pa bcom pa'i mtshan mar ni// dkar po nyid dang g.yasu 'bar
237a6(rgyud): gyen du 'bar zhing dri ma med// zlum zhing rnam par mi 'phro la// brtan la grol bzhin dri ma med// yang na me lha nyid kyis ni// bdag nyid de bzhin ston byed de// zla ba dri med dkar 'dra la// bzhin
237a7(rgyud): gdog dkar zhing lam mer 'bar// de ni mtshan ma 'di dag gis// dmyal ba la sogs rnam grol zhing // sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni// skyes pa yin par shes par bya// khru bzhi pa yi
237a8(rgyud): tshad du ni// cho ga bzhin du khung brkos la// rdo rje mtha' ma bskor ba yi// 'khor lo dbusu bri bar bya// rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams// ji bzhin pa yi phyogs bri// de bzhin sems dpa'
237b1(rgyud): rnams dang ni// 'jig rten gco la sogs pa bri// bya dang bum pa gang ba dang // gtor mas snod rnams bkang ba dang // brgyad snyed tsam du bzhag pa'am// yang na bcu drug snyed du bzhag bza' ba
237b2(rgyud): dang ni bca' ba'i bshos// me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te// bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs// gdugs mchog rnams kyis legs par rgyan// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor dam par ni// sbyin
237b3(rgyud): sreg rab tu bya ba ni// cho ga shes pas bris nas kyang // lha rnams mang po spyan drangs la// sngags shes pas ni sngags phyag rgyas// arga phul bas shes nas kyang // mdor na mchod pa byas
237b4(rgyud): nas ni// lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la// ga pur gur gum da la sogs pas// mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la// til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang // dri yi chus ni legs
237b5(rgyud): bkang ste// 'bras chan yos dang la du dang // sbrang rtsi sha ka ra/ ra ldan pa// brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas la// ya ma nga la yang de bzhin te// rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shi
237b6(rgyud): khung bu'i nang du bzhag par bya// ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang // chu mchog gis ni bkrus nasu// bzlas pa'i dri yis byug par bya// gos dang rgyan gyis klubs nas kyang // sngags kyis
237b7(rgyud): btab pa'i bdug pas bdug/ me tog phreng la sogs pas mchod// gtsug phud dpung par de bzhin du// sngags bris nas ni gdags par bya// snying kalkog ma kha phyogasu/ sarba bid+yAs
237b8(rgyud): byin gyis brlab// dpral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis// mgo bo gtsug pud dpung pa gnyis// sna dang rked pa dbus mo bo la// long bu sna yi rtse mo dang // mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi// dbang po/ 
238a1(rgyud): / rnams kyi gnas la ni// de ltar gzhan du yi ge sngags// mchog tu dge ba rnams gzhag go// de nas ngan song sbyang ba'i phyir// stan dang bcas te thab dbus// bzhag pa nyid
238a2(rgyud): du bya ba yin// de nas sngags 'chang sngags kyis ni// btab pa'i gos kyis g.yog par bya// de nas byin za dge ba rab sbar la// me lnga stong gis 'khrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus// 
238a3(rgyud): zla dkar kun da'i zhi la zhi ba'i lus// mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyi me bkug la// arga dbul bar brtags nas de bzhin du// blo mchog ldan pa'i mdun du gzugs sogs
238a4(rgyud): bzhag/ de bzhin gshegs tshogs de bzhin spyan drangs la / arga la sogs btags te de bzhin du// bde ga/ shegs gsungs pa'i mchod pa la sogs bya// de nas byin
238a5(rgyud): za la ni brtag bya la// sreg byas bkang ste de yang sbar ba'i/ phyir// de nas sreg byas bkang ste rim gyis ni// rgyal la sogs la brgya rtsa brgyad du brtag/ de nas spyod
238a6(rgyud): ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po la// bsreg par bya ba nyi shu rtsa gcig brtag/ de nas spyan drangs yo byad lan gsum dang // arga la sogs pad ma'i dkar zhal mchod// phyag na rdo rje pad+ma
238a7(rgyud): zhags bsnams pa'i// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs// zhabs kyi pad+mas sdig mnan cing // rgyan rnams kun ni rab rdzogs la// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi
238a8(rgyud): dbu rgyan mtho// bsams sam yang na bris kyang rung // de yi snying pos de bzhin du// brgya phrag stong ngam yang na ni// bye ba'i tshad du sbyin bsreg bya// ci sti mtshan ma la sogs/ 
238b1(rgyud): 'byung // de bzhin sdig can rgyud ces bya// de nas thal bar gyur pa dang // rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags kyis ni// cho ga bzhin du bsdu bar bya// thal bde dang rus pa'i rdul// sngags kyis btab pa'i
238b2(rgyud): dri chu dang // ba skyes 'o ma la sogs lngas// sbyong ba'i sngags kyis blo ldan gyis// 'bum du bzlas pas brdzis nas ni// ga pur dri dang sgos pa yis// 'jim pa dang ni bsres nas kyang / 
238b3(rgyud): gzugasu bya ba 'om yang na ni// mchod rten gyi ni ltar byas la// gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am lnga// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad par du// sngags dang phyag rgyas btab nas// 'bum phrag/ 
238b4(rgyud): gnyis kyi bar du bzlas// de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam/ yang na gzugs kyi zhal 'dzum 'am// dri dang bdug dpa 'od kyang rung // snang ngam yang na ngad ldang ngam/ lha la
238b5(rgyud): sogs pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs par ni snang gyur tam// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang // me tog la sogs 'dor ba dang // dung dang rnga la sogs pa'i sgra// gling bu pi dang
238b6(rgyud): la sogs rnams// ci ste mtshan ma 'di dag ni// sdig can blos ni ma mthong na// 'bum gyi phrag ni brgyad stong ngam// ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni/ 
238b7(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par bya// de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang // mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzlas// de nas de yi sdig pa ni// dag pa nyid du nges par mthong // lha yi
238b8(rgyud): lus kyi gzugs gyur la// rang gi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur// mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas ni// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis kyang // byams dang snying rjer ldan pa yis// las
239a1(rgyud): rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// yang na med par gyur na yang // bzlas shing sgom pa'i tshul gyis ni// ming tsam legs par bris nas kyang // mchod rten phreng
239a2(rgyud): ba bya ba dang // yang na gzugasu bris kyang rung // sbyin sreg mngon par dbang bskur na// gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye// thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs// rang gi ming smos sngags
239a3(rgyud): btab nas// bzlas pa byas te song nas kyang // rgya mtsho 'bab pa'i klung du dor// de ltar na ni sdig can yang // ngan song las ni thar 'gyur na// dge ba'i mchog ni bskyed pa dang // 
239a4(rgyud): byang chub sa bon bskyed pa'i bdag/ sangs rgyas 'bras bu'i dargyu ldan pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par ldan// tshul khrims rgyud dang rab ldan pa// bzod pa brtson 'grus
239a5(rgyud): mnyam bzhag dang // shes rab rnams kyis rgyu sgom pa'i// 'jig rten bsod nams ldan ci smos// myur du de ni/ ngan song ni// bcom par gyur te the tshom med// dge ba'i
239a6(rgyud): rtsab ma bskyed la// med par lta ba gang yin dang // byang chub lam las rnam log pas// bstan pa zhe sdang gnod byed cing // sdig pa'i rang bzhin ma mthong la// ma dang pha la snying ring zhi
239a7(rgyud): byang chub sems la rten pa dang // 'dod chags bral ba bsad pa'i rnams// ci ste lha rnams med gyur tam// sangs rgyas dge 'dun chos de bzhin// sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs
239a8(rgyud): lo sogs// shes rab thabs rnams med na ni// sdig can de dag mithar zhes// bdi gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs// de nas brgya byin la sogs lha// pad+ma lta bu'i mig phyes
239b1(rgyud): legs shes bya bas mnyes byas te// rab tu mgu nas mchod byas nas// brgya byin gzhan la phan brtson pas// ji skad gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du/ shAkya'i gtso bos bka' stsal pa// bden
239b2(rgyud): pa nyid du byas gyur nas// de nas de ni dmyal ba yi// sdug bsngal las ni thar nas kyang // dga' ldan gnas sems can kun// phan phyir bde gshegs 'dra bar skyes// de nas dbang por
239b3(rgyud): bcas pa yi// grags chen lha rnams gar byed cing // mchod pa'i sprin ni mtha' yas pas// de bzhin gshegs la mchod byi'i phyir// lha yi tshogs kyis mdun byas te// tshe 'di nyid
239b4(rgyud): la mchod pa'i phyir// byang chub tu yang sems bskyed nas// da lha rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// me tog bdug pa byug pa da dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phen la sogs// rgyan
239b5(rgyud): la sogs pa rab mdzes dang // na bza' rin chen char las gas// dga' ba'i tshal ni gang bar byas// de nas ya mtshan cher gyur te// lha rnams kyis kyang phyag 'tshal
239b6(rgyud): nas// dga' ba'i tshal ni yid 'ong ba// kun nas gang bar gyur pa yi// sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di ci lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ 
239b7(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de yin no// mtshams med pa'i dbang du gyur pa yang myong zhing mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la bde 'gro'i dbang du gyur
239b8(rgyud): po gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo tshar lag so// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lag so// de nas brgya byin la sogs po lha'i bu thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad
240a1(rgyud): ces smra so// sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med// chos dang 'dra ba'i dge ba med// dge 'dun 'dra ba'i snod med de// sngags dang 'dra ba'i 'dren pa med// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis
240a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigasu skyes pa'i lha'i bu de ci 'dra ba zhig/ de'i rdzu 'phrul
240a3(rgyud): dang mthu ni ji lta bu lags pa lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de bdag cag lta bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad kyi snying bskul bar byed pa zhes bya
240a4(rgyud): ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba nyid kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo gnyis las/ phyung ngo // byung nas kyang nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i lus thams cad snang bar byas nas snying khar zhugs te/ 
240a5(rgyud): bskul nas yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i bu de nyid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas lus kyi 'od zer gyi sa dpag tshad brgya phrag stong tshun chad kyi na mkha'i ngos thams
240a6(rgyud): cad gsal bar byas te/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas nas lha'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos mi snang bar byas te 'ongs nas dga' ba'i tshal thams cad gas
240a7(rgyud): zhing snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / brgya byin gnyis ma gtogs pa lha rnams kyi 'od zil gyis mnan to// de nas lha'i bu des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag
240a8(rgyud): tshal nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kye ma shAkya mgon po yi// sangs rgyas mdzad pa ya mtshan che// gang phyir ngan song lhung ba yi// sems can myur du glog bzhin grol// 
240b1(rgyud): nas skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi pad+mo thams cad rin po che las byas pa/ dpag tshad brgya phrag stong du dri'i ngad ldang ba/ lha'i glu snyan pa'i sgra grag pa// ya mtshan du
240b2(rgyud): ma yang dag par ston pa/ lha rdzas kyi glu dang / gar dang / brdung ba dang / gling bu dang / rnga dang / ker ko rnams kyi sgra snyan pa 'byin pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byung ste/ de mthong nas
240b3(rgyud): kyang shin tu ya mtshan skyes te 'di skad ces smraso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni bsam mi khyab// sngags kyi yon tan sna tshogs bsam mi khyab// byang chub rten pa rnams kyang bsam mi
240b4(rgyud): khyab// tshangs spyod tshul khrims dri med skye bas ma yas/ de nas lha'i bu de dag gis blta bar 'chilo// de nas dbacom ldan 'das kyi yang 'di skad ces gsol to// lha'i bu de
240b5(rgyud): dang de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams blta bar 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'tshalo// bde bar ga gas pa blta bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang
240b6(rgyud): mthe bo gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer dri ma med pa des lha'i bu de dang lha'i 'khor de dag kun snang bar byas te bskul nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od
240b7(rgyud): ces bya ba de la so grang gan gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das dang / brgya byin gnyis kyi gdan ma gtogs par dga' ba'i tshal thams cad g.yos par byas te/ lan ba
240b8(rgyud): stong du mar bskor ba byas shing bskor ba byas nas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ sngags kyi byin brlabs ya mtshan che// gang phyir mtshams med lhung
241a1(rgyud): / yi/ sems can lha gnas myur du skyes// de nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / 
241a2(rgyud): do shal dang / se mo do dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan cha la sogs pa rgyan gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / lda ldi dang / snga ma la
241a3(rgyud): sogs pa yo byad kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / seng ge'i gdan dang / gzim cha dang / pho brang dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang bu brtsegs pa la sogs pa gnas kyi khyad par sna tshog
241a4(rgyud): pa dang / me tog dang spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i khyad dpar sna tshogs pa dang / rang gi lus dang ngag dang / se dmas rnams kyang phul te/ ba lang dang / rta dang / seng ge dang / stag
241a5(rgyud): dang / spre'u dang / rko ba dang / thug re dang / ma he dang / bong bu dang // rnga mo dang / chu srin dang / phag dang / ra dang / glang dang / ba dang / 'dod pa'i ba bzhon la sogs pa bzhon pa'i khyad par
241a6(rgyud): du ma yang phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par
241a7(rgyud): mchod de/ leg so zhes bya ba bsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / brgya byin gnyis la bla ma dang / sti stang du byas te phyag 'tshal nas de bzhin du song ngo // de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa
241a8(rgyud): la sogs pa lha rnams mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du leg so zhes bya bas bstod cing mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
241b1(rgyud): ldan 'das gang gi slad du ma 'ongs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'chang ba dang klog pa la spro bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod pa'i yon tan bshad du gsol// brgya
241b2(rgyud): byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams ngas bshad kyis/ legs par nyon la yid la bzung shig/ lha'i bu rnams dge ba bcu dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam
241b3(rgyud): du thos par 'gyur gyi/ sems can ma rabs rnams kyi ni ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ sems can phal
241b4(rgyud): pa ma rabs kyi ni ma yin no// sems can bsam pa nges dpa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan mang po/ mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro bar
241b5(rgyud): 'gyur te/ mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la/ brten pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs
241b6(rgyud): pa'i lha'i bu de dag yang dag par dga' ba skyes nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni snod du gyur pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag ni snod du gyur pa ste/ 
241b7(rgyud): gang gi slad du bdag cag gis de bzhin goshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i
241b8(rgyud): mtshan brjod pa 'di bcom ldan 'das pad+mo'i zhal nyid nas thos pas bdag cag ni ngan song gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ dus ma lags par 'chi bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur// 
242a1(rgyud): 'chi ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa la sogs pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni gdon mi 'tshal
242a2(rgyud): bar sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i snod du gyur pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dis sems can rnams kyi don bgyid pa gang lags pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag gi
242a3(rgyud): 'bras bu ni cir 'gyur/ rnam par smin pa ni cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po de dag ni skyes bu dam pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ yang dag par
242a4(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du lta bar bya ste/ lha'i dbang po gang gi phyir 'jig rten pha rol tu phyin nas mtsha mas med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por
242a5(rgyud): skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu spong bar byed pa dang / byang chub/ la gdon mi za bar ston par byed pa dang / byang chub sems
242a6(rgyud): dpa'i sa phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phyir te/ lha'i dbang po dper na khyod kyi lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por
242a7(rgyud): skyes pa'i don byas pa bzhin no// lha'i dbang po de ltar gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i sems can de dag ci so so'i skye bo yin snyam sems sam/ 
242a8(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lag so// bde bar gshegs pa ma lag so// lha'i dbang po sems can de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po/ gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ste/ de bzhin ga
242b1(rgyud): pa rnams kyis kyang phyag bya ba/ mchod pa/ brjed pa/ sti stang du bya ba/ 'phrag la bskur bar bya ba yin na/ lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas brgya byin dang / 
242b2(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin chen po nor bu bzang po dang / 
242b3(rgyud): nor bu bzang po chen po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo gnyis dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgyas
242b4(rgyud): bskor ba rnams dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po pIny+tsa ka/  dang / pIny+tsa ka chen po la sogs pa dang / gang gzha dan dag kyang rgya che zhing rgya che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
242b5(rgyud): srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 'dre dang / rims dang / gdon dang / dug dang / 
242b6(rgyud): skar ma la sogs pa thams cad kyis 'grin cig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa chen po de'i rkang pa
242b7(rgyud): gnyis mgo bos blang bar bgyi'o// mdor na rtag pa rgyun tu dus thams cad du srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di rigs kyi bu
242b8(rgyud): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pas 'chang ngam/ klog gam gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par 'chad par 'gyur ram/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas mchod par 'gyu/ 
243a1(rgyud): / ram/ rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i bu'am/ rgyal po'i bu mo'am/ rgyal po'i brdzun
243a2(rgyud): mo'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor po 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor mo 'am/ gang su yang rung bas 'chang zhing klog pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par 'chad cing ston pa'i bar du bgyid na/ bcom
243a3(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad de'i bran du gyur pa lag so// rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi skye bo dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po'i pho
243a4(rgyud): pang 'khor rnams yongasu brkyang bar bgyi/ dus dusu char dbab par bgyi/ 'bru la sogs pa bskyed par bgyi/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du sgrub par bgyi/ pa
243a5(rgyud): rol gyi phru ma mang po gzhom par bgyi/ sems can ma rung sa pa gnod cing 'tshe ba pos de la mi phan po'i sems pa skyod pa gang yin pa de dag brlag par bgyi ba'i slad du sgrub pa
243a6(rgyud): bgyi/ ma rungs par bgyi/ de la bdud kyi las kyang bgyi/ gnod par bgyi ba la yang nye bar gnas par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la
243a7(rgyud): brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lta bur gnas pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gos bu bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o// lha'i dbang po khyod kyis ji ltar
243a8(rgyud): smras pa de de bzhin te/ brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// lha'i dbang po legs kyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnos pa'i sems can sdig pa'i chos la kun tu spyod pa
243b1(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba'i dbang du gyur pa/ 'khor ba mi gtsang ba'i dong du bying ba'i sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring por bag yod par byos la bsgrubs shig
243b2(rgyud): bam po gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mthus brtag pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phyi ma 'di bsha
243b3(rgyud): do// dpa' bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni// dgyes shing rdo rje gsor nas kyang // shAkya'i dbang po dgyes mdzad pa// thub pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal nas// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag
243b4(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ngan song thams cad las rnam par sbyong ba zhe sa bya bo rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // 
243b5(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba pA pa da ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba pA pa bi sho b+da na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra NA ni b+hasmi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM b+hU bi nA sha ya A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM b+hu bi na
243b6(rgyud): d+ha ya A ba rA NA ni hUM phaT/ oM dza la dz+wa la/ d+he ka d+ha ka/ ha na ha na/ sarba A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM sU sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra/ A ba ra NAM ni hUM phaT/ oM hUM ha ra sar+b+ba A ba ra NA na hUM/ 
243b7(rgyud): phaT/ oM hUM phaT sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM b+hU ta b+h+r-i ta/ sar+b+ba A ba re NA ni hUM phaT/ oM trai Te traT sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni hU trA/ oMts+tshin+da ts+tshin+d+ra sirba a ba ra NI ni hUM phaT/ oM bi dra ba'idri/ 
243b8(rgyud): ba sar+b+ba A pA yai tat+tA dz+nyA no hU~M phaT/ oM da had hi sar+b+ba na ra ga ge ti hi hUM hUM phaT/ oM be tsa bi tsa sar+b+ba pre te ga ti he trAM hUM phaT/ oM mi the mtha sin+ni te ru ga ga ti he hUM hUM liT/ de nas de dag nas/ 
244a1(rgyud): kyi yo byad bshad do// oM sar+b+ba pA paM bi sho d+ha na d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hU pa ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba durga ti bi sho d+ha na puSh+pa bi lo ki ni hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA na A lo ka/ 
244a2(rgyud): ri hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ga ti gan+d+ha sha na gan d+ha pa ti hUM phaT/ sgo ba rnams kyi sngags la/ oM sar+b+ba na ra ka ga ti ur+tha ni hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ban+d+ha ni bi mo tsa ni hUM baM phaT/ os/ 
244a3(rgyud): a pA ya b+han d+ha na mo tsa na hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ga ti ga ha na bi nA sha ni hUM ho phaT// de nas dkyil 'khor bshad de// 'khor lo 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la// shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs
244a4(rgyud): brgyad can// lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten ldan// nang gi dam pa bris nas ni// lte ba'i nang du shAkya yi// bdag/ po thub pa bzhag par bya// lag na rdo rje stobs chen ni/ dpa
244a5(rgyud): de yi spyan mngar bri// rgyab tu 'khor los bsgyur ba bri// g.yas phyogs rgyal ba'i gtsug tor la// g.yon par rnam par rgyal ba bri// gzi brjid phung po me'i phyogs// dbang
244a6(rgyud): po'i phyogasu gdugs dkar po// rnam par 'thor ba rlung gi phyogs// rnam par 'joms pa ne ri ta ra// bris nas phyi rol bri bya ste// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// seng ge rta babs brgyan par bya
244a7(rgyud): dpa' bos lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu snyan rnams bzhag/ grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du// bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya// de nas dri zhim dri la sogs/ rang gi
244a8(rgyud): lus ni bskus nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin ma zhugs nas ni// oM dzaHhUM ba ho/ b+ha ga ban/ oM h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i bya to// sa ma ya sta nas pas lha rnams thams cad spyan drang ngo // de nas
244b1(rgyud): gshegs par mos pa skyed de mchod pa byas nas// de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thams cad las rnam par grol te/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang / gong nas gong du
244b2(rgyud): sa rnamasu yang skye bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgya su yang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing / 
244b3(rgyud): thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// bya ba byas pas ni rims nad thams cad dang / gdon dang / dug la sogs pa las thar par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i hUM zhes bya bas las tham/ 
244b4(rgyud): cad byed par 'gyur ro// brtag pa gzhan gyi cho ga thams cad kyang sgrub par 'gyur ro// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi rgyud kyi dbang
244b5(rgyud): du gyur pa rnams kyi shi ba'i ro'am gzugs brnyan nam/ ming la sogs pa bris te bzlas pa dang / sbyin sregs dang / dbang rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du ngan song thams
244b6(rgyud): cad las yongasu grol bar byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
244b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya dom pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bgyi'o// thugs rjes bskul ba'i thugs gsang ba'i// rgyal ba kun gyi byin gyis rlobs// mnyam par gzhag pas dpral
244b8(rgyud): pabar ni// phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar// sangs rgyas bde gshegs skyes rnams kyi// phyag 'tshal ba yi phyag rgyar bshad// rnal 'byor rig pas mgrin phyogasu// thal mo snyam
245a1(rgyud): / bar sbyar ba ni// rtag tu pad+ma'i rigs nyid kyi// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yin par bshad// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas kyang // snying kar gung mo'i mtha' sbyar ba// rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgyas
245a2(rgyud): dam tshig thams cad 'dzin byed pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo gan rkyal du dbang du bzhag la// de yi steng du g.yas pa bzhag ste/ mthe bo'i ngos gnyis sbrad la zhi ba'i lta bas lta/ 
245a3(rgyud): ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste/ dam tshig yin par bshad do// de nyid las bzlog ste lta 'og bsnol la mthe bong dang / mthe'u chung gnyis
245a4(rgyud): gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol te snying ka/ dar bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// thal mo rdzogs par sbyang ba las mthe bo dang / 
245a5(rgyud): mthe'u chung gnyis bsnyams la lhag ma rnams rkyang ba 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams pa las/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje
245a6(rgyud): 'dra bar bsnyams la/ mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang pa 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la/ mdzub mo gnyis dang srin
245a7(rgyud): lag pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// mtha
245a8(rgyud): chung dang mthe bos so sor bsdams la/ lhag ma rnams brkyang ba ni sdig pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du sbyar zhing bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi
245b1(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// snying pa bzed la gyen du 'thor ba ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o// de las 'og nas gyen du 'thor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsnams la mdun
245b2(rgyud): du 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor mo'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du btsug/ 
245b3(rgyud): pa ni arga'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo gnyis bstan te/ tshigs dang po bcag la sor mo thams cad brkyang ba ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bo dang
245b4(rgyud): mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag nga rgya'o// de nyid las 'od zer 'bar ba 'dra ba'i gzi brjid pa dang po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las spyi bor bskor ba ni gdugs
245b5(rgyud): kar po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mdzub mo/ gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te/ mdud la rgyu na du bskor ba ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa
245b6(rgyud): las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che lta bur byas te/ lhag ma rnams 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsugator gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo
245b7(rgyud): rjer byas la/ sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i'o// g.yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la g.yon pa sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin
245b8(rgyud): no// rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas po bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i'o// de nyid las me tog 'dra bar
246a1(rgyud): byas pa ni 'di'i'o// de nyid las slar bkug ste/ mthe'o gnyis rtse mo sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i'o// de nyid las tshigs par ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i'o// de nyid las sor ma
246a2(rgyud): las 'od zer 'dra bar 'gyed pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o// de nyid las spyi bor bzhag pa dpal gyi'o// de nyid las mdun du bzhag pa bzhad pa'i'o// de nyid las pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni pad+ma'i'o// de
246a3(rgyud): bzhin nyid las rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni ral gri'o// de nyid las gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i'o// de nyid las pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i'o// de nyid las rtse mo yid tsam bkyed
246a4(rgyud): pa ni rgya gra mo// de nyid las shin tu bskyed pa ni srung ba'i 'o// de nyid las rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi da'o// dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i'o// bsdams pa nyid
246a5(rgyud): mdun du bkug pa ni bdug pa'i 'o// de nyid gyen du bstod pa ni phreng ba'i'o// mdun du mthe'o gnyis bsdams te/ bskor ba ni mar me'i'o// de nyid byug pa ltar byas pa ni 'dri'i
246a6(rgyud): 'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o// de nyid las rtse mo gnyis sprad pa ni zhags pa'i 'o// de nyid las gcig la gcig mdud pa ni// lcags sgrog gi'o// de nyid las
246a7(rgyud): bskyod pa ni mnyes pa'i'o// sku gzugs kyi cho ga yang 'dir de bzhin du byas te/ cung zad du na bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs bri'o// yang na sku
246a8(rgyud): gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la me tog la sogs pas mcho de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum tsam zhig sngar snyen pa byas nas las thams cad bya'o// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa
246b1(rgyud): lha'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de dmya
246b2(rgyud): ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po
246b3(rgyud): nyon cig/ 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ris 'di nyid na mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ngan du gtogs pa'i rgyal po lus mi bde ba zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ des mi she
246b4(rgyud): pa'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas rgya// la po 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi pha 'tsho ba dang bral bar/ gyur pa dang / ma de'i mya ngan gyis gzir bas ma yang dus
246b5(rgyud): las 'ad so// lan cig ci zhig gi rkyen gyis nags tshal stug po gzhan zhig du rtse zhing dga' ba'i phyir nye bar song // de na drang srong dgos pa med par byams pa zhes bya ba zhig
246b6(rgyud): gnas te/ de mthong ba dang rgyal po shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ kye ma 'di lta bu seng ge dang / stag dang / ri dgas dang / phag rgod dang / ba lang dang / ma he la sogs pa dang / sbrul dang / 
246b7(rgyud): sre mo dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrul gdug pa can rnams kyis gtse ba/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mgo ba dang / longs spyod rnams dang rnam par bral ba/ rlung dang grang
246b8(rgyud): bas yongasu gdung zhing 'tshe bde na bdag nyid chen po 'di gnaso snyam par sems kyi brtags nas de'i drung du nye bar song ste phyin pa dang / de la 'di skad ces smra so// drang srong chen po khyod ci
247a1(rgyud): phyir na rlung dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bdag la gnod par byed/ drang srong gi smras pa/ skyes bu chen po bskal pa brgya stong phrag du mar sgrib pa'i sdug bsngal
247a2(rgyud): myong bar 'gyur ba las/ sdug bsngal gyi khur bu cung zad tsam zhig blangs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas 'di ni sdug
247a3(rgyud): bsngal ma yin gyi/ skad cig tsam mam/ yud tsam zhig yul gyi bde ba rjesu myong bas bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma mtha' thug pa med pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su
247a4(rgyud): myong bar 'gyur ro// yul gyi bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir pa ma la/ sogs pa yang gsod par 'gyur na srog chags ga/ zhan lta ci smos te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun
247a5(rgyud): yongasu mi shes pa'i phyir sdig pa thams cad byed par 'gyu ro// drang srong gis smras pa'i tshig de skad ces thos pa dang shi na tu 'jigs skrag skyo ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyis
247a6(rgyud): gzir nas 'di skad ces smraso// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun zhes bya ba de ci zhig/ de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa dka' thub chen po smros shig dang / de la kho bo yang skyabs su
247a7(rgyud): 'chi'o// pha ma la gtses pa dang / srog chags rnams kyi srog bcad na sdig pa ji lta bu zhig thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun zhes bya ba ci zhig/ de'i rang
247a8(rgyud): bzhin ji lta bu yin pa yongasu shes na bsod nams ci 'dra ba zhig yongasu 'thob// pha ma ma bsad pa dang / srog chags rnams kyang ma bsad na bsod nams ci 'dra ba cig 'thob// 
247b1(rgyud): 'bras bu ji lta bu zhig 'thob/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod spangs na bsod nams dang 'bras bu ci 'dra ba zhig 'thob/ de nas drang srong des de la 'di skad ces smra so// ci ste sems can chen po khyod/ 
247b2(rgyud): nga yi tshig 'di nyan 'dod na/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal la// gus par nyon dang bshad par bya'o// de bzhin bgyi zhes bsgrubs nas ni// ci mdog pas ni mchod byas te// sangs rgyas
247b3(rgyud): spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi// zab mo'i chos ni nyan par gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs dgra la// thos nas kyang ni skyabasu song // sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgrib med chos// rgyal pos thos
247b4(rgyud): nas dga' bar 'gyur// yi dgas byol song dmyal ba rnams nga // sdig pa kun gyi 'bras bu ste// yul spyod pa dang srog chags rnams// bsod cing shin tu mi zad dang // pha ma ga
247b5(rgyud): pa'i rgyu las byung // bskal pa du mar rab sdug bsngal// dum la ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa// mgon med sbyang/ sa kyang med pa ste// thos nas mya ngan zug rngu yis// rang gi
247b6(rgyud): yid la gdung ba ni// ji ltar rlung gis mar me bzhin// de nyid du ni dus las 'das// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// dga' dang ldan pa'i lhar skyes na// brgya byin lha yi dbang po yi// 
247b7(rgyud): blon po gzugs dang ldan pa la// lha rnams kun dang yid 'thun zhing // rab dga' bde dang ldan par skyes// bde ba'i mchog ni myong gyur nas// ngan song du yang ltung bar 'gyur// de nas
247b8(rgyud): da ltar lha dbang po khyod kyi mthus kyang de nyid ni// dga' ldan gnas ni dga' ba'i mchog/ pade ma kun gyi gnas skyes// lha yi dbang po nyon cig dang // gang gi cha 'byung ba 'i
248a1(rgyud): dus na byung ba'i drang srong du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin par khyed kyis shes par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
248a2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid do// phar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin pa khyod kyis shes par mi bya ste/ lha'i dbang po de'i tshe de'i dus na khyod de'i phar gyur to// ma gang yin pa de bzhin
248a3(rgyud): yin par mi blta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sha tsika nyid yin no// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin par mi lta'i/ lha'i 'khor 'di dag nyid yin no// de nas
248a4(rgyud): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams yid rab tu mgu zhing rangs te/ ba spu'i bu gnas spu rnams langs shing rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes skad chen por bos nas
248a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la ming bcu pa 'dis mngon bar bstod de gsol ba btab bo// ko Ta ko Ta k+Sha/ koTako DA ko Ta bo shA ka TI ra ka/ ko la k+Sha ko la ba// ko la ka
248a6(rgyud): lA ba sh+tsa/ ko la sto tha i ti zhes byas nas/ brgya byin la sogs lha mchog rnams// sems can kun la phan pa dang // tshe dang nad med spel ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod la gsol ba
248a7(rgyud): 'debs// bcom ldan 'das tshe thung ba dang // skal ba chung ba rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tshe sring ba'i slad du bshad du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag po bshad du gsol/ 
248a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor mang po de dag la gzigs nas le gso zhes bya ba las mgu bar byas te/ tshangs pa la sogs
248b1(rgyud): palha'i bu rnams gang khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang dag par bskyed pa de ni leg so// leg so legs par sgrub shing bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sem
248b2(rgyud): can thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pas khyab pa 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med par
248b3(rgyud): 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas byung ngo // oM pu N+ya pu N+ya ma hA pu N+ya/ a pa'i mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na sa b+ha ro pa tsi ti ka rin
248b4(rgyud): swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gdangs 'di bshad ma thag tu ngan song thams cad rab tu ni da ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgas
248b5(rgyud): rnams skyes pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes so// 'jig rten gyi kham thams cad rab tu snang bar byas te/ snang bar byas nas
248b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
248b7(rgyud): kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bshad do// 
248b8(rgyud): oM a mi te/ a mi ta ud b+ha baM/ a mi to sa b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi te bi grAn+ta/ ga mi ni/ sar+b+ba karma kle shak+Sha yaM ka re swAhA/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin du sems
249a1(rgyud): can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
249a2(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzung 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // oM ke ka ni ka ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ tA sa ni trA sa
249a3(rgyud): ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha nA/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma pa raM pa rA Ni me sar+b+ba satwa nany+dza swA hA// / 'di bshad ma thag tu yang thams cad de bzhin du gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrib pa
249a4(rgyud): thams cad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin dgashegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnams ma lus par
249a5(rgyud): 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thug sa ka nas phyung ngo // oM rat+ne rat+naM/ ma hA rat+ne/ rat+na saM b+ha be/ rat+na ki ra Ne/ rat+na mA lA bi shud+d+he shod+d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba bA
249a6(rgyud): pa ni hUM phaT// / de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom/ rnam par bcom par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gdon mi za bar mi tshoms pa'i
249a7(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // 
249a8(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/ sar+b+ba a ba ra Na/ bi sho d+ha ni/ ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag
249b1(rgyud): par rab tu g.yos so// bskyod rab tu bskyod/ yang dag par rab tu bskyod do// bskul/ rab tu bskul/ yang dag par rab tu bskul nas rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du snang bar gyur to// de
249b2(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo ba rnams dang ldan pa ste// rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya// lte ba dang ni sgo khyud ldan// de yi dbus 'khor lo yi// dkyil 'khor
249b3(rgyud): dam pa bri bya ste// rtsibs bzhi dag dang ldan pa la// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya// de yi dbusu gtso bo ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po// phyag na rdo rje dril bsnams shing // zla ba rgyas pa'i
249b4(rgyud): zhal 'dzum bri/ shar gyi rtsibs kyi steng du ni// mgon po mi ba skyod bri bar bya// lho yi phyogasu rin chen bri// nub phyogs chu skyes pad+ma la// byang phyogasu ni gdon mi za// dpa' bo stobs
249b5(rgyud): chen bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// 'khor los bsgyur ba chas pa dang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mad ga 'dra zhing // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang // phyag ni
249b6(rgyud): mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa// rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gzhugs bri// grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du// de bzhin bdug sogs thams cad bri// sgo ba dag kyang khros pa la// khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa bri/ 
249b7(rgyud): de nas rnal 'byor can nyid zhugs// sngags kyi lha rnams spyan drangs te// dzaHhUM baM ho// b+ha ga baM badz+ra e h+ye hi sa ma ya s+t+waM// de nas gtso bo byon pa dang // mdor na mchod pa byas nas kyang // 'chi bdag
249b8(rgyud): sbrul gyis 'jigs ldan rnams// 'chi bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM// rdo rje ti rin ti ri bcings la// lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug/ yang na me tog phreng ba ste// 
250a1(rgyud): / de ni dkyil 'khor nyid du dor// oM pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hUM/ de nas mna'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya ste/ oM badz+ra hA sa/ 
250a2(rgyud): ud g+ha Ta ya hUM/ de nas 'dis bstan par bya ste/ oM badz+ra dra sh+ye ho// de nas 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM badz+ra a bi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha a bi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na a bi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM
250a3(rgyud): pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hre oM karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM badz+ra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa o/ oM rat+na ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa tA/ 
250a4(rgyud): oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hri oM kar+m+ma ka la sha a b+hi Ni ny+tsa a de nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM rat+na da mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa dzA tr-i tra d+hA traM/ oM badz+ra paT+Ta a ba le ba na
250a5(rgyud): a b+hi Shany+tsa traM/ oM badz+ra mudra a b+hi Shiny+tsahUM/ oM bud+d+ha mu d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa au/ oM rat+na mu trA a b+hi Shiny+tsa tre/ oM pad+ma mu trA a b+hi Shiny+dza hrIH/ oM karma mudrA a bi Shiny+tsa aH/ a
250a6(rgyud): badz+ra na ma a bi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM hU trA hrIH/ oMHoM badz+ra kar+m+ma a bi Shiny+tsa hA a/ oM badz+ra tsakra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM b+h+rUM/ oM badz+ra tsakra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hUM hUM/ oM oM oM/ traM trA dzA/ hrI hrIH
250a7(rgyud): aHaHaHoM badz+ra d+hA ra Ni a d+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ o ta thA ga ti d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa o/ oM rat+na d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa truM/ oM pad+ma d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hI[:]oM kar+m+ma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA
250a8(rgyud): ga ta gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ye a bi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM rat+na gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa traMH/ oM pad+ma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM kar+m+ma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ oM pra dz+nyA pa ya sa ma yog a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ 
250b1(rgyud): a/ de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe srid pa'i rig pa 'di sbyin par bya'o// oM b+h+rUM badz+ra A yuShe hUM a/ de'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i tshe zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'a
250b2(rgyud): la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin du mdzad pa las bdud rtsi mdzag pa bri'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'i lag pa thal mo
250b3(rgyud): brkyang la/ gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bris la mchod pa rnam pa lnga mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas zla ba nya ba dang mchod pa chen po byas te ba
250b4(rgyud): dmar ser gyi mar snod sar bar bcug la rdo rje g.yon pa/ das mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu sems shing dmatshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas dri ma mnam zhi
250b5(rgyud): mngon ma byung ba'i dri'i ngad ldang la rlangs pa'am/ du ba 'am/ me byung ngam/ 'od zer ram me sgron nam/ 'od byungangam/ de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de'am/ mar
250b6(rgyud): sar ram/ til mar ram/ chu'am/ 'o ma 'am/ zho'am/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag gam/ klad pa'am/ sha 'am/ gang yang rung ba la rab tu sbrus te/ nang par sngar srung ba la
250b7(rgyud): sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te thungs sam zos na mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang nyi ma dang yod kyi bar du tshe ring zhing rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ tha mas ni/ 
250b8(rgyud): tham 'grub pas 'di la the tshom ni med do// mtshan ma byung na yang 'jig rten na nad med/ ldo basbyin/ lus la skra kar dang gnyer ma med par 'gyur ro// lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya
251a1(rgyud): // thub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis ni ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'gyur tekye tshom modo/ de nas rgyal
251a2(rgyud): po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ban
251a3(rgyud): slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal du gsol/ rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' stsal du gsol/ rgyal po chen po rnams legs kyi
251a4(rgyud): shod shig dang / ngas kyang rje su yi rang zhing byin gyis/ de rlab par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi gnang zhing rje su yi rang ste/ 
251a5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pas rang gi snying po 'di bshad do// oM dwe/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad// oM D+hi/ de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po
251a6(rgyud): 'phags skyes pos kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do// oM bi/ de nas klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad// oM k+Sha/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor ba shad/ gru
251a7(rgyud): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dkyil 'khor lngas ni rgyan pa ste// de yi dbu su gtso bo ni// phyag na rdo rje bgying bcas bri// de yi g.yon gyi phyogasu ni// rnam thos bung gi'i lag pa na// be con ne'u
251a8(rgyud): thogs pa dang // rin chen rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang // sbom zhing seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs// gser mdog gzi can ldan par bri// mkhas pas bum bzang la sogs/ rin chen chu bo bar
251b1(rgyud): bar bri// mdun du yul 'khor srung nyid ni// pi bang len pa brtson pa dang // mdzes shing kha dog ljang ku ste// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri// g.yas phyogs dpa' bo lus 'phags
251b2(rgyud): po/ ral gri lag na thogs pa bri// nub phyogasu ni mig mi bzang // rdo rje zhag pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sbrul mgo bdun gyi bskor ba la// mig kyang dmar zhing shin tu 'bar// sgo yi phyogs
251b3(rgyud): ni thams cad du// sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes bya bas// sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs nas kyang // bcom ldan 'das ni spyan drangs te// de nas rgyal po sgra/ 
251b4(rgyud): drang ngo // spyan drang nas ni mkhas pas mchod// cho ga bzhin du arga dbul// de nas sngags mkhan sngags 'di dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'dis// slob ma rgyal rigs rje'u
251b5(rgyud): rigs dang // bram ze la sogs de bzhin te// me tog rin chen thogs te zhugs// oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ de na sa me tog gam rin po che 'dis dor bar bya'o// oM badz+ra pra
251b6(rgyud): tIts+tsha tA ma hota ta ma// gang la bab pa'i rgyal po ni// de ni 'dis 'grub gzhan du med// de nas gral bzhag pa yi// bum pa bzhis ni dbang bskur te// dang po phyag na rdo rje yi// phyag rgyas
251b7(rgyud): dbang ni bskur bar bya// de la sogs pa go rims kyis// dkyil 'khor nyid du dbang bskur na// rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur// rgyal po yin na che bar 'gyur// 'dzam bu gling dbang
251b8(rgyud): dpal dang ldan// gling bzhi pa la dbang ba'i mchog/ lan bzhi dbang ni bskur ba dang // len bzhir gzhug par byas nas ni// de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag/ bu sdug bzhin du bskyang ba dang / 
252a1(rgyud): / bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis// dran dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang // pho brang dang ni 'khor bcas pas// rgyal po rtag tu bsrung bar bgyi// de gnod gzhan gyi phram dang / 
252a2(rgyud): de yi nad dang 'chi bdag gi/ 'jigs dang mu ge la sogs pa'i// gnod pa rnams ni gzhom par bgyi// rnam thos bus ni rgyas par bgyi// yul 'khor srung gi zhi bar bgyi// phyag dang gan/ 
252a3(rgyud): bcas dus min pa'i// 'chi bdag lus 'phags po yis 'joms// mig mi bzang gis bkra shis shing // mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms// mdor na bdag gis de yi ni// ri dang bsam
252a4(rgyud): pa kun bgyi ste// ji ste nges pa ma lags na// phyag na rdo rje la 'khus 'gyur// de nas phyogs skyong ba rnams kyi dbacom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol
252a5(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang sem sa can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du ra nga rang gi snying po rnams dbul bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan
252a6(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams legaso leg so// legs kyi phul cig/ de nas 'byung po rnams kyi bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams
252a7(rgyud): phul ba/ oM I/ oM i/ oM a/ oM ya/ oM ri/ oM ba/ oM ya/ oM ku/ oM a/ oM pra/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// 
252a8(rgyud): mgon po dbusu de bzhin bzhag/ phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas// bzhag bya spyan sngar nyi ma dang // phag gi gzugs dang gnyis bzhag ste// sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas spyan
252b1(rgyud): drangs de kun la// mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya// de nas bdag nyid zhugs nas kyang // slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya zhing // phyogs skyong rang gi sngags btab pa'i// bum pa rnams kyis
252b2(rgyud): dbang bskur ro// de nas phan par 'dod pa yis// bsgrub phyir snying po sbyin par bya// phyogs skyongs rang gi phyogs gnas rnams// brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mgu
252b3(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing // rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs te// dbang bskur ba thob pa'am/ gzhan yang
252b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag/ bcom da ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par dus thams cad du srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi
252b5(rgyud): phrum kun gzhom par bgyi// dus dusu char pa dbab pa ra bgyi/ 'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams bsgre dpar bgyi'o// de nas chos kyi rgyal po chen po gshin rjes
252b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po chen po de'i tshe sring par bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'chi ba brgyad po so so
252b7(rgyud): dgag par bgyi'o// srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po ni ri tis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / bram ze dang / rgyal
252b8(rgyud): rigs dang / mi'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad dang / yi dgas dang / 'dres mi 'jigs par bgyi/ srin po la sogs pas 'jigs par mi bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i 'chi
253a1(rgyud): bdag gis 'jigs par mi bgyi ste/ dus thams cad du srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// // de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po ba ru nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol te/ 
253a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rtag par dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang / yul thams cad so sor bskyab par bgyi/ kun tu srung bar bgyi/ 'bru rnams bskyed par bgyi/ klu'i
253a3(rgyud): nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi/ thog dang ser ba rnams mi dbab par bgyi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams so sor dgag par bgyi'o// de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol
253a4(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can chen po/ de la dus thams cad du rlung gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/ 'bru dang / 
253a5(rgyud): me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad bskyed par bgyi/ 2jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi'o// de na sa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ku be ras bcom ldan 'das
253a6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig du mchis te/ stobs dang ldan pas sems
253a7(rgyud): can chen po de la dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi/ nor dang / 'bru rnams thams cad legs par 'byor par bgyi/ rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / 
253a8(rgyud): yul dang / gnas dang / bran dang / snag gi gnyen dang / rus kyi gnyen dang / grogs dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma la sogs bsrung bar bgyi/ glang dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / 
253b1(rgyud): lug dang / ma he dang / baglang dang / rta dang / ra la sogs pa la yang srung bar bgyi'o// de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang byed kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di
253b2(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po de dang / rgyal po de dag gi bu dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol tu bskyab pa dang / phan gdags pa dang / 
253b3(rgyud): yongasu bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bkra shis pa dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug bzhil ba dang / dug gzhom pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa'i 'og gi mtshams/ 
253b4(rgyud): bcad pa dang / phyogs kyi mtshams bcad pa dang / rdo rje dar bas bskor ba dang / rdo rje phur bus gdab pa dang / rdo rje dra ba rnams bre bar bgyi/ dgos pa rnams thams cad
253b5(rgyud): la nye bar gnas par bgyi/ dgos pa dang / dgos pa ma lags pa rnams kyi mtshan ma nye bar bstan par bgyi/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba thams cad rmi lam du yang bsgo bar
253b6(rgyud): bgyi/ sgrub pa yang bgegs ma mchis par bgyi/ dngos grub thams cad stsal par bgyi'o// de nas yang na mkha' lding gi bdag po na mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyis kyang bcom
253b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang dus thams cad dus rgyal po de dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal
253b8(rgyud): rigs rnams 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag nyid 'khor thams cad dang bcas par mchis la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi/ mchog thams cad rab tu bstabs par bgyi/ 
254a1(rgyud): / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o// de nas sa 'og gi bdag po phag chen pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal na
254a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang mi'i bdag po de dang / mi'i bdag po'i bu dang / yang na lan gnyisu byung ba'am/ lan gnyi su byung ba'i bu dang / rgyal rigs
254a3(rgyud): dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams kyis dus thams cad don thams cad grub par bgyi'o// 'jigs pa thams
254a4(rgyud): cad las dus thams cad yang srung bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid kyang yongasu bskyab par bgyi'o// de nas bza' che na po brgyad dang / 'khor rgyu skar du bcas pa rnams kyis
254a5(rgyud): kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag/ cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi sngags kyi snying po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal na/ de dag
254a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs par gsol/ legaso leg so// ngas byin gyi brlabs kyis gza' chen po rnams shod cig/ de nas nyi ma la sogs pa gza' chen po rnams kyis
254a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// oM a/ oM so// oM aM/ oM bu/ oM br-i/ oM shu/ oM sa/ oM ra/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dbus su
254a8(rgyud): ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugasu bri'o// ngos rnamasu phyag rgya chen po bzhi bri'o// pab sangs ni mdun du la/ zla ba rgyab du bri bar
254b1(rgyud): bya/ g.ya su phur bu bri bya zhing // g.yon par gza' lhag bri bar bya// me yi phyogasu mig dmar dang // rlung gi phyogasu nyi ma ste// dbang ldan phyogasu spen pa'o// srin po'i phyogasu sgra gcan bri/ 
254b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug du// rgyu skar thams cad bri bar bya// sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams// khros pa'i yid du bri bar bya// rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ 
254b3(rgyud): thams cad kyang ni spyan drang ngo // de nas slob ma rnams zhugs te// oM badz+ra ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gra ha sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gra ha pra tits+tsha sa ma ye hUM/ de nas gza' brgyad sngags btab
254b4(rgyud): pa'i/ bum pa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te// gza' rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// 
254b5(rgyud): de nas gza' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'a/ das bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad kyis kyang rgyal po chen
254b6(rgyud): po de dang / rgyal po'i bu la gtogs par dus thams cad du de bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o// de nas rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig dang / dus dang / zla tshigs dang / sbyor
254b7(rgyud): ba dang / khyim dang / dus sbyor dang / chu tshod la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi
254b8(rgyud): kyang dus thams cad du sems can chen po de dag gi bka' mi bcog ste/ dpon po bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o// grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po dang / pho brang dang / 
255a1(rgyud): 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi gnas thams cad so sor skrang bar bgyi'o// 'jig pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe yang des bdag cag mchod na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'jig
255a2(rgyud): pa mi 'byung ngo // de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phud ces bya ba'i sgras bcom ldan 'das de gnyis par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang de dag thams
255a3(rgyud): cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po 'di dbulo// klu chen po rnams legs kyi gsang ba'i snying po rnams phul cig/ de nas de dag mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
255a4(rgyud): oM phu/ oM pha/ oM pU/ oM phA/ oM phI/ oM phe/ oM phe/ oM pau// de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de// pad+ma rmAn po med brgyad la// kha dog dkar po bri bar bya// de yi dbu sug
255a5(rgyud): bo ni// phyag na rdo rje rab gnas pa// sbrul mgo mtha' yas/ gdengs pa yi// ltos 'gro chen po bsdigs pa bri// ma tha' yas 'jog po de bzhin du// karko Ta dang u la ka/ nor
255a6(rgyud): rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang / pad+ma chu lha de bzhin du// mdor na mdab ma re re la// de dag sbrul mgo 'bar ba bri// sbrul mgo bdun bdun chung ma yis// mgul nas 'khyud dang bcas pa bri// bum
255a7(rgyud): pa brgyad dang gtor ma dang // bshes mdzes pa dang 'byung po yi// mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas// byas pa rnams ni bzhag par bya// de nas rdo rje bdag nyid zhugs// sbrul mgos sbrul mgo
255a8(rgyud): can rnams dgug/ bud ces bya dang lhan cig tu// dzaHhUM baM ho// zhes brjod de/ de nas bu ni rgyal po dang / rgyal rigs thams cad rab bcug nas// dug gi nyes skyon bsal ba'i phyir/ 
255b1(rgyud): phud ces bya ba'i dbang bskur ro// de nas ming tsam brjod pas kyang // klu gnas de dag thams cad 'grub// de nas de dag kun mgunas// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te// spyan sngar thal mo
255b2(rgyud): sbyar 'khod nas// smon lam rab tu 'debs par gyur// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa las mngon par dga' ba rnams gal te dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs
255b3(rgyud): pa rnams la bslu bar gyur na/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid la smras par gyur cig/ de'i tshe bdag cag gi gnas bye mas sregs par gyur cig/ rdo rje kun 'bar bas bdag cag gi mgo bkas bA/ 
255b4(rgyud): gyur cig/ rtag pa dus thams cad du sems can chen po de srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyi/ byin chen po da dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus bskyed par bgyi/ de'i yul
255b5(rgyud): du dug ma mchis par bgyi/ dus du su char dbab par bgyi/ pha rol po'i g.yul thams cad la dus dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par bgyi/ 'jigs pa thams cad
255b6(rgyud): rnam par gzhom par bgyi/ rgyal ba'i bka' dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dka' rab tu sgrub par bgyi'o// de nas sgrub pa bshad de lha rdzas 'od phreng dkar po yis// dbu la sbrul mgo bzhis bskor
255b7(rgyud): ba'i// rdo rje 'dzin gtso bsam na su// phud ces bya ba 'bum bzlas la// de nas dug blangs phud ces ni/ bya ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas kyang // lha rdzas 'od zer phreng glang // de la phud ces
255b8(rgyud): bya ba bsam// lag pa sbrul mgo zhags 'dra dang // phud ces bya ba'i rlung gis gtor// lpags pa sha dang rus gnas pa'i// dug rnams thams cad ma lus par// phud ces bya ba'i lag pas drang // de nas
256a1(rgyud): / las rnams kun byed cing // dug rims dug sbyar la sogs pa// khu tshur gyis kyang kun phyin na// sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos// de nas lha chen po rnams kyi bdag po 'jig
256a2(rgyud): par byed pa chen po bud med chen po brgyad kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis skrag pa dang / bud med rnams
256a3(rgyud): kyis skrag pas lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad skrag/ rnam par skrag/ rab tu skrag te/ kha srub du 'gyel nas gos dang bral te/ sems kyang stor nas kun tu 'phyan pa de dag la phan gdags
