282a7(rgyud): la reg cing phyog bya ste/ oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra a b+hiSh+Ta kA ya/ At+ma na nir+yA ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM zhes bya ba 'dis so// de nas de bzhin du langs te/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag/ 
282a8(rgyud): ste/  nub phyog su khas la rag cing phyag byas ste/ oM sarba bidI pU dza pre brta nA ya At+ma naM/ nir+yA ta yA me/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra brta ya me zhes bya ba 'di so// de nas de bzhin du langs la / 
282b1(rgyud): rje thal mo spyi bo nas pab te/ snying khar byas la byang phyog su spyi bos la reg cing phyag bya ste/ oM sarba bid+yA pU dza karma Na sat+ma na/ ni rA ta yA mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru me zhes pa 'das
282b2(rgyud): de nas dbus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te/ rdo rje thal mo snying khar byas la sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bya ste/ phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
282b3(rgyud): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigasu bzhug pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rigs pa dang / lha
282b4(rgyud): thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag che ge mo zhe// sa bya ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan snga dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
282b5(rgyud): dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigasu zhu gas pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sdug pa/ sa dang / rig pa dang / sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi yang spyan/ 
282b6(rgyud): sngar sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o// phyogs bcu na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas
282b7(rgyud): dang / 'phags pa nyan thos yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / sems can gyi rigs thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rgya cher rje su yi rang bar bgyi'o// phyog
282b8(rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor ba thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir bskul bar bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a
283a1(rgyud): yongasu mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa thams cad la mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'deb so// de nas me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do// oM sarba bidA
283a2(rgyud): pU dza me g+ha sa mudrA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o// bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ oM sarba bid+yA d+hU pa pU dza ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o// mar me phyag rgya
283a3(rgyud): bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ oM sarba bid+yA dI po pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o// dri'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ oM sarba bid+ye gan+d+ha pA dza me g+ha sa mudra s+tha
283a4(rgyud): ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o// thal mo snyim pa khong stong du sbyar ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ oM sarba bidI bod+hAng+tha ra rat+na a lang kA ra pU dza ma g+ha sa mu dre s+pha ra Ni sa ma ye hUM zhes
283a5(rgyud): ba'o// oM sarba bid+ya hA s+ya lA s+ya ra ti krI Da sau khya a nut+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa dang / au/ sarba bod+yA a nut+ta ra bi d+hi a lang kA ra bsta pU dza g+ha sa mu dra swa
283a6(rgyud): ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o// de nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rje su dran par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ snying rje'i dbang gis
283a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya ste/ ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba'i phyir dang / ma grol ba rnams grol bar bya ba'i phyir dang / dbugs ma
283a8(rgyud): phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir dang / yongasu mya ngan laso ma 'das pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus po 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho
283b1(rgyud): las yang dag par bsgral ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra bo d+hi tsat+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o// de nas sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di
283b2(rgyud): skad ces brjod de/ sems can thams cad dang yo byad thams cad yang dag par ldan zhing phun sum tshogs pa rnams 'dod pa tsam la so sor 'byor par gyur cig/ oM sarba bid+yA ma hA badz+ra ud
283b3(rgyud): b+ha ba dA na pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha'
283b4(rgyud): thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i lus dang / dag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang yang da / dag par ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba bid+yA a nut+ta ra ma hA do
283b5(rgyud): d+hu ga a hA ra shI lA pa rA ma ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ glu ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad kyi yang
283b6(rgyud): dag par rgyan po'i lus dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med pa dang / zhe 'gras pa med par zhugs shing snying dang mig mngon par dga' ba dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang
283b7(rgyud): ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba bid+yA a nut+tA ra ma hA d+harma a ba po d+hak+Sha nI pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o// gar ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ sems
283b8(rgyud): can thams cad byang chub kyi spyod pa dang mngon par ldan zhing sangs rgyas nyid la mchog tu gzhom zhing 'khor ba yong su mi spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig oM sarba bidI sa swa ra par
284a1(rgyud): / tri ga a nut+ta ra bI r+ya par mit+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o// me tog ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang
284a2(rgyud): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral zhing bas ma tan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / dbang thams cad phun
284a3(rgyud): sum tshogs par gyur cig/ oM sarba bid+yA a nut+ta ra sau khya bI ha ra d+hu na pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o// bdug pa ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod/ sems
284a4(rgyud): can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang / de ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig/ so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang dag par thob ste bzo dang bstan
284a5(rgyud): bcos thams cad shes shing sgyu rtsal dang / sbyor ba dang / cho ga shes pa dang / de kho na nyid mthong ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i
284a6(rgyud): shes thob par gyur cig/ oM sarba bid+yA oM nut+ta rakle shits+tshed sarba d+harma sa man+ta dz+nyA na ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA pU dza me gA sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o// mar me ma'i phyag rgya bcings la
284a7(rgyud): 'di skad ces brjod de/ sems can thams cad log par ltung ba thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ oM sarba bid+yA sarba a pA ya bi sho d+he ne dz+nyA na A lo ka pra Ni d+hi pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa
284a8(rgyud): sudra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o// dri chab ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod/ sems can thams cad mi shes pa deng bral bar gyur cig/ oM sarba bid+yA sarba a bI ya gan+d+ha
284b1(rgyud): nas ni badz+ra gan+d+ha u pA ya pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o// lus kyi bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i de
284b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin par lhag par mos par byas la/ oM sarba bid+h+r-i kA ya nir+ya ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes bya'o// thams cad
284b3(rgyud): du lce brgya pa'i kha yis mnyam med mi g.yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pa nye bar spyod pa lhag par mos par byas la/ oM sarba bid+yA bA ka nir+yA ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM zhes
284b4(rgyud): bya'i// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs pag ci dag pa'i sbyor ba nyid kyis chos mnyam pa nyid du lhag par dmos par bya ste/ oM sarba bid tsit+ta ni rA da na pU dza me g+ha sa ma
284b5(rgyud): dra s+phar No sa ma ye hUM zhes bya'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa'o zhes lhag par mos
284b6(rgyud): pa byas la/ oM sarba bid+d+ha gu h+ya pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes bya'o// de ltar mchod pa rnam pa nyi shus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod la bdag nyid dbul
284b7(rgyud): bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bgyi'o// bdag dus thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhe su gsolo// thugs rje chen po
284b8(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol zhes bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di
285a1(rgyud): // ngag gis bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgud pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa
285a2(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig/ bde ba dang yid bde ba nyid kyis mi ye mchog sangs rgya su tshe 'di nyid la gyur cig/ bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di
285a3(rgyud): dag gis// 'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog/ 'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing // sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las sgrol zhes bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag pa/ 
285a4(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos la sdom pa bzung / par bya ste/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang churab tu ni nges mdzad pa// byang chub sems ni bla na med/ dam pa
285a5(rgyud): bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum// dge ba dang ni chos sdud dang // sems can don byeng tshul khrims ni/ bdag gis so sor brtan por bzung / 
285a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum mchog bla na med// sdom pa sangs rgyas rnam 'byor byung // deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi// rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsdus la// rdo
285a7(rgyud): rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // de nyid kyis ni rab tu gzung // slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen chen po'i rigs mchog gi/ dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re bzhin du lan drug pu/ 
285a8(rgyud): sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin// pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag pa// byang chub chen po 'byung ba la// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi// las chen rigs ni bsdus pa
285b1(rgyud): las // sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan// mchod pa'i las ni ci nus bzhin// kun nas so sor gzung bar bgyi// sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir// byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ dam pa
285b2(rgyud): yang dag bskyed bgyis shing // sdom pa ma lus gzung bgyis nas// ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi// ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung bgyi/ 
285b3(rgyud): sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod ces bya'o// de nas na mkha'i dkyil 'khor la lha la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par lhag par mos te/ nye bar spyod pa lnga la sogs pas mchod par bya'o// 
285b4(rgyud): yang dag par mchod nas ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan sngags par byed de// e ma'o sangs rgyas e sangs rgyas/ sangs rgyas mdzad pa mchog leg so// ngan song thams cad legs
285b5(rgyud): sbyangs nas// sems can byang chub thob mdzad phyir zhes pa'o// de nas badz+ra any+dza li zhes pa dang // rdo rje bsdams/ pa snying khar dral bar bya ste/ oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra ban d+ha d+har+tha
285b6(rgyud): zhes brjod bcing ngo // rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra dra d+ho me b+ha ba shA shwa to me b+ha badz+ra da ya mi a d+hi tiSh+To sarba sid+d+ha m+me pra yats+tsha hUM ha ha ha ha ho zhes bya'o// oM badz+ra muSh+Ta de/ 
285b7(rgyud): sems ma rdo rje bcings nas/ oM sarba bid+yA sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne sarba pA paM a na ya hUM/ rdo rje bsdams pa brtan bcings nas// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis par nas// myur du gyen tu legs 'phen
285b8(rgyud): la// ltung ba slong bar byed pa'i mchog zhes pa'o// oM sarba bid+yA sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ne mu ne hUM phaT/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i sngagaso// rdo rje bsdams pa brtan byas nas// gu
286a1(rgyud): / mo dag ni kha sbyar te// mtha' ma bzhi po kha sprang pa// myur du sdig pa dral bar 'gyur// oM sarba bid+yA tAT hUM/ sems ma rdo rje bcings la// oM sarba bid+yA sarba a ba ra na bi sho d+ha ne hUM pa
286a2(rgyud): 'don pa'i mtshan nyid do// de nas de'i rjes la rnal 'byor pas snying kha'i dbusu yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang de'i steng du/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mun ye swA hA// oM na maHsarba durga ti shau d+ha
286a3(rgyud): ne sho d+ha ne sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma a ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA// de dag gis ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de nas rdo rje lcags
286a4(rgyud): klu la sogs pas bkug nas bcug ste bcings nas dang du byas nas// na mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gzhug steng / dal 'khor gnyis kyis dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'gyuraro// rdzog
286a5(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor du gyur pa las dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de la dkyil 'khor dbusu bdag nyid kyi dngos po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs
286a6(rgyud): shAkya seng ge bsgom mo// de nas shAkya thub pa'i thugs yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom zhing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu// oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ de nas rdo rje rgyu'i las
286a7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor sprul te/ oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra tsakra hUM zhes pas so// sems ma rdo rje bcings nas de nas de nyid kyi sor mo dbus ma gnyis kyis phreng ba thogs la sa ma ya hUM zhes
286a8(rgyud): pa 'dis yid kyi 'jug/ phreng ba de yang rang gi mgo bor bzhag/ pre tIts+tsha badz+ra ho// zhes pa 'di so// de nas rang gi mgo bor bcings te/ oM pra ti gr-ih+Na s+t+waM i ma satwa ma hA ba la zhes pa 'dis so// 
286b1(rgyud): gdong pa bcings la yang 'dis dgrol lo// oM rdo rje sems dpa' ring nyid de/ khyed kyi mig ni 'byed par brjon// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// thams cad mig ni bye bar 'gyur zhes pa dang / he badz+ra pa
286b2(rgyud): zhes pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen por ji srid bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de srid du blta'o// yang sems ma rdo rje bcings la thugs khar dgrol zhing rdo rjer byin gyi brlabs pa'i bum pa
286b3(rgyud): nas dbang bskur ba rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyin pa'o// oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsA zhes pa'o// yang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas gdab ste/ oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra d+ha ra tiSh+Tha
286b4(rgyud): badz+ri Ni hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba bing+ga rat+na badz+ri Ni ts+tsha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba bid+yA d+harmA badz+ri ni hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba bing+ga kar+m+ma badz+ri Ni hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM Tu badz+ra tuSh+ya ho yi ge gnyi
286b5(rgyud): kyi go chas go bgos la/ de nas rang nyid rdo rje'i dbang bskur/ ba gzung bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje yis/ dbang gi dri ring khyed dbang bskur/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams
286b6(rgyud): cad nyid/ rdo rje rab tu grub phyir bzung / oM badz+ra a d+hi pi tistaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Ti badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ oM badz+ra satwa s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams
286b7(rgyud): cad nyid/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzung // phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha staM d+hA ra ya mi badz+ra satwa/ 
286b8(rgyud): hi hi hi hi hUM zhes pa'o// oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra a d+hiSh+Tha na sa ma ye hUM/ bdag nyid byin gyi brlab pa'i sngagaso// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mthe bong dang gung mo dang mthe'u gyen du sgreng ste kha
287a1(rgyud): / sbyar nas 'dzum mo dang ming med sems dpa'i skyil krung byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste/ snying kha dang / 'grin pa dang / bral ba dang / mdzod spu dang / smin mtshams pa dang / sna dang / rna
287a2(rgyud): dang / dku dang / pus mo dang / rkang pa dag dang / byin pa dang / mig gnyis dang / gsang bar byin gyis brlab par yang bya'o// de nas rang gi lus la sa ma ya aHyi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil
287a3(rgyud): 'khor sa bon las byung ba'i mtshan ma thams cad kyi snying po'i nga rgyal bskyed cing / oM sarba bid+yA dri sh+ya dzaHhUM baM ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya hoHoM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ya swA hA/ zhes lan gas
287a4(rgyud): brjod par bya'o// thun mong pa yang ngo // de nas rang gi lus la rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings tI/ dzaHhUM baM haM/ brjod cing gnas ji lta ba rnamasu bkug nas bcug ste bcings la
287a5(rgyud): dbang du bya'o// rang gi thugs khar hUM yig ni// sbyor bas rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ shAkya seng ge'i dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya rab tu bshad par bya// dbusu ting 'dzin mchog gis ni// bzhu
287a6(rgyud): pa dam tshig phyag rgya bshad// rdo rje bcing padam byas la// gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar// rdo rje phyag rgya dam bcas pa// rdo rje gtsug tor phyag rgya'o// de nyid gung mo rin chen dang / gung mo
287a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i rnam pa dang // de nyid gung mo rdo rje las// sor mo lhag ma 'bar byas nyid// sor mo de nyid 'bar byas pa// gtsug tor gzi brjid phyag rgya'o// de nyid las ni srin lag dang // mthe'u
287a8(rgyud): gnyis ni mnyam ste sgreng // mdzub mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma las// gung mo rdo rje steng ba dang // de nyid mdun du bzhag nas ni// rdo rje dra ba'i tshul du bya/ snying khar yang ni mthe bo mnyam/ rab tu btu/ 
287b1(rgyud): baphreng ba ma// thal mo sbyar ba kha nas dbyung // gar byed spyi bor thal mo sbyar// rdo rje bsdams pa thur du sbyin// thal mo legs sbyar gyen tu gtor// mthe bo mnyam ste rab tu bsdams// rab tu/ 
287b2(rgyud): brkyang ba byug pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// mdzub mo mthe bong gung mo rnams// re re zhing yang phan tshun du// mngon du phyogs pa bzung bar bya// mdzub mo gcig ni cung zad bkus
287b3(rgyud): mthe bo gnyis ni mdud pa bcing // mthe bo mdzub mo brnol ba bcing // rdo rje khu tshur rtse mo bsdams// 'grin par pang zla'i dkyil 'khor du// chos kyi phyag rgya rnam par bsgoms// sngar gyi 'byin
287b4(rgyud): pa'i sngags kyis ni// chos kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad/ thugs khar sna tshogs rdo rje ni// bsams te las kyi phywa dag rgya bya/ ji skad bshad pa'i chos 'khor lo// shAkya'i rgyal
287b5(rgyud): po'i phyag rgya'o// sa mnon mchog sbyin ting 'dzin dang / mi' jig sbyin sogs rim pa bzhin// ting 'dzin mchog tu ga nas pa ni// gtsug tor gzi brjid phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i
287b6(rgyud): lag ngar dbyug pa dang // g.yon bsnying khar ral gri 'phyar// g.yon pa brdegs mdzub bsgreng bya ste// g.yas pa bteg te brkyang bar bya// lag pa gnyis ka gar sdoms nas// gdugs kyi rnam
287b7(rgyud): par gzhag par bya// chos kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga gang // rdzogs sangs rgyas skyob min pa'i yang // rdo rje bsgyings pa'i sbyor ba yis// btags pa'i bsams pas mdud par bya// phreng ba bcing dang kha
287b8(rgyud): nas dbyung // gar gyis yongasu bskor ba nyid// rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba yis// gdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyar// mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba yis// mthe chung la ni lcags sgrog che// 'khrig ma mdu
288a1(rgyud): // cing 'dzub gnyis bsnol// rgyab dag kyang ni nges par bsdam// de nas de phyir go rim bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che'i// las kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba yi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab
288a2(rgyud): tu bshad// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// phan tshun lhan cig gshibs nas ni// mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dgug/ me tog rnam par bzung bar bya// byams pa'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa khu tshur bkur
288a3(rgyud): bzhag la/ g.yas pa'i dpung pa'i thad kar ni// mdzub mo gung mo brkyang nas ni// mig gi tshul du bzhag par bya// mthong ba don yod kyi'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// mdzub mo dag ni rkyang na su// gas
288a4(rgyud): pa lcags kyu legs bzhag pa// ngan song thams cad spong ba yin// / g.yon pa khu tshur bkur bzhag la// g.yas pas dbyig dpa lta bur ni/ gyen du sbrengs la bzhag par bya// mya ngan mun pa
288a5(rgyud): kun 'jom gyi'o// g.yon pa khu tshur lte bar bzhag/ lag pa g.yas pa glang po che'i// sna yi tshul du bzhag pa ni// sgo sa kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa khu tshur bkur bzhag ste/ 
288a6(rgyud): g.yas pa ral gri thogs pa yis// tshul du 'jog par byed pa ni// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa khu tshur snying kar bzhag/ g.yas pa steng bskor mkha' mdzod kyi// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
288a7(rgyud): bcings pa// rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa lta bur ni// g.yas kyi log su 'jog byed pa// ye shes tog gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyi bum 'dzin ltar// bzhag pa 'od dpag med pa'i 'o// g.yon pa'i khu
288a8(rgyud): tshur brla stengs bzhag/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur gzhog su ni// mthe bong mthe chung brkyang byas la// zla tshes rnam pa zla 'od kyi'o// lag pa gnyis ni snying ka ru// pad+ma'i rnam par rnam phye la// rtse mo phan tshun
288b1(rgyud): sbyar ba ni bzang skyong gi ni phyag rgya yin// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// go cha 'dzin pa lta bur ni// nu ma gnyi su legs bzhag pa// dra ba can 'od phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bkur bzhag la// 
288b2(rgyud): g.yas pa snying khar bzhag nas ni// sor mo dbus ma bsgrengs byas la// rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa khu tshur snying khar bzhag/ g.yas pa mi 'jig sprin rnams la// blo gros mi zad pa yi'o// 
288b3(rgyud): g.yon pa'i khu tshur lte bar bzhag/ g.yas pa'i se gol tog pa ni// spobs pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bkur bzhag ste// g.yas pa rin chen khu tshur bya// kun tu bzang po'i
288b4(rgyud): phyag rgya yin// mtshan ma dang bral cho ga yis// las kyi phyag rgyab shad pa yin// snying khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i// gzugs can yang dag bzung ba zhing // 'byin pa rnams ji ltar bzung // phyag rgya
288b5(rgyud): mtshan ma bsdams pa dag/ rdo rje dril bu bzung nas ni/ thugs/ khar rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// phyag rgya che zhes byang chub gang / byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che'o// 'byin pa rnams
288b6(rgyud): ltar bzung // phyag rgya mtshon cha bsnams pa rnams// bdag nyid chen po gang gang gis// phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings nas// snying po don gyi bzlas pa dang // rang gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ phyag
288b7(rgyud): rgya bzhi rnams sgrub byed pa// lha rnams thams cad rgyas btab dang / kun khyen yon tan rdzogs pa dang // sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// ngan srong thams cad legs sbyangs nas// sems can
288b8(rgyud): byang chub thob bya'i phyir// de nas sngags rab bshad bya ste// ngan song kun sbyong dkyil 'khor du// phyag rgya sngags kyi rab sbyor gyis// bya ba thams cad nus par 'gyur// so so so sor rdo rje gar byas
289a1(rgyud): / nas sngags rnams brjod par bya// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te san+yakle bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA pa bi
289a2(rgyud): sho d+ha ne/ shud d+he bi shud d+he sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud d+he swA hA// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis// rdo rje dril bu blangs la lag pa g.yas pas rdo rje 'gying ba dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing 'di skad
289a3(rgyud): ces brjod do// badz+ra pA tsan Tika hUM dzaHdzaHdzaHrang gi snying khar sgreng ste gsal ba'i sbyor bas gzung zhing Tik+ka dzaHho zhes brjod de// de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ste/ de dag gi byang chub
289a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sa bcu pa'i dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de rna dmas bltas la mchod pa thams cad kyis rab tu mtsho/  do// de nas de rnams kyis bstod pa rnams kyis yang dag
289a5(rgyud): par mchod par bya ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa// kham sa gsum pa yi 'gro kun gyi// ngan song thams cad sbyong mdzad pa// shAkya seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi
289a6(rgyud): dbyings kyi rang bzhin las// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rang gi de nyid ston mdzad pa// rdo rje gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// mnyam nyid de nyid bsgoms pa yis// khams
289a7(rgyud): gsum la gnas thams cad la// dbang bskur rab tu gsol mdzad pa// rin chen gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// so sor kun rtog rang bzhin can// chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs
289a8(rgyud): pas// sems can dbugs 'byin mdzad pa po/ pad+ma'i gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// sems can sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir// bya ba rjes sgrub rang bzhin can// phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa po// sgra
289b1(rgyud): tshogs gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// khams gsum 'od kyis gsal mdzad nas// sems can kun gyis 'phags pa yi// bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa po// gtsug tor gzi brjid khyod
289b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams// sbyin pas sems can thams cad kyi// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// gtsug tor rgyal mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal
289b3(rgyud): nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag/ gcod cing bdud bzhi'i stobs bcom nas// sems can byang chub thob mdzad pa// gtsug tor rnon po khyod phyag 'tshal// khams gsum 'gro ba thams cad
289b4(rgyud): kyis// gdugs kar gyi ni rgyan pa yi// chos kyi rgyal po thob ma dzad pa// gtsug tor gdugs dkar khyod phyag 'tshal/ sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ gar mkhan lha mo bzhi po dang / spos dang
289b5(rgyud): me tog mar me ma// dri yi lha mo khyod phyag 'tshal// dad sogs ngo bo las byung ba// sgo bzhi'i dbus na gang bzhugs pa// / lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// sgo skyong
289b6(rgyud): khyed rnams la phyag 'tshal// sgo bzhi yi ni logs dag na// khyams rnamasu ni bzhugs mdzad pa// rab dga' la sogs bcu gnyis gnas// byang chub sems dpa' khyed phyag 'tshal// 
289b7(rgyud): tshangs dbang drag po zla ba sogs// phyogs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// me dang srin po rlung lha dang // 'byung po'i bdag po khyed phyag 'tshal// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// dkyil
289b8(rgyud): 'khor mdun du kun bstod nas// sngags pa rdo rje dril 'chang bas// bstod pa 'di dag yang dag brjod// phyi nas rang gi lus la ni// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhugs// de ltar nges pa
290a1(rgyud): / bsgom bzhin pa'i// dkyil 'khor dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog zhes bya ba rab tu bshad par bya ste/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA/ 
290a2(rgyud): NA a d+ya nuta pan+na tAta/ de'i don ni rnam par thar pa las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad stong pa nyid bcu drug tu lhag par mos par bya ste/ ngar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid stong / 
290a3(rgyud): de nyid du blta'o// de nas yi ge hUM las rdzogs pa'i rdo rjes rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang / yi ge raM gyis me'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du yi ge baM las chu gter chen po dang / de'i steng du yi
290a4(rgyud): ge ka la gser gyi dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du dbus hUM su hUM zhes bya ba ste/ de las ri rab gru bzhi pa rin dpo che'i rang bzhin rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed
290a5(rgyud): la/ oM badz+ra dwiTA zhes pa la sogs pa dang rdo rje bsdams pa byin gyis brlab bo// de'i steng du rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas yi ge b+h+rUM dkar po las byung ba'i rdo rje dang nor bu
290a6(rgyud): dang rin po che'i rtse mo can gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa la bsgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhi yis rnam par rgyan// gru bzhi rnams ni thams cad du// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnamasu// zla ba
290a7(rgyud): mtshan ma rdo rjes spras// dra ba dra phyed kyis rgyan cing // thig le dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// nang gi dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rdo rje phreng
290a8(rgyud): bas yongasu bskor ba'o// de'i lte ba'i steng du seng ge'i gdan no// de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i nang rnamasasu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te lha rnams
290b1(rgyud): kyi gnaso// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi gnas ni snam bu rnams la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa brgyad blta'o// seng ge'i gdan gyi steng gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge a la sogs
290b2(rgyud): pa dang / yi ge ka la sogs pa shes rab dang thabs kyi yi ge zhu bar gyur pa mkha'i khyab kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi don gyi
290b3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sngags kyi gzungasu gyur te/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA// sngags 'dis dpa' shAkya'i rgyal po rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sgrib pa thams cad sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
290b4(rgyud): par zhugs pa'o// de nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhug sa pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i phyag rgya dang sta dgas bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// 
290b5(rgyud): rim gyis rnam par dbye bar bya// chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag/ rgya ni// 'khor ba thams cad gcod byed yin// de yi dpe ni 'di lta ste// ji ltar pad+ma la chags pa'i// bung ba la sogs
290b6(rgyud): bsdams pa rnams// pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha phyen// bcings pa'i sdug bsngal las thar byed// de bzhin 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi// srid gsum 'khor bar bcings pa 'di// thugs rje'i bdag
290b7(rgyud): nyid shAkya yi// seng ges bcings pa las grol mdzad// de nas dpal shAkya thub pa'i thugs khar yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngags thams
290b8(rgyud): cad kyis bskyed par bya ste/ rdo rje gtsug tor nas brnams te ji srid rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa 'byung ba yin no// de nas sngags rnams 'thung ste/ oMn mo b+ha ga ba te sarba dun tipa
291a1(rgyud): / ri shod+ha na rA dzA ya ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+ha te samyakr-i bud+d+hA ya/ tangad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sar+b+ba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sar+b+ba karma A pa ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ sngags 'di nges pa
291a2(rgyud): brjod do// de nas de'i phyir go rims bzhin yang dag/ rims bzhin yang dag rab bshad bya// oM badz+ra hUM phaT/ kha yi sgo nas phyung nas ni// kun nas 'od zer lnga par 'thon// kun nas phyogs bcur
291a3(rgyud): snang byas nas// sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal rnams ni thar mdzad de// 'od zer rnams ni slar logs nas// thugs khar zhugs te de rjes la// sngags dang 'od zer gnyis
291a4(rgyud): 'dres pa la las byung sku ni yongs rdzogs pa// nang gi dkyil nga 'khor 'khor lo'i rtsibs// shar phyogs pad+ma zla bar ba zhugs// rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs// sems can kun
291a5(rgyud): la phan don du// thugs kha las byung bzhugs pa ni// sku mdog dkar zhing 'od zer 'bar// sa mnon phyag rgya yang dag bzhugs// de ltar 'od zer spro bsdu ni// sngar bshad pa yi
291a6(rgyud): thams cad kyang // spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// sngags dang 'od zer legs 'dres dang // sku ni skyed cing yang dag rdzogs// ji bzhin gan su bzhugs par bya// oM ra ta nota ta ma traM zhes bya/ 
291a7(rgyud): bas dbyung bar bya'o// lho yi brtsibasu yang dag bzhugs// pad+ma zla ba'i dbus ni// rin chen gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs// thugs kha nas ni nges gton nas// sangs rgyas mtshan gyis
291a8(rgyud): yang dag rgyan// sku mdog sngo zhing shin tu mdzes// 'di'i phyag rgya mchog sbyin nyid// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i// sems can kun la dbang bskur mdzod// sngar bzhin spro dang bsdu
291b1(rgyud): bdang gzugs bskyed pa yi rim pa yin// oM pad mod ta ma hrI/ zhes dbyung bar bya'o// de nas nub kyi rtsibs gnas pa'i// pad stengs zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ sa bon 'od zer gyis rdzogs
291b2(rgyud): pa'i/ pad+ma gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs// thugs kha las ni phyung gyur nas// rjesu ston mdzad bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'bar la// bsam gtan phyag rgyas rnam par bzhugs// oM bi
291b3(rgyud): sho d+ha ma i zhes dbyung ngo // byang phyogs rtsibs gnas pad+ma yi// steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// thugs kha nas bton sangs rgyas ni// sna tshogs gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ sku mdog ldang
291b4(rgyud): ku 'od 'bar ba// 'di yi phyag rgyas mi 'jigs sbyin// phyagargyas phrin las sna tshogs mdzad// sems can 'khor dpa las sgrol ba'o// yi ge oM gyis sangs rgyas dbyung / 
291b5(rgyud): gtsug tor gzi brjid de bzhin gshegs// me yi mtsha mas gnas pad+ma gnas// yang dag zla ba'i dkyil 'kho ral// g.yas pa nyi ma yang dag bsnams// phyag g.yon pa
291b6(rgyud): ni sku la gnas// sku mdog dkar dmar 'od kyis ni// khams gsum pa ni snang bar mdzad// hUM gi sa bon las byung ba// gtsug tor rgyal mtshan de bzhin gshegs// thugs kha las byung / 
291b7(rgyud): byung nas ni// bden brel rtsibs la bzhugs nas ni// pad gnas zla ba'i gzugs la yang // sku mdog dmar zhing gnag pa la// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan rnams// sems can ser// 
291b8(rgyud): sna sbyong mdzad pa// d+hIHyige sa bon las rdzogs pa'i// gtsug tor rnon po de bzhin gshegs// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams/ gcod mdzad rlung gi rtsibs phyung // pad+ma zla ba la
292a1(rgyud): bzhugs shing // 'di yi phyag mtshan g.yas ral gri g.yon na glegs bam rnams pa ni// sku mdog mkha' ltar sngo ba'o// pad+ma la gnas zla bar bzhugs/ kri yig sa bon
292a2(rgyud): las byung ba'i// gtsug tor gdugs dkar de bzhin gshegs// sems can rnams kyi chos kyi rje// dbang ldan rtsibasu dbyung bar bya// kun da lta bu'i mdog lta bu// 'di yi phyag mtshan gdug
292a3(rgyud): bsnams pa// de kun sna tshogs pad+mar gnas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i// oM tre hriHaHsngags de rnamasu brjod na su// thugs kha nas ni dbyung ba dang // mtshams kyi gnas
292a4(rgyud): ni bzhi po ru// pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// sgeg mo la sogs lha mo bzhi// rigs kyi sku mdog 'dzin pa ste// dkar ser dmar po sna tshogs mdog// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba ni
292a5(rgyud): sngar bshad ji skad bzhin du// bsngags pa nyid ni brjod nasu// thugs kha nas kyang dbyangs bya ste// gdug pa la sogs lha mo bzhi// pad+ma la gnas zla ba yi// dkyil
292a6(rgyud): 'khor du ni mtshams bzhi'o// thams cad du yang sku mdog ni// rigs kyi rim pa nyid kyis so// oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te/ ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya
292a7(rgyud): pa ri bA re swA hA// sngags kyi dbyung ste shar gyi sgo'i// gzhogs gnyis dag tu gnas pa ni// byams pa la sogs gnas bzhi po// pad gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// thams cad
292a8(rgyud): sems dpa'i skyil krungs can// phyag rgya sku mdog rim pa yang / byams pa thugs ni rnam dag pa// sku mdog ser po 'od zer bzang // g.yas pa glu shing me tog can// g.yon pas spyi
292b1(rgyud): blugs bsnams pa'o// gnyis pa mthong ba don yod ni// sku mdog ser po 'od zer 'bar// phyag g.yas pad+ma spyan can te// g.yon pa'i phyag ni bkur bzhag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' gas
292b2(rgyud): pa yang / mtshan ni ngan song spong 'joms pa// sku mdog dkar po 'od 'bar zhing // phyag rgya lcags kyu bsnams pa can// bzhi pa mya ngan mun pa kun// nges 'joms blo gros de bzhin te/ da
292b3(rgyud): ser 'dres pa'i mdog tu snang // de yi phyag rgya dbyug pa rnams// g.yon pa khu tshur bkur bzhag cing // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' bzhi rnams kyang // 
292b4(rgyud): lho sgor rab tu bzhugs pa'o// dang po spos kyi glang po yang // dkar po sngo ba'i sku mdog can// 'di yi phyag rgya phyog g.yas na// dri ya~M dung ni rab tu bkang // g.yon pa khu tshur
292b5(rgyud): bkur bzhag la// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spyong // gnyi sa pa dpa' bar 'gro ba mtshon// nyon mongs thams cad rab grol mdzad/ shel gyi mdog can 'od bzang ba
292b6(rgyud): 'di yi phyag rgya ral gri bsnams// g.yon pa'i phyag ni bkur bzhag nas// sems can sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa'o// gsum pa na mkha' mdzod nyid de// rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan
292b7(rgyud): pa// dkar ser bsres pa'i sku mdog 'od// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spangs// 'di yi phyag rgya phyag g.yas na// pad+ma la gnas chos kyi mdzod// g.yon pa'i phyag ni bkur bzhag la
292b8(rgyud): namakha' nor kun 'chang bapo// bzhi pa yang ni ye shes tog/ bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// sngon po mdog can yang dag gsal/ yid sbyin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan
293a1(rgyud): // bsnams// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bkur 'jog cing // dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dgrol bar mdzad// nub sgo'i drung du pad+ma la// gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dang po bdud rtsi 'od
293a2(rgyud): ces bya// zla ba'i mdog gi rnam par mdzes// bdud rtsi'i bum pa legs par bsnams// cod pan rin chen phyag giso// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur 'jog cing // rgya chen tshe ni rtsol ba po// 
293a3(rgyud): gnyis pa'i mtshan ni zla ba'i 'od// mi shes pa yi mun pa bsal// sku mdog dkar po mdzes pa ni// phyag rgya g.yas pa'i phyag nyid kyis// pad+mar gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs// g.yon
293a4(rgyud): pa khu tshur dkur bzhag pa'o// gsum pa bzang skyong zhes bya ba// dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdog can nyid// chos rnam das thams cad rab bsal mdzad// phyag rgya phyag ni g.ya/ 
293a5(rgyud): nga yi/ rin chen 'bar ba yang dag bsnams// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa bzhi pa yang // dra ba can gyi 'od mtshan can// sku mchog
293a6(rgyud): dmar po 'od 'bar ba// rdo rje gur ni bsnams pa can// byang sgo'i rtsa bar pad+ma la// gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas sras po dang po nyid// mtshan ni rdo rje snying po zhes// 
293a7(rgyud): dkar zhing sngo bo'i mdog dang ldan// phyag rgya phyag ni g.yas pa yis// ud pa la ni rdo rje'i ldan// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur gnas pa'o// gnyis pa blo gros zhes pa yi// mi zad pa tha
293a8(rgyud): yang dag ldan// kun tu zla ba'i mdog ltar bsal// phyag rgya phyag ni gnyis pa yis// yi ges bum pa yang dag bsnams// sems can thams cad rab tshim mdzad// sangs rgyas
293b1(rgyud): sras po gsum pa yang // spobs pa brtsegs pa'i tha snyad can// sku mdog dmar zhing 'od 'bar ba/ phyag rgya phyag g.yas pad+ma la// gnas pa'i rin chen phung po nyid// g.yon pa khu tsha
293b2(rgyud): dkur gnas pa'o// rgyal ba'i sras po bzhi po ni// kun tu bzang po ces bya ste// sku mdog ser zhing 'od 'bar ba// g.yas pa'i phyag gi phyag rgya ni// rin chen snye ma bsnams pa la/ 
293b3(rgyud): g.yon pa khu tshur bstan pa'o// de lta'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan// byang chub sems dpa' brtse bdag nyid// dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM mu ne mu
293b4(rgyud): nim hA mun ye swAhA/ na maHsar+b+ba dun ti pa ri sho d+ha naraHde ya/ ta thA ga tA yA/ an te sa mukra bud+d+hA ya/ dang thA/ oM sho d+hA ne sho d+ha ne/ sar+b+ba pa bi shod+ha ne/ shud+d+he bai
293b5(rgyud): sar+b+ba kar+m+ma a ba ra Ne bi shud+d+he swAhA// sngags 'dis shAkya rgyal po la sogs pa lnga sum cu rtsa bdun yongasu rdzog sa par sgo mo// de nas de'i rjes la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
293b6(rgyud): spyan drang bar bya'o// sngags dang phyag rgya mnyam ldan pas// sgo ni dbye bar byas nas// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// mdzub mo gnyis ni rab tu brkyang // mthe'u chung lug gu rgyud byas
293b7(rgyud): la/ sgo dbye ba yi phyag rgya yis// oM sar+b+ba bid+yA d+ha ra/ ud g+ha Ta ya hUM/ sgo dbye ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas sgo dbye'o// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor yongasu gteg ste// oM
293b8(rgyud): sar+b+ba bid+yA badz+ra tsakra hUM// lagangar dag ni rdo rjer bcings// rdo rje se gol rnam grol bas/ shAkya'i rgyal po sbyor ba dag dpal// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// g.yas pa se gol brdabs
294a1(rgyud): pa yis/ mnyam par brdabs par grub par 'gyur// g.yas pa yis kyang brdab par gsungs// gnyis ka yang ni sdud pa yin// oM badz+ra sa mA dzaHdzaHhUM baM ho/ bka' bsgo ba 'di bsgrags
294a2(rgyud): tsam gyis// 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs// sangs rgyas thams cad byon 'gyur te// gzhan rnams rab 'jug lta ci smos// de nas mdun gyi na mkhar dkyil 'khor la bltas la/ 
294a3(rgyud): rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis mchod yon gyi snod na gnas pa'i dri'i chus yang dag par bsangs te/ zhabs bsil dbul lo// de nas mchod yon gyi phyag rgyas mchod yon dbu'o// de nas zhabs
294a4(rgyud): bsil gyi phyag rgyas zhabs bsil dbul lo// de nas oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM oM badz+ra d+hU pa hUM/ oM badz+ra dI pe hUM/ badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas bgegs bskrad la/ dkyil 'khri/ 
294a5(rgyud): du gzhugo// de nas yang phyag rgya dang por sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bcing ngo // de nas sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis chos kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga'o// den/ 
294a6(rgyud): los kyi phyag rgya'i sngags kyis las kyi phyag rgya bcing ngo // de nas phyag rgya chen po'i sngags kyis phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya'o// de nas rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
294a7(rgyud): rnams kyis sems ma rdo rje ma dang / rin chen rdo rje ma dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma rnams spros te/ dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i lha dpal shAkya'i rgyal po nas brtsams pa'i rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mtha
294a8(rgyud): thug pa la dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya ste/ dbang bskur ba lnga dang / bdag po stes bcu'i mthar thug pa sbyin no// dbang bskur ma thag tu/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma
294b1(rgyud): ye hUM/ oM sar+b+bA ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta da pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gan+d+he pudza me g+has mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hA/ 
294b2(rgyud): nas sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi yis mchod do// rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje'i tshig yige brgya pa sngon du 'gro bas sngar bzhin bstod par bya'o// de nas mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med snying po'i chos can
294b3(rgyud): ni/ 'thugs rje'i bdag nyid can nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ yon tan dngos grub thams cad mtha' yas sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog rab chos can rnams// yon tan
294b4(rgyud): mchog ni phra mo'i cha la'ang mtshams medo// na mkha' dang ma nyam dper gyur pa nyid yod ma yin// sems can khams dal grub mchog rtsol ba rnams la gsol// dngos grub mtha'
294b5(rgyud): yas rnams la dpe dang rnam par bral// dri med thugs rje ba rgyang nyid kyi shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub lhur mdzad
294b6(rgyud): mtha' yas mnga' ba can// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // 'gag med nyid kyi thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten gsum la mchog gi dngos grub rtsol ba 'jug
294b7(rgyud): dpag med dpag bral rnams la shin tu rdzogs nyid rdzogs// bde ba'i gan su gshegs kyang e ma'o chos nyid bzang // rtag tu mchog sbyin nyid de bde 'gro nyid du gshegs// mtha' dang 'jig
294b8(rgyud): rten gsum la dngos grub mchog ni stsol ba po// bde gshegs dus gsum bgrod nyid sgrib pa mi mnga' nyid// dam tshig gsum mchog dngos grub mchog sbyin bdag la stsol ces pa dang / thams
295a1(rgyud): cad la lce brgya pa'i kha yis bstod pa nye bar spyod par mos te// rdo rje dang dril du 'dzin pas bstod par bya'o// de nas phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'
295a2(rgyud): thams cad dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyi rol gyi lha rnams la mchod pa thams cad dang gtor ma'i cho ga nye bar mkho ba dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dbul lo// dpung pa bzang po'i
295a3(rgyud): tshigs bcad brjod do// dang por se gol la sogs sgras// khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yis// sdig pa'i phung po dgug bya zhing // yi ge gsum sogs yang dag ldan// 'jig rten khams ni
295a4(rgyud): ma lus pa'i// sdig pa thams cad mnyam po spong // ngogug dang gdon dang bcing ba rnam par gzhoms// sdug sa bzhi po rnams legs par sbyar ba ni// bdag sogs sngags te nyung
295a5(rgyud): kar dkar po brdeg/ shi ba'i rus pa gos la rab ba/ kru ba/ oM sho d+ha ne zhes sogs sngags kyis ni// srid gsum dri ma chu yis bkru ba bya// oM kaM ka ni zhes sogs sngags
295a6(rgyud): kyis ni// ba yi rnam pa lnga yis bkru bar bya// oM rat+ne rat+ne zhes sogs sngags kyis ni// dri bzang rnams ni kun gyis bkru bar bya// oM a mo g+ha A ba ra Na sogs// sngags kyis pa yi 'o mas
295a7(rgyud): bkru bar bya// oM a mi te a mi ti zhes sogs// sngags kyis char mchog gis kyang bkru bar bya// oM pu N+ye sogs pa'i sngags kyis ni// bar dang bar du chu yis bkru bar bya// yang bkra
295a8(rgyud): shis kyi gru blang zhing dbang bskur ro// lam sbyang ba bya'o// gdugs pa la sogs lha mo bzhi'i sngag so// de nas 'di'i thag khung ni khri gang tsam la sprin bsreg bya// ngan 'gro kun tu gnas pa yi// 
295b1(rgyud): sems can de rjes dran byas nas// dge ba'i rgyud phyir sdig pa dang // sgrib pa ni phyir bsreg bya ste// mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang // 'bras yos nyungs kar bsres pa dang // til dang 'bru dang 'bras
295b2(rgyud): la sogs// bud shing rnamasu lag gnyis kyis// las rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang // snga ma ji ltar de ltar gyis// de yis myur du sems can rnams/ bde bar phun sum tshogs pa 'gro/ 
295b3(rgyud): las kyi rgyal po mchog ces pa'i ting 'dzin to// de dag kyang sems can de la byas pa de nas de dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur te// dga' ldan gyi gan su sems can thams
295b4(rgyud): cad la phan par mdzad pa bde bar gshegs pa dang lda na par skye so// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnam sa snyan grags dang bcas pas gar byed cing / sngags kyis mchod
295b5(rgyud): pa'i sprin mtha' yas skye ba 'di nyid la de bzhin gsheg sa pa mchod pa'i phyir lha'i tshogs rnams mdun du bya ste/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa
295b6(rgyud): dang / mar me dang / dri dang / gdugs pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang / rgyan du ma rnams kyis kyang mdzes shing na bza' rin po che'i char la sogs pas kyang dga'
295b7(rgyud): ba'i tshal yongasu gang bar byaso// de nas ngo mtshar che bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs
295b8(rgyud): kyis brtag pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phyi mar gsungs te// dpa' bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni// dgyes pas rdo rje gsor zhing shAkya'i bdag po dgyes pa thub pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal nas
296a1(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid rang gi thugs kha nas
296a2(rgyud): phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba pA pad ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya bi sho d+ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra NA ni b+hasmi ku ru hU~M phaT/ oM b+huM bi na sha ya A pa ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ oM d+b+ha bi sho d+ha ya a ba ra Na/ 
296a3(rgyud): ni hU~M phaT/ oM dz+wa la dza la d+ha ka d+haM ka ha na ha na A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM suM sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pre sa ra/ a ba ra NA hU~M phaT/ oM hU he ra he ra sar+b+ba A ba ra Ni ni hUM phaT/ oM hrI phaT sar+b+ba A pa ra/ 
296a4(rgyud): ni hUM phaT/ oM b+hI ta b+h+r-i ta sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM d+haHtrA Ta sar+b+bA A ba ra Na na hUM phaT/ oM ts+tshi nad sar+b+ba A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oMd ha da he sar+b+bA nA ra ka ga ti ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM ba6
296a5(rgyud): ba sar+b+ba pre ta ga ti he tru hU~M phaT/ oM mtha ma thi sar+b+ba tir ga~M ga ti he tu hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gis nye bar mkhri/ bai rnams spyad de/ oM sar+b+ba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne d+ha ma d+hU pa ya hUM phaT/ 
296a6(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba durga ti bi sho d+hi ni puSh+pa bi lo ki ni hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA yA bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA nA lo ka ka ri hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ga ti gan+d+ha na sha ni gan+d+ha ba ti hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba na ra ka ga ti A kaR+Sha ni hA
296a7(rgyud): dza phaT/ oM sar+b+ba na ra ka ud+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ban d+hu na bi mo tsa ni hUM baM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pa ya ga tig ha ni bi nA shi ni hUM hoHphaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ nang
296a8(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad pa yis shin tu mdzes// lte ba mu khyud yang dag ldan// nang gi rim pa bris nas ni// lte bar shAkya'i dbang po yi/ bdag po thub pa bri bar bya/ 
296b1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje stobs chen ni// dpa' bo de yi spyan sngar bri// rgyab tu 'khor lo sgyur ba yang // legs par mngon par bri bar bya// g.yasu rgyal ba'i gtsug tor bri// g.yon du rnam par rgyal ba
296b2(rgyud): bri// gzi brjid phung po yang ne mer// dbang ldan du ni gdugs dkar po// rnam par mthor ba rlung nyid du// rnam par 'joms pa bden bral bri// de nas phyi rol yang dag bri/ gru bzhi pa la
296b3(rgyud): sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi pa shin tu mdzes// dpa' bo lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu bstan rnams bzhag/ grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du// bdug pa la sogs bri bar
296b4(rgyud): bya// de nas me tog phreng ba dang // dri sogs rang gi lus la byA dge/ slob dpon 'jug par bya ste// dzaHhUM ba ho// b+ha ga bAM/ e h+ye hi ma hA/ kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoHzhes bya bas lha thams cad
296b5(rgyud): spyan drang ngo // de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thams cad las rnam par grol te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang sa gong ma rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ro// dngos gru
296b6(rgyud): thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur ro// snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs
296b7(rgyud): pa med par 'gyur ro// bya ba byas pas rims thams cad dang gdon la sogs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas las thams cad byedado// brtag pa gzhan gyi tshe/ 
296b8(rgyud): gas kyang las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi dbang du gyur pa rnams 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan la sogs pa
297a1(rgyud): / mngon par bris pa las bzlas pa dang sbyin bsreg dang dbang bskur ba rnams kyis ngan song thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas seng
297a2(rgyud): ge'i lta stangs kyis zhal du bltas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya mchog gi mtshan nyid dam pa bshad par bya ste/ thugs rje'i gdung ba'i dbang du
297a3(rgyud): gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyal ba thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin du gnas par dpral ba thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnal
297a4(rgyud): 'byor rig pas 'grin pa'i phyogasu thal mo kha phye ba pad+ma'i rnam par bya'o// thugs khar rdo rje thal mo byas sor mo dbus dam rtse mo sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// 
297a5(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa gan rkyal du dngang par bzhag la de'i steng/ du g.yas pa bzlog ste/ bzhag la mthe bong gnyis sbyar te zhi ba'i lta bas blta'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
297a6(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid yongasu bskor te phan tshun sbyar te mthe'u chung dag dang mthe bong dag lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par bcings la snying khar bzhag go// 'di ni rdo
297a7(rgyud): rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// thal mo gang bar sbyar nas mthe'u chung dang mthe bong sbyar te bzung zhing lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang ba'o// 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdam
297a8(rgyud): par bstan par byas nas// gung mo gnyis rdo rje rtse mor byas la// mthe'u chung dang mthe bo rab tu brkyang ba'o// 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyis mthe'u chung dang mthe bong gnyis de bani/ 
297b1(rgyud): du byas byas la/ mdzub mo dang ming med pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i rnam par bya'o// 'di ni ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i ngag rgya'o// de nyid kyi mdzub mo dang ming med dag rin po che'i rnam
297b2(rgyud): par bya'o// 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe'u chung dang mthe bong so so so sor sbyar nas lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang ba ni mtshon cha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon bde kho
297b3(rgyud): na bzhin du rab tu 'jug pa ni las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya'o// snyim pa gyen du mthor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'og nas 'thor ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid mthe bong
297b4(rgyud): gnyis gyen du mnyams la 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid gung mo
297b5(rgyud): rnams nang du bcug pa ni ar+ha'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings ba las gung mo gnyis mnyams te tshogs par ma cag nas sor mo thams cad brkyang ba 'di ni rnam par ma
297b6(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyi snyim pa 'od zer gyi rnam pa ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid spyi bo'i
297b7(rgyud): gnasu bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings la bskor ba 'di ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams
297b8(rgyud): pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che ltar bya ste/ lhag ma 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas
298a1(rgyud): la sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pas mchod sbyin dang g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i de bzhin ga
298a2(rgyud): pa'i yin no// rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis pa bkug pa ni ljags kyi'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las rwa 'dra bar byas
298a3(rgyud): pa ni mdo'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid phyag rgya dang mthe bong rtse sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i'o// de nyid kyi tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i'o// de nyid sor mo rnams 'od zer 'dra ba gzi brjid kyi'o// 
298a4(rgyud): de nyid spyi bor bzhag pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid mdun nga du bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i'o// de nyid pad+ma 'dra bar byasadapa ni pad+ma'o// de nyid gung mo dang mdzub mo bkug pa ni ral grin
298a5(rgyud): de nyid gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i'o// de nyid pad+mar/ 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i'o// de nyid bskyed pa/ ni sna tshogs kyi'o// de nyid shin tu bskyed pa ni srung ba'i'o// 
298a6(rgyud): de rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o// de nyid dam du dkug pa ni bsdams pa'i 'o// de nyid mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'o// de nyid rtse mo gnyis sprad pa ni zhags pa'i'o// 
298a7(rgyud): de nyid phan tshun mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o// de nyid bskyod pa ni dril bu'o// de nas tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa lci'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
298a8(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen pod de dag la/ gzigs nas leg so zhes bya bas mgu bar bya ste/ brgya byin la sog
298a9(rgyud): bskal ba chung ba rnam kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tshe sring
298b1(rgyud): pa lha'i bu rnams gang khyed la 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang dag par skyes pa de ni leg so// leg so// legs par bsgrubs shig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje thams/ 
298b2(rgyud): cad tshe dpag tu med par khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phel ba zhes bya ba de bzhin ga
298b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yuHpu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te ya ka ra Ni swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
298b4(rgyud): po'i gzungs 'di bshad pa tsam gyis ngan song thams cad ra rab tu zhi ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang byol song gi 'gro ba rnamasu skyes pa'i sems can thams
298b5(rgyud): cad grol bar bdag nyid kyis rab tu sheso// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas shing snang bar byas/ nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis byas nas de
298b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to// de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
298b7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad// oM a mi taM a mi te/ i ma tod b+ha be/ 
298b8(rgyud): mi ta se b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bi kAn+ta gA mi ni sar+b+ba kar+m+ma g+he sha k+Sha ye ka ri swAhA// de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams ca
299a1(rgyud): rab tu zhi ba'o// de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin
299a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // oM kaM ka ni ka ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni dr-i Ta ni/ trA sa ni trA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra
299a3(rgyud): ti ha nA/ sar+b+ba karma pa raM pa rA NI sar+b+ba satwa nAny+dzu swA hA// 'di bshad pa tsam gyis thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro// de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa thams cad dri ma
299a4(rgyud): med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dal snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs/ rab thams cad kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa rnam par 'joms pa
299a5(rgyud): bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs kha nas/ oM rat+ne rat+ne ma hA rat+na rat+na saM b+ha be rat+na ki ra Ne/ rat+na/ mA lA bi shud d+he sho d+hA ya/ sar+b+ba pA paM tsU trA Ta/ de nas 'di
299a6(rgyud): bshad ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom zhing rnam par bcom par gyur to// de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi choms par sgrib pa thams cad rnam
299a7(rgyud): par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // oM e mo g+ha a pa ti ha ta
299a8(rgyud): sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos yang dag par rab tu g.yos/ bskyod rab tu bskyod yang
299b1(rgyud): dag par rab tu bskyod/ bsgral rab tu bskul yang dag par rab tu bskul zhing ngo mtshar che zhing rmad du byung ba du ma 'jig rten du snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni 'di
299b2(rgyud): yin te/ grubazhi po la sgo bzhi pa// logs bzhi dang yang yang dag ldan// rta babs bzhi dang kun tu ldan// kha khyer dang ni sgo khyud bcas// de yi dbusu 'khor lo yi// dkyil 'khor
299b3(rgyud): dam pa bri bar bya// rtsibs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// de yi dbusu mgon po ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs che zhing // phyag na rdo rje dril bu can// zla ba rgyas zhal
299b4(rgyud): 'dzum pa bri// shar gyi rtsibs kyi dbus kyi char// gtso bo mi bskyod pa nyid bri// lhor ni rin chen bri bya zhing // nub tu chu skyes pad+ma ste/ byang du gdon mi za zhe grags// dpa' bo stobs
299b5(rgyud): chen bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i cha lugs mdzad// zla ba'i dkyil 'khru ra mdog 'dra zhing // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa rnams/ 
299b6(rgyud): phyag na mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa// rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa bri// grwa yi tshe rnams thams cad du// de bzhin bdug pa la sogs bri/ sgo skyong rnams kyang khro bo dang // mchog tu khro bar gzhol
299b7(rgyud): ba bri// de nas rnal 'byor rang nyid zhugs// sngags kyis lha rnams spyan drangs te// dzaHhUM ba ho// b+ha ga ba/ badz+ra ai h+ye hi ni sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas mgon po byon pa la// mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni// 
299b8(rgyud): 'chi bdag nyid dang sgrol 'jigs pa'i// 'chi bdag gzhom phyir gzhog par bya/ oM badz+ri sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje ti rin te ri bcings// lag na rin chen thogs pa bcug yang na me tog phreng ldan pa/ 
300a1(rgyud): / dag dkyil 'khor nyid du dor// oM pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hUM/ de nas dam tshig sbyin te/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'dis gdong g.yog dgrol bar bya'o// oM badz+ra hA s+ya ud g+ha Ta ya hUM/ de nas
300a2(rgyud): 'dis brtan par bya'o// oM badz+ra dri sh+ya ho// de nas dbang bskur ba sbyin te/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrI/ oM kar+m+ma a b+hi ShiH
300a3(rgyud): aHde nas bum pa'i dbang byin te// oM badz+ra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa o// oM rat+na ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa dzA/ oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrI/ oM kar+m+mi ka la sha/ 
300a4(rgyud): a b+hi Shiny+tsa aHde nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM rat+na mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsi trA tra twA tAM dzAM/ oM badz+ra paT+Ta a ba la ban a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM badz+ra mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsi hUM/ oM
300a5(rgyud): bud+d+ha mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa o// oM rat+na mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM.oM pad+ma mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM kar+m+ma mu dra a b+hi Sheny+tsa a oM badz+ra nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM hU dzA hriHaHo badz+ra
300a6(rgyud): kar+m+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ aHoM badz+ra tsakra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM pre/ oM badz+ra tsakra a d+hi pa d+his+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hUM hUM/ oM o oM/ tra dzA tAM/ hI hI hrI/ a a a/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ta thA ga/ 
300a7(rgyud): ta d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsA o/ oM rat+na d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa dzAM/ oM pad+ma d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hriHoM kar+m+ma d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa aHoM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa o/ oM badz+ra gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ 
300a8(rgyud): oM rat+na guh+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma gu d+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hI/ oM kar+m+ma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa aHoM pradz+nyo pA ya sa ma yog a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM aHde ltar dbang bskur nas tshe 'phel ba'i rig pa sbyin no// 
300b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra a yu She shU a/ 'di'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe dpag med zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis
300b2(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin mdzad pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag pa thal mo sbyar ba brkyang ba gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba bris la mchod pa rnam
300b3(rgyud): pa lngas mchod pa bya ste de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlaso// de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa chen po byas la ba dmar ser gyi mar snod sar par bcug la g.yon pa'i rdo rjes mnan te/ bcom ldan
300b4(rgyud): 'das la rab tu sems shing mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya'o// de nas dri snum zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri'i ngad kyang ldang ngo // dro ba dang du ba dang me yang 'byung ngo // 'od zer gyi snang ba rab tu 'phros
300b5(rgyud): te de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de mar gsar pa/ 'am/ til mar ram/ chu'am/ 'o ma'am/ zho'am/ chang / ngam khrag gam/ zhag gam/ klad pa'am/ sha'am/ gang yang
300b6(rgyud): rung ba dang lhan cig tu rab tu bsgrubs te nang par sngar srung po la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam/ zos na mtshan ma ji lta ba nyi ma ji srid pa'i tsher 'gyur zhing rdo rje sems
300b7(rgyud): dpa'i tsher yang 'gyur ro// tha mas ni dngos grub tha mar 'gyur te 'di la the tshom medo// mtshan ma byung na yang 'jig rten na nad med pa dang yid gzhungs pa dang ldan zhing skad kar dang gnyer ma med
300b8(rgyud): ba dang lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'grub ste the tshom med/ 
301a1(rgyud): do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dung / 
301a2(rgyud): phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad pa 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' gnang bar nu// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' gnang bar nu// rgyal po chen po dag legaso legaso
301a3(rgyud): shod cig dang / ngas rje su yi rang zhing rang gi dam tshig byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ngal bso pos// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing rje su yi rang ste byin
301a4(rgyud): gyis rlabs pas rang gi snying po rang gi snying ka nas phyung la// / oM be/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis de kho na bzhin du rang gis snying po bshad pa oM d+hi/ 
301a5(rgyud): de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa oM gi de na sa klu'i rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis de kho na bzhin du
301a6(rgyud): rang gis snying po bshad pa oM k+Sha/ de nas de dag gis dkyil 'khor bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dkyil 'khor lngas ni rgyan pa ste// de yi dbusu mgon po ni// phyag na rdo rje bgyid
301a7(rgyud): bcas bri// de yi g.yon pa'i log su ni// ngal bso dge ba lag pa na/ be con dang ni ne'u le// rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan// sbom zhing seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs// gser mdog gzi
301a8(rgyud): brjid ldan pa bri// mkhas pas bum pa bzang la sogs// rin chen chogs char 'bab pa bri// mdun du yul 'khor skyong nyid ni// pi wang sgrogs par yang dag brtson// rol cing kha dog
301b1(rgyud): ljang gu nyid// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri// g.yasu dpa' bo lus 'phags po// ral gri phyag na bsnams par bri// nub tu yang ni mig mi bzang / rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin cing mchog/ 
301b2(rgyud): sbrul mgo bdun gyis yongasu bskor// mig ni dmar zhing shin tu 'bur// sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du// sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas sngags pa rang nyid 'jug 'khor lo'i
301b3(rgyud): pag rmya zhes grags pa'i// bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan drang zhing // de nas rgyal po spyan drang ngo // spyan drangs nas ni mkhas pas mchod// mchod yon zhabs bsil cho ga bzhin// de nas slob ma
301b4(rgyud): rgyal rigs sam// rje rigs bram ze la sogs kyang // me tog phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/ sngags shes pa yi sngags 'di dang // rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas gzhugs// oM badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ 
301b5(rgyud): de nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis kyang dor bar bya'o// oM badz+ra pra tits+tsha d+ha ma ho ta ta ma/ gang la lhung ba'i rgyal po de// 'di yis 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// de nas gran gnas
301b6(rgyud): pa yi// bum pa bzhis kyang dbang bskur te// lnga pa phyag na rdo rje'i'o// phyag rgya nyid kyis dbang bskur bya// de la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin// dkyil 'khor bris nas dbang bskur bas// rgyal
301b7(rgyud): po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur// rgyal po yin na chen por 'gyur// 'dzam bu gling dbang dpal dang ldan// gling bzhi pa yi bdag po mchog/ lan bzhir dbang ni bskur ba dang / lan bzhir rab tu
301b8(rgyud): zhugs na ni// de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag/ rang gi bu bzhin brkyang bar bya// bdag cag rgyal chen bzhi pos kyang // 'bangs dang 'khor du bcas pa dang / yul 'khor pho brang bcas pa yi// rgyal
302a1(rgyud): pos rtag tu brkyang bgyi ste// de yi ma rungs pa rnams dang // de yi pha rol sde dang nad// 'chi bdag 'jigs pa mu ge dang // yams dang nyer 'tshe gzhom par bgyi// ngal bso bos ni rgyas
302a2(rgyud): par bgyid// yul 'khor srung gis zhi ba nyid// phyugs dang gnyen bcas dus min pa'i// 'chi bdag lus 'phags po yis 'joms// mig mi bzang gis bde bar byed/ mu ge la sogs rnam
302a3(rgyud): par 'joms// mdor na bdag gis de yi ni// re ba kun dang bsam pa kun// bgyi ste gal te ma nges na// phyag na rdo rje bslus pa yin// de nas phyogs skyong bcus bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 
302a4(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan bdag cag kyang se/ dmas can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du darang rang gi snying po rab tu dbu'o// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams
302a5(rgyud): legaso// leg so// de legs par smros shig/ de nas 'byungango'i bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/ oM I/ oM AM/ oM a/ oM ya/ 
302a6(rgyud): oM ri/ oM be/ oM yaM/ oM ku/ oM aM/ oM bA/ de nas de dag gis dkyil 'khor bshad// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// mgon po dbus de bzhin bzhag/ phyogs skyong rang gi
302a7(rgyud): phyogs kyi char// bzhag bya spyan sngar rnam pa gnyis// nyi ma dang ni phag gi gzugs// ske skyong rnams kyang de bzhi no// de nas de kun spyan drangs la// mchod pa kun gyis mchod pa bya// de nas
302a8(rgyud): rang nyid zhugs nas kyang // slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya zhing // phyogs skyong la sogs sngags bzlas pa'i// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bsku ro// de nas phan par 'dod pa yis// sgrub phyir snying/ 
302b1(rgyud): po'i sbyin par bya// phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas rnams// brtag mi bgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mgu nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang su
302b2(rgyud): zhig rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur bas dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs te dbang bskur ba 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag bcom ldan 'das
302b3(rgyud): bdag ca kri kun nas srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi sde rnams gzhom par bgyi'o// dus dang dusu char dbab par bgyi'o// 'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams
302b4(rgyud): bskyed par bgyi'o// de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes/ bco ma ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gso ral to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po chen po de'i tshe srid
302b5(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dgag/ par bgyi'o// srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po bde/ na bral gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
302b6(rgyud): gis rgyal po chen po de dang // rgyal po chen po'i bu dang / bram ze'am/ rje rigs sam/ mi gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad med pa dang / yi dgas dang / 'dres 'jigs pa med pa dang / srin po/ 
302b7(rgyud): la sogs po'i 'jigs pa med pa dang // dus thams cad du srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po chu bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra
302b8(rgyud): bdag gis dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang / yul thams cing kun nas so sor srung bar bgyi'o// kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// 'bru rnams kyang bskyed par bgyi'o// klu'i nyes pa rnams mi 'byung
303a1(rgyud): / bar bgyi'o// dug dang thog kyang mi 'byung bar bgyi'o// me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad kyang yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// 'jigs pa thams cad kyang so sor dgag par bgyi'o// 
303a2(rgyud): de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du rlung gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i
303a3(rgyud): rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/ 'bru dang me tog dang 'bru thams cad kyang yongasu bskyed par bgyi'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po lus ngan pos/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di
303a4(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad cu dang lhan cig tu mchis te/ stobs dang ldan pas sems can chen po de la dus thams
303a5(rgyud): cad du 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi'o// nor dang 'bru thams cad legs par 'byor par bgyi'o// rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / yul dang / gnas dang / dran
303a6(rgyud): dang / nags kyi gnyin dang / grogs dang / bu dang bu mo dang / chung ma la sogs pa yang srung bar bgyi'o// glang dang / ba dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / lug dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / ra la sogs
303a7(rgyud): pa yang srung bar bgyi'o// de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po de dang / 
303a8(rgyud): rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol tu yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzungs pa dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bkra shis pa dang / chad pa yongasu spang ba
303b1(rgyud): dang drug gnal ba dang / drug gnom pa dang / mtshams bcing bdang / sa gzhi bcings pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / rdo rje rab dang / rdo rje 'phur bus gdang pa dang / rdo rje gur yang
303b2(rgyud): bgos pa thams cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi'o// bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa rnams kyis mtshan mnye bar bstan par bgyi/ dge ba dang dge ba ma yin pa thams cad rmi lam du yang bsgo bar
303b3(rgyud): gyi/ grub pa thams cad la bgegs ma mchis par dngos grub thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas yang na mkha' la spyod cing na mkha' la 'gro ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la
303b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan pa/ dngas bdag gis dus thams cad rgyal po dang / rgyal po dbu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram zebam// rgyal rigs lam
303b5(rgyud): la gnas pa thams cang dang bcas pa mchis te/ srung bdu / bslab pa dang / swa ba kun nas sgrub par bgyi/ bgegs kyi gnas thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// 
303b6(rgyud): nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// dus thams cad phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o// de nas sa'i 'og gi bdag po phag chen pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
303b7(rgyud): bdag gis mi'i bdag po dang / rje'i rigs dang / bram ze dang / rlangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams kyis dus thams cad don bsgrub par bgyi'o// 'jigs pa thams
303b8(rgyud): cad las kyang srung bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang yongasu bskyab par bgyi'o// de nas gza' chen po brgyad 'khor rgyu skar dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
304a1(rgyud): cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi snying po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal na de la bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs du gsol/ leg so leg so// ngas byin gyis
304a2(rgyud): brlabs kyis gza' chen po rnams shod cig/ de nas nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ oM a/ oM so// oM aM/ oM bu/ oMH
304a3(rgyud): shu/ oM sa/ oM rA/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dbusu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugasu bri'o// mtha' rnamasu ni rgya mtsho
304a4(rgyud): chen po bzhi bri'o// de yi mdun du babasangs// zla ba'i rgyab tu bri bar bya// g.ya su phur bu bri bya zhi// g.yon du lhag pa bri bar bya// me yi gnasu mig dmar nyid// rlung gi phyogasu nyi
304a5(rgyud): ma ste// dbang ldan du ni spen pa nyid// srin po'i phyogasu skrag can bri/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu// rgyu skar tha/ mas cad bri bar bya// sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams// khros
304a6(rgyud): pa'i yid du bri bar bya// rdo rje 'dzin pas 'jug bya ste// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas// thams cad kyang ni spyan drang ngo // de nas slob ma rnams gzhug ste// oM badz+ra ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gra ha
304a7(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM// oM badz+ra gra ha pra tits+tshahUM// de nas gza' brgyad sngags ni bsngags pa yis// bum pa brgyad po rnams kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas rdo rje phyag rgyas dbang bskur te// de nas gza'
304a8(rgyud): rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// de nas gza' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad
304b1(rgyud): kyis rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po'i bu la kun tu dus thams cad du// de kho na bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o// de nas rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam rnam so// ches
304b2(rgyud): dang / sbyor ba dang / khyim dang / dus sbyor dang / mjug pod la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das pa/ 
304b3(rgyud): cag gos kyang dus thams cad du sems can chen po'i bka' mi bcag cing dpon po bzhin du bskyang par bgyi'o// grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i/ 
304b4(rgyud): pho brang gi gnas thams cad so sor bskyab par bgyi'o// 2 'jigs pa chen po 'thung ba'i tshen yang des bdag cag ma chod na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'jigs pa de mi 'byung ngo // 
304b5(rgyud): de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phud ces bya ba'i sgras bcom/ ldan 'das mnyes par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag rnams kyis gsang ba'i snying
304b6(rgyud): po rnams 'bul lo// klu chen po rnams leg so leg so// gsang ba'i snying po rnams phul cig/ de nas de dag mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol
304b7(rgyud): to// oM phu/ oM phu/ oM phu/ oM phu/ oM phreM/ oM pheM/ oM po/ oM pheM// de nas de dag gis dkyil 'khor bshad de// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// kha dog dkar po legs par bri// 
304b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de yi dbus bzhugs pa// phyag na rdo rje rab tu nag/ sbrul mgo mtha' yas gdengs ka mdun// ltos 'gro chen po bsdigs pa bri/ mtha' yas 'jog po de bzhin
305a1(rgyud): / du// stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang // nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang // pad+ma chu bdag de bzhin du// mdor na 'dab ma re re la// de dag sbrul mgo 'bar 'bri// sbrul mgo bdun
305a2(rgyud): bdun chung ma yi// mgul nas 'khyud dang bcas pa bri// bum pa brgyad rnams bzhag bya ste// gtor ma lha bshos mdzes pa dang // mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas// bcos pa'i dbye ba
305a3(rgyud): rnams kyang ngo // rdo rje'i bdag nyid bzhugs pa ni// sbrul mgos sbrul mgo can rnams dgug/ phud ces bya ba lhan cig ste// dza hUM baM hoHzhes brjod do// de nas rgyal po'am rgyal rigs
305a4(rgyud): ni/ de dag thams cad bcug nasu// dug gi nyes skyon pas/ dal ba'i phyir// bud ces bya bas dbang bskuro// de nas ming tsam bzung bas kyang / klu rnams de dag thams cad
305a5(rgyud): 'grub// de nas de dag kun mgu nas// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshol te/ spyan sngar thal mo sbyar 'khod nas// / smon lam rab tu 'debs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'dra
305a6(rgyud): bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba gang dag dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de dag bslus par gyur na de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid la smras
305a7(rgyud): par gyur cig/ de'i tshe bdag bye tshan gyis bsregs par gyur cig/ rdo rje kun tu 'bar bas bdag cag gi mgo 'gems par gyur cig/ rtag par dus thams cad du sems can tshe/ 
305a8(rgyud): bode srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// gzi byin chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus bskyed par bgyi'o// de'i dug rnas dugamatho par bgyi'o// dus dang dus char dbab par 'argyas
305b1(rgyud): me tog thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi g.yul thams cad la dus dang dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par bgyi'o// 'jig rten pa thams cad bskyed par bgyi'o// rgyal bI
305b2(rgyud): bka' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' rab tu sgrub par bgyi'o// de nas sgrub pa bshad de// lha rdzas 'od 'phro dkar po can// klu rnams 'dud pas gnas pa yi/ rdo rje 'dzin gtso bsams
305b3(rgyud): nas ni/ phud ces bya ba 'bum du bzlas// de nas dug gis zin pa la// bud ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// lha rdzas 'od zer phreng ba 'khrigs// bsams nas de la phung yig bsam// lag
305b4(rgyud): basbrul mgo zhagaso 'dra dang // phud kyis rlung gi lpags pa sha // rus gnas phud kyi rnam pa'i dug/ mtha' dag drangs tre gso bar bya// de nas las rnams kun byed cing // dug
305b5(rgyud): rims dug sbyar la sogs pa/ khu tshur gyis kyang kun sel/ na// sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos// de nas lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po 'jigs byed chen po'i
305b6(rgyud): ma mo chen mo brgyad kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jigs pa dang ma mo rnams kyis 'jigs
305b7(rgyud): pas lha dang klu la sogs pa kun tu skrag rnam par skrag te kha bub tu 'gyel nas gos dang bral te/ sems stor nas kun tu 'phyan pa dag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bdag cag gi snying
305b8(rgyud): po 'bul bar tshal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de legs par byin gyis brlab du gsol// 'jigs byed chen po leg so leg so// rab tu 'jigs par byed pas rang nyid dang lha'i bu mo thams
306a1(rgyud): cad kyi snying po rnams shog cig/ de nas 'jigs byed chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to// oM b+hai ra ba be ra swA hA/ oM b+ha swA hA/ oM b+hi swAhA/ oM b+h+ya
306a2(rgyud): swA hA/ oM b+he swA hA/ oM b+hai swA hA/ oM b+hau swAhA/ oM b+haM swAhA/ oM b+haHswA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po ni// brgyad po de dag gdam ngag nyan// de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ 
306a3(rgyud): 'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad bri// dbusu phyag na rdo rje ni// khro bo chen po 'jig rten gsum// rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya gzhag/ de yi zhags 'og ma rungs pa// 'jigs byang rnams kyi bdag po
306a4(rgyud): che// 'jigs byed ma dang bcas pa bri// rtsibs kyi nang rnams thams cad du// gzhan yang 'jigs byed brgyad po ni// / ma mo rnams dang ldan pa ni// khros pa'i bzhin dang yid khros
306a5(rgyud): par// ci bde bar ni bri bar bya// 'dir ni sgo sgor de bzhin du/ sgo ba shin tu khros ldan bri// de nas lcags kyu la sog sa pas// bkug ste mgo bo'i thod pa ni// khrag gis gang ba/ 
306a6(rgyud): mchod na su// sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang // snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang // mgo tha~Md mgo yi dum bu dang // khrag gam chang bkang bum pa brgyad// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bzhag par bya// 
306a7(rgyud): de nas 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal// mchog gis slob ma rnams gzhug bya// thod pa dang ni bum pa yang // brgyad po rnams kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas las rnams sbyin par bya// ma mo'i khyim
306a8(rgyud): mam mtshan gcig par// 'jig rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog/ tshul bzhin du ni mchod byas nas// 'bum phrag bzhir ni bzlas par bya// de nas 'jigs par byed pa'i sgras// bdag nyid chen
306b1(rgyud): bos thos gyur te// mi 'jigs pa ni thod pa ru// khrag mchog bkang ba'i arga dbul// de nas khro bo 'jigs byed pa// ma rungs yid can ma mo ni// tshogs kyis bskor cing 'jigs byed ni/ rgyan
306b2(rgyud): kyis bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur// de mthong 'jigs pa med byas la// hUM zhes bya ba dran byed cing // sha'am yang na chang mchog gis// thod pa bkang ste dbul bar bya// de nas 'jigs byed ma
306b3(rgyud): rungs 'joms// mgu zhing rab tu 'grub gyur nas// ci 'dod smos shig zhes bya 'o// mgu ba'i yid kyis de sbyin byed// sa rnams sbyin pa ma gtogs par// ro dang bcud len rdzas dang ni// ral
306b4(rgyud): gri 'khor lo rtse gsum dang // mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og da dang // gling dang gling bzhi'i rgyal srid dang / brgya byin nyid dang gnod sbyin dbang // srin po nyid dang rig 'dzin nyid// rig
306b5(rgyud): 'dzin 'khor lo bsgyur ba nyid// 'jig rten gsum gyi bad ga po nyid// bka' nyan nyid kyang rang nyid dam// ma mo'i/ tshogs rnams ster bar 'gyur// dngos grub gang yang rung
306b6(rgyud): ba ni// ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya// hUM gis rnam par mngon phyogs shing // byin nas dgod cing 'gro bar byed// skrag na de ma thag tu gsod// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams
306b7(rgyud): kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnang na rang gi rtog pa bshad par 'tshal
