306b8(rgyud): gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te byin gyis brlab par gsol// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyi rang rang gi snying po rnams bshad// o oM// 
307a1(rgyud): oM ge oM ru/ oM i/ oM kaM/ oM ga/ oM bri/ oM ka/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// dbusu 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba// de

307a3(rgyud): thogs bri// sgo skyong rang bzhin 'dir de rnams// chung ma rang gi dkyil 'khor du// bum pa bum pa bkang ba yang // phyi rol dkyil 'khor du ni bzhag/ stobs bzang la sogs mthu chen
307a4(rgyud): yang // de nas 'jug bya lha rnams yin// mkhas pas ku ngan nas spyan drang zhing // dzaHhUM baM hos lha thams cad/ pho brang dam par 'jug par mdzod// de nas de rnams gshegs
307a5(rgyud): bltas nas// dga' ba chen po mchod par bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// phyag rgya slob mo rnams gzhug ste// oM pra tits+tsha d+ha ma hA satwa badz+ra d+ha ra Adz+nyA ya hU ha ha ha ha ho/ 
307a6(rgyud): me tog ji lta bzhin du dor// mig phye nas ni bstan par bya// de nas mngon par bsngags pa yi// bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur ro// de nas lha rnams gang 'dod pa// dngos grub rab tu sbyin

307b1(rgyud): nam nas byed na //  nas khyod kyi 'dod pam// ji lta ba shing ban pa ni// sbyin zhes nges pa go ba byed// nga pocur du sems te spos// gang kya mchog na khyong sa sbyir/ nas d+hA/ 
307b2(rgyud): shes so grub dang / mchog gi lnga la gsol ba ga du// lnga rdzas bcu dang btsud len dang // mi snang bdang mkha' 'gro dang // la bu rgyal srid sa la sogs// yid 'a tshad med ga so
307b3(rgyud): bgadang// de nas dbang drug chen po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'dus pa'i
307b4(rgyud): 'khor du zhugs pa de dag gi bcom ldan 'das bdag ca dag lha rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang // // mtho ris kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o// bde 'gro'i lam
307b5(rgyud): bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o// sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam bstan par bgyi 'o// rnam par 'byed pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// nges par
307b6(rgyud): 'byung ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// spong ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// nyon mongs pa med pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas nyid 'grub
307b7(rgyud): ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// dus thams cad du 'jigs
307b8(rgyud): pa thams cad las srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams srung bar bgyi'o// yul dang phyogs
308a1(rgyud): // dang grong khyer rnams kyang srung bar bgyi'o// rgyal po yang brtsal bar bgyi'o// rgyal po thob pa'i rgyal po che bar bgyi'o// gling gcig dang / gling gnyis dang / gling gsum dang /

308a3(rgyud): chen po nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad// de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag g.yo/ 
308a4(rgyud): rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ yang dag par rab tu 'gul/ 'bar rab tu 'bar/ yang dag par rab tu 'bar/ dga' rab tu dga'/ 
308a5(rgyud): yang dag par rab tu dga'/ rtse rab tu rtse yang dag par rab tu rtse zhing ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yang dag par rab tu mthong ngo // de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams
308a6(rgyud): shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di'i rgyu gang lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra/ 
308a7(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de'i phyir 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu lung bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na
308a8(rgyud): rdo rjes lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams gang sngon sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa 'chi dag/ 
308b1(rgyud): bar byed pa'i rig pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'joms par byed pa'i rig pa'i sngags gzi brjid chen po nyon cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la tshangs pa la sogs/ 
308b2(rgyud): ba'i lha rnams kun tu dga' zhing baspu langs shing phyag 'tshal nas leg so zhes bya ba rab tu phul te/ bcom ldan 'das legaso leg so// rdo rje 'dzin pa legaso leg so// gang gi tshe
308b3(rgyud): thung ba'i sems can rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag gis zin pa rnams dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par grol ba dang / ngan song du skyes pa'i sems
308b4(rgyud): can rnams ngan song las ji ltar grol ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa'i sems can rnams bde ba'i thabs kyis 'khor ba la rgyab kyi sa phyogs par 'gyur zhing
308b5(rgyud): myur ba nyid du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba gzi brjid che ba pha rol gnon pa'i rig pa bshad
308b6(rgyud): du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig
308b7(rgyud): pa 'di rang gi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye ri mi ta A yuHpU N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa rtsi te swA hA// snying po'i rig pa'o// oM badz+ri swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM
308b8(rgyud): b+h+rUM sA hA/ snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM drA swAhA// snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i rig pa'o// oM tAM swA hA/ snying po dam pa'o// oM hrI swA hA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// de nas de dag gi/ 
309a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ba shad/ dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi par byas la de'i dbus de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzi brjid kyi rnal
309a2(rgyud): po zhes bya ba bzhag ste/ b+hU zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// de spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje ste// badz+ri zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// g.yon du ni khro bo ste/ kr-i zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// g.ya su na mkha'i snying po ste/ dzA zhes
309a3(rgyud): bya ba'i snying po'o// rgyab tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba ste/ hrIHzhes bya ba'i snying po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la reg par bri'o// 
309a4(rgyud): bum pa lnga dang brgyad 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags kyis ba tu ba la bzhago/ las thams cad pas mngon par bsngags dpa yang ngo // bdug pa la sogs bzhago// mchod pa'i dang po can sgo
309a5(rgyud): skyong thams cad nyid kyang ngo // de nas sngags pa yang dag bar 'jug pa'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa da pa sras da nga bcas pa 'khor gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba rig pa dang lhan cig
309a6(rgyud): spyan drang ngo // rig pa yang bde bar gshegs pa'i g.yon gyi log su bri'o// de nas bdag nyid dbang bskur ste// skyil mo krung gi 'dug la stong phrag brgyar bzla so// de bzhin gshegs pa
309a7(rgyud): mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing rdo rje 'dzin pa'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gam/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog so sor thob bo// gang gi tshe mnyam par gzhag pa de'i tshe/ 
309a8(rgyud): yid kyis las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// de nas slongam rnams bzhug ste rdo rje 'dzin po'i phyag rgyas nga rgyal 'di skyed par bya ste/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ bi shwa d+ha ra/ ta
309b1(rgyud): gtas ma ya an ti kra ma/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya d+hA ra ko/ ho zhes pa'o// de nas 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra tits+tsha ho sa ma ya ste// de nas dreng bder gol bcings la dang
309b2(rgyud): bskur/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya hUM b+h+rUM/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsahUM b+h+rUM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM dzAM/ oM badz+ra pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM trAMHoM kar+m+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsahUM aHde nas dam tshig dang / 
309b3(rgyud): bki'i dbang bskur ba sbyin no// de la dam tshig ni/ dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems// bla ma dam pa yong mi spang / srog chags rnams ni bsad mi bya// ma byin par yang mi blang nyid// 
309b4(rgyud): brdzun yang smra bar mi bya'o// pha rol bud med spyad mi bya// / bla ma smad par mi bya zhing // grib ma'ang bgom par mi bya'o// slob dpon ma yin mi bzung zhing // mtshan ma slob dpon
309b5(rgyud): spangs pa yang // sngags dang phyag rgya mi snad de// lha ni mas la yang gal zhig/ gal te rmongs pas smad na ni/ nad kyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// mchod snying lha yi grib ma
309b6(rgyud): dang / 'jig rten 'jig rten los 'das pa'i// phyag rgya yi ge mtshan ma yang // gom pas bgom par mi bya'o// blun po dkon mchog gsum sogs dang // sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed
309b7(rgyud): dang // bla ma smod la brtson pa rnams// mkhas pas bsgrims te bsad par bya// chos mi ldan dang sreg pa dag/ rtag tu sems can gnod brtson dang // dam tshig sdang rnams snying brtse bas// / 
309b8(rgyud): sngags pas sngags kyis gzhom par bya// 'jungs pa'i nor yang yang dag blang // sems can sdug bsngal can la sbyin// bla ma mchod pa'i rgyu mtshan dang // de bzhin dam tshig sgrub pa dag
310a1(rgyud): 'khor don dang rgyal sras la// mchod pa'i don phyir bsams pa yis// nor 'phrog 'jungs pa'i nor yang 'ong // sems can rnams la phan dga' bas// dam tshig dang ni bla mi'i
310a2(rgyud): rdzas// sems can rnams kyi srog srung phyir// rtag tu brdzun ni smra bar bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang // dam tshig rnams ni srung ba dang // sngags rig pa yis sgrub pa'i phyir// gzhan
310a3(rgyud): gyi bud med kyang sten bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug pas// thams cad spyod cing kun byas kyang // 'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur na// snying rje ldan pas smos ci dgos// de nas 'dis bka'
310a4(rgyud): yi dbang bskur ro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA dad s+ya mi gr-ih+na badz+ra su sid d+ha ye/ oM badz+ra tiSh+Tha tsu/ 'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la phrin las kyi dbang bskur sbyin no// oM sarba kar+m+ma Ni
310a5(rgyud): ku ru bud d+ha na hUM/ de nas bla ma bla mar bya ba'i phyir// khyod kyi sa lus mchog sbyin par bya// rdzas dang nor dang 'bru rnam sa dang // rta dang gzhon pa nyid dang ni// bran gyi mchog dang
310a6(rgyud): khang pa dang // rgyal srid dbang phyug de bzhin to// bu dang bu mo chu ma dang // ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang // gzhan yang ci bzhed thams cad ni// phan pa'i bsam pas bla ma dbul// de nas dngos grub sangs
310a7(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sgrub dang gzhan yang ni// 'jig rten pa yi mthu chen rnams// ji ltar 'dod pas gsol ba gdab// de nas bu la phan pa'i phyir// sngags rig ser sna med sems
310a8(rgyud): dang // dad pas dad pa'i sems ldan pa// dngos grub rnams ni sbyin par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med par ni// sems kyis bsgom par byas nas kyang // a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bas/ 
310b1(rgyud): rang gi sa bon de dbu su// bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya yang // bsam bzhin de bzhin de nyid kyang // lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du// sgrub pa po yis yongasu bsgyur// de nas rang gi sa bon dang / phyag
310b2(rgyud): rgyas phyag rgya de byin rlab// gong 'og go rims ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro// de ltar nga rgyal bskyed nas ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs kyang 'gru
310b3(rgyud): 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal
310b4(rgyud): po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / rgyal ri/ dgas dang / bram ze dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gzhan yang dman pa phyag dar ba dang / mtha' 'khob
310b5(rgyud): kyi skye bo'i gnas kyi rigasu skyes pa dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bur 'a gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa la
310b6(rgyud): sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni leg so leg so// lha'i tshogs rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs shing dbang
310b7(rgyud): bskur ba dang / bris pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa nyon cig/ lha'i bu rnams mdor na nga la yang de'i phan
310b8(rgyud): yon bshad par spro bar med de/ gang nga la bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya phrag stong du mar bsgyur yang grangasu yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang mi bzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
311a1(rgyud): / cad la bsod nams kyi phung po'i bar gyis kyang mi bzod do// gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ngo ma
311a2(rgyud): che'o// rdo rje'i 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs par zhugs spro'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o// de nas lha de dag
311a3(rgyud): gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / 
311a4(rgyud): dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song rnamasu skyes pad dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag gi rangs ji ltar bsgrub par bya// kye lha'i bu dag de dge ni dkyil 'khor
311a5(rgyud): 'di nyid du chug cig/ bcug nas kyang dbang bskur cig/ chos kyi yi ge yang zlo su chug shig/ de nas sems can de dag che ring bar 'gyur/ bsod nams dang bral ba
311a6(rgyud): bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur/ ngan song las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu rnams gang ngan song du skyes pa de dag gi ming la dbang bskur ba mdzod cig/ gzugs brnyan la yang
311a7(rgyud): dbang bskur bar byos shig/ rang gi lha'i sku la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig/ tha na de dang rigs 'thun pa dang / de'i bu dang de dang rus 'thun pa dang / de'i ming 'dzin pa dang / bran la yang
311a8(rgyud): dbang bskur cig/ zhag bdun lan bdun dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur bas nges par ngan song gi sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyuraro// lha'i bu rnams de'i ming nas smos te/ 
311b1(rgyud): 'bum phrag gnyis dang / 'bum phrag gsum dang / 'dum phrag bzhi dang / 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bar du bzlas na/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur na sdig pa chung
311b2(rgyud): du byas pa rnams lta ci smos/ lha'i bu rnams zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po tha ma dang / bar ma dang / mchog khru gang dang / khru do'am/ khru bzhi pa byas nas/ de'i ming gis nyungs kar dkar po rnams brgya drag
311b3(rgyud): sdong du bsregs te ngan song kun las thar bar 'gyur ro// de'i sha dang / rus pa dang / skra dang thal ba la sogs pa la chog de nyid kyis sdig pa kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de yi dbus
311b4(rgyud): 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad dkar po 'od zer 'bar/ 'dar yug rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ 'od zer dkar po dang ldan bri/ de na// sa sna tshogs rdo rje bya// rdo rje rin chen chu skyes mchog de nas
311b5(rgyud): sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs bya// phyi rol rdo rje rigs rnams kyi// phyag rgya rnams ni phyi rol bri/ gza' dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang // de ltar 'jig
311b6(rgyud): rten 'khor rnams kyang // gtso bo'i ri mo lugs ma dang // rdo rje can dang lhan cig bzhag/ bum pa bum pa gang ba dang // gtor ma lta ba shos shin tu dkar// mdor na thig ni btab nas
311b7(rgyud): kyang // cho ga bzhin du dri bar bya// dkar po'i gos ni gyon nasu// sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas// ngan song 'gro bar gnas pa yi// sems can de rjes dran byed cing / sdig pa
311b8(rgyud): sgrib bzhi ba'i phyir// rgyud dag pa yi sbyin sreg ni// mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas// 'bras yos nyung kar bsres pa dang // de yi rus pa sha la sogs// yang na ming tsam gyis kyang ni// de na/ 
312a1(rgyud): bde 'gror skyes nas su// mkhas pas rgyas par bya ba ni// khru do pa 'am khru bzhi pa// de bzhin mchog ni khru brgyad par// byas nas thab khung khru bzhi pa/ kun tu mun ran dang / 
312a2(rgyud): ldan pa// de dbus pad+ma rin chen can// 'od zer ser po can bri zhing // khor yug tu ni rin chen dang // mu ran la ni chu skyes bri// phyi rol tu ni rigs lnga yi// dbye bas phyag rgya bri bar bya// 
312a3(rgyud): de bzhin phyi yi lha rnams dang // lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya// na gza' ser po gyon byas nas// mtho ris gnas pa rjes dran zhing // de la phan phyir rgyas pa yi// don du rgyas pa'i las
312a4(rgyud): byas nas// lus can de yi tshe dang dpal// gzi brjid/ dal pa bzang po 'phel// de nas de la phan pa yi// dbang du dbya ba'i las bya ste// thab khung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ga khru
312a5(rgyud): gang pa'am khru do pa// khru bzhi byas la de dbu su// chu skye sa dmar po yang dag bri/ de yi dbu su mda' bcas pa'i/ gzhu nyid kyang ni bri bar bya// khor yug tu ni mngar ba yi// 
312a6(rgyud): gzhu ni kha dog dmar po bri// sngags 'dzin pa yis rtag par yang // phyi rol de yi lha yi bya// sems can de ni dran byas la// na gza' dmar po rgyan pa yi// me tog dmar zhing pad+ma yang // 'bras
312a7(rgyud): bud mar dang khams bcas pa// mar dang gur gum bsres pa dang // tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma dang // sbyin sreg byas nas lha la sogs// thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur// de yi gdon rnams
312a8(rgyud): rnam gzhom phyir// mngon spyod yang dag brtsom par bya// khru do phyed bcas khru gsum mam// de bzhin mchog ni khru dgu pa// zur gsum dang ni ldan par bya// dbus rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ 
312b1(rgyud): gsum pa yis mu ran bya// sna tshogs rdo rje yang byas la// dajug pa mgo dang rtse gsum rnams// rdo rje dgras rtse gcig gis// phyi rol du yang mtshan par bya// rig pa gsum pa sngar bzhin
312b2(rgyud): rgyun dbum pa gtor ma bum pa yang // zhal zas mang po bzhag par bya// sha dang khrag gi bkang ba yi// bod pa rnams kyang kun tu yang // de nas gos nag dgos shing khros// rang nyid 'jig
312b3(rgyud): rten gsum rnam rgyal// lus can de yi sdig la sogs// de nas de yi sdig bcom zhing // bgegs dang bral te ci bde bar// mtho ris 'jig rten mi rnams nyid// ji snyed khams gsum 'jig
312b4(rgyud): rten spyod// myur du go rims 'di nyid kyis// tshe 'dir gnas rapa rnams la bya// de nas gang gi phyir byas pa// de yi phyir ni de bzhin 'gyur// gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kyang / snga
312b5(rgyud): mji bzhin de bzhin bya// de ni sems can rnams la yang nga// myur du bde skyid 'grub par 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams yang dag par dga' bas bcom
312b6(rgyud): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang phan yon dang bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di 'dri ba
312b7(rgyud): dang 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du yongasu bskyang bar bgyi ste/ yang ji ltar bshad pa ma tshang ba med par bgyid pa
312b8(rgyud): lta ci smos// gang yang rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu dang rgyal po'i blon po ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags rjesu slob pa de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi'o// yul dang phyogs dang skye bo'i gnas dang 'khor gyi sku
313a1(rgyud): / be'i lo thog la sogs pa yang srung bar bgyi'o// nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor par bgyi'o// bud med dang skyes pa dang / khye'u dang bu mo rnams phun sum tshogs par yang bgyi'o// 
313a2(rgyud): 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang bde bar bgyi'o// gang zhig brtags pa'i rgyal po 'di la dad pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la brtags te grong dang grong khyer la sogs par 'jug pa
313a3(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis bsdu bar yang bgyi'o// glang po che'i steng du bzhag la grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad du bskor bar bya ste/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar
313a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyi das tshul lam bu'i tshul du gnas pa shes par bgyi'o// gang na 'di rab tu spyod bde na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
313a5(rgyud): rang nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skurabazhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po re ba thams cad yongasu
313a6(rgyud): skong ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po'i gzugasu bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du gyur pa 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ mchod par bgyi phag 'tshal bar bgyi'o// kun
313a7(rgyud): tu srung bar bgyi'o// gang yang brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di rab tu spyod pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chen po la bdag cog tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis g.yog bgyi'o// bran gyi tshul du
313a8(rgyud): gnas par bgyi'o// mngag gzhugs pa nyid du gnas par bgyi'o// bsgo ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o// phan pa dang bde ba thams cad dngos grub stsal bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das
313b1(rgyud): 'dor na de'i rkang pa'i rdul mgo bos gzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o// do phyi bzhin du rjesu 'brang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs
313b2(rgyud): tedabang bskur ba de kho bo cag gis mnga' bdag tu 'tshal bar bgyi'o// phyag na rdo rjer 'tshal bar bgyi'o// rdo rje sems dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bde ba chen po kun tu bzang ngo / 
313b3(rgyud): lags pa 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsa
313b4(rgyud): to// tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams gang chos la rim grog cig gnyis byas pas de ltar yang dag pa'i dam bca' ni legaso legs par bsgrubs shig/ de nas bcom ldan
313b5(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang rig pa dang / snying po than/ sa cad brtan par bya ba'i phyir rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ oM b+huM dru badz+ra pA Ni dri b+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM hUM AHoM badz+ra hU pha
313b6(rgyud): oM dr-i D+ha badz+ra hUM/ oM badz+ra hUM sa/ oM badz+ra hUM aHde nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// dbusu rdo rje bri bar bya// yang ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// 
313b7(rgyud): kun tu bzang po bde ba che// spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje nyid// g.yasu phyag na rin chen spyan// phyag na pad+ma nub phyogs bri// byang du phyag na sna tshogs bri// phyi rol du ni zlum por bskor// sangs rgyas
313b8(rgyud): thams cad dgod par bya// de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams// go rims bzhin du bri bar bya// de yi phyi rol sems dpa'o yang // byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri// de phyir de bzhin dge
314a1(rgyud): slong ni/ kun dga' bo sogs thub pa bri// rang gi chung ma bus bskor ba'i// tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri// bza' dang rgyu skar nyi ma dang // rgyal po bzhi po rnams dang ni/ phyogs
314a2(rgyud): skyong 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni yang dag bri// phyi rol du ni dmyal ba sogs// klu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i dpe// sgo dang sgor ni de bzhin du// sgo skyong stobs kyis dam pa rnam
314a3(rgyud): dkar po 'dod pa'i nyi ma la// rab tu 'bad pas dkyil 'khor bri// gang bsngags nag po'i phyogs la yang // dkyil 'khor 'gal ba ma yin no// lnga pa de rjes bdun pa dang // nya gang ba ni khyad
314a4(rgyud): par ni// bsngags de phyag na pad+ma yi// dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga la'o// gang yang drag po'i las rnams la// de ni nag po la yang bre// khro bo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang // zla
314a5(rgyud): ba nya ba khyad par du// rgyal ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor po snga gas/ gzhan yang rang gis 'dus byas pa'i// dkyil 'khor la brtson gdab ba zhing / shar nas 'char ba'i
314a6(rgyud): dbang bya ste// phyogs kyi cha ni brtag par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni// yid kyis yongasu brtag par bya// sngags dang rgyud ni dang por byas// 'jam zhing sngags gzugs dge zhing
314a7(rgyud): zhi/ rjes 'thun rang gi slong nyid kyi// slob ma lhan cig tsam gyis spyad// de nas nang par rab sngar langs// logs bkrus gos dkar 'chang zhing gtsang // blo ldan bla ma slob mar bcas/ 
314a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor drung du kun nas 'gro// dkyil 'khor phyogs nyid shin tu yang // nye bar byugs shing legs par mnyes// khro bo chen po bzlas pa yi// dri yi chu yis bsams pa yis// dbusu
314b1(rgyud): rigs rnams snying po yis// lhag par gnas par bya ba nyid// dkyil 'khor gyi ni gtso bo yi// sngags kyi las rnams thams cad bya// sa la sor ni bcu gnyis pa'i// dkyil 'khor dul
314b2(rgyud): byas nasu// dkyil 'khor rig pas lan bdun du// lhag pa de nas bzlas par bya// de rjes lha rnams nyid kyi yang // byang chub chen po zhes bya ba'i// snying pos skal pa ji lta bar// dri dang me tog
314b3(rgyud): sogs mchod pa// byas nas gtor ma dbul bya zhing // mngon par bsngags pa'i spos kyang ngo // de nas tsan dan la sogs pa// bsres pa'i tshul mngon par bsngags// de la dbul ba'i me tog
314b4(rgyud): dang // bdug pa la yang cho ga bzhin// so shIng u dum par deng / a shwad tha sogs rma med cing // shin tu braman desgom pa min// sor mo bcu gnyis tshad tsam ni/ dI yi chu
314b5(rgyud): yis rab bskus shing // me tog phreng ba yis kyang bcing sa/ dri bzang la sogs byugs shing bdug/ lag pa sa reg na snying po ni// mang po yang ni bzlas bya zhing / rigs
314b6(rgyud): nyid kyi ni lan bdun nam// slob ma rnams kyi tshad gzhal bar// so zhing la sogs yang dag gzung // gcig la sogs pas go rims bzhin// rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya// de nas
314b7(rgyud): mkhas pas bdag nyid kyis// slob ma srung ba brtan byas nas// sbyin sregs las ni mar blugs pa'i// yam shing rnams ni mar dang bcas// sbrang dri mar dang bsres pa dang / mar gyi
314b8(rgyud): bsregs thugs bsrag bya zhing // zho zan gyi yang sbyin pasregs bya// dang por bgegs ni ni byi'i phyir// de nas thugs kyi rjes 'dzin phyir/ de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg zhing / sdig bzhi
315a1(rgyud): / bya phyir ram// de nas slob ma rnams brtags nas// cho ga yi ni lhag gnas bya// de yis ji ltar nus pa yis// de bzhin sdom pa bzung bar bya// de rnams cho ga 'di yin te/ 
315a2(rgyud): zhing dkar ba'i gos can ni// mdun du bltas te 'dug pa la// lhag par gnas par brtsam par bya// bla mas dang por skyabs gsum sbyin// de yi rjes la byang chub sems// ma skyes pa ni bskyed bya/ 
315a3(rgyud): zhing bskyed pa slar yang rjes dran gyi/ de nas khro bo mngon bzlas pa'i// chu yis spyi bor gsang gtor bya// mgo bor kun tu reg nas ni// mnyam par gzhag par lan bdun bzlas// rig pa'i rgyal po'i
315a4(rgyud): snying po ni lag pas dri bzang spags pa la// 'jigs pa bzlog la mkhas pa yis// lan bdun rtag tu bzlas par bya// 'khor los sgyur ba rgyal po yis// rig pa'i rgyal po yig
315a5(rgyud): gcig/ rta 'grin chu skyes rigs la ni// rig pa'i rgyal po/ yi ge bcu// suM b+ha zhes bya rdo rje rigs// rigs pa'i rgya/ la po rdzu 'phrul tshe// yi ge hUM bzhi rnams dang ldan// las kun ra
315a6(rgyud): tu spros pa la'o// rigs gsum rnams la thun mong ba// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil b+ha nyid// bgegs kun rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir/ gsang ba pa yi bdag po gsungs// las ni thams cad pa yi
315a7(rgyud): sngags// spyi bor reg cing bzlas de nas// gsang gtor yang bya de nyid kyis// bdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya// dbang bskur ba ni bum pa bcas// 'bru la sogs pa thams cad ldan// cung zad cung
315a8(rgyud): zad gang du blugs// rig pa'i rgyal pos mngon par bsngags// cho ga bzhin du lhag gnas bya// dri yi chu yis mchod yon sbyin// me tog kyang ni gzhug par bya// gdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya// dbang
315b1(rgyud): bskur ba ni bum pa bcas// mkhas pas yang dag yongasu bzlas// de yis dbang bskur bya ba yin// slar yang bzlas pa dkyil 'khor du// slob ma dam tshig can rnams ni// thal mo sbyar zhing mngon
315b2(rgyud): phyogs la// de nas so shing sbyin par bya// slob ma rnams ni go rims bzhin// gzung shing shar du kha bltas te// phyi rol nyid du so shing bca'// mags par ni mchos na su// logs ma yin par
315b3(rgyud): dor bya ste// so shing mdun du dor byas pa// gang tshe mdun du rtse mo lhung // de tshe dngos grub mchog shes bya// gang zhig steng du bltas pa yang // de bzhin shar du rtse mo bstan// dngos grub 'bring du yongasu grags// 
315b4(rgyud): byang du bltas na thang ka nyid// rig pa'i dngos grub 'jig rten dpa// so shing dor ba brgyal lam du/ gang tshe 'og tu kha blta/ das pa// de tshe sa 'og dngos grub ni// 'byung ba 'di la the tshom med/ 
315b5(rgyud): slob ma nye bar reg pa ni// snga ma bzhin du bzung byas la// tham sa cad las byed sngags kyis ni// bla mas dri bzang chu ste na no// re re la yang btung ba'i phyir/ khyor ba gsum ni sbyin par bya/ 
315b6(rgyud): de nas blo ldan langs nas su// 'di dag kun tu spyad par bya// de nas mchod pa yang byas nas// lag pas spos ni bteg na su// blo ldan gus pas lha rnams la// gsol ba gdab cing gus gnas bya/ 
315b7(rgyud): dang por sngags ni bstan gsan dbab// de yi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa// de yis rim pa'i sbyin pa yis// lha rnams spyan 'dren pa yin no// bcom ldan che ge mo zhes bya/ rig pa'i rgyal po khyo/ 
315b8(rgyud): la 'dud na slob ma rnams la rtse phyir dang / khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rje yi// bdag nyid kyang ni bri bar 'tshal/ bcom ldan de ni bdag gus la/ bka' dran
316a1(rgyud): mdzad pa rigs lag so// 'jig rten mgon po brtse ba can// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dgra bcom gang gzhan sngags kyi lha// lha dang 'jig rten skyong rnams dang / 'byung po rdzu
316a2(rgyud): 'phrul che gang dang // sangs rgyas bstan la mngon dga' rnams// bdag la yang dag dgongasu gsol// che ge mo zhes bya ba dang // che ge mo yi dkyil 'khor ni// rang nyid 'byung bar bgyid par 'tshal
316a3(rgyud): ji ltar gus pa'i nyer spyod kyis// slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni// rje su brtse bas nyer bzung nas// dkyil 'khor dang bcas thams cad ni// nye bar byon par mdzad par rigs/ de skad smras te tshig
316a4(rgyud): gang zhig/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas// bstod pa/ de'i nyer spyod kyang byas nas// de dag gshegasu gsol ba ra bya/ chags bral so sor ldan pa yi// slob ma rnams la
316a5(rgyud): chos bshad bya// blo ldan shar du mgo bstan te// dge ba'i gnyid kyis nyal du gzhug/ de nas snga dro nyid du ni// mtsha na mo'i rmi lam mthong ba bri// gang tshe dge ba'am mi dge ba/ 
316a6(rgyud): dogs med nyin par thos nasu// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas ni// rigs bdun rnams kyi dam tshig kyang // de nas bu khyod dam tshig dang // sdom pa rgyal ba yis gsungs pa// dad pa'i bla ma'i bka'
316a7(rgyud): yang bskyang // khyed kyis srog chags bsad mi bya// ma byin mi blang 'dod log dang // dngos grub 'dod pas mi bya'o// chang mi btung shing sha la sogs// bza' ba nam yang ma yin nyid// sems
316a8(rgyud): can kun la gnod mi bya// dkon mchog gsum yang mi spang zhing // dus rnams kun tu byang chub sems// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / bla ma lha rnams de bzhin nyid// bla ma'i bka' las 'da'
316b1(rgyud): mi bya// gang las sdig 'gyur de las 'da'// de la phul ba'i rnying pa dang // grib ma la yang 'gom mi bya// phyag rgya'i rnam pa'ang de bzhin nyid// sngags dang lha la mi smad cing // gdon gyi las rnams ma
316b2(rgyud): bya'o// mu stegs pa yang smad mi bya// mdor na bdag nyid the tshom dang // som nyi yid gnyis mi bya ste// rgyud dang lha tshogs la de bzhin// dad pa brtan pas dam bcas nas// sarba bid kyis dbang de
316b3(rgyud): bzhin/ bum pa la sogs mchog rnams kyis// dbang bskur bcu po 'dod ji bzhin// de nas lag ni rdo rje dang // dril bu sbyin bya de rjes la/ 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun// bzung nas 'khor los
316b4(rgyud): bsgyur ba yi// rgyal po dbang phyug thob phyir dang // sdig pa gzhim phyir dbang bskur zhing // sngags sgrub 'dod pa'i slob ma la // rjesu gnang ba mnyan du gzhug/ de nas bstod pas mgo bo
316b5(rgyud): yis// phyag 'tshal ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas// bla ma la ni dbul bya ste// rin chen gter dang 'bru dang dbyig/ gser dang / bzhon pa khyim dang gdan/ bu dang bu mo skyes pa dang / bud med
316b6(rgyud): rnams ni dbul bya zhing // grong dang grong khyer ci bzhed rnams// rang gi sems ni rab dang bas// yon rnams nges par dbul bya zhing // dngos grub myur phyir bla ma la// mdor na bdag nyid kyang 'bul bya// 
316b7(rgyud): tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang // 'jig rten pha rol bde ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur te// lha yi bde ba lta ci smos// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa gang / de yis
316b8(rgyud): rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob// de phyir slob dpon slad mi bya// rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang // gang yang smad par mi bya zhing // khon par yang ni mi bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / bla ma smod byed
317a1(rgyud): // ma rungs rnams// dam tshig 'das la bzod mi bya// de lta bu sogs gnod byed la'ang // de lta nyid do de byas na// kun rigs gis gsungs dngos grub thob// sems can kun la rjes brtse
317a2(rgyud): bas/ dngos grub myur du 'byung ba 'thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po dang / lha dang bcas pa la 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sgrub pa'i cho ga gsungs te/ bri gzhi la
317a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de kho na bzhin du bri zhing g.yasu de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i rgyal po dang / g.yon du shAkya thub pa dang / ngan song thams cad yod
317a4(rgyud): su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ dbang phyug sku mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na pad+ma can dang / shAkya thub pa'i 'og na phyag na rdo rje dang / de dag gi dbus sman
317a5(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po phyag gcig gis a ru r-i'i 'bras bu bsnam sa shing de las gzhan ni mchog sbyin du bya'o// rta ma grin dang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ma rungs
317a6(rgyud): pa 'joms pa la brtson pa dag ni rang gi lha la mngon par phyogs par bri zhing de dag gi dbu su lo tsa nA dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dag phyag na rang gi mtshan ma can bri'o/ 
317a7(rgyud): de rnams kyi 'og tu rdzing bu chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa dkar po la sogs pa dang bcas pa chu las skyes pa'i me tog du mas yongasu gang bar bri zhing 'dug pa dang / mar me
317a8(rgyud): dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / zhal zas dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bri bar bya'o// 'og nyid du sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar te rab tu 'dug cing 'dud par bri'o// de nas de rdzogs pa la
317b1(rgyud): byin gyis brlab pa dmigs par bya ste// spyan dubya ba byas nas mchod pas mchod par bya'o// de nas gal te mtshan ma mthong na myur du 'grub po// gal te ma mthong na ring mo zhig na 'grub
317b2(rgyud): pa'o// bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang / dril bu'i sgra dang 'brog sgra nyid// dge slong bram ze bu mo dang // 'bras bu mthong na dngos grub ni// mchog 'bring tha ma myur du 'grub// de nas sku gzugs
317b3(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / sngags rnams kyis ni byin gyis brlabs// ji ltar bskyed pas thob bya zhing // 'jig rten gsum ni rnam rgyal gyis// bdag srung la sogs byas na su// bdag gi de nyid kyang
317b4(rgyud): bsgoms nas// ji srid dngos grub rtags 'byung ba// 'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'bum bzlas// de nas dben pa'i gan su ni// sngags kyang chad lhag bkang bya ste/ brgya phrag brgyad
317b5(rgyud): rnams bzlas par bya// de nas bzlas pa de yi mthar// dkyi/ la 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la// mchod pa rgya che/ na yang byas nas// mtshan mo gcig ni bzlas par bya// de nas
317b6(rgyud): gal te gtso bo'am// sras sam lha rnams mthong gyur na// de tshe snod 'dod ji lta bar// dngos grub mchog ni gsol ba gdab/ lha rnams rtag tu dgyes pa yis// dngos grub 'bras bu de la stsol/ 
317b7(rgyud): phyag byas kyang ni dngos grub ni// mchog la sogs pa blang bar bya// bla ma dkon mchog gsum po la// rang rang skal pa phul nas ni// de nas rtag tu bdag nyid spyad// de rnams med na shes rab
317b8(rgyud): can dablangs nas rang nyid spyad par bya// sems can kun la phan brtson zhing // bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur// legs par bsgrubs na thams cad byed// gnod sbyin rgyu skar gdong la sogs
318a1(rgyud): tshig tsam gyis ni bran bzhin du// zhi ba'i las la sogs pa ni// thams cad byed par 'gyur ba yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
318a2(rgyud): ldan 'das sems can sdig pa bgyis pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams kyis dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu spang ba'i phyir ji ltar sgrub par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das
318a3(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa chen po byed pa de rnams dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams las tshigs med par
318a4(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur ba de nyid de bzhin du nyon cig/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas pa yi// bum po/ rnams ni snga ma bzhin// dbang bskur ba ni rtag par bya/ de nas
318a5(rgyud): sngon gyi sdig byang zhing // dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal ni// kun las myur du rnam grol 'gyur// sdig las rnal gro la bdag nyid che// de yang gnas gtsang lhar skyes nas/ rtag
318a6(rgyud): tu sangs rgyas chos 'gro thos// phyir mi bzlog pa'i sa la gnas// rims kyis byang chub mngon sum byed// de yi gzugs brnyan dang ni ming / gur gum gyis ni bris na su// ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs
318a7(rgyud): chen las// sems can rnams ni thar pa'i phyir// sngags pa gzhan la phan brtson zhing // brtse bas mngon par dbang bskur ro// de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni// sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur te/ 
318a8(rgyud): lha yi gzugasu brtags na su// mchod rten debu su bzhag par bya// rang gzhan lha yi snying po ni// snying kha de yi phyogs bris nas// lha mnyam par ni sems bskyed de// khyim du yang ni gzhag par bya// / 
318b1(rgyud): yi ming dang spel ba'i sngags// gur gum bzang pos bris nas ni// 'bum ni yongasu rdzogs bar du// mchod rten las ni rab tu bya// sdig chen sdig ni zad bya'i phyir/ bye ba yang ni rdzogs par bya// de ltar
318b2(rgyud): byas na de nges par// dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur// de bzhin yi dgas byol song las// grol te lha rigs rnamasu skyes// de yi ming dang spel nas ni// ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags stong bzlas
318b3(rgyud): gal te brgya phrag stong yang tshang / bye ba'i bar du rdzogs par bya// lha'i rigs rnams skye bar 'gyur// de yi ming nas spel ba yi// mkhas pas 'bum khrag brgya 'am ni// yang na brgya phrag stong snyedadu/ 
318b4(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas na dmyal ba ni// chen po'i sdig pa las grol ba gyur// ji srid mtshan ma 'bar ba yi// gan su yang dag skye bar 'gyur// nyungs kar dkar po'i til dang 'bras// ra yi
318b5(rgyud): 'o ma yang dag ldan// de bskus yam shing de srid du// cho ga dzi ba zhin sbyin bsreg bya// de nas de ni nges par yang // lha rig sa rnams skyes pa yi// mtshan mnye bar mthong bar gyur// gal
318b6(rgyud): te lha yi mchog skyes dang // yang na thab khung nang du ni// dkar po g.yas bskor 'bar ba dang // gyen du 'greng zhing dri ma med// 'phro bsdoms bzhin 'bar ba dang // glog bzhin dri ma med 'od bstan// ma
318b7(rgyud): rtags 'di rnams mthong bar 'gyur// yang na me lha bdag nyid ni// de bzhin kho nar ston 'gyur te// zla ba bzhin du dri ma med// dkar po bzhin mdog 'bar ba'o// mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ba la// / 
318b8(rgyud): de nas dmyal sogs rnams grol zhing // sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni// skyes pa yin par shes par bya// khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni/ cho ga ji bzhin thab khung ba'o// rdo rjes mtha' ma bskor ba yi// 
319a1(rgyud): 'khor lo dbus bri bar bya// rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams// ji bzhin rang gi phyogasu bri// ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni// 'jig rten la sogs phyin nas bri/ de nas bum pa gang ba
319a2(rgyud): dang // gtor mas snod rnams bkang ba ni// brgyad dam bcu drug dag tu bzhag/ bza' dang bcas pa zhal zas dang // me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te// bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs/ gdugs mchog
319a3(rgyud): rnams kyis legs par rgyan// de ltar sbyin sreg thab khung ni// mchog tu yang dag sbyin sreg bya// cho ga shes pas de bris nas// lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs te// sngags shes pas sngags phyag
319a4(rgyud): rgya yis// arga la sogs phul nas ni// mdor bsdus mtsho dad par byas nasu// lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la/ ga bur dgur gum la sogs pas// mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la// 
319a5(rgyud): til dang nyungs kar 'bras rnams dang // dri yi chus ni leg sa bkang ste// 'bras chan spos dang la du ba// sbrang rtsi sha ka rar ldan la/ brgya phrag du mar yongasu bzlas// yam shing
319a6(rgyud): la yang de bzhin te/ rang gis sngags kyis btab pa'i shing // khung bu'i nang du bzhag par bya// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za sogasu gnas pa yi// ro l-i sngags kyis btab nas// chu
319a7(rgyud): mchog gis ni dkrus nas ni// sngags bzlas dri yis byug par bya// gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan bya zhing // sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug/ me tog phreng ba la sogs mchog/ gtsug
319a8(rgyud): phud dpung par de bzhin du/ sngags bris nas ni gdags par bya// snying kha mgrin pa kha phyogasu// sarba bi dAs byin gyis brlabs// dpral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis// mgo bo spyi gtsug dpung pa
319b1(rgyud): gnyis/ rna ba gnyis dang dbus mo bol// sna yi rtse mo long bu dang // mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi// dbang po rnams kyi gnas dang ni// de ltar gzhan du'ang gnas yi ge/ mchog tu dge ba de dag gzhag/ 
319b2(rgyud): de dag ngan song yongs sbyangs phyir// stan dang bcas te thab dbus gzhag/ de nas sngags pas sngags kyis ni// mngon par sngags pa'i gos kyis g.yogs// de nas byin za yang dag rab spang la/ 
319b3(rgyud): me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus// zla ba kun de bzhin du zhi ba'i yid// dpag med kun la mchod yon yongasu brtag/ de bzhin ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa bya// de nas dang po de yi// 
319b4(rgyud): sbyin sreg ni// rdzogs par byas shing 'bar ba nyid la ni// yid das brtags nas ni rgyal ba las// sogs pa rnams kyi brgyad ni lhag pa dang // bcas pa'i brgya ni yongasu brtag par
319b5(rgyud): bya// de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po yang // bsreg bya nyid shu rtsa gcig yongasu brtag/ de nas zhal ras dkar po/ spyan drangs la/ yo byad rnams sam mchod yon sogs
319b6(rgyud): gsum mchod// phyag na rdo rje pad+ma zhags pa bsnams// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni rab brgyan cing // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbu rgyan can/ bsam par bya zhing yang ni bri bar bya// de yi
319b7(rgyud): snying po brgya phrag stong ngam ni// ji srid bye ba'i bar du sbyin bsreg bya// yang na mtshan ma yang dag byung na ni// de bzhin sdig rgyun spangs par shes par bya// de nos thal bar 'gyur ba cho ga bzhi/ 
319b8(rgyud): rdo rje bsdu bas thal ba rus pa bsdu// rdo rje bdud rtsi dri chu dang // ba yi rnam lnga dang bcas la// sbyong ba'i sngags ni 'bum 'i zlas te// gong bu byas nas gapur drir/ sa dang legs par bsres pa
320a1(rgyud): / la sku gzugs mchod rten lhar bsam zhing // lan gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga'am// yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin rlabs la// 'bum phrag
320a2(rgyud): gnyis ni bzlas par bya// de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam// yang na sku gzugs zhal 'dzum mam// dri spos ngad ljang 'od snang ngam// lha la sogs pa sna tshogs pa// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul
320a3(rgyud): pa dang // me tog la sogs 'dor ba dang // dung dang rnga dang gling bu dang // pi wang la sogs sgra thos 'gyur// gal te lha yi mtshan med// sdig mang nyid kyis ma mthong ba/ de tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong bzlas
320a4(rgyud): ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du// de bzhin gshegs pa mcho du nas ni// mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par byas// / de mthar chog shes pa yis// mtshan gcig thog thag mi
320a5(rgyud): nyal bzlas// de nas de yi sdig pa ni// rnam dag bdag nyid/ nges par mthong // lha yi lus kyis gzugs dang / ni// de yi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur// mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas
320a6(rgyud): su// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni// byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis// las rnams thams cad rab tu bya// gal te de yang med gyur na// de tshe bzlas bsgom tshul gyi bya// de yi ming tsam bris
320a7(rgyud): na su// mchod rten phreng ba bya ba dang // sku gzugs kyang ni byas na su// sbyin sreg dbang bskur byas gyur na// gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye// thal ba nyung kar bye ma sogs// ming spel sngags ni mngon
320a8(rgyud): btab nas// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung dor// de ltar byas na sdig pa can// yin yang ngan song rnams las ni// rnam par thar par gyur nas kyang // dge ba mchog gi sa bon ni// bskyed dang ldan pas
320b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid// 'bras bur yang dag ldan pa yi// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rgyu// rab tu bsgoms pa'i bsod nams ldan// 'jig rten ngan song
320b2(rgyud): bcom pa ni// 'di ltar lha yang ci zhig smos// 'di la the tshom med pa yin// gang yang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang // gang yang med pa'i lta ba can dang / gang byang chub kyi lam las rnam par 'das
320b3(rgyud): pas bstan pa la zhe sdang gis gnod pa byed pa dang / sdig pa'i rang bzhin mi shes pa pha dang ma la sems mi brtse ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la mi brten pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba bsad
320b4(rgyud): pa dang / lha dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa rnams la/  med pa nyid du lta ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa can rnams la de
320b5(rgyud): lta bu'i shes rab can dang thabs med na grol ba med do zhes pa// bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba rnams kyis ga sung so// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa spyan pad+ma rgyas pa rnam
320b6(rgyud): leg so zhes bya bas mnyes par mdzad do// mnyes par mdzad nas mchod pa mdzad do// brgya byin gzhan la phan par brtson pas kyang ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du byaso// 'bras bu de bzhin
320b7(rgyud): du thob par gyur to// dbang ldan du 'grin pa sngon po glang khyu mchog la zhon pa// sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa'i drang po dang gnyis pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang mchog sbyin du bcas
320b8(rgyud): pa/ g.yon pa'i gcig gis rtse gsum pa 'dzin cing gnyis pas ral gri 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyis mchod phyir thogs pa can bris te/ oM pa shu ba ti nI la kaN+Da um pri ya swA hA zhes pa 'dis
321a1(rgyud): / so// de nas phyag rgya 'di yin te/ lag pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la mthe'u chung mthe bong gis mnan te sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje mtshan nyid du byas shing ming med dang mdzub mo yang rje/ 
321a2(rgyud): rje'i rnam par cung zad mdud par bya'o// 'di ni phyugs bdag gi phyag rgya'o// khyab 'jug khyung la zhon pa mdog nag po phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na dbyug tho dang rdo rje 'dzin cing g.yon
321a3(rgyud): pabadag na dung dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// gser gyi rdo rje ma khyab 'jug lta bu gser gyi mdog can du shes par bya'o// rdo rje dril bu rma bya la zhon pa/ dmar po g.yas pa dag na shag ti dang rdo rje/ g.yon
321a4(rgyud): pa dag na khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gzhon nu mdo rje dril bur shes par bya'o// mi smra ba rdo rje ngang pa la zho/ na pa// gser mdog can/ zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa/ phyag
321a5(rgyud): g.yas pa dag ni rdo rje dang 'grang phreng 'dzin cing // g.yon pa dag na dbyug zo dang / spyi lugs 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje zhib mtshangs pa lta bur shes par bya'o// rdo rje mtshon cha glang
321a6(rgyud): po che dkar po la zhon pa/ phyag g.yon pas rang gi rdo rje 'dzin cing g.yas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje mtshon cha ltar shes pa bya'o// rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo
321a7(rgyud): yang shing rta la zhon pa/ mdog dmar po g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa na pad+ma dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi ma dang rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo lta bu nyid do// rdo rje 'od zer khro bo dkar
321a8(rgyud): po ngang pa la zhon pa/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing // g.yon pas pad+ma dang / zla ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'od zer ma rdo rje khro bo lta bu'o// rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo rus sbal la zhon pa mdog sngon po phyag g.yas
321b1(rgyud): na rdo rje 'dzin cing // g.yon pas dbyug pa rdo rje mchog ma rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo lta bu'o// rdo rje dmar ser khro bo glang po che la zhon pa/ mdog dmar po// phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin cing // g.yon pas mi
321b2(rgyud): bzung nas za zhing gnas pa'o// rdo rje skye rags ma rdo rje dmar ser khro bo lta bu'o// rdo rje tshogs bdag glang sna glang po che zhon pa can/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas gshol
321b3(rgyud): 'dzin cing gnas pas/ mdog dkar po'o// rdo rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glung sna lta bu'o// 'di ni khyad par te gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje phreng ba tshogs kyi bdag po mngon
321b4(rgyud): ljang ku/ byA ku li ka'i shing rta zhon pa phyag g.yas kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gdan ma rdo rje phreng ba lta bu'o// 'di ni khyad par te gang zhe na/ 
321b5(rgyud): phyag g.yon gyis sha ka ti 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje dbang can ni 'i shing rta zhon pa// mdog dkar ser phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams
321b6(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje dbang rdo rje dbang can lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ mdog dmar po'o// rnam rgyal rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po sbal bzhon pa mdog dkar po'o// phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa
321b7(rgyud): g.yon pas ral gri 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gdengs pa ma rnams rgyal rdo rje lta bu'o// rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo me tog gi shing rta'i khang bu zhon pa mdog dkar sar phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ 
321b8(rgyud): g.yon pas gtun shing 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gtun shing po nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rlung gi pho nya mdog sngon po rings
322a1(rgyud): / zhon pa phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas dar 'dzin pa'o// mgyogs pa'i rdo rje ma rdo rje rlung gi pho nya lta bu'o// rdo rje me'i ngo nya mor skyes zhon pa/ mdog dmar po gyen du
322a2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'od rtse gsum pa 'bar ba'i phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang go cha 'dzin pa// g.yon pa dag na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje mo lta bu'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed ponya
322a3(rgyud): sngon po ro langs zhon pa phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gartsigs pa pho nya mo rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ g.yon
322a4(rgyud): pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje lcags kyu bran klu lhag pa zhon pa sngon po phag gi gdong pa can g.yas pa rdo rje 'dzi na pa/ g.yon pas lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje nag po bran
322a5(rgyud): mo ro langs kyi zhon pa can// phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzi na pa/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa mdog nag mo/ rdo rje log 'dren phran brab byi bzhon pa// mdog dkar po glang po
322a6(rgyud): tsheche'i gdong pa can/ phyag g.yas dag na rdo rje dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na rtse gsum dang ni dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa'o// rdo rje srul mo bran mo mdog sngon mo// 
322a7(rgyud): g.yan rdo rje 'dzin pa g.yon pa phyags ma 'dzin pa bra ba byi ba zhon pa'o// klu rdo rje'i chu srin zhon pa gdengs ka brgyad pa/ mdog dkar po g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa klu'i zhags pa
322a8(rgyud): 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje srin ma bran mo chu srin non pa/ mdog dkar mo gdengs ka brgyad ma g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa// g.yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o// 'jigs mdog ma
322b1(rgyud): ljang ku g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas ral gri phe Ta ka 'dzin pa'o// dpal mo mdog dkar ser g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing // g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// dbyangs can ma mdog
322b2(rgyud): dkar mo// phyag g.yon pa sarba dang g.yas pas rdo rje ma'o// dgrod ka mdog ljang ku seng ge la zhon pa phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa// g.yon pa dag na lde men dang ral
322b3(rgyud): gri 'dzin pa'o// ma mo thams cad dang / drag po la sogs pa dang / chu bdag gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi dang / gang phyag g.yasu rdo rje gsungs pa de ni rdo rje rtse gsum par shes par bya'o// 
322b4(rgyud): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la mngon du bltas pa'o// de nas thun mtshams kyis dusu rdo rje ti rin ti ris dag par bcing/ 
322b5(rgyud): te me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug go/ yi ge hUM bzhi pa brjod cing rdo rjes rnam par sna/ nga mdzad la bskor ba bdun dang // dung dang dril bu'i sgra bsgrag
322b6(rgyud): par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi yang lhag pa dang chad pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i nges par bltas te phreng ba bcom ldan 'das la phul nas rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs te yi ge hUM
322b7(rgyud): bzhi pa nyid kyis rang gi mgo bor bcing ngo // ji ltar cho ga bzhin du yang // gang zhig chad pa yongasu bskang // mkhas pas lhag pa rnams spang phyir// rdo rje dril bu kun rtog bya// 'grub 'gyur/ 
322b8(rgyud): nyes pa spang mi bya zhes gsung so// de nas 'dug par gyur pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas// rdo rje sgo ni bzhi po rnams// yid kyi dbye bar bya ba nyid// oM badz+ra u ta g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra
323a1(rgyud): / be sha hU zhes bya'o// ngag rgya yang 'di yin te// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gshibs te/ mdzub mo gan rgyal yang dag bzung / legs par drag tu rnam par dbye/ slo dbye ba yi chog
323a2(rgyud): yin zhes pa'o// de nas ljags kyu la sogs pas las rnams byas la rin po che bdun las byas pa 'am/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa nag po la sogs pa med pa// 'grin pa ring ba/ mchub
323a3(rgyud): ba/ lto ba che ba/ lha rdzas kyi dri'i chu dang / rin po che dang / sman thams cad dang / 'bru thams cad kyis yongasu rdzogs pa// yal 'dab dang bcas pa/ mgrin pa la gos dam pas legs par
323a4(rgyud): bcings la byas pa// phyi rol kun tu lha rdzas kyi dri rje su byugs dpa// me tog gi phreng ba btags pa'i rdo rjes steng du mtshan dpa/ rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa khro bo ti rin ti ris
323a5(rgyud): yongasu bzung ba'i rdo rje dang me tog gi yal 'dab kyis/ oM ba dz+ra ud ka hUM zhes bya ba 'di stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsdu gas pa'i yi ge hUM bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags
323a6(rgyud): pa byas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par bzhago// 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyi rol du bum pa gnyis pa la yi ge hUM bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa
323a7(rgyud): bzhag go// de'i chus bdag nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur ba bya ste gzhug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas sam ma bcings pa yang ngo // byu ru de bzhin sa le sbram// dung dang de bzhin nor bu ni/ rin chen kun te/ 
323a8(rgyud): sing ha dang / byi g+h+ri ga re be re bai ra/ sman kun til dang sran ma sha/ 'bras dang gro ni lnga pa ste// sman lnga 'bru kun smras mtshon pa'o// de'i rjes la phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom pa 'dzin
323b1(rgyud): du bcug nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gos sngon po la yang yongasu bzlas te/ sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis sgo skyong gis gdongs bcings pa rdo rje go chas stod g.yogs dang / gtsug tor la sog/ 
323b2(rgyud): pa can gyi slob dpon gyis khro bo ti rin ti ris me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung nas/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ma pra be shA mi zhes brjod cing zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol
323b3(rgyud): pa gdab ste/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas so// de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs nas bdag nyid 'jug par byas la// phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor la rang rang gi mgo la bcings te
323b4(rgyud): gdong bcings pa dkrol la// ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la bltas te/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra zhes pa la sogs pas gzhugs pa'i phyag rgya dgrol ba yang byas la chu'i dbang bskur ba dang / sangs
323b5(rgyud): rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang / dar sbyangs dang / rdo rje dang / phreng ba da nga / bdag po la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dgu bcom lda na 'das kyi spyan snga nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
323b6(rgyud): nas blangs pa de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig dang / dngos grub dang rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang bzung la me tog la sogs pas kyang bdag nyid legs par mchod de tshigasu bcad pa lnga pas rjes
323b7(rgyud): gnang ba dang / yi ge hUM gi gzengs bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa yang smos la slar yang byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yang ste hUM kA ra badz+ra hUM
323b8(rgyud): zhes pa'o// rang gi mtshan brjod par bya yis rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing la de'i sngags a'i rnam pa'i mtha' can rnam snang mdzad kyi gnasu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i ba
324a1(rgyud): nyid dbab bo// badz+reHhUM zhes bya ba yis rdo rje'i nga rgyal rnam par bsgoms la de rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms te/ badz+ra d+hA tu a haM zhes pa'o// de ltar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen
324a2(rgyud): po bcings la byang gi sgor de'i sngags aH'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rdo rje rdo rje dril bu bdag nyid dbab pa'o// badz+ra g+haN+Do&haM zhes pa'i nga rgyal bskyed la de badz+ra A be sha kro d+ho dza haM zhes sgom mo// de lta bus
324a3(rgyud): rdo rjes bsgrubs pa yin no// de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyus bcings la se gol legs par gtog pa byed cing sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par bya ste/ 
324a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra sa mA dza dzaHhUM ba hoHzhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu brjod do// de nas myur du phyag rgya chen po dang / rdo rje khro dpe dam tshig brjod do// de ma thag tu mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
324a5(rgyud): pa mchog go// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rang gi/ sgo nas spyan drangs la bcug ste bcings nas dbang du byas la ji lta bzhin dul 9 bzhi pas mchod yon phul
324a6(rgyud): te dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rnams bsgrubs te rang gi sngags brjod pa ji lta bur brjod cing dzaHhUM ba ho
324a7(rgyud): sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ de nas rang gi sngags brjod do// de lta bus 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dbyung ste/ rdo rje las gsang dam pa byung // dam tshig mchog
324a8(rgyud): rnams nyid du grags/ khro bo'i bcing ba bla med pa// de rnams bcing bar rab bshad k+Sha/ lag ngar rdo rje kun tu bsnol// mthe chung lcags kya bcing ba nyid// mdzub mo dag ni rab tu brkyang / 'dzi/ 
324b1(rgyud): rten gsum po rnams rgyal zhes// de bzhin mdzud mo/ khaspyad cing // nor bu nyid ni par ma bskums// bsnams lang du ma pad+ma nyid// gung mo mdzu mo gnyis bsdigs mdzub/ bsdigs mdzub gnyis
324b2(rgyud): ni rdo rje yang // g.yas pa bkug pa lcags kyu'o// de dag nyid sbyar yi ge ts+tsha// legs pa'i rnam pa de bzhin yang // mdzub gnyis logs gnas khro gnyer du// snying kar nyi ma mdzub gnyis zlum/ 2/ 
324b3(rgyud): pa mgo bor rab tu brkyang // mdzub mo kha ru dgod pa can// mdzub mo sen mo kun tu rig/ g.yas pa mdzod kyi khu tshur yang // gung mo'i mgo bcas 'khor lo nyid// kha las rab mchog
324b4(rgyud): thon pa yi// mdzub mo dbu ma rdo rje yang // mdzub mo 'grin pa bskor ba dang // mdzub mo lhag ma mche ba che// rdo rje khu chu/ dar mthe bong bsdams// sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni rdo
324b5(rgyud): rje dbyingasu bshad pa bzhin du bya ba 'di ltar te/ rdo rje bsdam sa pa bcings nas// snying khar yang na mthe bong bsnam/ legs par rab brkyang phreng ba ma// thal mo sbyar mchog
324b6(rgyud): kha nas dbyung // gar las spyi bor thal mo sbyar// rdo rje bsdams pa thur du sbyin// thal mo legs sbyar gyen du gtor// mthe bong bsnams te nges par bsdams// rab tu brkyang ba byug pa yi// 
324b7(rgyud): mdzub mo gcig ni bkug pa dang // mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa bcings// mthe bong mdzub mo bsnol ba bcing // rdo rje khu tshur mchog bsdams nyid zhes pa'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor la
324b8(rgyud): rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams la hUM gi rnam pa nyid brjod cing phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o// de nas phyag rgya'i nges par 'byung ba ste// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya ni// rnam par snang mdzad/ 
325a1(rgyud): / rdo rdzu mdzad/ chos kyi chu mdzad lasas rdu mdzad kyi gnas 'ang ngo // de nas rin chen chumadzad la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags rnams 'byung ste/ yo ba drug Ta kro d+ha A na yas \u0f7f na
325a2(rgyud): hrIHhUM phaT/ oM badz+ra hrIHSh+Ti kod+ha duSh+Ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bi shwa krod+ha ku ru sarba bi shwa ru pa yA pa d+ha ya hUM phaT/ phyag rgya gzhan rnams ni sems dpa' rdo rje mnas brtsams par blta'o// de nyid
325a3(rgyud): kyi phyir rig pa thams cad kyi mchog rnams kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i sngagasu bshad// rdo rje hUM mdzod dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya bsdu bas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad klog par bya'o// 
325a4(rgyud): rnams rdo rje hUM mdzad du 'gyur ba rigs pa yang ma yin te/ rgyud thams cad du hUM mdzad nges par bstan pa yang ma de yin no// de'i rjes de kho na bzhin lce la rdo rje bkod de rim pa bzhin
325a5(rgyud): du sangs rgyas rdo rje 'tshang la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi ge/ rnams dgod do// de rnams kyang hUM yig sangs rgyas rdo rje can// dzA yig rdo rje'i snying po yi// hriHyi rnam pa rdo rje'i sde'i/ 
325a6(rgyud): aHyig rdo rje sna tshogs kyi// hUM sems dpa' rdo rje'i ma'i// dzA rin chen rdo rje ma'i// hrI/ chos kyi rdo rje ma'i/ a las kyi rdo rje'i ma'i// hUM hUM/ dzI dz+re/ hriHhrIHa a zhes bya'o// rdo rje
325a7(rgyud): sems dpa' la sogs pa dga' bo chen po la hUM/ gzugs mdzes pa la hUM/ rna ba bde ba la hUM/ mchod pa thams cad la hUM/ rab tu dga' ba la hUM/ dbusu bgrod pa la hUM/ legs par
325a8(rgyud): gzi mchog la dru/ dri bzang mchog la hUM/ a bi tsi dza hU/ a hi s+'un+na hU/ he sIT bcug a a hU~M/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi'o// dam
325b1(rgyud): thag tu a'i yi ge las snying khar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed pa las kyi phyag rgya bcing ngo // de la khro bo'i khu tshur rnam pa gnyis byas la g.yon pa'i rdo rje sen mo g.yas pa bzung zhing sbeng ba byang chub
325b2(rgyud): mchog zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu ster ro// gnyis po de dag gis 'gying ba dang bcas pas gsal bar byed pa ni rdo rje hUM mdzad dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang sems
325b3(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o// lcags kyu 'dzin par yang dag gnas// mda' gsor ba yi sbyor ba dang // leg so zhes bya snying kar gnas// rdo rje gnyis nyid dbang bskur ba// rin chen du mdzad
325b4(rgyud): dang rdo rje khro gnyer dang / khro ba dang / rin chen rdo rje marnamadas kyi'o// snying kar nyi ma rab tu blta/ g.yon gnas la dgang dbyug pa dang // de bzhin 'di ni yongasu bzlog// g.yas
325b5(rgyud): dang g.yas min rnam par bsnol// chos kyi hUM mdzad/ rdo rje chos dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o// snying / ra nyi ma la ral gri'o// 'gal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba nyid/ 
325b6(rgyud): rdo rje gnyis ni khar gnas shing // rdo rje'i gar ni bgrol bas ni// 'gram pa spyi gtsug yang dag gnas// las kyi hUM mdzad dang // rdo rje las dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o// go cha
325b7(rgyud): mthe chung mche ba mchog/ khu tshur gnyis ni nges par bcing // rdo rje 'gyings pa'i rab sbyor bas// bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya// phreng ba bcings te kha nas dbyung // gar wa
325b8(rgyud): spyi bor thal mo sbyar// 'og tu 'phyang dang gyen du 'thor// mthe bo mnyams te nges par gshig/ dri byug pa yi sbyor ba las// mchod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu grags// 'dzub mo
326a1(rgyud): / lcags kyu bcings pa yis// mthe chung las ni lcags kyu che// 'khrig ma mdud pa mchog ngag bsnol// rgya ba dag kyang ni nges par gshibs// zhes sgo skyong rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// 
326a2(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyang gar las 'byung ba yin no// de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi bcing bar bya'o// rdo rje sems dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi rdo rje
326a3(rgyud): ma rnams kyi yang ste rdo rje dang po dang / mthar gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po gang dang gang gi phyag rgya gang dang gang yin pa rnams bcing
326a4(rgyud): do// thams cad kyi phyag rgya dam tshig phyag rgya yang yin te/ g.yo/ ngan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gan rkyal du byas dal lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag dang
326a5(rgyud): mthe chung nas brtsams te kha phye ba'i thal mo kha sbyar ba'o// 'di/ ni byams pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de rnams kyi ri ga pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid do// de rnams kyi rig pa ljags
326a6(rgyud): rnams la 'god do// 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o// yi ge a las rang gi thugs khar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la de rnams 'dri ba'i phyir rje su 'brangs nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa
326a7(rgyud): ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro// rang gi thugs khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la bri bya'i rje su 'brangs pa nyid las de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ngo // de nyid kyis yang rig pa'i thun mong ba'o// 
326a8(rgyud): mthe'u chung dang mthe bong bcings nas kyang g.yon pa'i sor mi dbus ma gsum po rtse gsum pa la dbus ma rtse mo yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu bzung zhing rdo rje'i rigs pa mchog 'di ni rdo rje
326b1(rgyud): dpal zhes grag so// de nas gzhan ni rab bshad bya// sbrum rdo rje sogs ming can// rdo rje bsdams pa brtan byas la// g.yon pa rdo rje yang bcing bya// rdo rje khu tshur zhes grags pa/ rdo rje'i rigs
326b2(rgyud): rnams kun la 'di// rdo rje rnam gnyis dang yang byas// mtshan ma thams cad bkod pa ni// rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi// phyag rgya rnams ni'ang dgod par bya// mdun dang rgyab gnas rab tu brkyang / 
326b3(rgyud): bong rgan po 'dzin pa'i chos// oM gyi rnam pa spyi bor gnas// rdo rje shugs kyis rab tu gnas// rig pa'i rgyal po 'am phyag rgya chen po'i chog so// lag pa'i mdun nyid rab tu brkyang // lag pa'i
326b4(rgyud): mdun yang de bzhin du// lag pa gnyis kyang khu tshur gnas// kha de las yongasu bskor ba nyid// rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshe gso // g.yon pa'i mthe bo legs gnas kyang // phreng ba 'dzin pa
326b5(rgyud): nges rgyal nyid// g.yas pas nor ni sbyin pa dang // ral gri'i pha/ ga rgya khu tshur son// tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya'i cho ga so// g.yas pa gshol ni gzung ba dang // de bzhi
326b6(rgyud): lag pa rab tu brkyang // g.yas pa 'bar ba kun tu ston// rdo rje khu tshur rab tu 'dar// pho nya chen po'i phyag rgya'i cho ga so// bsnyems bcas kha dang mche ba rtse// byugs pas 'joms pa rab tu sbyor
326b7(rgyud): lag pa bskum pa sbyar ba dang // rdo rje g.yas pa 'phrog ma'o// bran gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga so// de nas u ma la sogs pa ma mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'byung ste/ g.yon pa rdo rje bsdams pa yis// rtse
326b8(rgyud): gsum mtshan ma bcing bar bya'o// 'di bcings pa yis yang dag pa'i// dngos grub rig pa mchog rang nyid// rdo rje rigs rnams thams cad kyi// g.yon pa rdo rje mchog bsrungs pa/ cho ga ji bzhin
327a1(rgyud): / dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya bcing bar rab bshad bya// 'khor lo thams cad mchog kun bsdams// de bzhin bu yi phag rgya dang / oM yig phyag rgya'ang de bzhin nyid/ yi ge rna can yongs su
327a2(rgyud): gzung // phyag rgya mdzes pa can dang ni// 'bar ba yongasu gzung ba nyid// 'od zer bsdus pa kho na yang // dbyug pa khu tshur bzung ba nyid// kha las yongasu bskor ba dang / khro bo'i dam tshig gdengs ka yis// 
327a3(rgyud): phyag rgya phreng ba rdo rje bcings// ming med spyi bor gnas pa nyid// rtsibs can dkyil 'khor bzhin du bza'// 'od can rtsibs can dam tshig rnams// lag ngar bskum zhing 'phyogs dang // rgyab nas yongasu
327a4(rgyud): bskor ba nyid// 'od zer 'bar bgrol ba dang // mdun du dul ba dar gnas pa nyid// pho nya'i dam tshig rnam so// gnyis mad/ ra bzhugs pa rtse mo sbyar// bcings pa nyid dang rab ltung byed// 
327a5(rgyud): lag ngar bsnol dang ma bsnol dang // de bzhin stobs ni 'phro ga pa'o// bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig yin no// de nas lA chen po la sogs pa'i ljags rnams la sngags bkod la yi
327a6(rgyud): ge a las rang gi snying khar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la de rnams la #// rang gi snying khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms la phyag rgya chen po bri bya'i rje su 'brangs te bcing bar bya'o// de nas
327a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang // bskal pa bzang po pa dang phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs rnams la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ma dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad la sogs sangs rgyas lnga'i
327a8(rgyud): cod pan dang / phreng ba dang / der sbyangs kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas mchod yon phul la mchod pa bya'o// de nas rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can rdo rje la sogs
327b1(rgyud): rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa rnams phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dgod par bya'o// bum pa gang ba rnams dang / gos zung 'bum
327b2(rgyud): dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya 'am/ re re la re re'am/ thun mong ba'am/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bla re dang / zur bzhir rnam par bkra ba'i bdan bcings pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
327b3(rgyud): dang / bdan rnams kyang yi ge oM dang / dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad yongasu bzlas la/ badz+ra s+pha ra Na khaM zhes pa 'dis lha thams cad la nges par dbu'o// me tog gi shing brgya dang / bzhi 'am ljon shing rnams
327b4(rgyud): dang / me tog thams cad la rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang nga / oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM zhes pas me tog gi phyag rgya mngon pa/ dar bsngago/ dri thams cad dang / ngang zhim po rnams dang / dri ma med
327b5(rgyud): pa'i dri bzang po rnams la de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang / oM badz+ra gan d+he zhes pa 'di 'dri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i so// ga pur dang a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan dan la sog
327b6(rgyud): pa la legs par bsres la// de kho na bzhin du rdo rje ma dang / oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM zhes pa 'dis bdug pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas spos phor 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya 'am/ 
327b7(rgyud): ji ltar rnyed pa la'o// sgron ma 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya 'am/ sgron ma thams cad sgron ma'i sdong bu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i skong bu stong dang / bcu 'am bcu gcig la de kho
327b8(rgyud): na bzhin du ma dang rdo rje ma dang / oM badz+ra A lo ki hUM zhes pa 'di mar me'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas yongasu bzlas la/ oM swa ra Na ba zhes pa brjod cing dbul bar bya'o// gtor ma'i nye bar spyod pa 'bum
328a1(rgyud): / dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya'am/ bcu'i grangs sam/ bkra shis can dang por bya ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la de bzhin du rdo rje me yongasu bzlas te/ 
328a2(rgyud): a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nutA pa nA twA ta zhes pa brjod cing dbul bar bya'o// rol mo bcu dang / stong dang / stong phrag bcu dang / rol mo 'bum yang rung ba la yi ge hUM dang / rol mo'i phyag rgya
328a3(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur bdag gi leg pa yis rol mi rnams kyis ril mo'i stang stabs rnam pa bcu bzhi 'di lta ste/ pi thang dang / gling bu dang / rnga mu ra dza dang / rnga mu kun dang / 'khar rje dang / rnga b+hi ri dang / 
328a4(rgyud): paT ha dang / rnga kun dza dang / rdza ti mi la'i stang stab so// rol mo dang / zlos gar dang / gar dang / rna rgyan dang / cod pan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang yi ge oM gyis mngon
328a5(rgyud): par bsngags te'o// de bzhin du dar dbyangs 'phyang bar bya zhi nga me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga yab kyis rnam par rgyan pa dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas spras pa dang / zla ba phyed pas
328a6(rgyud): nye bar mdzes pa dang / rta dang glang po che dang / ba long dang / shing rta rnams 'bul te/ brtags pa dang bcas pa yang ngo // rta babs nyams dga' ba'i dril bu dang bcas pa rnams kyang badz+ra
328a7(rgyud): s+phA ra Na kha zhes pa'i ngaso// oM badz+ra satwa su saM gra ha ta/ badz+ra rat+na ma nut+ta ra/ badz+ra d+harma gA ya baM/ badz+ra karma ka rod+b+ha be zhes brjod cing gar byas la/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa la chod pa brgyad
328a8(rgyud): pa rnams kyis khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis dang ldan pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod par bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis ra/ 
328b1(rgyud): tu brkyangs pa khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis yin no// slar rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcu drug pa rnams kyis kyang legs par mchod la// khro bo'i rigs thams
328b2(rgyud): cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don du dngos grub thams cad 'grub par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o// de nas phyi rol gyi mchod pa dngul te/ sgrub pa'i grogs
328b3(rgyud): mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la 'bras yos bcas shing til dang bcas// chu bcas zas bcas me tog bcas// sran chad bcas shing snum khur las/ sogs pa'i bza' ba rnams
328b4(rgyud): la ni// yang a ka ro mu khaM zhes pa la sogs bzlas nasangar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te/ gsum gsum gto/ dar bar byas te dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / 
328b5(rgyud): mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma dang tha mar dbul bar bya'o// de la dang po re shig maN+Dal rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o// de nas spyan drang ngo // de nas dam tshig bstan no// de nas
328b6(rgyud): mchod yon yang phul te dri la sogs pas legs par mchod la/ gtor ma dbul lo// de nas gshegasu gsol lo// de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ shar phyogasu khang ltas te
328b7(rgyud): g.yas brkyang gi gom pas 'dug cing lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje bstan la// g.yas pa dku'i phyogasu bzhag ste// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ngo // de'i mdzub mo lcags kyu
328b8(rgyud): dang bral ba ni// brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa brkyang gi gom pas 'dug la spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo bairkyang ba ni gsheg su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas der/ 
329a1(rgyud): // sngags na/ na mo badz+ras di shod shi badz+ra pA Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha satwa/ me'i phyog su bltas te lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum po'i rnam par bkug ste/ gung mo spang ba'i tshigs gsum pa
329a2(rgyud): btsugs la mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong mdzub mo'i gzhogs la bstan pa ni me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// phyag
329a3(rgyud): rgya de nyid lag pa'i dbusu mngon du phyogs te gcig tu sbyor ba ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni ag+na ye he ai hi pI la dz+wa la dz+wa la ha ha shi khi ti la bi rU pA k+Sha swA hA/ gshin rjer
329a4(rgyud): bltas te lag pa mdun du phyogs par byas la nang du rdo rje bsdams dnga'i dbu su mthe bong gnyis dang phyi ru ming med gnyis sbyar zhing sgreng ste slar nang du bzung ba ni gshin rje spyan drang ba'i
329a5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// srin lag gnyis yang phyi rol du gshings te sbrang nga'i snying khar bzung ba ni dam chog gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// 
329a6(rgyud): de'i sngags ni ya mA ya swA hA// bden bral du bltas te mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug sde bzung zhing gri'i rnam par bzhag la
329a7(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa ste zur phyogasu g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug nas bzhag pa ni bden bral spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogasu gnas par ral gri'i phyag rgya
329a8(rgyud): ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang pa ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni sarba b+hU ta b+hi yaM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ chu'i lha'i phyogs su
329b1(rgyud): mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bong dang mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar bzhag la g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyar
329b2(rgyud): drang ba ni chu bdag spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur la sbyar te bzung ba zhags pa'i phyag rgya chu bdag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo
329b3(rgyud): brkyang ba ni gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni tri tri su ba tri tri shi khi ti li bai ru pAk+Sha swA hA// rlung lha'i phyogasu bltas te 'dug pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs te gung mo sgreng ba'i tshig
329b4(rgyud): gsum par mdzub mo bkug pa'i rtse mo btsugs la mngon du phyogangs te brkyang ngo // lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du byas ta lta zur logasu bzhag cing mthe bos bskul ba ni rlung lha/ 
329b5(rgyud): spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phya ga rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni gshegasu gsol ba'i
329b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// sngogs ni oM sras khA kha khu kha swA hA/ ku be ra la mngon du daltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis kha sbyar la rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas la mthe chung gnyis gshibs te brkyang // 
329b7(rgyud): de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas gung mo dag sgreng ba rdo rje'i mdud pa bya ba ni ku be ra spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid kyis gud mo gnyis nang du rdo rje gung mo bcing bal
329b8(rgyud): sbyor bas bzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni go shegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni oM ku be rA ya swA hA/ dbang / 
330a1(rgyud): ldan gyi phyogasu bltas te 'dug la lag pa dag gcig tu sbyar te thal mo sbyar ba bya ste/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung lag 'thil du rdo rje bcing ba byas te/ mthe bo zung dag gzhan la
330a2(rgyud): brtan cing nang du bkug ste bsnol la/ gung mo ga shibs te sgreng ba'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par bzhag la de nyid bkug ste steng du phan tshun sen mo sprad par bya ba ni dbang ldan spyan
330a3(rgyud): drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyi mdzub mo sngar bzhin rdo rje'i rnam par bzung ba ni dbang ldan gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegasu gsol
330a4(rgyud): ba'i phyago rgya'o// sngags ni dzu rdu shi ba swA hA/ g.yon brkyang dpa'i gnas pas 'dul la lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags
330a5(rgyud): kyu ni tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan dang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan dang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brgya
330a6(rgyud): ba ni gshegasu gsol pa'i phyag rgya'o// de rnams kyi sngags ni Ur d+ha brah+ma Ni swA hA// oM sU gra ha a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA// oM tsan+d+ra nak+Sha tra a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA// mnyam pa'i gom pa'i gnas pas/ 
330a7(rgyud): 'dug la lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar ba ste sor mo'i rtse mo rnam par mtshams med par phan tshun sbyar te mthe bong zlum po byas la 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo lcags
330a8(rgyud): kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las sngar bzhin du mdzub mo dag bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo dag brkyang ba ni gshegs su
330b1(rgyud): gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags rnams ni a d+ho pri thi byai swA hA// a su re b+h+ya/ swA hAHnA ge b+h+yaHswA hA/ de nas rang gi sngags kyis thams cad la thor 'thung phul la/ bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su
330b2(rgyud): bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig/ las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la stsol cig ces brjod la thams cad gshegasu gsol lo// yang na dpung bzang gi ched du gsungs pa'i tshigs/ 
330b3(rgyud): bcad rnams kyis gtor ma dbul te/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lho phye grul// na mkha' lding dang mda' bzang lus srul po// dri za srin po gdon gyi tshogs rnams dang / gang sus la gnas
330b4(rgyud): pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor/ bcas pa la/ bdag gi dbus mo sa steng 'dir bcug/ sa nas// thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyis// 
330b5(rgyud): gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir spyon cig/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang // shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim gan/ 
330b6(rgyud): dang / ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang // chu bor kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang // rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang // mtsho dang rdzing bu steng ka chu ngogs dang // g.ya' chu sil ma
330b7(rgyud): can dang khron par gnas// grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang // kha stong dang ni lha yi khang par yang // gtsugs lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag dang // dka' thub gnas dang blang
330b8(rgyud): chen bras dang ni// rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang // lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang / gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung // dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po/ 
331a1(rgyud): // dang / seng ge dred dang gcan zan gnas dag dang // 'brog chen 'jig su rung bar gang gnas dang // gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang / lhun po dur khrod dag na gang gnas rnams
331a2(rgyud): dgyes shing mgu bas phreng ba byug pa dri// bdug pa gtor ma mar me bstod pa 'dis// gus 'bul snoms mdzod gsol mdzod 'thung mdzod cig/ las 'di rnams kyis 'bras bu mchis par/ 
331a3(rgyud): mdzod// de ltar gdon la mchod byas nas// rtse gcig yid kyis phyogs skyong mchod par byas// dbang po rdo rje can gyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas// gtor ma khyad 'phags 'di dag bzhes
331a4(rgyud): su gsol// me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag/ chu ba ro dag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang // dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang // steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang / 
331a5(rgyud): lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams gang // ri yi lha dang gsang / kha'i tshogs 'dus rnams// pung bcas sde bcas bu da nga bshes gnyen bcas// rang gi skye bo'i tshogs shing
331a6(rgyud): mnyes pa rnams// so so'i thugs dgongs gcig mdzad nas// rang rang phyogasu legs par byon nas ni// rang gi bu snad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang / nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas
331a7(rgyud): thabs gcig tu// me tog dri dang byug pa mar me dang // zhal zas gtor ma 'di dag bzhes nas kyang // gsol mdzod snoms mdzod legs par 'thung mdzod cig/ las 'di rnams kyis
331a8(rgyud): 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de la 'di ni phyi dang nang thams cad du gtor ma rab tu dngul ba'i sngags te/ a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NA ang+ga nud pan na tAta zhes pa'o// de nas nye reg bya ste sha
331b1(rgyud): sgor mngon par phyogs te gnas pa la// las thams cad pa'i thag zung gi dbus dpal 'jig rten gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi sngags brjod cing ma
331b2(rgyud): tog dmar po nges par bkod la sbyin sreg gi tshogs dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sngags kyis de'i mar gyis bsregs blugs brgya rtsa brgyad dngu'o// dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
331b3(rgyud): sngags rdo rje 'bebs pa khro bo'i mthar thug par kyang bsregs blugs bdun bdun slar yang ngo // de nas ji lta ba bzhin du thab khung gi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams me tog kho nas
331b4(rgyud): sbyin drangs la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags kyis dbris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang gi gan su dgod// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la/ bdag
