331b5(rgyud): ming che ge zhes bgyi ba'i// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ sa mas can kun la phan pa'i phyir// slob ma rnams ni gzhu ga par bgyi// 'dir yang dkyil 'khor 'jug pa la snod
331b6(rgyud): dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa de rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong ste
331b7(rgyud): zhugs nas ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang / dam tshig la mi 'da' ba dang / 
331b8(rgyud): sngar spyod pa la sogs pa 'dod cing mi nus pa'i sems can dag mchis te/ de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar bya bar 'dod pa bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur
332a1(rgyud): ro/ bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang / glu dang / gad mo dang / rtsed mo dang // kha zas la spyod pa la dga' ba nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po
332a2(rgyud): chos nyid khong du ma chud pas lha'i rigs dang dkyil 'khor gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin du rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ba
332a3(rgyud): bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa rnams 'byung bar mdzad pa der ni bslab pa'i gnas la 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam
332a4(rgyud): du ji ltar gnas pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid kyi gnas skabs can de dag kyang dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar ba gyi ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud thams cad du 'jug par kha bltas
332a5(rgyud): pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi da kyil 'khor du 'jug tu rung ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos ldan gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
332a6(rgyud): / tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dam pa 'grub pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol ba ni/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa dang / sa rnams la 'bad pas
332a7(rgyud): nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thams cad kyang rnyed par dga' ba yang ma lags na/ 
332a8(rgyud): dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes gsol bar bya'o// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o// de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongasu bzung ba'i dge bsnyen nam/ dge sbyong 'am/ dge slong gi sdom pa
332b1(rgyud): yongasu bzung zhing slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa/ slob dpon gyi zhabs dag la phyag byas te 'di skad ces brjod de/ bdag gi ston pa dge chen khyod// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ mgon/ 
332b2(rgyud): po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// skyabs gsum dag kyang dag la stsol zhes pa'o// de nas slob ma la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongasu bzla
332b3(rgyud): pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g.yog smad g.yogs dang / rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo skyong bzhi bzlas pa'i gdong g.yogs bcing bar byas la phyag bzhi byed du bzhugo// yang lag na me tog thogs
332b4(rgyud): pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la/ lag na me tog tho/ dgas pa nyid kyis bshags pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa byas la 'di skad ces brjod
332b5(rgyud): gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol// thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i// sa/ ngas rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs// bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba// slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas
332b6(rgyud): rol mo 'byung ba yi// phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun can// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/ gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi'o// gsang ba thams cad rigs bsdus pa// slob dpon bdag
332b7(rgyud): ni 'jug par mdzod// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba// skal pa chen po bdag la stsol// mtshan rnams rjesu gsol btab pa// dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong
332b8(rgyud): pa/ slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol// dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che// sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// de nas slob
333a1(rgyud): // dpon gyi rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni// byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa// gsang ba yis ni 'khor lo 'dir// 'jug cing byang chub sngo
333a2(rgyud): pa 'tshal// de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu song // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa brtan
333a3(rgyud): por gyur// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // blo gros chen po khyod kyis zung // byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes bshad// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis// bla ma sangs rgyas
333a4(rgyud): kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dgas pa'i// sdom pa dam/ tshig yin par gsungs/ rin chen rigs ni bsdus pa/ ni/ nyin mo gsum dang mtshan mo gsum/ zang zing mi 'dzin
333a5(rgyud): chos dang byams/ sbyin pa rnams bzhi rab sbyin bya// phyi dang ga sang ba theg pa gsum// dam chos khyod kyi gzung bar bya/ 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par

333a7(rgyud): dag pas dam par ni bshad/ mi spring dor bar yang mi bya/ rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'di bshad// nyin mo gsum dang mtshan gsum du// nyin ro zhing ni brjod par bya// gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa/ lha/ 
333a8(rgyud): basbom po dag tu 'gyur/ khyod kyis srog chags bsod mi bya/ me byin par yang mi blang ngo // 'dod pa logs par mi smad cing // brdzun yang smra bar mi bya'o// phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ chang
333b1(rgyud): ni btung ba rnam par spang // sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa/ bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / dam pa'i drung du gnas bya zhing // rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ lus kyi las ni rnam
333b2(rgyud): pa gsum// ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni// ci nus pas ni rje su brkyang // theg pa dman la dga' mi bya// sems can don la rgyab phyogs min// 'khor bdag kyang
333b3(rgyud): yongs mi spang // rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags// lha dang lha min gsang ba ba// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing / phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang / mtshan ma 'gom par yang mi bya// 'di dag dam
333b4(rgyud): tshig zhes bshad do// de dag ni blo gros khyed kyis bsrung bar bya// des kyang 'di skad brjod par bya// slob dang na khyod ni 'ang dag la gson// gtso bo ji ltar bka' bsgo ba// de ltar bdag
333b5(rgyud): ni bgyid par 'tshal// ji ltar dus gsum dgon po rnams/  nga chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i zhes pa nas sems can na/ ngan las 'das la 'god ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par

333b7(rgyud): ud pA da yA mi zhes pa 'dis/ byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// de yi snying khar snying pos ni// rdo rje rab tu bzhag par bya// su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM hoHbadz+ra sim+b+ha
333b8(rgyud): yab su kha zhis pa 'diso// de nas rdo rje hU~M mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la dri dang me tog le sogs pas mchod de me tog phreng ba gdags shing // gdong dri zhim pos byugs la yon gyi mtsha
334a1(rgyud): bzung ste/ phyi rol na gnas pa la bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la// oM grah+Na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM bzhes pa 'dis khro bo ti rin ti ri rang nyid bcings la slob ma mching du gtsug/ rdo rje bsdam
334a2(rgyud): pa nang byas la// mthe bong rdo rje dam pa yis// yid kyi khro bos dga' byas pas// khro bo ti rin ti ri dran// de nas de nyid kyi mthe bong dag gi me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la snying po 'dis bzhug/ 
334a3(rgyud): par bya ste/ badz+ra sa ma ya pra ti sh+yA mi zhes pa'o// shar gyi sgor yang rdo rje lcags kyus de dgug cing lhor zhags pas gzhugo/ nub tu lcags sgrog gis bcing zhing // byang du rdo rje 'bebs
334a4(rgyud): pas dbab po// yang shar gyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod do// deng khyod de bzhin gshegs dpa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi deng nas ngas khyod la rdo rje'i
334a5(rgyud): sems bskyed par bya// ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan rnams lta ci smos// khyod kyis
334a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o// khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid khro bo ti rin te ri kha gyen du lta ba dang bcas pas
334a7(rgyud): bcings la/ rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras te/ 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje yin te gal te khyed 'ga' zhig la smras na spyi bong gems par 'gyur ro// de nas
334a8(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang // mna'i snying po lan gcig bzlas pa'i chu rdo rje slob mde 'thung du gzhug go// de la mni'i snying po 'di yin te// rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ snying
334b1(rgyud): la yang dag zhugs par mdzod// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// badz+ra ud dka wa zhes bya'o// de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces smra'o// deng nas brtsams nas khyod kyi
334b2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis// ngas 'di gyis shig ces gang bsgo ba de bya dgos so// khyod yang bam spangs par dus kyi bya ba byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes pa'o// de'i rjes la rang gi
334b3(rgyud): snying khar yi ge a rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan par bsam mo// de nas slob ma'i snying kha dang / mdzod spu dang / 'grin po dang / spyi bo rnamasu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa
334b4(rgyud): 'bar ba dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs bsam te/ oM drA hri aHzhes pa 'di dag gi go rims bzhin du'o// sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas rang dang slob ma'i snying khar phye la rang gi
334b5(rgyud): snying kha'i yi ge yaM las yi ge byung la/ sgrib mi'i snying kharaganas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus blos bcug la lus thams cad gang bar bsam mo// 'di skad ces brjod do// de bzhin

334b8(rgyud): sum cu ngo // bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / drug cu dang / bdun cu dang / brgyad cu dang / dgu bcu dang / lan brgyar brjod denges par 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje'i khu tshur bcings la

335a3(rgyud): 'khor la rdo rje hUM gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog dmar po 'bar bar gang bzhin par bsam mo// slar yang gal te 'bab par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe dril bu dang bcas pas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi

335a8(rgyud): yam shing 'jag ma rnams kyis me// rab 'bor rdo rje khro bo yi// mnyam par bzhag pas dbul ba yi/ de yi sdig pa thams cad ni// til gyi sbyin sreg des ngas sreg oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra yasaH
335b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / lag pa g.yas pa'i 'thil du ti la nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la/ yi ge hUMng dbu su bsams te/ mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag gis sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas sbyin

336a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ he badz+ra pa sh+ya zhes pa 'dis gdong g.yogs dgro'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te ji srid rnam par snang mdzad kyi mthar thug par bstan// de na/

337a2(rgyud): pa mi 'gyur zhing // mu ge ca co che rnams dang / pha rol dmag tshogs nyams par 'gyur// lha dang klu rnams sgro chen gyis// bde bar yang ni skyong bar 'gyur// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams dang /

337a4(rgyud): chen gdugs sogs mchog rnams ni// rnam pa sna chog/ sa mchod byas te/ phyag na rdo rje rgyal dbang la// dag pa'i bsam pas yang dag bstod// sangs rgyas kun pas sngar

337a6(rgyud): rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba// rdo rje mtshon cha rdo rje che// phyag ni rdo rje phyag chen po// rdo rje mda' ste rab 'bigs pa/ rdo rje rnon po rno pa che// che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che/ rdo rje pad+ma

337b1(rgyud): rung skrag byed ma rungs pa// drag po 'jigs byed rnga ma byed pa/ sgrub dka' sgrub pa legs pa ste/ rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa/ rdo rje dga' ba dga' ba che// dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang byed pa/ rdo rje gzi
337b2(rgyud): brjid gzi brjid che/ 'bar 'od gshin rje mthar byed po// rdo rje drag po drag po che// 'od thug pa ni 'jug pa ste// na mkha' dang ni mnyam pa yi// re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ rdo rje dbang bskur rin
337b3(rgyud): chen mchog rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon tan mtsho/ rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ rigs pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis mchod/ hA lA ha la nag po che/ sgra chen rnam par sgeg pa po// rdo rje 'dod pa 'dod pa che// snyigs
337b4(rgyud): ma'i rnyog ma 'joms pa po// dus kyi g.yo ba'i gcod pa'i/ mchog zhal ni ljags kyi glog 'phro ma// rdo rje me ste rab tu dgatum pa'i rab snang 'joms pa po// nyi ma stong gi 'od zer
337b5(rgyud): zhal/ spyan dmar 'jigs par mdzad pa po// khro bo du ma'i 'od 'phro ba/ phyag ni du ma'i mtshon cha rgya/ du ma'i zhal te/ sku yang stong / 'khyil cing sku yang 'khyil ba lags/ thug
337b6(rgyud): chos bdag nyid sku mi mngar// rnam par rtogs pa ma lus spangs// ma rigs 'joms pa tshangs pa ste/ 'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad/ sgyu ma khyab 'jug rdo rje can/ mdung can rtse gsum
337b7(rgyud): 'chang 'phrog byed// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ srid dang srid min rnam sbyong ba/ zhi zhing dul la dag pa che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtogs mdzad// sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku// 
337b8(rgyud): rdo rje legs skyes rdo rje sems/ kun tu bzang po cher bzang ba/ mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa po// khams kun bdag nyid khyab pa po// thams cad rdo rje'i bdag nyid gtsang / gang gi 'di bris
338a1(rgyud): / klog pa dang // rtag tu don ni 'chang byed dam// dran na mnyan par byed kyang rung / phyag na rdo rje mnyam par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // brgya byin dang
338a2(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa phan pa dang bde ba thob pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis
338a3(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongasu sbyong ba gzi brjid rgyal po'i brtags pa phyogs
338a4(rgyud): gcig pa rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po re ban dra de dba'i zhabs dang / bla ma pa Na tshon skyes bu chen po mA Ni ka shrI
338a5(rgyud): dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas gus par gnyan te chag lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i/ dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gta zhi la phab pa/ spre'u lo dbyug gu zla ba'i mar
338a6(rgyud): de'i tshe sa bcu gsum la/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thang po tshar dbu gtsugs nas/ smin drug zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi snga dro'o bar zhag bco lngar 'gro ba'i tshe dpa' rba
338a7(rgyud): lha'i gding su tshar bar bgyis// dpal ldan rgyud rgyal ngan song sbyong ba yi// brtag pa phyogs gcig sngar grags kha che nas// chos rgyal sku drin pa Na chen sgra bsgyur mchog/ skyes
338a8(rgyud): chen rnams kyis legs par dar ba mdzad// 'di ni dpal ldan kun dga'i snying po dang // rje btsun 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa yi// man ngag la rten rgya gar bal po na// yongs
338b1(rgyud): glags bla ma'i drin las kho bos bsgyur// sgra gzhung bla ma'i gsung bzhin du// gus bsgyur nongs pa mkhas chen rnams// bzod mdzad de bges 'gro ba kun// 'gro mgon thub chen nyid gyur
338b2(rgyud): cigargya gar skad du/ saM kre ba pra tiSh+Tha bi ti tin+ta/ bod skad du/ rab tu gnas pa mdor smras pa'i cho ga'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad
338b3(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig/ rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// brdungs pa/ 
338b4(rgyud): dang / bris pa dang / 'bur du byas pa la sogs pa'i rab tu ga/ nas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa/ slob dpon de nyid bcu / so shing // mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya sngag/ 
338b5(rgyud): dang chog shes// las rnams kun la mkhas paso// sku gzugs mtshan nyid ldan pa ste/ zhi ba la sogs rim sa ldan/ tshad kyis tshad la phab cing bzang // de 'dra rab tu
338b6(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur// yang thog mchod rten sogs gnas dang / khyim dang lha yi gnas rnams/ sangs rgyas la sogs rabang gnas ni// cho dang ldan pas bya// cho ga dman pas mi bya ste/ rab
338b7(rgyud): gnas rtag par bkra mi shes// 'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal la// 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa che/ de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// dngos grub 'dod pas nan tan bya// cho ga
338b8(rgyud): bdag nyid nus pa yi// brtag pa las gsungs tshul legs pas// de byas bsod nams che ba ni// mthong dang mi mthong rnamasu skye// sku gzugs sngags kyis mtshan nyid kyis// de la byin
339a1(rgyud): / rlub 'jug par 'gyur// gang du sku gzugs rdzogs pa la/ byin ma rlabs par ring gnas na// de la bkra mi shis 'gyur zhing // de srid mchod par de mi 'os// dper na skyes bu la
339a2(rgyud): la zhig/ rig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa na// 'jig rten kun gyis mchod mi byed// de de bzhin du gzugs mnyan te// rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la/ gang gis mchod cing phyag byed pa// dam
339a3(rgyud): tshig bral zhing sngags dman pas// sbyin sreg thal ba 'bras med mtshungaso// de bzhin du yang sngags gnas pas/ chos ldan mchod pa byed pa gang // de yi las kyi rnam smin gyis// skye ba ru ni mtsho/ 
339a4(rgyud): par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pra/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa lpags na/ ji ltar na rgyal ba rnams kyis rab tu gnas pa lags/ 
339a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas/ kun ni rab tu bzhugs// rab tu gnas pa gang na'ang me // kun tu mkha' ltar gnas pa la// gcig shos kyi ni
339a6(rgyud): rab tu brtags// 'jig rten kun rdzob la rten nas/ rab tu gnas pa rab tu brtags// dam pa'i don du dpyad pa na/ gang zhig gang gis gang du brlab/ bzod ma nas ni skye med pa// ci 'dras ji ltar rab
339a7(rgyud): tu gnas/ dang po'i las can sems can rnams// rtogs pa'i rgyu ru bshad par zad// dang por re shig yongasu brtag pa'i gnas yongasu sbyangs pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / 
339a8(rgyud): bla re dang / bdan sgreng ba rnam su mchog tu gsol ba 'debs pas// gsol te btab ba'i bla ma spos dang me tog la sogs pa dang ldan pas/ chos dang rgyu skar shis pa la slob dpon
339b1(rgyud): legs par mnyam par gzhag pas rab tu gnas pa'i sar 'khod de/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs lnga dang rab tu 'brel ba yin la/ de bzhin du rab tu / 
339b2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs sa yongasu bzung zhing rdul tshon gyi las dang / thig gdab pa dang / gsol ba gdab la sogs pa byas la/ rtsa ba'i sngags sam/ rgyud kyi dgongs pas sa'i
339b3(rgyud): gter du nor bu'am sor gdungab bcug la/ de nas lho'i khang par rang gi slob ma bcug ste/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs de'i skur bltas la/ lba
339b4(rgyud): la mngon par phyogs te phyag 'tshal zhing // ji ltar 'gro dar ba'i me tog thal mo dang / dri chu gtsang mas chog pa bzhin brtags la/ ting nge 'dzin la legs gnas pas/ 
339b5(rgyud): zhabs bsil me tog pos sogs ldan// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni// mchod yon rnams ni phul byas la// mnyam par gzhag pas sngags 'di yis// lan gsu
339b6(rgyud): bar du brjod par bya'o// oM sa ma ya ste sa ma ya ho sa ma ya ha/ ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni// dga' ldan du ni gnas pa yi// lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar// de bzhin gzugs
339b7(rgyud): brnyan 'dir bzhugs zhig/ 'di ru mgon po rtag bzhugs nas// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / 'di zhes bya ba'i don slad du// bdag gi 'byor pa nyid kyis ni// ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa rnams
339b8(rgyud): me tog la sogs 'di bzhes shig/ bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ rje su brtse bas dgongasu gsol// kun gyis 'di la byin rlabs shing // de nyid ni bzhugs par rigs// sku gzugs ste
340a1(rgyud): / gon legs byas la// de nas brtag pa mnyam par brtsam// slob ma bsrung bar gnas pa yi// de ltar thams cad dpyad byas la/ sngags pas mchod pa'i cho ga sogs// bla ma yis ni/ 
340a2(rgyud): gang bsgo ga/ mtshogs pa kun bsgrub par bya// mchod yon 'bras bu chen po 'gyur// de nas sngags pas snyan gsan dbab// gdan la bstim byas mchod yon dang // mchod pa spos dang me tog
340a3(rgyud): dang / de bzhin du ni mar me dang // sngags dang ldan pas dbul bar bya// sku gzugs mdun du phyogs byas la// na bza' ser pos g.yog bya zhing // de nas sngags pas 'du bya ba// khyad par du
340a4(rgyud): ni bdug par bya// de nas grub phyir de la ni// de la lan gcig do gter bya ba/ de nas de la sngags 'dis ni// me dang de na das chu la ni// oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+rA ya swA hA// zhes bya bas// 
340a5(rgyud): so/ 'di nas rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// don bzhin du ni bsgom bya ste// de nas gsum gnas rnamasu bstim/ oM hUM AHyig gsum/ oM yig spyi bor bstim bya zhing // 
340a6(rgyud): snying khar hUM gi yi ger 'gyur// ngag gi phyogasu AHyig go// sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub par bya// yang na gang gi sa bon gang yin pa// de yi thugs khar de dgod// phyag rgya sngags kyis rab
340a7(rgyud): bskul zhing / ci rigs pa ni snyan gas na dbab// gser ram dngul lam zangs ma'am// rdo dang de bzhin shing dang ni// yang na shing lo'i mdab ma rnams// mchod yon du ni sbyar bar bya// de bzhin
340a8(rgyud): bum pa gser la sogs// zangs ma'i snod kyi mchod yon ni// mchod yon snod la rab tu shes// gal te nus pas ma rnyed na// ji ltar rnyed pas kun tu bya// de nas de yi ti la mar sogs// dur
340b1(rgyud): ba'i phon gyi pir gyis sbyang // bkra shis rnga la sogs pa'i sgras// na chung rnams kyis de bzhin brjod// til mar la sogs pa'i sngags ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ bum pa lnga'am yang
340b2(rgyud): na brgyad// tsan dan la sogs rnams kyis byug/ sna tshogs dri chus dgang ba dang / 'khor lo byas la mngon par bsngags// bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu'am// yang na bso ma'i skud pa'ang rung // tshon
340b3(rgyud): chen po yis bsgyur byas la// de la sngags kyis dkri bar bya/ sman snga rin chen lnga dang ni/ me tog 'bras bur ldan pa ste// sku gsum pa dang yungs kar ldan// bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya// gtsug
340b4(rgyud): gtor rnam rgyal zhes bya ba// gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi rdzi dang // ba dkra shis zhi rnams sngags kyis ni/ khrus kyi ched du mngon bar sngags// 'jam pa'i til mar dag dang ni// u dum pa ra'i
340b5(rgyud): lcug ma bzang // mkhor ba'i snod kyi nang dag tu/ bkod la rab tu dbul bar bya// dri lnga yis ni de nas byug/ sa bon lnga ni gtor ba bya// slob mtshogs dang bcas pa yi// sngags
340b6(rgyud): kyis gtsang sbras bkru bar bya// bkra shis zhes bya yid 'ong ba'i// blo dang ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod// rig ma spyan ma ji bzhin du// cho ga bzhin du mngon dbang bskur// sngags ni ji ltar bsnam
340b7(rgyud): pa tsam gyis ni// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar// de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo// zhes bya ba la sogs paso// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Sha ka ta sa
340b8(rgyud): ma ya shrId+d+ha// lugs ma la ni dngos bkru/ ri mo rnams ni me long la'i// dag byed lngas ni sngon du sgo// dur ba yis ni meng par bya// ras sa ma la gang dag gis ni// blo dang ldan pas sku lus
341a1(rgyud): pri/ gur gum mar dang bcas pas bsku// gos bzang dag kyang sku la gsol// blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di yis// dkyil 'khor dbu su bzhugasu gsol// oM d+hi badz+ra bAs sa
341a2(rgyud): swA hA/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he swAhA/ oM badz+ra A ba ra Na ba su ra Ne swAhA/ blo ldan gyis rang dam tshig bskul/ phyag rgya sngags kyis dbang bskur la/ ji ltar 'os par mngon dbang bskur/ oM hUM aM
341a3(rgyud): badz+ri khe/ de ltar tsi dben bcing ba byas la/ bzhugasu gsol te brtag pa las gsungs pa'i tshul gyiso// mdun gyi phyogs ni ma nub cing // yo ba min zhing drang ba yis// de ltar sku gzugs
341a4(rgyud): mdzes par dgod// de ltar min na skyon 'byung 'gyur// ma tog sogs dang de bzhin dri/ mar min bza' sogs sbyor gang // de kun sngags dang ldan pa yis// lha rnams la ni
341a5(rgyud): dbul bar bya/ oM puSh+pe AHhUM/ zhes bya ba 'di dag la sog/ sa paso// mchog gi me tog 'di dag ni/ chu dang thang las de bzhin skyes// mchog tu dad pas khyed la dngul/ 
341a6(rgyud): bde bar ni so sor bzhes/ lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung // mchog gi bdug pa 'di dag ni/ bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ ci bde bar ni bzhe su gsol// lhan cig skyes dang
341a7(rgyud): sbyar las byung / mchog tu gyur pa'i dri 'di ni// mchog gi dad pas 'dul lags kyis// ci bde bar ni so sor bzhes/ mun pa 'joms byed snang ba'i mchog mar dang til gyi mar me 'di// yang
341a8(rgyud): dag ye shes spyan dpe phyir// dad pas bdag gis dbul bar bgyi// bza' dang bca' ba phun sum tshogs// kha dog dri ro rnams dang ldan// thams cad ldan pa lha yi bshos// bdag gis
341b1(rgyud): dbul gyis so sor bzhes// de la sogs pa gang yang rung / cung zad ci 'byor sku gzugs la/ de dag thams cad 'di nyid kyis// rim pa yis ni dbul bar bya// sngags kyi gtsang sbra tsAru/ 
341b2(rgyud): bya/ der ni gser gyi rang bzhin gyi// thur mas spyan ni dbye bar bya// zhal zas der dbul blo ldan pas/ oM tsakru tsak+ShaHsa man+ta tsak+Shu ra bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ oM di bya a ne sa mA d+hi d+h+ya na pra Na ma
341b3(rgyud): swA hA// de ltar byas te de rnams yang // slob ma rab tu bcug byas la// khyod kyis nga la gang gsol ba'i// sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du// ji ltar gsungs par rab gnas par// de dag don
341b4(rgyud): ni ngas byas te// de rnams don ni grub zin gyis// ci bde bar ni mchod par byos// de nas dam tshig dbang bskur ba sa/ khyod la byas kyis bsregs blugs ni// stong ngam yang na
341b5(rgyud): de yi phyed// mngar gsum brtags la 'bru rnams kyis/ 'o ma can gyi bud shing la/ srag khung gru bzhi sregs blugs bya// de nyid mar dang 'o ma yis// lhag pa'i
341b6(rgyud): ru phul byas pas/ bdag dang slob ma thams cad ni// zhi dang rgyas pa 'phel bar bya/ oM badz+ra A yu She swA hU~M/ A gats+tsha ha ri ping ga la dIp+ta k+Sha de hi de hi dA pA ya i dan tsa me kA ru ku ru sAtra/ 
341b7(rgyud): oM badz+ra puSh+pA ye swA hA/ de ltar byas la 'bang pa yis/ khri yi steng du bzhugs par bya// sku gzugs kyi ni sum 'gyur cha'i// tshad tsam du ni rab tu bsgrags// oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+re swAhA/ 
341b8(rgyud): me tog spos sogs sngon 'gro bas/ phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod par bya/ oM in+d+ra ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba dbang ldan la thug gi bar du// rol mo'i sgral sogs pas yang dge par
342a1(rgyud): mchod de// gshegs su gsol bar bya ba ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras// tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs rnams dang // gang dag cho ga mtshangs pas// 
342a2(rgyud): dag bzod pa mdzad pa'i rigs// kun tu zhi dang rgyas pa ru// yon bdag tsha la rab mdzad nas/ sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni// slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol// sa dang chu dang me
342a3(rgyud): rlung gi/ lha rnams kun gyi sku gzugs la// bskal pa brgya ru srung gnas mdzod/ dgyes shing yid bzang 'gyur ba yis// slob dpon bla mar bcas pa yi/ bu dang che bo srung mdzad nas// rang
342a4(rgyud): gnas dge bar gshigasu gsol// dpyid zla ra ba'am/ dpyid zla 'bring // dgun dang dpyid kyi tha chungs sam// dbyar zla de bzhin dbyar 'bring ngo // nyi ma byang du gnas pa yi/ 
342a5(rgyud): dkar po phyogs kyi gnyis pa'am// rims bzhin de ltar gsum pa'am// gong tshe gza' dang rjes 'thun na// nag po'i phyogs la'ang brtsam par bya// gang
342a6(rgyud): tshe thams cad 'thun gyur na// mi rnams yun du 'phel bar byed// bco lnga de bzhin brgyad pa dang // bcu gsum pa yang de bzhin no// gnam stong dang ni
342a7(rgyud): de bzhin du// bcu bzhi pa la'ang bya ba min// thams cad du ni chu smad dang // snar ma gro zhun de bzhin te// lag pa snrubs dang snron dang ni// rgyal
342a8(rgyud): dang chu smad de bzhin no// khrums smad dag kyang de bzhin du// rgyu skar 'di rnams thams cad du// skye dgu 'phel zhing de yin// rab tu gnas pa mchog
342b1(rgyud): tu byed/ yid la 'dod pa ci yang rung // dngos grub me bzhis ster bar 'gyur// lung las shes pa'i yang dag pa// khyams sam yang na gro bzhin gyis/ 
342b2(rgyud): lagogs skal bzang snar mas ni// gzhan dag las ni rgyal bar byed// mgo yis zhing nye bar ston// chu stod kyis ni bu dag gson// rtag par dngos grub khrums smad
342b3(rgyud): kyis// rgyal gyis rtag par tshe ring 'gyur// snron gyis mchog tu bde bar byed// lha mtshams kyis ni mchog ster 'gyur// phur bu lag dang pa bsangs// zla ba'i
342b4(rgyud): gza' sogs shes bya ste// 'di rnams bzang da ldan la byas na// rab tu gnas pa mchog tu dge gsum pa drug pa bdun pa la// bcu dang bcu gcig
342b5(rgyud): la zla ba// gnyis pa bzhi pa de bzhin brgyad// bcu dang bcu gcig rnams la lag/ gnyis dang bdun dang de bzhin dgu// de bzhin phur bu bcu
342b6(rgyud): gcig pa// dus sbyor bzhi pa la brten nas// de la lhog par gnas par bya// drug bdun bcu pa dor ba yis// pa ba sangs nyid dge ba yin// de ltar bza' rnams thams cad kyi// 
342b7(rgyud): stobs ldan mi ldan der shes bya// gang tshe zhi ba'i gza' rnams dang // zhing rnams zhi ba dge ba yin// dang po lnga pa gsum de bzhin// nor rnams 'joms pa spang bar bya// rje su 'thun
342b8(rgyud): par byed pa pos// skad cig de'i yangs grub cing // ji ltar gsungs bzhin kun byas na// rab tu gnas pa mchog 'gyur zhing // 'khor los bsgyur rgyal dbang phyug ni// thob 'gyur 'di
343a1(rgyud): la the tshom med// gza' dang rgyu skar 'dir med de// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med// gza' rnams thams cad rjes 'thun phyir// bgegs dang rgyu
343a2(rgyud): skar lha rnams nyid// de ru sgrub par kun gnas shing // gzugs brnyan mchod rten la sogs kyis// dngos grub dag ni ster bar mdzad// yid kyis cung zad gang bsams pa// skye
343a3(rgyud): dang skye ba 'grub par 'gyur// rgyan rnams ma lus pa yis ni// phyi nas gzo bo rnams la mchod// gang dag de la grog byed pa// gzhan dag kyang ni mchod par bya// de nas de dag thams cad
343a4(rgyud): la// dga' bas 'di skad brjod par bya// ji ltar gsung sa pa'i mchod pa rnams// bdag la 'thun pa'i nus pa/ med// de phyir khyod la bdag bzod gsol// sngags kyi
343a5(rgyud): gtsang sbra'i bza' ba dag/ gzugs brnyan dag la bani na bya ste// bder gshegs lhag ma 'di dag ni// zos nga sdig pa byang bar 'gyur// zhes bya bas so// glang po rtagaglas
343a6(rgyud): shing rta nir// yon gyi dam pa dbul bar bya// de nas de la nan tan gyis// longs spyod g.yo ba dbul bar bya// gal te lha nyid dgyes 'dod na// bla ma gus pas dgyes pa zhing // de ltar rnam
343a7(rgyud): pa thams cad du// bla ma yang dag mnyes par bya// de nas gang dag brtul zhugs can// dge slong dge bsnyen dge slong ma// mchog tu grub pas mchod byas la// ji ltar 'os pa'i yon
343a8(rgyud): yang dbul// dung ngam rol mo ska la sogs// bzang ba'i glu dang gar rnams kyis// gnyen dang rigs brgyud 'khor rnams kyis/ rol mo chen po mtshan ma dngul// de ltar thams cad phul
343b1(rgyud): zin nas// gar rung mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la// phul lam dbul bar byed pa rnams// slob dpon la ni dbul bya yi// bzo bo la ni mi sbyin zhing // dge slong rnams la'ang sbyin mi bya/ 
343b2(rgyud): slob dpon mchog gi lha yin te// nor rnams thams cad de la dbul// de nas dkyil 'khor byug byas te// ba yi lci bas byugs byas shing // rdul tshon chu bor rab dor ro// de yis
343b3(rgyud): yang dag legs par 'gyur// rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud rdzog so// dur khrod dag dang shan
343b4(rgyud): pa yi// khyim dang srin po'i gnas rnams su// mngon spyod kyi ni las bya ba// thab khung tham par ma mchog/ phyed dang gsum mam// khru dgu ni byas pa
343b5(rgyud): las// stegs bu de yi tshad brtsigs te// gru gsu/ ma pa'am mdung rtse 'dra// lugs phye sel phye dug gis ni// bskus pas thab khung nag por bya// dbus
343b6(rgyud): su rdo rje rje dgug// nag po shin tu 'bar 'bri// myur na snang du rje gsum dang // rgya gram pa yi rdo rjes mtshan// de yi phyi rol mu khyud la// dbyug pa dang ni dgra
343b7(rgyud): ral gri shin tu 'bar ba bri// de yi phyi rol keng rus te// bdagashegs la sogs phyag rgyas mtshan// dud sprin mdog 'dra drang srong mchog
343b8(rgyud): yi steng bzhugs rtse gsum dang // gzar bu phreng ba ril bar ldan// de lta'i me lha spyan drangs nos// lhor bltas khros pa'i sems kyis sreg/ shin tu gdug
